SIR_NNP ,_, I_PRP have_VBP the_DT honour_NN to_TO forward_VB herewith_JJ Part_NNP I._NNP of_IN the_DT Report_NNP on_IN Plague_NNP Operations_NNP in_IN Bombay_NNP during_IN the_DT year_NN ending_VBG 31st_CD May_NNP 1899_CD ._.
This_DT portion_NN of_IN the_DT report_NN deals_NNS with_IN general_JJ plague_NN measures_NNS in_IN the_DT City_NNP ,_, and_CC has_VBZ been_VBN written_VBN by_IN Mr._NNP J._NNP H._NNP DuBoulay_NNP ,_, I._NNP C._NNP S._NNP ,_, Deputy_NNP Commissioner_NNP in_IN charge_NN ,_, Plague_NNP Operations_NNP ._.

2_CD ._.
The_DT assistance_NN rendered_VBN by_IN a_DT number_NN of_IN gentlemen_NNS has_VBZ been_VBN recognized_VBN in_IN the_DT report_NN ,_, and_CC I_PRP heartily_RB endorse_VBP the_DT remarks_NNS therein_RB contained_VBD ._.
I_PRP have_VBP only_RB now_RB to_TO bring_VB to_TO the_DT notice_NN of_IN Government_NNP the_DT services_NNS of_IN those_DT officers_NNS who_WP have_VBP not_RB already_RB been_VBN mentioned_VBN ._.
Since_IN the_DT 12th_CD August_NNP 1898_CD all_DT plague_NN measures_NNS in_IN the_DT City_NNP ,_, with_IN the_DT excep-_JJ tion_NN of_IN the_DT control_NN of_IN Hospitals_NNP ,_, have_VBP been_VBN under_IN the_DT direction_NN of_IN Mr._NNP DuBoulay_NNP whose_WP$ previous_JJ experience_NN as_IN Deputy_NNP Municipal_NNP Commissioner_NNP and_CC success_NN as_IN a_DT District_NNP Plague_NNP Officer_NNP had_VBD marked_VBN him_PRP out_RP as_IN special-_JJ ly_NN fitted_VBN for_IN the_DT difficult_JJ post_NN he_PRP now_RB holds_VBZ ._.

The_DT numerous_JJ improve-_JJ ments_NNS which_WDT he_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN able_JJ to_TO effect_NN in_IN the_DT existing_VBG system_NN of_IN work-_JJ and_CC I_PRP would_MD specially_RB mention_VB the_DT difficult_JJ problem_NN of_IN death_NN registration-_NN illustrates_VBZ the_DT thoroughness_NN of_IN his_PRP$ supervision_NN and_CC his_PRP$ admirable_JJ powers_NNS of_IN organization_NN and_CC the_DT fact_NN that_IN while_IN strictly_RB enforcing_VBG the_DT orders_NNS of_IN Government_NN he_PRP has_VBZ won_VBN the_DT confidence_NN of_IN the_DT volunteers_NNS ,_, and_CC leaders_NNS of_IN all_DT Communities_NNP ,_, bear_JJ eloquent_JJ testimony_NN to_TO the_DT sympathetic_JJ considera-_JJ tion_NN towards_IN the_DT people_NNS which_WDT has_VBZ always_RB been_VBN a_DT marked_JJ feature_NN of_IN his_PRP$ administrative_JJ work_NN ._.
ii_RB 3_CD ._.

Their_PRP$ duties_NNS during_IN the_DT continuance_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_NNS have_VBP been_VBN most_JJS loyally_RB performed_VBN ,_, and_CC while_IN some_DT officers_NNS have_VBP shown_VBN greater_JJR aptitude_NN than_IN others_NNS all_DT have_VBP endeavoured_VBN by_IN patience_NN and_CC an_DT unsparing_JJ devotion_NN to_TO work_VB which_WDT is_VBZ always_RB monotonous_JJ and_CC frequently_RB difficult_JJ and_CC irksome_JJ to_TO attain_VB the_DT end_NN in_IN view_NN ._.

?_. iii_JJ 7_CD ._.
I_PRP have_VBP received_VBN at_IN all_DT times_NNS the_DT greatest_JJS aid_NN from_IN Mr._NNP R._NNP H._NNP Vincent_NNP ,_, C.I.E._NNP ,_, and_CC Mr._NNP Kennedy_NNP ,_, Commissioners_NNP of_IN Police_NNP ,_, and_CC from_IN Mr._NNP H._NNP G._NNP Gell_NNP ,_, Deputy_NNP Commissioner_NNP of_IN Police_NNP ._.
It_PRP was_VBD fortunately_RB un-_JJ necessary_JJ to_TO use_VB coercion_NN to_TO any_DT great_JJ extent_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT knowledge_NN that_IN we_PRP could_MD rely_VB on_IN the_DT hearty_JJ co-operation_NN of_IN the_DT Police_NNP authorities_NNS enabled_VBD us_PRP to_TO work_VB with_IN a_DT confidence_NN that_WDT would_MD otherwise_RB have_VB been_VBN absent_JJ ._.
8_CD ._.
The_DT attitude_NN of_IN the_DT Corporation_NNP placed_VBD ,_, as_IN it_PRP was_VBD ,_, in_IN a_DT some-_JJ what_WP difficult_JJ position_NN ,_, has_VBZ been_VBN of_IN a_DT friendly_JJ character_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT dis-_JJ cussions_NNS that_WDT have_VBP taken_VBN place_NN on_IN various_JJ points_NNS connected_VBN with_IN Plague_NNP Administration_NNP have_VBP never_RB been_VBN calculated_VBN to_TO hamper_VB or_CC embarrass_VB ._.
Many_JJ of_IN the_DT individual_JJ members_NNS have_VBP worked_VBN with_IN the_DT greatest_JJS energy_NN in_IN their_PRP$ districts_NNS and_CC many_JJ have_VBP assisted_VBN in_IN other_JJ directions_NNS ._.
I_PRP have_VBP already_RB had_VBN the_DT pleasure_NN of_IN bringing_VBG their_PRP$ names_NNS to_TO the_DT notice_NN of_IN Govern-_NNP ment_NN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP the_DT honour_NN to_TO be_VB ,_, Sir_NNP ,_, Your_NNP most_RBS obedient_JJ Servant_NNP ,_, W._NNP L._NNP HARVEY_NNP ,_, Municipal_NNP Commissioner_NNP for_IN the_DT City_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
CHAPTER_NN I_PRP ._.
GENERAL_NNP ._.
Introduction_NN ._.
SINCE_NNP plague_NN first_RB became_VBD established_VBN in_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, there_EX have_VBP only_RB been_VBN 8_CD days_NNS on_IN which_WDT the_DT Official_NNP Returns_NNP showed_VBD no_DT attacks_NNS or_CC deaths_NNS ._.
Of_IN these_DT 7_CD occurred_VBD in_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN July_NNP 1897_CD ,_, and_CC 1_CD in_IN August_NNP of_IN the_DT same_JJ year_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ not_RB therefore_RB necessary_JJ ,_, in_IN dealing_VBG with_IN the_DT past_JJ epidemic_NN ,_, to_TO search_VB for_IN its_PRP$ origin_NN outside_IN the_DT limits_NNS of_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
How_WRB the_DT disease_NN spreads_VBZ from_IN man_NN to_TO man_NN ,_, why_WRB at_IN certain_JJ seasons_NNS ,_, in_IN spite_NN of_IN all_PDT that_WDT can_MD be_VB done_VBN ,_, it_PRP assumes_VBZ epidemic_JJ proportions_NNS ,_, and_CC why_WRB ,_, again_RB ,_, at_IN other_JJ seasons_NNS ,_, with_IN precisely_RB the_DT same_JJ measures_NNS in_IN force_NN it_PRP relapses_VBZ into_IN comparative_JJ inactivity_NN ,_, are_VBP subjects_NNS about_IN which_WDT we_PRP are_VBP little_JJ wiser_JJR now_RB than_IN we_PRP were_VBD at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT first_JJ epidemic_NN ._.
It_PRP might_MD be_VB urged_VBN that_IN ,_, with_IN a_DT numerous_JJ staff_NN so_RB long_RB and_CC persis-_JJ tently_RB engaged_VBN on_IN plague_NN duty_NN ,_, there_EX should_MD be_VB a_DT mass_NN of_IN material_NN available_JJ for_IN the_DT elucidation_NN of_IN such_JJ questions_NNS ;_: but_CC the_DT conditions_NNS of_IN plague_NN administration_NN offer_NN few_JJ facilities_NNS for_IN scientific_JJ observation_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ an_DT experience_NN common_JJ to_TO most_JJS of_IN those_DT who_WP have_VBP come_VBN in_IN contact_NN with_IN plague_NN ,_, that_IN their_PRP$ knowledge_NN seems_VBZ to_TO contract_NN as_IN their_PRP$ experience_NN widens_VBZ ._.
The_DT scientific_JJ problems_NNS connected_VBN with_IN the_DT disease_NN will_MD ,_, no_DT doubt_NN ,_, be_VB fully_RB dealt_JJ with_IN in_IN the_DT report_NN of_IN the_DT Indian_JJ Plague_NNP Com-_NNP mission_NN ._.
This_DT report_NN will_MD be_VB confined_VBN to_TO the_DT facts_NNS of_IN the_DT last_JJ epidemic_JJ ,_, its_PRP$ progress_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT measures_NNS taken_VBN to_TO deal_VB with_IN it_PRP ,_, -with_VBZ a_DT few_JJ remarks_NNS on_IN the_DT results_NNS of_IN those_DT measures_NNS ,_, so_RB far_RB as_IN can_MD be_VB gathered_VBN from_IN the_DT limited_JJ and_CC unreliable_JJ data_NNS available_JJ ._.
Administra-_JJ tion_NN ,_, Government_NNP ,_, in_IN their_PRP$ Resolution_NN No_DT ._.
3018-3397-P_CD of_IN 27th_CD May_NNP 1898_CD ,_, transferred_VBD the_DT responsibility_NN of_IN plague_JJ administration_NN in_IN Bombay_NNP from_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Committee_NNP to_TO the_DT Municipal_NNP Commissioner_NNP ,_, under_IN the_DT direct_JJ control_NN of_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Commissioner_NNP ._.
They_PRP further_RB provided_VBD for_IN the_DT appointment_NN of_IN a_DT Special_JJ Deputy_NNP Commissioner_NNP and_CC a_DT Special_JJ Medical_JJ Officer_NNP ._.
2_CD The_DT month_NN of_IN May_NNP was_VBD occupied_VBN in_IN winding_VBG up_RP the_DT affairs_NNS of_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Committee_NNP ,_, and_CC Mr._NNP A._NNP Cumine_NNP ,_, I.C.S._NNP ,_, who_WP had_VBD relieved_VBN Sir_NNP J._NNP Campbell_NNP ,_, K.C.I.E._NNP ,_, I.C.S._NNP ,_, as_IN Chairman_NNP of_IN the_DT Committee_NNP ,_, actually_RB handed_VBN over_RP charge_NN of_IN plague_JJ operations_NNS to_TO the_DT Municipal_NNP Commis-_NNP sioner_NN ,_, Mr._NNP P._NNP C._NNP H._NNP Snow_NNP ,_, I.C.S._NNP ,_, on_IN the_DT 7th_CD June_NNP 1898_CD ;_: Mr._NNP W._NNP L._NNP Harvey_NNP ,_, I.C.S._NNP ,_, relieved_VBD Mr_NNP ._.
Snow_NNP on_IN the_DT 20th_JJ August_NNP ._.
Government_NNP more_RBR fully_RB defined_VBN the_DT powers_NNS and_CC duties_NNS of_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP Commissioner_NNP and_CC his_PRP$ assistants_NNS in_IN regard_NN to_TO Plague_NNP in_IN their_PRP$ Notification_NN No_DT ._.
4516-4779-P_CD of_IN the_DT 12th_CD August_NNP 1898_CD ,_, and_CC at_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN appointed_VBD Mr._NNP J._NNP H._NNP DuBoulay_NNP ,_, I.C.S._NNP ,_, to_TO be_VB Deputy_NNP Commissioner_NNP for_IN plague_NN operations_NNS ,_, and_CC Lieut.-Col._NNP J._NNP S._NNP Wilkins_NNP ,_, D.S.O._NNP ,_, I.M.S._NNP ,_, to_TO be_VB Special_JJ Medical_JJ Officer_NNP for_IN plague_NN operations_NNS ._.
Mr._NNP DuBoulay_NNP took_VBD charge_NN of_IN his_PRP$ duties_NNS on_IN the_DT same_JJ day_NN ,_, and_CC remained_VBD in_IN charge_NN till_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN ;_: Lieut.-Col._NNP Wilkins_NNP was_VBD placed_VBN at_IN the_DT disposal_NN of_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Government_NNP for_IN plague_NN duty_NN on_IN the_DT 7th_JJ October_NNP and_CC remained_VBD in_IN charge_NN till_NN he_PRP went_VBD on_IN privilege_NN leave_VBP in_IN the_DT first_JJ week_NN of_IN May_NNP 1899_CD ,_, when_WRB Dr._NNP C._NNP H._NNP Cayley_NNP ,_, Divisional_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, took_VBD over_RP his_PRP$ duties_NNS ._.

CENTRAL_JJ DISTRICT.-This_NNP District_NNP ,_, comprising_VBG portions_NNS of_IN Chakla_NNP ,_, Umarkhari_NNP ,_, Bhuleshwar_NNP ,_, Byculla_NNP and_CC the_DT whole_NN of_IN Kharatalao_NNP and_CC 2nd_CD Nagpada_NNP ,_, was_VBD constituted_VBN on_IN 1st_CD November_NNP and_CC was_VBD placed_VBN in_IN charge_NN of_IN Sirdar_NNP Mahommed_NNP Yakub_NNP ,_, Deputy_NNP Commissioner_NNP ,_, who_WP reported_VBD himself_PRP on_IN 7th_CD October_NNP 1898_CD and_CC was_VBD on_IN general_JJ duty_NN till_NN he_PRP took_VBD charge_NN ._.

Warneford_NNP took_VBD Mr._NNP C._NNP J._NNP Clark_NNP with_IN him_PRP from_IN C_NNP Ward_NNP ._.

The_DT above_NN shows_VBZ the_DT administrative_JJ sub-divisions_NNS of_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
They_PRP corresponded_VBD generally_RB with_IN the_DT Ward_NNP Divisions_NNP ;_: but_CC F_NNP and_CC G_NNP Wards_NNP were_VBD treated_VBN as_IN one_CD ,_, B_NNP Ward_NNP was_VBD divided_VBN into_IN two_CD ,_, -B_FW Ward_NNP ,_, ?_. 5_CD North_NNP comprising_VBG Umarkhari_NNP and_CC Dongri_NNP ;_: and_CC B_NNP Ward_NNP ,_, South_NNP ,_, compris-_JJ ing_NN Mandvi_NNP and_CC Chukla_NNP ._.
E._NNP Ward_NNP was_VBD divided_VBN into_IN three-E_JJ Ward_NNP ,_, West_NNP ,_, comprising_VBG Kamatipura_NNP ,_, 1st_CD Nagpada_NNP and_CC Tardeo_NNP ;_: E_NNP Ward_NNP ,_, East_NNP ,_, Byculla_NNP ,_, consisting_VBG of_IN that_DT section_NN only_RB ;_: and_CC E_NNP Ward_NNP East_NNP ,_, Wari_NNP Bandar_NNP ,_, including_VBG Mazagaum_NNP and_CC Tarwari_NNP ._.
The_DT success_NN attained_VBN by_IN Sirdar_NNP Mahomed_NNP Yakub_NNP in_IN dealing_VBG with_IN the_DT Karachi_NNP Mussulmans_NNPS during_IN the_DT plague_NN led_VBD to_TO his_PRP$ transfer_NN to_TO Bombay_NNP and_CC the_DT constitution_NN of_IN the_DT Central_NNP District_NNP ._.
The_DT sections_NNS included_VBD ,_, and_CC their_PRP$ boundaries_NNS are_VBP given_VBN below_IN :_: -_: B_NNP Ward_NNP ,_, Chukla-_NNP The_DT area_NN bounded_VBD on_IN the_DT North_NNP by_IN the_DT Pydhoni_NNP Road_NNP ;_: on_IN the_DT South_NNP by_IN Nakhuda_NNP Street_NNP ,_, Naran_NNP Dharu_NNP Street_NNP ,_, Musjid_NNP Bandar_NNP Road_NNP ;_: on_IN the_DT East_NNP by_IN Don_NNP Tar_NNP Street_NNP ;_: on_IN the_DT West_NNP by_IN Abdur_NNP Rehman_NNP Street_NNP ._.

The_DT population_NN was_VBD estimated_VBN at_IN about_IN 11/4_CD lakhs_NNS ,_, including_VBG 1/4_CD lakh_NN of_IN Hindus_NNP ,_, with_IN a_DT few_JJ Christians_NNPS ,_, Parsees_NNP ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, and_CC 100,000_CD Mussalmans_NNPS ,_, or_CC about_IN 80_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
of_IN the_DT entire_JJ Mahomedan_NNP population_NN of_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
The_DT Pass_NNP Office_NNP which_WDT had_VBD been_VBN opened_VBN in_IN March_NNP 1898_CD ,_, in_IN the_DT Town_NNP Hall_NNP ,_, was_VBD closed_VBN on_IN 13th_CD June_NNP 1898_CD ,_, and_CC thereafter_RB passes_NNS were_VBD issued_VBN by_IN the_DT various_JJ District_NNP Officers_NNP till_IN they_PRP were_VBD entirely_RB abolished_VBN by_IN Government_NNP Resolution_NNP No_NNP ._.
5772-5864-P_CD of_IN 16th_CD October_NNP 1898_CD ._.
The_DT inspection_NN of_IN the_DT areas_NNS in_IN the_DT occupation_NN of_IN the_DT Military_NNP in_IN Colaba_NNP ,_, the_DT Fort_NNP ,_, Marine_NNP Lines_NNP ,_, and_CC Bori_NNP Bandar_NNP Lines-all_NNP portions_NNS of_IN A_DT Ward-and_NNP the_DT detection_NN and_CC removal_NN of_IN plague_NN cases_NNS there_EX were_VBD ,_, as_IN in_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ,_, entrusted_VBD to_TO the_DT Military_NNP ;_: and_CC most_JJS efficiently_RB carried_VBN out_RP ._.
All_DT measures_NNS in_IN connection_NN with_IN the_DT Health_NNP Department_NNP scavengers_NNS and_CC sweepers_NNS were_VBD left_VBN entirely_RB in_IN the_DT control_NN of_IN that_DT department_NN ._.
?_. 6_CD Outline_NNP of_IN mea-_JJ sures_NNS adopted_VBN ._.
The_DT following_JJ report_NN from_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP Commissioner_NNP to_TO the_DT Cor-_NNP poration_NN gives_VBZ in_IN outline_NN the_DT measures_NNS adopted_VBN to_TO combat_VB the_DT plague_NN :_: -_: No_DT ._.
18550_CD OF_IN 1898-99_NNS ._.
BOMBAY_NNP ,_, 18th_CD October_NNP 1898_CD ._.
FROM_IN W._NNP L._NNP HARVEY_NNP ,_, ESQ._NNP ,_, I.C.S._NNP ,_, Acting_NNP Municipal_NNP Commissioner_NNP for_IN the_DT City_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
To_TO THE_VB MUNICIPAL_NNP SECRETARY_NNP ._.
SIR_NNP ,_, -With_NNP reference_NN to_TO Corporation_NNP Resolution_NNP No_NNP ._.
3284_CD of_IN the_DT 7th_CD July_NNP 1898_CD ,_, asking_VBG me_PRP to_TO report_VB on_IN the_DT measures_NNS it_PRP is_VBZ proposed_VBN to_TO take_VB with_IN the_DT view_NN of_IN dealing_VBG with_IN any_DT recrudescence_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN the_DT City_NNP ,_, I_PRP have_VBP the_DT honour_NN to_TO state_NN ,_, for_IN the_DT information_NN of_IN the_DT Corporation_NNP ,_, that_IN the_DT operations_NNS at_IN present_NN in_IN progress_NN are_VBP based_VBN on_IN the_DT general_JJ lines_NNS of_IN policy_NN initiated_VBN by_IN Government_NNP in_IN March_NNP 1898_CD ,_, and_CC detailed_VBN at_IN pages_NNS 186_CD et_JJ seq_NN ._.
of_IN the_DT report_NN of_IN Bombay_NNP Plague_NNP Committee_NNP for_IN 1897-98_JJ ,_, copies_NNS of_IN which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN supplied_VBN to_TO the_DT Corporation_NNP ._.
A_DT copy_NN of_IN detailed_JJ instructions_NNS to_TO District_NNP Officers_NNP ,_, issued_VBN in_IN July_NNP ,_, is_VBZ also_RB forwarded_VBN herewith_NN ._.
Considerable_JJ latitude_NN in_IN the_DT direction_NN of_IN relaxation_NN of_IN rules_NNS is_VBZ allowed_VBN to_TO District_NNP Officers_NNP according_VBG to_TO the_DT varying_VBG circumstances_NNS of_IN different_JJ localities_NNS ._.
2_CD ._.
In_IN addition_NN to_TO the_DT more_RBR general_JJ measures_NNS ,_, viz._NN ,_, removal_NN of_IN the_DT sick_JJ to_TO hospitals_NNS ,_, observation_NN of_IN contacts_NNS and_CC evacuation_NN and_CC disinfection_NN of_IN affected_JJ houses_NNS ,_, particular_JJ attention_NN is_VBZ being_VBG paid_VBN to_TO the_DT following_JJ subjects_NNS :_: -_: (_( a_DT )_) Inoculation_NN is_VBZ being_VBG encouraged_VBN ._.
(_( b_NN )_) Rats_NNPS are_VBP being_VBG destroyed_VBN ._.
(_( c_NN )_) Arrangements_NNS have_VBP been_VBN made_VBN for_IN the_DT local_JJ preparation_NN of_IN Lustig_NNP 's_POS serum_NN ._.
(_( d_NN )_) The_DT different_JJ communities_NNS are_VBP being_VBG moved_VBN and_CC assisted_VBN to_TO start_VB health_NN camps_NNS and_CC hospitals_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ ._.
(_( e_NN )_) Arrangements_NNS have_VBP been_VBN made_VBN for_IN tile-turning_NN ._.
(_( f_NN )_) A_NNP systematic_JJ survey_NN of_IN houses_NNS in_IN the_DT City_NNP is_VBZ being_VBG made_VBN with_IN a_DT view_NN to_TO their_PRP$ sanitary_JJ improvement_NN ._.
The_DT regulations_NNS regarding_VBG the_DT segregation_NN of_IN contacts_NNS have_VBP been_VBN materially_RB re-_JJ laxed_NN ,_, and_CC they_PRP are_VBP permitted_VBN to_TO attend_VB to_TO their_PRP$ ordinary_JJ duties_NNS on_IN the_DT sole_JJ condition_NN of_IN returning_VBG to_TO camp_VB in_IN the_DT evening_NN ._.
3_CD ._.
Orders_NNS have_VBP been_VBN issued_VBN by_IN Government_NNP regarding_VBG the_DT abolition_NN of_IN passes_NNS and_CC detention_NN camps_NNS for_IN travellers_NNS by_IN railway_NN ._.
There_EX will_MD be_VB free_JJ communication_NN between_IN the_DT City_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP and_CC the_DT Island_NNP of_IN Salsette_NNP ,_, and_CC inspections_NNS at_IN the_DT Cause-_NNP ways_NNS have_VBP been_VBN discontinued_VBN ._.
4_CD ._.
In_IN conclusion_NN ,_, I_PRP have_VBP the_DT honour_NN to_TO observe_VB that_IN all_PDT the_DT measures_NNS at_IN present_NN in_IN force_NN depend_NN on_IN the_DT assistance_NN and_CC co-operation_NN of_IN the_DT Volunteer_NNP Committees_NNP in_IN the_DT different_JJ Wards_NNS ._.
The_DT main_JJ object_NN to_TO be_VB attained_VBN is_VBZ the_DT discovery_NN of_IN plague_NN cases_NNS ,_, and_CC up_RB to_TO the_DT present_JJ the_DT working_NN of_IN the_DT Committees_NNP has_VBZ ,_, except_IN in_IN a_DT few_JJ instances_NNS ,_, been_VBN attended_VBN with_IN very_RB satisfactory_JJ results_NNS ._.
The_DT answer_NN to_TO the_DT question_NN as_IN to_TO whether_IN the_DT present_JJ system_NN will_MD continue_VB rests_NNS with_IN the_DT Committees_NNP themselves_PRP ._.
They_PRP have_VBP accepted_VBN the_DT responsibility_NN of_IN keeping_VBG the_DT District_NNP Officers_NNP informed_VBD of_IN cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN or_CC suspicious_JJ illness_NN ,_, and_CC of_IN giving_VBG them_PRP general_JJ assistance_NN in_IN the_DT carrying_VBG out_IN of_IN the_DT necessary_JJ sanitary_JJ measures_NNS ;_: where_WRB this_DT duty_NN is_VBZ loyally_RB performed_VBN ,_, I_PRP should_MD be_VB sorry_JJ to_TO propose_VB any_DT change_NN ._.
There_EX are_VBP ,_, however_RB ,_, a_DT few_JJ localities_NNS in_IN which_WDT little_JJ or_CC no_DT help_NN is_VBZ given_VBN by_IN the_DT Committees_NNP ,_, and_CC should_MD they_PRP remain_VB apathetic_JJ and_CC indifferent_JJ in_IN the_DT event_NN of_IN a_DT serious_JJ recrudescence_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ ,_, it_PRP may_MD be_VB necessary_JJ to_TO substitute_VB a_DT more_RBR efficient_JJ agency_NN -I_NNP have_VBP ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, W._NNP L._NNP HARVEY_NNP ,_, Acting_NNP Municipal_NNP Commissioner_NNP ._.
?_. 7_CD Instructions_NNPS for_IN District_NNP Officers_NNP during_IN the_DT Rains_NNP ._.
The_DT District_NNP Officer_NNP is_VBZ the_DT Chief_NNP Plague_NNP Authority_NNP of_IN a_DT ward_NN ,_, having_VBG general_JJ control_NN over_IN all_DT plague_JJ operations_NNS in_IN his_PRP$ ward_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP is_VBZ responsible_JJ for_IN seeing_VBG that_IN all_DT members_NNS of_IN the_DT establishment_NN under_IN him_PRP work_VBP properly_RB ._.
He_PRP will_MD work_VB in_IN co-operation_NN with_IN the_DT staff_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Department_NNP ,_, and_CC should_MD bring_VB to_TO the_DT immediate_JJ notice_NN of_IN the_DT District_NNP Health_NNP Officer/Inspector_NNP any_DT cases_NNS of_IN insanitary_JJ buildings_NNS gullies_NNS ,_, drains_NNS ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, which_WDT do_VBP not_RB come_VB within_IN the_DT scope_NN of_IN his_PRP$ duties_NNS as_IN simply_RB a_DT plague_JJ officer_NN ._.
For_IN instance_NN ,_, a_DT house_NN in_IN which_WDT a_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN has_VBZ occurred_VBN will_MD be_VB cleaned_VBN as_RB far_RB as_IN possible_JJ ,_, by_IN the_DT District_NNP Officer_NNP 's_POS own_JJ staff_NN ;_: but_CC the_DT cleansing_NN of_IN dirty_NN gutters_NNS ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, in_IN other_JJ cases_NNS is_VBZ the_DT business_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Department_NNP ,_, and_CC any_DT instance_NN discovered_VBD should_MD be_VB reported_VBN at_IN once_RB to_TO the_DT District_NNP Health_NNP Officer/Inspector_NNP ._.
As_IN Plague_NNP authority_NN ,_, the_DT duties_NNS of_IN the_DT District_NNP Officers_NNP will_MD fall_VB under_IN the_DT following_JJ heads_NNS :_: -_: (_( a_DT )_) To_TO make_VB himself_PRP thoroughly_RB acquainted_VBD with_IN his_PRP$ charge_NN ,_, and_CC see_VB that_IN his_PRP$ establishment_NN is_VBZ sufficient_JJ and_CC duly_RB distributed_VBN ._.
(_( b_NN )_) To_TO organize_VB Local_NNP Committees_NNP ,_, see_VBP to_TO the_DT distribution_NN of_IN work_NN among_IN the_DT members_NNS so_RB that_IN the_DT whole_JJ area_NN is_VBZ kept_VBN under_IN regular_JJ observation_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO arrange_VB for_IN regular_JJ meetings_NNS ,_, to_TO hear_VB grievances_NNS and_CC discuss_VB difficul-_JJ ties_NNS ._.
Notes_NNS should_MD be_VB kept_VBN of_IN the_DT work_NN done_VBN by_IN each_DT Committee_NNP member_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT report_NN made_VBN about_IN any_DT Committee_NNP which_WDT is_VBZ neglecting_VBG its_PRP$ work_NN ._.
Note.-During_VBG the_DT rains_NNS all_DT assistance_NN which_WDT members_NNS of_IN the_DT Local_NNP Com-_NNP mittees_NNS or_CC other_JJ gentlemen_NNS may_MD give_VB is_VBZ to_TO be_VB accepted_VBN ,_, but_CC District_NNP Officers_NNP should_MD refrain_VB from_IN pressing_VBG volunteers_NNS to_TO carry_VB on_IN inspections_NNS which_WDT may_MD be_VB repugnant_JJ to_TO them_PRP in_IN bad_JJ weather_NN ,_, and_CC may_MD result_VB in_IN a_DT difficulty_NN in_IN getting_VBG assistance_NN later_RB on_IN ._.
(_( c_NN )_) To_TO obtain_VB immediate_JJ information_NN of_IN plague_NN cases_NNS ._.
The_DT members_NNS of_IN the_DT Local_NNP Committees_NNP are_VBP for_IN the_DT most_JJS part_NN gentlemen_NNS with_IN business_NN of_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ ,_, who_WP can_MD spare_VB but_CC a_DT few_JJ hours_NNS a_DT day_NN for_IN plague_NN work_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ necessary_JJ ,_, therefore_RB ,_, to_TO supplement_VB their_PRP$ efforts_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT District_NNP Officer_NNP should_MD see_VB that_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ inspectors_NNS and_CC those_DT of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Department_NNP keep_VB a_DT careful_JJ watch_NN over_IN all_DT houses_NNS ._.
A_DT good_JJ Inspector_NN should_MD know_VB by_IN sight_NN all_PDT the_DT people_NNS in_IN his_PRP$ charge_NN ,_, and_CC by_IN his_PRP$ local_JJ knowledge_NN and_CC the_DT help_NN of_IN informers_NNS should_MD be_VB able_JJ to_TO learn_VB at_IN once_RB of_IN any_DT case_NN of_IN sickness_NN or_CC death_NN ._.
(_( d_NN )_) To_TO have_VB made_VBN (_( where_WRB not_RB yet_RB done_VBN )_) and_CC regularly_RB kept_VBD up_RP a_DT plague_NN re-_JJ gister_NN of_IN every_DT house_NN in_IN the_DT ward_NN ._.
Every_DT death_NN ,_, whether_IN from_IN plague_NN or_CC other_JJ causes_NNS ,_, should_MD be_VB entered_VBN in_IN this_DT register_NN ,_, distinguished_VBN by_IN red_JJ entries_NNS for_IN plague_NN and_CC black_JJ for_IN other_JJ causes_NNS ._.
This_DT is_VBZ a_DT most_RBS important_JJ duty_NN ,_, and_CC special_JJ attention_NN should_MD be_VB paid_VBN to_TO it_PRP ._.
The_DT cause_NN of_IN death_NN as_IN shown_VBN in_IN the_DT cemetery_NN returns_NNS is_VBZ often_RB unreliable_JJ ,_, but_CC when_WRB the_DT register_NN shows_VBZ that_IN a_DT particular_JJ house_NN or_CC a_DT particular_JJ street_NN has_VBZ had_VBN an_DT unusual_JJ number_NN of_IN deaths_NNS ,_, to_TO whatever_VB cause_NN ascribed_NN ,_, special_JJ attention_NN should_MD be_VB paid_VBN to_TO that_DT house_NN or_CC street_NN ._.
Information_NN for_IN the_DT register_NN will_MD be_VB obtained_VBN from_IN the_DT cemetery_NN returns_NNS ,_, from_IN the_DT reports_NNS of_IN Local_JJ Com-_NNP mittees_NNS ,_, and_CC from_IN information_NN obtained_VBN from_IN the_DT District_NNP and_CC Health_NNP Department_NNP staffs_NNS ._.
(_( e_NN )_) To_TO watch_VB the_DT migration_NN of_IN and_CC mortality_NN among_IN rats_NNS ._.
Directly_RB an_DT increase_NN of_IN rats_NNS is_VBZ noticed_VBN in_IN any_DT locality_NN ,_, every_DT effort_NN should_MD be_VB made_VBN to_TO destroy_VB them_PRP ,_, and_CC any_DT place_NN in_IN which_WDT dead_JJ rats_NNS are_VBP found_VBN should_MD be_VB thoroughly_RB disinfected_VBN at_IN once_RB ._.
8_CD (_( f_NN )_) To_TO see_VB that_IN patients_NNS are_VBP removed_VBN from_IN infected_JJ dwellings_NNS with_IN relatives_NNS and_CC dependents_NNS ._.
Steps_NNS will_MD be_VB taken_VBN as_RB soon_RB as_IN possible_JJ to_TO arrange_VB all_DT hospitals_NNS on_IN the_DT plan_NN of_IN the_DT Maratha_NNP ,_, so_RB that_IN there_EX may_MD be_VB no_DT division_NN of_IN families_NNS ,_, and_CC unless_IN the_DT relatives_NNS specially_RB desire_VBP it_PRP ,_, the_DT patient_NN and_CC all_DT ``_`` contacts_NNS ``_`` should_MD ,_, whenever_WRB possible_JJ ,_, be_VB sent_VBN to_TO the_DT same_JJ place_NN ._.
In_IN selected_VBN cases_NNS the_DT patient_NN may_MD be_VB left_VBN in_IN his_PRP$ house_NN and_CC treated_VBD there_RB ,_, but_CC care_NN must_MD be_VB taken_VBN that_IN the_DT house_NN is_VBZ suitable_JJ ,_, that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ kept_JJ clean_JJ and_CC disinfected_VBN ,_, the_DT patient_NN provided_VBD with_IN a_DT cot_NN and_CC other_JJ sanitary_JJ rules_NNS observed_VBN ._.
Careful_JJ notes_NNS of_IN any_DT such_JJ case_NN should_MD be_VB kept_VBN ._.
Two_CD attendants_NNS should_MD be_VB retained_VBN for_IN each_DT patient_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT other_JJ members_NNS of_IN the_DT family_NN sent_VBD to_TO a_DT contact_NN camp_NN ,_, unless_IN they_PRP prefer_VBP to_TO be_VB inoculated_VBN and_CC remain_VBP ,_, when_WRB they_PRP should_MD be_VB registered_VBN and_CC kept_VBN under_IN observation_NN ._.
(_( g_NN )_) To_TO disinfect_VB infected_JJ houses_NNS ._.
Now_RB that_DT plague_NN has_VBZ almost_RB ceased_VBN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ most_RBS important_JJ that_IN every_DT effort_NN should_MD be_VB made_VBN to_TO get_VB rid_JJ of_IN it_PRP entirely_RB ._.
When_WRB a_DT death_NN is_VBZ known_VBN to_TO be_VB due_JJ to_TO plague_VB ,_, there_EX is_VBZ no_DT question_NN about_IN disinfecting_NN ,_, but_CC when_WRB the_DT cause_NN of_IN death_NN is_VBZ doubtful_JJ ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ advisable_JJ to_TO be_VB on_IN the_DT safe_JJ side_NN and_CC disinfect_NN ,_, so_RB as_IN ,_, if_IN possible_JJ ,_, to_TO leave_VB no_DT locality_NN ,_, where_WRB the_DT plague_JJ germ_NN may_MD be_VB dormant_NN for_IN some_DT months_NNS only_RB to_TO spring_VB up_RP afterwards_NNS with_IN greater_JJR virulence_NN ._.
What-_JJ ever_RB disinfectant_NN is_VBZ used_VBN ,_, the_DT chief_JJ points_NNS to_TO be_VB remembered_VBN are_VBP light_JJ ,_, air_NN and_CC thorough_JJ cleanliness_NN ._.
During_IN the_DT rains_NNS tiles_NNS can_MD not_RB be_VB removed_VBN ,_, but_CC where_WRB possible_JJ doors_NNS and_CC windows_NNS should_MD be_VB taken_VBN off_RP their_PRP$ hinges_NNS ._.
Every_DT corner_NN of_IN the_DT house_NN must_MD be_VB swept_VBN out_RP ,_, all_DT rags_NNS ,_, refuse_NN ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, burnt_NN and_CC the_DT surroundings_NNS cleaned_VBD up_RP ._.
If_IN this_DT is_VBZ well_RB done_VBN ,_, there_EX is_VBZ fair_JJ chance_NN of_IN the_DT germ_NN dying_NN ._.
It_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN the_DT practice_NN hitherto_NN when_WRB a_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN occurs_NNS in_IN a_DT chawl_NN to_TO disinfect_VB only_RB the_DT room_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT patient_NN was_VBD lying_VBG ,_, and_CC one_CD room_NN on_IN each_DT side_NN ._.
This_DT practice_NN should_MD be_VB adhered_VBN to_TO ,_, but_CC when_WRB a_DT chawl_NN is_VBZ obviously_RB badly_RB infected_VBN ,_, the_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT occupants_NNS should_MD be_VB removed_VBN to_TO a_DT health_NN camp_NN and_CC the_DT chawl_NN disinfected_VBD and_CC cleaned_VBD from_IN top_JJ to_TO bottom_VB ._.
The_DT District_NNP Officer_NNP should_MD satisfy_VB himself_PRP by_IN personal_JJ inspection_NN that_IN the_DT work_NN has_VBZ been_VBN properly_RB done_VBN ,_, and_CC should_MD note_VB in_IN his_PRP$ house_NN register_VBD the_DT dates_NNS of_IN vaca-_JJ tion_NN ,_, disinfection_NN ,_, and_CC re-occupation_NN ._.
(_( h_NN )_) To_TO supervise_VB the_DT camps_NNS in_IN his_PRP$ ward_NN ._.
The_DT District_NNP Officer_NNP will_MD have_VB control_NN over_IN all_DT camps_NNS in_IN his_PRP$ ward_NN ,_, seeing_VBG that_IN they_PRP are_VBP kept_VBN in_IN proper_JJ sanitary_JJ order_NN ,_, that_IN registers_NNS are_VBP maintained_VBN ,_, all_DT inmates_NNS regularly_RB inspected_VBN ,_, and_CC that_IN all_DT requirements_NNS ,_, which_WDT he_PRP can_MD not_RB himself_PRP supply_RB ,_, such_JJ as_IN drainage_NN water_NN and_CC latrine_JJ accommodation_NN ,_, are_VBP promptly_RB brought_VBN to_TO the_DT notice_NN of_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP Commissioner_NNP ._.
The_DT camping_VBG space_NN in_IN Bombay_NNP being_VBG limited_VBN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ necessary_JJ that_IN people_NNS should_MD occupy_VB the_DT huts_NNS as_IN short_JJ a_DT time_NN as_IN possible_JJ ,_, subject_JJ to_TO a_DT minimum_JJ period_NN of_IN fourteen_JJ days_NNS ._.
The_DT District_NNP Officer_NNP will_MD therefore_VB see_VB that_IN as_RB far_RB as_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ ward_NN is_VBZ concerned_VBN ,_, houses_NNS from_IN which_WDT evicts_NNS are_VBP received_VBN in_IN the_DT camp_NN are_VBP prepared_VBN for_IN re-occupation_NN as_RB quickly_RB as_IN possible_JJ ,_, and_CC that_IN officers_NNS in_IN charge_NN of_IN other_JJ wards_NNS are_VBP duly_RB informed_VBN that_IN evicts_NNS from_IN their_PRP$ wards_NNS can_MD no_RB longer_RB be_VB kept_VBN in_IN the_DT camp_NN ._.
Every_DT officer_NN wishing_VBG to_TO send_VB evicts_NNS to_TO a_DT camp_NN not_RB in_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ ward_NN should_MD enquire_VB first_RB of_IN the_DT officer_NN in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT camp_NN whether_IN accommodation_NN is_VBZ available_JJ ._.
9_CD The_DT District_NNP Officer_NNP in_IN charge_NN of_IN a_DT camp_NN will_MD also_RB be_VB responsible_JJ for_IN the_DT due_JJ distribution_NN among_IN indigent_JJ evicts_NNS of_IN any_DT charitable_JJ funds_NNS placed_VBN at_IN his_PRP$ disposal_NN ,_, and_CC should_MD always_RB consult_VB the_DT officer_NN who_WP sent_VBD the_DT evict_NN before_IN making_VBG a_DT grant_NN ,_, as_IN otherwise_RB people_NNS will_MD fraudulently_RB obtain_VB double_JJ doles_NNS ._.
(_( i_NN )_) Over_IN hospitals_PDT the_DT District_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, if_IN not_RB the_DT Medical_JJ Officer_NNP ,_, will_MD merely_RB exercise_VB a_DT general_JJ supervision_NN in_IN matters_NNS not_RB purely_RB professional_JJ ._.
Being_VBG in_IN almost_RB all_DT cases_NNS an_DT officer_NN of_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT Indian_JJ Services_NNPS ,_, he_PRP will_MD give_VB his_PRP$ advice_NN on_IN questions_NNS of_IN caste_NN ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, when_WRB the_DT Medical_NNP Officer_NNP in_IN immediate_JJ charge_NN is_VBZ unacquainted_VBN with_IN the_DT customs_NNS of_IN the_DT country_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP will_MD see_VB that_IN the_DT wants_VBZ of_IN the_DT hospitals_NNS in_IN the_DT way_NN of_IN furniture_NN ,_, establishment_NN ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, are_VBP supplied_VBN ._.
(_( k_NN )_) To_TO issue_VB passes_NNS to_TO people_NNS going_VBG up-country_NN ._.
In_IN connection_NN with_IN this_DT subject_NN it_PRP is_VBZ to_TO be_VB noted_VBN that_IN in_IN view_NN of_IN the_DT possibility_NN of_IN a_DT recrudes-_JJ cence_NN of_IN plague_NN it_PRP is_VBZ desirable_JJ that_IN people_NNS doing_VBG business_NN in_IN Bombay_NNP should_MD be_VB encouraged_VBN to_TO take_VB their_PRP$ families_NNS away_RB now_RB to_TO their_PRP$ native_JJ places_NNS and_CC leave_VBP them_PRP there_RB ._.
The_DT risk_NN both_DT to_TO the_DT families_NNS and_CC to_TO the_DT remaining_VBG population_NN will_MD thereby_RB be_VB greatly_RB diminished_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT difficulty_NN hitherto_NN experienced_VBN in_IN dealing_VBG with_IN women_NNS and_CC children_NNS will_MD be_VB removed_VBN ._.
(_( l_NN )_) Lastly_RB ,_, the_DT District_NNP Officer_NNP should_MD see_VB that_IN all_DT returns_NNS are_VBP punctually_RB submitted_VBN ._.
He_PRP should_MD keep_VB a_DT brief_JJ diary_NN of_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ inspection_NN and_CC should_MD enter_VB in_IN his_PRP$ weekly_JJ progress_NN report_NN an_DT account_NN of_IN the_DT work_NN done_VBN by_IN his_PRP$ Local_JJ Committees_NNS and_CC his_PRP$ District_NNP staff_NN ._.
?_. 10_CD CHAPTER_NN II_NNP ._.
THE_DT COURSE_NNP OF_IN THE_NNP EPIDEMIC_NNP ._.
Population_NN in_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
The_DT following_JJ statement_NN very_RB roughly_RB indicates_VBZ the_DT population_NN in_IN Bombay_NNP at_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN each_DT month_NN from_IN 1st_CD July_NNP 1896_CD ._.
The_DT figures_NNS are_VBP taken_VBN from_IN Mr._NNP James_NNP 's_POS Chart_NNP No_NNP ._.
1_CD ,_, which_WDT are_VBP based_VBN on_IN the_DT average_JJ receipts_NNS of_IN the_DT Tramway_NNP Company_NNP ._.
They_PRP have_VBP been_VBN checked_VBN by_IN the_DT figures_NNS of_IN emigration_NN and_CC immigration_NN supplied_VBN by_IN the_DT Collector_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, and_CC though_IN they_PRP have_VBP no_DT pretensions_NNS to_TO accuracy_NN ,_, they_PRP are_VBP sufficiently_RB good_JJ estimates_NNS ._.
?_.

1898-99_CD ._.
1st_CD July_NNP 850,000_CD 750,000_CD 829,000_CD ``_`` August_NNP 850,000_CD 775,000_CD 829,000_CD ``_`` September_NNP 850,000_CD 800,000_CD 885,000_CD ``_`` October_NNP 850,000_CD 810,000_CD 885,000_CD ``_`` November_NNP 761,000_CD 820,000_CD 920,000_CD ``_`` December_NNP 797,000_CD 850,000_CD 950,000_CD ``_`` January_NNP 640,000_CD 900,000_CD 950,000_CD ``_`` February_NNP 447,000_CD 775,000_CD 875,000_CD ``_`` March_NNP 467,000_CD 725,000_CD 827,000_CD ``_`` April_NNP 485,000_CD 737,000_CD 749,000_CD ``_`` May_NNP 665,000_CD 750,000_CD 755,000_CD ``_`` June_NNP 732,000_CD 800,000_CD 774,000_CD Total_JJ 8,394,000_CD 9,492,000_CD 10,228,000_CD Average_NN for_IN the_DT year_NN in_IN round_NN numbers_NNS ._.
700,000_CD 790,000_CD 850,000_CD Plague_NNP at-_JJ tacks_NNS and_CC deaths_NNS ._.
The_DT following_NN shows_VBZ the_DT total_NN recorded_VBD number_NN of_IN plague_NN attacks_NNS and_CC deaths_NNS in_IN each_DT section_NN during_IN the_DT year_NN ending_VBG 31st_CD May_NNP 1899_CD ._.
Wards_NNS ,_, &_CC c._NN Sections_NNPS ._.

Diagrams_NNP showing_VBG the_DT rise_NN and_CC fall_NN of_IN the_DT general_JJ death-rate_NN in_IN Bombay_NNP as_IN a_DT whole_NN and_CC for_IN each_DT section_NN of_IN the_DT City_NNP are_VBP attached_VBN to_TO this_DT report_NN ._.
Except_IN a_DT brief_JJ out-break_NN of_IN cholera_NN at_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN the_DT monsoon_NN of_IN 1897_CD ,_, no_DT other_JJ epidemic_NN of_IN serious_JJ importance_NN has_VBZ appeared_VBN in_IN the_DT City_NNP during_IN the_DT past_JJ three_CD years_NNS ._.
The_DT line_NN of_IN general_JJ mortality_NN may_MD therefore_RB be_VB taken_VBN as_IN a_DT safe_JJ index_NN to_TO the_DT rise_NN and_CC fall_NN of_IN plague_NN ._.
Referring_VBG first_RB to_TO the_DT diagram_NN for_IN the_DT whole_JJ City_NNP ,_, it_PRP will_MD be_VB seen_VBN that_IN the_DT ?_. 12_CD mortality_NN began_VBD to_TO rise_VB slowly_RB at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN June_NNP 1896_CD ,_, reaching_VBG nearly_RB 800_CD in_IN the_DT week_NN ending_VBG 6th_CD October_NNP ._.
In_IN the_DT week_NN ending_VBG 20th_CD October_NNP it_PRP fell_VBD to_TO about_IN 600_CD ,_, and_CC then_RB rapidly_RB rose_VBD to_TO over_IN 1,800_CD in_IN the_DT week_NN ending_VBG 29th_CD December_NNP ._.
It_PRP remained_VBD at_IN high_JJ level_NN for_IN 7_CD weeks_NNS ,_, reaching_VBG 1,900_CD in_IN the_DT week_NN ending_VBG 19th_CD February_NNP ;_: after_IN which_WDT it_PRP rapidly_RB decreased_VBD till_NN it_PRP was_VBD normal_JJ in_IN the_DT week_NN ending_VBG 4th_CD May_NNP ._.
In_IN the_DT second_JJ year_NN it_PRP was_VBD practically_RB never_RB normal_JJ ;_: a_DT serious_JJ recrudescence_NN began_VBD from_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN July_NNP ,_, reaching_VBG its_PRP$ height_NN 1,050_CD in_IN the_DT week_NN ending_VBG 3rd_CD August_NNP ._.

After_IN the_DT first_JJ week_NN of_IN December_NNP ,_, it_PRP rose_VBD rapidly_RB to_TO 2,200_CD in_IN the_DT week_NN ending_VBG 15th_CD February_NNP ,_, remaining_VBG at_IN high_JJ level_NN for_IN 6_CD weeks_NNS ,_, in_IN the_DT last_JJ of_IN which_WDT ending_VBG 22nd_CD March_NNP it_PRP reached_VBD 2,250_CD and_CC then_RB fell_VBD rapidly_RB till_IN it_PRP reached_VBD normal_JJ in_IN the_DT week_NN ending_VBG 17th_CD May_NNP ,_, or_CC only_RB a_DT fortnight_NN from_IN the_DT close_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN ._.

It_PRP remained_VBD at_IN this_DT high_JJ level_NN for_IN three_CD weeks_NNS only_RB ,_, and_CC then_RB fell_VBD rapidly_RB ,_, but_CC did_VBD not_RB reach_VB normal_JJ till_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN the_DT following_JJ year_NN ._.
Mortality_NN of_IN each_DT section_NN ._.
A_DT careful_JJ study_NN of_IN the_DT Charts_NNP of_IN the_DT total_JJ mortality_NN ,_, which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN prepared_VBN for_IN each_DT section_NN ,_, would_MD afford_VB support_NN to_TO the_DT most_RBS diverse_JJ theories_NNS as_IN to_TO the_DT progress_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.

A_DT Ward_NNP ._.
Fort_NNP South.-From_NNP the_DT statement_NN of_IN total_JJ mortality_NN it_PRP will_MD be_VB seen_VBN that_DT Fort_NNP South_NNP has_VBZ been_VBN practically_RB free_JJ from_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ throughout_IN ._.
This_DT is_VBZ no_DT doubt_NN due_JJ to_TO the_DT fact_NN that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB a_DT residential_JJ quarter_NN ,_, but_CC is_VBZ almost_RB entirely_RB occupied_VBN by_IN offices_NNS of_IN a_DT substantial_JJ character_NN ;_: it_PRP is_VBZ comparatively_RB speaking_JJ ,_, well-drained_JJ ,_, well_RB ventilated_VBN ,_, clean_JJ and_CC dry_JJ ._.
Upper_NNP Colaba_NNP has_VBZ also_RB been_VBN very_RB lightly_RB touched_VBN ._.
After_IN Fort_NNP South_NNP it_PRP has_VBZ the_DT smallest_JJS population_NN of_IN any_DT in_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, and_CC a_DT considerable_JJ proportion_NN consists_VBZ of_IN Europeans_NNPS and_CC European_JJ Troops_NNP ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ well_RB separated_VBN from_IN the_DT rest_NN of_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, is_VBZ well_RB ventilated_VBN and_CC exposed_VBN to_TO every_DT breeze_NN that_WDT blows_VBZ ,_, and_CC its_PRP$ health_NN and_CC sanitary_JJ condition_NN has_VBZ been_VBN vigilantly_RB watched_VBN by_IN the_DT Military_NNP authorities_NNS ._.
In_IN Middle_NNP and_CC Lower_NNP Colaba_NNP after_IN a_DT slight_JJ recrudescence_NN in_IN September_NNP and_CC the_DT beginning_NN of_IN October_NNP ,_, the_DT mortality_NN began_VBD to_TO rise_VB at_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN January_NNP ,_, attained_VBD its_PRP$ maximum_JJ 9_CD weeks_NNS later_RB in_IN the_DT week_NN ending_VBG 14th_CD March_NNP 1899_CD ;_: remained_VBN there_EX for_IN a_DT fortnight_NN and_CC then_RB fell_VBD irregularly_RB till_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, the_DT whole_JJ course_NN of_IN the_DT main_JJ epidemic_JJ lasting_VBG 22_CD weeks_NNS ._.
There_EX were_VBD 203_CD deaths_NNS more_JJR than_IN in_IN 1896-97_JJ ,_, and_CC 69_CD more_JJR than_IN in_IN 1897-98_JJ ._.
In_IN Fort_NNP North_NNP matters_NNS took_VBD a_DT distinct_JJ turn_NN for_IN the_DT bad_JJ in_IN the_DT week_NN ending_VBG 6th_CD December_NNP 1898_CD ,_, the_DT mortality_NN was_VBD at_IN its_PRP$ worst_JJS for_IN 5_CD weeks_NNS from_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN February_NNP to_TO the_DT 3rd_CD week_NN in_IN March_NNP and_CC then_RB declined_VBD till_IN it_PRP reached_VBD a_DT comparatively_RB normal_JJ figure_NN at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN April_NNP :_: the_DT whole_JJ course_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ having_VBG lasted_VBN 21_CD weeks_NNS ._.
The_DT chart_NN for_IN this_DT Section_NN shows_VBZ vividly_RB the_DT rapid_JJ rise_NN and_CC fall_NN and_CC the_DT virulence_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN in_IN the_DT epidemic_NN of_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ,_, when_WRB in_IN one_CD week_NN the_DT mortality_NN was_VBD nearly_RB 10_CD times_NNS the_DT normal_JJ ._.
There_EX was_VBD a_DT difference_NN of_IN 518_CD lives_NNS in_IN favour_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN under_IN report_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ equivalent_JJ to_TO the_DT average_JJ mortality_NN of_IN 6_CD months_NNS ._.
In_IN the_DT Esplanade_NNP ,_, an_DT extended_JJ but_CC open_JJ and_CC thinly_RB populated_JJ area_NN ,_, the_DT mortality_NN began_VBD to_TO rise_VB seriously_RB in_IN the_DT week_NN ending_VBG 7th_CD February_NNP 1899_CD ;_: the_DT epidemic_JJ lasted_VBD 16_CD weeks_NNS ,_, remaining_VBG at_IN its_PRP$ highest_JJS level_NN for_IN the_DT last_JJ 4_CD weeks_NNS of_IN March_NNP ._.
During_IN this_DT period_NN it_PRP was_VBD between_IN 9_CD and_CC 10_CD times_NNS the_DT normal_JJ ._.
The_DT epidemic_NN in_IN this_DT section_NN has_VBZ increased_VBN in_IN virulence_NN each_DT year_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP shares_NNS with_IN Mahim_NNP and_CC Worli_NNP the_DT unenviable_JJ distinction_NN of_IN a_DT mortality_NN this_DT year_NN ,_, approaching_VBG double_NN of_IN that_DT of_IN 1897-98_JJ ._.
The_DT following_JJ general_JJ remarks_NNS regarding_VBG A_DT Ward_NNP are_VBP taken_VBN from_IN Captain_NNP Lock_NNP 's_POS report_NN :_: -_: ``_`` Oolaba_NNP Village_NNP is_VBZ a_DT densely_RB populated_VBN neighbourhood_NN off_IN the_DT South_NNP side_NN of_IN ``_`` Colaba_NNP Road-intersected_JJ by_IN short_JJ narrow_JJ lanes_NNS crossing_VBG and_CC re-crossing_NN ._.
The_DT ``_`` residents_NNS are_VBP for_IN the_DT most_JJS part_NN coolies_NNS ,_, cartmen_NNS ,_, fishermen_NNS ,_, mahars_NNS ,_, and_CC sweepers_NNS ``_`` It_PRP was_VBD in_IN this_DT village_NN that_WDT plague_VBP first_RB broke_VBD out_RP ,_, showing_VBG itself_PRP especially_RB in_IN ?_. 14_CD ``_`` Thomas_NNP Street_NNP ,_, spreading_VBG in_IN September_NNP 1898_CD ,_, to_TO Pilot_NNP Bunder_NNP ,_, and_CC involving_VBG the_DT ``_`` whole_JJ village_NN ._.
The_DT rest_NN of_IN Colaba_NNP except_IN for_IN a_DT few_JJ dropping_NN cases_NNS kept_VBD clear_JJ until_IN ``_`` the_DT 15th_JJ January_NNP ,_, when_WRB Victoria_NNP Bunder_NNP ,_, about_RB 1/2_CD a_DT mile_NN up_RP the_DT Colaba_NNP road_NN ,_, ``_`` became_VBD seriously_RB affected_VBN and_CC from_IN that_DT date_NN to_TO the_DT 31st_CD May_NNP there_EX were_VBD 168_CD cases_NNS ``_`` in_IN this_DT 12-acre_JJ patch_NN of_IN ground_NN alone_RB ._.
Colaba_NNP Road_NNP which_WDT is_VBZ the_DT residence_NN of_IN ``_`` Europeans_NNPS chiefly_NN ,_, of_IN different_JJ nationalities_NNS ,_, had_VBD 29_CD cases_NNS during_IN the_DT year_NN entirely_RB ``_`` among_IN servants_NNS ._.
Contamination_NN was_VBD often_RB found_VBN to_TO have_VB been_VBN got_VBN from_IN staying_VBG ``_`` with_IN or_CC visiting_VBG friends_NNS in_IN Colaba_NNP Village_NNP and_CC Victoria_NNP Bunder_NNP ._. ''_''
The_DT previous_JJ history_NN of_IN Victoria_NNP Bunder_NNP is_VBZ interesting_JJ ._.
In_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN General_NNP Gatacre_NNP Plague_NNP was_VBD very_RB bad_JJ in_IN some_DT insanitary_JJ chals_NNS stand-_JJ ing_NN here_RB ._.
They_PRP were_VBD eventually_RB demolished_VBN in_IN the_DT hot_JJ weather_NN of_IN 1897_CD ._.
The_DT people_NNS were_VBD exceedingly_RB reluctant_JJ to_TO leave_VB ;_: they_PRP camped_VBD out_RP in_IN the_DT open_JJ ,_, and_CC when_WRB the_DT monsoon_NN broke_VBD they_PRP were_VBD in_IN such_JJ distress_NN and_CC misery_NN that_IN the_DT erection_NN of_IN temporary_JJ sheds_NNS was_VBD permitted_VBN ,_, a_DT certain_JJ number_NN being_VBG put_VBN up_RP by_IN the_DT Municipality_NNP itself_PRP ._.
In_IN the_DT year_NN under_IN report_NN there_EX were_VBD some_DT 2,000_CD people_NNS living_VBG in_IN these_DT huts_NNS ,_, the_DT surroundings_NNS were_VBD most_RBS insanitary_JJ and_CC it_PRP was_VBD found_VBN impossible_JJ to_TO make_VB the_DT landlord_NN take_VB the_DT matter_NN seriously_RB in_IN hand_NN ._.
Plague_NNP attacked_VBD the_DT residents_NNS very_RB severely_RB ,_, and_CC extended_VBD to_TO those_DT of_IN pakka_JJ chals_NNS in_IN the_DT immediate_JJ neighbourhood_NN ;_: and_CC finally_RB at_IN the_DT close_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN it_PRP was_VBD decided_VBN that_IN this_DT death-trap_NN must_MD be_VB abolished_VBN once_RB for_IN all_DT ._.
The_DT demolition_NN of_IN the_DT huts_NNS has_VBZ been_VBN going_VBG on_IN by_IN degrees_NNS ever_RB since_IN and_CC at_IN least_JJS one_CD plague_NN centre_NN has_VBZ now_RB been_VBN removed_VBN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD very_RB difficult_JJ to_TO catch_VB hold_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN the_DT North_NNP Fort_NNP sec-_JJ tion_NN ._.
It_PRP broke_VBD out_RP here_RB ,_, there_EX and_CC everywhere_RB ;_: and_CC assumed_VBD epidemic_JJ proportions_NNS first_RB in_IN one_CD locality_NN and_CC then_RB in_IN another_DT without_IN any_DT apparent_JJ rhyme_NN or_CC reason_NN ._.
B_NNP Ward_NNP South_NNP ._.
Mandvi_NNP went_VBD through_IN two_CD distinct_JJ epidemics_NNS which_WDT practically_RB lasted_VBD the_DT whole_JJ year_NN ._.
Beginning_VBG on_IN 21st_CD June_NNP the_DT first_JJ epidemic_JJ remained_VBN at_IN a_DT high_JJ level_NN from_IN 23rd_CD August_NNP to_TO 11th_CD October-7_JJ weeks-_NN and_CC the_DT mortality_NN did_VBD not_RB touch_VB normal_JJ till_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN December_NNP ._.
It_PRP started_VBD to_TO rise_VB again_RB almost_RB at_IN once_RB and_CC by_IN irregular_JJ jumps_NNS reached_VBD its_PRP$ maximum_NN (_( 106_CD )_) in_IN the_DT week_NN ending_VBG 21st_CD March_NNP 1899_CD ;_: after_IN which_WDT it_PRP decreased_VBD till_VB the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
The_DT entire_JJ course_NN of_IN the_DT first_JJ epidemic_JJ lasted_VBN 25_CD weeks_NNS ,_, of_IN the_DT second_JJ 22_CD weeks_NNS ._.
The_DT chart_NN shows_VBZ that_IN both_DT the_DT previous_JJ years_NNS were_VBD marked_VBN by_IN a_DT similar_JJ mortality_NN line_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT mortality_NN was_VBD in_IN both_DT years_NNS lower_JJR ,_, except_IN during_IN the_DT fierce_JJ outbreak_NN of_IN the_DT 1st_CD three_CD weeks_NNS at_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN October_NNP 1896_CD ,_, which_WDT ushered_VBD in_IN the_DT first_JJ epidemic_NN in_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
The_DT mortality_NN during_IN the_DT year_NN under_IN report_NN (_( 2,794_CD )_) exceeded_VBD that_IN of_IN the_DT 1st_CD year_NN by_IN 372_CD and_CC that_IN of_IN the_DT 2nd_CD by_IN 430_CD ._.
In_IN Chuckla_NNP there_EX was_VBD a_DT slight_JJ recrudescence_NN during_IN the_DT monsoon_NN ,_, the_DT mortality_NN attaining_VBG a_DT rate_NN of_IN 45_CD during_IN the_DT week_NN ending_VBG 27th_CD September_NNP 1898_CD ,_, but_CC the_DT epidemic_JJ really_RB began_VBD about_IN the_DT 10th_JJ January_NNP ._.
The_DT death-rate_NN rose_VBD for_IN 7_CD weeks_NNS ,_, was_VBD at_IN its_PRP$ height_NN for_IN 6_CD weeks_NNS from_IN 28th_CD February_NNP 1899_CD to_TO 11th_CD April_NNP 1899_CD ,_, and_CC then_RB fell_VBD till_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT ?_. 15_CD year_NN :_: covering_NN altogether_RB a_DT period_NN of_IN 21_CD weeks_NNS ._.
The_DT total_JJ loss_NN of_IN life_NN (_( 1,921_CD )_) was_VBD about_IN the_DT same_JJ as_IN in_IN 1896-97_JJ ,_, but_CC less_JJR by_IN 334_CD than_IN in_IN 1897-98_JJ ._.
In_IN neither_DT Mandvi_NNP nor_CC Chuckla_NNP does_VBZ the_DT disease_NN seem_VBP to_TO have_VB spread_VBN from_IN any_DT definite_JJ centre_NN ._.
B_NNP Ward_NNP North_NNP ._.
Umarkhari_NNP ,_, like_IN Mandvi_NNP ,_, is_VBZ marked_VBN by_IN two_CD distinct_JJ epidemics_NNS ._.

Influence_NN of_IN Rats_NNP ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ exceedingly_RB difficult_JJ to_TO obtain_VB any_DT precise_JJ information_NN ,_, either_CC about_IN the_DT movements_NNS of_IN ,_, or_CC the_DT mortality_NN among_IN ,_, rats_NNS ._.

The_DT following_JJ account_NN of_IN an_DT outbreak_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN Colaba_NNP ,_, at_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, shows_VBZ how_WRB close_JJ is_VBZ the_DT relation_NN between_IN plague_NN among_IN rats_NNS and_CC plague_NN among_IN human_JJ beings_NNS ,_, and_CC seems_VBZ to_TO show_VB that_IN rats_NNS undoubtedly_RB can_MD spread_VB plague_NN among_IN human_JJ beings_NNS :_: -_: ``_`` After_IN a_DT break_NN of_IN nearly_RB two_CD months_NNS a_DT recrudescence_NN of_IN plague_NN occurred_VBD in_IN ``_`` Colaba_NNP village_NN in_IN July_NNP 1898_CD ._.

The_DT dead_JJ rats_NNS had_VBD been_VBN found_VBN from_IN six_CD to_TO seven_CD days_NNS before_IN the_DT attacks_NNS ._.
In_IN ``_`` the_DT first_JJ week_NN in_IN September_NNP 1898_CD ,_, dead_JJ rats_NNS were_VBD found_VBN in_IN large_JJ quantities_NNS in_IN the_DT ``_`` compound_NN of_IN a_DT disused_JJ bungalow_NN in_IN Upper_NNP Colaba_NNP adjoining_VBG a_DT small_JJ native_JJ bazaar_NN ``_`` known_VBN as_IN the_DT Parsee_NNP Bazaar_NNP ._.

On_IN the_DT 13th_JJ September_NNP a_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN ``_`` occurred_VBD in_IN this_DT bazaar_NN ,_, the_DT occupants_NNS of_IN the_DT room_NN were_VBD turned_VBN out_RP and_CC also_RB the_DT ``_`` rooms_NNS on_IN either_DT side_NN and_CC the_DT premises_NNS thoroughly_RB disinfected_VBN ._.

The_DT number_NN of_IN Europeans_NNPS who_WP have_VBP been_VBN attacked_VBN with_IN plague_NN during_IN past_JJ epidemics_NNS has_VBZ been_VBN markedly_RB small_JJ ,_, and_CC in_IN a_DT large_JJ number_NN of_IN the_DT cases_NNS that_WDT have_VBP occurred_VBN among_IN them_PRP the_DT attacks_NNS have_VBP been_VBN preced-_JJ ed_NN by_IN the_DT finding_NN of_IN dead_JJ rats_NNS in_IN their_PRP$ residences_NNS ._.

On_IN this_DT subject_NN the_DT Dis-_NNP trict_NN Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, Dr._NNP Cayley_NNP ,_, wrote_VBD on_IN 12th_CD May_NNP 1899_CD :_: -_: ``_`` The_DT only_JJ part_NN of_IN Bombay_NNP practically_RB in_IN which_WDT Europeans_NNPS have_VBP suffered_VBN ``_`` to_TO any_DT extent_NN from_IN plague_NN has_VBZ been_VBN Elphinstone_NNP Circle_NNP ._.
This_DT ,_, in_IN my_PRP$ opinion_NN ,_, is_VBZ ``_`` due_JJ to_TO the_DT fact_NN that_IN there_EX are_VBP double_JJ floors_NNS to_TO these_DT buildings_NNS ,_, in_IN which_WDT rats_VBP swarm._VBP ``_``

The_DT same_JJ is_VBZ likely_JJ to_TO recur_VB next_JJ ``_`` year_NN unless_IN something_NN is_VBZ done_VBN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP looked_VBN at_IN several_JJ of_IN the_DT houses_NNS ``_`` where_WRB plague_NN has_VBZ occurred_VBN ._.
They_PRP are_VBP mostly_RB clean_JJ ,_, light_JJ and_CC airy_NN ._.
The_DT double_JJ ``_`` floors_NNS with_IN the_DT facilities_NNS they_PRP give_VBP for_IN the_DT breeding_NN of_IN rats_NNS are_VBP the_DT main_JJ points_NNS ``_`` in_IN which_WDT these_DT houses_NNS differ_VBP from_IN other_JJ European_JJ houses_NNS ,_, and_CC I_PRP am_VBP confident_JJ that_IN ``_`` this_DT is_VBZ the_DT cause_NN of_IN these_DT houses_NNS being_VBG infected_VBN with_IN plague_NN ._. ''_''
In_IN view_NN of_IN these_DT facts_NNS it_PRP was_VBD decided_VBN to_TO call_VB upon_IN the_DT owners_NNS of_IN these_DT houses_NNS to_TO do_VB away_RB with_IN the_DT double_JJ floors_NNS ._.
No_DT important_JJ observations_NNS were_VBD recorded_VBN during_IN the_DT year_NN regarding_VBG the_DT migration_NN of_IN rats_NNS ;_: but_CC it_PRP very_RB commonly_RB occurred_VBD that_IN when_WRB a_DT house_NN was_VBD attacked_VBN by_IN plague_NN ,_, enquiry_NN elicited_VBD that_IN dead_JJ rats_NNS had_VBD been_VBN found_VBN a_DT few_JJ days_NNS previously_RB and_CC that_IN then_RB all_DT traces_NNS of_IN rats_NNS had_VBD dis-_NN appeared_VBN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ a_DT point_NN difficult_JJ to_TO establish_VB that_IN the_DT rats_NNS brought_VBD ?_. 23_CD infection_NN ,_, but_CC that_DT is_VBZ an_DT almost_RB universal_JJ opinion_NN in_IN Bombay_NNP :_: though_IN occasional_JJ instances_NNS have_VBP been_VBN observed_VBN where_WRB plague_JJ infection_NN has_VBZ been_VBN carried_VBN by_IN human_JJ beings_NNS from_IN one_CD house_NN to_TO another_DT ,_, and_CC sickness_NN in_IN the_DT second_JJ house_NN has_VBZ been_VBN followed_VBN by_IN rat_NN mortality_NN ._.
Dead_JJ rats_NNS did_VBD not_RB always_RB mean_VB plague_NN among_IN the_DT residents_NNS in_IN a_DT house_NN ._.
In_IN December_NNP 1898_CD large_JJ numbers_NNS of_IN rats_NNS were_VBD noticed_VBN along_IN the_DT foreshore_NN of_IN Colaba_NNP at_IN dusk_NN ,_, and_CC writing_VBG at_IN this_DT time_NN ,_, the_DT District_NNP Officer_NNP says_VBZ :_: -_: ``_`` Dead_JJ rats_NNS have_VBP been_VBN found_VBN in_IN as_RB many_JJ as_IN 25_CD houses_NNS ._.
In_IN nearly_RB every_DT house_NN ``_`` they_PRP have_VBP been_VBN found_VBN off_RB and_CC on_IN for_IN at_IN least_JJS 14_CD days_NNS before_IN the_DT fact_NN was_VBD brought_VBN ``_`` to_TO notice_VB ._.
Each_DT house_NN was_VBD disinfected_VBN on_IN receipt_NN of_IN information_NN ._.
In_IN five_CD of_IN these_DT ``_`` houses_NNS cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN occurred_VBD ._. ''_''
Endeavours_NNS were_VBD made_VBN to_TO persuade_VB the_DT people_NNS to_TO vacate_VB their_PRP$ houses_NNS in_IN all_DT these_DT cases_NNS ;_: where_WRB the_DT finding_NN of_IN rats_NNS had_VBD been_VBN followed_VBN by_IN plague_NN among_IN the_DT residents_NNS they_PRP went_VBD willingly_RB enough_RB ;_: but_CC when_WRB no_DT one_NN had_VBD been_VBN attacked_VBN with_IN plague_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT rats_NNS had_VBD stopped_VBN dying_VBG ,_, they_PRP could_MD not_RB see_VB the_DT necessity_NN of_IN leaving_VBG ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ ,_, however_RB ,_, significant_JJ that_IN the_DT mortality_NN in_IN the_DT Fort_NNP began_VBD to_TO rise_VB from_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN December_NNP ._.
In_IN one_CD case_NN plague_NN broke_VBD out_RP simultaneously_RB in_IN two_CD adjoining_NN houses_NNS ._.
In_IN one_CD lived_VBD Hindus_NNP ,_, in_IN the_DT other_JJ Parsees_NNP ._.
There_EX was_VBD no_DT intercourse_NN between_IN the_DT residents_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT only_JJ point_NN of_IN com-_JJ munity_NN was_VBD that_IN dead_JJ rats_NNS had_VBD been_VBN found_VBN in_IN both_DT houses_NNS shortly_RB before_IN ._.
Instances_NNS constantly_RB occurred_VBD all_DT over_IN Bombay_NNP where_WRB dead_JJ rats_NNS had_VBD been_VBN found_VBN a_DT few_JJ days_NNS previously_RB to_TO the_DT residents_NNS of_IN a_DT house_NN being_VBG attack-_JJ ed_NN with_IN plague_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP was_VBD a_DT common_JJ incident_NN to_TO find_VB dead_JJ rats_NNS in_IN cup-_JJ boards_NNS or_CC behind_VB boxes_NNS when_WRB a_DT house_NN was_VBD being_VBG disinfected_VBN on_IN account_NN of_IN plague_NN ,_, but_CC in_IN this_DT as_IN in_IN most_JJS other_JJ respects_NNS it_PRP was_VBD difficult_JJ to_TO collect_VB precise_JJ information_NN ._.
Lieut_NNP ._.

''_''
In_IN C_NNP Ward_NNP during_IN August_NNP and_CC September_NNP ,_, when_WRB there_EX was_VBD a_DT minor_JJ epidemic_NN ,_, reports_NNS were_VBD constantly_RB being_VBG received_VBN of_IN the_DT finding_NN of_IN dead_JJ rats_NNS ,_, and_CC plague_JJ cases_NNS usually_RB were_VBD reported_VBN at_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN or_CC shortly_RB afterwards_NNS ._.

But_CC places_NNS where_WRB dead_JJ rats_NNS were_VBD found_VBN were_VBD very_RB systematically_RB vacated_VBN and_CC disinfected_VBN ,_, and_CC perhaps_RB to_TO this_DT may_MD be_VB ascribed_VBN the_DT lighter_JJR incidence_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_NN in_IN this_DT ward_NN during_IN the_DT year_NN under_IN report_NN ._.
From_IN this_DT ward_NN it_PRP is_VBZ reported_VBN that_IN Plague_NNP almost_RB always_RB supervened_VBN if_IN a_DT house_NN ?_. 24_CD remained_VBD tenanted_JJ when_WRB dead_JJ rats_NNS had_VBD been_VBN found_VBN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ worth_JJ noting_VBG that_IN during_IN April_NNP and_CC May_NNP when_WRB the_DT epidemic_NN was_VBD subsiding_VBG ,_, houses_NNS which_WDT had_VBD been_VBN locked_VBN up_RP and_CC deserted_VBN by_IN the_DT residents_NNS were_VBD opened_VBN and_CC disinfected_VBN prior_RB to_TO re-occupation_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT course_NN of_IN this_DT a_DT few_JJ dead_JJ rats_NNS were_VBD constantly_RB being_VBG found_VBN ._.
At_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN December_NNP the_DT District_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, D_NNP Ward_NNP ,_, wrote_VBD that_IN in_IN the_DT past_JJ three_CD months_NNS reports_NNS of_IN dead_JJ rats_NNS had_VBD been_VBN received_VBN from_IN 19_CD places_NNS ._.
In_IN every_DT case_NN disinfection_NN was_VBD promptly_RB carried_VBN out_RP ._.
In_IN seven_CD instances_NNS cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN occurred_VBD within_IN a_DT week_NN after_IN the_DT dead_JJ rats_NNS were_VBD found_VBN ._.
In_IN this_DT district_NN it_PRP was_VBD especially_RB remarked_VBN that_IN reports_NNS of_IN dead_JJ rats_NNS were_VBD frequent_JJ at_IN the_DT time_NN when_WRB the_DT mortality_NN began_VBD to_TO rise_VB in_IN the_DT various_JJ sections_NNS ,_, but_CC except_IN on_IN Malabar_NNP and_CC Cumballa_NNP Hills_NNP little_JJ was_VBD heard_VBN about_IN them_PRP when_WRB the_DT epidemic_NN was_VBD at_IN its_PRP$ height_NN ._.
The_DT District_NNP Officer_NNP holds_VBZ strongly_RB to_TO the_DT opinion_NN that_IN the_DT rats_NNS moving_VBG from_IN place_NN to_TO place_VB took_VBD the_DT plague_NN with_IN them_PRP ._.

Speaking_VBG generally_RB of_IN E_NNP Ward_NNP ,_, instances_NNS have_VBP been_VBN frequent_JJ where_WRB dead_JJ rats_NNS have_VBP been_VBN found_VBN before_IN plague_NN appeared_VBD ,_, and_CC about_IN a_DT fort-_JJ night_NN before_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ became_VBD really_RB virulent_JJ they_PRP were_VBD being_VBG found_VBN all_DT over_IN the_DT district_NN in_IN large_JJ numbers_NNS ._.
This_DT was_VBD especially_RB marked_VBN in_IN Byculla_NNP ._.
Dr._NNP Godinho_NNP ,_, Deputy_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, doing_VBG plague_NN duty_NN in_IN the_DT Mazagaon_NNP section_NN of_IN this_DT District_NNP ,_, writes_VBZ :_: -_: ``_`` Early_RB in_IN January_NNP rats_NNS began_VBD to_TO die_VB ._.

``_`` I_PRP may_MD take_VB this_DT occasion_NN to_TO mention_VB two_CD interesting_JJ facts_NNS :_: A_DT plague_NN case_NN ``_`` had_VBD occurred_VBN in_IN Gokaldas_NNP Wadi_NNP ,_, No_NNP ._.
109_CD ._.
The_DT patient_NN had_VBD been_VBN brought_VBN during_IN ``_`` the_DT night_NN from_IN elsewhere_RB ._.

This_DT ,_, I_PRP am_VBP ``_`` inclined_JJ to_TO think_VB ,_, was_VBD a_DT case_NN of_IN infection_NN from_IN man_NN to_TO rat_VB ._.
Just_RB the_DT reverse_NN obtained_VBN ``_`` in_IN Carpenter_NNP Street_NNP ._.
