It_PRP was_VBD afterwards_NNS ascertained_VBD that_IN some_DT dead_JJ rats_NNS had_VBD ``_`` been_VBN found_VBN in_IN the_DT rear_NN of_IN the_DT house_NN near_IN the_DT privies_NNS ._. ''_''
The_DT District_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, F_NNP and_CC G_NNP Wards_NNP ,_, as_IN most_JJS others_NNS ,_, found_VBD it_PRP difficult_JJ to_TO obtain_VB precise_JJ information_NN on_IN this_DT subject_NN ;_: but_CC he_PRP notes_VBZ the_DT almost_RB complete_JJ disappearance_NN of_IN rats_NNS during_IN the_DT monsoon_NN of_IN 1898_CD ,_, ?_. 25_CD their_PRP$ re-appearance_NN at_IN the_DT north_JJ end_NN of_IN the_DT District_NNP during_IN the_DT cold_JJ weather_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT considerable_JJ mortality_NN among_IN them_PRP both_DT in_IN the_DT north_NN and_CC south_NN at_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN December_NNP ,_, i.e._NN ,_, just_RB when_WRB the_DT mortality_NN began_VBD to_TO rise_VB in_IN those_DT directions_NNS ._.
Re-infection_NN ._.
In_IN B_NNP Ward_NNP South_NNP (_( Mandvi_NNP and_CC Chakla_NNP )_) ,_, where_WRB the_DT houses_NNS are_VBP for_IN the_DT most_JJS part_NN fairly_RB good_JJ ,_, plague_NN seemed_VBD at_IN first_JJ to_TO spread_VB slowly_RB from_IN one_CD man_NN to_TO another_DT ,_, the_DT epidemic_JJ only_RB becoming_VBG severe_RB when_WRB the_DT rats_NNS became_VBD badly_RB infected_VBN and_CC carried_VBD the_DT disease_NN into_IN almost_RB every_DT house_NN ,_, but_CC ,_, speaking_VBG generally_RB ,_, plague_NN attached_VBD itself_PRP to_TO insanitary_JJ localities_NNS ,_, and_CC only_RB after_IN they_PRP had_VBD become_VBN thoroughly_RB poisoned_VBN did_VBD the_DT better_JJR class_NN dwellings_NNS in_IN the_DT neighbourhood_NN suffer_NN ._.
This_DT feature_NN of_IN plague_NN ,_, which_WDT it_PRP doubtless_VBZ shares_NNS with_IN most_JJS other_JJ epidemic_JJ diseases_NNS ,_, has_VBZ been_VBN noticed_VBN in_IN past_JJ years_NNS ,_, and_CC it_PRP was_VBD observed_VBN that_IN localities_NNS ,_, and_CC even_RB particular_JJ houses_NNS ,_, which_WDT were_VBD badly_RB affected_VBN in_IN previous_JJ epidemics_NNS ,_, were_VBD more_RBR liable_JJ to_TO re-infection_NN during_IN the_DT year_NN under_IN report_NN ._.
The_DT history_NN of_IN a_DT plague_JJ epidemic_JJ naturally_RB tends_VBZ to_TO become_VB a_DT Lis-_JJ tory_NN of_IN insanitary_JJ areas-the_JJ out-break_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC the_DT attempts_NNS made_VBN to_TO free_VB them_PRP from_IN infection_NN ._.
The_DT methods_NNS adopted_VBN were_VBD ,_, briefly_NN ,_, removal_NN of_IN the_DT sick_NN to_TO hospital_NN ,_, and_CC of_IN the_DT healthy_JJ to_TO camps_VB ,_, and_CC the_DT disinfection_NN of_IN the_DT infected_JJ place_NN ._.
It_PRP can_MD hardly_RB be_VB doubted_VBN that_IN ,_, if_IN it_PRP were_VBD possible_JJ to_TO simultaneously_RB evacuate_VB the_DT whole_NN or_CC large_JJ portions_NNS of_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, and_CC to_TO keep_VB the_DT people_NNS in_IN camp_NN till_NN rats_NNS had_VBD ceased_VBN to_TO die_VB and_CC their_PRP$ houses_NNS had_VBD been_VBN disinfected_VBN ,_, the_DT back_NN of_IN an_DT epidemic_JJ would_MD be_VB at_IN once_RB broken_VBN ,_, though_IN plague_NN might_MD linger_VB on_IN and_CC break_VB out_RP again_RB in_IN a_DT subsequent_JJ year_NN ._.
But_CC anything_NN approaching_JJ evacuation_NN on_IN a_DT sufficiently_RB large_JJ scale_NN is_VBZ out_IN of_IN the_DT question_NN in_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT result_NN was_VBD ,_, and_CC always_RB has_VBZ been_VBN ,_, that_IN though_IN the_DT temporary_JJ evacuation_NN of_IN a_DT bad_JJ locality_NN has_VBZ stopped_VBN the_DT epide-_JJ mic_NN there_EX for_IN the_DT time_NN being_VBG ,_, and_CC saved_VBD thousands_NNS of_IN lives_NNS ,_, these_DT insanitary_JJ places_NNS are_VBP always_RB liable_JJ to_TO re-infection_NN so_RB long_RB as_IN the_DT disease_NN is_VBZ prevalent_JJ ._.
It_PRP may_MD be_VB brought_VBN in_IN by_IN rats_NNS ,_, or_CC by_IN a_DT man_NN who_WP has_VBZ visited_VBN a_DT sick_JJ friend_NN ,_, or_CC in_IN numberless_JJ other_JJ ways_NNS :_: and_CC once_VB it_PRP has_VBZ obtained_VBN a_DT fresh_JJ footing_NN ,_, the_DT same_JJ conditions_NNS of_IN filth_NN and_CC overcrowding_NN ,_, and_CC of_IN want_NN of_IN light_NN and_CC ventilation_NN ,_, help_NN and_CC foster_VB it_PRP till_VB the_DT place_NN once_RB more_RBR becomes_VBZ a_DT plague_NN centre_NN ._.
It_PRP thus_RB frequently_RB happened_VBD that_IN neighbourhoods_NNS suffering_VBG from_IN these_DT defects_NNS were_VBD seriously_RB infected_VBN more_JJR than_IN once_RB during_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ ._.
Facts_NNS of_IN this_DT kind_NN are_VBP the_DT weapons_NNS of_IN those_DT who_WP urge_VBP that_IN plague_NN measures_NNS are_VBP useless_JJ ,_, and_CC therefore_RB intolerable_JJ ._.
The_DT lives_NNS that_WDT are_VBP lost_VBN arrest_IN the_DT attention_NN ;_: no_DT allowance_NN is_VBZ made_VBN for_IN the_DT lives_NNS that_WDT are_VBP saved_VBN ._.
The_DT classes_NNS most_RBS liable_JJ to_TO Plague_NNP ._.
The_DT people_NNS who_WP suffered_VBD most_JJS were_VBD those_DT who_WP lived_VBD among_IN the_DT most_RBS insanitary_JJ surroundings_NNS ,_, in_IN other_JJ words_NNS the_DT poorer_NN classes_NNS ._.
Capt_NNP ._.
Pritchard_NNP writes_VBZ :_: -_: ``_`` Their_PRP$ habits_NNS are_VBP often_RB dirty_JJ and_CC unclean_JJ ,_, even_RB the_DT food_NN they_PRP eat_VBP and_CC their_PRP$ ``_`` manner_NN of_IN eating_NN ._.
The_DT ordinary_JJ duties_NNS which_WDT nature_VBP necessarily_RB imposes_VBZ upon_IN all_DT ``_`` alike_RB are_VBP executed_VBN by_IN them_PRP often_RB in_IN the_DT very_RB room_NN in_IN which_WDT they_PRP sleep_VBP and_CC eat_NN ,_, and_CC ``_`` almost_RB as_IN much_JJ of_IN this_DT is_VBZ done_VBN inside_RB as_IN outside_JJ ,_, to_TO a_DT distance_NN of_IN within_IN a_DT few_JJ paces_NNS ``_`` of_IN the_DT house_NN ._. ''_''
26_CD Their_PRP$ standard_NN of_IN living_NN is_VBZ lower_JJR ,_, their_PRP$ food_NN not_RB so_RB good_JJ or_CC plenti-_JJ ful_NN ,_, and_CC they_PRP are_VBP handicapped_VBN in_IN the_DT power_NN of_IN resistance_NN to_TO the_DT disease_NN ;_: Mussulmans_NNP ,_, on_IN the_DT whole_NN ,_, suffered_VBD less_JJR than_IN Hindus_NNP ,_, and_CC had_VBD a_DT greater_JJR chance_NN of_IN recovery_NN ._.
The_DT Khojas_NNP especially-a_JJ well-to-do_NN and_CC cleanly_RB community-were_JJ very_RB lightly_RB touched_VBN ;_: but_CC a_DT considerable_JJ proportion_NN of_IN them_PRP have_VBP at_IN various_JJ times_NNS been_VBN inoculated_VBN ._.
Of_IN high-caste_NN Hindus_NNP ,_, those_DT from_IN Gujarat_NNP seem_VBP specially_RB liable_JJ to_TO the_DT disease_NN ._.
Until_IN ,_, however_RB ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Department_NNP Returns_NNP are_VBP tabulated_VBN ,_, any_DT accurate_JJ analysis_NN of_IN the_DT incidence_NN of_IN plague_NN upon_IN particular_JJ communities_NNS is_VBZ not_RB possible_JJ ._.
The_DT comparative_JJ immunity_NN of_IN Europeans_NNPS continued_VBN ._.
Some_DT officers_NNS have_VBP noticed_VBN that_IN people_NNS living_VBG on_IN ground_NN floors_NNS and_CC in_IN attics_NNS suffered_VBD more_JJR than_IN others_NNS ._.
This_DT may_MD possibly_RB be_VB due_JJ to_TO the_DT greater_JJR dampness_NN of_IN the_DT one_CD ,_, the_DT overcrowding_NN and_CC want_NN of_IN ventilation_NN of_IN the_DT other_JJ :_: more_RBR pro-_JJ bably_NN to_TO the_DT fact_NN that_IN rats_VBZ mostly_RB frequent_JJ the_DT ground_NN floor_NN and_CC roof_NN ._.
Brief_JJ compa-_JJ rison_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ with_IN that_DT of_IN pre-_JJ vious_JJ years_NNS ._.
The_DT mortality_NN chart_NN for_IN Bombay_NNP shows_VBZ how_WRB the_DT ascending_VBG curve_NN of_IN mortality_NN was_VBD later_RB than_IN in_IN previous_JJ years_NNS ,_, so_IN that_IN the_DT hot_JJ weather_NN was_VBD established_VBN by_IN the_DT time_NN it_PRP reached_VBD its_PRP$ maximum_NN ._.
That_DT maximum_NN was_VBD higher_JJR than_IN in_IN either_DT 1896-97_JJ or_CC 1897-98_JJ ,_, but_CC the_DT high_JJ level_NN period_NN lasted_VBD for_IN three_CD weeks_NNS only_RB against_IN seven_CD in_IN the_DT first_JJ year_NN and_CC six_CD in_IN the_DT second_JJ ;_: and_CC the_DT decline_NN began_VBD at_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN as_IN in_IN 1897-98_CD ._.
The_DT medical_JJ officers_NNS in_IN Bombay_NNP have_VBP noticed_VBN that_IN during_IN the_DT year_NN under_IN report_NN the_DT virulence_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ,_, the_DT rapidity_NN of_IN its_PRP$ course_NN in_IN the_DT individual_JJ patient_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT case_NN mortality_NN were_VBD greater_JJR than_IN ever_RB before_IN ;_: and_CC the_DT enlargement_NN of_IN the_DT lymphatic_JJ glands_NNS ,_, which_WDT has_VBZ attached_VBN to_TO plague_VB the_DT epithet_NN Bubonic_NNP ,_, was_VBD very_RB slight_JJ or_CC altogether_PRP$ absent_NN in_IN a_DT very_RB much_JJ larger_JJR proportion_NN of_IN cases_NNS ._.
These_DT were_VBD general_JJ impressions_NNS ._.
The_DT hos-_JJ pital_JJ statistics_NNS found_VBD elsewhere_RB give_JJ actual_JJ facts_NNS ._.
The_DT following_JJ notes_NNS have_VBP been_VBN prepared_VBN by_IN Mr._NNP C._NNP Carkeet_NNP James_NNP ,_, Drainage_NNP Engineer_NNP ,_, on_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Charts_NNP compiled_VBN by_IN him_PRP from_IN August_NNP 1896_CD to_TO the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT third_JJ Epidemic_NNP in_IN May_NNP 1899_CD ._.
The_DT two_CD charts_NNS are_VBP given_VBN as_IN an_DT appendix_NN to_TO this_DT report_NN :_: -_: '_'' The_DT third_JJ Epidemic_NNP of_IN Plague_NNP having_VBG run_VBN its_PRP$ course_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ possible_JJ to_TO now_RB make_VB a_DT comparison_NN of_IN the_DT Charts_NNP which_WDT show_VBP the_DT progress_NN of_IN the_DT three_CD epidemics_NNS ._.
These_DT charts_NNS have_VBP been_VBN previously_RB described_VBN in_IN detail_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT Plague_NNP reports_NNS of_IN Major-General_JJ Sir_NNP W._NNP F._NNP Gatacre_NNP and_CC Sir_NNP J._NNP M._NNP Campbell_NNP ,_, but_CC it_PRP will_MD not_RB be_VB out_IN of_IN place_NN to_TO again_RB give_VB a_DT brief_JJ explanatory_JJ description_NN of_IN them_PRP here_RB under_IN their_PRP$ different_JJ headings_NNS ._.
CHART_NNP No_NNP ._.
1_CD ._.
Chart_NNP No_NNP ._.
1_CD shows_VBZ the_DT mortality_NN from_IN all_DT causes_NNS which_WDT occurred_VBD in_IN the_DT City_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP from_IN August_NNP 1st_CD ,_, 1896_CD ,_, to_TO June_NNP 30th_CD ,_, 1899_CD ,_, registered_VBD concurrently_RB with_IN the_DT following_VBG data_NNS :_: -_: Maximum_JJ temperature_NN Indicated_VBN on_IN the_DT Chart_NNP by_IN thick_JJ black_JJ lines_NNS ._.
Minimum_NNP ``_`` Population_NNP ``_`` ``_`` by_IN a_DT thin_JJ blue_JJ line_NN ._.
Humidity_NNP ``_`` ``_`` by_IN a_DT green_JJ line_NN ._.
Daily_JJ mortality_NN ``_`` ``_`` by_IN a_DT thick_JJ red_JJ line_NN ._.
Normal_NNP mortality_NN ,_, previous_JJ five_CD years_NNS '_POS averages_NNS ``_`` ``_`` a_DT thin_JJ red_JJ line_NN ._.
Velocity_NN of_IN wind_NN ``_`` ``_`` a_DT purple_JJ line_NN ._.
Clouds_NNP ``_`` ``_`` a_DT brown_JJ line_NN ._.
?_. 27_CD The_DT horizontal_JJ scale_NN is_VBZ six_CD days_NNS to_TO one_CD inch_NN ;_: the_DT vertical_JJ scale_NN varies_NNS as_IN shown_VBN in_IN the_DT left_JJ hand_NN margin_NN ._.
The_DT information_NN compiled_VBN in_IN this_DT chart_NN has_VBZ been_VBN obtained_VBN as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -_: The_DT maximum_JJ and_CC minimum_JJ temperatures_NNS ,_, humidity_NN ,_, velocity_NN of_IN wind_NN ,_, and_CC amount_NN of_IN clouds_NNS have_VBP been_VBN obtained_VBN from_IN the_DT published_VBN records_NNS of_IN the_DT Colaba_NNP Observatory_NNP ._.
The_DT population_NN has_VBZ been_VBN obtained_VBN from_IN the_DT Managing_NNP Director_NNP of_IN the_DT Tramway_NNP Company_NNP ,_, who_WP has_VBZ based_VBN his_PRP$ returns_NNS on_IN the_DT averages_NNS of_IN Tramway_NNP receipts_NNS ,_, extending_VBG over_IN several_JJ years_NNS ._.
These_DT returns_NNS have_VBP been_VBN checked_VBN with_IN the_DT information_NN supplied_VBN by_IN the_DT Collector_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, and_CC as_IN they_PRP agree_VBP within_IN a_DT few_JJ thousands_NNS ,_, they_PRP may_MD therefore_RB be_VB taken_VBN as_IN substantially_RB correct_VBP ._.
The_DT daily_JJ mortality_NN ,_, from_IN the_DT Cemetery_NNP returns_NNS of_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP Health_NNP Department_NNP ,_, The_DT normal_JJ mortality_NN ,_, the_DT average_NN of_IN five_CD previous_JJ years_NNS from_IN the_DT returns_NNS published_VBN in_IN the_DT Government_NNP Gazette_NNP ._.
The_DT red_JJ figures_NNS at_IN the_DT top_NN of_IN the_DT Chart_NNP are_VBP the_DT total_JJ deaths_NNS from_IN all_DT causes_NNS for_IN the_DT month_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT red_JJ figures_NNS at_IN the_DT bottom_NN of_IN the_DT chart_NN are_VBP the_DT total_JJ deaths_NNS from_IN Plague_NNP ._.
The_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN deaths_NNS from_IN Plague_NNP has_VBZ been_VBN arrived_VBN at_IN in_IN the_DT following_JJ manner_NN :_: -_: The_DT total_JJ weekly_JJ average_NN number_NN of_IN deaths_NNS ,_, during_IN the_DT five_CD years_NNS previous_JJ to_TO the_DT Plague_NNP ,_, has_VBZ been_VBN deducted_VBN from_IN the_DT total_JJ deaths_NNS from_IN all_DT causes_NNS for_IN the_DT week_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT remainder_NN taken_VBN as_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN deaths_NNS due_JJ to_TO Plague_NNP ,_, deaths_NNS from_IN Cholera_NNP being_VBG shown_VBN separately_RB ,_, but_CC owing_VBG to_TO the_DT decrease_NN of_IN population_NN ,_, there_EX must_MD be_VB added_VBN ,_, in_IN order_NN to_TO arrive_VB at_IN a_DT true_JJ conception_NN of_IN the_DT increased_VBN mortality_NN a_DT figure_NN bearing_VBG the_DT same_JJ proportion_NN to_TO the_DT recorded_JJ deaths_NNS as_IN the_DT cal-_NN culated_VBD actual_JJ population_NN bears_NNS to_TO the_DT normal_JJ population_NN of_IN 8,50,000_CD ._.
This_DT calculation_NN has_VBZ been_VBN made_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT figure_NN or_CC number_NN to_TO be_VB added_VBN is_VBZ given_VBN in_IN red_JJ figures_NNS above_IN the_DT numbers_NNS for_IN estimated_VBN deaths_NNS from_IN Plague_NNP by_IN months_NNS ,_, entered_VBN at_IN the_DT bottom_NN of_IN the_DT Chart_NNP ._.
The_DT object_NN of_IN the_DT compilation_NN of_IN this_DT Chart_NNP was_VBD to_TO establish_VB the_DT truth_NN or_CC other-_JJ wise_NN of_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT theories_NNS freely_RB advanced_VBD regarding_VBG the_DT definite_JJ influence_NN of_IN temperature_NN ,_, humidity_NN ,_, wind_NN and_CC clouds_NN on_IN mortality_NN ._.
Northerly_RB and_CC Easterly_NNP winds_NNS ,_, which_WDT are_VBP always_RB dry_JJ ,_, seem_VBP generally_RB to_TO have_VB had_VBN an_DT unfavourable_JJ influence_NN ,_, often_RB ,_, immediately_RB so_RB ,_, on_IN the_DT mortality_NN ,_, e.g._NN ,_, from_IN November_NNP to_TO near_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN March_NNP when_WRB the_DT humidity_NN is_VBZ generally_RB between_IN 60_CD and_CC 70_CD ,_, and_CC while_IN Easterly_NNP winds_NNS prevail_VBP the_DT mortality_NN increases_VBZ irregularly_RB ,_, but_CC more_RBR or_CC less_RBR steadily_RB ;_: and_CC in_IN particular_JJ cases_NNS ,_, e.g._NN ,_, on_IN the_DT 8th_CD and_CC 9th_CD February_NNP 1898_CD and_CC on_IN the_DT 2nd_CD March_NNP 1898_CD ,_, when_WRB high_JJ winds_NNS were_VBD accompanied_VBN by_IN a_DT fall_NN in_IN the_DT Humidity_NNP ,_, there_EX were_VBD immediate_JJ increases_NNS in_IN the_DT deaths_NNS ,_, as_IN shown_VBN in_IN the_DT Chart_NNP ._.
There_EX has_VBZ not_RB ,_, however_RB ,_, been_VBN a_DT sufficiently_RB consistent_JJ sequence_NN to_TO make_VB any_DT generalisation_NN possible_JJ ._.
As_IN a_DT matter_NN of_IN fact_NN ,_, in_IN order_NN to_TO have_VB given_VBN the_DT elements_NNS a_DT fair_JJ chance_NN ,_, all_DT Plague_NNP measures_NNS would_MD have_VB to_TO be_VB abandoned_VBN ,_, for_IN it_PRP can_MD not_RB be_VB doubted_VBN that_IN the_DT measures_NNS that_WDT have_VBP been_VBN adopted_VBN in_IN Bombay_NNP have_VBP had_VBD the_DT effect_NN of_IN diminish-_JJ ing_VBG the_DT extent_NN of_IN the_DT pest_NN ._.
The_DT degree_NN of_IN sanitary_JJ efficiency_NN is_VBZ also_RB a_DT disturbing_JJ factor_NN ._.
It_PRP would_MD appear_VB that_IN a_DT low_JJ temperature_NN may_MD have_VB had_VBD an_DT adverse_JJ bearing_NN on_IN the_DT disease_NN ,_, as_IN ,_, throughout_IN the_DT months_NNS of_IN December_NNP ,_, January_NNP and_CC February_NNP ,_, when_WRB the_DT minimum_JJ temperature_NN is_VBZ the_DT lowest_JJS for_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, the_DT mortality_NN is_VBZ greatest_JJS ._.
The_DT chart_NN is_VBZ interesting_VBG in_IN showing_VBG the_DT movements_NNS of_IN the_DT population_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT first_JJ epidemic_VBZ the_DT population_NN fell_VBD from_IN 8,50,000_CD to_TO 4,37,000_CD in_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN February_NNP 1897_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT second_JJ epidemic_VBZ the_DT lowest_JJS recorded_JJ population_NN is_VBZ 7,10,000_CD ,_, about_RB ?_. 28_CD March_NNP 15th_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT third_JJ epidemic_JJ the_DT population_NN was_VBD estimated_VBN to_TO be_VB 7,37,000_CD in_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN April_NNP ,_, having_VBG fallen_VBN from_IN 9,50,000_CD ,_, showing_VBG that_IN the_DT fear_NN of_IN Plague_NNP has_VBZ considerably_RB decreased_VBN ,_, since_IN the_DT first_JJ epidemic_NN ._.
Another_DT interesting_JJ point_NN is_VBZ the_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN deaths_NNS registered_VBN from_IN all_DT causes_NNS shown_VBN on_IN this_DT Chart_NNP from_IN August_NNP 1st_CD ,_, 1896_CD ,_, to_TO June_NNP 30th_CD ,_, 1899-35_JJ months-which_JJ amount_NN to_TO 1,56,980_CD ._.
The_DT number_NN of_IN deaths_NNS based_VBN on_IN an_DT average_NN of_IN 5_CD years_NNS before_IN that_DT period_NN is_VBZ 83,764_CD ,_, leaving_VBG an_DT excess_NN of_IN 73,216_CD as_IN the_DT probable_JJ number_NN of_IN victims_NNS of_IN Plague_NNP ._.
Taking_VBG 8,50,000_CD as_IN the_DT average_JJ population_NN ,_, this_DT figure_NN means_VBZ that_IN the_DT percentage_NN of_IN loss_NN from_IN plague_NN is_VBZ 8.61_CD only_RB ,_, a_DT remarkable_JJ result_NN when_WRB compared_VBN with_IN recorded_JJ epidemics_NNS in_IN earlier_JJR years_NNS ._.
The_DT fixing_NN of_IN a_DT date_NN for_IN the_DT commencement_NN of_IN Plague_NNP in_IN Bombay_NNP must_MD always_RB be_VB problematical_JJ ,_, but_CC from_IN facts_NNS gained_VBN from_IN enquiries_NNS made_VBN during_IN the_DT first_JJ epidemic_NN from_IN local_JJ medical_JJ practitioners_NNS ,_, the_DT first_JJ week_NN in_IN August_NNP 1896_CD was_VBD agreed_VBN upon_IN by_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Plague_NNP Committee_NNP ,_, certainly_RB from_IN about_IN that_DT date_NN the_DT total_JJ mortality_NN rose_VBD above_IN normal_JJ ,_, and_CC never_RB again_RB touched_VBD it_PRP except_IN on_IN one_CD or_CC two_CD days_NNS until_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN April_NNP 1_CD 897_CD ._.
In_IN referring_VBG to_TO the_DT Chart_NNP it_PRP will_MD be_VB noticed_VBN that_IN after_IN the_DT first_JJ epidemic_VBZ the_DT mortality_NN reached_VBD its_PRP$ normal_JJ level_NN about_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN April_NNP ,_, and_CC remained_VBD so_RB until_IN nearly_RB the_DT middle_NN of_IN July_NNP ._.
This_DT occurred_VBD again_RB in_IN the_DT Spring_NN of_IN 1898_CD ,_, except_IN that_IN the_DT normal_JJ level_NN was_VBD reached_VBN at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT first_JJ week_NN in_IN May_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT mortality_NN remained_VBD so_RB to_TO the_DT middle_NN of_IN August_NNP ._.
It_PRP might_MD be_VB said_VBD that_IN the_DT lowering_NN of_IN the_DT sub-soil_JJ water_NN due_JJ to_TO evaporation_VB had_VBD something_NN to_TO do_VB with_IN this_DT result_NN ,_, but_CC it_PRP must_MD be_VB remembered_VBN that_IN however_RB low_JJ a_DT level_NN the_DT sub-soil_JJ water_NN reached_VBN at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN May_NNP ,_, it_PRP was_VBD fully_RB replenished_VBN before_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN June_NNP by_IN the_DT first_JJ monsoon_NN rains_NNS ._.
From_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN July_NNP 1897_CD ,_, the_DT health_NN of_IN the_DT City_NNP suddenly_RB took_VBD a_DT turn_NN for_IN the_DT worse_JJR ,_, and_CC throughout_IN to_TO the_DT remainder_NN of_IN the_DT monsoon_NN ,_, the_DT mortality_NN was_VBD abnormally_RB high_JJ ,_, showing_VBG the_DT probable_JJ presence_NN of_IN plague_NN ,_, until_IN it_PRP became_VBD epidemic_JJ in_IN December_NNP 1897_CD ._.
But_CC in_IN referring_VBG to_TO the_DT same_JJ period_NN in_IN 1898-99_JJ ,_, there_EX is_VBZ a_DT very_RB distinct_JJ improvement_NN ,_, and_CC ,_, with_IN the_DT exception_NN of_IN the_DT period_NN from_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN August_NNP to_TO the_DT middle_NN of_IN October_NNP ,_, the_DT death-rate_NN of_IN the_DT City_NNP is_VBZ normal_JJ ,_, and_CC in_IN spite_NN of_IN the_DT fact_NN that_IN the_DT population_NN was_VBD much_RB in_IN excess_NN of_IN 8,50,000_CD ._.
This_DT can_MD not_RB be_VB accounted_VBN for_IN by_IN any_DT particular_JJ meteorological_JJ conditions_NNS ,_, but_CC I_PRP think_VBP it_PRP may_MD probably_RB be_VB placed_VBN to_TO the_DT credit_NN of_IN the_DT good_JJ work_NN done_VBN in_IN putting_VBG the_DT City_NNP in_IN a_DT better_JJR sanitary_JJ condition_NN ._.
CHART_NNP No_NNP ._.
2_CD ._.
Chart_NNP No_NNP ._.
2_CD shows_VBZ the_DT course_NN of_IN the_DT epidemics_NNS for_IN the_DT three_CD seasons_NNS 1896-97_CD ,_, 1897-98_CD ,_, 1898-99_CD ,_, plotted_VBN per_IN mille_FW per_IN annum_NN according_VBG to_TO the_DT official_JJ returns_NNS of_IN the_DT weekly_JJ death-rate_NN from_IN all_DT causes_NNS against_IN actual_JJ population_NN ._.
In_IN this_DT as_IN in_IN Chart_NNP No_NNP ._.
1_CD ,_, the_DT population_NN has_VBZ been_VBN estimated_VBN from_IN the_DT Tramway_NNP Company_NNP 's_POS statistics_NNS ,_, checked_VBN with_IN the_DT returns_NNS supplied_VBN by_IN the_DT Collector_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
The_DT red_JJ line_NN shows_VBZ the_DT epidemic_JJ in_IN 1896-97_JJ ,_, the_DT blue_JJ line_NN the_DT epidemic_JJ in_IN 1897-98_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT black_JJ line_NN the_DT epidemic_JJ in_IN 1898-99_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT yellow_JJ line_NN the_DT normal_JJ death-rate_NN based_VBN on_IN the_DT average_NN of_IN five_CD years_NNS previous_JJ to_TO 1896_CD ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ only_RB by_IN a_DT chart_NN of_IN this_DT description_NN that_IN a_DT true_JJ comparison_NN of_IN the_DT three_CD epidemics_NNS can_MD be_VB made_VBN ._.
An_DT epidemic_NN is_VBZ considered_VBN to_TO be_VB present_JJ when_WRB the_DT mortality_NN of_IN the_DT City_NNP is_VBZ equal_JJ to_TO 60.00_CD per_IN mille_NN ,_, that_WDT is_VBZ about_IN double_RB the_DT normal_JJ ._.
The_DT following_NN are_VBP a_DT few_JJ interesting_NN points_NNS which_WDT the_DT Chart_NNP brings_VBZ out_RP :_: -_: The_DT first_JJ epidemic_NN was_VBD undoubtedly_RB the_DT worst_JJS ;_: it_PRP commenced_VBD in_IN the_DT first_JJ week_NN in_IN December_NNP and_CC ended_VBD in_IN the_DT last_JJ week_NN in_IN April_NNP ,_, and_CC its_PRP$ maximum_NN was_VBD attained_VBN in_IN February_NNP with_IN a_DT death-rate_NN of_IN 225_CD per_IN thousand_NN on_IN a_DT population_NN of_IN 442,000_CD ;_: from_IN ?_. 29_CD that_IN time_NN it_PRP steadily_RB declined_VBD until_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN April_NNP ._.
For_IN these_DT five_CD months_NNS the_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN deaths_NNS from_IN all_DT causes_NNS was_VBD 31,618_CD including_VBG 23,256_CD deaths_NNS over_IN the_DT normal_JJ number_NN ,_, which_WDT ,_, in_IN the_DT absence_NN of_IN any_DT other_JJ cause_NN ,_, may_MD be_VB taken_VBN as_IN the_DT plague_NN mortality_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT second_JJ epidemic_VBZ the_DT mortality_NN did_VBD not_RB reach_VB epidemic_JJ proportions_NNS until_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN January_NNP 1898_CD ,_, and_CC it_PRP attained_VBD its_PRP$ maximum_NN of_IN 165.00_CD per_IN thousand_NN in_IN the_DT third_JJ week_NN in_IN March_NNP on_IN a_DT population_NN of_IN 715,400_CD ,_, having_VBG taken_VBN a_DT fortnight_JJ longer_JJR to_TO reach_VB it_PRP than_IN in_IN the_DT first_JJ ,_, and_CC declining_VBG ,_, as_IN did_VBD its_PRP$ predecessor_NN ,_, at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN April_NNP ._.
The_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN deaths_NNS from_IN all_DT causes_NNS for_IN the_DT four_CD months_NNS of_IN this_DT epidemic_NN was_VBD 29,509_CD ,_, and_CC of_IN which_WDT 18,651_CD are_VBP over_IN the_DT normal_JJ and_CC may_MD be_VB accounted_VBN plague_JJ deaths_NNS ._.
The_DT third_JJ epidemic_JJ started_VBD at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT first_JJ week_NN in_IN January_NNP ,_, just_RB a_DT week_NN after_IN its_PRP$ predecessor_NN ._.
It_PRP has_VBZ followed_VBN the_DT curve_NN of_IN the_DT second_JJ visitation_NN almost_RB exactly_RB ,_, attaining_VBG its_PRP$ maximum_JJ death-rate_NN of_IN 161.5_CD per_IN thousand_NN in_IN the_DT same_JJ week_NN on_IN a_DT population_NN of_IN 774,500_CD souls_NNS ._.
The_DT length_NN of_IN this_DT epidemic_NN was_VBD five_CD months_NNS ,_, for_IN it_PRP did_VBD not_RB decline_VB ,_, as_IN did_VBD the_DT previous_JJ ones_NNS ,_, at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN April_NNP ,_, but_CC a_DT month_NN later_RB ,_, and_CC the_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN deaths_NNS from_IN all_DT causes_NNS was_VBD 34,241_CD ,_, being_VBG 22,859_CD over_IN the_DT normal_JJ ._.
The_DT Chart_NNP distinctly_RB shows_VBZ that_IN the_DT third_JJ epidemic_JJ ,_, though_IN not_RB so_RB virulent_JJ as_IN the_DT first_JJ ,_, and_CC not_RB attaining_VBG such_JJ a_DT high_JJ death-rate_NN by_IN 3.5_CD per_NN mille_NN as_IN the_DT second_JJ ,_, was_VBD considerably_RB worse_JJR than_IN the_DT second_JJ in_IN its_PRP$ length_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN its_PRP$ total_JJ number_NN of_IN deaths_NNS ._.
It_PRP also_RB shows_VBZ that_IN the_DT generally_RB accepted_VBN idea_NN that_WDT plague_VBP leaves_VBZ us_PRP with_IN the_DT advent_NN of_IN the_DT hot_JJ weather_NN ,_, is_VBZ not_RB borne_VBN out_RP in_IN the_DT third_JJ epidemic_NN ,_, which_WDT ran_VBD prac-_NNS tically_RB until_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN May_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT fact_NN that_IN a_DT large_JJ proportion_NN of_IN the_DT population_NN sleep_VBZ out_IN of_IN doors_NNS in_IN the_DT hot_JJ weather_NN is_VBZ not_RB such_JJ an_DT important_JJ factor_NN as_IN is_VBZ supposed_VBN ._.
Another_DT point_NN in_IN the_DT Chart_NNP worth_NN noticing_NN is_VBZ that_IN all_DT three_CD epidemics_NNS have_VBP as_RB nearly_RB as_IN possible_JJ commenced_VBD three_CD months_NNS after_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT monsoon_NN ._.
In_IN 1896_CD ,_, the_DT epidemic_NN started_VBD in_IN the_DT first_JJ week_NN in_IN December_NNP ,_, the_DT rains_NNS of_IN that_DT year_NN having_VBG ended_VBN in_IN the_DT first_JJ week_NN in_IN September_NNP ;_: in_IN 1897_CD and_CC 1898_CD ,_, the_DT completion_NN of_IN the_DT monsoon_NN occurred_VBD about_IN the_DT first_JJ week_NN in_IN October_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT second_JJ and_CC third_JJ epidemics_NNS started_VBD as_RB nearly_RB as_IN possible_JJ at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN December_NNP and_CC the_DT first_JJ week_NN in_IN January_NNP ._.
General_JJ Observations_NNPS ._.
In_IN reviewing_VBG the_DT two_CD Charts_NNS now_RB completed_VBN for_IN the_DT three_CD epidemics_NNS ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ interesting_VBG to_TO note_VB some_DT of_IN the_DT points_NNS which_WDT stand_VBP prominently_RB out_RP in_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC which_WDT ,_, if_IN not_RB altogether_RB definite_JJ ,_, are_VBP yet_RB valuable_JJ ._.
It_PRP may_MD be_VB noted_VBN from_IN Chart_NNP No_NNP ._.
1_CD ,_, that_IN a_DT low_JJ temperature_NN in_IN all_DT three_CD epidemics_NNS has_VBZ had_VBD the_DT effect_NN of_IN increasing_VBG the_DT disease_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN dry_JJ Northerly_NNP and_CC Easterly_NNP winds_VBZ clearly_RB have_VBP an_DT unfavourable_JJ influence_NN ,_, often_RB immediately_RB ,_, on_IN the_DT mortality_NN ._.
The_DT coincidence_NN mentioned_VBD under_IN the_DT notes_NNS on_IN Chart_NNP No_NNP ._.
2_CD ,_, that_WDT plague_VBP becomes_NNS epidemic_JJ three_CD months_NNS after_IN the_DT completion_NN of_IN the_DT monsoon_NN ,_, tend_VBP rather_RB to_TO point_VB that_IN a_DT period_NN of_IN time_NN elapses_VBZ either_DT of_IN immunity_NN for_IN the_DT population_NN or_CC of_IN dormancy_NN for_IN the_DT plague_NN bacilli_NN ._.
Each_DT year_NN the_DT disease_NN appears_VBZ to_TO become_VB epidemic_JJ at_IN a_DT later_JJ period_NN than_IN its_PRP$ predecessor_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP will_MD be_VB interesting_JJ to_TO note_VB ,_, should_MD there_RB be_VB a_DT fourth_JJ epidemic_JJ ,_, whether_IN there_EX is_VBZ anything_NN in_IN the_DT coincidence_NN of_IN the_DT mortality_NN becoming_VBG epidemic_JJ three_CD months_NNS after_IN the_DT monsoon_NN is_VBZ over_IN ._.
30_CD It_PRP can_MD not_RB be_VB doubted_VBN that_IN the_DT measures_NNS undertaken_VBN in_IN Bombay_NNP to_TO combat_VB the_DT plague_NN have_VBP been_VBN remarkably_RB successful_JJ ,_, and_CC that_IN only_RB 8.61_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
of_IN the_DT popula-_JJ tion_NN should_MD have_VB in_IN three_CD years_NNS succumbed_VBD to_TO the_DT disease_NN is_VBZ a_DT result_NN which_WDT has_VBZ proba-_NN bly_RB never_RB been_VBN hitherto_JJ obtained_VBN in_IN the_DT history_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN ._.
But_CC in_IN working_VBG out_RP the_DT percentage_NN of_IN plague_NN mortality_NN for_IN the_DT three_CD epidemics_NNS on_IN actual_JJ estimated_VBN population_NN from_IN Chart_NNP No_NNP ._.
2_CD ,_, we_PRP get_VBP the_DT following_NN :_: -_: No.1_NNP Epidemic_NNP 4.30_CD No.2_NNP ``_`` 2.43_CD No.3_NNP ``_`` 2.80_CD These_DT figures_NNS are_VBP even_RB more_RBR remarkable_JJ than_IN the_DT figure_NN 8.61_CD on_IN the_DT assumed_JJ population_NN of_IN 850,000_CD for_IN the_DT whole_JJ period_NN ._.
In_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT concluding_VBG paragraph_NN of_IN the_DT above_NN ,_, it_PRP should_MD be_VB pointed_VBN out_RP that_IN the_DT figures_NNS are_VBP based_VBN upon_IN chart_JJ No_NNP ._.
2_CD ,_, which_WDT only_RB deals_VBZ with_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ months_NNS proper_IN ._.
To_TO arrive_VB at_IN a_DT true_JJ concep-_JJ tion_NN of_IN the_DT damage_NN done_VBN by_IN plague_NN ,_, not_RB only_RB the_DT plague_NN mortality_NN during_IN the_DT monsoon_NN recrudescences_NNS ,_, but_CC all_DT plague_VBP deaths_NNS throughout_IN the_DT year_NN should_MD be_VB taken_VBN into_IN consideration_NN ._.
The_DT table_NN given_VBN at_IN the_DT begining_NN of_IN this_DT chapter_NN compares_VBZ the_DT mortality_NN of_IN the_DT past_JJ three_CD years_NNS with_IN the_DT average_NN and_CC shows_VBZ that-_NN In_IN the_DT first_JJ year_NN the_DT mortality_NN was_VBD 37.70_CD per_IN mille_NN above_IN the_DT average._NN ``_``
second_JJ ``_`` ``_`` ``_`` 38.96_CD ``_`` ``_`` ``_`` ``_`` third_JJ ``_`` ``_`` ``_`` 33.51_CD ``_`` ``_`` ``_`` This_DT would_MD make_VB the_DT percentage_NN plague_NN mortality_NN for_IN the_DT three_CD years-_NN First_NNP year_NN 3.77_CD Second_JJ year_NN 3.89_CD Third_NNP year_NN 3.35_CD ?_. 31_CD CHAPTER_NN III_NNP ._.
Measures_NNS adopted_VBN ._.
The_DT discovery_NN of_IN Plague_NNP cases_NNS ._.
The_DT discovery_NN of_IN plague_NN cases_NNS is_VBZ the_DT basis_NN of_IN all_DT plague_JJ administra-_JJ tion_NN ._.
The_DT measures_NNS adopted_VBD may_MD be_VB perfect_JJ ,_, but_CC if_IN a_DT large_JJ proportion_NN of_IN cases_NNS escape_VBP detection_NN the_DT administration_NN is_VBZ a_DT failure_NN ._.
For_IN various_JJ reasons_NNS it_PRP was_VBD not_RB thought_VBN feasible_JJ to_TO render_VB the_DT report_NN of_IN all_DT sickness_NN ,_, or_CC of_IN all_DT sickness_NN from_IN plague_NN ,_, compulsory_NN upon_IN the_DT public_JJ generally_RB in_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
But_CC the_DT majority_NN of_IN plague_NN cases_NNS were_VBD discovered_VBN through_IN the_DT following_JJ agencies_NNS :_: -_: 1_CD ._.

The_DT following_JJ statement_NN shows_NNS for_IN A_DT Ward_NNP ,_, B_NNP Ward_NNP South_NNP ,_, C_NNP Ward_NNP and_CC D_NNP Ward_NNP the_DT extent_NN to_TO which_WDT these_DT various_JJ agencies_NNS proved_VBD useful_JJ ._.

Volunteers_NNS 487_CD 350_CD 1,233_CD 376_CD Voluntary_JJ admissions_NNS 222_CD 326_CD 576_CD 295_CD Friends_NNS and_CC neighbours_NNS 121_CD 119_CD 99_CD 134_CD Private_JJ practitioners_NNS other_JJ than_IN volunteers_NNS 42_CD 37_CD 79_CD 6_CD Military_JJ 91_CD ..._: ..._: ..._: Plague_NNP ,_, Police_NNP and_CC Municipal_NNP Staff_NNP ,_, Roadside_NNP and_CC Miscellaneous_NNP 421_CD 317_CD 405_CD 908_CD Cemeteries_NNS 112_CD 155_CD 201_CD 286_CD Total_JJ 1,496_CD 1,304_CD 2,593_CD 2,005_CD It_PRP will_MD be_VB seen_VBN that_IN the_DT volunteers_NNS in_IN C_NNP Ward_NNP reported_VBD 47_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
of_IN the_DT cases_NNS discovered_VBD ,_, in_IN A_NNP Ward_NNP 33_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
in_IN B_NNP Ward_NNP South_NNP 27_CD per_IN cent._NN ,_, and_CC in_IN D_NNP Ward_NNP 19_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
Of_IN other_JJ districts_NNS their_PRP$ assistance_NN was_VBD specially_RB valuable_JJ in_IN E_NNP Ward_NNP West_NNP and_CC parts_NNS of_IN F_NNP and_CC G_NNP Wards_NNP ,_, but_CC the_DT very_RB large_JJ area_NN comprised_VBD in_IN these_DT last_JJ two_CD Wards_NNS had_VBD hardly_RB sufficient_JJ volunteers_NNS ._.
In_IN the_DT Central_NNP District_NNP out_IN of_IN 903_CD attacks_NNS ,_, 554_CD were_VBD report-_JJ ed_NN by_IN volunteers_NNS and_CC 249_CD were_VBD either_RB reported_VBN by_IN relatives_NNS or_CC voluntarily_RB admitted_VBN into_IN hospital_NN ._.
The_DT highest_JJS proportion_NN of_IN voluntary_JJ admissions_NNS to_TO hospital_NN was_VBD 25_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
in_IN B_NNP Ward_NNP South_NNP ,_, C_NNP Ward_NNP came_VBD next_JJ with_IN ?_. 32_CD 22_CD per_IN cent._NN ,_, and_CC A_NNP and_CC D_NNP Wards_NNP following_VBG with_IN about_IN 15_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
in_IN each_DT case_NN ._.
In_IN other_JJ districts_NNS the_DT proportion_NN was_VBD much_JJ smaller_JJR ;_: it_PRP was_VBD to_TO a_DT very_RB large_JJ extent_NN the_DT well-to-do_JJ classes_NNS with_IN private_JJ hospitals_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ who_WP most_JJS readily_RB went_VBD to_TO these_DT institutions_NNS ,_, and_CC these_DT classes_NNS are_VBP much_RB more_RBR numerous_JJ in_IN A_NNP ,_, B_NNP ,_, C_NNP and_CC D_NNP Wards_NNP than_IN in_IN the_DT northern_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT city_NN ._.
The_DT voluntary_JJ removal_NN of_IN patients_NNS to_TO hospital_VB is_VBZ highly_RB desirable_JJ from_IN many_JJ points_NNS of_IN view_NN ,_, but_CC as_IN information_NN of_IN them_PRP was_VBD not_RB ,_, as_IN a_DT rule_NN ,_, given_VBN to_TO the_DT District_NNP Officer_NNP concerned_VBD till_NN after_IN arrival_NN of_IN the_DT patient_NN in_IN hospital_NN ,_, he_PRP constantly_RB found_VBD that_IN the_DT residence_NN of_IN the_DT patient_NN was_VBD in_IN such_JJ cases_NNS entirely_RB deserted_VBN ,_, and_CC it_PRP was_VBD therefore_RB often_RB impossible_JJ for_IN him_PRP to_TO satisfy_VB himself_PRP that_IN the_DT kit_NN in_IN the_DT infected_JJ rooms_NNS was_VBD properly_RB disinfected_VBN ._.
Friends_NNS and_CC neighbours_NNS gave_VBD but_CC little_JJ information-the_JJ highest_JJS proportions_NNS being_VBG in_IN B_NNP Ward_NNP South_NNP 9_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
and_CC in_IN A_NNP Ward_NNP 8_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
The_DT class_NN of_IN persons_NNS who_WP are_VBP bound_VBN by_IN law_NN to_TO give_VB information_NN of_IN any_DT plague_NN case_NN that_IN they_PRP may_MD become_VB cognisant_NN of_IN in_IN a_DT dwelling_NN ,_, viz._NN ,_, medical_JJ practitioners_NNS ,_, gave_VBD least_JJS assistance_NN of_IN all_DT ._.
It_PRP should_MD ,_, however_RB ,_, be_VB remembered_VBN that_IN a_DT number_NN of_IN the_DT most_RBS promi-_JJ nent_JJ medical_JJ practitioners_NNS in_IN Bombay_NNP were_VBD members_NNS of_IN various_JJ Volunteer_NNP Committees_NNP ,_, and_CC reported_VBD a_DT large_JJ number_NN of_IN cases_NNS in_IN that_DT capacity_NN ._.
Thus_RB in_IN A_NNP Ward_NNP against_IN 42_CD reported_VBN by_IN private_JJ practitioners_NNS in_IN their_PRP$ ordinary_JJ practice_NN ,_, 82_CD were_VBD reported_VBN by_IN the_DT 3_CD medical_JJ men_NNS who_WP were_VBD working_VBG as_IN volunteers_NNS ._.
In_IN a_DT certain_JJ number_NN of_IN cases_NNS it_PRP was_VBD found_VBN necessary_JJ to_TO call_VB upon_IN professional_JJ gentlemen_NNS for_IN an_DT explanation_NN of_IN their_PRP$ apparent_JJ failure_NN to_TO report_VB plague_NN cases_NNS that_IN they_PRP came_VBD across_IN in_IN their_PRP$ practice_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT difficulties_NNS of_IN diagnosis_NN are_VBP often_RB admittedly_RB great_JJ ,_, and_CC though_IN in_IN many_JJ cases_NNS there_EX was_VBD little_JJ real_JJ doubt_NN it_PRP was_VBD generally_RB impossible_JJ to_TO prove_VB in_IN these_DT cases_NNS that_IN they_PRP were_VBD aware_JJ of_IN the_DT nature_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.
Two_CD cases_NNS were_VBD ,_, however_RB ,_, taken_VBN into_IN court-in_JJ one_CD the_DT doctor_NN concerned_VBD made_VBD an_DT official_JJ apology_NN and_CC the_DT complaint_NN was_VBD withdrawn_VBN ,_, in_IN the_DT other_JJ the_DT accused_VBN was_VBD convicted_VBN and_CC fined_VBN ._.
In_IN three_CD other_JJ cases_NNS the_DT medical_JJ practitioners_NNS admitted_VBD their_PRP$ failure_NN to_TO comply_VB with_IN the_DT law_NN ,_, and_CC as_IN they_PRP expressed_VBD regret_NN and_CC promised_VBD amendment_NN they_PRP were_VBD not_RB pro-_JJ secuted_VBN ._.
Difficulty_NN was_VBD often_RB experienced_VBN in_IN dealing_VBG with_IN plague_JJ cases_NNS in_IN consequence_NN of_IN the_DT delay_NN which_WDT occurred_VBD in_IN the_DT submission_NN of_IN their_PRP$ reports_NNS by_IN medical_JJ men_NNS ,_, or_CC the_DT insufficiency_NN of_IN the_DT addresses_NNS given_VBN ._.
The_DT profession_NN complained_VBD bitterly_RB that_IN they_PRP were_VBD handicapped_VBN in_IN this_DT matter_NN ,_, that_WDT owing_VBG to_TO their_PRP$ compliance_NN with_IN their_PRP$ legal_JJ obligations_NNS they_PRP lost_VBD a_DT great_JJ portion_NN of_IN their_PRP$ practice_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN quacks_NNS and_CC native_JJ vaids_NNS drove_VBD a_DT roaring_NN trade_NN ,_, treating_VBG and_CC concealing_VBG plague_NN cases_NNS without_IN let_NN or_CC hindrance_NN ._.
Some_DT doubt_NN was_VBD felt_VBN as_IN to_TO whether_IN an_DT unqualified_JJ man_NN could_MD be_VB regarded_VBN as_IN a_DT medical_JJ practitioner_NN within_IN the_DT meaning_NN of_IN the_DT law_NN ,_, but_CC this_DT has_VBZ been_VBN set_VBN at_IN rest_NN by_IN a_DT recent_JJ prosecution_NN ending_VBG in_IN the_DT conviction_NN of_IN a_DT vaid_NN who_WP had_VBD failed_VBN to_TO report_VB a_DT case_NN ._.
Men_NN of_IN this_DT class_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, can_MD not_RB be_VB expected_VBN to_TO have_VB much_JJ professional_JJ pride_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ a_DT simple_JJ matter_NN for_IN them_PRP to_TO say_VB that_IN they_PRP were_VBD ignorant_NN of_IN the_DT nature_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.
The_DT following_NN is_VBZ an_DT instance_NN in_IN point_NN ._.
A_DT case_NN was_VBD found_VBN by_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Staff_NNP ,_, and_CC unhesitatingly_RB diagnosed_VBD as_IN plague_NN by_IN two_CD fully_RB qualified_VBN and_CC most_RBS experienced_JJ medical_JJ men_NNS ._.
It_PRP was_VBD under_IN the_DT treat-_NN ?_. 33_CD ment_NN of_IN a_DT Hakim_NNP ,_, who_WP continued_VBD to_TO attend_VB the_DT case_NN after_IN its_PRP$ removal_NN to_TO hospital_NN ._.
On_IN being_VBG called_VBN upon_NN for_IN an_DT explanation_NN of_IN his_PRP$ failure_NN to_TO report_VB the_DT case_NN he_PRP wrote_VBD as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -_: ``_`` The_DT plague_NN according_VBG to_TO our_PRP$ Unani_NNP medical_JJ practitioners_NNS is_VBZ attended_VBN with_IN high_JJ ``_`` fever_RB ,_, delirium_NN and_CC sometimes_RB total_JJ insensibility_NN ._.
One_CD of_IN the_DT highest_JJS authorities_NNS of_IN ``_`` our_PRP$ medical_JJ system_NN ,_, Don_NNP Henri_NNP de_FW Matteis_NNP ,_, late_RB physician_NN to_TO the_DT late_JJ Begum_NNP of_IN ``_`` Bhopal_NNP ,_, assigns_VBZ the_DT above_NN symptoms_NNS to_TO the_DT plague_NN in_IN his_PRP$ work_NN ._. ''_''
He_PRP then_RB proceeds_VBZ with_IN an_DT admirable_JJ air_NN of_IN indignation_NN to_TO maintain_VB that_IN his_PRP$ patient_NN had_VBD none_NN of_IN these_DT symptoms_NNS ,_, and_CC to_TO challenge_VB denial_NN of_IN his_PRP$ statement_NN ._.
His_PRP$ position_NN was_VBD impregnable_JJ ._.
The_DT information_NN supplied_VBN by_IN the_DT Military_JJ refers_NNS entirely_RB to_TO those_DT portions_NNS of_IN A_NNP Ward_NNP where_WRB their_PRP$ co-operation_NN was_VBD enlisted_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT District_NNP Officer_NNP speaks_VBZ very_RB highly_RB of_IN the_DT efficient_JJ manner_NN in_IN which_WDT they_PRP searched_VBD out_RP every_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN occurring_VBG in_IN those_DT limits_NNS ._.
The_DT figures_NNS show_VBP how_WRB heavily_RB the_DT work_NN of_IN searching_VBG out_RP plague_NN cases_NNS fell_VBD upon_IN the_DT staff_NN in_IN D_NNP Ward_NNP ._.
A_DT certain_JJ number_NN of_IN the_DT cases_NNS were_VBD roadside_RB ._.
The_DT discovery_NN of_IN the_DT remainder_NN was_VBD due_JJ partly_RB to_TO the_DT cordial_JJ relations_NNS which_WDT many_JJ of_IN the_DT sectional_JJ Medical_NNP Officers_NNP managed_VBD to_TO establish_VB with_IN the_DT residents_NNS in_IN their_PRP$ charges_NNS ,_, partly_RB to_TO the_DT careful_JJ inspec-_JJ tion_NN of_IN infected_JJ and_CC insanitary_JJ localities_NNS ,_, and_CC partly_RB to_TO the_DT information_NN picked_VBD up_RP by_IN the_DT subordinates_NNS of_IN various_JJ public_JJ departments_NNS in_IN the_DT course_NN of_IN their_PRP$ daily_JJ duties_NNS ._.
In_IN the_DT earlier_JJR part_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN a_DT certain_JJ amount_NN of_IN money_NN was_VBD in_IN some_DT parts_NNS of_IN the_DT city_NN paid_VBN to_TO people_NNS who_WP brought_VBD news_NN of_IN plague_NN cases_NNS ,_, but_CC this_DT system_NN is_VBZ open_JJ to_TO abuse_VB and_CC was_VBD almost_RB entirely_RB discontinued_VBN ._.
Here_RB and_CC there_RB landlords_NNS and_CC their_PRP$ agents_NNS were_VBD induced_VBN to_TO keep_VB the_DT Plague_NNP Staff_NNP notified_VBD of_IN any_DT cases_NNS that_WDT might_MD occur_VB in_IN their_PRP$ chawls_NN ,_, but_CC as_IN a_DT rule_NN the_DT dread_NN of_IN evacuation_NN with_IN the_DT possible_JJ loss_NN of_IN rent_NN involved_VBN inclined_VBD them_PRP to_TO keep_VB any_DT sickness_NN secret_NN ._.
Information_NN obtain-_JJ ed_NN from_IN the_DT cemeteries_NNS was_VBD in_IN one_CD sense_NN most_RBS unsatisfactory_JJ and_CC in_IN another_DT supremely_RB important_JJ ._.
As_IN evidence_NN that_IN an_DT individual_NN from_IN a_DT certain_JJ house_NN had_VBD died_VBN of_IN plague_NN it_PRP was_VBD entirely_RB unreliable_JJ ,_, for_IN except_IN in_IN the_DT few_JJ cases_NNS when_WRB a_DT medical_JJ certificate_NN is_VBZ forthcoming_VBG the_DT cemetery_NN establishment_NN is_VBZ entirely_RB dependent_JJ upon_IN the_DT account_NN given_VBN by_IN members_NNS of_IN the_DT funeral_JJ party_NN as_IN to_TO the_DT cause_NN of_IN death_NN and_CC for_IN the_DT address_NN where_WRB the_DT deceased_VBN had_VBD expired_VBN ._.
Usually_RB the_DT one_CD object_NN of_IN the_DT funeral_JJ party_NN was_VBD to_TO satisfy_VB the_DT cemetery_NN officers_NNS that_IN death_NN was_VBD not_RB due_JJ to_TO plague_VB ,_, and_CC through_IN ignorance_NN or_CC intention_NN they_PRP constantly_RB gave_VBD incorrect_JJ addresses_NNS ._.
The_DT supreme_JJ importance_NN of_IN information_NN from_IN the_DT cemeteries_NNS lies_VBZ in_IN the_DT fact_NN that_IN the_DT major_JJ portion_NN of_IN plague_NN cases_NNS terminate_VBP fatally_RB ,_, those_DT that_IN linger_JJR long_RB enough_RB to_TO recover_VB are_VBP usually_RB brought_VBN to_TO light_JJ sooner_NN or_CC later_RB in_IN their_PRP$ residences_NNS ,_, those_DT that_IN succumb_NNS are_VBP invariably_RB included_VBN in_IN the_DT returns_NNS from_IN one_CD cemetery_NN or_CC the_DT other_JJ ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ a_DT fairly_RB safe_JJ conclusion_NN that_IN all_DT plague_NN cases_NNS not_RB otherwise_RB discovered_VBN are_VBP included_VBN ,_, if_IN not_RB identi-_JJ fied_VBN ,_, in_IN the_DT daily_JJ death_NN returns_NNS ._.
34_CD Every_DT day_NN the_DT returns_NNS of_IN deaths_NNS from_IN the_DT various_JJ cemeteries_NNS are_VBP sorted_VBN out_RP in_IN the_DT Health_NNP Office_NNP ,_, according_VBG to_TO the_DT districts_NNS in_IN which_WDT the_DT deceased_NN resided_VBD ;_: it_PRP will_MD ,_, however_RB ,_, be_VB apparent_JJ that_IN it_PRP was_VBD not_RB sufficient_JJ for_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Staff_NNP merely_RB to_TO pick_VB out_RP the_DT plague_NN cases_NNS and_CC visit_NN and_CC deal_NN with_IN the_DT houses_NNS named_VBN ._.
The_DT hospital_NN assistant_NN or_CC other_JJ official_NN at_IN the_DT cemetery_NN is_VBZ not_RB invariably_RB a_DT man_NN whose_WP$ diagnosis_NN could_MD be_VB entirely_RB relied_VBN upon_IN even_RB if_IN he_PRP had_VBD had_VBN every_DT opportunityof_NN treating_NN and_CC watching_VBG the_DT course_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN while_IN the_DT patient_NN still_RB lived_VBD ;_: his_PRP$ difficulties_NNS in_IN arriving_VBG at_IN a_DT correct_JJ conclusion_NN are_VBP practically_RB insurmountable_JJ when_WRB he_PRP has_VBZ to_TO rely_VB upon_IN the_DT statements_NNS of_IN persons_NNS generally_RB ignorant_VBP ,_, and_CC almost_RB always_RB free_JJ from_IN the_DT rudiments_NNS of_IN medical_JJ knowledge_NN ,_, whose_WP$ intelligence_NN moreover_NN is_VBZ devoted_VBN towards_NNS creating_VBG the_DT belief_NN that_IN the_DT death_NN has_VBZ been_VBN due_JJ to_TO any_DT other_JJ cause_NN but_CC plague_NN ._.
In_IN short_JJ the_DT diagnosis_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN at_IN the_DT cemetery_NN can_MD not_RB be_VB trusted_VBN ,_, nor_CC in_IN times_NNS of_IN plague_NN can_MD the_DT addresses_NNS from_IN which_WDT bodies_NNS are_VBP brought_VBN as_IN supplied_VBN from_IN the_DT cemeteries_NNS be_VB relied_VBN upon_IN ._.
Here_RB again_RB the_DT cemetery_NN officials_NNS are_VBP entirely_RB dependent_JJ upon_IN the_DT information_NN supplied_VBN by_IN members_NNS of_IN the_DT funeral_JJ party_NN ._.
Often_RB in_IN pure_JJ ignorance_NN ,_, oftener_NN with_IN the_DT deliberate_NN object_NN of_IN evading_VBG the_DT plague_NN adminis-_JJ tration_NN ,_, they_PRP give_VBP entirely_RB wrong_JJ addresses_NNS ,_, and_CC at_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN the_DT present_JJ year_NN the_DT percentage_NN of_IN deaths_NNS which_WDT the_DT administration_NN were_VBD un-_JJ able_JJ to_TO trace_VB in_IN the_DT city_NN from_IN the_DT information_NN supplied_VBN by_IN the_DT cemeteries_NNS was_VBD about_IN 20_CD ._.
To_TO meet_VB these_DT difficulties_NNS two_CD measures_NNS were_VBD introduced_VBN ._.
The_DT sec-_JJ tional_JJ Medical_NNP Officers_NNP employed_VBD in_IN the_DT city_NN were_VBD held_VBN responsible_JJ to_TO visit_VB every_DT house_NN where_WRB a_DT death_NN occurred_VBD and_CC by_IN the_DT strictest_JJS possible_JJ enquiry_NN ascertain_VBP whether_IN there_EX was_VBD any_DT suspicion_NN that_IN the_DT death_NN was_VBD due_JJ to_TO plague_VB ;_: if_IN there_EX was_VBD ,_, disinfection_NN and_CC such_JJ other_JJ measures_NNS as_IN were_VBD deemed_VBN necessary_JJ were_VBD adopted_VBN ._.
At_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN to_TO facilitate_VB their_PRP$ discovery_NN of_IN the_DT houses_NNS where_WRB deaths_NNS had_VBD occurred_VBN the_DT services_NNS of_IN the_DT police_NN were_VBD en-_JJ listed_VBN :_: and_CC in_IN this_DT matter_NN the_DT co-operation_NN of_IN Mr._NNP R._NNP H._NNP Vincent_NNP ,_, C._NNP I._NNP E._NNP ,_, late_JJ Police_NNP Commissioner_NNP ,_, was_VBD of_IN very_RB great_JJ value_NN ._.
Seventeen_JJ recording_VBG stations_NNS were_VBD constituted_VBN in_IN different_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT city_NN ,_, to_TO each_DT of_IN which_WDT two_CD superior_JJ police_NNS officers_NNS were_VBD attached_VBN for_IN day_NN and_CC night_NN duty_NN ._.
The_DT police_NN in_IN the_DT city_NN had_VBD instructions_NNS to_TO note_VB all_DT deaths_NNS that_WDT might_MD occur_VB and_CC to_TO report_VB them_PRP without_IN delay_NN at_IN the_DT nearest_JJS recording_NN station_NN ;_: the_DT infor-_JJ mation_NN was_VBD then_RB noted_VBN down_RP by_IN the_DT Recording_NNP Officer_NNP and_CC arrangements_NNS were_VBD made_VBN to_TO pass_VB it_PRP on_IN without_IN delay_NN to_TO the_DT District_NNP Officer_NNP concerned_VBD ._.
This_DT system_NN was_VBD introduced_VBN towards_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN August_NNP ,_, when_WRB the_DT in-_JJ creasing_NN mortality_NN gave_VBD grave_NN cause_NN for_IN anxiety_NN ._.
It_PRP worked_VBD well_RB at_IN the_DT outset_NN ,_, but_CC it_PRP did_VBD not_RB overcome_VB the_DT desire_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS to_TO conceal_VB the_DT ad-_JJ dress_NN where_WRB a_DT man_NN had_VBD died_VBN of_IN plague_NN ;_: they_PRP were_VBD clever_RB enough_RB to_TO evade_VB the_DT police_NN in_IN many_JJ cases_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT sepoys_JJ themselves_PRP ,_, who_WP had_VBD little_JJ inducement_JJ to_TO show_VB smartness_NN in_IN this_DT extra_JJ and_CC alien_JJ duty_NN ,_, soon_RB show-_JJ ed_NN a_DT tendency_NN to_TO become_VB slack_NN ,_, and_CC as_IN regards_NNS deaths_NNS which_WDT they_PRP failed_VBD to_TO register_VB the_DT difficulties_NNS of_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Staff_NNP were_VBD just_RB as_RB bad_JJ as_IN before_IN ._.
The_DT proportion_NN of_IN deaths_NNS untraceable_JJ had_VBD fallen_VBN from_IN 20_CD to_TO 10_CD per_IN cent._NN ,_, but_CC with_IN a_DT rising_VBG mortality_NN in_IN January_NNP ,_, and_CC every_DT pro-_NN ?_. 35_CD spect_NN of_IN a_DT severe_JJ epidemic_NN ,_, it_PRP was_VBD felt_VBN that_IN something_NN must_MD be_VB done_VBN to_TO further_RBR improve_VB matters_NNS ._.
The_DT weak_JJ points_NNS of_IN the_DT system_NN then_RB in_IN operation_NN have_VBP been_VBN indicated_VBN above_IN and_CC the_DT lines_NNS along_IN which_WDT im-_JJ provement_NN might_MD be_VB looked_VBN for_IN were_VBD clear_JJ ._.
The_DT police_NN required_VBD to_TO be_VB stimulated_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT people_NNS had_VBD in_IN some_DT way_NN to_TO be_VB induced_VBN to_TO give_VB information_NN themselves_PRP ._.
After_IN much_JJ consideration_NN the_DT following_JJ scheme_NN was_VBD introduced_VBN :_: -Every_JJ policeman_NN on_IN duty_NN in_IN the_DT City_NNP was_VBD provided_VBN with_IN a_DT small_JJ book_NN of_IN tickets_NNS in_IN foil_NN and_CC counterfoil_NN ;_: whenever_CC he_PRP heard_VBD of_IN a_DT death_NN in_IN his_PRP$ beat_NN he_PRP was_VBD to_TO verify_VB the_DT address_NN and_CC offer_VB a_DT ticket_NN to_TO a_DT member_NN of_IN the_DT funeral_JJ party_NN ;_: and_CC at_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN reporting_VBG the_DT matter_NN the_DT Recording_VBG Officer_NNP was_VBD to_TO initial_JJ the_DT counterfoil_NN in_IN token_NN of_IN the_DT information_NN having_VBG been_VBN registered_VBN and_CC passed_VBN on_IN to_TO the_DT District_NNP Officer_NNP ._.
For_IN every_DT ticket_NN issued_VBD the_DT constable_NN was_VBD to_TO get_VB annas_JJ 2_CD ._.
The_DT Officers_NNPS on_IN duty_NN at_IN the_DT various_JJ cemeteries_NNS were_VBD at_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN instructed_VBN to_TO ask_VB for_IN the_DT ticket_NN whenever_WRB a_DT body_NN was_VBD brought_VBN for_IN disposal_NN ,_, unless_IN a_DT certificate_NN from_IN a_DT volunteer_NN or_CC some_DT other_JJ satisfactory_JJ document_NN indicating_VBG the_DT address_NN was_VBD forthcoming_JJ ,_, and_CC at_IN the_DT principal_JJ cemeteries_NNS a_DT small_JJ staff_NN of_IN messengers_NNS was_VBD organised_VBN under_IN the_DT supervision_NN of_IN a_DT few_JJ reliable_JJ men_NNS who_WP were_VBD to_TO return_VB with_IN the_DT funeral_JJ party_NN and_CC verify_VB the_DT address_NN in_IN every_DT case_NN where_WRB a_DT ticket_NN or_CC other_JJ satisfactory_JJ certificate_NN was_VBD not_RB forthcoming_VBG ._.
This_DT scheme_NN ,_, thanks_NNS to_TO the_DT co-operation_NN of_IN the_DT Commissioner_NNP of_IN Police_NNP ,_, Mr._NNP H._NNP Kennedy_NNP ,_, was_VBD introduced_VBN at_IN the_DT begin-_JJ ning_NN of_IN February_NNP ._.
The_DT people_NNS readily_RB fell_VBD in_IN with_IN the_DT idea_NN of_IN obtaining_VBG tickets_NNS from_IN the_DT police_NN and_CC the_DT work_NN of_IN the_DT police_NN considerably_RB improved_VBN ._.
The_DT people_NNS in_IN the_DT few_JJ cases_NNS when_WRB they_PRP came_VBD to_TO the_DT cemeteries_NNS unprovided_VBD with_IN the_DT necessary_JJ ticket_NN or_CC certificate_NN made_VBN no_DT difficulty_NN about_IN taking_VBG a_DT messenger_NN back_RB with_IN them_PRP to_TO indicate_VB the_DT house_NN from_IN which_WDT they_PRP came_VBD ,_, and_CC the_DT number_NN of_IN untraceable_JJ deaths_NNS fell_VBD from_IN about_IN 10_CD to_TO about_IN 6_CD or_CC 7_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
This_DT system_NN might_MD have_VB continued_VBN to_TO work_VB satisfactorily_RB ,_, but_CC on_IN the_DT one_CD hand_NN the_DT reward_NN of_IN two_CD annas_NNS was_VBD not_RB a_DT very_RB great_JJ one_CD to_TO the_DT man_NN ,_, though_IN it_PRP might_MD amount_VB up_RP to_TO considerable_JJ sum_NN for_IN the_DT Municipality_NNP to_TO pay_VB ._.
One_CD case_NN came_VBD to_TO notice_VB where_WRB a_DT policeman_NN issued_VBD a_DT ticket_NN to_TO a_DT relation_NN (_( whose_WP$ wife_NN died_VBD of_IN plague_NN )_) without_IN registering_VBG the_DT address_NN ._.
He_PRP lost_VBD 2_CD annas_NNS for_IN the_DT ticket_NN ,_, but_CC his_PRP$ object_NN was_VBD to_TO save_VB his_PRP$ friends_NNS any_DT trouble_NN in_IN the_DT way_NN of_IN disinfection_NN ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP was_VBD only_RB by_IN chance_NN that_IN the_DT District_NNP Officer_NNP found_VBD out_RP the_DT circumstances_NNS ._.
The_DT Police_NNP also_RB had_VBD other_JJ duties_NNS to_TO perform_VB ;_: and_CC while_IN for_IN one_CD reason_NN or_CC another_DT they_PRP missed_VBD a_DT few_JJ deaths_NNS or_CC gave_VBD wrong_JJ addresses_NNS in_IN a_DT certain_JJ number_NN of_IN cases_NNS ,_, it_PRP was_VBD impossible_JJ to_TO hold_VB such_JJ failure_NN to_TO be_VB a_DT dereliction_NN of_IN duty_NN or_CC to_TO demand_VB their_PRP$ punishment_NN ._.
On_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN the_DT work_NN was_VBD alien_JJ to_TO their_PRP$ proper_JJ duties_NNS which_WDT occasionally_RB suffered_VBD in_IN consequence_NN of_IN the_DT registration_NN work_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT Police_NNP Commissioner_NNP not_RB unnaturally_RB ,_, as_RB soon_RB as_IN the_DT mortality_NN approached_VBD the_DT normal_JJ ,_, pressed_VBD that_IN his_PRP$ men_NNS might_MD be_VB relieved_VBN of_IN all_DT connection_NN with_IN death_NN registration_NN ._.
The_DT system_NN was_VBD also_RB somewhat_RB cumbrous_JJ inasmuch_JJ as_IN the_DT police_NN force_NN as_IN a_DT body_NN are_VBP not_RB able_JJ to_TO read_VB and_CC write_VB ,_, and_CC while_IN the_DT interposition_NN of_IN Recording_VBG Officers_NNP was_VBD 36_CD necessary_JJ between_IN them_PRP and_CC the_DT District_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, it_PRP was_VBD not_RB found_VBN possible_JJ to_TO devise_VB any_DT form_NN of_IN ticket_NN which_WDT would_MD indicate_VB to_TO the_DT cemetery_NN authorities_NNS the_DT locality_NN from_IN which_WDT a_DT body_NN was_VBD brought_VBN ;_: an_DT incorrect_NN or_CC false_JJ address_NN might_MD still_RB be_VB given_VBN them_PRP by_IN the_DT funeral_JJ party_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT unfortunate_JJ sectional_JJ medical_JJ officer_NN in_IN some_DT other_JJ part_NN of_IN the_DT city_NN might_MD upon_VB the_DT information_NN from_IN the_DT cemetery_NN trudge_NN all_DT over_IN his_PRP$ section_NN in_IN search_NN of_IN a_DT death_NN ,_, which_WDT had_VBD already_RB been_VBN registered_VBN by_IN the_DT police_NN in_IN the_DT section_NN to_TO which_WDT it_PRP properly_RB belonged_VBD ,_, and_CC had_VBD already_RB been_VBN traced_VBN and_CC dealt_VBN with_IN by_IN the_DT medical_JJ officer_NN there_RB ._.
A_DT further_JJ scheme_NN has_VBZ ,_, therefore_RB ,_, been_VBN recently_RB introduced_VBN ._.
The_DT assistance_NN of_IN the_DT police_NN has_VBZ been_VBN dispensed_VBN with_IN and_CC a_DT body_NN of_IN some_DT 200_CD registration_NN ramosees_NNS has_VBZ been_VBN engaged_VBN ._.
They_PRP have_VBP been_VBN assigned_VBN beats_NNS throughout_IN the_DT city_NN ,_, and_CC one_CD man_NN is_VBZ always_RB on_IN duty_NN on_IN every_DT beat_NN ._.
They_PRP can_MD all_DT read_VB and_CC write_VB ,_, and_CC instead_RB of_IN merely_RB tickets_NNS they_PRP issue_VBP to_TO the_DT funeral_JJ parties_NNS certificates_NNS showing_VBG from_IN what_WP house_NN they_PRP come_VBP ,_, so_IN that_IN there_EX is_VBZ little_JJ room_NN for_IN mistake_NN at_IN the_DT cemeteries_NNS ._.
The_DT men_NNS are_VBP directly_RB under_IN the_DT control_NN of_IN the_DT various_JJ district_NN officers_NNS ,_, who_WP should_MD have_VB no_DT difficulty_NN in_IN keeping_VBG them_PRP up_IN to_TO the_DT mark_NN ;_: and_CC as_IN they_PRP write_VBP the_DT certificates_NNS themselves_PRP in_IN foil_NN and_CC counterfoil_VB the_DT necessity_NN for_IN recording_VBG officers_NNS disappears_NNS ._.
The_DT scheme_NN is_VBZ in_IN its_PRP$ infancy_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP has_VBZ not_RB been_VBN possible_JJ to_TO exercise_VB much_JJ selection_NN in_IN gathering_VBG this_DT uniformed_JJ corps_NN of_IN ramosees_NNS ,_, but_CC if_IN it_PRP is_VBZ carefully_RB worked_VBN there_EX is_VBZ every_DT reason_NN to_TO hope_VB it_PRP will_MD prove_VB successful_JJ ._.
In_IN connection_NN with_IN this_DT subject_JJ Rao_NNP Bahadur_NNP Narayen_NNP Trimbak_NNP Vaidya_NNP rendered_VBD special_JJ and_CC very_RB valuable_JJ assistance_NN ._.
By_IN the_DT above_NN means_VBZ the_DT proportion_NN of_IN undiscovered_JJ plague_NN cases_NNS has_VBZ been_VBN considerably_RB reduced_VBN ._.
There_EX were_VBD of_IN course_NN a_DT number_NN of_IN cases_NNS where_WRB the_DT enquiries_NNS of_IN the_DT sectional_JJ medical_JJ officers_NNS could_MD elicit_VB no_DT satisfactory_JJ information_NN as_IN to_TO the_DT cause_NN of_IN death_NN ._.
The_DT relatives_NNS would_MD vehemently_RB deny_VB that_IN it_PRP was_VBD plague_JJ ,_, but_CC the_DT rapidity_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ,_, the_DT symptoms_NNS described_VBD or_CC other_JJ circumstances_NNS often_RB left_VBD the_DT sectional_JJ medical_JJ officer_NN in_IN grave_JJ doubt_NN ._.
Such_JJ cases_NNS were_VBD classed_VBN and_CC dealt_JJ with_IN as_RB suspicious_JJ ,_, and_CC though_IN ,_, except_IN in_IN one_CD or_CC two_CD cases_NNS ,_, the_DT measures_NNS of_IN segregation_NN of_IN the_DT family_NN or_CC vacation_NN of_IN the_DT house_NN were_VBD not_RB adopted_VBN ,_, disinfection_NN was_VBD in_IN all_DT but_CC a_DT few_JJ instances_NNS rigorously_RB carried_VBD out_RP in_IN suspicious_JJ cases_NNS ._.
In_IN the_DT central_JJ district_NN where_WRB the_DT discovery_NN of_IN plague_NN presents_NNS more_RBR difficulty_NN than_IN anywhere_RB else_RB in_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, the_DT treatment_NN of_IN suspicious_JJ deaths_NNS received_VBD special_JJ attention_NN from_IN Sirdar_NNP Mahomed_NNP Yakub_NNP ._.
He_PRP pointed_VBD out_RP to_TO the_DT principal_JJ Jamayets_NNPS the_DT necessity_NN of_IN strict_JJ enquiry_NN into_IN the_DT cause_NN of_IN death_NN ,_, and_CC they_PRP agreed_VBD that_IN unless_IN a_DT medical_JJ certificate_NN was_VBD forthcoming_VBG ,_, or_CC sickness_NN reported_VBN beforehand_NN and_CC the_DT patient_JJ examin-_JJ ed_NN before_IN death_NN by_IN the_DT sectional_JJ medical_JJ officer_NN ,_, or_CC unless_IN there_EX was_VBD clear_JJ and_CC undeniable_JJ proof_NN of_IN the_DT cause_NN of_IN death_NN ,_, the_DT accounts_NNS of_IN friends_NNS and_CC relatives_NNS should_MD not_RB be_VB accepted_VBN ,_, but_CC the_DT death_NN should_MD be_VB treated_VBN as_IN suspicious_JJ ._.
At_IN first_JJ frequent_JJ objection_NN was_VBD taken_VBN to_TO the_DT disinfection_NN which_WDT followed_VBD this_DT classification_NN of_IN a_DT death_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT support_NN of_IN the_DT Jamayets_NNPS and_CC the_DT assistance_NN of_IN the_DT headmen_NNS gradually_RB led_VBD to_TO its_PRP$ being_VBG ?_. 37_CD accepted_VBD without_IN much_JJ demur_NN ._.
Houses_NNS where_WRB such_JJ deaths_NNS occurred_VBD were_VBD watched_VBN ,_, lists_NNS of_IN the_DT inmates_NNS were_VBD made_VBN ,_, and_CC surprise_VB visits_NNS were_VBD paid_VBN by_IN a_DT lady_JJ nurse_NN with_IN volunteers_NNS ,_, and_CC if_IN a_DT plague_NN case_NN or_CC a_DT second_JJ suspi-_JJ cious_JJ death_NN occurred_VBD the_DT inmates_NNS were_VBD induced_VBN to_TO go_VB into_IN a_DT segregation_NN camp_NN or_CC some_DT other_JJ suitable_JJ house_NN ._.
The_DT following_JJ statement_NN shows_NNS ,_, Ward_NNP by_IN Ward_NNP ,_, the_DT total_JJ mortality_NN the_DT number_NN of_IN plague_NN and_CC suspicious_JJ deaths_NNS and_CC the_DT average_JJ mortality_NN ,_, and_CC is_VBZ an_DT index_NN to_TO the_DT extent_NN to_TO which_WDT the_DT staff_NN was_VBD able_JJ by_IN the_DT various_JJ agencies_NNS at_IN its_PRP$ disposal_NN to_TO find_VB the_DT plague_NN cases_NNS that_WDT occurred_VBD :_: --_: Ward_NNP ._.

Removal_NN of_IN patients_NNS to_TO Hospital_NNP ._.
As_IN a_DT general_JJ rule_NN every_DT suffering_NN plague_NN case_NN was_VBD removed_VBN to_TO hospital_VB ,_, a_DT not_RB inconsiderable_JJ proportion_NN going_VBG voluntarily_RB before_IN the_DT Dis-_NNP trict_JJ Officer_NNP appeared_VBD on_IN the_DT scene_NN ,_, but_CC there_EX were_VBD some_DT 900_CD cases_NNS left_VBN in_IN their_PRP$ houses_NNS ._.
Of_IN these_DT approximately_RB 150_CD were_VBD cases_NNS that_WDT might_MD have_VB been_VBN removed_VBN ,_, but_CC which_WDT the_DT District_NNP Officer_NNP in_IN the_DT exercise_NN of_IN the_DT discretion_NN vested_VBN in_IN him_PRP permitted_VBD to_TO be_VB isolated_VBN at_IN home_NN ._.
Of_IN the_DT remainder_NN between_IN 50_CD and_CC 100_CD were_VBD Health_NNP Department_NNP biggaries_NNS who_WP were_VBD dealt_VBN with_IN by_IN the_DT Health_NNP Department_NNP only_RB ,_, and_CC the_DT rest_NN were_VBD moribund_VBN cases_NNS ._.
In_IN the_DT moribund_NN cases_NNS death_NN supervened_VBN usually_RB in_IN a_DT few_JJ hours_NNS and_CC the_DT ordi-_JJ ?_. 38_CD nary_JJ measures_NNS of_IN disinfection_NN and_CC segregation_NN were_VBD then_RB adopted_VBN ._.
Cases_NNS were_VBD only_RB isolated_VBN where_WRB it_PRP was_VBD possible_JJ to_TO secure_VB for_IN the_DT patient_NN a_DT room_NN of_IN decent_JJ size_NN with_IN good_JJ ventilation_NN ._.
Endeavours_NNS were_VBD made_VBN to_TO secure_VB attention_NN to_TO a_DT few_JJ essential_JJ matters_NNS ._.
The_DT number_NN of_IN attendants_NNS was_VBD limited_VBN to_TO two_CD ,_, disinfectants_NNS were_VBD supplied_VBN and_CC the_DT relatives_NNS directed_VBD how_WRB to_TO use_VB them_PRP ;_: special_JJ instructions_NNS being_VBG given_VBN as_IN to_TO the_DT disinfection_NN and_CC removal_NN of_IN all_DT secretions_NNS and_CC excretions_NNS of_IN the_DT patient_NN ._.
The_DT rest_NN of_IN the_DT house_NN was_VBD ,_, if_IN possible_JJ ,_, evacuated_JJ and_CC visits_NNS from_IN friends_NNS and_CC neighbours_NNS discouraged_VBN ._.
The_DT house_NN was_VBD frequently_RB visited_VBN by_IN the_DT District_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, Sectional_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP or_CC volunteers_NNS ,_, to_TO see_VB that_IN these_DT precautions_NNS were_VBD adopted_VBN ,_, but_CC though_IN the_DT people_NNS were_VBD ready_JJ enough_RB with_IN promises_NNS ,_, it_PRP was_VBD impossible_JJ to_TO rely_VB upon_IN their_PRP$ performance_NN ._.
The_DT number_NN of_IN cases_NNS where_WRB the_DT isolation_NN of_IN patients_NNS was_VBD attended_VBN with_IN disastrous_JJ consequences_NNS was_VBD not_RB very_RB great_JJ ._.
Lt._NNP Brackenbury_NNP quotes_VBZ two_CD cases_NNS of_IN a_DT little_JJ boy_NN and_CC of_IN a_DT servant_NN who_WP had_VBD been_VBN tending_VBG isolated_JJ cases_NNS dying_VBG of_IN plague_NN a_DT few_JJ days_NNS later_RB ._.
In_IN two_CD cases_NNS ,_, in_IN B_NNP Ward_NNP North_NNP ,_, the_DT infection_NN spread_NN to_TO the_DT next_JJ floor_NN and_CC there_RB attacked_VBD several_JJ rooms_NNS ,_, and_CC Captain_NNP Cuppage_NNP quotes_VBZ the_DT following_JJ case_NN :_: -_: ``_`` On_IN 27th_CD August_NNP a_DT death_NN occurred_VBD in_IN this_DT house_NN from_IN plague_NN ._.
Subsequently_RB ``_`` there_EX was_VBD another_DT death_NN from_IN the_DT same_JJ cause_NN ._.
On_IN 2nd_CD September_NNP the_DT Medical_NNP Officer_NNP ``_`` was_VBD called_VBN in_IN to_TO see_VB two_CD people_NNS sick_VBP in_IN the_DT same_JJ house_NN ._.
He_PRP pronounced_VBD them_PRP to_TO ``_`` be_VB suffering_VBG from_IN pneumonic_JJ plague_NN ._.
Not_RB being_VBG in_IN a_DT fit_JJ condition_NN for_IN removal_NN they_PRP ``_`` were_VBD allowed_VBN to_TO remain_VB in_IN the_DT house_NN ._.
Two_CD of_IN the_DT attendants_NNS in_IN these_DT cases_NNS died_VBD ``_`` subsequently_RB elsewhere_RB of_IN plague_NN ._.
All_PDT these_DT people_NNS were_VBD members_NNS of_IN one_CD firm_NN and_CC ``_`` related_VBN to_TO each_DT other_JJ ._.
No_DT dead_JJ rats_NNS had_VBD been_VBN found_VBN in_IN the_DT house_NN ._. ''_''
Segregation_NN of_IN contacts_NNS ._.
The_DT word_NN ``_`` contact_NN ''_'' is_VBZ used_VBN to_TO describe_VB persons_NNS living_VBG with_IN or_CC attending_VBG a_DT person_NN suffering_VBG from_IN plague_NN ;_: and_CC endeavours_NNS were_VBD made_VBN to_TO remove_VB such_JJ persons_NNS ,_, partly_RB to_TO get_VB them_PRP away_RB from_IN the_DT infected_JJ room_NN ,_, and_CC partly_RB to_TO reduce_VB the_DT danger_NN of_IN their_PRP$ infecting_NN others_NNS ._.
Ordinarily_RB con-_JJ tacts_NNS were_VBD sent_VBN to_TO the_DT accommodation_NN provided_VBD at_IN the_DT various_JJ hospitals_NNS ,_, public_JJ and_CC private_JJ ,_, for_IN the_DT friends_NNS and_CC relatives_NNS of_IN patients_NNS ,_, but_CC where_WRB the_DT plague_NN patient_NN had_VBD died_VBN before_IN removal_NN they_PRP were_VBD sent_VBN to_TO one_CD of_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP Health_NNP Camps_NNP ._.
Contacts_NNS were_VBD often_RB very_RB difficult_JJ to_TO get_VB hold_NN of_IN ;_: to_TO avoid_VB going_VBG to_TO camp_VB they_PRP would_MD leave_VB the_DT house_NN where_WRB they_PRP had_VBD been_VBN living_VBG and_CC find_VB quarters_NNS elsewhere_RB ._.
A_DT large_JJ number_NN who_WP did_VBD this_DT were_VBD followed_VBN up_RP ,_, found_VBN ,_, and_CC sent_VBD to_TO camp_VB ,_, but_CC it_PRP can_MD not_RB be_VB denied_VBN that_IN a_DT great_JJ many_JJ people_NNS coming_VBG under_IN the_DT description_NN of_IN contacts_NNS managed_VBN to_TO escape_VB being_VBG sent_VBN to_TO camp_NNS ._.
Another_DT difficulty_NN in_IN regard_NN to_TO them_PRP was_VBD that_IN the_DT discipline_NN of_IN private_JJ hospitals_NNS was_VBD hardly_RB sufficiently_RB good_JJ to_TO secure_VB that_DT contacts_NNS sent_VBD to_TO them_PRP would_MD reside_VB there_RB ._.
If_IN the_DT patient_NN lived_VBD there_EX was_VBD no_DT trouble_NN ;_: if_IN he_PRP died_VBD even_RB a_DT few_JJ hours_NNS after_IN admission_NN there_EX was_VBD practically_RB no_DT control_NN over_IN the_DT contacts_NNS ,_, and_CC they_PRP could_MD leave_VB the_DT hos-_JJ pital_NN and_CC take_VB up_RP quarters_NNS wherever_IN they_PRP wished_VBD ._.
Endeavours_NNS were_VBD made_VBN to_TO improve_VB matters_NNS in_IN this_DT respect_NN ,_, but_CC without_IN much_JJ success_NN ;_: the_DT managers_NNS of_IN various_JJ private_JJ hospitals_NNS were_VBD called_VBN together_RB ,_, but_CC they_PRP pointed_VBD out_RP that_IN it_PRP would_MD be_VB impossible_JJ to_TO do_VB much_RB in_IN this_DT direction_NN without_IN making_VBG the_DT hospitals_NNS unpopular_JJ ._.
But_CC though_IN the_DT segregation_NN ?_. 39_CD of_IN contacts_NNS may_MD not_RB have_VB been_VBN carried_VBN out_RP so_RB thoroughly_RB as_IN was_VBD desirable_JJ ,_, the_DT figures_NNS show_VBP that_IN a_DT good_JJ deal_NN of_IN work_NN was_VBD done_VBN ._.
A_DT great_JJ many_JJ more_JJR of_IN those_DT who_WP were_VBD not_RB dealt_VBN with_IN by_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Staff_NNP ,_, went_VBD into_IN the_DT private_JJ camps_NNS and_CC hutments_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ accord_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP may_MD be_VB hoped_VBN that_IN the_DT work_NN that_WDT was_VBD done_VBN went_VBD far_RB to_TO prevent_VB the_DT spread_NN of_IN infection_NN ._.
The_DT difficulties_NNS in_IN the_DT way_NN of_IN finding_VBG and_CC sending_VBG contacts_NNS to_TO camp_VB were_VBD greatly_RB diminished_VBN by_IN the_DT assistance_NN rendered_VBD from_IN the_DT discretional_JJ relief_NN fund_NN to_TO those_DT whose_WP$ livelihood_NN was_VBD interfered_VBN with_IN ._.
In_IN E_NNP Ward_NNP ino-_JJ culation_NN was_VBD to_TO a_DT large_JJ extent_NN offered_VBD to_TO contacts_NNS as_IN an_DT alternative_NN to_TO going_VBG to_TO camp_VB ;_: and_CC was_VBD often_RB preferred_JJ ,_, more_RBR especially_RB in_IN Tarwari_NNP ,_, a_DT section_NN that_WDT has_VBZ long_RB been_VBN in_IN honorary_JJ charge_NN of_IN Mr._NNP Lund_NNP ._.
In_IN B_NNP Ward_NNP South_NNP the_DT segregation_NN of_IN contacts_NNS was_VBD especially_RB unpopular_JJ ,_, and_CC when_WRB informa-_JJ tion_NN of_IN a_DT plague_NN case_NN was_VBD duly_RB given_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT patient_NN sent_VBD to_TO hospital_NN ,_, the_DT contacts_NNS were_VBD not_RB pressed_VBN to_TO vacate_VB their_PRP$ houses_NNS except_IN while_IN they_PRP were_VBD being_VBG disinfected_VBN ._.
The_DT District_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, B_NNP Ward_NNP South_NNP ,_, found_VBD that_IN the_DT removal_NN of_IN contacts_NNS to_TO camp_VB was_VBD the_DT principal_JJ cause_NN of_IN the_DT concealment_NN of_IN cases_NNS and_CC rendered_JJ nugatory_NN the_DT efforts_NNS of_IN the_DT volunteers_NNS ._.
In_IN view_NN of_IN the_DT fact_NN that_IN ,_, if_IN a_DT plague_NN case_NN is_VBZ reported_VBN and_CC removed_VBN in_IN its_PRP$ earliest_JJS stages_NNS ,_, the_DT danger_NN to_TO friends_NNS and_CC neighbours_NNS is_VBZ minimised_VBN ,_, and_CC in_IN order_NN to_TO meet_VB so_RB far_RB as_IN possible_JJ the_DT objections_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ people_NNS and_CC thereby_RB secure_VB better_JJR information_NN about_IN plague_NN ;_: he_PRP was_VBD permitted_VBN to_TO issue_VB the_DT following_JJ circular_NN ._.
It_PRP explains_VBZ itself_PRP :_: -_: ``_`` When_WRB you_PRP hear_VBP of_IN any_DT illness_NN ,_, especially_RB fever_RB ,_, in_IN your_PRP$ house_NN go_VB and_CC report_VB it_PRP ``_`` at_IN once_RB to_TO the_DT District_NNP Plague_NNP Office_NNP in_IN Argyle_NNP Road_NNP ._.
A_DT Doctor_NNP will_MD be_VB sent_VBN to_TO ``_`` examine_VB the_DT case_NN ._.
If_IN it_PRP is_VBZ plague_JJ the_DT patient_NN should_MD at_IN once_RB be_VB sent_VBN to_TO hospital_VB ``_`` where_WRB he_PRP will_MD be_VB well_RB looked_VBN after_IN and_CC have_VB a_DT much_RB better_JJR chance_NN of_IN recovering_VBG ``_`` than_IN if_IN kept_VBN in_IN the_DT house_NN ._.
He_PRP will_MD be_VB allowed_VBN to_TO go_VB to_TO any_DT hospital_NN he_PRP may_MD choose_VB ._.
``_`` One_CD or_CC two_CD attendants_NNS will_MD be_VB allowed_VBN to_TO accompany_VB him_PRP ._.
His_PRP$ relations_NNS will_MD be_VB ``_`` allowed_VBN to_TO visit_VB him_PRP ._.
The_DT remainder_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS living_VBG in_IN the_DT same_JJ room_NN with_IN ``_`` the_DT patient_NN will_MD be_VB requested_VBN to_TO remove_VB into_IN another_DT room_NN while_IN it_PRP is_VBZ being_VBG disin-_JJ ``_`` fected_VBN and_CC cleaned_VBN ._.
If_IN it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB plague_JJ ,_, the_DT Doctor_NNP will_MD record_VB it_PRP and_CC give_VB a_DT certi-_JJ ``_`` ficate_NN (_( if_IN asked_VBN for_IN )_) and_CC in_IN the_DT event_NN of_IN death_NN the_DT authorities_NNS will_MD know_VB that_IN it_PRP was_VBD ``_`` not_RB due_JJ to_TO plague_VB and_CC there_EX will_MD be_VB no_DT trouble_NN ._.
But_CC there_EX will_MD be_VB trouble_NN if_IN the_DT ``_`` authorities_NNS having_VBG heard_NN of_IN a_DT death_NN due_JJ to_TO an_DT illness_NN that_WDT has_VBZ not_RB been_VBN reported_VBN ``_`` to_TO them_PRP ,_, get_VB to_TO know_VB or_CC suspect_VB that_IN the_DT person_NN died_VBD of_IN plague_NN ._.
In_IN that_DT case_NN ``_`` those_DT people_NNS living_VBG in_IN the_DT same_JJ room_NN ,_, as_IN the_DT deceased_VBN ,_, will_MD be_VB liable_JJ to_TO be_VB sent_VBN to_TO ``_`` quarantine_VB for_IN 10_CD days_NNS ._.
The_DT reason_NN for_IN this_DT being_VBG that_IN people_NNS living_VBG in_IN close_JJ con-_JJ ``_`` tact_NN with_IN a_DT plague_NN stricken_NN man_NN for_IN three_CD or_CC four_CD days_NNS are_VBP liable_JJ to_TO become_VB attack-_JJ ``_`` ed_JJ themselves_PRP and_CC if_IN allowed_VBN to_TO go_VB where_WRB they_PRP like_IN ,_, may_MD carry_VB the_DT disease_NN into_IN other_JJ ``_`` houses_NNS and_CC endanger_VB the_DT lives_NNS of_IN many_JJ other_JJ healthy_JJ people_NNS ._.
Whereas_IN if_IN a_DT plague_NN ``_`` stricken_JJ man_NN is_VBZ at_IN once_RB removed_VBN from_IN a_DT house_NN ,_, there_EX is_VBZ little_JJ chance_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ``_`` spreading_NN in_IN that_DT house_NN ._.
In_IN very_RB special_JJ cases_NNS and_CC then_RB only_RB with_IN the_DT sanction_NN ``_`` of_IN the_DT District_NNP Plague_NNP Officer_NNP patients_NNS may_MD be_VB treated_VBN in_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ houses_NNS ._. ''_''
Evacuation_NN of_IN infected_JJ houses_NNS and_CC localities_NNS ._.
The_DT evacuation_NN of_IN thoroughly_RB infected_VBN houses_NNS ,_, was_VBD carried_VBN on_IN system-_NN atically_RB throughout_IN the_DT city_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ a_DT measure_NN which_WDT popular_JJ opinion_NN approves_NNS ,_, and_CC often_RB the_DT mere_JJ suggestion_NN to_TO the_DT residents_NNS of_IN a_DT chawl_NN that_IN it_PRP was_VBD better_RBR for_IN them_PRP to_TO go_VB into_IN camp_NN for_IN a_DT bit_NN was_VBD enough_RB to_TO set_VB them_PRP ?_. 40_CD packing_VBG up_RP their_PRP$ property_NN preparatory_NN to_TO moving_VBG ._.
The_DT question_NN whether_IN a_DT house_NN was_VBD infected_VBN or_CC not_RB was_VBD entirely_RB one_CD of_IN evidence_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT District_NNP Officer_NNP had_VBD to_TO decide_VB each_DT case_NN on_IN its_PRP$ merits_NNS ._.
Thus_RB 5_CD cases_NNS at_IN short_JJ intervals_NNS in_IN a_DT house_NN containing_VBG 50_CD or_CC 100_CD people_NNS would_MD show_VB that_IN con-_JJ tinued_JJ residence_NN there_RB involved_JJ great_JJ danger_NN to_TO their_PRP$ lives_NNS ,_, but_CC if_IN the_DT population_NN was_VBD 1,000_CD ,_, or_CC there_EX was_VBD a_DT considerable_JJ interval_NN between_IN the_DT cases_NNS ,_, the_DT same_JJ inference_NN could_MD not_RB so_RB confidently_RB be_VB drawn_VBN ._.
A_DT good_JJ deal_NN more_RBR trouble_NN was_VBD experienced_VBN with_IN Mahomedans_NNS than_IN with_IN Hindus_NNP in_IN carrying_VBG out_RP this_DT measure_NN ;_: and_CC difficulties_NNS were_VBD often_RB made_VBN by_IN land-_JJ lords_NNS ,_, who_WP foresaw_VBD a_DT loss_NN of_IN rent_NN ,_, when_WRB the_DT tenants_NNS were_VBD willing_JJ and_CC ready_JJ to_TO go_VB ._.

The_DT cost_NN of_IN moving_VBG was_VBD paid_VBN from_IN the_DT discretional_JJ relief_NN fund_NN ,_, and_CC considerable_JJ sums_NNS were_VBD spent_VBN in_IN assisting_VBG those_DT whose_WP$ daily_JJ work_NN was_VBD interfered_VBN with_IN ,_, and_CC this_DT went_VBD far_RB to_TO smooth_VB away_RP difficulties_NNS ._.
How_WRB the_DT people_NNS were_VBD dealt_VBN with_IN after_IN they_PRP were_VBD moved_VBN is_VBZ described_VBN in_IN the_DT chapter_NN on_IN ``_`` Camps_NNP ._. ''_''
It_PRP is_VBZ difficult_JJ to_TO give_VB any_DT clear_JJ idea_NN of_IN the_DT nature_NN of_IN this_DT work_NN ;_: the_DT figures_NNS convey_VBP but_CC little_JJ ;_: but_CC it_PRP was_VBD common_JJ in_IN the_DT city_NN during_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ to_TO see_VB a_DT street_NN almost_RB blocked_VBD up_RP with_IN carts_NNS ,_, hurriedly_RB collected_VBN from_IN all_DT directions_NNS ,_, loaded_VBD up_RP with_IN furniture_NN and_CC kit_NN of_IN every_DT description_NN :_: the_DT men_NNS busily_RB carrying_VBG boxes_NNS and_CC bundles_VBZ out_IN of_IN the_DT chawl_NN to_TO the_DT carts_NNS ,_, the_DT women_NNS and_CC children_NNS sitting_VBG on_IN the_DT top_NN of_IN everything_NN ,_, the_DT District_NNP Officer_NNP standing_VBG by_IN listening_VBG to_TO and_CC smoothing_VBG away_RB difficulties_NNS ,_, with_IN the_DT relief_NN fund_NN in_IN his_PRP$ pocket_NN ,_, and_CC directing_VBG and_CC arranging_VBG the_DT whole_JJ operation_NN ._.

I_PRP ,_, this_DT morning_NN ,_, vacated_VBD the_DT whole_NN of_IN Bhangwadi_NNP ,_, 175_CD people_NNS and_CC 33_CD cart-_JJ ``_`` loads_NNS of_IN kit_NN ._.

In_IN this_DT case_NN the_DT people_NNS heard_VBP overnight_MD that_IN they_PRP were_VBD to_TO be_VB re-_JJ moved_VBN ,_, and_CC attempted_VBD to_TO migrate_VB during_IN the_DT night_NN ._.

Mr._NNP Purshotam_NNP heard_VBD of_IN this_DT ,_, and_CC promptly_RB was_VBD on_IN the_DT spot_NN ;_: he_PRP communicated_VBD with_IN the_DT police_NN and_CC obtained_VBN ready_JJ assistance_NN from_IN Superintendent_NNP Hack_NNP and_CC the_DT move_NN was_VBD prevented_VBN ,_, some_DT 14_CD people_NNS did_VBD go_VB away_RB but_CC were_VBD found_VBN and_CC sent_VBN to_TO camp_VB the_DT following_JJ day_NN ._.
Another_DT day_NN Lt._NNP Warneford_NNP wrote_VBD :_: -_: ``_`` I_PRP ,_, this_DT morning_NN ,_, from_IN 6_CD a.m._NN to_TO 11_CD a._NN m._NN ,_, vacated_VBD 5_CD chawls_NN in_IN Limachiwadi_NNP and_CC sent_VBD 141_CD people_NNS to_TO the_DT Goculdas_NNP Camp_NNP and_CC (_( about_IN )_) 277_CD people_NNS to_TO the_DT Charni_NNP Road_NNP Camp_NNP ,_, making_VBG a_DT total_NN of_IN 418_CD people_NNS in_IN all_DT ._.

?_. 41_CD Here_RB is_VBZ another_DT extract_NN :_: -_: ``_`` Yesterday_NN ,_, from_IN 6_CD a.m._NN to_TO 1_CD p.m._NN ,_, I_PRP vacated_VBD the_DT chawls_NN in_IN the_DT interior_NN of_IN Antoba-_NNP wadi_NN and_CC removed_VBD 466_CD people_NNS from_IN them_PRP ,_, of_IN whom_WP 240_CD were_VBD sent_VBN to_TO the_DT Kennedy_NNP Sea_NNP Face_NNP Camp_NNP ,_, and_CC 226_CD to_TO the_DT Goculdas_NNP Tejpal_NNP Camp_NNP ._.
