43_CD Inoculation_NNP ._.
On_IN the_DT 19th_CD July_NNP 1898_CD the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP applied_VBD for_IN a_DT grant_NN of_IN Rs_NNP ._.
500_CD to_TO compensate_VB people_NNS of_IN the_DT poorer_NN classes_NNS who_WP might_MD be_VB debarred_VBN for_IN 2_CD or_CC 3_CD days_NNS from_IN their_PRP$ ordinary_JJ employments_NNS through_IN having_VBG under-_JJ gone_VBN the_DT operation_NN ._.
This_DT application_NN was_VBD complied_VBN with_IN ._.
On_IN the_DT 17th_JJ August_NNP a_DT discussion_NN took_VBD place_NN in_IN the_DT Standing_NNP Committee_NNP on_IN the_DT motion_NN of_IN Dr._NNP N._NNP N._NNP Katrak_NNP and_CC there_EX was_VBD a_DT strong_JJ consensus_NN of_IN opinion_NN that_IN inoculation_NN should_MD be_VB pushed_VBN in_IN Bombay_NNP in_IN anticipation_NN of_IN a_DT further_JJ outbreak_NN of_IN plague_NN ._.
This_DT led_VBD to_TO consultation_NN between_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP Commissioner_NNP and_CC M._NNP Haffkine_NNP on_IN the_DT 29th_CD August_NNP ._.
It_PRP was_VBD followed_VBN by_IN a_DT series_NN of_IN weekly_JJ meetings_NNS at_IN which_WDT the_DT Commissioner_NNP consulted_VBD M._NNP Haffkine_NNP ,_, the_DT Executive_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, the_DT Hon'ble_NNP Dr._NNP Bhalchandra_NNP Krishna_NNP ,_, Dr._NNP Katrak_NNP and_CC others_NNS ._.
An_DT inoculation_NN station_NN was_VBD already_RB open_JJ at_IN the_DT Laboratory_NNP ,_, Khoshroo_NNP Lodge_NNP ,_, and_CC from_IN 1st_CD September_NNP 1898_CD Drs_NNP ._.
Trilokkeker_NNP ,_, Kalapesi_NNP and_CC D._NNP K._NNP Patel_NNP agreed_VBD to_TO under-_JJ take_VB the_DT duty_NN of_IN honorary_JJ inoculators_NNS going_VBG round_IN the_DT localities_NNS in_IN which_WDT their_PRP$ practice_NN lay_NN and_CC endeavouring_VBG to_TO persuade_VB their_PRP$ acquaintances_NNS of_IN the_DT value_NN of_IN the_DT prophylactic_JJ treatment_NN ._.
On_IN the_DT 13th_JJ September_NNP a_DT special_JJ inoculation_NN allowance_NN was_VBD sanctioned_VBN for_IN Dr._NNP B._NNP S._NNP Shroff_NNP ,_, and_CC Dr._NNP Rajaballi_NNP V._NNP Patel_NNP ;_: the_DT latter_JJ being_VBG one_CD of_IN the_DT Sectional_NNP Medical_NNP Officers_NNP on_IN plague_NN duty_NN who_WP had_VBD already_RB had_VBN some_DT measure_NN of_IN success_NN in_IN this_DT direction_NN ._.
About_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN October_NNP a_DT special_JJ inoculation_NN shed_VBD was_VBD erected_VBN on_IN the_DT maidan_NN opposite_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP Office_NNP ._.
Later_RB on_IN 23rd_CD January_NNP special_JJ inoculation_NN allowances_NNS were_VBD made_VBN experimentally_RB to_TO Drs_NNP ._.
Britto_NNP and_CC K._NNP B._NNP Shroff_NNP ,_, Sectional_NNP Medical_NNP Officers_NNP in_IN C_NNP Ward_NNP and_CC D_NNP Ward_NNP ,_, and_CC from_IN the_DT 10th_JJ February_NNP to_TO Dr._NNP Godinho_NNP ,_, Medical_NNP Officer_NNP in_IN E_NNP Ward_NNP ._.
An_DT allowance_NN was_VBD also_RB made_VBN to_TO Dr._NNP Sorabji_NNP D._NNP Desai_NNP ,_, who_WP was_VBD placed_VBN in_IN charge_NN of_IN an_DT inoculation_NN station_NN at_IN Dharavi_NNP in_IN the_DT north_NN of_IN the_DT Island_NNP (_( F_NNP and_CC G_NNP Wards_NNP )_) under_IN the_DT patronage_NN of_IN Mr._NNP Adamji_NNP Peerbhoy_NNP ,_, who_WP induced_VBD most_JJS of_IN his_PRP$ factory_NN hands_NNS there_RB to_TO under-_JJ go_VB the_DT operation_NN ._.
Meantime_RB the_DT Commissioner_NNP had_VBD used_VBN every_DT endeavour_NN to_TO enlist_VB in_IN this_DT cause_NN the_DT leaders_NNS of_IN all_DT sections_NNS of_IN society_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT meet-_JJ ing_NN of_IN the_DT most_RBS influential_JJ gentlemen_NNS among_IN Marathi_NNP speaking_VBG Hindus_NNP was_VBD held_VBN in_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP Hall_NNP on_IN the_DT 13th_JJ October_NNP ._.
This_DT meeting_NN was_VBD addressed_VBN by_IN the_DT Hon'ble_NNP Dr._NNP Bhalchandra_NNP Krishna_NNP and_CC by_IN Dr._NNP Katrak_NNP ,_, and_CC an_DT almost_RB unanimous_JJ feeling_NN in_IN favour_NN of_IN inoculation_NN was_VBD on_IN that_DT occasion_NN evinced_VBD ._.
Dr._NNP Bhalchandra_NNP had_VBD already_RB in_IN September_NNP addressed_VBD a_DT meeting_NN of_IN Hindu_NNP gentlemen_NNS at_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ house_NN ,_, distributing_VBG hand-bills_NNS explaining_VBG the_DT results_NNS achieved_VBN by_IN inoculation_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP followed_VBD it_PRP up_RP by_IN addressing_VBG a_DT mass_NN meeting_NN on_IN the_DT occasion_NN of_IN the_DT Dussera_NNP festival_NN ,_, 24th_CD October_NNP ,_, at_IN the_DT gathering_NN of_IN the_DT Arya_NNP Mitra_NNP Mela_NNP in_IN Madhav_NNP Bag_NNP ._.
It_PRP was_VBD at_IN this_DT time_NN that_IN the_DT results_NNS secured_VBD at_IN Hubli_NNP had_VBD just_RB become_VBN available_JJ ,_, and_CC at_IN the_DT meeting_NN thousands_NNS of_IN hand-bills_NNS summarizing_VBG those_DT results_NNS were_VBD scattered_JJ broadcast_NN ._.
On_IN the_DT 27th_JJ October_NNP an_DT inoculation_NN station_NN was_VBD opened_VBN in_IN the_DT Walkeshwar_NNP Temple_NNP compound_NN at_IN the_DT house_NN of_IN Mr._NNP Ranchordas_NNP Tribhovandas_NNP under_IN the_DT auspices_NNS of_IN Mr._NNP Mulji_NNP B._NNP Barbhaya_NNP and_CC other_JJ influential_JJ gentlemen_NNS ,_, and_CC here_RB ,_, too_RB ,_, Dr._NNP Bhalchandra_NNP addressed_VBD the_DT meeting_NN ._.
Mr._NNP Lakhmidas_NNP 44_CD Khimji_NNP opened_VBD another_DT station_NN at_IN his_PRP$ residence_NN in_IN the_DT presence_NN of_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP Commissioner_NNP ,_, M._NNP Haffkine_NNP and_CC other_JJ officers_NNS ._.
On_IN this_DT occasion_NN Dr._NNP B._NNP S._NNP Shroff_NNP ,_, who_WP undertook_VBD to_TO perform_VB the_DT opera-_JJ tions_NNS ,_, explained_VBD the_DT value_NN of_IN the_DT treatment_NN ,_, and_CC Dr._NNP Bhalchandra_NNP met_VBD certain_JJ objections_NNS raised_VBN by_IN the_DT Secretary_NNP of_IN the_DT Jain_NNP Community_NNP ._.
This_DT gentleman_NN was_VBD afterwards_NNS taken_VBN round_VBP the_DT Laboratory_NN at_IN Khoshroo_NNP Lodge_NNP and_CC the_DT whole_JJ system_NN of_IN preparation_NN of_IN the_DT lymph_NN was_VBD carefully_RB explained_VBN to_TO him_PRP ._.
Later_RB on_IN 13th_CD January_NNP 1899_CD the_DT leading_VBG gentlemen_NNS of_IN the_DT Gujarathi_NNP speaking_NN Hindus_NNP were_VBD invited_VBN to_TO a_DT meeting_NN in_IN the_DT Corporation_NNP Hall_NNP ._.
This_DT meeting_NN was_VBD addressed_VBN by_IN the_DT Hon'ble_NNP Dr._NNP Bhalchandra_NNP ,_, Dr._NNP Katrak_NNP ,_, M._NNP Haffkine_NNP and_CC others_NNS ,_, but_CC there_EX was_VBD little_JJ enthusiasm_NN and_CC only_RB 20_CD out_IN of_IN about_IN 70_CD gentlemen_NNS invited_VBN put_NN in_IN an_DT appearance_NN ,_, while_IN some_DT of_IN those_DT who_WP came_VBD showed_VBD a_DT disposition_NN to_TO question_VB the_DT value_NN of_IN inoculation_NN and_CC to_TO criticise_VB the_DT pro-_JJ cess_NN ._.
Their_PRP$ attitude_NN was_VBD in_IN some_DT measure_NN due_JJ to_TO the_DT evidence_NN of_IN Col._NNP Lawrie_NNP ,_, I.M.S._NNP ,_, before_IN the_DT Indian_NNP Plague_NNP Commission_NNP and_CC the_DT uncontradicted_JJ statements_NNS of_IN Captain_NNP Johnston_NNP ,_, I.M.S._NNP ,_, criticizing_VBG the_DT composition_NN of_IN the_DT lymph_NN ,_, which_WDT had_VBD appeared_VBN in_IN the_DT daily_JJ papers_NNS ._.
These_DT statements_NNS gave_VBD rise_NN to_TO much_JJ discussion_NN among_IN the_DT educated_JJ classes_NNS of_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, greatly_RB strengthened_VBD the_DT hands_NNS of_IN those_DT who_WP opposed_VBD inoculation_NN on_IN the_DT ground_NN that_IN the_DT operation_NN was_VBD unorthodox_JJ ,_, dangerous_JJ and_CC useless_JJ ,_, and_CC any_DT chance_NN of_IN protecting_VBG Bombay_NNP at_IN that_DT critical_JJ moment_NN by_IN creating_VBG a_DT popular_JJ and_CC universal_JJ demand_NN for_IN the_DT prophylactic_JJ treatment_NN was_VBD destroyed_VBN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD considered_VBN in_IN the_DT then_RB state_NN of_IN public_JJ opinion_NN both_DT undesirable_JJ and_CC futile_JJ to_TO adopt_VB any_DT more_RBR energetic_JJ measures_NNS to_TO push_VB the_DT matter_NN ._.
In_IN addition_NN to_TO the_DT meetings_NNS above_IN referred_VBN to_TO the_DT Commissioner_NNP had_VBD in_IN October_NNP interviews_NNS with_IN the_DT leading_VBG gentlemen_NNS of_IN the_DT Bhattia_NNP Com-_NNP munity_NN ,_, which_WDT resulted_VBD in_IN the_DT opening_NN of_IN the_DT inoculation_NN stations_NNS at_IN Mr._NNP Lakhmidas_NNP Khimji_NNP 's_POS house_NN already_RB referred_VBN to_TO ._.
He_PRP invited_VBD Dr._NNP Accacio_NNP DaGama_NNP and_CC Dr._NNP Rozario_NNP ,_, gentlemen_NNS of_IN influence_NN among_IN the_DT Portuguese_NNP and_CC Goanese_NNP communities_NNS ,_, to_TO discuss_VB matters_NNS with_IN him_PRP at_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN November_NNP ,_, but_CC was_VBD advised_VBN by_IN them_PRP that_IN there_EX was_VBD little_JJ chance_NN of_IN success_NN ._.
He_PRP asked_VBD some_DT of_IN the_DT principal_JJ Borah_NNP gentlemen_NNS to_TO meet_VB him_PRP on_IN the_DT 24th_JJ November_NNP ,_, but_CC only_RB one_CD Mr._NNP Abdul_NNP Hossein_NNP Adamji_NNP Peerbhoy_NNP responded_VBD ._.
His_PRP$ response_NN was_VBD ,_, however_RB ,_, very_RB cordial_JJ ,_, and_CC a_DT mass_NN meeting_NN was_VBD organised_VBN which_WDT was_VBD attended_VBN by_IN Sir_NNP A.Wingate_NNP ,_, K.C.I.E._NNP ,_, I.C.S._NNP ,_, the_DT Municipal_NNP Commissioner_NNP and_CC other_JJ officers_NNS ._.
The_DT High_NNP Priest_NNP of_IN the_DT community_NN ,_, who_WP presided_VBD ,_, addressed_VBD them_PRP in_IN moving_VBG terms_NNS ,_, and_CC by_IN midday_NN 263_CD persons_NNS were_VBD inoculated_VBN ,_, Mr._NNP Adamji_NNP Peerbhoy_NNP himself_PRP setting_VBG the_DT example_NN ._.
Khan_NNP Bahadur_NNP Abdul_NNP Razzak_NNP bin_NN Curtas_NNP threw_VBD himself_PRP vigorously_RB into_IN the_DT cause_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP was_VBD no_DT small_JJ achievement_NN to_TO succeed_VB ,_, as_IN he_PRP did_VBD ,_, in_IN inducing_VBG some_DT 70_CD Julahis_NNP to_TO undergo_VB the_DT operation_NN during_IN October_NNP ._.
Small_JJ funds_NNS were_VBD entrusted_VBN to_TO him_PRP to_TO reconcile_VB them_PRP to_TO the_DT reactionary_JJ fever_NN and_CC the_DT loss_NN of_IN money_NN entailed_VBN ._.
In_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN November_NNP Rao_NNP Bahadur_NNP Bhaskerrao_NNP ?_. 45_CD Balkrishnaji_NNP Pitale_NNP had_VBD a_DT gathering_NN in_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ house_NN at_IN which_WDT the_DT ad-_JJ vantages_NNS of_IN inoculation_NN were_VBD impressed_JJ upon_IN ladies_NNS and_CC gentlemen_NNS alike_RB ._.
On_IN the_DT 30th_CD October_NNP 1898_CD a_DT meeting_NN of_IN the_DT Telugu_NNP and_CC other_JJ Hindu_NNP residents_NNS of_IN Kamatipura_NNP was_VBD held_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT President_NNP ,_, Rao_NNP Bahadur_NNP Ellapa_NNP Balaram_NNP ,_, put_VBD the_DT question_NN clearly_RB before_IN the_DT meeting_NN ,_, generously_RB pro-_JJ mising_VBG himself_PRP to_TO contribute_VB towards_IN the_DT support_NN of_IN those_DT who_WP might_MD be_VB temporarily_RB debarred_VBN from_IN earning_VBG their_PRP$ daily_JJ bread_VBN by_IN the_DT effects_NNS of_IN the_DT inoculation_NN ,_, and_CC promptly_RB advancing_VBG a_DT considerable_JJ sum_NN for_IN this_DT purpose_NN ._.
On_IN the_DT 1st_CD ,_, 5th_CD and_CC 8th_CD November_NNP the_DT subject_NN was_VBD discussed_VBN by_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Medical_NNP Union_NNP and_CC a_DT resolution_NN in_IN favour_NN of_IN inoculation_NN was_VBD passed_VBN by_IN an_DT overwhelming_JJ majority_NN ,_, the_DT four_CD dissentients_NNS being_VBG Drs_NNP ._.
N._NNP H._NNP E._NNP Sukhia_NNP ,_, Dr._NNP Khaja_NNP Abdula_NNP ,_, Dr._NNP M._NNP G._NNP Deshmukh_NNP and_CC Dr._NNP G._NNP B._NNP Kher_NNP ._.
The_DT Plague_NNP Commissioner_NNP ,_, in_IN his_PRP$ Circular_JJ No_NNP ._.
2178_CD of_IN 2nd_CD September_NNP 1898_CD ,_, placed_VBD the_DT seal_NN of_IN approval_NN upon_IN inoculation_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN view_NN of_IN the_DT encouraging_JJ results_NNS at_IN Hubli_NNP directed_VBD ,_, under_IN certain_JJ conditions_NNS ,_, exemption_NN of_IN persons_NNS holding_VBG inoculation_NN certificates_NNS from_IN detention_NN while_IN travelling_VBG ,_, and_CC from_IN segregation_NN ._.
The_DT same_JJ concession_NN to_TO inoculated_JJ travellers_NNS was_VBD made_VBN by_IN the_DT Bengal_NNP Government_NNP on_IN 3rd_CD October_NNP 1898_CD ._.
Inoculation_NN was_VBD one_CD of_IN the_DT subjects_NNS to_TO which_WDT the_DT Parsee_NNP Panchayet_NNP devoted_VBN special_JJ attention_NN ;_: a_DT large_JJ number_NN of_IN medical_JJ men_NNS offered_VBD their_PRP$ gratuitous_JJ services_NNS ,_, hand-bills_NNS explaining_VBG the_DT value_NN of_IN the_DT prophylactic_JJ were_VBD freely_RB distributed_VBN and_CC lectures_NNS were_VBD delivered_VBN during_IN October_NNP by_IN Drs_NNP ._.
Katrak_NNP and_CC Ranina_NNP and_CC Khan_NNP Bahadur_NNP Darasha_NNP Ruttonji_NNP Chichgar_NNP ._.

Dr._NNP A._NNP G._NNP Viegas_NNP is_VBZ another_DT citizen_NN who_WP was_VBD convinced_VBN of_IN the_DT great_JJ possibilities_NNS of_IN inoculation_NN and_CC did_VBD his_PRP$ best_JJS to_TO push_VB it_PRP ._.
Messrs._NNS Vassantrao_NNP Nana_NNP Moroba_NNP and_CC Vamanrao_NNP Nana_NNP Moroba_NNP placed_VBD a_DT fine_JJ hall_NN at_IN his_PRP$ disposal_NN ,_, and_CC 141_CD operations_NNS were_VBD performed_VBN there_RB between_IN 6th_CD December_NNP and_CC 6th_CD February_NNP ._.

The_DT people_NNS undoubtedly_RB regard_JJ inoculation_NN with_IN suspicion_NN ;_: and_CC many_JJ stilt_NNS believe_VBP that_IN it_PRP may_MD produce_VB leprosy_JJR ,_, wasting_VBG ,_, loss_NN of_IN vitality_NN ,_, loss_NN of_IN memory_NN or_CC phthisis_NN ._.

of_IN immunity_NN ;_: they_PRP seem_VBP unable_JJ to_TO realise_VB the_DT extent_NN to_TO which_WDT their_PRP$ chances_NNS are_VBP increased_VBN ,_, or_CC to_TO have_VB any_DT idea_NN of_IN estimating_VBG chances_NNS ,_, and_CC regard_VB the_DT death_NN of_IN a_DT single_JJ inoculated_JJ person_NN as_IN proof_NN that_IN the_DT treatment_NN is_VBZ valueless_JJ ._.
A_DT few_JJ are_VBP withheld_VBN by_IN the_DT belief_NN that_IN the_DT protection_NN afforded_VBD is_VBZ merely_RB temporary_JJ ,_, and_CC do_VBP not_RB regard_VB immunity_NN for_IN six_CD months_NNS as_IN sufficient_JJ reward_NN for_IN the_DT 2_CD or_CC 3_CD days_NNS '_POS reactionary_JJ fever_NN ._.

?_. 49_CD CHAPTER_NN IV_NNP ._.
Measures_NNS Adopted-contd_NNP ._.
Disinfection_NN ._.
The_DT orders_NNS regarding_VBG disinfection_NN issued_VBN by_IN the_DT late_JJ Plague_NNP Committee_NNP (_( printed_VBN at_IN pages_NNS 181_CD and_CC 182_CD of_IN Sir_NNP J._NNP Campbell_NNP 's_POS report_NN )_) continued_VBD in_IN force_NN ._.
The_DT preparation_NN of_IN the_DT disinfecting_VBG solution_NN was_VBD carried_VBN out_RP at_IN the_DT various_JJ district_NN offices_NNS ._.
From_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN during_IN the_DT course_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN samples_NNS were_VBD taken_VBN of_IN the_DT disinfectant_NN in_IN actual_JJ use_NN ,_, and_CC as_IN the_DT results_NNS were_VBD not_RB altogether_RB satisfactory_JJ ,_, it_PRP was_VBD thought_VBN desirable_JJ to_TO have_VB the_DT disinfectant_NN prepared_VBD on_IN a_DT uniform_JJ system_NN at_IN a_DT Central_NNP Laboratory_NNP under_IN skilled_VBN supervision_NN ._.
Dr._NNP Cayley_NNP was_VBD placed_VBN in_IN charge_NN of_IN this_DT work_NN ,_, and_CC his_PRP$ report_NN upon_IN it_PRP is_VBZ given_VBN below_IN :_: -_: I_PRP have_VBP the_DT honour_NN to_TO submit_VB my_PRP$ report_NN on_IN the_DT organization_NN and_CC work_NN done_VBN at_IN the_DT Central_NNP Depot_NNP for_IN the_DT preparation_NN of_IN disinfectants_NNS ._.
The_DT Central_NNP Depot_NNP for_IN the_DT preparation_NN of_IN the_DT Perchloride_NNP of_IN Mercury_NNP solution_NN to_TO be_VB used_VBN as_IN a_DT disinfectant_NN in_IN Bombay_NNP was_VBD established_VBN on_IN March_NNP 16th_CD of_IN this_DT year_NN ._.
A_DT room_NN at_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP Drainage_NNP Chowkey_NNP ,_, in_IN Foras_NNP Road_NNP was_VBD fitted_VBN up_RP for_IN the_DT preparation_NN and_CC storing_NN of_IN the_DT disinfectant_NN ._.
Water_NNP was_VBD laid_VBN on_IN to_TO the_DT room_NN from_IN two_CD sources.-_NN (_( 1_CD )_) by_IN a_DT pipe_NN leading_VBG directly_RB from_IN the_DT main_JJ ;_: (_( 2_CD )_) by_IN a_DT pipe_NN connected_VBN with_IN an_DT iron_NN storage_NN cistern_JJ erected_VBN outside_IN the_DT building_NN ._.
A_DT mori_NN with_IN raised_VBN sides_NNS was_VBD erected_VBN in_IN one_CD corner_NN of_IN the_DT room_NN ._.
The_DT necessary_JJ cupboards_NNS ,_, tables_NNS ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, were_VBD supplied_VBN and_CC the_DT preparation_NN of_IN the_DT disinfectant_NN was_VBD begun_VBN on_IN March_NNP 22nd_CD ._.
The_DT following_JJ staff_NN was_VBD engaged_VBN :_: -_: Medical_JJ Officer_NNP in_IN charge_NN ._.
One_CD European_JJ Inspector_NNP ._.
One_CD Clerk_NNP ._.
Four_CD Coolies_NNPS ._.
After_IN April_NNP 3rd_CD (_( three_CD Coolies_NNS only_RB were_VBD employed_VBN )_) ._.
The_DT prepared_JJ disinfectant_NN is_VBZ distributed_VBN to_TO ,_, and_CC utilized_JJ in_IN ,_, the_DT various_JJ districts_NNS in_IN Bombay_NNP in_IN the_DT following_JJ manner_NN :_: -_: The_DT disinfectant_NN prepared_VBD at_IN the_DT Central_NNP Depot_NNP contains_VBZ 10_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
of_IN Per-_NNP chloride_NN of_IN Mercury_NNP and_CC 20_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
of_IN Hydrochloric_NNP Acid_NNP ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ issued_VBN in_IN stoneware_NN screw_NN stoppered_VBD jars_NNS of_IN a_DT capacity_NN of_IN 21/2_CD gallons_NNS ._.
One_CD hundred_CD jars_NNS of_IN the_DT prepared_JJ solution_NN are_VBP kept_VBN constantly_RB in_IN stock_NN ._.
This_DT number_NN is_VBZ found_VBN to_TO be_VB sufficient_JJ to_TO meet_VB any_DT demand_NN ._.
A_DT solution_NN of_IN Perchloride_NNP of_IN Mercury_NNP tends_VBZ to_TO decompose_VB ,_, if_IN kept_VBN for_IN any_DT length_NN of_IN time_NN ,_, even_RB when_WRB enclosed_VBN in_IN screw_NN stoppered_JJ jars_NNS away_RB from_IN light_JJ and_CC air_NN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD not_RB considered_VBN advisable_JJ ,_, therefore_RB ,_, to_TO keep_VB in_IN stock_NN a_DT larger_JJR quantity_NN of_IN the_DT solution_NN than_IN was_VBD absolutely_RB necessary_JJ ._.
To_TO each_DT jar_NN containing_VBG the_DT prepared_JJ solution_NN is_VBZ attached_VBN a_DT label_NN marked_VBN ``_`` Perchloride_NNP of_IN Mercury_NNP solution_NN 1_CD in_IN 10_CD ,_, ''_'' the_DT date_NN of_IN preparation_NN and_CC the_DT number_NN of_IN the_DT jar_NN prepared_VBD ._.
To_TO prevent_VB accidents_NNS a_DT poison_NN label_NN is_VBZ also_RB attached_VBN to_TO each_DT jar_NN and_CC the_DT solution_NN is_VBZ coloured_VBN with_IN Methylene_NNP Blue_NNP ._.
The_DT Method_NNP of_IN Issue.-The_NNP District_NNP Officers_NNP indent_NN for_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN jars_NNS they_PRP require_VBP directly_RB on_IN the_DT Medical_JJ Officer_NNP in_IN Charge_NNP ._.
A_DT hand_NN cart_NN is_VBZ sent_VBN up_RP with_IN two_CD or_CC three_CD coolies_NNS to_TO whom_WP the_DT jars_NNS are_VBP delivered_VBN ._.
The_DT jars_NNS are_VBP packed_VBN on_IN the_DT cart_NN 50_CD with_IN straw_NN and_CC taken_VBN to_TO the_DT District_NNP Office_NNP ._.
If_IN there_EX are_VBP any_DT empty_JJ jars_NNS to_TO be_VB returned_VBN from_IN the_DT District_NNP Office_NNP they_PRP are_VBP brought_VBN to_TO the_DT Central_NNP Depot_NNP by_IN the_DT coolies_NNS on_IN the_DT hand_NN cart_NN ._.
A_DT receipt_NN is_VBZ given_VBN by_IN the_DT District_NNP Officer_NNP for_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN full_JJ jars_NNS he_PRP receives_VBZ and_CC the_DT clerk_NN at_IN Foras_NNP Road_NNP gives_VBZ a_DT receipt_NN for_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN empty_JJ jars_NNS returned_VBD ._.
The_DT strong_JJ 10_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
solution_NN is_VBZ diluted_VBN before_IN use_NN ._.
Each_DT District_NNP Officer_NNP is_VBZ provided_VBN with_IN a_DT cup_NN holding_NN ,_, when_WRB quite_RB full_JJ ,_, six_CD ounces_NNS ,_, and_CC also_RB with_IN wooden_JJ buckets_NNS holding_VBG ,_, when_WRB nearly_RB full_JJ ,_, 380_CD ounces_NNS ._.
The_DT Perchloride_NNP solution_NN is_VBZ intended_VBN to_TO be_VB used_VBN of_IN a_DT strength_NN of_IN 1_CD in_IN 760_CD ._.
Five_CD ounces_NNS of_IN this_DT strong_JJ 1_CD in_IN 10_CD solution_NN contains_VBZ 1/2_CD ounce_NN of_IN Perchloride_NNP of_IN Mercury_NNP ,_, and_CC this_DT when_WRB made_VBD up_RB to_TO 380_CD ounces_NNS with_IN water_NN gives_VBZ the_DT strength_NN required_VBN ._.
In_IN order_NN to_TO give_VB a_DT margin_NN for_IN errors_NNS the_DT cups_NNS used_VBN have_VBP a_DT capacity_NN of_IN six_CD ounces_NNS ,_, but_CC as_IN in_IN practice_NN the_DT cups_NNS are_VBP never_RB quite_RB filled_VBN approximately_RB five_CD ounces_NNS are_VBP added_VBN to_TO each_DT bucket_NN of_IN water_NN ._.
The_DT whole_JJ procedure_NN is_VBZ simplified_VBN as_RB far_RB as_IN is_VBZ possible_JJ ''_'' wooden_JJ buckets_NNS and_CC cups_NNS of_IN a_DT definite_JJ size_NN are_VBP provided_VBN ,_, and_CC one_CD cup_NN full_JJ of_IN the_DT solution_NN issued_VBN from_IN the_DT Central_NNP Depot_NNP has_VBZ to_TO be_VB added_VBN to_TO each_DT bucket_NN of_IN water_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT resulting_JJ mixture_NN consists_VBZ of_IN a_DT solution_NN of_IN Perchloride_NNP of_IN Mercury_NNP of_IN the_DT strength_NN required_VBN ._.
Wooden_NNP rods_NNS are_VBP used_VBN for_IN stirring_VBG the_DT mixture_NN in_IN the_DT buckets_NNS after_IN the_DT contents_NNS of_IN the_DT cups_NNS have_VBP been_VBN added_VBN to_TO them_PRP ._.
E_NNP Ward_NNP West_NNP was_VBD the_DT first_JJ District_NNP in_IN Bombay_NNP to_TO be_VB supplied_VBN with_IN the_DT strong_JJ Perchloride_NNP of_IN Mercury_NNP solution_NN ._.
This_DT was_VBD on_IN March_NNP 28th_CD when_WRB 20_CD jars_NNS were_VBD issued_VBN ._.
The_DT disinfectant_NN was_VBD issued_VBN to_TO the_DT other_JJ districts_NNS by_IN degrees_NNS until_IN by_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN May_NNP all_PDT the_DT Districts_NNPS were_VBD being_VBG supplied_VBN with_IN the_DT exception_NN of_IN C_NNP Ward_NNP ._.
This_DT ward_NN was_VBD not_RB supplied_VBN with_IN the_DT disinfectant_NN until_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN June_NNP ._.
The_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN jars_NNS of_IN the_DT disinfectant_NN issued_VBD up_RB to_TO the_DT end_NN of_IN May_NNP was_VBD 578_CD ,_, divided_VBN amongst_VBP the_DT different_JJ districts_NNS as_IN below_IN :_: -_: A_DT Ward_NNP Jars_NNP 30_CD B_NNP ,_, ,_, North_NNP ,_, ,_, 88_CD B_NNP ,_, ,_, South_NNP ,_, ,_, 50_CD D_NNP ,_, ,_, ,_, ,_, 20_CD E_NN ,_, ,_, East_NNP ,_, ,_, 125_CD E_NN ,_, ,_, West_NNP ,_, ,_, 145_CD E_NN ,_, ,_, Ripon_NNP Road_NNP ,_, ,_, 85_CD F_NNP &_CC G_NNP Wards_NNP ,_, ,_, 35_CD Total_JJ 578_CD Methods_NNS of_IN Preparation.-At_NNP first_RB the_DT Perchloride_NNP of_IN Mercury_NNP solution_NN was_VBD prepared_VBN in_IN a_DT large_JJ earthenware_NN tub_VBD holding_VBG 8_CD gallons_NNS ._.

of_IN Perchloride_NNP were_VBD added_VBN to_TO 8_CD gallons_NNS of_IN Hydrochloric_NNP Acid_NNP ._.

solution_NN was_VBD obtained_VBN ._.

The_DT method_NN of_IN preparation_NN finally_RB adopted_VBN is_VBZ as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -Into_VB each_DT jar_NN four_CD pints_NNS of_IN Acid_NNP are_VBP measured_VBN and_CC after_IN the_DT addition_NN of_IN the_DT Acid_NNP 21/2_CD lbs_NN ._.
of_IN carefully_RB powdered_VBN Perchloride_NNP of_IN Mercury_NNP are_VBP slowly_RB added_VBN while_IN the_DT whole_NN is_VBZ being_VBG briskly_RB stirred_VBN with_IN a_DT wooden_JJ rod_NN ._.
The_DT Perchloride_NNP is_VBZ dissolved_VBN in_IN a_DT few_JJ minutes_NNS and_CC the_DT jar_NN is_VBZ filled_VBN up_RP with_IN water_NN ._.
The_DT solution_NN thus_RB prepared_VBN is_VBZ kept_VBN for_IN 24_CD hours_NNS when_WRB it_PRP is_VBZ examined_VBN ,_, and_CC if_IN the_DT solution_NN is_VBZ clear_JJ and_CC there_EX is_VBZ no_DT deposit_NN the_DT Mthylne_NNP Blue_NNP is_VBZ added_VBN and_CC the_DT stopper_NN screwed_VBD up_RP tightly_RB ._.
The_DT jar_NN is_VBZ then_RB labelled_VBN and_CC set_VBN aside_RB to_TO await_VB issue_NN ._.
A_DT saturated_JJ solution_NN of_IN Methylene_NNP Blue_NNP is_VBZ prepared_VBN by_IN dissolving_VBG the_DT crystals_NNS in_IN a_DT mixture_NN of_IN acid_NN and_CC water_NN ._.
Two_CD ounces_NNS of_IN this_DT solution_NN is_VBZ added_VBN to_TO each_DT jar_NN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD found_VBN necessary_JJ to_TO dissolve_VB the_DT Methylene_NNP Blue_NNP before_IN adding_VBG it_PRP to_TO the_DT disinfectant_JJ solution_NN as_IN the_DT crystals_NNS would_MD not_RB dissolve_VB when_WRB added_VBN to_TO a_DT solution_NN containing_VBG Perchloride_NNP of_IN Mercury_NNP ._.
The_DT Perchloride_NNP cf_JJ Mercury_NNP is_VBZ supplied_VBN in_IN brown_JJ paper_NN packets_NNS weighing_VBG about_IN 28_CD lbs_NNS ._.
each_DT ._.
Tests_NNS are_VBP applied_VBN to_TO samples_NNS from_IN each_DT packet_NN to_TO ascertain_VB the_DT purity_NN or_CC otherwise_NN of_IN the_DT Perchloride_NNP supplied_VBD ._.
The_DT tests_NNS used_VBD are-_JJ 1_CD ._.
The_DT solubility_NN in_IN water_NN ._.
It_PRP should_MD dissolve_VB in_IN excess_NN of_IN water_NN on_IN gently_RB heating_VBG without_IN leaving_VBG any_DT residue_NN ._.
2_CD ._.
When_WRB the_DT crystals_NNS are_VBP heated_VBN in_IN a_DT test_NN tube_NN the_DT whole_NN should_MD sublime_VB and_CC be_VB deposited_VBN on_IN the_DT cold_JJ part_NN of_IN the_DT tube_NN in_IN the_DT form_NN of_IN a_DT thick_JJ white_JJ powder_NN ._.
3_CD ._.
On_IN the_DT addition_NN of_IN Iodide_NNP of_IN Potassium_NNP to_TO a_DT solution_NN of_IN the_DT salt_NN in_IN water_NN a_DT red_JJ precipitate_NN (_( Iodide_NNP of_IN Mercury_NNP )_) should_MD form_VB which_WDT re-dissolves_NNS on_IN addition_NN of_IN excess_NN of_IN the_DT Iodide_NNP solution_NN ._.
The_DT Perchloride_NNP supplied_VBD was_VBD very_RB pure_JJ and_CC in_IN every_DT case_NN conformed_VBN with_IN the_DT above_NN tests_NNS ,_, with_IN the_DT exception_NN that_IN in_IN a_DT few_JJ of_IN the_DT packets_NNS that_WDT had_VBD got_VBN damp_RB a_DT small_JJ proportion_NN of_IN the_DT Perchloride_NNP had_VBD been_VBN converted_VBN into_IN the_DT brown_JJ Carbonate_NNP of_IN Mercury_NNP ._.
The_DT amount_NN of_IN carbonate_NN present_NN in_IN any_DT individual_JJ packet_NN did_VBD not_RB exceed_VB a_DT few_JJ grains_NNS in_IN weight_NN ._.
In_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT packets_NNS a_DT few_JJ small_JJ pieces_NNS of_IN glass_NN were_VBD found_VBN ,_, but_CC practically_RB no_DT adulteration_NN was_VBD present_JJ and_CC none_NN of_IN the_DT Perchloride_NNP had_VBD been_VBN converted_VBN into_IN the_DT subchloride_NN (_( calomel_NN )_) ._.
The_DT Hydrochloric_NNP Acid_NNP is_VBZ supplied_VBN in_IN stone_NN screw_NN stoppered_VBD jars_NNS holding_VBG 20lbs_CD ._.
of_IN acid_NN ._.
The_DT acid_NN was_VBD supplied_VBN in_IN jars_NNS of_IN 2_CD kinds_NNS ,_, i._NN e._NN ,_, with_IN small_JJ stoppers_NNS and_CC with_IN large_JJ stoppers_NNS ._.
The_DT acid_NN in_IN the_DT first_JJ of_IN these_DT jars_NNS was_VBD the_DT best_JJS in_IN quality_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT majority_NN of_IN the_DT jars_NNS the_DT quality_NN of_IN the_DT acid_NN was_VBD good_JJ ,_, but_CC 5_CD jars_NNS had_VBD to_TO be_VB returned_VBN as_IN they_PRP had_VBD evidently_RB been_VBN diluted_VBN with_IN water_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT jars_NNS containing_VBG this_DT diluted_VBN acid_IN the_DT stoppers_NNS were_VBD loose_JJ and_CC had_VBD evidently_RB been_VBN recently_RB tampered_VBN with_IN ._.
When_WRB the_DT stoppers_NNS were_VBD tightly_RB screwed_VBN on_IN ,_, the_DT acid_NN was_VBD always_RB found_VBN to_TO be_VB of_IN full_JJ strength_NN ._.
No_DT direct_JJ tests_NNS were_VBD applied_VBN to_TO ascertain_VB the_DT strength_NN of_IN the_DT acid_NN ,_, but_CC if_IN the_DT acid_NN did_VBD not_RB give_VB off_RP dense_NN fumes_NNS when_WRB exposed_VBN to_TO the_DT air_NN the_DT jars_NNS were_VBD rejected_VBN and_CC returned_VBN to_TO the_DT contractor_NN who_WP replaced_VBD them_PRP with_IN others_NNS of_IN full_JJ strength_NN ._.
The_DT acid_NN is_VBZ syphoned_VBN out_IN of_IN the_DT jars_NNS by_IN means_NNS of_IN a_DT glass_NN acid_NN syphon_NN into_IN a_DT measured_JJ glass_NN jug_NN ,_, from_IN which_WDT it_PRP is_VBZ poured_VBN into_IN the_DT issue_NN jars_NNS ._.
Some_DT experiments_NNS were_VBD carried_VBN out_IN to_TO ascertain_VB the_DT quantity_NN of_IN acid_NN that_WDT should_MD be_VB added_VBN to_TO each_DT jar_NN in_IN order_NN to_TO get_VB the_DT full_JJ effect_NN of_IN the_DT germicidal_JJ action_NN on_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Bacillus_NNP ._.
It_PRP was_VBD considered_VBN advisable_JJ to_TO add_VB sufficient_JJ acid_NN to_TO render_VB cowdung_NN floors_NNS acid_VBP in_IN reaction_NN for_IN a_DT period_NN of_IN at_IN least_JJS 24_CD hours_NNS ._.
At_IN first_JJ 52_CD 2_CD pints_NNS of_IN acid_NN were_VBD added_VBN to_TO each_DT jar_NN giving_VBG a_DT strength_NN of_IN 1_CD in_IN 760_CD to_TO the_DT diluted_VBN solution_NN ._.
With_IN this_DT quantity_NN of_IN acid_NN the_DT cowdung_NN floors_NNS gave_VBD an_DT acid_JJ reaction_NN for_IN from_IN 8_CD to_TO 11_CD hours_NNS ._.
The_DT amount_NN was_VBD then_RB increased_VBN to_TO 3_CD pints_NNS per_IN jar_NN giving_VBG a_DT strength_NN of_IN about_RB 1_CD in_IN 500_CD in_IN the_DT diluted_JJ solution_NN ._.
This_DT rendered_VBD the_DT floors_NNS acid_VBP for_IN periods_NNS varying_VBG from_IN 12_CD to_TO 18_CD hours_NNS ._.
Four_CD pints_NNS were_VBD then_RB tried_VBN ,_, giving_VBG a_DT strength_NN to_TO the_DT diluted_JJ solution_NN of_IN 1_CD in_IN 380_CD ._.
This_DT amount_NN rendered_VBD the_DT floors_NNS acid_VBP for_IN at_IN least_JJS 30_CD hours_NNS after_IN dis-_JJ infection_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT preparation_NN of_IN the_DT solution_NN therefore_RB four_CD pints_NNS was_VBD fixed_VBN upon_IN as_IN the_DT amount_NN of_IN acid_JJ necessary_JJ to_TO be_VB added_VBN to_TO each_DT jar_NN ._.
The_DT acid_NN in_IN the_DT solution_NN acts_VBZ as_IN a_DT solvent_NN for_IN the_DT Perchloride_NNP ._.
It_PRP also_RB acts_VBZ as_IN a_DT solvent_NN of_IN any_DT albuminate_NN of_IN Mercury_NNP that_WDT may_MD be_VB formed_VBN allowing_VBG the_DT Perchloride_NNP therefore_NN to_TO penetrate_VB through_IN what_WP would_MD otherwise_RB have_VB been_VBN an_DT impervious_JJ covering_VBG protecting_VBG the_DT germs_NNS ._.
In_IN addition_NN to_TO these_DT two_CD actions_NNS the_DT Hydrochloric_NNP acid_NN has_VBZ a_DT distinct_JJ germicidal_JJ action_NN of_IN its_PRP$ own_JJ on_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Bacillus_NNP and_CC is_VBZ itself_PRP a_DT good_JJ disinfectant_NN for_IN this_DT purpose_NN ._.
By_IN rendering_VBG the_DT floors_NNS acid_VBP tor_NN periods_NNS of_IN 24_CD hours_NNS after_IN disinfection_NN this_DT disinfectant_JJ action_NN is_VBZ continued_VBN after_IN all_PDT the_DT Perchloride_NNP cf_NN Mercury_NNP has_VBZ been_VBN decomposed_VBN ._.
In_IN the_DT first_JJ series_NN of_IN jars_NNS prepared_JJ ,_, Sodium_NNP Chloride_NNP was_VBD added_VBN to_TO assist_VB the_DT solution_NN of_IN the_DT Perchloride_NNP ._.
The_DT salt_NN supplied_VBD was_VBD covered_VBN with_IN mud_NN containing_VBG organic_JJ matter_NN which_WDT actually_RB decom-_VBP posed_VBD the_DT Perchloride_NNP ,_, although_IN the_DT salt_NN was_VBD washed_VBN as_RB carefully_RB as_IN possible_JJ and_CC strained_VBD through_IN several_JJ layers_NNS of_IN cloth_NN ._.
The_DT use_NN of_IN the_DT Sodium_NNP Chloride_NNP was_VBD dispensed_VBN with_IN and_CC it_PRP was_VBD not_RB considered_VBN necessary_JJ to_TO replace_VB it_PRP with_IN Ammonium_NNP Chloride_NNP as_IN the_DT amount_NN of_IN Hydrochloric_NNP acid_NN used_VBN was_VBD considered_VBN sufficient_JJ to_TO effect_NN all_PDT that_DT was_VBD required_VBN ._.
In_IN a_DT number_NN of_IN the_DT jars_NNS a_DT greyish_JJ muddy_NN looking_VBG sediment_NN was_VBD deposited_VBN after_IN the_DT solution_NN had_VBD been_VBN standing_VBG for_IN 3_CD or_CC 4_CD days_NNS ._.
On_IN testing_VBG the_DT deposit_NN it_PRP was_VBD found_VBN to_TO consist_VB of_IN Mercury_NNP in_IN a_DT very_RB finely_RB divided_VBN state_NN with_IN some_DT organic_JJ matter_NN ._.
Experiments_NNS were_VBD made_VBN to_TO discover_VB the_DT source_NN of_IN this_DT deposit_NN and_CC it_PRP was_VBD found_VBN to_TO be_VB due_JJ to_TO the_DT organic_JJ matter_NN contained_VBN in_IN the_DT water_NN used_VBN for_IN the_DT pre-_JJ paration_NN of_IN the_DT disinfectant_NN ._.
When_WRB distilled_JJ water_NN was_VBD used_VBN instead_RB of_IN water_NN from_IN the_DT main_JJ no_DT sediment_NN was_VBD deposited_VBN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD also_RB found_VBN that_IN the_DT sediment_NN was_VBD less_RBR when_WRB water_NN from_IN the_DT main_JJ was_VBD used_VBN than_IN when_WRB water_NN from_IN the_DT cistern_NN was_VBD used_VBN ._.
The_DT water_NN from_IN these_DT two_CD sources_NNS was_VBD analysed_VBN and_CC found_VBN to_TO contain_VB a_DT considerable_JJ amount_NN of_IN organic_JJ matter_NN both_DT in_IN suspension_NN and_CC in_IN solution_NN ._.
By_IN filtering_VBG the_DT water_NN through_IN several_JJ layers_NNS of_IN cloth_NN the_DT organic_JJ matter_NN in_IN suspension_NN was_VBD removed_VBN and_CC the_DT sediment_NN deposited_VBD ,_, when_WRB this_DT filtered_VBD water_NN was_VBD used_VBN ,_, was_VBD lessened_VBN in_IN amount_NN ,_, but_CC was_VBD not_RB entirely_RB removed_VBN ._.
This_DT sediment_NN was_VBD caused_VBN by_IN the_DT organic_JJ matter_NN in_IN solution_NN ._.
The_DT form-_JJ ation_NN of_IN this_DT sediment_NN could_MD only_RB be_VB prevented_VBN by_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN distilled_JJ water_NN ,_, but_CC as_IN distilled_JJ water_NN in_IN the_DT large_JJ quantity_NN required_VBN was_VBD not_RB available_JJ ,_, an_DT additional_JJ quantity_NN of_IN Perchloride_NNP of_IN Mercury_NNP was_VBD added_VBN to_TO each_DT jar_NN sufficient_NN to_TO cover_VB any_DT loss_NN from_IN this_DT cause_NN ._.
On_IN 16th_CD May_NNP 1899_CD the_DT sediment_NN that_WDT had_VBD been_VBN deposited_VBN in_IN 73_CD jars_NNS was_VBD collected_VBN ,_, dried_VBN and_CC weighed_VBN ._.
The_DT total_JJ weight_NN was_VBD four_CD ounces_NNS giving_VBG an_DT average_NN of_IN 24_CD grains_NNS for_IN each_DT jar_NN ._.
The_DT water_NN that_WDT had_VBD been_VBN used_VBN in_IN the_DT preparation_NN of_IN these_DT jars_NNS had_VBD not_RB been_VBN filtered_VBN ._.
On_IN 31st_CD May_NNP 1899_CD the_DT sediment_NN from_IN 35_CD jars_NNS was_VBD collected_VBN and_CC weighed_VBN ._.
It_PRP averaged_VBD 91/2_CD grains_NNS to_TO each_DT jar_NN ._.
The_DT water_NN used_VBN in_IN the_DT preparation_NN of_IN these_DT jars_NNS had_VBD been_VBN filtered_VBN ._.
53_CD These_DT results_NNS show_VBP that_IN the_DT actual_JJ amount_NN of_IN Perchloride_NNP decomposed_VBD in_IN each_DT jar_NN is_VBZ very_RB small_JJ ._.
The_DT grey_JJ deposit_NN consisted_VBD of_IN finely_RB divided_JJ Mercury_NNP and_CC 91/2_CD grains_NNS of_IN Mercury_NNP correspond_NN to_TO 12.87_CD grains_NNS of_IN Perchloride_NNP ._.
So_RB by_IN using_VBG filtered_JJ water_NN from_IN the_DT main_JJ the_DT actual_JJ loss_NN of_IN Perchloride_NNP of_IN Mercury_NNP in_IN each_DT jar_NN averaged_VBD 12.87_CD grains_NNS out_IN of_IN 21/2_CD lbs_NNS ._.
To_TO counter-balance_NN this_DT loss_NN an_DT extra_JJ half_NN ounce_NN of_IN Perchloride_NNP over_IN and_CC above_IN the_DT 21/2_CD lbs_NN ._.
is_VBZ added_VBN to_TO each_DT jar_NN ._.
Every_DT week_NN samples_NNS of_IN the_DT prepared_JJ solutions_NNS in_IN stock_NN were_VBD analysed_VBN ._.
Until_IN the_DT extra_JJ 1/2_CD ounce_NN of_IN Perchloride_NNP was_VBD added_VBN to_TO each_DT jar_NN ,_, the_DT solution_NN was_VBD often_RB found_VBN to_TO contain_VB a_DT small_JJ fraction_NN less_JJR than_IN the_DT full_JJ 10_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
This_DT loss_NN was_VBD in_IN part_NN due_JJ to_TO the_DT decomposition_NN of_IN the_DT Perchloride_NNP by_IN the_DT organic_JJ matter_NN in_IN the_DT water_NN ,_, and_CC partly_RB to_TO the_DT alteration_NN in_IN the_DT composition_NN of_IN the_DT Perchloride_NNP which_WDT always_RB takes_VBZ place_NN to_TO a_DT small_JJ extent_NN when_WRB a_DT solution_NN of_IN the_DT salt_NN is_VBZ kept_VBN for_IN any_DT length_NN of_IN time_NN ._.
Some_DT experiments_NNS made_VBN to_TO ascertain_VB the_DT loss_NN from_IN this_DT cause_NN gave_VBD the_DT following_JJ results_NNS :_: -_: A_DT solution_NN when_WRB freshly_RB prepared_VBN was_VBD found_VBN to_TO contain_VB on_IN analysis..10_NN parts_NNS in_IN 100_CD ._.
After_IN the_DT same_JJ solution_NN had_VBD been_VBN kept_VBN for_IN four_CD weeks_NNS it_PRP contained..9.982_VBZ do_VBP ._.
After_IN eight_CD do_NNS ._.
..9.9_RB 54_CD do_NNS ._.
i.e._NN ,_, after_IN four_CD weeks_NNS there_RB was_VBD a_DT loss_NN of_IN 31.5_CD grains_NNS of_IN Perchloride_NNP of_IN Mercury_NNP and_CC after_IN eight_CD weeks_NNS 80.5_CD grains_NNS ._.
As_IN stated_VBN above_IN an_DT extra_JJ half_NN ounce_NN ,_, i.e._FW ,_, 218.75_CD grains_NNS ,_, is_VBZ now_RB added_VBN to_TO each_DT jars_NNS ._.
This_DT is_VBZ sufficient_JJ to_TO cover_VB the_DT loss_NN from_IN keeping_VBG and_CC the_DT loss_NN due_JJ to_TO the_DT organic_JJ matter_NN in_IN the_DT water_NN and_CC at_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN to_TO leave_VB a_DT margin_NN for_IN any_DT further_JJ loss_NN ._.

of_IN Perchloride_NNP of_IN Mercury_NNP ._.
Several_JJ analyses_NNS were_VBD made_VBN of_IN the_DT diluted_JJ solutions_NNS taken_VBN from_IN the_DT buckets_NNS of_IN the_DT solution_NN actually_RB being_VBG used_VBN for_IN disinfection_NN ._.
The_DT samples_NNS varied_VBN in_IN strength_NN from_IN 1_CD in_IN 700_CD to_TO 1_CD in_IN 750_CD ._.
This_DT increase_NN of_IN strength_NN over_IN the_DT theoretical_JJ 1_CD in_IN 760_CD showed_VBD that_IN a_DT little_RB more_JJR than_IN 5_CD ounces_NNS of_IN the_DT 10_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
solution_NN was_VBD being_VBG added_VBN to_TO each_DT bucket_NN ._.
The_DT cups_NNS used_VBN for_IN measuring_VBG out_RP the_DT strong_JJ solution_NN hold_NN ,_, when_WRB quite_RB full_JJ ,_, 6_CD ounces_NNS ._.
This_DT accounts_VBZ for_IN the_DT excess_NN of_IN the_DT strong_JJ solution_NN added_VBD ._.
In_IN the_DT preparation_NN of_IN the_DT disinfectant_NN care_NN is_VBZ taken_VBN that_IN no_DT apparatus_NN or_CC materials_NNS are_VBP used_VBN that_IN can_MD in_IN any_DT way_NN react_NN on_IN the_DT Perchloride_NNP ._.
The_DT Perchloride_NNP is_VBZ kept_VBN in_IN paper_NN packets_NNS ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ powdered_VBN in_IN a_DT China_NNP mortar_NN with_IN a_DT China_NNP pestle_NN ._.
The_DT acid_NN is_VBZ syphoned_VBN from_IN the_DT acid_JJ jars_NNS with_IN a_DT glass_NN syphon_NN ,_, and_CC glass_NN or_CC China_NNP jugs_NNS only_RB are_VBP used_VBN for_IN measuring_VBG the_DT acid_NN and_CC for_IN transferring_VBG it_PRP to_TO the_DT jars_NNS ._.
The_DT cups_NNS supplied_VBD to_TO the_DT District_NNP Officers_NNPS were_VBD at_IN first_JJ enamelled_VBD iron_NN cups_NNS ._.
They_PRP had_VBD no_DT effect_NN on_IN the_DT Perchloride_NNP solution_NN at_IN first_JJ ,_, but_CC the_DT enamel_NN was_VBD soon_RB eaten_JJ away_RB and_CC the_DT iron_NN exposed_VBD ,_, so_IN these_DT cups_NNS were_VBD replaced_VBN by_IN similar_JJ cups_NNS made_VBN of_IN thick_JJ glass_NN ._.
No_DT change_NN was_VBD made_VBN in_IN the_DT orders_NNS regarding_VBG disinfection_NN ,_, but_CC towards_IN the_DT close_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN when_WRB the_DT epidemic_NN was_VBD declining_VBG it_PRP was_VBD felt_VBN to_TO be_VB desirable_JJ to_TO emphasize_VB the_DT necessity_NN of_IN uniformity_NN and_CC thorough-_JJ ness_NN in_IN disinfection_NN ;_: and_CC on_IN receipt_NN of_IN a_DT report_NN from_IN Dr._NNP Cayley_NNP ,_, detailed_JJ instructions_NNS were_VBD drawn_VBN up_RP in_IN consultation_NN with_IN him_PRP for_IN the_DT guidance_NN of_IN all_DT District_NNP Officers_NNP and_CC forwarded_VBN to_TO them_PRP together_RB with_IN his_PRP$ report_NN ._.
?_. 54_CD His_PRP$ report_NN and_CC the_DT instructions_NNS issued_VBN are_VBP printed_VBN below_IN :_: -_: Dr._NNP Cayley_NNP 's_POS SIR_NNP ,_, Report_NNP ._.
I_PRP have_VBP the_DT honour_NN to_TO report_VB that_IN Mr._NNP Clark_NNP ,_, the_DT Superintendent_NNP of_IN Disinfection_NNP in_IN the_DT Central_NNP District_NNP ,_, has_VBZ consulted_VBN me_PRP with_IN reference_NN to_TO the_DT disinfection_NN of_IN clothes_NNS ,_, leather_NN ,_, &_CC c._VBP The_DT solution_NN of_IN Perchloride_NNP of_IN Mercury_NNP ,_, as_IN supplied_VBN from_IN Foras_NNP Road_NNP ,_, is_VBZ not_RB suitable_JJ for_IN disinfecting_VBG clothes_NNS ,_, owing_VBG to_TO the_DT large_JJ percentage_NN of_IN acid_NN that_IN it_PRP contains_VBZ ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ most_RBS important_JJ that_IN the_DT clothes_NNS ,_, bedding_NN ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, of_IN an_DT infected_JJ person_NN should_MD be_VB disinfected_VBN ._.
I_PRP find_VBP that_IN it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN the_DT custom_NN in_IN the_DT Central_NNP District_NNP to_TO burn_VB those_DT articles_NNS that_WDT were_VBD of_IN small_JJ value_NN and_CC to_TO leave_VB the_DT remainder_NN untouched_VBD ._.
The_DT best_JJS method_NN of_IN disinfecting_VBG clothes_NNS is_VBZ undoubtedly_RB in_IN a_DT steam_NN disinfector_NN ._.
Owing_VBG to_TO the_DT distances_NNS and_CC the_DT number_NN of_IN articles_NNS requiring_VBG disinfection_NN this_DT is_VBZ not_RB practicable_JJ ._.
To_TO disinfect_VB the_DT clothes_NNS phenyle_NN might_MD be_VB used_VBN ._.
As_IN it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB convenient_JJ to_TO keep_VB clothes_NNS for_IN a_DT long_JJ time_NN in_IN the_DT solution_NN of_IN phenyle_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ necessary_JJ te_NNS make_VBP the_DT solution_NN a_DT strong_JJ one_CD ._.
A_DT suitable_JJ solution_NN could_MD be_VB made_VBN by_IN adding_VBG a_DT cupful_NN of_IN phenyle_NN to_TO a_DT bucket_NN of_IN water_NN ,_, using_VBG cups_NNS and_CC buckets_NNS of_IN the_DT same_JJ size_NN as_IN those_DT now_RB used_VBN to_TO make_VB the_DT diluted_JJ Perchloride_NNP solution_NN ._.
As_RB soon_RB as_IN the_DT disinfecting_VBG party_NN enters_NNS a_DT house_NN for_IN disinfection_NN ,_, the_DT clothes_NNS should_MD be_VB collected_VBN and_CC placed_VBN in_IN a_DT tub_NN or_CC tubs_NN of_IN the_DT phenyle_JJ solution_NN made_VBN of_IN the_DT strength_NN given_VBN above_IN ._.
They_PRP should_MD be_VB left_VBN in_IN the_DT solution_NN until_IN the_DT disinfection_NN of_IN the_DT room_NN is_VBZ completed_VBN and_CC should_MD then_RB be_VB wrung_VBN out_RP and_CC hung_VB up_RP to_TO dry_VB ._.
The_DT time_NN occupied_VBN in_IN disinfecting_VBG a_DT room_NN is_VBZ over_IN 20_CD minutes_NNS ,_, which_WDT will_MD give_VB ample_JJ time_NN to_TO disinfect_VB the_DT clothes_NNS using_VBG phenyle_NN of_IN the_DT above_JJ strength_NN ._.
Leather_RB can_MD not_RB be_VB soaked_VBN in_IN the_DT solution_NN in_IN the_DT same_JJ way_NN without_IN spoiling_VBG it_PRP ._.
Leather_NNP should_MD be_VB well_RB swabbed_VBN all_DT over_IN with_IN a_DT cloth_NN dipped_VBN in_IN phenyle_JJ solution_NN ,_, for_IN this_DT purpose_NN the_DT phenyle_JJ solution_NN should_MD be_VB stronger_JJR than_IN that_DT given_VBN above_IN ._.
In_IN making_VBG the_DT solutions_NNS the_DT phenyle_NN should_MD be_VB put_VBN in_IN the_DT bucket_NN before_IN adding_VBG the_DT water-for_JJ making_VBG a_DT solution_NN for_IN treating_VBG leather_PDT the_DT bucket_NN should_MD only_RB be_VB half_NN filled_VBN with_IN water_NN ._.
After_IN the_DT leather_NN has_VBZ been_VBN thus_RB treated_VBN the_DT bucket_NN can_MD be_VB filled_VBN up_RP with_IN water_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT solution_NN used_VBN for_IN clothes_NNS ._.
A_DT tub_NN once_RB filled_VBN with_IN phenyle_NN can_MD be_VB used_VBN for_IN a_DT series_NN of_IN clothes_NNS ._.
For_IN bedding_NN ,_, matresses_NNS and_CC other_JJ similar_JJ bulky_NN articles_NNS ,_, the_DT only_JJ method_NN to_TO efficiently_RB disinfect_VB these_DT is_VBZ to_TO have_VB them_PRP carted_VBN to_TO the_DT steam_NN steriliser_NN and_CC there_RB disinfected_VBN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ only_RB occasionally_RB that_IN articles_NNS of_IN this_DT description_NN will_MD be_VB found_VBN in_IN infected_JJ rooms_NNS ,_, and_CC I_PRP think_VBP it_PRP would_MD be_VB practicable_JJ to_TO have_VB them_PRP treated_VBN in_IN this_DT way_NN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP found_VBN that_IN a_DT distinction_NN is_VBZ being_VBG drawn_VBN between_IN so_RB called_VBN suspicious_JJ cases_NNS and_CC cases_NNS of_IN undoubted_JJ plague_NN ._.
This_DT is_VBZ not_RB very_RB logical_JJ ,_, and_CC in_IN all_DT doubtful_JJ cases_NNS the_DT disinfection_NN should_MD be_VB as_IN thorough_JJ and_CC complete_JJ as_IN in_IN cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN ._.
There_EX is_VBZ no_DT doubt_NN that_IN efficient_JJ disinfection_NN is_VBZ the_DT main_JJ factor_NN in_IN stamping_VBG out_RP an_DT epidemic_NN of_IN an_DT infectious_JJ disease_NN ._.
Now_RB that_IN there_EX are_VBP only_RB a_DT few_JJ cases_NNS to_TO deal_VB with_IN disinfection_NN can_MD and_CC should_MD be_VB carried_VBN out_RP most_JJS thoroughly_RB ._.
More_JJR time_NN can_MD be_VB spent_VBN on_IN individual_JJ cases_NNS ,_, and_CC in_IN every_DT room_NN in_IN which_WDT a_DT death_NN occurs_NN ,_, unless_IN the_DT cause_NN of_IN death_NN is_VBZ absolutely_RB above_JJ suspicion_NN ,_, should_MD be_VB thoroughly_RB disinfected_VBN ._.
The_DT period_NN which_WDT intervenes_VBZ between_IN two_CD epidemics_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT very_RB early_JJ stages_NNS of_IN an_DT epidemic_JJ are_VBP the_DT only_JJ times_NNS when_WRB the_DT disease_NN can_MD be_VB coped_VBN with_IN ,_, and_CC when_WRB thorough_JJ dis-_JJ infection_NN is_VBZ likely_JJ to_TO have_VB any_DT real_JJ effect_NN in_IN stamping_VBG out_RP the_DT disease_NN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP the_DT honour_NN to_TO be_VB ,_, Sir_NNP ,_, Your_NNP most_RBS obedient_JJ Servant_NNP ,_, C._NNP H._NNP CAYLEY_NNP ._.
?_. 55_CD When_WRB a_DT Plague_NNP case_NN occurs_VBZ disinfection_NN should_MD in_IN future_JJ be_VB carried_VBN out_RP as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -_: Instructions_NNS for_IN Disinfec-_NNP tion_NN ._.
1_CD ._.
The_DT room_NN and_CC the_DT whole_NN of_IN its_PRP$ contents_NNS must_MD be_VB disinfected_VBN ,_, also_RB adjoining_VBG rooms_NNS which_WDT have_VBP ,_, through_IN doors_NNS ,_, windows_NNS ,_, cracks_NNS or_CC crevices_NNS ,_, any_DT direct_JJ connection_NN with_IN the_DT room_NN where_WRB the_DT case_NN occurs_VBZ ;_: also_RB the_DT latrines_NNS ,_, the_DT passage_NN on_IN which_WDT the_DT room_NN opens_VBZ ,_, and_CC the_DT passage_NN of_IN all_DT floors_NNS below_IN ,_, together_RB with_IN connecting_VBG staircase_NN ._.
2_CD ._.
First_RB the_DT bedding_NN and_CC any_DT soiled_JJ clothes_NNS belonging_VBG to_TO the_DT patient_NN should_MD be_VB secured_VBN ,_, carefully_RB picked_VBD up_RP ,_, taken_VBN outside_JJ and_CC burned_VBD ._.
If_IN specially_RB valuable_JJ they_PRP may_MD be_VB sent_VBN to_TO the_DT nearest_JJS steam_NN sterilizer_NN ._.
3_CD ._.
All_DT other_JJ bedding_NN and_CC clothes_NNS in_IN the_DT room_NN ,_, whether_IN lying_VBG about_RB or_CC contained_VBN in_IN boxes_NNS or_CC cupboards_NNS ,_, should_MD then_RB be_VB collected_VBN and_CC carefully_RB taken_VBN out_RP and_CC sent_VBD to_TO the_DT nearest_JJS steam_NN sterilizer_NN ._.
If_IN the_DT distance_NN is_VBZ great_JJ or_CC there_EX are_VBP other_JJ difficulties_NNS they_PRP may_MD be_VB soaked_VBN in_IN a_DT solution_NN of_IN phenyle_NN or_CC carbolic_JJ acid_NN for_IN at_IN least_JJS 30_CD minutes_NNS ._.
Note_NNP 1.-The_JJ solution_NN of_IN Perchloride_NNP of_IN Mercury_NNP now_RB being_VBG supplied_VBN should_MD not_RB be_VB used_VBN for_IN this_DT purpose_NN ,_, as_IN it_PRP is_VBZ likely_JJ to_TO be_VB destructive_JJ owing_VBG to_TO the_DT quantity_NN of_IN hydrochloric_JJ acid_JJ present_NN in_IN it_PRP ._.
Note_VB 2.-In_CD the_DT case_NN of_IN very_RB valuable_JJ clothes_NNS ,_, and_CC if_IN a_DT steam_NN sterilizer_NN is_VBZ not_RB available_JJ ,_, matresses_NNS or_CC bulky_NN articles_NNS which_WDT can_MD not_RB be_VB con-_JJ veniently_RB soaked_VBN in_IN a_DT solution_NN ,_, as_IN above_IN ,_, should_MD be_VB either_CC hung_VB up_RP or_CC spread_VB out_RP in_IN the_DT sun_NN ._.
4_CD ._.
Boots_NNP and_CC articles_NNS of_IN leather_NN should_MD be_VB carefully_RB rubbed_VBN over_IN with_IN a_DT cloth_NN soaked_VBN in_IN a_DT strong_JJ solution_NN or_CC Phenyle_NNP or_CC Carbolic_NNP Acid_NNP ._.
5_CD ._.
Metal_NN or_CC earthern_JJ cooking_VBG pots_NNS need_MD not_RB be_VB disinfected_VBN if_IN the_DT people_NNS strongly_RB object_VBP ,_, otherwise_RB they_PRP should_MD be_VB washed_VBN with_IN solution_NN of_IN Phenyle_NNP and_CC Perchloride_NNP of_IN Mercury_NNP ,_, respectively_RB ._.
6_CD ._.
Books_NNP and_CC paper_NN should_MD be_VB carefully_RB dusted_VBN ,_, unless_IN the_DT owner_NN consents_NNS to_TO their_PRP$ destruction_NN ._.
7_CD ._.
Furniture_NN and_CC boxes_NNS in_IN the_DT room_NN should_MD be_VB mopped_VBN on_IN the_DT outside_NN with_IN a_DT cloth_NN soaked_VBN in_IN the_DT Perchloride_NNP solution_NN ;_: they_PRP should_MD then_RB be_VB taken_VBN out_RP and_CC thoroughly_RB washed_VBD inside_RB and_CC out_IN with_IN the_DT Perchloride_NNP solution_NN ._.
8_CD ._.
Articles_NNS of_IN food_NN should_MD ,_, so_RB far_RB as_IN possible_JJ ,_, be_VB spread_VBN out_RP in_IN the_DT sun_NN ._.
9_CD ._.
Rags_NNP and_CC similar_JJ rubbish_NN lying_VBG about_RB in_IN the_DT rooms_NNS should_MD be_VB carefully_RB lifted_VBN ,_, removed_VBN and_CC burned_VBN with_IN the_DT patient_NN 's_POS bedding_NN ._.
In_IN placing_VBG them_PRP outside_IN they_PRP should_MD be_VB carefully_RB laid_VBN down_RP (_( not_RB thrown_VB down_RP )_) so_RB as_IN not_RB to_TO raise_VB a_DT dust_NN ._.
10_CD ._.
No_DT brushing_NN of_IN floors_NNS or_CC walls_NNS should_MD on_IN any_DT account_NN be_VB permitted_VBN before_IN flushing_NN ._.
This_DT is_VBZ a_DT most_RBS dangerous_JJ proceeding_NN and_CC likely_JJ to_TO spread_VB infection_NN ._.
11_CD ._.
The_DT room_NN itself_PRP should_MD be_VB systematically_RB flushed_VBN with_IN the_DT solution_NN of_IN Perchloride_NNP ._.
Special_JJ care_NN being_VBG taken_VBN to_TO thoroughly_RB flood_VB the_DT floor_NN if_IN it_PRP is_VBZ of_IN mud_NN or_CC cow-dung_NN ._.
12_CD ._.
It_PRP should_MD be_VB swept_VBN out_RP and_CC again_RB flushed_JJ and_CC cleaned_VBN on_IN the_DT following_JJ day_NN :_: -_: Note.-Where_RB for_IN any_DT reason_NN ,_, e._NN g._NNS ,_, in_IN merely_RB suspicious_JJ cases_NNS it_PRP is_VBZ necessary_JJ to_TO allow_VB the_DT people_NNS to_TO re-occupy_VB the_DT room_NN without_IN delay_NN ,_, the_DT whole_JJ operation_NN may_MD be_VB completed_VBN on_IN the_DT same_JJ day_NN ._.
56_CD 13_CD ._.
Passages_NNS and_CC staircases_NNS should_MD be_VB similarly_RB flushed_VBN and_CC then_RB swept_VB and_CC cleaned_VBN on_IN the_DT same_JJ day_NN ._.
14_CD ._.
All_DT windows_NNS and_CC other_JJ methods_NNS of_IN ventilation_NN should_MD be_VB thrown_VBN as_IN wide_JJ open_JJ as_IN possible_JJ ._.
15_CD ._.
Latrines_NNS should_MD be_VB thoroughly_RB flushed_VBN with_IN plain_JJ water_NN ,_, a_DT final_JJ flushing_NN being_VBG given_VBN with_IN a_DT solution_NN of_IN Phenyle_NNP or_CC Carbolic_NNP ._.
16_CD ._.
The_DT whole_JJ neighbourhood_NN of_IN the_DT house_NN should_MD be_VB thoroughly_RB cleaned_VBN up_RP and_CC all_DT rubbish_JJ burnt_NN ._.
17_CD ._.
Landlords_NNS should_MD be_VB encouraged_VBN to_TO lime-wash_VB their_PRP$ houses_NNS ,_, after_IN an_DT interval_NN of_IN 24_CD hours_NNS ,_, with_IN hot_JJ quick-lime_NN ._.
18_CD ._.
Where_WRB the_DT people_NNS are_VBP sent_VBN to_TO camp_VB with_IN their_PRP$ belongings_NNS the_DT disinfection_NN of_IN their_PRP$ kit_NN will_MD ordinarily_RB be_VB done_VBN in_IN camp_NN where_WRB the_DT same_JJ rules_NNS should_MD be_VB closely_RB followed_VBN ._.
19_CD ._.
The_DT disinfecting_JJ gangs_NNS should_MD be_VB for_IN Hindu_NNP houses_NNS ,_, Pardesi_NNP Brahmans_NNPS or_CC Marathas_NNP ,_, and_CC for_IN Mahomedan_NNP houses_NNS Mussalmans_NNPS ._.
In_IN the_DT Fort_NNP and_CC C_NNP Ward_NNP a_DT couple_NN of_IN Parsis_NN should_MD be_VB engaged_VBN to_TO disinfect_VB Parsi_NNP houses_NNS where_WRB deaths_NNS have_VBP occurred_VBN ._.
20_CD ._.
The_DT greatest_JJS care_NN should_MD be_VB taken_VBN to_TO avoid_VB all_DT unnecessary_JJ damage_NN ._.
21_CD ._.
The_DT District_NNP Officer_NNP or_CC his_PRP$ Assistant_NN or_CC the_DT Sectional_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP should_MD endeavour_VB to_TO be_VB present_JJ during_IN disinfection_NN ._.
22_CD ._.
Except_IN for_IN special_JJ reasons_NNS ,_, disinfection_NN should_MD always_RB be_VB begun_VBN within_IN 12_CD hours_NNS at_IN most_JJS of_IN hearing_VBG that_IN a_DT place_NN is_VBZ infected_VBN ._.
23_CD ._.
Carbolic_JJ powder_NN is_VBZ of_IN little_JJ value_NN except_IN as_IN a_DT deodorizer_NN ,_, and_CC its_PRP$ general_JJ use_NN should_MD be_VB discontinued_VBN ;_: it_PRP may_MD ,_, however_RB ,_, be_VB used_VBN where_WRB necessary_JJ to_TO overcome_VB offensive_JJ smells_NNS ._.
24_CD ._.
The_DT solution_NN of_IN Carbolic_NNP Acid_NNP for_IN soaking_VBG clothes_NNS in_IN should_MD be_VB prepared_VBN by_IN putting_VBG two_CD of_IN the_DT measuring_NN glasses_NNS ,_, now_RB supplied_VBN ,_, full_JJ of_IN the_DT acid_NN into_IN the_DT 21/2_CD gallon_NN bucket_NN of_IN water_NN and_CC stirring_VBG well_RB ,_, so_RB as_IN to_TO thoroughly_VB mix_NN ._.
The_DT mixture_NN should_MD be_VB stirred_VBN periodically_RB while_IN the_DT clothes_NNS are_VBP soaking_VBG ._.
Clothes_NNS should_MD be_VB loosely_RB placed_VBN in_IN the_DT solution_NN ,_, not_RB tightly_RB packed_VBN ,_, so_IN that_IN the_DT disinfectant_NN can_MD get_VB at_IN every_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT clothes_NNS ._.
When_WRB a_DT strong_JJ solution_NN of_IN carbolic_JJ acid_NN is_VBZ referred_VBN to_TO 3_CD cups_NNS full_JJ of_IN the_DT acid_NN should_MD be_VB added_VBN to_TO a_DT bucket_NN of_IN water_NN ._.
Care_NN in_IN every_DT case_NN should_MD be_VB taken_VBN to_TO thoroughly_VB mix_VB the_DT acid_NN in_IN the_DT water_NN ,_, as_IN if_IN oil_NN globules_NNS of_IN free_JJ acid_NNS are_VBP floating_VBG in_IN the_DT water_NN they_PRP will_MD burn_VB the_DT hands_NNS of_IN whoever_NN may_MD wring_VBG out_RP the_DT clothes_NNS ._.
If_IN the_DT hands_NNS are_VBP burnt_JJ with_IN the_DT Carbolic_NNP Acid_NNP the_DT acid_NN should_MD be_VB at_IN once_RB washed_VBN off_RP with_IN plenty_NN of_IN water_NN ,_, and_CC if_IN any_DT oil_NN ,_, grease_NN or_CC ghee_NN is_VBZ available_JJ it_PRP should_MD be_VB applied_VBN to_TO the_DT injured_JJ part_NN ._.
If_IN phenyle_NN is_VBZ used_VBN as_IN the_DT disinfectant_NN ,_, the_DT solution_NN for_IN disinfecting_VBG clothes_NNS should_MD be_VB prepared_VBN by_IN adding_VBG one_CD cup_NN full_JJ of_IN phenyle_NN to_TO a_DT bucket_NN of_IN water_NN ._.
The_DT strong_JJ solution_NN should_MD be_VB prepared_VBN by_IN adding_VBG two_CD cups_NNS full_JJ of_IN phenyle_NN to_TO a_DT bucket_NN of_IN water_NN ._.
Sterilizers_NNS ._.
At_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN two_CD steam_NN disinfectors_NNS were_VBD in_IN use_NN ,_, one_CD at_IN Modikhana_NNP and_CC one_CD at_IN Narielwadi_NNP ._.
They_PRP have_VBP been_VBN described_VBN at_IN pages_NNS 201_CD to_TO 203_CD of_IN Sir_NNP J._NNP Campbell_NNP 's_POS plague_JJ report_NN ._.
The_DT efficiency_NN of_IN these_DT two_CD disinfectors_NNS ,_, the_DT ``_`` Equifex_NNP ''_'' at_IN Modikhana_NNP and_CC the_DT ?_. 57_CD ``_`` Bowman_NNP ''_'' at_IN Narielwadi_NNP ,_, was_VBD investigated_VBN by_IN Dr._NNP Marsh_NNP in_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN April_NNP 1898_CD ._.
Regarding_VBG the_DT ``_`` Equifex_NNP ''_'' he_PRP concluded_VBD his_PRP$ remarks_NNS as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -_: ``_`` The_DT conditions_NNS under_IN which_WDT these_DT experiments_NNS were_VBD carried_VBN out_RP were_VBD such_JJ as_IN ``_`` include_VBP the_DT severest_JJS tests_NNS of_IN the_DT disinfecting_VBG action_NN and_CC penetrating_VBG power_NN of_IN steam_NN ``_`` through_IN bulky_NN articles_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT results_NNS obtained_VBD allow_IN of_IN the_DT conclusion_NN that_IN under_IN ``_`` ordinary_JJ conditions_NNS of_IN use_NN the_DT apparatus_NN at_IN the_DT Modikhana_NNP Camp_NNP would_MD prove_VB ``_`` efficient_JJ as_IN a_DT disinfector_NN ._. ''_''
Regarding_VBG the_DT ``_`` Bowman_NNP ''_'' sterilizer_NN he_PRP wrote_VBD :_: ``_`` The_DT process_NN of_IN disinfection_NN proved_VBN sufficient_JJ to_TO sterilize_VB not_RB only_RB the_DT compara-_JJ ``_`` tively_RB feebly_RB resisting_VBG plague_NN bacillus_NN ,_, but_CC also_RB the_DT more_RBR resistant_JJ hay_NN bacillus_NN and_CC ``_`` its_PRP$ spores_NNS ._.
I_PRP have_VBP the_DT honour_NN ,_, in_IN conclusion_NN ,_, to_TO state_NN that_IN I_PRP find_VBP the_DT '_'' Bowman_NNP '_POS ``_`` apparatus_NNS to_TO be_VB an_DT effective_JJ and_CC easily_RB managed_VBN disinfector_NN and_CC a_DT rapid_JJ and_CC reliable_JJ ``_`` drying_JJ machine_NN ._. ''_''
Another_DT disinfector_NN lent_NN by_IN Government_NNP was_VBD erected_VBN in_IN the_DT Byculla_NNP camp_NN ._.
This_DT was_VBD also_RB of_IN the_DT ``_`` Equifex_NNP ``_`` pattern_NN ._.
These_DT three_CD disin-_NN fectors_NNS were_VBD of_IN great_JJ use_NN to_TO the_DT districts_NNS ,_, camps_NNS and_CC hospitals_NNS in_IN their_PRP$ neighbourhood_NN ,_, and_CC large_JJ quantities_NNS of_IN clothing_NN were_VBD passed_VBN through_IN them_PRP ._.
Procedure_NN ._.
The_DT following_JJ note_NN by_IN Lieut_NNP ._.
Warneford_NNP indicates_VBZ the_DT regular_JJ procedure_NN in_IN C_NNP Ward_NNP in_IN the_DT matter_NN of_IN disinfection-other_JJ districts_NNS followed_VBD the_DT same_JJ general_JJ lines_NNS ._.
The_DT actual_JJ process_NN of_IN disinfection_NN ,_, where_WRB it_PRP differed_VBD from_IN ,_, has_VBZ now_RB been_VBN assimilated_VBN with_IN the_DT instructions_NNS laid_VBD down_RB in_IN the_DT above_NN quoted_VBD circular_JJ :_: Disinfection_NN has_VBZ been_VBN carried_VBN on_IN in_IN the_DT ward_NN on_IN a_DT uniform_JJ system_NN as_IN described_VBN below_IN ,_, and_CC while_IN carrying_VBG it_PRP out_RP thoroughly_RB ,_, every_DT endeavour_NN has_VBZ been_VBN made_VBN ,_, by_IN the_DT personal_JJ supervision_NN of_IN superior_JJ officers_NNS ,_, to_TO prevent_VB damage_NN or_CC other_JJ cause_NN for_IN complaint_NN ,_, and_CC especially_RB the_DT bribery_NN and_CC extortion_NN of_IN subordinates_NNS ,_, which_WDT may_MD be_VB considered_VBN one_CD of_IN the_DT greatest_JJS evils_NNS and_CC hardships_NNS to_TO which_WDT our_PRP$ plague_NN work_NN may_MD give_VB rise_NN ._.
The_DT District_NNP Officer_NNP or_CC an_DT Assistant_JJ District_NNP Officer_NNP went_VBD round_IN the_DT houses_NNS for_IN disinfection_NN every_DT afternoon_NN to_TO see_VB the_DT work_NN which_WDT had_VBD been_VBN already_RB executed_VBN in_IN the_DT morning_NN and_CC the_DT afternoon_NN 's_POS work_NN in_IN course_NN of_IN execution_NN ,_, and_CC this_DT supervision_NN kept_VBD a_DT sufficient_JJ check_NN on_IN subordinates_NNS so_RB long_RB as_IN the_DT amount_NN of_IN work_NN was_VBD small_JJ ,_, but_CC when_WRB the_DT present_JJ recrudescence_NN began_VBD in_IN January_NNP it_PRP was_VBD found_VBN essential_JJ to_TO have_VB a_DT trustworthy_JJ superior_JJ officer_NN to_TO superintend_VB disinfection_NN alone_RB ,_, and_CC I_PRP consider_VBP that_IN this_DT system_NN of_IN having_VBG a_DT superior_JJ officer_NN to_TO personally_RB superintend_VB disinfection_NN has_VBZ been_VBN the_DT means_NN not_RB only_RB of_IN carrying_VBG out_RP disinfection_NN much_RB more_RBR thoroughly_RB ,_, but_CC also_RB of_IN minimising_VBG the_DT possibility_NN of_IN hardship_NN and_CC complaint_NN ._.
The_DT routine_JJ ordinarily_RB observed_VBN in_IN this_DT ward_NN in_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT carrying_VBG out_IN of_IN disinfection_NN is_VBZ as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -_: When_WRB a_DT Sectional_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP has_VBZ enquired_VBN into_IN a_DT plague_JJ case_NN or_CC death_NN and_CC has_VBZ ascertained_VBN the_DT actual_JJ place_NN where_WRB the_DT case_NN used_VBN to_TO sleep_VB or_CC live_VB ,_, he_PRP returns_VBZ to_TO the_DT District_NNP Office_NNP and_CC enters_VBZ the_DT case_NN in_IN a_DT book_NN ._.
At_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN his_PRP$ making_VBG enquiries_NNS at_IN the_DT place_NN he_PRP is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO mark_VB the_DT actual_JJ rooms_NNS that_IN he_PRP wants_VBZ disin-_JJ fected_VBN with_IN charcoal_NN or_CC pencil_NN ,_, and_CC on_IN entering_VBG the_DT case_NN in_IN the_DT book_NN he_PRP must_MD give_VB the_DT number_NN of_IN rooms_NNS to_TO be_VB disinfected_VBN and_CC the_DT floor_NN that_IN they_PRP are_VBP on_IN ._.
A_DT disinfecting_VBG Sub-Inspector_NNP gives_VBZ out_RP the_DT work_NN from_IN the_DT book_NN to_TO each_DT muccadam_NN and_CC gang_NN and_CC he_PRP and_CC they_PRP are_VBP responsible_JJ that_IN ,_, unless_IN the_DT District_NNP Officer_NNP orders_NNS otherwise_RB ,_, 58_CD these_DT particular_JJ rooms_NNS are_VBP disinfected_VBN and_CC neither_DT more_RBR nor_CC less_RBR :_: on_IN the_DT arrival_NN of_IN the_DT muccadam_NN and_CC his_PRP$ gang_NN at_IN the_DT place_NN ,_, the_DT rooms_NNS ordered_VBN are_VBP disinfected_VBN as_IN laid_VBN down_RB in_IN the_DT circular_NN above_IN quoted_VBN ._.
All_DT houses_NNS were_VBD treated_VBN alike_RB whether_IN plague_NN cases_NNS had_VBD occurred_VBN or_CC whether_IN the_DT case_NN was_VBD only_RB suspicious_JJ ,_, but_CC in_IN the_DT latter_JJ case_NN ,_, especi-_JJ ally_NN in_IN the_DT Central_NNP District_NNP ,_, endeavours_NNS were_VBD made_VBN to_TO get_VB the_DT whole_JJ work_NN done_VBN in_IN one_CD day_NN so_RB as_IN to_TO put_VB the_DT people_NNS to_TO as_IN little_JJ inconvenience_NN as_IN possible_JJ ._.
Endeavours_NNS were_VBD also_RB made_VBN at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ to_TO disinfect_VB houses_NNS which_WDT owners_NNS had_VBD locked_VBN up_RP and_CC deserted_VBN ._.
The_DT desirability_NN of_IN this_DT was_VBD evidenced_VBN by_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN such_JJ houses_NNS where_WRB dead_JJ rats_NNS were_VBD found_VBN ._.
Captain_NNP Cuppage_NNP writes_VBZ :_: ``_`` Apart_RB from_IN the_DT disinfection_NN of_IN plague-infected_JJ houses_NNS or_CC rooms_NNS ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ the_DT ``_`` practice_NN in_IN C_NNP Ward_NNP to_TO open_VB and_CC thoroughly_VB disinfect_NN and_CC clean_JJ any_DT rooms_NNS ,_, shops_NNS ,_, ``_`` lofts_NNS or_CC dwellings_NNS of_IN any_DT kind_NN that_WDT have_VBP been_VBN untenanted_JJ or_CC unused_JJ and_CC closed_VBD up_RP ``_`` for_IN over_IN a_DT month_NN ._.
This_DT has_VBZ entailed_VBN very_RB heavy_JJ work_NN on_IN the_DT disinfecting_JJ staff_NN ;_: ``_`` and_CC at_IN the_DT commencement_NN the_DT people_NNS objected_VBD to_TO it_PRP ,_, but_CC patience_NN ,_, combined_VBN with_IN ``_`` firmness_NN ,_, justice_NN and_CC tact_NN ,_, gained_VBD the_DT day_NN ,_, and_CC there_EX is_VBZ now_RB little_JJ or_CC no_DT difficulty_NN ``_`` experienced_VBN in_IN carrying_VBG this_DT measure_NN out_RP ._.
I_PRP have_VBP known_VBN instances_NNS in_IN which_WDT on_IN the_DT ``_`` disinfecting_JJ staff_NN arriving_VBG at_IN a_DT house_NN of_IN this_DT kind_NN the_DT people_NNS have_VBP demurred_VBN ,_, but_CC ``_`` on_IN rats_NNS being_VBG found_VBN ,_, they_PRP themselves_PRP willingly_RB set_VBD to_TO and_CC assisted_VB our_PRP$ men_NNS in_IN ``_`` every_DT way_NN ._. ''_''
Difficulties_NNS were_VBD specially_RB experienced_VBN with_IN the_DT higher_JJR classes_NNS of_IN Mussulmans_NNPS ,_, with_IN Parsees_NNP ,_, Bhattias_NNP and_CC Bannyas_NNP in_IN the_DT matter_NN of_IN disinfection_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN the_DT Mussulmans_NNPS referred_VBD to_TO the_DT principal_NN difficulty_NN was_VBD when_WRB a_DT death_NN occurred_VBD ._.
For_IN 3_CD days_NNS after_IN ,_, during_IN the_DT performance_NN of_IN the_DT ziarat_NN ceremony_NN ,_, friends_NNS and_CC relations_NNS congre-_JJ gate_NN in_IN and_CC about_IN the_DT house_NN ,_, and_CC during_IN this_DT time_NN disinfection_NN is_VBZ practically_RB impossible_JJ ._.
The_DT difficulty_NN with_IN the_DT Parsees_NNP was_VBD very_RB much_RB the_DT same_JJ ,_, and_CC can_MD be_VB and_CC was_VBD got_VBN over_IN in_IN many_JJ instances_NNS ,_, thanks_NNS to_TO the_DT assistance_NN of_IN the_DT Secretary_NNP of_IN the_DT Parsee_NNP Punchayet_NNP ,_, by_IN using_VBG the_DT services_NNS of_IN Parsees_NNP to_TO disinfect_VB ._.
The_DT Bhattias_NNP and_CC Bannyas_NNP are_VBP specially_RB sensitive_JJ about_IN intrusion_NN upon_IN their_PRP$ rooms_NNS and_CC damage_NN to_TO their_PRP$ often_RB valuable_JJ belongings_NNS ,_, and_CC their_PRP$ objections_NNS could_MD only_RB be_VB overcome_VBN by_IN the_DT employment_NN of_IN Hindus_NNP of_IN good_JJ caste_NN and_CC the_DT exercise_NN of_IN great_JJ patience_NN ._.
In_IN all_DT districts_NNS every_DT endeavour_NN was_VBD made_VBN to_TO induce_VB the_DT owner_NN of_IN a_DT house_NN or_CC chawl_NN or_CC his_PRP$ agent_NN to_TO be_VB present_JJ while_IN disinfection_NN was_VBD going_VBG on_IN ,_, and_CC either_DT one_CD or_CC the_DT other_JJ generally_RB appeared_VBN ._.
In_IN some_DT cases_NNS ,_, however_RB ,_, they_PRP were_VBD unavoidably_RB absent_JJ or_CC persistently_RB refused_VBD to_TO come_VB ._.
On_IN these_DT occasions_NNS one_CD of_IN the_DT Volunteers_NNS or_CC two_CD or_CC three_CD respectable_JJ persons_NNS living_VBG in_IN the_DT vicinity_NN were_VBD called_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT work_NN was_VBD carried_VBN on_IN in_IN their_PRP$ presence_NN ._.
When_WRB a_DT door_NN had_VBD to_TO be_VB broken_VBN open_JJ it_PRP was_VBD the_DT practice_NN to_TO call_VB in_IN a_DT police_NN sepoy_NN to_TO see_VB that_IN no_DT property_NN was_VBD stolen_VBN ,_, and_CC in_IN C_NNP Ward_NNP when_WRB the_DT owner_NN was_VBD absent_JJ t_NN was_VBD usual_JJ to_TO have_VB all_DT members_NNS of_IN the_DT disinfecting_NN gangs_NNS searched_VBD 59_CD on_IN entering_VBG and_CC leaving_VBG the_DT house_NN ._.
If_IN the_DT owners_NNS were_VBD poor_JJ the_DT value_NN of_IN any_DT articles_NNS destroyed_VBN was_VBD assessed_VBN on_IN the_DT spot_NN and_CC compensation_NN paid_VBN ._.
These_DT measures_NNS were_VBD very_RB successful_JJ ,_, and_CC one_CD of_IN the_DT most_RBS gratifying_JJ features_NNS of_IN the_DT year_NN 's_POS work_NN has_VBZ been_VBN the_DT extreme_JJ rarity_NN of_IN complaints_NNS of_IN loss_NN or_CC damage_NN to_TO property_NN arising_VBG from_IN plague_NN measures_NNS ._.
In_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT few_JJ cases_NNS of_IN complaint_NN ,_, the_DT matter_NN was_VBD at_IN once_RB put_VBN in_IN the_DT hands_NNS of_IN the_DT police_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP was_VBD found_VBN that_IN a_DT by-stander_NN had_VBD entered_VBN the_DT house_NN while_IN it_PRP was_VBD being_VBG evacuated_VBN and_CC had_VBD rifled_VBN the_DT contents_NNS of_IN a_DT box_NN ._.
He_PRP was_VBD tracked_VBN down_RP ,_, tried_JJ and_CC convicted_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT property_NN restored_VBD to_TO the_DT owner_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT matter_NN of_IN ventilation_NN ,_, men_NNS were_VBD specially_RB employed_VBN to_TO remove_VB the_DT tiles_NNS in_IN strips_NNS from_IN the_DT roofs_NN of_IN infected_JJ houses_NNS and_CC of_IN all_DT houses_NNS in_IN infected_JJ localities_NNS ._.
Doors_NNS and_CC windows_NNS were_VBD invariably_RB left_VBN open_RP after_IN completion_NN of_IN disinfection_NN till_IN the_DT house_NN was_VBD re-occupied_JJ ,_, bamboo_JJ partitions_NNS were_VBD often_RB pulled_VBN down_RP and_CC holes_NNS occasionally_RB made_VBN in_IN walls_NNS where_WRB there_EX was_VBD no_DT other_JJ means_NNS of_IN admitting_VBG light_NN and_CC air_NN ;_: but_CC in_IN really_RB bad_JJ cases_NNS the_DT house_NN was_VBD reported_VBN to_TO the_DT Executive_NNP Engineer_NNP for_IN survey_NN ._.
The_DT work_NN done_VBN by_IN his_PRP$ department_NN in_IN the_DT matter_NN of_IN improv-_JJ ing_VBG the_DT buildings_NNS of_IN Bombay_NNP is_VBZ given_VBN in_IN his_PRP$ report_NN below_IN ._.
Improvement_NN and_CC demolition_NN of_IN insanitary_JJ buildings_NNS ._.

Stray_JJ cases_NNS in_IN other_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT city_NN were_VBD also_RB inspected_VBN when_WRB their_PRP$ improvement_NN was_VBD urgently_RB demanded_VBN ._.
Altogether_RB 2,553_CD houses_NNS were_VBD inspected_VBN during_IN the_DT year_NN under_IN review_NN ,_, of_IN which_WDT 2,178_CD houses_NNS were_VBD found_VBN more_RBR or_CC less_RBR in_IN need_NN of_IN improvement_NN ,_, 364_CD houses_NNS were_VBD found_VBN incapable_JJ of_IN improvement_NN and_CC fit_NN for_IN demolition_NN ,_, the_DT remaining_VBG being_VBG such_JJ as_IN not_RB to_TO require_VB any_DT improvement_NN ._.
In_IN all_DT 242_CD houses_NNS were_VBD actually_RB demolished_VBN during_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
Notices_NNS ._.
During_IN the_DT year_NN 2,182_CD notices_NNS were_VBD issued_VBN requiring_VBG the_DT house-owners_NNS to_TO improve_VB their_PRP$ buildings_NNS ,_, out_IN of_IN which_WDT the_DT owners_NNS of_IN 838_CD houses_NNS took_VBD the_DT work_NN of_IN improvement_NN in_IN hand_NN ,_, 714_CD houses_NNS had_VBD to_TO be_VB declared_VBN unfit_JJ for_IN human_JJ habitation_NN ,_, out_IN of_IN which_WDT 76_CD 60_CD houses_NNS were_VBD closed_VBN permanently_RB for_IN demolition_NN ,_, 350_CD temporarily_RB for_IN enforcing_VBG improvements_NNS in_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC 288_CD were_VBD declared_VBN unfit_JJ for_IN human_JJ habitation_NN to_TO allow_VB of_IN action_NN being_VBG taken_VBN for_IN the_DT immediate_JJ improvement_NN of_IN their_PRP$ ventilation_NN ._.

8,880_CD ._.
Rs_NNP ._.
2,989-6-7_JJ was_VBD paid_VBN by_IN way_NN of_IN compensation_NN during_IN the_DT year_NN for_IN huts_NNS and_CC sheds_NNS demolished_VBN under_IN Section_NNP 426_CD of_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP Act_NNP and_CC a_DT sum_NN amounting_VBG to_TO Rs_NNP ._.
1,154-1-5_JJ still_RB remains_VBZ to_TO be_VB paid_VBN owing_VBG to_TO the_DT owners_NNS not_RB having_VBG proved_VBN their_PRP$ title_NN to_TO receive_VB the_DT compensation_NN awarded_VBD to_TO them_PRP ._.
Abatement_NN of_IN overcrowding_VBG ._.
As_IN a_DT rule_NN the_DT residences_NNS of_IN the_DT poor_JJ classes_NNS of_IN the_DT communities_NNS are_VBP insanitary_JJ ,_, ill-ventilated_JJ and_CC damp_NN ._.
Many_JJ of_IN the_DT rooms_NNS have_VBP absolutely_RB no_DT light_JJ or_CC venti-_JJ lation_NN and_CC the_DT floors_NNS being_VBG low_JJ are_VBP generally_RB damp_JJ and_CC fruitful_JJ of_IN disease_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ sometimes_RB found_VBN that_IN ten_JJ people_NNS live_VBP in_IN a_DT room_NN hardly_RB sufficient_JJ for_IN one-fourth_JJ the_DT number_NN ._.
Attempts_NNS have_VBP been_VBN made_VBN to_TO abate_VB the_DT overcrowding_NN in_IN these_DT buildings_NNS ,_, but_CC without_IN much_JJ success_NN ,_, as_IN it_PRP was_VBD found_VBN that_IN the_DT rooms_NNS were_VBD re-occupied_JJ shortly_RB after_IN the_DT officers_NNS of_IN the_DT Municipality_NNP left_VBD the_DT scene_NN of_IN action_NN ._.
The_DT only_JJ remedy_NN is_VBZ to_TO increase_VB the_DT amount_NN of_IN house_NN accommodation_NN and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ hoped_VBN that_IN the_DT work_NN of_IN the_DT City_NNP Improvement_NNP Trust_NNP will_MD help_VB the_DT City_NNP in_IN this_DT matter_NN ._.
Only_RB one_CD Inspector_NNP was_VBD employed_VBN during_IN the_DT year_NN for_IN inspection_NN of_IN houses_NNS with_IN a_DT view_NN to_TO abate_VB the_DT overcrowding_NN ._.
This_DT work_NN is_VBZ ,_, as_IN stated_VBN above_IN ,_, difficult_JJ of_IN accomplishment_JJ owing_VBG to_TO insufficient_VB house_NN accommodation_NN for_IN the_DT poor_JJ ._.
The_DT overcrowding_NN was_VBD naturally_RB found_VBN only_RB in_IN chawls_NNS occupied_VBN by_IN the_DT poorest_JJS classes_NNS of_IN the_DT people_NNS ._.
Until_IN sufficient_JJ house_NN accommodation_NN suitable_JJ for_IN these_DT people_NNS is_VBZ provided_VBN ,_, the_DT effects_NNS of_IN overcrowding_VBG must_MD continue_VB ._.
Reduction_NN is_VBZ ,_, however_RB ,_, more_RBR rigidly_RB enforced_VBN in_IN cases_NNS where_WRB the_DT creation_NN or_CC spread_NN of_IN disease_NN is_VBZ apprehended_VBN ._.

Of_IN the_DT first_JJ 8_CD camps_NNS it_PRP may_MD be_VB noted_VBN that_IN that_DT at_IN Modykhana_NNP was_VBD practically_RB not_RB used_VBN for_IN purely_RB Municipal_JJ purposes-a_JJ portion_NN of_IN its_PRP$ area_NN had_VBD to_TO be_VB returned_VBN to_TO the_DT Port_NNP Trust_NNP authorities_NNS for_IN the_DT construction_NN of_IN kerosine_NN oil_NN sidings_NNS :_: about_IN half_NN of_IN it_PRP was_VBD made_VBN over_IN to_TO the_DT Port_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, when_WRB with_IN the_DT rise_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ it_PRP became_VBD necessary_JJ to_TO discontinue_VB the_DT use_NN of_IN the_DT Modykhana_NNP Hospital_NNP for_IN observation_NN cases_NNS detained_VBD at_IN the_DT Bandar_NNP :_: and_CC the_DT remainder_NN was_VBD eventually_RB made_VBN over_IN to_TO the_DT Parsee_NNP Panchayet_NNP for_IN use_NN as_IN a_DT hospital_NN and_CC segregation_NN camp_NN ._.
The_DT camps_NNS at_IN Sankli_NNP Street_NNP and_CC Victoria_NNP Bandar_NNP were_VBD occupied_VBN by_IN permanent_JJ residents_NNS and_CC were_VBD never_RB available_JJ for_IN evacuation_NN purposes_NNS ._.

The_DT question_NN of_IN providing_VBG ample_JJ camp_JJ accommodation_NN was_VBD receiv-_JJ ing_JJ attention_NN before_IN the_DT close_NN of_IN the_DT monsoon_NN ;_: and_CC a_DT great_JJ stimulus_NN was_VBD given_VBN to_TO this_DT work_NN by_IN G._NNP R._NNP 6294/6405-P_CD of_IN 17th_CD November_NNP 1898_CD ,_, communicat-_JJ ing_VBG the_DT generous_JJ grant_NN by_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP of_IN one_CD lakh_NN of_IN rupees_NNS for_IN expenditure_NN independently_RB of_IN the_DT Municipality_NNP on_IN plague_NN camps_NNS in_IN and_CC near_IN the_DT City_NNP ._.
The_DT marginally_RB noted_JJ public_JJ camps_NNS were_VBD erected_VBN and_CC rapidly_RB pushed_VBD forward_RB during_IN the_DT cold_JJ weather_NN ._.
The_DT Ellapa_NNP Balaram_NNP camp_NN was_VBD also_RB consi-_JJ derably_RB extended_VBN by_IN its_PRP$ generous_JJ founder_NN ._.
The_DT Vittal_NNP Sayana_NNP camp_NN also_RB owed_VBD its_PRP$ ori-_JJ gin_NN to_TO a_DT gentleman_NN of_IN that_DT name_NN ,_, who_WP put_VBD it_PRP up_RP in_IN the_DT first_JJ instance_NN entirely_RB at_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ expense_NN ._.
All_PDT the_DT other_JJ camps_NNS men-_NNS tioned_VBN were_VBD erected_VBN from_IN the_DT funds_NNS placed_VBN at_IN the_DT disposal_NN of_IN the_DT Commissioner_NNP by_IN the_DT Government_NNP ,_, an_DT account_NN of_IN which_WDT is_VBZ here_RB attached_VBN ._.
It_PRP will_MD be_VB seen_VBN that_IN this_DT fund_NN enabled_VBD the_DT Commissioner_NNP to_TO give_VB different_JJ communities_NNS assistance_NN in_IN the_DT erection_NN of_IN health_NN camps_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ ._.
