64_CD Sites_NNS for_IN Camps_NNP ._.
Ellapa_NNP Balaram_NNP ,_, Gilder_NNP Street_NNP ,_, Victoria_NNP Bandar_NNP ,_, Worli_NNP Pakhadi_NNP ,_, Umarkhari_NNP ,_, Grant_NNP Road_NNP ,_, Ghorupdeo_NNP ._.
Of_IN the_DT various_JJ camps_NNS that_WDT were_VBD erected_VBN ,_, those_DT marginally_RB noted_VBN were_VBD on_IN private_JJ land_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT first_JJ two_CD cases_NNS the_DT land_NN belongs_VBZ to_TO Mr._NNP Shivlal_NNP Motilal_NNP ,_, whose_WP$ great_JJ liberality_NN has_VBZ enabled_VBN the_DT Municipality_NNP to_TO occupy_VB it_PRP till_RB now_RB at_IN a_DT nominal_JJ rent_NN ._.
The_DT site_NN at_IN Victoria_NNP Bandar_NNP belongs_VBZ to_TO the_DT Colaba_NNP Land_NNP and_CC Mills_NNP Com-_NNP pany_NN ,_, and_CC thanks_NNS are_VBP due_JJ to_TO them_PRP for_IN permitting_VBG the_DT use_NN of_IN the_DT land_NN with-_NN out_IN payment_NN ._.
Land_NN at_IN Worli_NNP was_VBD generously_RB placed_VBN at_IN the_DT disposal_NN of_IN the_DT Municipality_NNP by_IN Khan_NNP Saheb_NNP Mahomed_NNP Ibrahim_NNP though_IN not_RB used_VBN ,_, and_CC no_DT rent_NN has_VBZ been_VBN asked_VBN for_IN by_IN Mr._NNP Dosabhoy_NNP Cooverji_NNP Doctor_NNP ,_, for_IN the_DT site_NN of_IN the_DT Jail_NNP Road_NNP camp_NN at_IN Umarkhari_NNP ,_, or_CC by_IN Mr._NNP Tribhuvandas_NNP Varjivandas_NNP ,_, and_CC Mr._NNP Kaitaun_NNP Bastansing_NNP for_IN the_DT sites_NNS of_IN two_CD small_JJ camps_NNS at_IN Worli_NNP ,_, Koliwada_NNP ._.
In_IN the_DT other_JJ cases_NNS rent_NN was_VBD fixed_VBN and_CC paid_VBN ._.
The_DT other_JJ camps_NNS were_VBD either_RB on_IN Municipal_NNP ,_, Government_NNP ,_, Port_NNP Trust_NNP or_CC Improvement_NNP Trust_NNP land_NN ._.
Government_NNP charged_VBD no_DT rent_NN ;_: the_DT Port_NNP Trust_NNP who_WP originally_RB charged_VBN full_JJ rates_NNS ,_, eventually_RB under_IN pressure_NN from_IN Government_NNP reduced_VBD their_PRP$ rents_NNS to_TO 3/16_CD of_IN the_DT ordinary_JJ rates_NNS :_: the_DT Improvement_NNP Trust_NNP allowed_VBD the_DT use_NN of_IN their_PRP$ property_NN rent_NN free_JJ ,_, but_CC where_WRB the_DT land_NN had_VBD been_VBN let_VBN out_RP to_TO cultivators_NNS ,_, the_DT Municipality_NNP had_VBD to_TO pay_VB them_PRP compensation_NN ._.
This_DT is_VBZ a_DT suitable_JJ point_NN at_IN which_WDT to_TO acknowledge_VB the_DT great_JJ public_JJ spirit_NN of_IN Sir_NNP Dinshaw_NNP Maneckji_NNP Petit_NNP ,_, who_WP has_VBZ now_RB for_IN more_JJR than_IN two_CD years_NNS ,_, allowed_VBD the_DT Plague_NNP Administration_NNP the_DT free_JJ use_NN of_IN the_DT large_JJ area_NN of_IN land_NN occupied_VBN by_IN extensions_NNS of_IN the_DT Maratha_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, and_CC of_IN Shet_NNP Haji_NNP Ahmed_NNP Nurani_NNP who_WP has_VBZ for_IN a_DT like_JJ period_NN allowed_VBD the_DT free_JJ use_NN of_IN the_DT land_NN occu-_JJ pied_VBN by_IN the_DT Sunni_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, Ripon_NNP Road_NNP ,_, and_CC during_IN the_DT year_NN gave_VBD an_DT additional_JJ piece_NN for_IN contact_NN sheds_NNS ._.
The_DT generous_JJ loan_NN by_IN Mr._NNP Mahomed_NNP Casum_NNP Kurtay_NNP of_IN his_PRP$ house_NN in_IN Ali_NNP Umar_NNP Street_NNP as_IN a_DT place_NN for_IN segregation_NN ,_, is_VBZ also_RB deserving_VBG of_IN special_JJ mention_NN ._.
Accommodation_NN for_IN contacts_NNS ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, at_IN Hospitals_NNP ._.
Great_NNP importance_NN was_VBD attached_VBN to_TO the_DT provision_NN of_IN suitable_JJ accom-_JJ modation_NN for_IN the_DT families_NNS of_IN patients_NNS in_IN close_JJ proximity_NN to_TO the_DT various_JJ hospitals_NNS :_: and_CC ,_, towards_IN the_DT close_NN of_IN the_DT monsoon_NN this_DT was_VBD arranged_VBN for_IN at_IN Modykhana_NNP by_IN the_DT erection_NN of_IN a_DT double_JJ row_NN of_IN huts_NNS ,_, with_IN accommo-_JJ dation_NN for_IN 48_CD persons_NNS ,_, just_RB outside_IN the_DT hospital_NN precincts_NNS ._.
At_IN the_DT Arthur_NNP Road_NNP Hospital_NNP no_DT dry_JJ ground_NN was_VBD available_JJ at_IN that_DT period_NN ,_, but_CC three_CD empty_JJ wards_NNS were_VBD converted_VBN to_TO the_DT purpose_NN in_IN question_NN ._.
Subsequently_RB when_WRB the_DT fair_JJ weather_NN set_VBN in_IN ,_, 50_CD rooms_NNS were_VBD erected_VBN on_IN low-lying_JJ ground_NN close_RB by_IN ._.
The_DT three_CD wards_NNS had_VBD to_TO be_VB re-converted_JJ to_TO hospital_JJ purposes_NNS ;_: but_CC two-_NNS of_IN them_PRP were_VBD again_RB made_VBN available_JJ for_IN the_DT friends_NNS and_CC relatives_NNS of_IN patients_NNS ,_, when_WRB at_IN the_DT close_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, the_DT approach_NN of_IN the_DT monsoon_NN necessitated_VBD the_DT demolition_NN of_IN the_DT huts_NNS on_IN the_DT low-lying_JJ ground_NN ._.
Huts_NNS were_VBD provided_VBN at_IN the_DT Mahommedan_NNP General_NNP Hospital_NNP when_WRB it_PRP was_VBD re-opened_JJ ._.
A_DT few_JJ huts_NNS were_VBD from_IN the_DT first_JJ available_JJ at_IN the_DT Sunni_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, but_CC these_DT were_VBD added_VBN to_TO during_IN the_DT year_NN under_IN report_NN ._.
Similar_JJ accommodation_NN was_VBD made_VBN avail-_JJ able_JJ near_IN the_DT Sarvajanik_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, Government_NNP House_NNP ,_, Parel_NNP ,_, at_IN the_DT Stuart_NNP Strong_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, Colaba_NNP ,_, and_CC at_IN the_DT Mahim_NNP Hospital_NNP constructed_VBD ?_. 65_CD at_IN the_DT close_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN ;_: the_DT desirability_NN of_IN these_DT arrangements_NNS was_VBD impressed_JJ upon_IN the_DT Managers_NNS at_IN the_DT various_JJ private_JJ hospitals_NNS ,_, and_CC prac-_JJ tically_RB all_PDT those_DT of_IN importance_NN either_CC erected_VBD huts_NNS close_RB by_IN ,_, or_CC set_VB aside_RB rooms_NNS ,_, or_CC engaged_VBD neighbouring_NN houses_NNS for_IN the_DT purpose_NN in_IN question_NN ._.
Private_JJ Camps_NNP ._.
The_DT various_JJ private_JJ camps_NNS in_IN the_DT City_NNP may_MD be_VB roughly_RB divided_VBN into_IN three_CD classes_NNS :_: -_: 1_CD ._.
Those_DT erected_VBN on_IN sites_NNS provided_VBN by_IN the_DT Municipality_NNP for_IN the_DT various_JJ communities_NNS along_IN the_DT Sea_NNP Face_NNP ,_, and_CC at_IN Cruik-_NNP shank_NN and_CC Frere_NNP Roads_NNP ._.
2_CD ._.
Those_DT erected_VBN on_IN private_JJ land_NN in_IN F._NNP and_CC G._NNP Wards_NNP in_IN the_DT North_NNP ._.
3_CD ._.
Municipal_JJ sites_NNS allotted_VBD to_TO private_JJ individuals_NNS on_IN the_DT Vincent_NNP Road_NNP in_IN the_DT North_NNP of_IN the_DT Island_NNP ._.
Private_JJ camps_NNS were_VBD erected_VBN to_TO a_DT very_RB much_JJ larger_JJR extent_NN than_IN ever_RB before_IN ,_, and_CC the_DT following_JJ account_NN of_IN a_DT Meeting_NN of_IN Representatives_NNS of_IN different_JJ castes_NNS of_IN the_DT Dakshani_NNP Hindu_NNP Community_NNP held_VBD on_IN 6th_CD Septem-_JJ ber_NN 1898_CD ,_, shows_VBZ how_WRB the_DT movement_NN originated_VBD ,_, and_CC gives_VBZ the_DT names_NNS of_IN the_DT gentlemen_NNS who_WP took_VBD a_DT special_JJ interest_NN in_IN its_PRP$ development_NN :_: -_: Proceedings_NNS of_IN a_DT Meeting_NN of_IN Representatives_NNS of_IN different_JJ Castes_NNS of_IN the_DT Dakshani_NNP Hindu_NNP Community_NNP ,_, held_VBD on_IN 6th_CD September_NNP 1898_CD ._.
A_DT preliminary_JJ meeting_NN of_IN representatives_NNS of_IN different_JJ castes_NNS of_IN the_DT Hindu_NNP community_NN was_VBD held_VBN in_IN Shankarsett_NNP House_NNP on_IN Tuesday_NNP ,_, the_DT 6th_CD September_NNP 1898_CD ,_, at_IN 5-30_JJ P.M._NNP ,_, to_TO consider_VB the_DT advisability_NN of_IN erecting_VBG health_NN camps_NNS for_IN those_DT castes_NNS ,_, in_IN view_NN of_IN the_DT apprehended_JJ recrudescence_NN of_IN plague_NN this_DT year_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO adopt_VB measures_NNS for_IN the_DT erection_NN of_IN such_JJ camps_NNS ._.
The_DT Honourable_NNP Dr._NNP Bhalchandra_NNP Krishna_NNP was_VBD called_VBN to_TO the_DT chair_NN on_IN the_DT motion_NN of_IN Rao_NNP Bahadur_NNP Wasudev_NNP Jagannath_NNP Kirtikar_NNP ,_, seconded_VBN by_IN Rao_NNP Bahadur_NNP Dhakji_NNP Kashinathji_NNP ._.
The_DT Chairman_NNP explained_VBD that_IN the_DT meeting_NN had_VBD been_VBN called_VBN at_IN the_DT suggestion_NN of_IN Mr._NNP W._NNP L._NNP Harvey_NNP ,_, I.C.S._NNP ,_, Acting_NNP Municipal_NNP Commissioner_NNP for_IN the_DT City_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, who_WP had_VBD conferred_VBN with_IN some_DT Members_NNS of_IN the_DT Corporation_NNP ,_, and_CC stated_VBD that_IN it_PRP was_VBD time_NN for_IN the_DT people_NNS of_IN different_JJ communities_NNS to_TO consider_VB the_DT advisability_NN of_IN constructing_VBG health_NN camps_NNS ,_, and_CC that_DT so_RB far_RB as_IN practicable_JJ he_PRP (_( the_DT Municipal_NNP Commissioner_NNP )_) would_MD help_VB them_PRP in_IN the_DT matter_NN of_IN suitable_JJ sites_NNS and_CC the_DT necessary_JJ sanitary_JJ and_CC other_JJ requirements_NNS such_JJ as_IN drainage_NN ,_, latrines_NNS ,_, water_NN and_CC lighting_NN ;_: that_IN the_DT arangements_NNS for_IN Marths_NNP ,_, Telugus_NNP ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, were_VBD entrusted_VBN to_TO other_JJ members_NNS ;_: and_CC that_IN this_DT meeting_NN had_VBD to_TO consider_VB the_DT measures_NNS for_IN certain_JJ castes_NNS whose_WP$ representatives_NNS had_VBD been_VBN called_VBN to_TO meet_VB there_EX that_DT day_NN ._.
The_DT Chairman_NNP said_VBD that_IN Mr._NNP Harvey_NNP 's_POS suggestion_NN was_VBD a_DT good_JJ one_CD ,_, and_CC that_IN it_PRP would_MD be_VB eminently_RB desirable_JJ to_TO accept_VB it_PRP as_RB soon_RB as_IN possible_JJ ._.
He_PRP farther_RB said_VBD that_IN the_DT Pathare_NNP Prabhu_NNP community_NN had_VBD already_RB begun_VBN work_NN in_IN this_DT direction_NN and_CC were_VBD obtain-_JJ ing_VBG the_DT requisite_JJ information_NN for_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ caste_NN ._.
In_IN answer_NN to_TO a_DT question_NN whether_IN the_DT Municipality_NNP would_MD also_RB supply_VB the_DT Police_NNP required_VBD to_TO guard_VB the_DT camps_NNS ,_, the_DT Chairman_NNP explained_VBD that_IN this_DT was_VBD a_DT matter_NN on_IN which_WDT the_DT Commissioner_NNP of_IN Police_NNP would_MD have_VB to_TO be_VB consulted_VBN ;_: and_CC that_IN if_IN a_DT representation_NN were_VBD made_VBN ,_, he_PRP thought_VBD the_DT Municipal_NNP and_CC Police_NNP Commissioners_NNP would_MD in_IN all_DT probability_NN be_VB willing_JJ to_TO meet_VB the_DT wishes_NNS of_IN the_DT people_NNS ._.
66_CD Rao_NNP Bahadurs_NNP Kirtikar_NNP and_CC Dhakji_NNP Kashinathji_NNP expressed_VBD their_PRP$ approval_NN of_IN what_WP the_DT Chairman_NNP said_VBD ._.
It_PRP was_VBD then_RB proposed_VBN by_IN Dr._NNP Shantaram_NNP Vithal_NNP and_CC seconded_VBN by_IN Rao_NNP Saheb_NNP Narayan_NNP Trimbak_NNP Vaidya_NNP ,_, that_IN a_DT Committee_NNP consisting_NN of_IN the_DT gentlemen_NNS named_VBN in_IN the_DT list_NN printed_VBD below_IN be_VB appointed_VBN ,_, with_IN power_NN to_TO add_VB to_TO their_PRP$ number_NN ,_, to_TO ascertain_VB how_WRB many_JJ members_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ respective_JJ castes_NNS would_MD be_VB willing_JJ to_TO remove_VB to_TO health_NN camps_NNS constructing_VBG sheds_NNS at_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ expense_NN ,_, and_CC what_WP sites_VBZ they_PRP would_MD consider_VB suitable_JJ for_IN the_DT purpose_NN ,_, so_IN that_DT steps_NNS may_MD be_VB taken_VBN to_TO secure_VB the_DT sites_NNS required_VBN ._.
This_DT proposition_NN was_VBD carried_VBN unanimously_RB ._.
Rao_NNP Bahadur_NNP W._NNP J._NNP Kirtikar_NNP proposed_VBD and_CC Mr._NNP Balkrishna_NNP V._NNP N._NNP Kirtikar_NNP seconded_VBD that-_JJ Rao_NNP Bahadur_NNP Dhakji_NNP Kashinathji_NNP ,_, Rao_NNP Saheb_NNP Narayan_NNP Trimbak_NNP Vaidya_NNP ,_, Mr._NNP Sundarnath_NNP D._NNP Khote_NNP ,_, and_CC Dr._NNP Dadoba_NNP Janardan_NNP Mantri_NNP ,_, be_VB appointed_VBN General_NNP Secretaries_NNPS ,_, and_CC that_IN they_PRP should_MD obtain_VB the_DT required_JJ information_NN from_IN the_DT Sub-Committees_NNP of_IN different_JJ castes_NNS ,_, consisting_VBG of_IN the_DT representa-_JJ tives_NNS of_IN those_DT castes_NNS on_IN the_DT General_NNP Committee_NNP and_CC any_DT other_JJ members_NNS of_IN the_DT caste_NN whose_WP$ names_NNS these_DT representatives_NNS may_MD consider_VB necessary_JJ to_TO add_VB to_TO their_PRP$ number_NN ._.
This_DT proposition_NN was_VBD also_RB carried_VBN unanimously_RB ._.
The_DT Chairman_NNP in_IN his_PRP$ concluding_VBG speech_NN requested_VBD the_DT representatives_NNS of_IN each_DT caste_NN to_TO immediately_RB proceed_VB to_TO form_VB themselves_PRP into_IN Sub-Committees_NNP and_CC to_TO collect_VB the_DT requisite_JJ information_NN as_RB early_RB as_IN possible_JJ ._.
Votes_NNS of_IN thanks_NNS to_TO the_DT Chairman_NNP for_IN his_PRP$ able_JJ conduct_NN in_IN the_DT chair_NN and_CC to_TO Mr._NNP Raoji_NNP V._NNP J._NNP Shankarsett_NNP for_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN his_PRP$ Hall_NN for_IN the_DT meeting_NN ,_, terminated_VBD the_DT proceedings_NNS ._.

The_DT Pathare_NNP Prabhu_NNP Camp_NNP was_VBD opened_VBN on_IN the_DT 4th_CD November_NNP 1898_CD ,_, with_IN accommodation_NN for_IN 325_CD persons_NNS ._.

The_DT public_JJ camps_NNS were_VBD made_VBN of_IN sheds_NNS constructed_VBN with_IN bamboo_JJ posts_NNS ,_, roofs_VBP either_DT of_IN double_JJ bamboo_NN matting_NN or_CC cadjans_NNS ,_, and_CC walls_NNS of_IN bamboo_NN matting_NN ._.

These_DT results_NNS could_MD not_RB have_VB been_VBN achieved_VBN without_IN the_DT most_RBS cordial_JJ and_CC loyal_JJ co-operation_NN of_IN the_DT Executive_NNP Engineer_NNP ,_, Khan_NNP Bahadur_NNP M._NNP C._NNP Murzban_NNP ,_, C.I.E._NNP ,_, and_CC Messrs._NNP James_NNP and_CC Fairlie_NNP Bruce_NNP ,_, in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT Drainage_NNP and_CC Water_NNP Works_NNP Departments_NNP ._.
This_DT opportunity_NN is_VBZ taken_VBN by_IN the_DT Commissioner_NNP of_IN recording_VBG his_PRP$ hearty_NN appreciation_NN of_IN their_PRP$ services_NNS ._.
A_DT special_JJ word_NN of_IN praise_NN is_VBZ due_JJ to_TO the_DT Architectural_NNP Surveyor_NNP ,_, Mr._NNP Govindram_NNP ,_, upon_IN whom_WP fell_VBD the_DT task_NN of_IN erection_NN of_IN almost_RB all_DT the_DT Munici-_NNP pal_NN camps_NNS and_CC hospitals_NNS ._.
The_DT segregation_NN of_IN those_DT persons_NNS who_WP from_IN contact_NN with_IN the_DT sick_NN are_VBP very_RB possibly_RB plague-stricken_JJ ,_, although_IN they_PRP have_VBP not_RB as_IN yet_RB manifested_VBN any_DT outward_NN symptoms_NNS ,_, has_VBZ long_RB been_VBN recognised_VBN as_IN an_DT important_JJ point_NN in_IN plague_JJ administration_NN ._.
Such_JJ persons_NNS are_VBP called_VBN contacts_NNS ._.
When_WRB the_DT recurrence_NN of_IN plague_NN has_VBZ proved_VBN a_DT house_NN or_CC locality_NN to_TO be_VB thoroughly_RB in-_JJ fected_VBD its_PRP$ vacation_NN is_VBZ one_CD of_IN the_DT few_JJ measures_NNS which_WDT popular_JJ opinion_NN ,_, educated_VBN by_IN individual_JJ experience_NN ,_, supports_NNS ._.
The_DT people_NNS turned_VBD out_RP are_VBP called_VBN evicts_NNS ._.
Camps_NNS are_VBP erected_VBN to_TO provide_VB accommodation_NN for_IN these_DT two_CD classes_NNS ._.
?_. 71_CD It_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN thought_VBN advisable_JJ in_IN the_DT past_NN to_TO keep_VB contacts_NNS entirely_RB separate_VBP from_IN all_DT other_JJ people_NNS :_: this_DT could_MD only_RB be_VB done_VBN by_IN stringent_JJ quarantine_JJ regulations_NNS ._.
They_PRP were_VBD enforced_VBN ,_, but_CC their_PRP$ stringency_NN defeated_VBD their_PRP$ object_NN ,_, and_CC practically_RB no_DT contacts_NNS could_MD be_VB found_VBN to_TO segregate_VB ._.
At_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN under_IN report_NN ,_, it_PRP was_VBD decided_VBN on_IN account_NN of_IN this_DT consideration_NN to_TO relax_VB these_DT quarantine_JJ regulations_NNS almost_RB entirely_RB ;_: and_CC practically_RB speaking_VBG contacts_NNS have_VBP been_VBN treated_VBN in_IN precisely_RB the_DT same_JJ way_NN as_IN evicts_NNS ._.
They_PRP have_VBP been_VBN more_RBR rigorously_RB disinfected_VBN ,_, they_PRP have_VBP been_VBN quartered_VBN in_IN a_DT separate_JJ portion_NN of_IN the_DT camp_NN ,_, and_CC district_NN officers_NNS have_VBP been_VBN impressed_VBN with_IN the_DT necessity_NN of_IN sending_VBG with_IN them_PRP their_PRP$ household_NN goods_NNS in_IN order_NN that_IN the_DT camp_NN master_NN may_MD have_VB some_DT control_NN over_IN them_PRP ._.
They_PRP were_VBD expected_VBN to_TO sleep_VB in_IN camp_NN ,_, and_CC roll-call_NN was_VBD held_VBN to_TO see_VB whether_IN they_PRP did_VBD so_RB ,_, but_CC during_IN the_DT day_NN they_PRP were_VBD allowed_VBN to_TO go_VB to_TO and_CC from_IN camp_NN with_IN absolute_JJ freedom_NN ._.
The_DT camp_NN master_NN had_VBD ramosis_NN to_TO assist_VB him_PRP ,_, and_CC almost_RB the_DT only_JJ check_NN upon_IN them_PRP was_VBD that_IN they_PRP were_VBD not_RB allowed_VBN to_TO take_VB away_RP their_PRP$ cooking_JJ pots_NNS and_CC furniture_NN till_VB their_PRP$ time_NN was_VBD up_RB ._.
In_IN almost_RB all_PDT the_DT few_JJ cases_NNS that_WDT were_VBD brought_VBN to_TO notice_NNS of_IN con-_JJ tacts_NNS leaving_VBG camp_NN ,_, i.e._FW ,_, failing_VBG to_TO sleep_VB there_RB ,_, without_IN permission_NN ,_, they_PRP were_VBD traced_VBN and_CC brought_VBN back_RB to_TO complete_VB their_PRP$ time_NN ._.
The_DT people_NNS in_IN camp_NN were_VBD kept_VBN under_IN close_JJ supervision_NN in_IN regard_NN to_TO their_PRP$ health_NN ;_: plague_NN when_WRB it_PRP occurred_VBD among_IN them_PRP was_VBD almost_RB always_RB detected_VBN in_IN its_PRP$ earliest_JJS stages_NNS ;_: the_DT patient_NN was_VBD at_IN once_RB sent_VBN off_RP to_TO hospital_NN ,_, his_PRP$ hut_JJ un-_JJ roofed_NN ,_, disinfected_VBN and_CC kept_VBD unoccupied_JJ for_IN at_IN least_JJS 10_CD days_NNS ;_: and_CC these_DT precautions_NNS were_VBD so_RB successful_JJ ,_, that_IN in_IN none_NN of_IN the_DT various_JJ Municipal_NNP camps_NNS ,_, crammed_VBN as_IN they_PRP were_VBD with_IN people_NNS from_IN the_DT most_RBS highly_RB infected_JJ locali-_JJ ties_NNS in_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, did_VBD plague_VB ever_RB appear_VBP in_IN epidemic_JJ form_NN :_: and_CC it_PRP hardly_RB ever_RB occurred_VBD that_IN there_EX was_VBD any_DT suspicion_NN that_IN one_CD person_NN might_MD have_VB got_VBN plague_NN from_IN another_DT in_IN camp_NN ._.
The_DT people_NNS in_IN camp_NN were_VBD allowed_VBN to_TO go_VB about_IN their_PRP$ ordinary_JJ avocations_NNS ;_: but_CC in_IN the_DT cases_NNS where_WRB ,_, owing_VBG to_TO the_DT sickness_NN of_IN the_DT bread-winner_NN ,_, the_DT distance_NN of_IN the_DT camp_NN from_IN the_DT place_NN of_IN work_NN ,_, or_CC other_JJ cause_NN ,_, the_DT occupants_NNS were_VBD distressed_VBN ,_, they_PRP were_VBD helped_VBN from_IN the_DT Discretional_NNP Relief_NNP Fund_NNP in_IN the_DT hands_NNS of_IN the_DT district_NN or_CC other_JJ officers_NNS ._.
The_DT same_JJ fund_NN bore_VBD the_DT expense_NN of_IN their_PRP$ removal_NN to_TO camp_VB ._.
Ordinarily_RB people_NNS were_VBD kept_VBN in_IN camp_NN for_IN 10_CD days_NNS ,_, but_CC when_WRB the_DT localities_NNS they_PRP came_VBD from_IN continued_VBN seriously_RB infected_VBN ,_, or_CC their_PRP$ houses_NNS were_VBD not_RB ready_JJ for_IN re-occupation_NN ,_, the_DT period_NN was_VBD extended_VBN ;_: and_CC ,_, on_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN ,_, when_WRB at_IN the_DT height_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ the_DT pressure_NN upon_IN the_DT available_JJ accommodation_NN became_VBD extreme_JJ ,_, the_DT officers_NNS in_IN charge_NN were_VBD authorised_VBN to_TO reduce_VB the_DT period_NN ,_, if_IN absolutely_RB necessary_JJ ,_, to_TO a_DT minimum_NN of_IN 3_CD days_NNS ._.
The_DT following_VBG further_JJ account_NN of_IN the_DT camps_NNS in_IN C_NNP Ward_NNP is_VBZ given_VBN by_IN Lieutenant_NNP Warneford_NNP :_: -_: ``_`` On_IN arrival_NN in_IN camp_NN the_DT people_NNS 's_POS clothes_NNS ,_, bedding_NN ,_, boxes_NNS and_CC other_JJ furniture_NN ``_`` were_VBD thoroughly_RB disinfected_VBN and_CC then_RB placed_VBN in_IN the_DT sun_NN ._.
This_DT disinfection_NN was_VBD ``_`` carried_VBN out_RP by_IN a_DT special_JJ gang_NN which_WDT went_VBD round_NN to_TO each_DT of_IN the_DT three_CD camps_NNS once_RB ``_`` a_DT day_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP was_VBD also_RB the_DT duty_NN of_IN this_DT gang_NN to_TO disinfect_VB all_DT huts_NNS in_IN the_DT camps_NNS that_IN ``_`` had_VBD been_VBN vacated_VBN on_IN the_DT discharge_NN of_IN their_PRP$ occupants_NNS ,_, so_IN that_IN the_DT huts_NNS might_MD be_VB ``_`` perfectly_RB clean_JJ and_CC healthy_JJ on_IN the_DT arrival_NN of_IN fresh_JJ occupants_NNS ._.
The_DT clothing_NN and_CC ?_. 72_CD ``_`` bedding_NN of_IN all_DT occupants_NNS of_IN the_DT camps_NNS was_VBD also_RB required_VBN to_TO be_VB spread_VBN in_IN the_DT sun_NN ``_`` daily_RB from_IN 11_CD a.m._NN to_TO 1_CD p.m_NN ._.
Contacts_NNS and_CC evicts_NNS were_VBD kept_VBN in_IN opposite_JJ quarters_NNS of_IN ``_`` the_DT camps_NNS ,_, and_CC every_DT resident_NN in_IN the_DT camp_NN was_VBD inspected_VBN daily_RB by_IN the_DT Visiting_NNP ``_`` Medical_NNP officer_NN ,_, who_WP also_RB specially_RB examined_VBN all_DT people_NNS newly_RB admitted_VBN or_CC who_WP were_VBD ``_`` to_TO be_VB discharged_VBN ._.
The_DT three_CD camps_NNS for_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN the_DT ward_NN were_VBD the_DT Gokuldas_NNP ``_`` Tejpal_NNP ,_, Charni_NNP Road_NNP and_CC Crawford_NNP Market_NNP ,_, and_CC they_PRP consisted_VBD of_IN altogether_RB ``_`` 950_CD huts_NNS ,_, accommodating_VBG about_IN 3,500_CD people_NNS ._.
They_PRP were_VBD completely_RB full_JJ om_IN ``_`` several_JJ occasions_NNS and_CC were_VBD of_IN the_DT greatest_JJS use_NN in_IN enabling_VBG us_PRP to_TO empty_VB infected_JJ ``_`` rooms_NNS or_CC houses_NNS ._.
Between_JJ September_NNP and_CC the_DT middle_NN of_IN May_NNP over_IN 300_CD complete_JJ ``_`` houses_NNS were_VBD vacated_VBN by_IN the_DT direct_JJ action_NN of_IN the_DT District_NNP Officer_NNP and_CC the_DT occupants_NNS ``_`` removed_VBN to_TO these_DT camps_NNS ,_, and_CC probably_RB more_RBR than_IN double_RB that_IN number_NN of_IN houses_NNS in-_JJ ``_`` habited_VBN by_IN persons_NNS of_IN the_DT higher_JJR classes_NNS were_VBD vacated_VBN voluntarily_RB by_IN their_PRP$ occu-_JJ ``_`` pants_NNS on_IN the_DT advice_NN or_CC persuasion_NN of_IN the_DT District_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, aided_VBN by_IN the_DT Volunteers._NNP ``_``
In_IN these_DT latter_JJ cases_NNS the_DT occupants_NNS were_VBD allowed_VBN to_TO go_VB where_WRB they_PRP wished_VBD ._. ''_''
The_DT above_JJ description_NN applies_NNS with_IN slight_JJ variations_NNS to_TO all_PDT the_DT other_JJ Municipal_NNP camps_NNS ._.
At_IN two_CD of_IN them-the_JJ Narielwadi_NNP and_CC Byculla_NNP camps_NNS ,_, the_DT process_NN of_IN disinfection_NN was_VBD greatly_RB facilitated_VBN by_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN the_DT Sterili-_JJ zers_NNS set_VBD up_RP in_IN them_PRP ._.
In_IN some_DT cases_NNS strong_JJ carbolic_JJ soap_NN or_CC phenyle_NN was_VBD given_VBN to_TO the_DT people_NNS to_TO wash_VB themselves_PRP with_IN ,_, and_CC sometimes_RB they_PRP were_VBD again_RB disinfected_VBN before_IN leaving_VBG camp_NN ._.
Blankets_NNS also_RB were_VBD served_VBN out_RP to_TO those_DT who_WP felt_VBD the_DT cold_NN ,_, being_VBG returned_VBN ,_, except_IN where_WRB the_DT people_NNS were_VBD extremely_RB poor_JJ ,_, when_WRB they_PRP left_VBD camp_NN ._.
In_IN a_DT few_JJ cases_NNS cots_NNS were_VBD supplied_VBN where_WRB the_DT ground_NN was_VBD damp_JJ and_CC the_DT inmates_NNS had_VBD none_NN of_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ ._.
A_DT careful_JJ register_NN was_VBD invariably_RB kept_VBN of_IN all_DT arrivals_NNS and_CC departures_NNS ,_, cases_NNS of_IN sickness_NN and_CC other_JJ particulars_NNS ._.
It_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN mentioned_VBN that_IN at_IN the_DT Julaha_NNP camp_NN ,_, Byculla_NNP ,_, a_DT shed_VBN for_IN prayer_NN and_CC accommodation_NN for_IN their_PRP$ handlooms_NNS was_VBD provided_VBN ._.
Every_DT consideration_NN was_VBD given_VBN to_TO their_PRP$ habits_NNS and_CC prejudices_NNS ,_, and_CC camp_JJ life_NN was_VBD made_VBN for_IN them_PRP as_RB comfortable_JJ as_IN possible_JJ ._.
The_DT popularity_NN of_IN this_DT camp_NN increased_VBD so_RB much_JJ ,_, that_IN when_WRB rats_NNS were_VBD dying_VBG or_CC plague_JJ cases_NNS occurring_VBG in_IN a_DT chawl_NN ,_, the_DT people_NNS themselves_PRP often_RB asked_VBD to_TO be_VB re-_JJ moved_VBN there_RB ._.
The_DT Julahas_NNP signified_VBD their_PRP$ approval_NN of_IN this_DT camp_NN by_IN chang-_JJ ing_VBG its_PRP$ designation_NN from_IN ``_`` Karanteen_NNP ''_'' to_TO ``_`` Karamteen_NNP ._. ''_''
The_DT word_NN ``_`` Karam_NNP ''_'' means_VBZ ``_`` kindness_JJ ''_'' ._.
People_NNS constantly_RB left_VBD the_DT various_JJ camps_NNS with_IN the_DT greatest_JJS reluctance_NN ._.
Applications_NNS from_IN outsiders_NNS for_IN permission_NN to_TO reside_VB in_IN them_PRP throughout_IN the_DT fair_JJ weather_NN at_IN any_DT reasonable_JJ rent_NN had_VBD over_IN and_CC over_RB again_RB to_TO be_VB refused_VBN ,_, and_CC one_CD of_IN the_DT greatest_JJS difficulties_NNS met_VBD with_IN in_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT management_NN of_IN camps_NNS was_VBD that_IN of_IN getting_VBG rid_JJ of_IN tenants_NNS who_WP had_VBD been_VBN permitted_VBN to_TO reside_VB in_IN some_DT of_IN them_PRP through_IN the_DT monsoon_NN on_IN payment_NN of_IN rent_NN ._.

It_PRP only_RB remains_VBZ to_TO mention_VB that_DT between_IN 1,000_CD and_CC 2,000_CD people_NNS in_IN E_NNP Ward_NNP erected_VBD huts_NNS in_IN convenient_NN open_JJ spaces_NNS for_IN themselves_PRP ,_, and_CC as_IN in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN the_DT huts_NNS in_IN F_NNP and_CC G_NNP Wards_NNP ,_, they_PRP were_VBD left_VBN to_TO themselves_PRP ._.

Plague_NN in_IN Camps_NNP ._.
The_DT following_JJ account_NN of_IN the_DT 3_CD Municipal_NNP camps_NNS in_IN C_NNP Ward_NNP is_VBZ given_VBN by_IN Dr._NNP P._NNP J._NNP de_IN Souza_NNP ,_, who_WP was_VBD appointed_VBN to_TO medically_RB supervise_VB them_PRP :_: -_: I_PRP was_VBD in_IN medical_JJ charge_NN of_IN the_DT Charni_NNP Road_NNP ,_, Goculdas_NNP Tejpal_NNP ,_, and_CC Crawford_NNP Market_NNP Camps_NNP from_IN February_NNP up_RB to_TO the_DT end_NN of_IN May_NNP 1899_CD and_CC during_IN that_DT time_NN I_PRP had_VBD frequent_JJ and_CC ample_JJ opportunity_NN of_IN noticing_VBG how_WRB they_PRP were_VBD managed_VBN ,_, and_CC to_TO what_WP extent_NN they_PRP fulfilled_VBD the_DT purpose_NN for_IN which_WDT they_PRP were_VBD erected_VBN ._.
Each_DT camp_NN consisted_VBN of_IN several_JJ rows_NNS of_IN huts_NNS ,_, each_DT row_NN containing_VBG on_IN an_DT average_JJ 3_CD blocks_NNS of_IN huts_NNS ,_, each_DT hut_NN ?_. 77_CD being_VBG about_IN 10_CD feet_NNS long_JJ and_CC 10_CD feet_NNS broad_JJ ._.
In_IN the_DT Crawford_NNP Market_NNP camp_NN ,_, the_DT space_NN between_IN the_DT rows_NNS of_IN huts_NNS was_VBD not_RB so_RB large_JJ as_IN in_IN the_DT other_JJ two_CD Camps_NNS and_CC might_MD have_VB been_VBN widened_VBN with_IN advantage_NN ._.
The_DT huts_NNS could_MD each_DT give_VB comfortable_JJ accommodation_NN to_TO about_IN 5_CD persons_NNS ,_, and_CC were_VBD light_JJ ,_, airy_JJ ,_, clean_JJ ,_, and_CC generally_RB sanitary_JJ ._.
The_DT water_NN and_CC conservancy_NN arrangements_NNS were_VBD adequate_JJ ,_, the_DT only_JJ complaints_NNS received_VBD being_VBG about_IN occasional_JJ bad_JJ smells_NNS from_IN the_DT latrines_NNS ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT Charni_NNP Road_NNP Camp_NNP also_RB from_IN the_DT cesspools_NNS ._.
Each_DT camp_NN was_VBD under_IN the_DT direct_JJ supervision_NN of_IN a_DT Camp_NNP Master_NNP ,_, who_WP had_VBD a_DT staff_NN of_IN subordinates_NNS and_CC servants_NNS under_IN him_PRP ._.
His_PRP$ duty_NN was_VBD principally_RB to_TO keep_VB a_DT register_NN of_IN arrivals_NNS and_CC departures_NNS ,_, and_CC to_TO go_VB round_RP the_DT camp_NN morning_NN ,_, noon_NN and_CC night_NN every_DT day_NN to_TO see_VB that_IN everything_NN was_VBD in_IN order_NN ._.
The_DT people_NNS who_WP occupied_VBD the_DT camps_NNS were_VBD divided_VBN into_IN 2_CD classes_NNS ;_: contacts_NNS and_CC evicts_NNS ._.
These_DT were_VBD sent_VBN in_IN by_IN the_DT Sectional_NNP Medical_NNP Officers_NNP ,_, in_IN charge_NN of_IN a_DT contact_NN Inspector_NNP ,_, On_IN arrival_NN at_IN the_DT camp_NN ,_, the_DT Camp_NNP Master_NNP took_VBD down_RB and_CC re-_JJ gistered_VBD the_DT names_NNS of_IN all_PDT the_DT persons_NNS ,_, and_CC then_RB assigned_VBD to_TO them_PRP the_DT huts_NNS in_IN which_WDT they_PRP were_VBD to_TO live_VB ._.
Their_PRP$ clothes_NNS and_CC belongings_NNS were_VBD thoroughly_RB disinfected_VBN and_CC personal_JJ cleanliness_NN was_VBD strictly_RB insisted_VBN on_IN ._.
Contacts_NNS and_CC evicts_NNS were_VBD kept_VBN in_IN sepa-_JJ rate_NN rows_NNS of_IN huts_NNS to_TO prevent_VB the_DT possibility_NN of_IN the_DT latter_JJ being_VBG infected_VBN by_IN the_DT former_JJ ._.
Contacts_NNS and_CC evicts_NNS alike_RB were_VBD detained_VBN in_IN camp_NN for_IN eleven_JJ days_NNS ,_, and_CC were_VBD generally_RB discharged_VBN on_IN the_DT 12th_CD ._.
An_DT exception_NN was_VBD made_VBN in_IN the_DT cases_NNS of_IN people_NNS whose_WP$ houses_NNS were_VBD not_RB ready_JJ to_TO receive_VB them_PRP back_RP ,_, or_CC when_WRB the_DT places_NNS in_IN which_WDT they_PRP usually_RB lived_VBD continued_VBN to_TO be_VB infected_VBN ._.
These_DT were_VBD allowed_VBN to_TO stay_VB on_IN ,_, and_CC such_JJ as_IN could_MD pay_VB were_VBD charged_VBN rent_NN for_IN the_DT period_NN of_IN their_PRP$ stay_NN in_IN excess_NN of_IN 15_CD days_NNS at_IN the_DT rate_NN of_IN Rs_NNP ._.
2_CD per_IN hut_NN per_IN mensem_NN ._.
Many_JJ found_VBD life_NN ``_`` in_IN camp_NN ''_'' so_RB desirable_JJ and_CC so_RB preferable_JJ to_TO their_PRP$ usual_JJ surroundings_NNS that_IN they_PRP begged_VBD to_TO be_VB allowed_VBN to_TO stay_VB for_IN longer_JJR periods_NNS ,_, offering_VBG to_TO pay_VB even_RB a_DT higher_JJR rental_NN than_IN the_DT nominal_JJ one_CD charged_VBN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD not_RB ,_, however_RB ,_, possible_JJ to_TO meet_VB the_DT wishes_NNS of_IN these_DT applicants_NNS as_IN the_DT camp_NN accommodation_NN was_VBD necessarily_RB limited_JJ and_CC room_NN had_VBD to_TO be_VB found_VBN or_CC made_VBN for_IN numerous_JJ fresh_JJ arrivals_NNS every_DT day_NN ._.
Some_DT plague_NN cases_NNS occurred_VBD in_IN the_DT 3_CD camps_NNS visited_VBN by_IN me_PRP ,_, and_CC full_JJ particulars_NNS of_IN these_DT ,_, as_RB far_RB as_IN possible_JJ ,_, were_VBD given_VBN in_IN my_PRP$ periodical_JJ reports_NNS to_TO the_DT District_NNP Plague_NNP office_NN of_IN the_DT C._NNP Ward_NNP ._.
A_DT careful_JJ consideration_NN of_IN these_DT cases_NNS seems_VBZ to_TO shew_VB that_DT in_IN most_JJS of_IN them-in_JJ almost_RB all_DT where_WRB the_DT previous_JJ ``_`` history_NN ''_'' of_IN the_DT patients_NNS could_MD be_VB traced-the_JJ source_NN of_IN infection_NN lay_NN outside_IN the_DT camp_NN ,_, either_RB in_IN their_PRP$ previous_JJ resi-_JJ dences_NNS or_CC surroundings_NNS ,_, or_CC in_IN the_DT places_NNS visited_VBN by_IN them_PRP for_IN purposes_NNS of_IN business_NN or_CC pleasure_NN during_IN the_DT time_NN they_PRP were_VBD residents_NNS of_IN the_DT camps_NNS ._.
The_DT majority_NN of_IN the_DT cases_NNS occurred_VBD among_IN low-class_NN Ghatees_NNP ,_, who_WP ,_, by_IN their_PRP$ habits_NNS and_CC mode_NN of_IN life_NN were_VBD much_RB less_JJR immune_JJ to_TO the_DT plague_NN infection_NN than_IN other_JJ classes_NNS ,_, and_CC who_WP ,_, when_WRB they_PRP caught_VBD the_DT disease_NN ,_, generally_RB had_VBD it_PRP in_IN a_DT more_RBR or_CC less_RBR virulent_JJ and_CC fatal_JJ form_NN ._.
I_PRP may_MD here_RB state_NN that_IN the_DT huts_NNS in_IN camp_NN in_IN which_WDT any_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN occurred_VBD ,_, were_VBD promptly_RB lime-washed_JJ and_CC disinfected_VBN ,_, and_CC afterwards_NNS kept_VBD vacant_JJ for_IN ten_JJ days_NNS at_IN least_JJS ._.
On_IN the_DT whole_NN it_PRP seems_VBZ to_TO me_PRP that_IN these_DT camps_NNS met_VBD a_DT great_JJ want_NN in_IN a_DT manner_NN that_WDT was_VBD altogether_RB satisfactory._JJ ``_``
Segregation_NN ''_'' lost_VBN much_RB of_IN its_PRP$ terrors_NNS for_IN the_DT people_NNS at_IN large_JJ when_WRB they_PRP saw_VBD that_DT ,_, as_RB far_RB as_IN the_DT camps_NNS went_VBD ,_, it_PRP only_RB meant_VBD a_DT short_JJ change_NN ,_, free_JJ of_IN cost_NN ,_, into_IN better_JJR ,_, livelier_JJR and_CC cleaner_JJR quarters_NNS ._.
In_IN the_DT camps_NNS they_PRP met_VBD with_IN most_JJS considerate_JJ treatment_NN and_CC were_VBD not_RB subjected_VBN to_TO any_DT irksome_JJ regulations_NNS ,_, and_CC they_PRP were_VBD free_JJ to_TO spend_VB the_DT day_NN time_NN where_WRB and_CC as_IN they_PRP pleased_VBD ._.
Better_RBR surround-_JJ ings_NNS soon_RB proved_VBD their_PRP$ value_NN in_IN the_DT much_RB reduced_VBN death-rate_NN ,_, for_IN though_IN the_DT inmates_NNS of_IN these_DT camps_NNS came_VBD from_IN all_DT parts_NNS of_IN Bombay_NNP and_CC spent_VBD all_DT day_NN in_IN various_JJ quarters_NNS of_IN the_DT city_NN ,_, nearly_RB all_DT highly_RB infected_JJ localities_NNS ,_, yet_RB the_DT percentage_NN of_IN deaths_NNS and_CC plague_NN cases_NNS in_IN the_DT camps_NNS was_VBD very_RB small_JJ ._.
These_DT camps_NNS also_RB helped_VBD to_TO improve_VB the_DT condition_NN of_IN the_DT localities_NNS from_IN which_WDT their_PRP$ inmates_NNS came_VBD ,_, by_IN relieving_VBG the_DT congestion_NN ?_. 78_CD in_IN thickly-populated_JJ districts_NNS ,_, by_IN allowing_VBG houses_NNS to_TO be_VB effectively_RB cleaned_VBN out_RP ,_, aired_VBD and_CC disinfected_VBD ,_, and_CC by_IN minimising_VBG in_IN them_PRP the_DT facilities_NNS for_IN the_DT spread_NN of_IN infection_NN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD also_RB noticeable_JJ that_IN the_DT general_JJ health_NN of_IN the_DT inmates_NNS was_VBD good_JJ ;_: remarkably_RB so_RB in_IN fact_NN ,_, if_IN we_PRP remember_VBP the_DT conditions_NNS under_IN which_WDT the_DT people_NNS had_VBD shifted_VBN into_IN these_DT quarters_NNS ,_, and_CC that_IN they_PRP had_VBD to_TO endure_VB certain_JJ discomforts_NNS inseparable_JJ from_IN sud-_JJ den_JJ change_NN from_IN a_DT regular_JJ residence_NN into_IN a_DT temporary_JJ one_CD ._.

5_CD ._.

On_IN the_DT 6th_CD February_NNP at_IN about_RB 11-30_CD ,_, while_IN on_IN my_PRP$ rounds_NNS ,_, I_PRP saw_VBD one_CD Govind_NNP Ramji_NNP sleeping_VBG in_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT huts_JJ No_NNP ._.
95_CD ,_, and_CC on_IN enquiring_NN was_VBD told_VBN by_IN him_PRP that_IN he_PRP had_VBD attended_VBN some_DT religious_JJ ceremony_NN at_IN Mahadeo_NNP Gully_NNP on_IN the_DT previous_JJ night_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN he_PRP was_VBD sleeping_VBG because_IN he_PRP had_VBD lost_VBN a_DT night_NN 's_POS rest_NN ._.
I_PRP could_MD find_VB no_DT suspicious_JJ symptoms_NNS ._.
On_IN the_DT 8th_CD I_PRP found_VBD at_IN noon_NN ,_, that_IN this_DT man_NN had_VBD suddenly_RB developed_VBN grave_VB symptoms_NNS such_JJ as_IN high_JJ fever_NN and_CC delirium_NN and_CC had_VBD died_VBN at_IN 11-30_JJ A.M._NNP From_IN the_DT suddenness_NN of_IN the_DT symptoms_NNS and_CC from_IN the_DT appearance_NN of_IN the_DT corpse_NN ,_, I_PRP should_MD say_VB the_DT cause_NN of_IN death_NN was_VBD plague_NN ,_, which_WDT he_PRP may_MD have_VB got_VBN at_IN the_DT religious_JJ ceremony_NN which_WDT he_PRP attended_VBD on_IN the_DT 5th_JJ ,_, as_IN his_PRP$ immediate_JJ surroundings_NNS at_IN the_DT Health_NNP Camp_NNP were_VBD clean_JJ ._.
6_CD ._.
Patient_NNP attacked_VBD 16_CD days_NNS after_IN arrival_NN ._.
This_DT woman_NN lost_VBD a_DT son_NN and_CC a_DT daughter_NN from_IN plague_NN 17_CD and_CC 4_CD days_NNS before_IN ,_, respectively_RB ._.
7_CD ._.
Patient_NNP attacked_VBD 19_CD days_NNS after_IN arrival_NN ._.
This_DT man_NN ,_, who_WP worked_VBD every_DT day_NN at_IN the_DT Byculla_NNP Educational_NNP Press_NNP ,_, was_VBD about_IN to_TO leave_VB for_IN his_PRP$ native_JJ country_NN ,_, but_CC suddenly_RB died_VBD of_IN plague_NN ._.
On_IN enquiries_NNS I_PRP find_VBP that_IN this_DT man_NN used_VBN to_TO conceal_VB himself_PRP in_IN the_DT privy_NN at_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN my_PRP$ visits_NNS ._.

?_. 80_CD 8_CD ._.
Patient_NNP attacked_VBD 22_CD days_NNS after_IN arrival_NN ._.
This_DT man_NN ,_, though_RB admitted_VBN here_RB on_IN the_DT 31st_CD January_NNP ,_, did_VBD not_RB live_VB in_IN the_DT huts_NNS ,_, but_CC with_IN some_DT tailors_NNS in_IN the_DT Army_NNP and_CC Navy_NNP Stores_NNPS godown_NN in_IN the_DT Fort_NNP ._.

Pinto_NNP probably_RB took_VBD the_DT infection_NN either_RB in_IN the_DT godown_NN or_CC in_IN his_PRP$ office_NN and_CC only_RB came_VBD to_TO the_DT Health_NNP Camp_NNP on_IN the_DT 19th_CD February_NNP ,_, when_WRB he_PRP felt_VBD unwell_NN ._.

9_CD ._.
Patient_NN attacked_VBD one_CD month_NN after_IN arrival_NN ._.

10_CD ._.
Patient_NN attacked_VBD one_CD month_NN and_CC 11_CD days_NNS after_IN arrival_NN ._.

She_PRP probably_RB caught_VBD the_DT disease_NN there_RB ,_, as_IN she_PRP returned_VBD to_TO the_DT camp_NN one_CD day_NN feeling_NN ill_NN with_IN strong_JJ fever_NN and_CC delirium-died_JJ the_DT next_JJ morning_NN at_IN about_RB 4_CD A.M._NNP 11_CD ._.

?_. 83_CD CHAPTER_NN VI_NNP ._.
Discretional_JJ Relief_NNP ._.
Discretional_JJ Relief_NNP Fund_NNP ._.
On_IN 17th_CD November_NNP 1898_CD Government_NNP in_IN their_PRP$ Resohltion_NN \ill\_IN made_VBN known_NN that_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP had_VBD sanctioned_VBN a_DT grant_NN for_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP of_IN 3_CD lakhs_NN of_IN rupees_NNS for_IN expenditure_NN on_IN ``_`` Discretional_JJ Relief_NN ''_'' to_TO be_VB incurred_VBN in_IN the_DT form_NN of_IN grants_NNS placed_VBN at_IN the_DT disposal_NN of_IN selected_VBN officers_NNS under_IN the_DT authority_NN of_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
Of_IN this_DT amount_NN one_CD and-a-half_NN lakhs_NN were_VBD reserved_VBN provision-_JJ ally_NN for_IN the_DT City_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
Government_NNP Resolution_NNP \ill\_NNP General_NNP Department_NNP (_( Plague_NNP )_) ,_, dated_VBD 14th_CD November_NNP 1898_CD ,_, a_DT copy_NN of_IN which_WDT is_VBZ here_RB inserted_VBN ,_, indicates_VBZ the_DT objects_NNS with_IN which_WDT this_DT Fund_NN was_VBD constituted_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT rules_NNS laid_VBP down_RP for_IN its_PRP$ administration_NN ._.
Plague.-_JJ Finance_NNP ._.
Grant_NN of_IN Discretional_NNP Relief_NNP Funds_NNS ._.
General_NNP Department_NNP (_( Plague_NNP )_) ._.
Bombay_NNP Castle_NNP ,_, No_NNP ._.
6230/6328-P_JJ 14th_CD November_NNP 1898_CD ._.
RESOLUTION_NNP OF_NNP GOVERNMENT_NNP ._.
With_IN a_DT view_NN to_TO encourage_VB the_DT prompt_JJ reporting_NN of_IN cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN and_CC to_TO facilitate_VB and_CC popularise_VB as_RB far_RB as_IN possible_JJ the_DT measures_NNS undertaken_VBN with_IN the_DT object_NN of_IN reducing_VBG mortality_NN during_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ ,_, Government_NNP are_VBP desirous_JJ of-_JJ (_( 1_CD )_) making_VBG the_DT hospitals_NNS attractive_JJ ,_, (_( 2_CD )_) removing_VBG the_DT minor_JJ discomforts_NNS and_CC losses_NNS attendant_VBP upon_IN measures_NNS of_IN disinfection_NN ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, and_CC (_( 3_CD )_) removing_VBG the_DT objections_NNS to_TO temporary_JJ removal_NN from_IN an_DT infected_JJ house_NN or_CC locality_NN ._.
2_CD ._.
If_IN there_EX is_VBZ any_DT dislike_NN or_CC distrust_NN of_IN hospitals_NNS ,_, cases_NNS will_MD be_VB concealed_VBN and_CC opposition_NN to_TO removal_VB will_MD revive_VB ._.
Large_JJ numbers_NNS of_IN hospitals_NNS have_VBP been_VBN opened_VBN both_DT by_IN local_JJ authorities_NNS and_CC by_IN caste_NN committees_NNS ,_, and_CC most_JJS of_IN them_PRP have_VBP been_VBN well_RB maintained_VBN ,_, but_CC at_IN present_JJ some_DT lack_VBP those_DT attractions_NNS which_WDT would_MD cause_VB patients_NNS and_CC their_PRP$ friends_NNS to_TO regard_VB them_PRP with_IN gratitude_NN ._.
As_IN the_DT severity_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ increases_NNS ,_, the_DT strain_NN on_IN the_DT benevolence_NN of_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT poorer_NN communities_NNS intensifies_NNS ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ unnecessary_JJ here_RB to_TO enumerate_VB the_DT ways_NNS in_IN which_WDT the_DT sufferings_NNS of_IN the_DT poor_JJ may_MD be_VB mitigated_VBN ,_, but_CC some_DT may_MD be_VB mentioned_VBN ,_, as_IN for_IN example_NN ,_, the_DT provision_NN of_IN extra_JJ rations_NNS before_IN discharge_NN ,_, the_DT gift_NN of_IN clothing_NN or_CC small_JJ sums_NNS of_IN money_NN on_IN discharge_NN ,_, the_DT payment_NN of_IN funeral_JJ expenses_NNS ,_, the_DT support_NN of_IN the_DT family_NN where_WRB necessary_JJ ,_, during_IN illness_NN or_CC interruption_NN of_IN ordinary_JJ avocations_NNS ,_, assistance_NN to_TO survivors_NNS or_CC convalescents_NNS to_TO return_VB to_TO their_PRP$ homes_NNS ,_, and_CC so_RB forth_JJ ._.
The_DT popularity_NN of_IN hospitals_NNS will_MD be_VB enhanced_VBN by_IN fairly_RB generous_JJ treatment_NN of_IN the_DT sick_NN and_CC their_PRP$ relations_NNS ._.
Occasionally_RB it_PRP may_MD be_VB useful_JJ to_TO engage_VB or_CC subsidise_VB popular_JJ hakims_NNS or_CC native_JJ practitioners_NNS to_TO attend_VB the_DT hospitals_NNS ._.
No_DT person_NN who_WP objects_VBZ should_MD be_VB compelled_VBN to_TO take_VB medicines_NNS ._.
It_PRP will_MD be_VB found_VBN sufficient_JJ to_TO publish_VB the_DT results_NNS in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN persons_NNS who_WP have_VBP accepted_VBN and_CC persons_NNS who_WP have_VBP refused_VBN treatment_NN ._.
84_CD 3_CD ._.
Concealment_NN of_IN cases_NNS is_VBZ also_RB practised_VBN in_IN order_NN to_TO avoid_VB the_DT inconveniences_NNS and_CC petty_JJ expenses_NNS of_IN disinfection_NN ,_, destruction_NN of_IN clothing_NN ,_, &_CC c._NN Here_RB also_RB much_JJ can_MD be_VB done_VBN to_TO remove_VB the_DT objections_NNS of_IN the_DT poor_JJ and_CC to_TO gain_VB at_IN least_JJS their_PRP$ acquies-_JJ cence_NN ._.
Government_NNP fear_NN that_IN too_RB little_JJ attention_NN has_VBZ been_VBN given_VBN to_TO the_DT payment_NN of_IN prompt_JJ compensation_NN and_CC to_TO the_DT grant_NN of_IN a_DT trifling_VBG sum_NN to_TO cover_VB ,_, in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN the_DT working_NN classes_NNS ,_, the_DT petty_NN expenses_NNS incidental_VBP to_TO a_DT temporary_JJ vacation_NN of_IN the_DT house_NN ._.
Compensation_NN for_IN articles_NNS destroyed_VBN or_CC damaged_VBN must_MD be_VB paid_VBN by_IN the_DT officer_NN on_IN the_DT spot_NN and_CC may_MD be_VB calculated_VBN not_RB only_RB with_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT value_NN of_IN the_DT article_NN ,_, but_CC also_RB with_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT cost_NN of_IN replacing_VBG it_PRP ._.
4.The_CD objections_NNS to_TO the_DT temporary_JJ removal_NN to_TO a_DT camp_NN are_VBP usually_RB of_IN a_DT similar_JJ nature_NN ._.
The_DT removal_NN involves_VBZ interruption_NN to_TO work_VB or_CC the_DT loss_NN of_IN wages_NNS or_CC exposure_NN of_IN children_NNS to_TO cold_VB ,_, or_CC expenses_NNS of_IN transit_NN ,_, and_CC so_RB forth_JJ ._.
This_DT is_VBZ particularly_RB the_DT case_NN with_IN weavers_NNS ._.
The_DT officer_NN must_MD make_VB careful_JJ inquiry_NN in_IN each_DT case_NN and_CC use_VB his_PRP$ discretion_NN how_WRB far_RB to_TO afford_VB relief_NN ._.
5_CD ._.
The_DT class_NN of_IN expenditure_NN which_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN indicated_VBN in_IN the_DT foregoing_JJ para-_JJ graphs_NN may_MD be_VB described_VBN as_IN Discretional_JJ Relief_NNP ._.
The_DT Plague_NNP Commissioner_NNP ,_, subject_JJ to_TO the_DT sanction_NN of_IN Government_NNP ,_, will_MD place_VB distinct_JJ sums_NNS from_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN at_IN the_DT disposal_NN of_IN particular_JJ officers_NNS ,_, Civil_NNP or_CC Military_NNP ._.
The_DT officer_NN concerned_VBN will_MD report_VB weekly_RB the_DT amount_NN spent_NN and_CC the_DT place_NN where_WRB he_PRP has_VBZ spent_VBN it_PRP ,_, and_CC the_DT countersignature_NN of_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Commissioner_NNP will_MD be_VB accepted_VBN by_IN the_DT Accountant-General_NNP as_IN a_DT sufficient_JJ voucher_NN for_IN the_DT expenditure_NN ._.
Subject_JJ to_TO the_DT sanction_NN of_IN Government_NNP in_IN each_DT case_NN ,_, the_DT Plague_NNP Commissioner_NNP may_MD also_RB subsidise_VB any_DT hospital_NN which_WDT he_PRP is_VBZ satisfied_JJ is_VBZ in_IN need_NN of_IN such_JJ assistance_NN ._.
6_CD ._.
In_IN Bombay_NNP City_NNP the_DT Plague_NNP Commissioner_NNP is_VBZ authorized_VBN to_TO place_VB a_DT sum_NN at_IN the_DT disposal_NN of_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP Commissioner_NNP and_CC elsewhere_RB at_IN the_DT disposal_NN of_IN the_DT Col-_NNP lector_NN of_IN the_DT District_NNP where_WRB such_JJ assistance_NN appears_VBZ to_TO the_DT Plague_NNP Commissioner_NNP to_TO be_VB necessary_JJ ._.
This_DT money_NN must_MD be_VB regarded_VBN as_IN quite_RB distinct_JJ from_IN advances_NNS or_CC grants_NNS made_VBN on_IN account_NN of_IN ordinary_JJ plague_NN charges_NNS ,_, and_CC no_DT funds_NNS held_VBD on_IN the_DT one_CD account_NN should_MD under_IN any_DT circumstances_NNS be_VB used_VBN for_IN expenditure_NN on_IN the_DT other_JJ ._.
No_DT officer_NN to_TO whom_WP a_DT grant_NN has_VBZ been_VBN made_VBN for_IN plague_JJ expenditure_NN generally_RB is_VBZ on_IN any_DT account_NN permitted_VBD to_TO disburse_VB from_IN it_PRP sums_VBD properly_RB debitable_JJ to_TO Discretional_NNP Relief_NNP ,_, and_CC no_DT outlay_NN on_IN Discretional_NNP Relief_NNP is_VBZ to_TO be_VB incurred_VBN from_IN Government_NNP funds_NNS under_IN any_DT circumstances_NNS without_IN a_DT prior_JJ grant_NN having_VBG been_VBN sanctioned_VBN by_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Com-_NNP missioner_NN ._.
The_DT names_NNS of_IN the_DT officers_NNS entrusted_VBD with_IN advances_NNS for_IN Discretional_NNP Relief_NNP and_CC the_DT amount_NN of_IN each_DT advance_NN must_MD be_VB approved_VBN by_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Commissioner_NNP ._.
The_DT sums_NNS advanced_VBD will_MD be_VB taken_VBN into_IN consideration_NN in_IN determining_VBG the_DT proportion_NN of_IN plague_NN expenditure_NN to_TO be_VB borne_VBN by_IN Government_NNP and_CC the_DT amount_NN of_IN aid_NN to_TO be_VB given_VBN to_TO Local_NNP Bodies_NNP when_WRB the_DT accounts_NNS are_VBP finally_RB adjusted_VBN ._.
7_CD ._.
For_IN the_DT due_JJ control_NN of_IN this_DT expenditure_NN the_DT Circular_NNP and_CC Forms_NNP appended_VBD to_TO this_DT Resolution_NNP ,_, which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN prepared_VBN by_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP Commissioner_NNP ,_, Bombay_NNP ,_, and_CC which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN modified_VBN to_TO suit_VB requirements_NNS elsewhere_RB ,_, are_VBP approved_VBN ._.
The_DT Forms_NNS have_VBP been_VBN made_VBN as_RB simple_JJ as_IN possible_JJ with_IN a_DT view_NN to_TO minimise_VB the_DT labour_NN involved_VBN to_TO the_DT officers_NNS concerned_VBN while_IN maintaining_VBG a_DT record_NN of_IN all_PDT that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ necessary_JJ to_TO know_VB ._.
The_DT account_NN of_IN the_DT Deputy_NNP Commissioner_NNP for_IN Plague_NNP Operations_NNP in_IN Bombay_NNP with_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Commissioner_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT District_NNP Officers_NNP '_POS accounts_NNS with_IN the_DT Deputy_NNP Commissioner_NNP ,_, will_MD be_VB kept_VBN up_RP in_IN the_DT Chief_NNP Accountant_NNP 's_POS Office_NNP in_IN ordinary_JJ account_NN form_NN ._.
Elsewhere_RB those_DT accounts_NNS will_MD be_VB kept_VBN by_IN the_DT Huzur_NNP Deputy_NNP Collector_NNP ._.
A_DT receipt_NN must_MD be_VB given_VBN by_IN every_DT officer_NN for_IN each_DT sum_NN advanced_VBD to_TO him_PRP ._.
The_DT Plague_NNP Commissioner_NNP will_MD inform_VB the_DT Accountant-General_NNP of_IN every_DT ?_. 85_CD advance_NN made_VBN by_IN him_PRP and_CC the_DT names_NNS of_IN those_DT authorized_VBN to_TO receive_VB advances_NNS and_CC the_DT amount_NN of_IN the_DT advance_NN allotted_VBN in_IN each_DT case_NN ._.
The_DT Plague_NNP Commissioner_NNP will_MD forward_VB weekly_RB to_TO the_DT Accountant-General_JJ one_CD copy_NN of_IN Form_NNP C_NNP with_IN his_PRP$ countersignature_NN ,_, which_WDT will_MD be_VB the_DT voucher_NN for_IN the_DT expenditure_NN ._.
8_CD ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ not_RB intended_VBN that_IN the_DT necessarily_RB very_RB limited_JJ allotment_NN available_JJ for_IN Discretional_NNP Relief_NNP should_MD replace_VB or_CC dry_VB up_RP private_JJ charity_NN ._.
On_IN the_DT contrary_JJ it_PRP is_VBZ hoped_VBN that_IN these_DT instructions_NNS will_MD stimulate_VB many_JJ to_TO come_VB forward_RB to_TO supple-_JJ ment_NN the_DT sums_NNS placed_VBN at_IN the_DT disposal_NN of_IN Officers_NNP ._.
It_PRP will_MD prove_VB convenient_NN that_IN any_DT officer_NN applying_VBG for_IN an_DT advance_NN for_IN Discretional_NNP Relief_NNP should_MD state_NN the_DT amount_NN and_CC the_DT principal_JJ objects_NNS for_IN which_WDT he_PRP requires_VBZ it_PRP and_CC how_WRB long_RB he_PRP thinks_VBZ it_PRP will_MD last_JJ ._.
Experience_NN has_VBZ shown_VBN that_IN even_RB small_JJ sums_NNS judiciously_RB expended_VBN are_VBP greatly_RB appreciated_VBN ._.
The_DT Deputy_NNP Commissioner_NNP in_IN Bombay_NNP and_CC elsewhere_RB the_DT Collector_NN of_IN the_DT District_NNP will_MD promptly_RB caution_VB any_DT officer_NN whose_WP$ expenditure_NN appears_VBZ to_TO be_VB unduly_RB heavy_JJ ,_, and_CC will_MD take_VB early_JJ steps_NNS to_TO satisfy_VB himself_PRP whether_IN the_DT distress_NN or_CC the_DT circumstances_NNS are_VBP so_RB exceptional_JJ as_IN to_TO justify_VB the_DT expenditure_NN ,_, and_CC whether_IN the_DT discretion_NN is_VBZ being_VBG wisely_RB exercised_VBN ._.
9_CD ._.
A_DT copy_NN of_IN this_DT Resolution_NNP should_MD be_VB furnished_VBN to_TO the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP in_IN compliance_NN with_IN the_DT request_NN conveyed_VBN in_IN paragraph_NN 2_CD of_IN their_PRP$ letter_NN No_DT ._.
4547-A._JJ ,_, dated_VBD the_DT 15th_CD October_NNP 1898_CD ,_, Finance_NNP and_CC Commerce_NNP Department_NNP ._.
A._NN WINGATE_NNP ,_, Acting_NNP Chief_NNP Secretary_NNP to_TO Government_NNP ._.
Circular_NNP ._.
Small_JJ advances_NNS will_MD be_VB placed_VBN by_IN the_DT Deputy_NNP Commissioner_NNP ._.
Plague_NNP Operations_NNP ,_, Bombay_NNP Collector_NNP '_POS at_IN the_DT disposal_NN of_IN certain_JJ officers_NNS for_IN discretional_JJ relief_NN in_IN cases_NNS of_IN distress_NN ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, connected_VBN with_IN plague_NN ._.
This_DT money_NN must_MD be_VB regarded_VBN as_IN quite_RB distinct_JJ from_IN advances_NNS or_CC grants_NNS made_VBN on_IN account_NN of_IN ordinary_JJ plague_NN charges_NNS and_CC no_DT funds_NNS held_VBD on_IN the_DT one_CD account_NN should_MD under_IN any_DT circumstances_NNS be_VB used_VBN for_IN expenditure_NN on_IN the_DT other_JJ ._.
There_EX must_MD be_VB no_DT outlay_NN whatever_RB without_IN a_DT prior_JJ grant_NN having_VBG been_VBN sanctioned_VBN by_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Commissioner_NNP ._.
2_CD ._.
Officers_NNS will_MD themselves_PRP learn_VB by_IN experience_NN in_IN what_WP direction_NN this_DT relief_NN should_MD be_VB afforded_VBN and_CC they_PRP should_MD freely_RB report_VB for_IN orders_NNS or_CC for_IN information_NN any_DT instance_NN requiring_VBG relief_NN not_RB enumerated_VBN below_IN ,_, but_CC as_IN a_DT general_JJ guide_NN the_DT following_VBG are_VBP indicated_VBN ,_, provided_VBN always_RB that_IN the_DT relief_NN is_VBZ intended_VBN for_IN the_DT poor_JJ and_CC the_DT poor_JJ only_RB :_: -_: (_( a_DT )_) Hospital_NN Relief_NN ._.
(_( 1_CD )_) The_DT provision_NN of_IN extra_JJ rations_NNS before_IN discharge_NN ._.

Collector_NN ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) The_DT gift_NN of_IN clothing_NN or_CC small_JJ sums_NNS of_IN money_NN on_IN discharge_NN ._.

86_CD (_( 6_CD )_) Compensation_NN ._.

(_( c_NN )_) Camps_NNP ._.

3_CD ._.
For_IN each_DT advance_NN received_VBD the_DT officer_NN will_MD furnish_VB a_DT receipt_NN ._.
No_DT vouchers_NNS will_MD be_VB required_VBN from_IN the_DT officers_NNS to_TO whom_WP advances_NNS from_IN this_DT Discretional_NNP Belief_NNP Fund_NNP are_VBP made_VBN ,_, except_IN in_IN case_NN of_IN purchase_NN of_IN supplies_NNS ,_, blankets_NNS ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, from_IN trades-_JJ men_NNS ,_, when_WRB the_DT receipts_NNS must_MD be_VB attached_VBN to_TO the_DT weekly_JJ return_NN ._.
They_PRP will_MD ,_, however_RB ,_, be_VB personally_RB responsible_JJ that_IN the_DT money_NN is_VBZ properly_RB expended_VBN and_CC that_IN the_DT accounts_NNS are_VBP correctly_RB and_CC punctually_RB submitted_VBN ._.
4_CD ._.
It_PRP may_MD be_VB impossible_JJ for_IN the_DT officer_NN entrusted_VBD with_IN an_DT advance_NN to_TO be_VB promptly_RB on_IN the_DT spot_NN in_IN every_DT case_NN where_WRB relief_NN is_VBZ desirable_JJ ,_, and_CC these_DT officers_NNS are_VBP therefore_RB authorized_VBN to_TO entrust_VB small_JJ sums_NNS to_TO those_DT of_IN their_PRP$ volunteers_NNS and_CC those_DT of_IN their_PRP$ assistants_NNS in_IN whose_WP$ integrity_NN and_CC discretion_NN they_PRP feel_VBP that_IN they_PRP are_VBP able_JJ to_TO repose_VB complete_JJ confidence_NN ._.
But_CC such_JJ advances_NNS must_MD not_RB appear_VB in_IN the_DT accounts_NNS and_CC the_DT officer_NN making_VBG the_DT advance_NN must_MD exact_VB from_IN such_JJ persons_NNS a_DT careful_JJ record_NN of_IN the_DT information_NN necessary_JJ to_TO complete_VB the_DT accounts_NNS in_IN the_DT prescribed_JJ form_NN ,_, and_CC any_DT balance_NN remaining_VBG with_IN such_JJ persons_NNS should_MD appear_VB in_IN the_DT accounts_NNS in_IN the_DT balance_NN remaining_VBG in_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ hands_NNS ,_, and_CC he_PRP must_MD be_VB ready_JJ to_TO hold_VB himself_PRP per-_JJ sonally_RB responsible_JJ for_IN it_PRP ._.
Each_DT person_NN so_RB entrusted_VBN by_IN the_DT officer_NN must_MD keep_VB the_DT same_JJ cash_NN book_NN and_CC details_NNS as_IN the_DT officer_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT officer_NN must_MD keep_VB a_DT record_NN of_IN any_DT sums_NNS so_RB entrusted_JJ ._.
5_CD ._.

*_RB 6_CD ._.

1,686_CD 2_CD 9_CD 90_CD 91_CD The_DT relief_NN of_IN distress_NN in_IN the_DT principal_JJ public_JJ hospitals_NNS was_VBD primarily_RB undertaken_VBN by_IN Professor_NNP O._NNP V._NNP Muller_NNP ;_: he_PRP was_VBD subsequently_RB assisted_VBN by_IN Mr._NNP V._NNP N._NNP Mandlik_NNP and_CC on_IN their_PRP$ departure_NN ,_, Mr._NNP G._NNP Lund_NNP undertook_VBD the_DT work_NN at_IN the_DT Maratha_NNP and_CC Arthur_NNP Road_NNP Hospitals_NNP ,_, the_DT Rev_NNP ._.
R._NNP M._NNP Gray_NNP and_CC subsequently_RB the_DT District_NNP Officer_NNP ._.
A_DT Ward_NNP ,_, that_WDT at_IN the_DT Modikhana_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT District_NNP Officers_NNP concerned_VBD that_IN at_IN the_DT other_JJ hospitals_NNS ._.
The_DT nature_NN of_IN the_DT work_NN done_VBN is_VBZ described_VBN in_IN Professor_NNP O._NNP V._NNP Muller_NNP 's_POS interesting_JJ report_NN which_WDT is_VBZ given_VBN in_IN full_JJ below_NN :_: -_: Report_NN on_IN my_PRP$ work_NN as_IN Official_NNP Plague_NNP Hospital_NNP Visitor_NNP in_IN Bombay_NNP City_NNP From_NNP November_NNP 1st_CD ,_, 1898_CD ,_, to_TO April_NNP 1st_CD ,_, 1899_CD ._.
Professor_NNP Muller_NNP 's_POS Report_NNP ._.
In_IN October_NNP 1898_CD I_PRP was_VBD asked_VBN by_IN Mr._NNP (_( now_RB Sir_NNP Andrew_NNP )_) Wingate_NNP ,_, Chief_NNP Secretary_NNP to_TO Government_NNP and_CC Plague_NNP Commissioner_NNP ,_, if_IN I_PRP were_VBD willing_JJ to_TO undertake_VB the_DT distribution_NN of_IN a_DT Relief_NNP Fund_NNP offered_VBN by_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP for_IN the_DT popularising_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN hospitals_NNS in_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
I_PRP ,_, thereupon_NN ,_, offered_VBN my_PRP$ services_NNS as_RB far_RB as_IN my_PRP$ college_NN work_NN would_MD allow_VB ._.
Work_NN easy_JJ i_JJ n_JJ November_NNP ;_: cases_NNS few_JJ ._.
I_PRP at_IN once_RB began_VBD visiting_VBG the_DT plague_NN hospitals_NNS and_CC enquiring_VBG into_IN the_DT circum-_JJ stances_NNS and_CC wants_VBZ of_IN each_DT patient_NN ._.
I_PRP thus_RB visited_VBD every_DT morning_NN the_DT Arthur_NNP Road_NNP ,_, Modikhana_NNP and_CC Mahomedan_NNP General_NNP Hospitals_NNP und_NN later_RB on_IN the_DT Julai_NNP Hospital_NNP of_IN Ripon_NNP Road_NNP ._.
The_DT patients_NNS were_VBD few_JJ in_IN November-7_NNP or_CC 8_CD only_RB in_IN the_DT Arthur_NNP Road_NNP Hospital-and_NNP the_DT type_NN was_VBD mild_JJ ,_, so_IN most_JJS cases_NNS lingered_VBD long_RB or_CC recovered_VBN ,_, and_CC thus_RB gave_VBD me_PRP time_NN to_TO help_VB ._.
I_PRP made_VBD the_DT persona_JJ ]_NNP acquaintance_NN of_IN ,_, learnt_VBD the_DT family_NN history_NN ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, of_IN all_PDT the_DT 30_CD or_CC 40_CD plague_NN cases_NNS in_IN these_DT hospitals_NNS and_CC aided_VBD them_PRP by_IN means_NNS of_IN the_DT Relief_NNP Fund_NNP in_IN various_JJ ways_NNS ._.
Methods_NNS of_IN relief_NN ._.
Fetching_VBG friends_NNS ._.
Sending_VBG convales-_JJ cents_NNS to_TO their_PRP$ homes_NNS in_IN the_DT country_NN ,_, &_CC c._NN Thus_RB ,_, if_IN any_DT patient_NN had_VBD no_DT friends_NNS visiting_VBG him_PRP ,_, I_PRP fetched_VBD to_TO the_DT hospital_NN any_DT relative_JJ living_NN in_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, or_CC ,_, if_IN from_IN up-country_NN ,_, I_PRP wrote_VBD to_TO his_PRP$ friends_NNS ,_, with_IN the_DT result_NN that_IN these_DT latter_JJ often_RB came_VBD to_TO Bombay_NNP to_TO nurse_VB their_PRP$ sick_JJ relations_NNS ._.
The_DT Fund_NNP paid_VBD for_IN their_PRP$ passage_NN down_RB ,_, provided_VBD them_PRP with_IN means_NNS of_IN support_NN and_CC often_RB sent_VBD them_PRP back_RP again_RB when_WRB the_DT patient_NN either_RB recovered_VBD or_CC died_VBD ._.
The_DT patient_NN when_WRB convalescent_NN was_VBD also_RB sent_VBN to_TO his_PRP$ home_NN in_IN the_DT country_NN if_IN he_PRP desired_VBD to_TO go_VB ._.
Most_JJS Bombay_JJ labourers_NNS come_VBP from_IN the_DT inland_NN villages_NNS ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ very_RB noticeable_JJ how_WRB large_JJ a_DT percentage_NN of_IN cases_NNS in_IN the_DT hospitals_NNS are_VBP new_JJ coiners_NNS ,_, chiefly_NN from_IN Ahmednagar_NNP ,_, Satara_NNP and_CC Ratnagiri_NNP Collectorates_NNP ,_, who_WP have_VBP been_VBN in_IN this_DT city_NN from_IN six_CD months_NNS to_TO a_DT few_JJ days_NNS only_RB ._.
Examples_NNS ._.
To_TO quote_VB a_DT few_JJ examples-_JJ Hassan_NNP Mohidin_NNP ,_, aged_VBD 3_CD 5_CD ,_, was_VBD admitted_VBN to_TO Arthur_NNP Road_NNP on_IN 25th_CD September_NNP 1898_CD and_CC recovered_VBD ._.
He_PRP was_VBD very_RB thin_JJ and_CC miserable_JJ ,_, and_CC so_RB when_WRB the_DT doctor_NN allowed_VBD he_PRP was_VBD supplied_VBN ,_, at_IN the_DT cost_NN of_IN the_DT Fund_NNP ,_, with_IN extra_JJ rations_NNS ._.
He_PRP was_VBD u_JJ domestic_JJ servant_NN ,_, on_IN Rs_NNP ._.
3_CD per_IN mensem_NN ,_, to_TO a_DT small_JJ grain_NN dealer_NN in_IN Dongri_NNP ._.
His_PRP$ father_NN was_VBD dead_JJ ,_, but_CC I_PRP discovered_VBD that_IN his_PRP$ mother_NN ,_, a_DT firewood_NN seller_NN ,_, lived_VBD at_IN Kalyan_NNP ._.
I_PRP wrote_VBD to_TO her_PRP$ ,_, and_CC finally_RB ,_, when_WRB her_PRP$ son_NN was_VBD discharged_VBN strong_JJ and_CC well_RB on_IN 10th_CD December_NNP 1898_CD ,_, he_PRP was_VBD sent_VBN home_NN with_IN Rs_NNP ._.
2-8-0_JJ in_IN his_PRP$ pocket_NN ,_, I_PRP seeing_VBG him_PRP off_RP in_IN person_NN ._.
Sonu_NNP Rama_NNP ,_, P._NNP malee_NN ,_, aged_VBD 30_CD ,_, was_VBD admitted_VBN to_TO the_DT Arthur_NNP Road_NNP on_IN 26th_CD November_NNP 1898_CD ._.
He_PRP had_VBD no_DT friends_NNS in_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, at_IN his_PRP$ request_NN I_PRP wrote_VBD to_TO his_PRP$ brothers_NNS in_IN Ratnagiri_NNP and_CC told_VBD them_PRP of_IN Sonu_NNP 's_POS sickness_NN ._.
One_CD brother_NN immediately_RB borrowed_VBD means_NNS and_CC came_VBD to_TO Bombay_NNP and_CC nursed_VBD his_PRP$ sick_JJ brother_NN ._.
When_WRB his_PRP$ means_NNS were_VBD exhausted_VBN ,_, he_PRP was_VBD helped_VBN from_IN the_DT Fund_NNP ,_, and_CC when_WRB Sonu_NNP died_VBD ,_, 15th_CD December_NNP 1898_CD ,_, the_DT brother_NN was_VBD sent_VBN home_NN with_IN a_DT few_JJ rupees_NNS to_TO start_VB with_IN again_RB ._.
92_CD Government_NNP Resolution_NNP ,_, 14th_CD November_NNP ._.
On_IN November_NNP 14th_CD ,_, a_DT Government_NNP Resolution_NNP laid_VBD down_RB certain_JJ rules_NNS and_CC directions_NNS for_IN the_DT distribution_NN of_IN the_DT Relief_NNP Fund_NNP which_WDT were_VBD as_IN under_IN :_: -_: (_( 1_CD )_) The_DT provision_NN of_IN extra_JJ rations_NNS before_IN discharge_NN ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) The_DT gift_NN of_IN clothing_NN or_CC small_JJ sums_NNS of_IN money_NN on_IN discharge_NN ._.
(_( 3_CD )_) The_DT payment_NN of_IN funeral_JJ expenses_NNS ._.
(_( 4_CD )_) The_DT support_NN of_IN a_DT family_NN ,_, where_WRB necessary_JJ ,_, during_IN illness_NN or_CC inter-_JJ ruptions_NNS of_IN ordinary_JJ avocations_NNS while_IN in_IN hospital_NN or_CC hospital_NN camp_NN ._.
(_( 5_CD )_) Assistance_NN to_TO survivors_NNS or_CC convalescents_NNS to_TO return_VB to_TO their_PRP$ own_JJ homes_NNS ._.
The_DT methods_NNS thus_RB suggested_VBN were_VBD followed_VBN by_IN me_PRP in_IN addition_NN to_TO many_JJ other_JJ little_JJ ways_NNS of_IN giving_VBG help_NN ._.
In_IN short_JJ ,_, by_IN means_NNS of_IN the_DT Fund_NNP I_PRP played_VBD the_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN patient_NN 's_POS friend_NN ._.
The_DT mere_JJ fact_NN that_IN an_DT officer_NN was_VBD being_VBG deputed_VBN to_TO visit_VB the_DT sick_NN ,_, pleased_VBD the_DT sufferers_NNS and_CC their_PRP$ relatives_NNS ,_, and_CC since_IN the_DT officer_NN wa_NN &_CC provided_VBN by_IN Government_NNP with_IN ample_JJ funds_NNS to_TO relieve_VB distress_NN ,_, he_PRP was_VBD doubly_RB welcome_JJ ._.
Thus_RB ,_, Abdool_NNP Rayman_NNP ,_, 18_CD ,_, was_VBD the_DT son_NN of_IN respectable_JJ parents_NNS in_IN Cawnpore_NNP ._.
His_PRP$ step-mother_NN was_VBD cruel_VBN to_TO him_PRP and_CC so_RB he_PRP ran_VBD away_RB from_IN home_NN and_CC made_VBD his_PRP$ way_NN to_TO Bombay_NNP where_WRB he_PRP hoped_VBD to_TO make_VB a_DT name_NN and_CC fortune_NN ._.
He_PRP caught_VBD the_DT plague_NN and_CC was_VBD taken_VBN to_TO the_DT Mahomedan_NNP General_NNP Hospital_NNP ._.
When_WRB discharged_VBD he_PRP was_VBD weak_JJ ,_, penniless_NN and_CC friendless_NN ._.
So_IN the_DT Fund_NNP provided_VBD him_PRP with_IN Rs_NNP ._.
4_CD to_TO live_VB on_IN till_NN he_PRP could_MD obtain_VB means_NNS from_IN his_PRP$ father_NN to_TO return_VB home_NN ._.
Appointed_VBN Official_NNP Plague_NNP Hospital_NNP Visitor_NNP ._.
On_IN December_NNP 3rd_CD ,_, my_PRP$ position_NN was_VBD made_VBN more_RBR regular_JJ by_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP Commissioner_NNP appointing_VBG me_PRP to_TO be_VB Official_NNP Plague_NNP Hospital_NNP Visitor_NNP ._.
I_PRP was_VBD requested_VBN to_TO consult_VB Lieut.-Colonel_NNP Wilkins_NNP ,_, I._NNP M._NNP S._NNP ,_, the_DT Special_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP for_IN Plague_NNP Operations_NNP ,_, and_CC to_TO look_VB after_IN the_DT wants_VBZ of_IN the_DT patients_NNS in-_JJ (_( 1_CD )_) The_DT Arthur_NNP Road_NNP ;_: (_( 2_CD )_) the_DT Julai_NNP Hospital_NNP in_IN the_DT Ripon_NNP Road_NNP ;_: (_( 3_CD )_) the_DT General_NNP Mahomedan_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, Northbrook_NNP Garden_NNP ;_: (_( 4_CD )_) the_DT Modikhana_NNP Hospital_NNP ._.
Any_DT other_JJ hospital-_JJ and_CC there_EX were_VBD a_DT great_JJ many_JJ 'private_POS ones-might_JJ be_VB added_VBN to_TO this_DT list_NN by_IN me_PRP if_IN their_PRP$ Managing_NN Committees_NNS desired_VBD it_PRP ._.
I_PRP very_RB soon_RB ,_, by_IN request_NN ,_, took_VBD over_RP the_DT relief_NN work_NN at_IN (_( 5_CD )_) the_DT Maratha_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, and_CC I_PRP have_VBP visited_VBN occasionally_RB (_( 6_CD )_) the_DT Beni-Israel_NNP ,_, (_( 7_CD )_) the_DT Jain_NNP Hospital_NNP and_CC (_( 8_CD )_) the_DT Khatri_NNP Memon_NNP Hospital_NNP ._.
Nos_NNP ._.
1_CD to_TO 5_CD have_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, been_VBN my_PRP$ special_JJ charge_NN in_IN which_WDT I_PRP have_VBP ,_, as_IN ordered_VBN ,_, organized_VBD a_DT regular_JJ system_NN of_IN relief_NN worked_VBN on_IN the_DT lines_NNS described_VBN below_IN ._.
This_DT system_NN has_VBZ gradually_RB been_VBN elaborated_VBN as_IN necessity_NN ,_, demanded_VBD and_CC as_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN patients_NNS in_IN hospitals_NNS increased_VBD ._.
The_DT five_CD hospitals_NNS mentioned_VBN above_IN lie_NN scattered_VBN over_IN the_DT town_NN ,_, so_IN I_PRP visit-_VBP ed_VBG them_PRP in_IN turn_NN on_IN a_DT bicycle_NN ,_, devoting_VBG from_IN 6_CD A.M._NNP to_TO 10_CD A.M._NNP daily_RB to_TO this_DT work_NN ._.
While_IN the_DT patients_NNS were_VBD few_JJ I_PRP visited_VBD each_DT hospital_NN daily_RB ,_, saw_VBD each_DT patient_NN and_CC gathered_VBD all_DT sorts_NNS of_IN information_NN about_IN the_DT sick_NN and_CC their_PRP$ friends_NNS and_CC relieved_VBD their_PRP$ distress_NN from_IN the_DT coffers_NNS of_IN the_DT Relief_NNP Fund_NNP ._.
Powers_NNS ._.
Powers.-Owing_NN to_TO my_PRP$ visiting_VBG the_DT hospitals_NNS before_IN the_DT doctors_NNS went_VBD their_PRP$ rounds_NNS ,_, all_PDT the_DT hospitals_NNS were_VBD ordered_VBN to_TO give_VB me_PRP 24_CD hours_NNS '_POS notice_NN on_IN a_DT post-card_NN of_IN the_DT discharge_NN of_IN any_DT patient_NN ;_: and_CC this_DT was_VBD later_RB extended_VBN to_TO all_DT attendants_NNS on_IN the_DT sick_JJ ,_, who_WP were_VBD kept_VBN in_IN contact_NN camps_NNS next_IN to_TO the_DT hospitals_NNS ._.
This_DT latter_JJ step_NN was_VBD rendered_VBN necessary_JJ to_TO enable_VB help_NN to_TO be_VB given_VBN from_IN the_DT Fund_NNP to_TO widows_NNS and_CC others_NNS who_WP had_VBD lost_VBN friends_NNS or_CC relations_NNS in_IN the_DT hospitals_NNS and_CC had_VBD then_RB been_VBN detained_VBN for_IN 10_CD days_NNS in_IN quarantine_NN ._.
93_CD No_DT money_NN given_VBN in_IN Hospital_NNP No_NNP money_NN wan_NN ever_RB given_VBN to_TO patients_NNS while_IN still_RB in_IN hospital_NN or_CC to_TO hospital_JJ contacts_NNS (_( attending_VBG friends_NNS of_IN the_DT sick_NN )_) till_NN discharged_VBN from_IN the_DT camps_NNS ._.
The_DT attendant_JJ friends_NNS were_VBD supported_VBN ,_, if_IN poor_JJ ,_, with_IN free_JJ rations_NNS ._.
This_DT rule_NN was_VBD ab-_RB solutely_RB necessary_JJ to_TO prevent_VB corruption_NN amongst_IN the_DT ward-boys_JJ ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, who_WP might_MD otherwise_RB obtain_VB a_DT share_NN of_IN the_DT patient_NN 's_POS relief_NN money_NN ._.
Extra_JJ rations_NNS ._.
Extra_JJ Rations_NNP ,_, -In_NNP consultation_NN with_IN the_DT Chief_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN each_DT hos-_JJ pital_NN ,_, steps_NNS were_VBD taken_VBN to_TO give_VB extra_JJ cooked_VBN rations_NNS to_TO all_DT weak_JJ convalescents_NNS ,_, and_CC even_RB to_TO patients_NNS ,_, when_WRB allowed_VBN ._.
Mutton_NNP and_CC chicken_JJ broths_NNS ,_, mutton_NN ,_, chicken_NN ,_, curry_NN ,_, soups_NNS ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, were_VBD thus_RB supplied_VBN to_TO those_DT whose_WP$ caste_NN permitted_VBD meat_NN diet_NN ,_, and_CC many_JJ convalescents_NNS from_IN plague_NN ,_, at_IN first_JJ too_RB weak_JJ and_CC miserable_JJ to_TO walk_VB ,_, much_RB less_JJR to_TO work_VB ,_, have_VB been_VBN sent_VBN out_RP well_RB and_CC strong_JJ ._.
Mahabeo_NNP Ranu-_NNP man_NN was_VBD a_DT Purdesi_NNP hawker_NN of_IN kerosine_NN ,_, who_WP was_VBD admitted_VBN to_TO the_DT Arthur_NNP Road_NNP with_IN plague_NN on_IN 7th_CD December_NNP 1898_CD ,_, and_CC Shripati_NNP Gunput_NNP was_VBD a_DT goldsmith_NN from_IN Karad_NNP ,_, who_WP was_VBD admitted_VBN to_TO the_DT same_JJ hospital_NN on_IN 26th_CD December_NNP 1898_CD ._.
These_DT two_CD men_NNS recovered_VBD from_IN plague_NN ,_, but_CC lingered_VBD on_IN far_RB too_RB weak_JJ to_TO be_VB discharged_VBN ._.
The_DT Fund_NNP thereupon_NN supplied_VBD them_PRP with_IN extra_JJ and_CC special_JJ rations_NNS ,_, and_CC they_PRP regained_VBD their_PRP$ strength_NN slowly_RB but_CC surely_RB ._.
The_DT former_JJ was_VBD discharged_VBN on_IN 18th_CD February_NNP 1899_CD ,_, the_DT latter_JJ not_RB till_VB 5th_CD March_NNP 1899_CD ,_, but_CC both_DT were_VBD now_RB healthy_JJ and_CC strung_JJ and_CC fit_JJ for_IN work_NN ._.
Special_JJ kitchen_NN in_IN Maratha_NNP Hospi-_NNP tal_NN for_IN meat_NN ,_, &_CC c._NN In_IN the_DT Maratha_NNP Hospital-an_NNP excellent_NN and_CC popular_JJ institution-a_JJ kitchen_NN was_VBD established_VBN for_IN the_DT Fund_NNP in_IN a_DT separate_JJ and_CC isolated_JJ building_NN and_CC special_JJ cooks_NNS engaged_VBN ._.
Here_RB all_DT extra_JJ rations_NNS made_VBN from_IN mutton_NN or_CC chicken_NN are_VBP cooked_VBN ._.
I_PRP enquire_VBP personally_RB on_IN my_PRP$ daily_JJ round_VB what_WP convalescents_NNS would_MD like_VB meat_NN rations_NNS ,_, and_CC if_IN the_DT doctor_NN agrees_VBZ ,_, rations_NNS are_VBP permitted_VBN ,_, and_CC I_PRP enquire_VBP of_IN the_DT patient_JJ daily_JJ whether_IN he_PRP has_VBZ received_VBN his_PRP$ extra_JJ food_NN ._.
The_DT kitchen_NN cooks_NN and_CC rations_NNS are_VBP all_DT paid_VBN for_IN from_IN the_DT Fund_NNP ._.
At_IN the_DT Arthur_NNP Road_NNP ,_, the_DT ordinary_JJ hospital_NN kitchens_NNS supply_NN whatever_WDT is_VBZ required_VBN in_IN this_DT way_NN ._.
Like_IN our_PRP$ poor_JJ in_IN England_NNP ,_, Maratha_NNP and_CC other_JJ Hindus_NNP of_IN caste_NN eat_NN mutton_NN if_IN they_PRP can_MD afford_VB it_PRP ,_, a_DT very_RB raro_JJ circumstance_NN ._.
Rations_NNS of_IN meat_NN are_VBP ,_, therefore_RB ,_, looked_VBD upon_IN as_IN a_DT great_JJ boon_NN and_CC the_DT Government_NNP is_VBZ blessed_VBN for_IN its_PRP$ benevolence_NN ._.
Biscuits_NNS ._.
Biscuits.-A_NNP great_JJ many_JJ sick_JJ persons_NNS and_CC many_JJ convalescent_JJ women_NNS and_CC children_NNS are_VBP unable_JJ to_TO take_VB much_JJ of_IN any_DT bread_NN ,_, so_RB ,_, by_IN means_NNS of_IN the_DT Fund_NNP ,_, the_DT hospitals_NNS have_VBP been_VBN kept_VBN supplied_VBN with_IN large_JJ tins_NNS of_IN ``_`` milk_NN ''_'' and_CC other_JJ plain_NN biscuits_NNS made_VBN by_IN Hindu_NNP bakers_NNS ._.
Strict_JJ supervision_NN is_VBZ maintained_VBN to_TO ensure_VB that_IN the_DT patients_NNS get_VBP the_DT biscuit_NN ._.
Oranges_NNS ._.
Oranges.-A_NNP contract_NN was_VBD made_VBN with_IN a_DT fruit_NN merchant_NN at_IN Kampti_NNP ,_, who_WP sent_VBD twice_RB a_DT week_NN 200_CD oranges_NNS delivered_VBN here_RB at_IN the_DT rate_NN of_IN Us_NNP ._.
3_CD per_IN hundred_VBN ._.
This_DT was_VBD increased_VBN later_RB on_IN to_TO 200_CD oranges_NNS daily_RB ;_: and_CC finally_RB ,_, since_IN March_NNP 15th_CD ,_, to_TO 300_CD daily_RB ._.
The_DT distribution_NN of_IN this_DT fruit_NN amongst_VBZ the_DT convalescents_NNS and_CC amongst_NNS such_JJ patients_NNS as_IN are_VBP allowed_VBN thorn_JJ ,_, besides_IN being_VBG exceedingly_RB good_JJ for_IN them_PRP ,_, gives_VBZ more_JJR pleasure_NN and_CC is_VBZ more_RBR popular_JJ than_IN any_DT other_JJ measure_NN undertaken_VBN for_IN the_DT relief_NN of_IN the_DT patients_NNS ._.
Method_NNP of_IN deli-_JJ vering_VBG goods_NNS at_IN vaiious_JJ hospitals_NNS ._.
Method_NNP of_IN delivering_VBG goods_NNS at_IN the_DT various_JJ Hospitals.-In_NNP the_DT Elphinstone_NNP College_NNP a_DT spare_JJ room_NN has_VBZ been_VBN reserved_VBN for_IN a_DT sort_NN of_IN Depot_NNP where_WRB are_VBP kept_VBN ,_, under_IN lock_NN and_CC key_NN ,_, a_DT large_JJ supply_NN of_IN tins_NNS of_IN biscuits_NNS ,_, blankets_NNS ,_, cheap_JJ toys_NN ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, and_CC here_RB are_VBP laid_VBN out_IN the_DT oranges_NNS as_IN they_PRP arrive_VBP ._.
Every_DT day_NN a_DT bullock_NN carriage_NN (_( rekla_NN )_) hired_VBD at_IN the_DT rate_NN of_IN Rs_NNP ._.
1-4_JJ per_IN day_NN ,_, leaves_VBZ the_DT College_NNP at_IN 2_CD p.m._NN and_CC deposits_NNS at_IN the_DT various_JJ hospitals_NNS whatever_WDT is_VBZ ordered_VBN ._.
The_DT goods_NNS for_IN each_DT hospital_NN are_VBP entered_VBN in_IN a_DT driver_NN 's_POS book_NN and_CC are_VBP labelled_VBN ._.
The_DT oranges_NNS are_VBP counted_VBN out_RP into_IN special_JJ bags_NNS -for_VBP the_DT number_NN required_VBN in_IN each_DT hospital_NN is_VBZ roughly_RB known-and_NN they_PRP and_CC the_DT other_JJ goods_NNS are_VBP received_VBN by_IN the_DT man_NN in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN office_NN ,_, are_VBP signed_VBN for_IN in_IN the_DT book_NN ,_, and_CC are_VBP kept_VBN in_IN the_DT office_NN unopened_VBD till_NN I_PRP arrive_VBP next_JJ morning_NN ._.
Oranges_NNS are_VBP distributed_VBN every_DT other_JJ day_NN ._.
They_PRP are_VBP then_RB more_RBR appreciated_JJ and_CC not_RB looked_VBD upon_IN as_IN a_DT right_NN or_CC ordinary_JJ ration_NN ._.
94_CD Toys_NNP ,_, &_CC c._NNS Lesser_NNP Items.-_NNP Cheap_NNP Toys_NNP have_VBP been_VBN given_VBN to_TO gladden_VB the_DT hearts_NNS of_IN poor_JJ con-_JJ valescent_NN children_NNS ._.
Cheap_JJ palm-leaf_NN fans_NNS and_CC squares_NNS of_IN coarse_NN muslin_NN have_VBP also_RB been_VBN given_VBN to_TO the_DT poor_JJ to_TO keep_VB the_DT flies_NNS off_IN the_DT faces_VBZ of_IN their_PRP$ sick_JJ friends_NNS and_CC relatives_NNS ._.
I_PRP have_VBP thus_RB generally_RB acted_VBN as_IN the_DT friend_NN of_IN plague_NN patients_NNS in_IN these_DT hospitals_NNS ,_, seeing_VBG and_CC ,_, if_IN possible_JJ ,_, talking_VBG to_TO each_DT person_NN or_CC his_PRP$ or_CC her_PRP$ friends_NNS ._.
Where_WRB no_DT friends_NNS or_CC relatives_NNS visited_VBD the_DT sick_NN ,_, if_IN any_DT were_VBD in_IN Bombay_NNP they_PRP were_VBD fetched_VBN ,_, if_IN up-country_JJ they_PRP were_VBD informed_VBN by_IN letter_NN of_IN their_PRP$ friend_NN or_CC relative_NN 's_POS sickness_NN ._.
Thus_RB a_DT man_NN ,_, called_VBN Govind_NNP Chagnanath_NNP ,_, was_VBD taken_VBN to_TO the_DT Modikhana_NNP Hospital_NNP with_IN plague_NN ._.
There_EX he_PRP bemoaned_VBD the_DT possible_JJ fate_NN of_IN his_PRP$ two_CD little_JJ children_NNS ,_, aged_VBD 6_CD and_CC 4_CD ,_, who_WP had_VBD been_VBN left_VBN without_IN protectors_NNS as_IN his_PRP$ wife_NN was_VBD dead_JJ ._.
A_DT mater-_JJ nal_JJ uncle_NN lived_VBD near_IN ,_, but_CC whether_IN he_PRP had_VBD taken_VBN the_DT children_NNS or_CC not_RB was_VBD uncertain_JJ ._.
The_DT address_NN given_VBN in_IN Colaba_NNP was_VBD hunted_VBN up_RP and_CC I_PRP interviewed_VBD the_DT uncle_NN and_CC learnt_NN that_IN the_DT children_NNS had_VBD been_VBN taken_VBN to_TO a_DT friend_NN 's_POS house_NN in_IN Kamatipura_NNP ._.
They_PRP were_VBD followed_VBN up_IN there_RB ,_, taken_VBN down_RP to_TO see_VB their_PRP$ father_NN who_WP was_VBD overjoyed_VBN at_IN the_DT sight_NN of_IN them_PRP :_: they_PRP were_VBD than_IN taken_VBN by_IN the_DT friends_NNS ,_, at_IN the_DT expense_NN of_IN the_DT Fund_NNP ,_, to_TO their_PRP$ father_NN 's_POS village_NN in_IN Ratnagiri_NNP where_WRB he_PRP will_MD ,_, I_PRP hope_VBP ,_, soon_RB follow_VB them_PRP ,_, as_IN he_PRP is_VBZ now_RB convalescent_JJ ._.
A_DT patient_NN has_VBZ usually_RB some_DT friend_NN who_WP can_MD be_VB found_VBN in_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
The_DT Hindus_NNP are_VBP wonderful_JJ in_IN their_PRP$ devotion_NN to_TO the_DT sick_NN ._.
Often_RB have_VBP I_PRP seen_VBN merely_RB a_DT fellow-_JJ villager_NN giving_VBG up_RP his_PRP$ work_NN and_CC earnings_NNS to_TO attend_VB on_IN a_DT sick_JJ man_NN ,_, or_CC it_PRP may_MD be_VB only_RB a_DT fellow-mill-hand_NN from_IN the_DT same_JJ mill_NN ._.
The_DT claims_NNS of_IN a_DT plague-stricken_JJ friend_NN are_VBP sacred_VBN ,_, no_DT matter_NN what_WP it_PRP may_MD cost_VB ,_, nor_CC how_WRB great_JJ a_DT personal_JJ risk_NN is_VBZ run_VBN ._.
A_DT good_JJ example_NN was_VBD that_IN of_IN Rama_NNP Babaji_NNP ,_, who_WP walked_VBD into_IN the_DT Arthur_NNP Road_NNP Hospital_NNP alone_RB on_IN 17th_CD January_NNP 1899_CD ,_, suffering_VBG from_IN plague_NN ._.
He_PRP was_VBD delirious_JJ for_IN a_DT very_RB long_JJ time_NN ,_, called_VBN for_IN his_PRP$ brother_NN and_CC others_NNS and_CC declared_VBD that_IN as_IN he_PRP had_VBD come_VBN in_IN himself_PRP ,_, he_PRP ought_MD to_TO be_VB treated_VBN kindly_RB ._.
Learning_VBG from_IN him_PRP that_IN he_PRP had_VBD lodged_VBN in_IN Kathayadadur_NNP ,_, Durgadevi_NNP ,_, Kamatipura_NNP ,_, a_DT visit_NN there_RB showed_VBD that_IN he_PRP had_VBD come_VBN from_IN Karad_NNP in_IN Satara_NNP 15_CD days_NNS before_IN being_VBG taken_VBN ill._VB His_PRP$ brother_NN was_VBD not_RB known_VBN ,_, but_CC several_JJ fellow-villagers_NNS living_VBG in_IN the_DT house_NN came_VBD to_TO see_VB him_PRP and_CC to_TO cheer_VB him_PRP up_RP ._.
He_PRP was_VBD discharged_VBN cured_VBN on_IN 5th_CD March_NNP 1899_CD ,_, and_CC given_VBN Rs_NNP ._.
5_CD from_IN the_DT Fund_NN to_TO support_VB him_PRP till_VB he_PRP should_MD be_VB able_JJ to_TO find_VB work_NN ._.
Number_NNP of_IN patients_NNS ,_, January_NNP 1st_CD to_TO March_NNP 31st_CD ._.
From_IN January_NNP 1st_CD to_TO March_NNP 31st_CD I_PRP have_VBP thus_RB visited_VBN in-_NN (_( 1_CD )_) JMaratha_NNP Hospital_NNP 2_CD 584_CD Total_JJ 5,583_CD patients_NNS ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) Arthur_NNP Road_NNP 1,316_CD (_( 3_CD )_) Julai_FW 306_CD (_( 4_CD )_) Mahomedan_NNP General_NNP 209_CD (_( 5_CD )_) Modikhana_NNP 1,168_CD Daily_NNP number_NN of_IN patients_NNS 800._CD lins_NNS does_VBZ not_RB incluae_VB friends_NNS and_CC attendants_NNS and_CC other_JJ contacts_NNS ._.
