Funerals_NNS ._.
Funerals.-In_JJ deserving_NN cases_NNS aid_NN has_VBZ been_VBN given_VBN in_IN the_DT shape_NN of_IN money_NN to_TO very_RB poor_JJ people_NNS to_TO dispose_VB of_IN their_PRP$ dead_JJ ._.
The_DT Muhomedans_NNPS have_VBP a_DT caste_NN organiza-_JJ tion_NN that_IN buries_VBZ all_DT their_PRP$ poor_JJ ._.
The_DT poor_JJ Christians_NNPS are_VBP buried_VBN by_IN the_DT Munici-_NNP pality-through_IN the_DT Vicar-General_NNP ,_, if_IN Roman_JJ Catholics_NNPS ._.
Poor_NNP Hindus_NNP alono_NNS have_VBP no_DT organization_NN to_TO help_VB them_PRP ._.
The_DT private_JJ hospitals_NNS have_VBP their_PRP$ special_JJ caste_NN arrangements_NNS ._.
95_CD Arrangements_NNS for_IN the_DT proper_JJ disposal_NN according_VBG to_TO caste_NN of_IN all_DT unclaimed_JJ bodies_NNS and_CC of_IN those_DT of_IN the_DT very_RB poor_JJ were_VBD not_RB lost_VBN sight_NN of_IN ._.
Through_IN the_DT kindness_NN of_IN the_DT Honourable_NNP Dr._NNP Bhalohandra_NNP his_PRP$ central_JJ organization_NN ,_, first_RB started_VBD for_IN the_DT Maratha_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, has_VBZ been_VBN extended_VBN to_TO the_DT Arthur_NNP Road_NNP and_CC Modikhana_NNP ._.
His_PRP$ staff_NN under-_JJ take_NN the_DT disposal_NN of_IN the_DT bodies_NNS of_IN all_DT unclaimed_JJ or_CC poor_JJ Brahmins_NNS and_CC goldsmiths_NNS (_( Sonars_NNP )_) ,_, the_DT staff_NN being_VBG called_VBN by_IN telephone_NN direct_NN from_IN the_DT hospitals_NNS ._.
A_DT staff_NN of_IN Maratha_NNP bearers_NNS was_VBD organized_VBN ,_, paid_VBN by_IN the_DT Relief_NNP Fund_NNP ,_, and_CC these_DT dispose_NN of_IN the_DT bodies_NNS of_IN all_DT poor_JJ and_CC of_IN all_DT unclaimed_JJ Hindus_NNP of_IN caste_NN exclusive_JJ of_IN Brahmins_NNP ._.
Relief_NN ._.
Free_JJ rations_NNS to_TO attendants_NNS on_IN sick_NN ._.
All_DT friends_NNS attending_VBG on_IN the_DT patients_NNS are_VBP ,_, if_IN poor_JJ ,_, granted_VBN daily_JJ rations_NNS from_IN the_DT hospitals_NNS as_IN they_PRP are_VBP unable_JJ to_TO work_VB while_IN nursing_VBG the_DT sick_NN ._.
These_DT rations_NNS are_VBP now_RB charged_VBN to_TO the_DT Relief_NNP Fund_NNP and_CC they_PRP add_VBP much_RB to_TO the_DT popularity_NN of_IN the_DT hospitals_NNS ._.
Thus_RB if_IN a_DT wife_NN comes_VBZ to_TO nurse_VB her_PRP$ sick_JJ husband_NN she_PRP does_VBZ not_RB starve_VB or_CC fall_VB ill_NN from_IN want_NN of_IN food_NN ,_, to_TO buy_VB which_WDT she_PRP may_MD have_VB no_DT money_NN ,_, now_RB that_IN her_PRP$ bread-winner_NN is_VBZ unable_JJ to_TO work_VB ._.
These_DT attendants_NNS are_VBP kept_VBN in_IN a_DT camp_NN for_IN ten_JJ days_NNS after_IN the_DT death_NN or_CC convalescence_NN of_IN their_PRP$ sick_JJ friend_NN ._.
Thus_RB a_DT Mahomedan_NNP ,_, Papamia_NNP Shetkarim_NNP ,_, lost_VBD his_PRP$ brother_NN in_IN the_DT General_NNP Mahomedan_NNP Hospital_NNP ._.
He_PRP was_VBD unable_JJ to_TO earn_VB anything_NN while_IN attending_VBG on_IN his_PRP$ brother_NN ,_, he_PRP was_VBD given_VBN daily_JJ rations_NNS ,_, and_CC on_IN leaving_VBG Rs_NNP ._.
3_CD for_IN food_NN till_NN he_PRP should_MD find_VB work_NN ._.
Another_DT example_NN was_VBD furnished_VBN by_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN Mathalahubai_NNP ,_, a_DT Mahomedan_NNP woman_NN ,_, dependent_NN on_IN her_PRP$ husband_NN for_IN support_NN ._.
The_DT latter_NN was_VBD taken_VBN to_TO the_DT General_NNP Mahomedan_NNP Hospital_NNP with_IN plague_NN and_CC the_DT woman_NN was_VBD soon_RB reduced_VBN to_TO grent_VB straits_NNS ._.

Meanwhile_RB ,_, the_DT woman_NN ,_, who_WP remained_VBD at_IN home_NN ,_, was_VBD given_VBN Rs_NNP ._.
5_CD for_IN her_PRP$ support_NN till_NN her_PRP$ husband_NN 's_POS discharge_NN ,_, when_WRB further_JJ help_NN was_VBD given_VBN to_TO him_PRP ,_, as_IN they_PRP were_VBD miserably_RB poor_JJ ._.
As_IN no_DT attending_VBG friend_NN or_CC convalescent_NN can_MD be_VB discharged_VBN ,_, as_IN above_IN stated_VBN ,_, without_IN my_PRP$ being_VBG given_VBN 24_CD hours_NNS '_POS notice_NN ,_, it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN possible_JJ to_TO enquire_VB into_IN the_DT affairs_NNS of_IN all_DT as_IN they_PRP departed_VBD and_CC to_TO relieve_VB their_PRP$ distress_NN if_IN necessary_JJ ._.
Money_NN relief_NN how_WRB given_VBN ._.
Patients_NNS sent_VBD home_NN to_TO their_PRP$ villages_NNS on_IN reco-_JJ very_NN ._.
Thus_RB if_IN a_DT poor_JJ patient_NN is_VBZ discharged_VBN and_CC is_VBZ too_RB weak_JJ to_TO work_VB and_CC wishes_NNS to_TO remain_VB in_IN Bombay_NNP he_PRP is_VBZ given_VBN sufficient_JJ rupees_NNS to_TO support_VB him_PRP for_IN as_RB long_RB as_IN the_DT doctor_NN thinks_VBZ necessary_JJ ._.
If_IN ,_, as_IN is_VBZ usually_RB the_DT case_NN ,_, the_DT patient_NN wishes_VBZ to_TO go_VB to_TO his_PRP$ native_JJ village_NN and_CC the_DT same_JJ is_VBZ within_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP ,_, he_PRP is_VBZ furnished_VBN with_IN money_NN for_IN a_DT ticket_NN by_IN rail_NN or_CC steamer_NN ,_, as_IN the_DT case_NN may_MD be_VB ,_, and_CC with_IN sufficient_JJ money_NN for_IN food_NN en_IN route_NN ,_, and_CC if_IN very_RB poor_JJ or_CC weak_JJ with_IN money_NN to_TO keep_VB him_PRP for_IN a_DT week_NN or_CC two_CD on_IN arrival_JJ home_NN ._.
Often_RB a_DT long_JJ journey_NN has_VBZ to_TO be_VB taken_VBN in_IN a_DT bullock_NN cart_NN in_IN addition_NN to_TO the_DT journey_NN by_IN steamer_NN or_CC railway_NN ,_, if_IN so_RB ,_, funds_NNS are_VBP provided_VBN to_TO defray_VB the_DT cost_NN ._.
The_DT great_JJ majority_NN of_IN the_DT poor_JJ plague_NN patients_NNS in_IN our_PRP$ hospitals_NNS have_VBP but_CC one_CD desire_NN ,_, viz._NN ,_, to_TO get_VB home_NN to_TO their_PRP$ villages_NNS in_IN the_DT country_NN as_RB soon_RB as_IN they_PRP are_VBP able_JJ to_TO leave_VB the_DT hospitals_NNS ._.
Means_NNS to_TO enable_VB them_PRP to_TO proceed_VB home_NN are_VBP ,_, there-_JJ fore_NN ,_, a_DT very_RB acceptable_JJ and_CC popular_JJ form_NN of_IN relief_NN ._.
The_DT payments_NNS are_VBP properly_RB assessed_VBN according_VBG to_TO the_DT cost_NN of_IN the_DT journey_NN ,_, length_NN of_IN time_NN it_PRP takes_VBZ ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, &_CC c._NN To_TO ensure_VB that_IN the_DT money_NN is_VBZ really_RB being_VBG spent_VBN on_IN tickets_NNS ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, a_DT trustworthy_JJ messenger_NN (_( peon_NN )_) from_IN the_DT hospital_NN accompanies_VBZ the_DT person_NN to_TO the_DT railway_NN station_NN or_CC pier_NN and_CC brings_VBZ back_RP the_DT numbers_NNS ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, of_IN the_DT tickets_NNS ._.
Any_DT number_NN of_IN examples_NNS of_IN this_DT form_NN of_IN relief_NN might_MD be_VB given_VBN :_: a_DT few_JJ typical_JJ cases_NNS are_VBP quoted_VBN below_IN :_: -_: Examples_NNS ._.
Nana_NNP Saula_NNP ,_, Mhr_NNP ,_, aged_VBD 10_CD ,_, was_VBD a_DT bright_JJ youth_NN who_WP appeared_VBD with_IN his_PRP$ mother_NN and_CC grandmother_NN Bhagu_NNP Madu_NNP ._.

Bhagi_NNP Dadu_NNP ,_, a_DT Maratha_NNP ,_, aged_VBD 45_CD ,_, was_VBD admitted_VBN with_IN his_PRP$ wife_NN and_CC eldest_JJS daughter_NN to_TO the_DT Maratha_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, all_DT three_CD were_VBD down_RB with_IN plague_NN ._.

Again_RB where_WRB a_DT patient_NN has_VBZ lost_VBN his_PRP$ or_CC her_PRP$ employment_NN ,_, especially_RB if_IN they_PRP be_VB domestic_JJ servants_NNS ,_, endeavours_NNS are_VBP made_VBN to_TO get_VB them_PRP ,_, when_WRB discharged_VBN ,_, either_DT back_RB into_IN their_PRP$ old_JJ places_NNS or_CC into_IN new_JJ situations_NNS ._.

Thus_RB ,_, the_DT daughter_NN of_IN Luis_NNP Santan_NNP Fernandez_NNP ,_, a_DT poor_JJ tailor_NN ,_, was_VBD taken_VBN to_TO the_DT Arthur_NNP Road_NNP with_IN plague_NN ._.
He_PRP and_CC his_PRP$ wife_NN were_VBD turned_VBN out_IN of_IN their_PRP$ home_NN and_CC they_PRP and_CC all_DT their_PRP$ goods_NNS taken_VBN to_TO the_DT camp_NN next_IN the_DT hospital_NN ._.
In_IN moving_VBG ,_, a_DT Singer_NNP 's_POS sewing_VBG machine_NN on_IN which_WDT the_DT family_NN depended_VBD for_IN their_PRP$ livelihood_NN was_VBD damaged_VBN ,_, so_RB as_IN to_TO become_VB useless_JJ ._.
The_DT machine_NN was_VBD overhauled_VBN and_CC restored_VBN at_IN the_DT expense_NN of_IN the_DT Fund_NNP at_IN a_DT cost_NN of_IN Rs_NNP ._.
11-9-0_JJ ,_, and_CC when_WRB in_IN time_NN the_DT daughter_NN was_VBD discharged_VBN cured_VBN ,_, the_DT family_NN departed_VBD blessing_VBG the_DT Government_NNP for_IN their_PRP$ timely_JJ aid_NN ._.
In_IN all_DT cases_NNS where_WRB the_DT discharged_JJ patient_NN is_VBZ poor_JJ and_CC needy_JJ ,_, presents_NNS of_IN clothes_NNS and_CC a_DT blanket_NN are_VBP given_VBN ,_, a_DT stock_NN of_IN these_DT being_VBG kept_VBD under_IN lock_NN and_CC key_NN at_IN each_DT hospital-replenished_NN at_IN times_NNS by_IN the_DT ``_`` recla_JJ ``_`` service_NN as_IN described_VBN above_IN from_IN the_DT Central_NNP Depot_NNP at_IN the_DT College_NNP ._.
As_IN regards_NNS the_DT friends_NNS or_CC relatives_NNS attending_VBG on_IN the_DT sick_NN ,_, if_IN they_PRP have_VBP to_TO be_VB fetched_VBN from_IN a_DT distance_NN ,_, the_DT cost_NN of_IN their_PRP$ coming_JJ and_CC of_IN their_PRP$ final_JJ return_NN is_VBZ defrayed_VBN ,_, or_CC ,_, if_IN possible_JJ ,_, their_PRP$ losses_NNS made_VBN good_JJ ._.
Thus_RB ,_, one_CD Daku_NNP Krishna_NNP came_VBD from_IN Fonda_NNP ,_, Ratnagiri_NNP ,_, 24_CD miles_NNS by_IN road_NN to_TO Devgur_NNP bunder_NN and_CC thence_NN by_IN steamer_NN to_TO Bombay_NNP ,_, to_TO nurse_VB his_PRP$ son_NN (_( 24_CD )_) down_IN with_IN plague_NN in_IN the_DT Maratha_NNP Hospital_NNP ._.

5_CD ._.
In_IN another_DT case_NN a_DT Mahomedan_NNP ,_, Balamia_NNP ,_, fell_VBD ill_NN of_IN plague_NN ,_, was_VBD taken_VBN to_TO the_DT Mahomedan_NNP General_NNP Hospital_NNP and_CC ultimately_RB died_VBD ._.

11_CD ._.
Again_NNP ,_, a_DT Madrassi_NNP butler_NN ,_, by_IN name_NN Ashebai_NNP Rameshawami_NNP ,_, threw_VBD up_RP a_DT good_JJ place_NN at_IN Igatpuri_NNP and_CC came_VBD with_IN his_PRP$ family_NN ,_, a_DT wife_NN and_CC two_CD children_NNS ,_, to_TO the_DT Camp_NNP ,_, Arthur_NNP Road_NNP ,_, to_TO attend_VB on_IN his_PRP$ son_NN down_RP with_IN plague_NN in_IN the_DT hospital_NN ._.
His_PRP$ son_NN died_VBD ?_. 97_CD and_CC the_DT father_NN was_VBD left_VBN without_IN any_DT means_NNS ,_, so_IN he_PRP was_VBD given_VBN Rs_NNP ._.

In_IN due_JJ course_NN he_PRP got_VBD a_DT new_JJ place_NN and_CC came_VBD to_TO the_DT hospital_NN to_TO report_VB the_DT same_JJ and_CC to_TO thank_VB Government_NNP for_IN their_PRP$ help_NN ._.
Widow_NNP through_IN plague_NN ._.
When_WRB a_DT poor_JJ woman_NN loses_VBZ her_PRP$ husband_NN in_IN a_DT plague_NN hospital_NN ,_, a_DT very_RB ,_, very_RB frequent_JJ occurrence_NN ,_, as_IN almost_RB every_DT Hindu_NNP has_VBZ a_DT wife_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT woman_NN is_VBZ left_VBN helpless_JJ perhaps_RB with_IN a_DT large_JJ family_NN ,_, she_PRP and_CC her_PRP$ children_NNS are_VBP kept_VBN for_IN 10_CD days_NNS in_IN a_DT camp_NN ._.

Very_RB great_JJ help_NN was_VBD given_VBN in_IN this_DT way_NN at_IN the_DT Maratha_NNP Hospital_NNP by_IN the_DT Hospital_NNP House_NNP Surgeon_NNP ,_, Suntaji_NNP Ramji_NNP ,_, a_DT retired_JJ Government_NNP Hospital_NNP Assistant_NNP ,_, who_WP studied_VBD all_PDT the_DT cases_NNS in_IN his_PRP$ official_JJ capacity_NN and_CC brought_VBD all_DT deserving_NN cases_NNS to_TO my_PRP$ notice_NN ,_, filling_VBG in_IN their_PRP$ forms_NNS ;_: at_IN the_DT Arthur_NNP Road_NNP this_DT work_NN was_VBD done_VBN by_IN the_DT Hospital_NNP Assistant_NNP Mr._NNP Samson_NNP ;_: at_IN the_DT Mahomedan_NNP General_NNP by_IN the_DT Mahomedan_NNP Doctor_NNP in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN ,_, Timour_NNP Rehman_NNP ,_, an_DT excellent_JJ fellow_NN ,_, and_CC at_IN Modikhana_NNP by_IN Dr._NNP Tarkud_NNP ,_, the_DT Medical_NNP Officer_NNP ._.

Julai_NNP Hospital_NNP ._.
At_IN the_DT Mahomedan_NNP Julai_NNP Hospital_NNP in_IN Ripon_NNP Road_NNP the_DT process_NN was_VBD somewhat_RB different_JJ ._.
There_EX were_VBD here_RB no_DT nurses_NNS and_CC no_DT European_JJ treatment_NN ._.
A_DT native_JJ Hakim_NNP controlled_VBD everything_NN ,_, all_PDT the_DT arrangements_NNS were_VBD thoroughly_RB native_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT patients_NNS themselves_PRP belonged_VBD to_TO a_DT poor_JJ and_CC rather_RB turbulent_JJ class_NN ._.
Special_JJ efforts_NNS were_VBD ,_, therefore_RB ,_, made_VBD to_TO make_VB this_DT hospital_NN popular_JJ ._.
The_DT convalescent_NN patients_NNS and_CC contacts_NNS were_VBD all_DT kept_VBN at_IN the_DT hospital_NN till_NN they_PRP were_VBD quite_RB hale_JJ ?_. 100_CD and_CC hearty_NN ._.
Then_RB on_IN a_DT Friday_NNP morning_NN the_DT committee_NN of_IN leading_VBG men_NNS of_IN this_DT section_NN of_IN the_DT populace_NN ,_, who_WP have_VBP established_VBN the_DT hospital_NN and_CC who_WP largely_RB control_VBP it_PRP ,_, would_MD meet_VB me_PRP at_IN the_DT hospital_NN ._.
The_DT people_NNS to_TO be_VB discharged_VBN would_MD come_VB up_RP one_CD by_IN one_CD and_CC their_PRP$ circumstances_NNS be_VB enquired_VBN into_IN and_CC the_DT relief_NN required_VBN ,_, if_IN any_DT ,_, assessed_VBN by_IN the_DT whole_JJ committee_NN sitting_VBG in_IN a_DT sort_NN of_IN darbar_NN the_DT chairman_NN presiding_NN and_CC I_PRP acting_VBG as_IN secretary_NN and_CC general_JJ adviser_NN ,_, writing_VBG down_RP all_DT particulars_NNS and_CC handing_VBG the_DT necessary_JJ money_NN to_TO the_DT chairman_NN for_IN distribution_NN to_TO each_DT case_NN as_IN it_PRP was_VBD decided_VBN on_IN ._.
A_DT large_JJ pile_NN of_IN blankets_NNS ,_, several_JJ sacks_NNS of_IN oranges_NNS and_CC trays_NNS of_IN biscuits_NNS ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, were_VBD conspicuous_JJ ._.
In_IN short_JJ ,_, the_DT whole_JJ affair_NN was_VBD made_VBN as_IN gay_NN and_CC bright_NN as_IN possible_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT entire_JJ neighbourhood_NN learnt_NN of_IN the_DT patients_NNS who_WP had_VBD been_VBN discharged_VBN and_CC of_IN how_WRB much_JJ the_DT Government_NNP had_VBD done_VBN for_IN them_PRP ._.
Thus_RB on_IN March_NNP 17th_CD ,_, 38_CD persons_NNS were_VBD discharged_VBN and_CC relieved_VBN in_IN various_JJ ways_NNS at_IN this_DT hospital_NN ._.
Below_IN are_VBP given_VBN a_DT few_JJ examples_NNS of_IN the_DT cases_NNS dealt_VBP with_IN on_IN March_NNP 17th_CD at_IN the_DT Julai_NNP Hospital_NNP :_: -_: Jumni_NNP (_( 25_CD )_) ,_, widow_NN of_IN Imam_NNP Ali_NNP ,_, who_WP died_VBD of_IN plague_NN last_JJ year_NN ._.
She_PRP had_VBD just_RB recovered_VBN from_IN plague_NN ._.
She_PRP worked_VBD with_IN the_DT weavers_NNS ,_, but_CC was_VBD too_RB weak_JJ to_TO earn_VB anything_NN for_IN some_DT time_NN ._.
Given_VBN Rs_NNP ._.
5_CD and_CC a_DT blanket_NN ._.
Again_RB another_DT widow_NN Khamani_NNP had_VBD just_RB lost_VBN her_PRP$ son_NN in_IN the_DT hospital_NN ._.
She_PRP ,_, too_RB ,_, worked_VBD with_IN the_DT weavers_NNS ,_, but_CC was_VBD too_RB weak_JJ owing_VBG to_TO the_DT strain_NN of_IN nursing_VBG her_PRP$ son_NN to_TO earn_VB at_IN present_NN ._.
Given_VBN Rs_NNP ._.
3_CD and_CC a_DT blanket_NN ._.
Another_DT woman_NN Rechi_NNP was_VBD left_VBN a_DT widow_NN with_IN 3_CD small_JJ children_NNS and_CC a_DT baby_NN ,_, her_PRP$ husband_NN having_VBG died_VBN of_IN plague_NN in_IN the_DT hospital_NN ._.
She_PRP was_VBD very_RB poor_JJ ,_, so_RB was_VBD given_VBN 2_CD blankets_NNS and_CC Rs_NNP ._.
8_CD ._.
Lastly_RB ,_, Lal_NNP Mahomed_NNP ,_, a_DT very_RB old_JJ man_NN ,_, who_WP had_VBD lost_VBN seven_CD relations_NNS in_IN the_DT hospital_NN ,_, was_VBD granted_VBN a_DT blanket_NN and_CC Rs_NNP ._.
5_CD for_IN a_DT new_JJ start_NN ._.
Owing_VBG to_TO their_PRP$ distance_NN apart_RB and_CC the_DT number_NN of_IN patients_NNS ,_, it_PRP soon_RB became_VBD impossible_JJ to_TO visit_VB all_PDT the_DT hospitals_NNS in_IN a_DT single_JJ morning_NN ._.
They_PRP were_VBD therefore_RB visited_VBN as_IN follows_VBZ ._.
The_DT Julai_NNP (_( Ripon_NNP Road_NNP )_) ,_, the_DT Mahomedan_NNP General_NNP (_( North-_NNP brook_NN Gardens_NNP )_) and_CC the_DT Modikhna_NNP were_VBD visited_VBN on_IN Mondays_NNS ,_, Wednesdays_NNS and_CC Fridays_NNP ,_, while_IN the_DT Maratha_NNP and_CC Arthur_NNP Road_NNP were_VBD visited_VBN on_IN Tuesdays_NNS ,_, Thurs-_NNP days_NNS and_CC Saturdays_NNP ,_, no_DT patients_NNS being_VBG discharged_VBN except_IN on_IN these_DT days_NNS from_IN the_DT respective_JJ hospitals_NNS ._.
In_IN February_NNP ,_, however_RB ,_, a_DT young_JJ Brhmin_NNP gentleman_NN of_IN independent_JJ means_NNS ,_, a_DT B.A._NNP ,_, and_CC a_DT former_JJ pupil_NN of_IN mine_NN at_IN Elphinstone_NNP College_NNP ,_, V._NNP N._NNP Mandlik_NNP by_IN name_NN ,_, volunteered_VBD to_TO help_VB me_PRP with_IN the_DT Arthur_NNP Road_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, Mr._NNP Mandlik_NNP has_VBZ visited_VBN this_DT hospital_NN every_DT Monday_NNP ,_, Wednesday_NNP and_CC Friday_NNP and_CC dealt_NN with_IN all_DT cases_NNS maturing_VBG on_IN these_DT days_NNS ._.
We_PRP used_VBD the_DT same_JJ book_NN of_IN particulars_NNS and_CC so_RB each_DT was_VBD able_JJ to_TO read_VB on_IN the_DT counterfoils_NNS what_WP the_DT other_JJ had_VBD done_VBN in_IN the_DT way_NN of_IN relief_NN ._.
Mr._NNP Mandlik_NNP has_VBZ worked_VBN very_RB hard_JJ and_CC has_VBZ made_VBN himself_PRP beloved_VBN by_IN all_PDT the_DT patients_NNS in_IN the_DT wards_NNS ,_, and_CC he_PRP has_VBZ set_VBN an_DT example_NN which_WDT might_MD well_RB be_VB followed_VBN by_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT young_JJ educated_VBN and_CC wealthy_JJ citizens_NNS of_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, who_WP are_VBP too_RB prone_JJ to_TO fly_VB from_IN the_DT city_NN on_IN the_DT approach_NN of_IN danger_NN ._.
Mr._NNP V._NNP N._NNP Mandlik_NNP 's_POS work_NN is_VBZ the_DT more_RBR praiseworthy_JJ as_IN he_PRP is_VBZ not_RB protected_VBN by_IN the_DT racial_JJ peculiarities_NNS or_CC habits_NNS which_WDT seem_VBP to_TO shield_VB and_CC to_TO render_VB a_DT European_NNP comparatively_RB immune_JJ ._.
During_IN the_DT period_NN ,_, January_NNP 1st_CD to_TO March_NNP 31st_CD ,_, as_IN above_IN stated_VBN ,_, 5,583_CD patients_NNS of_IN all_DT sorts_NNS have_VBP been_VBN received_VBN in_IN the_DT five_CD principal_JJ hospitals_NNS visited_VBD ._.
Out_IN of_IN these_DT ,_, 622_CD separate_JJ cases-a_JJ case_NN may_MD include_VB a_DT large_JJ family_NN or_CC group_NN of_IN friends_NNS or_CC relatives-have_VBP been_VBN relieved_VBN pecuniarily_RB in_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT abovementioned_JJ ways_NNS at_IN a_DT cost_NN of_IN Rs_NNP ._.
3,543_CD ._.
This_DT does_VBZ not_RB include_VB the_DT money_NN expended_VBN on_IN stocks_NNS of_IN ?_. 101_CD blankets_NNS ,_, clothes_NNS ,_, oranges_NNS ,_, biscuits_NNS and_CC other_JJ extra_JJ rations_NNS amounting_VBG to_TO about_IN Rs_NNP ._.
1,000_CD more_JJR ._.

Rs_NNP ._.
Fortnight_NNP ending_VBG January_NNP 14th_CD 17_CD 87_CD Week_NNP ending_VBG 21st_CD 20_CD 96_CD 28th_CD 25_CD 93_CD February_NNP 4th_CD 21_CD 109_CD 11th_CD 44_CD 197_CD 18th_CD 25_CD 142_CD 25th_CD 39_CD 287_CD March_NNP 4th_CD 77_CD 400_CD 11th_CD 61_CD 312_CD 18th_CD 85_CD 488_CD 25th_CD 60_CD 334_CD April_NNP 1st_CD 43_CD 323_CD 8th_CD 105_CD 675_CD Total_NN ._.
622_CD 3,543_CD The_DT above_JJ report_NN sets_NNS forth_VBP in_IN detail_NN how_WRB I_PRP have_VBP endeavoured_VBN ,_, with_IN the_DT limited_JJ time_NN at_IN my_PRP$ disposal_NN owing_VBG to_TO my_PRP$ professorial_JJ duties_NNS ,_, to_TO carry_VB out_RP a_DT scheme_NN which_WDT owed_VBD its_PRP$ conception_NN to_TO the_DT kindness_NN of_IN heart_NN of_IN His_PRP$ Excellency_NNP Lord_NNP Sandhurst_NNP ,_, and_CC to_TO the_DT generosity_NN of_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP ,_, who_WP provided_VBD the_DT funds_NNS ._.
Though_IN the_DT distribution_NN of_IN the_DT fund_NN and_CC the_DT keeping_VBG of_IN the_DT necessary_JJ accounts_NNS have_VBP required_VBN a_DT great_JJ effort_NN and_CC have_VBP left_VBN me_PRP no_DT leisure_NN at_IN all_DT ,_, the_DT gratitude_NN of_IN the_DT patients_NNS both_DT to_TO Government_NNP and_CC myself_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN an_DT ample_JJ reward_NN ._.
The_DT object_NN of_IN the_DT fund_NN was_VBD to_TO endeavour_VB to_TO alleviate_VB the_DT distress_NN and_CC untold_JJ misery_NN caused_VBD amongst_IN the_DT poor_JJ of_IN Bombay_NNP by_IN this_DT terrible_JJ pestilence_NN ._.
By_IN doing_VBG this_DT through_IN the_DT hospitals_NNS ,_, Government_NNP have_VBP shown_VBN more_RBR clearly_RB than_IN ever_RB to_TO the_DT masses_NNS that_IN they_PRP are_VBP actuated_VBN by_IN the_DT desire_NN to_TO help_VB the_DT plague-_JJ stricken_NN in_IN every_DT way_NN ._.
Every_DT rupee_NN ,_, every_DT blanket_NN ,_, every_DT orange_NN that_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN given_VBN away_RP has_VBZ been_VBN given_VBN in_IN the_DT name_NN of_IN the_DT Government_NNP (_( Sircar_NNP )_) and_CC it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN fully_RB explained_VBN to_TO all_DT again_RB and_CC again_RB that_IN the_DT Government_NNP desired_VBD to_TO help_VB all_DT who_WP came_VBD to_TO the_DT hospitals_NNS and_CC who_WP required_VBD help_NN ._.
The_DT scheme_NN has_VBZ undoubtedly_RB done_VBN a_DT very_RB great_JJ deal_NN to_TO popularize_VB the_DT hospitals_NNS ._.
The_DT plague-stricken_JJ feel_NN now_RB that_IN if_IN they_PRP go_VBP to_TO hospital_VB not_RB only_RB are_VBP their_PRP$ wants_VBZ attended_VBN to_TO and_CC everything_NN done_VBN to_TO save_VB them_PRP that_IN human_JJ skill_NN can_MD devise_VB and_CC money_NN procure_NN ,_, but_CC their_PRP$ wives_NNS and_CC children_NNS and_CC other_JJ relatives_NNS are_VBP taken_VBN care_NN of_IN while_IN they_PRP are_VBP sick_JJ ,_, and_CC if_IN they_PRP die_VBP a_DT good_JJ Government_NNP will_MD provide_VB for_IN their_PRP$ dear_JJ ones_NNS and_CC send_VB them_PRP to_TO their_PRP$ homes_NNS ._.
The_DT only_JJ pity_NN seems_VBZ that_IN Government_NNP should_MD not_RB have_VB let_VBN the_DT general_JJ public_NN know_VBP more_JJR about_IN their_PRP$ great_JJ scheme_NN of_IN benevolence_NN ._.
Their_PRP$ kindly_JJ action_NN is_VBZ ,_, however_RB ,_, well-known_JJ and_CC greatly_RB appreciated_JJ amongst_NNS those_DT classes_NNS who_WP suffer_VBP most_RBS from_IN the_DT plague_NN ,_, who_WP form_VBP in_IN short_JJ the_DT bulk_NN of_IN our_PRP$ hospital_NN and_CC contact_NN camp_NN population_NN ._.
The_DT increasing_VBG popularity_NN of_IN the_DT hospitals_NNS has_VBZ been_VBN very_RB marked_JJ and_CC apparent_JJ to_TO any_DT frequent_JJ visitor_NN to_TO these_DT formerly_RB dreaded_VBN institutions_NNS ._.
On_IN any_DT morning_NN at_IN the_DT Maratha_NNP Hospital_NNP an_DT observer_NN may_MD see_VB patients_NNS arriving_VBG voluntarily_RB at_IN the_DT hospital_NN gates_NNS ._.
Some_DT come_VBP in_IN bullock_NN carts_NNS ,_, some_DT in_IN reclas_NNS ,_, some_DT even_RB in_IN Victorias_NNP (_( but_CC these_DT are_VBP disinfected_VBN )_) ._.
Others_NNS are_VBP carried_VBN in_IN on_IN the_DT backs_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ friends_NNS ,_, and_CC I_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN a_DT sick_JJ wife_NN led_VBD gently_RB along_RB by_IN her_PRP$ husband_NN ,_, or_CC a_DT mill-hand_NN has_VBZ been_VBN brought_VBN in_IN carried_VBN along_IN by_IN two_CD fellow-workers_NNS whom_WP he_PRP held_VBD round_RP their_PRP$ necks_NNS for_IN ?_. 102_CD support_NN ._.
The_DT most_RBS frequent_JJ course_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, is_VBZ for_IN the_DT sick_JJ man_NN 's_POS friends_NNS to_TO come_VB and_CC borrow_VB an_DT ambulance_NN to_TO take_VB him_PRP to_TO hospital_NN ._.
A_DT similar_JJ increase_NN of_IN popularity_NN is_VBZ also_RB apparent_JJ at_IN the_DT other_JJ hospitals_NNS ._.
When_WRB we_PRP compare_VBP this_DT state_NN of_IN affairs_NNS with_IN the_DT dread_NN of_IN the_DT neglected_JJ hospitals_NNS of_IN 1896-97_JJ ,_, we_PRP see_VBP how_WRB much_JJ the_DT benevolent_JJ methods_NNS of_IN Government_NNP have_VBP accom-_NN plished_VBN in_IN popularizing_VBG our_PRP$ plague_NN hospitals_NNS ._.
OSVALD_NNP V._NNP MULLER_NNP ,_, (_( Volunteer_NNP )_) Official_NNP Plague_NNP Hospital_NNP Visitor_NNP ,_, Professor_NNP at_IN Elphinstone_NNP College_NNP ,_, Bombay_NNP ._.
10th_CD April_NNP 1899_CD ._.
Use_NNP of_IN the_DT Funds_NNS in_IN the_DT Districts_NNPS ._.
The_DT discretional_JJ relief_NN fund_NN played_VBD an_DT equally_RB conspicuous_JJ part_NN in_IN the_DT work_NN of_IN the_DT District_NNP Officers_NNPS in_IN their_PRP$ districts_NNS ._.
The_DT following_JJ note_NN by_IN Lt._NNP Warneford_NNP shows_VBZ how_WRB it_PRP was_VBD utilised_VBN :_: -_: ``_`` This_DT has_VBZ been_VBN found_VBN most_RBS useful_JJ in_IN promoting_VBG the_DT efficiency_NN as_RB well_RB as_IN the_DT popularity_NN of_IN plague_NN measures_NNS ._.
In_IN C_NNP Ward_NNP a_DT large_JJ amount_NN ,_, varying_VBG from_IN Rs_NNP ._.
2,500_CD in_IN February_NNP 1899_CD ,_, to_TO 600_CD or_CC 700_CD in_IN May_NNP 1899_CD ,_, has_VBZ been_VBN expended_VBN ._.
In_IN such_PDT a_DT large_JJ district_NN it_PRP was_VBD found_VBN impracticable_JJ to_TO keep_VB the_DT actual_JJ distribution_NN of_IN relief_NN and_CC of_IN compensation_NN in_IN the_DT hands_NNS of_IN the_DT District_NNP Officer_NNP alone_RB ,_, and_CC accordingly_RB out_IN of_IN the_DT total_JJ standing_NN advance_NN in_IN the_DT hands_NNS of_IN the_DT District_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, small_JJ standing_NN advances_NNS were_VBD made_VBN to_TO each_DT of_IN the_DT Assistant_NNP District_NNP Officers_NNP and_CC to_TO the_DT Section_NNP Medical_NNP Officers_NNP ._.
These_DT standing_VBG advances_NNS varied_VBD from_IN 25_CD to_TO 35_CD each_DT according_VBG to_TO the_DT number_NN and_CC class_NN of_IN the_DT population_NN of_IN each_DT Section_NN ._.
On_IN the_DT removal_NN of_IN patients_NNS to_TO Hospital_NNP ,_, or_CC the_DT despatch_NN of_IN their_PRP$ relations_NNS to_TO a_DT camp_NN as_IN contacts_NNS ,_, or_CC on_IN the_DT burning_NN of_IN the_DT clothing_NN or_CC bedding_VBG belonging_VBG to_TO a_DT plague_NN case_NN or_CC found_VBN in_IN a_DT plague_NN infected_JJ room_NN ,_, the_DT Officer_NNP present_NN paid_VBD immediately_RB a_DT small_JJ amount_NN to_TO the_DT persons_NNS concerned-_VBP that_DT is_VBZ ,_, to_TO compensate_VB them_PRP for_IN the_DT wage-earning_JJ time_NN lost_VBN to_TO them_PRP by_IN their_PRP$ removal_NN from_IN their_PRP$ home_NN ,_, or_CC for_IN the_DT expenses_NNS they_PRP would_MD probably_RB be_VB put_VBN to_TO by_IN such_JJ removal_NN ,_, or_CC for_IN the_DT value_NN of_IN their_PRP$ property_NN destroyed_VBD or_CC in_IN fact_NN for_IN any_DT loss_NN which_WDT would_MD be_VB entailed_VBN by_IN their_PRP$ temporary_JJ disturbance_NN from_IN their_PRP$ ordinary_JJ work_NN and_CC residence._VB ``_``
A_DT list_NN of_IN the_DT amounts_NNS thus_RB expended-giving_VBG full_JJ details_NNS as_IN regards_NNS the_DT cause_NN of_IN the_DT expenditure_NN ,_, date_NN ,_, time_NN ,_, and_CC place_NN ,_, and_CC names_NNS of_IN the_DT persons-was_NN submitted_VBN by_IN the_DT paying_VBG officer_NN to_TO the_DT District_NNP Officer_NNP every_DT Friday_NNP morning_NN ._.
This_DT list_NN was_VBD checked_VBN by_IN him_PRP ,_, and_CC if_IN approved_VBN ,_, the_DT amount_NN expended_VBD was_VBD refunded_VBN to_TO the_DT paying_VBG officer_NN next_JJ day_NN ,_, thus_RB making_VBG his_PRP$ standing_VBG advance_NN complete_JJ again_RB ._.
Then_RB again_RB on_IN occasions_NNS when_WRB a_DT large_JJ number_NN of_IN people_NNS ,_, three_CD or_CC four_CD hundred_CD say_NNS ,_, were_VBD being_VBG removed_VBN to_TO a_DT camp_NN on_IN account_NN of_IN their_PRP$ houses_NNS or_CC their_PRP$ immediate_JJ neighbourhood_NN being_VBG badly_RB infected_VBN the_DT District_NNP Officer_NNP was_VBD usually_RB present_JJ personally_RB to_TO distribute_VB relief_NN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD found_VBN expedient_NN in_IN such_JJ cases_NNS to_TO give_VB an_DT amount_NN of_IN money_NN to_TO each_DT family_NN sufficient_NN to_TO compensate_VB the_DT wage-earning_JJ members_NNS of_IN it_PRP for_IN the_DT loss_NN of_IN a_DT few_JJ hours_NNS or_CC of_IN a_DT day_NN 's_POS work._NN ``_``
In_IN all_DT cases_NNS the_DT carts_NNS or_CC coolies_NNS required_VBN to_TO transport_VB contacts_NNS or_CC evicts_NNS and_CC their_PRP$ property_NN to_TO camp_VB were_VBD also_RB paid_VBN for_IN ,_, and_CC this_DT was_VBD done_VBN in_IN the_DT following_JJ way_NN :_: -_: In_IN order_NN ,_, as_RB far_RB as_IN possible_JJ ,_, to_TO check_VB fraud_NN or_CC waste_NN on_IN the_DT part_NN of_IN subordinates_NNS ,_, the_DT officer_NN or_CC his_PRP$ inspector_NN when_WRB despatching_VBG a_DT loaded_JJ cart_NN off_IN to_TO camp_VB noted_VBN down_RP on_IN a_DT slip_NN of_IN paper_NN the_DT address_NN from_IN which_WDT it_PRP was_VBD sent_VBN and_CC the_DT exact_JJ time_NN at_IN which_WDT the_DT cart_NN was_VBD first_RB hired_VBN ._.
The_DT camp-master_NN having_VBG had_VBD the_DT cart_NN unloaded_VBD added_VBD the_DT exact_JJ time_NN of_IN unloading_VBG on_IN this_DT slip_NN and_CC sent_VBD the_DT cartman_NN off_IN to_TO the_DT District_NNP Office_NNP ,_, where_WRB he_PRP was_VBD paid_VBN the_DT correct_NN amount_NN due_JJ to_TO him_PRP in_IN the_DT presence_NN of_IN the_DT District_NNP ?_. 103_CD Officer_NNP ._.
This_DT system_NN reduced_VBD considerably_RB the_DT possibility_NN of_IN fraud_NN ,_, and_CC was_VBD far_RB more_JJR satisfactory_JJ to_TO all_DT concerned_VBN than_IN the_DT entrusting_NN of_IN money_NN to_TO subordinates_NNS to_TO pay_VB these_DT sorts_NNS of_IN charges._NN ``_``
On_IN the_DT discharge_NN of_IN contacts_NNS or_CC evicts_NNS from_IN camp_NN the_DT carts_NNS to_TO take_VB their_PRP$ kit_NN back_RB again_RB to_TO the_DT same_JJ or_CC another_DT residence_NN were_VBD also_RB paid_VBN for_IN ,_, by_IN a_DT similar_JJ arrangement_NN to_TO that_DT described_VBN above_IN ,_, and_CC if_IN their_PRP$ residence_NN in_IN a_DT camp_NN or_CC attending_VBG on_IN a_DT relation_NN in_IN a_DT hospital_NN was_VBD likely_JJ to_TO in_IN any_DT way_NN entail_JJ loss_NN of_IN wages_NNS to_TO them_PRP ,_, they_PRP were_VBD paid_VBN a_DT small_JJ amount_NN for_IN their_PRP$ support_NN during_IN such_JJ period_NN ._.
This_DT ,_, however_RB ,_, was_VBD not_RB often_RB done_VBN ,_, nor_CC did_VBD the_DT people_NNS ask_VBP for_IN it_PRP ._.
``_`` It_PRP is_VBZ curious_JJ how_WRB ,_, once_RB these_DT payments_NNS of_IN compensation_NN were_VBD started_VBN ,_, the_DT people_NNS of_IN the_DT poorer_NN classes_VBZ immediately_RB became_VBD aware_JJ of_IN the_DT fact_NN ,_, that_IN if_IN removed_VBN to_TO a_DT camp_NN or_CC hospital_NN or_CC if_IN their_PRP$ bedding_NN or_CC clothing_NN were_VBD destroyed_VBN they_PRP would_MD get_VB a_DT little_JJ money_NN ,_, and_CC naturally_RB this_DT knowledge_NN induced_VBD them_PRP to_TO regard_VB plague_NN measures_NNS with_IN less_JJR disfavour_NN ._.
I_PRP consider_VBP also_RB that_IN this_DT distribution_NN of_IN relief_NN has_VBZ ,_, among_IN the_DT poorer_NN classes_VBZ particularly_RB ,_, to_TO some_DT extent_NN reduced_VBD the_DT concealment_NN of_IN plague_NN and_CC also_RB the_DT removal_NN of_IN plague_NN cases_NNS from_IN place_NN to_TO place_NN ._.
No_RB longer_RBR fearing_VBG great_JJ loss_NN or_CC hardship_NN through_IN our_PRP$ measures_NNS they_PRP no_RB longer_RBR take_VB so_RB much_JJ care_NN to_TO hide_VB plague_JJ cases_NNS from_IN us_PRP ._. ''_''
The_DT Fund_NNP was_VBD not_RB of_IN great_JJ use_NN among_IN the_DT well-to-do_JJ inhabitants_NNS of_IN B_NNP Ward_NNP South_NNP ,_, but_CC elsewhere_RB the_DT District_NNP Officers_NNPS are_VBP unanimous_JJ in_IN their_PRP$ appreciation_NN of_IN the_DT advantages_NNS which_WDT have_VBP accrued_VBN from_IN this_DT generous_JJ contribution_NN of_IN Government_NNP towards_IN the_DT relief_NN of_IN individual_JJ misery_NN in_IN the_DT City_NNP ._.
Captain_NNP Pritchard_NNP writes_VBZ :_: -_: ``_`` This_DT money_NN was_VBD spent_VBN in_IN accordance_NN with_IN circular_JJ orders_NNS issued_VBN on_IN the_DT subject_NN ._.
The_DT objects_NNS on_IN which_WDT it_PRP was_VBD spent_VBN were_VBD distinctly_RB limited_VBN to_TO plague_VB and_CC those_DT who_WP suffered_VBD therefrom_IN either_DT directly_RB or_CC indirectly._VB ``_``
As_IN for_IN instance_NN ,_, relief_NN offered_VBN to_TO those_DT sent_VBN to_TO Camps_NNP ,_, also_RB to_TO such_JJ as_IN it_PRP was_VBD necessary_JJ to_TO relieve_VB owing_VBG to_TO loss_NN of_IN wages_NNS ,_, also_RB for_IN property_NN destroyed_NN ,_, and_CC gifts_NNS to_TO such_JJ as_IN were_VBD discharged_VBN cured_VBN from_IN hospitals_NNS and_CC for_IN transit_NN charges_NNS incurred_VBN in_IN conveyance_NN of_IN evicts_NNS and_CC their_PRP$ baggage_NN to_TO and_CC from_IN camps_NNS ._.
Also_RB to_TO assist_VB poor_JJ families_NNS ,_, orphans_NNS and_CC such_JJ like_IN to_TO their_PRP$ homes_NNS out_IN of_IN Bombay._NNP ``_``
This_DT form_NN of_IN relief_NN gave_VBD the_DT best_JJS results_NNS and_CC the_DT more_RBR so_RB according_VBG to_TO the_DT tact_NN and_CC care_NN and_CC moderation_NN with_IN which_WDT it_PRP was_VBD used_VBN ._.
Considering_VBG the_DT poverty_NN and_CC distress_NN always_RB found_VBN and_CC in_IN addition_NN the_DT heavy_JJ losses_NNS incurred_VBN by_IN families_NNS from_IN plague_NN ,_, this_DT money_NN was_VBD an_DT actual_JJ blessing_NN to_TO the_DT poor_JJ ._.
But_CC great_JJ care_NN and_CC moderation_NN were_VBD essential_JJ in_IN order_NN to_TO reap_VB true_JJ gratitude_NN from_IN the_DT people_NNS ._.
Else_RB the_DT money_NN was_VBD I_PRP considered_VBD to_TO a_DT certain_JJ extent_NN wasted_VBD ,_, for_IN though_IN it_PRP was_VBD better_RBR to_TO err_VB on_IN the_DT side_NN of_IN charity_NN than_IN on_IN that_DT of_IN illiberality_NN ,_, yet_RB there_EX was_VBD no_DT question_NN of_IN the_DT valuable_JJ results_NNS that_WDT might_MD be_VB obtained_VBN by_IN a_DT careful_JJ distribution_NN of_IN this_DT Fund_NNP ._.
It_PRP educated_VBD the_DT people_NNS ,_, informed_VBD them_PRP of_IN our_PRP$ open_JJ hearted_VBN sympathy_NN ,_, linked_VBD their_PRP$ sympathies_NNS to_TO ours_NNS and_CC drew_NN from_IN them_PRP something_NN more_JJR than_IN a_DT sullen_JJ acquiescence_NN in_IN the_DT Government_NNP measures_NNS ._. ''_''
The_DT actual_JJ assistance_NN in_IN cases_NNS of_IN desperate_JJ distress_NN has_VBZ been_VBN enormous_JJ ;_: and_CC nothing_NN has_VBZ done_VBN more_JJR to_TO convince_VB the_DT people_NNS generally_RB that_IN plague_NN measures_NNS are_VBP intended_VBN for_IN their_PRP$ welfare_NN ._.
This_DT change_NN in_IN their_PRP$ attitude_NN has_VBZ been_VBN cheaply_RB purchased_VBN at_IN the_DT expenditure_NN of_IN 50,000_CD Rupees_NNS :_: and_CC to_TO those_DT who_WP have_VBP experienced_VBN the_DT advantages_NNS of_IN the_DT Discretional_NNP Relief_NNP Fund_NNP it_PRP is_VBZ difficult_JJ to_TO realize_VB how_WRB previous_JJ epidemics_NNS have_VBP been_VBN got_VBN through_IN ,_, and_CC impossible_JJ to_TO contemplate_VB facing_VBG another_DT epidemic_NN ,_, without_IN its_PRP$ assistance_NN ._.
105_CD CHAPTER_NN VII_NNP ._.
Volunteers_NNS ._.
The_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN Volunteers_NNS on_IN the_DT various_JJ Committees_NNS in_IN each_DT district_NN is_VBZ marginally_RB shown_VBN ._.
A_DT Ward_NNP ..._: ..._: 28_CD B_NNP Ward_NNP (_( South_NNP )_) ..._: 54_CD B_NNP Ward_NNP (_( North_NNP )_) ..._: 21_CD C_NNP Ward_NNP ..._: ..._: 233_CD D_NNP Waid_NNP 160_CD E_NNP Ward_NNP (_( West_NNP )_) ..._: ..._: 47_CD B_NNP Ward_NNP (_( Byculla_NNP )_) ..._: ..._: 9_CD E_NNP Ward_NNP (_( East_NNP )_) ,_, Wari_NNP Bandar_NNP 5_CD F_NNP and_CC G_NNP Wards_NNP ..._: ..._: 102_CD Central_NNP District_NNP ..._: ..._: 143_CD Total_NN ..._: 802_CD More_JJR than_IN half_NN of_IN these_DT did_VBD real_JJ work_NN and_CC rendered_VBD valuable_JJ service_NN ._.
Their_PRP$ organization_NN and_CC methods_NNS varied_VBN in_IN different_JJ districts_NNS ._.
This_DT organisation_NN was_VBD ,_, perhaps_RB ,_, more_JJR perfect_JJ in_IN C_NNP Ward_NNP than_IN in_IN any_DT other_JJ part_NN of_IN the_DT City_NNP ,_, though_IN in_IN many_JJ other_JJ sections_NNS the_DT volunteers_NNS worked_VBD equally_RB well_RB ,_, but_CC rather_RB as_IN individuals_NNS than_IN members_NNS of_IN Committees_NNP ._.
The_DT following_NN is_VBZ an_DT account_NN by_IN Lieut_NNP ._.
Warneford_NNP of_IN the_DT organisa-_JJ tion_NN of_IN Volunteer_NNP Committees_NNP in_IN C_NNP Ward_NNP ,_, in_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN October_NNP ,_, before_IN the_DT formation_NN of_IN the_DT Central_NNP District_NNP had_VBD taken_VBN away_RB Kharatalao_NNP and_CC a_DT portion_NN of_IN Bhuleshwar_NNP :_: -_: ``_`` Each_DT section_NN has_VBZ a_DT certain_JJ number_NN of_IN Committees_NNP ,_, as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -_: Market_NN 8_CD committees_NNS ._.
Dhobitalao_NNP 7_CD ``_`` Fanaswadi_NNP 4_CD ``_`` Kumbharwada_NNP 7_CD ``_`` Kharatalao_NNP 6_CD ``_`` Bhuleshwar_NNP 6_CD ``_`` ``_`` These_DT Committees_NNS are_VBP composed_VBN of_IN gentlemen_NNS who_WP may_MD be_VB divided_VBN into_IN three_CD ``_`` classes_NNS as_IN regards_NNS their_PRP$ working-_JJ (_( 1_CD )_) those_DT who_WP have_VBP influence_NN and_CC who_WP use_VBP it_PRP ``_`` actively_RB and_CC personally_RB ;_: (_( 2_CD )_) those_DT who_WP have_VBP influence_NN but_CC who_WP do_VBP little_RB besides_IN ``_`` lending_VBG their_PRP$ names_NNS to_TO the_DT Committees_NNP ;_: and_CC (_( 3_CD )_) those_DT ,_, forming_VBG the_DT most_RBS numer-_JJ ``_`` ous_JJ class_NN ,_, who_WP have_VBP not_RB much_JJ influence_NN but_CC who_WP work_VBP actively_RB and_CC steadily_RB at_IN ``_`` their_PRP$ duty_NN of_IN house_NN visitation_NN ._.
On_IN the_DT C_NNP Ward_NNP Committees_NNP there_EX are_VBP representa-_JJ ``_`` tives_NNS of_IN all_DT classes_NNS and_CC creeds_NNS ._.
There_EX are_VBP great_JJ merchants_NNS ,_, leaders_NNS of_IN various_JJ Hindu_NNP ``_`` and_CC Mahomedan_NNP communities_NNS ,_, who_WP support_VBP caste_NN hospitals_NNS and_CC other_JJ plague_NN institu-_JJ ``_`` tions_NNS at_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ expense_NN ._.
There_EX are_VBP many_JJ professional_JJ gentlemen_NNS ,_, doctors_NNS ,_, pleaders_NNS ``_`` and_CC solicitors_NNS ,_, members_NNS of_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Municipality_NNP ,_, moulvies_NNS and_CC mullahs_NNS ,_, shop-_JJ ``_`` keepers_NNS ,_, clerks_NNS and_CC others_NNS ._.
In_IN all_DT there_EX are_VBP 37_CD Committees_NNS with_IN 257_CD members_NNS ._.
*_JJ ``_`` Each_DT Committee_NNP is_VBZ composed_VBN of_IN a_DT chairman_NN and_CC from_IN 3_CD or_CC 4_CD to_TO ,_, in_IN some_DT cases_NNS ,_, 12_CD or_CC ``_`` 15_CD members_NNS ._.
These_DT divide_VBP the_DT streets_NNS apportioned_VBD to_TO their_PRP$ Committee_NNP between_IN them_PRP ``_`` and_CC inspect_VB these_DT streets_NNS individually_RB ,_, under_IN the_DT general_JJ supervision_NN of_IN the_DT chairman_NN ._.
``_`` At_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN each_DT week_NN the_DT chairman_NN sends_VBZ in_IN a_DT report_NN to_TO the_DT District_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN ``_`` the_DT number_NN of_IN houses_NNS visited_VBN and_CC reported_VBN by_IN his_PRP$ Committee_NNP during_IN the_DT week_NN ,_, also_RB ``_`` of_IN any_DT sanitary_JJ defects_NNS or_CC other_JJ matters_NNS that_IN he_PRP wishes_VBZ to_TO bring_VB to_TO notice_VB ,_, and_CC the_DT *_JJ Note.-At_NNP the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN when_WRB Kharatalao_NNP and_CC a_DT portion_NN of_IN Bhuleshwar_NNP had_VBD been_VBN transferred_VBN to_TO the_DT Central_NNP District_NNP there_EX were_VBD 32_CD Committees_NNS and_CC 233_CD members_NNS ._.
?_. 106_CD ``_`` number_NN of_IN cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN ._.
The_DT Medical_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN each_DT section_NN of_IN the_DT ward_JJ accom-_JJ ``_`` panies_NNS one_CD of_IN the_DT Committees_NNP at_IN least_JJS twice_RB in_IN each_DT week_NN ,_, in_IN order_NN to_TO keep_VB in_IN touch_JJ ``_`` with_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC also_RB to_TO keep_VB up_RP their_PRP$ working_NN ._.
The_DT District_NNP Officer_NNP also_RB accompanies_VBZ ``_`` Committees_NNS or_CC particular_JJ members_NNS at_IN frequent_JJ intervals_NNS ._.
Their_PRP$ work_NN and_CC its_PRP$ nature_NN ``_`` varies_NNS considerably_RB according_VBG to_TO the_DT individuality_NN of_IN the_DT chairman_NN or_CC member_NN and_CC ``_`` the_DT section_NN in_IN which_WDT they_PRP work_VBP ._.
Some_DT gentlemen_NNS go_VBP out_RP regularly_RB morning_NN and_CC ``_`` evening_NN and_CC seem_VBP to_TO put_VB a_DT regular_JJ enthusiasm_NN into_IN their_PRP$ voluntary_JJ duties_NNS ,_, others_NNS go_VBP ``_`` out_RB once_RB or_CC twice_RB a_DT week_NN ,_, others_NNS again_RB (_( but_CC they_PRP are_VBP very_RB few_JJ )_) do_VBP not_RB go_VB out_RP at_IN all_DT ``_`` except_IN when_WRB stirred_VBN up_RP by_IN the_DT District_NNP Officer_NNP to_TO an_DT occasional_JJ effort_NN ._.
Besides_IN their_PRP$ ``_`` work_NN of_IN house_NN visitation_NN ,_, the_DT Committees_NNS or_CC their_PRP$ individual_JJ members_NNS are_VBP of_IN great_JJ ``_`` assistance_NN in_IN many_JJ other_JJ ways-in_JJ reporting_VBG dirty_NN or_CC overcrowded_VBN houses_NNS ,_, in_IN per-_JJ ``_`` suading_JJ landlords_NNS or_CC tenants_NNS to_TO limewash_VB and_CC clean_VB their_PRP$ houses_NNS ,_, in_IN persuading_VBG ``_`` people_NNS to_TO leave_VB infected_VBN houses_NNS ,_, and_CC go_VB to_TO camps_VB or_CC elsewhere_RB ,_, in_IN fact_NN in_IN a_DT great_JJ many_JJ ``_`` ways_NNS that_WDT can_MD not_RB be_VB accurately_RB gauged_VBN by_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN that_IN they_PRP ``_`` do_VBP or_CC do_VB not_RB report_VB during_IN the_DT week_NN ._.
I_PRP consider_VBP that_DT so_RB long_RB as_IN there_EX is_VBZ an_DT active_JJ and_CC ``_`` intimate_JJ connection_NN between_IN the_DT District_NNP Officer_NNP and_CC his_PRP$ Committees_NNS ,_, they_PRP are_VBP a_DT great_JJ '_POS and_CC very_RB useful_JJ means_NNS of_IN carrying_VBG out_RP plague_JJ measures_NNS in_IN a_DT conciliatory_JJ manner_NN and_CC ``_`` also_RB of_IN discovering_VBG plague_NN cases_NNS ._.
Of_IN course_NN ,_, I_PRP am_VBP only_RB speaking_VBG generally_RB ,_, as_IN in_IN ``_`` many_JJ instances_NNS cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN are_VBP as_IN studiously_RB and_CC effectually_RB concealed_VBN from_IN these_DT ``_`` gentlemen_NNS as_IN they_PRP are_VBP from_IN the_DT District_NNP or_CC Medical_NNP Officers_NNPS ._. ''_''
An_DT endeavour_NN was_VBD made_VBN in_IN C_NNP Ward_NNP to_TO get_VB the_DT Committees_NNP to_TO assist_VB in_IN encouraging_JJ inoculation_NN ._.
But_CC their_PRP$ sympathies_NNS in_IN its_PRP$ favour_NN were_VBD somewhat_RB doubtful_JJ ;_: they_PRP never_RB took_VBD the_DT matter_NN up_RP very_RB heartily_RB ,_, and_CC practically_RB no_DT result_NN was_VBD obtained_VBN in_IN this_DT direction_NN ,_, though_RB certain_JJ promi-_JJ nent_NN individuals_NNS ,_, as_IN has_VBZ been_VBN elsewhere_RB described_VBN ,_, made_VBN every_DT effort_NN ._.
Later_RB on_IN at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN May_NNP Lieut_NNP ._.
Warneford_NNP again_RB writes_VBZ :_: -_: ``_`` As_IN regards_NNS the_DT Committees_NNP in_IN the_DT ward_NN ,_, they_PRP have_VBP ,_, I_PRP think_VBP ,_, answered_VBD ``_`` their_PRP$ purpose_NN admirably_RB ,_, while_IN they_PRP have_VBP not_RB been_VBN the_DT means_NN of_IN directly_RB bringing_VBG ``_`` to_TO notice_RB more_JJR than_IN a_DT third_JJ to_TO a_DT half_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN cases_NNS that_IN we_PRP have_VBP recorded_VBN ,_, ._.
``_`` yet_RB they_PRP have_VBP been_VBN the_DT means_NN of_IN making_VBG the_DT necessity_NN of_IN our_PRP$ measures_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT ``_`` justice_NN of_IN our_PRP$ intentions_NNS ,_, more_RBR or_CC less_RBR understood_JJ by_IN the_DT people_NNS so_IN that_IN we_PRP ``_`` have_VBP been_VBN able_JJ to_TO do_VB our_PRP$ work_NN with_IN their_PRP$ good_JJ will_MD ._.
In_IN dealing_VBG with_IN Com-_NNP ``_`` mittees_NNS my_PRP$ object_NN has_VBZ been_VBN to_TO encourage_VB individuality_NN and_CC independence_NN of_IN ``_`` action_NN on_IN the_DT part_NN of_IN those_DT members_NNS who_WP show_VBP zeal_NN and_CC capability_NN and_CC ac-_JJ ``_`` cordingly_RB all_DT plague_NN cases_NNS and_CC other_JJ urgent_JJ matters_NNS are_VBP reported_VBN direct_JJ to_TO the_DT ``_`` District_NNP Officer_NNP or_CC section_NN Medical_JJ Officer_NNP concerned_VBN ,_, while_IN the_DT routine_JJ weekly_JJ ``_`` reports_NNS of_IN work_NN done_VBN are_VBP submitted_VBN through_IN the_DT chairman_NN ._.
Frequent_JJ meetings_NNS ``_`` and_CC discussions_NNS have_VBP been_VBN discouraged_VBN ,_, and_CC it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN found_VBN that_IN as_IN a_DT general_JJ rule_NN ``_`` the_DT Volunteers_NNS have_VBP loyally_RB carried_VBN out_RP the_DT suggestions_NNS made_VBN to_TO them_PRP ._.
At_IN the_DT ``_`` same_JJ time_NN it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN found_VBN very_RB necessary_JJ to_TO keep_VB in_IN constant_JJ touch_NN and_CC sympathy_JJ ``_`` with_IN them_PRP in_IN their_PRP$ work_NN ,_, otherwise_RB they_PRP slacken_VBP off_RP immediately_RB ._.
Probably_RB better_RBR ``_`` results_NNS have_VBP been_VBN obtained_VBN from_IN many_JJ small_JJ committees_NNS ,_, than_IN from_IN a_DT few_JJ large_JJ ``_`` ones_NNS ,_, as_IN a_DT more_RBR independent_JJ charge_NN encourages_VBZ energy_NN and_CC pride_NN in_IN their_PRP$ work_NN ._.
It_PRP ``_`` has_VBZ been_VBN difficult_JJ to_TO get_VB the_DT Volunteers_NNS to_TO keep_VB a_DT thorough_JJ watch_NN on_IN and_CC a_DT record_NN ``_`` of_IN all_DT sickness_NN found_VBD ,_, whether_IN plague_NN or_CC not_RB ,_, as_IN to_TO carry_VB this_DT out_RP completely_RB re-_JJ quires_NNS more_JJR time_NN and_CC trouble_NN than_IN the_DT average_JJ Volunteers_NNS can_MD spare_VB ._.
However_RB ,_, in_IN ``_`` the_DT most_RBS plague-infected_JJ section_NN of_IN the_DT ward-Kumbharwada-nearly_JJ all_DT the_DT mem-_JJ ``_`` bers_NNS keep_VB a_DT very_RB complete_JJ supervision_NN over_IN ordinary_JJ sickness_NN ,_, and_CC consequently_RB ``_`` there_EX is_VBZ hardly_RB a_DT death_NN that_WDT occurs_VBZ that_IN these_DT gentlemen_NNS do_VBP not_RB know_VB the_DT pre-_JJ ``_`` vious_JJ history_NN of_IN ._.
This_DT ,_, of_IN course_NN ,_, is_VBZ a_DT great_JJ assistance_NN and_CC makes_VBZ the_DT work_NN of_IN get-_JJ ``_`` ting_VBG hold_NN of_IN every_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN for_IN disinfection_NN so_RB much_RB the_DT more_JJR easy_JJ and_CC ``_`` certain_JJ ._.
The_DT part_NN of_IN our_PRP$ work_NN that_IN met_VBD at_IN first_JJ with_IN rather_RB doubtful_JJ support_NN from_IN ?_. 107_CD ``_`` Volunteers_NNS was_VBD the_DT removal_NN of_IN plague_NN cases_NNS to_TO hospital_NN ._.
They_PRP were_VBD all_DT more_RBR or_CC less_RBR ``_`` in_IN sympathy_NN with_IN plague_NN cases_NNS being_VBG kept_VBN at_IN home_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP required_VBD much_JJ time_NN and_CC ``_`` trouble_NN to_TO get_VB them_PRP to_TO heartily_VB support_VB the_DT opposite_JJ principle_NN which_WDT has_VBZ guided_VBN us_PRP ,_, ``_`` i.e._NN ,_, that_IN ,_, extraordinary_JJ causes_NNS (_( such_JJ as_IN great_JJ weakness_NN ,_, &_CC c._NN )_) apart_RB ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ far_RB better_RBR ``_`` for_IN the_DT ordinary_JJ sick_JJ man_NN in_IN a_DT native_JJ house_NN to_TO be_VB treated_VBN in_IN hospital_NN than_IN at_IN home_NN ._.
``_`` The_DT broader_JJR question_NN of_IN saving_VBG the_DT lives_NNS of_IN others_NNS and_CC of_IN checking_VBG plague_JJ infection_NN ``_`` by_IN the_DT prompt_JJ removal_NN of_IN plague_NN cases_NNS to_TO hospital_NN was_VBD not_RB so_RB much_JJ dwelt_NN upon_IN as_IN ``_`` the_DT benefit_NN in_IN each_DT individual_JJ case_NN ._.
It_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN our_PRP$ consistent_JJ policy_NN never_RB to_TO ``_`` leave_VB a_DT case_NN in_IN the_DT house_NN ,_, unless_IN the_DT patient_NN was_VBD in_IN a_DT state_NN unfit_NN for_IN removal_NN ,_, and_CC ``_`` at_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN we_PRP have_VBP endeavoured_VBN to_TO encourage_VB voluntary_JJ removals_NNS as_IN much_JJ ``_`` as_IN possible_JJ ,_, i.e._FW ,_, removals_NNS by_IN the_DT agency_NN of_IN relations_NNS or_CC friends_NNS or_CC Volunteers_NNS alone_RB ``_`` without_IN the_DT interference_NN or_CC presence_NN of_IN the_DT District_NNP Officer_NNP or_CC his_PRP$ section_NN Medical_NNP ``_`` Officer_NNP ,_, and_CC now_RB I_PRP find_VBP that_IN in_IN 9_CD cases_NNS out_IN of_IN 10_CD the_DT Volunteers_NNP themselves_PRP initiate_VBP ``_`` and_CC encourage_VB immediate_JJ removal_NN to_TO hospital_NN ._. ''_''
Captain_NNP Cuppage_NNP ,_, who_WP at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN relieved_VBD Lieut_NNP ._.
Warneford_NNP in_IN this_DT District_NNP ,_, reports_VBZ that_IN between_IN November_NNP 1898_CD and_CC May_NNP 1899_CD ,_, 1,233_CD cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN out_IN of_IN a_DT total_NN of_IN 2,593_CD were_VBD reported_VBN by_IN Volunteers_NNS ._.
He_PRP adds_VBZ :_: -_: ``_`` When_WRB I_PRP first_RB joined_VBD the_DT District_NNP I_PRP could_MD not_RB help_VB being_VBG struck_VBN by_IN the_DT energy_NN ``_`` which_WDT the_DT Volunteers_NNPS threw_VBD into_IN their_PRP$ work_NN ._.
Whenever_WRB I_PRP went_VBD round_NN with_IN the_DT ``_`` Sectional_NNP Medical_NNP Officers_NNP I_PRP always_RB found_VBD some_DT of_IN the_DT Volunteers_NNS on_IN their_PRP$ rounds_NNS ``_`` though_IN they_PRP had_VBD no_DT previous_JJ intimation_NN of_IN my_PRP$ intention_NN to_TO visit_VB them_PRP ._. ''_''
The_DT work_NN of_IN the_DT Volunteers_NNP in_IN A_NNP Ward_NNP ,_, too_RB ,_, was_VBD excellent_JJ ._.
There_EX were_VBD only_RB 2_CD Committees_NNS ,_, one_CD for_IN the_DT Fort_NNP and_CC one_CD for_IN Colaba_NNP ,_, comprising_VBG 28_CD gentlemen_NNS ._.
They_PRP reported_VBD 487_CD cases_NNS or_CC 32_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
of_IN the_DT total_NN found_VBD ,_, and_CC there_EX were_VBD some_DT of_IN them_PRP who_WP did_VBD their_PRP$ work_NN with_IN unbounded_JJ en-husiasm_NN ,_, devoting_VBG the_DT whole_NN of_IN their_PRP$ leisure_NN time_NN to_TO it_PRP ._.
By_IN keeping_VBG constautly_RB in_IN touch_NN with_IN the_DT people_NNS ,_, with_IN the_DT house-owners_NNS and_CC bhayas_NN (_( care-takers_NNS )_) they_PRP obtained_VBD a_DT thorough_JJ knowledge_NN of_IN their_PRP$ beats_NNS ,_, while_IN some_DT of_IN them_PRP had_VBD great_JJ influence_NN of_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ as_IN householders_NNS ,_, leaders_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ communities_NNS ,_, or_CC well-known_JJ medical_JJ practitioners_NNS ._.
Thanks_NNS to_TO their_PRP$ tact_NN ,_, good_JJ humour_NN and_CC kindness_NN ,_, not_RB a_DT single_JJ serious_JJ difficulty_NN occurred_VBD in_IN the_DT plague_JJ administration_NN of_IN A_NNP Ward_NNP ._.
In_IN B_NNP Ward_NNP (_( North_NNP )_) there_EX were_VBD 21_CD gentlemen_NNS who_WP worked_VBD ._.
They_PRP had_VBD an_DT overcrowded_VBN ,_, in-_JJ sanitary_JJ district_NN to_TO deal_VB with_IN ,_, and_CC never_RB got_VBD such_JJ a_DT hold_NN upon_NN it_PRP as_IN was_VBD secured_VBN by_IN those_DT in_IN A_DT Ward_NNP ._.
They_PRP did_VBD ,_, however_RB ,_, from_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN ,_, excellent_JJ work_NN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD marred_VBN occasionally_RB by_IN bickering_VBG ,_, and_CC a_DT good_JJ deal_NN of_IN effort_NN was_VBD required_VBN to_TO work_VB up_RP any_DT keenness_NN among_IN them_PRP ._.
There_EX were_VBD ,_, however_RB ,_, one_CD or_CC two_CD exceptionally_RB hard_JJ workers_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT short-_JJ comings_NNS of_IN the_DT Committees_NNP as_IN a_DT whole_NN may_MD be_VB with_IN some_DT justice_NN ascribed_VBD to_TO the_DT fact_NN that_IN the_DT District_NNP Officer_NNP was_VBD so_RB constantly_RB changed_VBN ._.
This_DT was_VBD unavoidable_JJ ._.
The_DT following_JJ account_NN is_VBZ given_VBN by_IN Lieut_NNP ._.
Brackenbury_NN of_IN the_DT work_NN of_IN Volunteers_NNS in_IN B_NNP Ward_NNP (_( South_NNP )_) ._.
``_`` In_IN June_NNP 1898_CD I_PRP found_VBD two_CD Committees_NNS working_VBG in_IN Mandvi_NNP and_CC one_CD in_IN ``_`` Chakla_NNP ._.
The_DT Committees_NNP in_IN Mandvi_NNP were_VBD the_DT Cutch_NNP Lohana_NNP and_CC the_DT Khoja_NNP (_( with_IN a_DT ``_`` Sub-Committee_NN for_IN Jews_NNP )_) ._.
The_DT Committee_NNP in_IN Chakla_NNP was_VBD the_DT Chakla_NNP Mixed_NNP ``_`` (_( Hindu_NNP and_CC Mahomedans_NNPS )_) ._.
The_DT Lohana_NNP Committee_NNP were_VBD supposed_VBN to_TO look_VB after_IN ``_`` the_DT whole_NN of_IN Mandvi_NNP ,_, i.e._NN ,_, not_RB only_RB their_PRP$ own_JJ caste_NN ,_, but_CC also_RB the_DT two_CD very_RB large_JJ castes_NNS ?_. 108_CD of_IN Banias_NNP and_CC Bhatyas_NNP ,_, not_RB counting_VBG a_DT small_JJ number_NN of_IN Marwaris_NNP ,_, Guzeratis_NNP ,_, etc._NN ,_, as_RB well_RB as_IN Ghattis_NNP and_CC Kolies_NNP in_IN Koliwada_NNP ._.
Amongst_NNP these_DT high_JJ caste_NN Hin-_NNP dus_NN it_PRP is_VBZ only_RB men_NNS of_IN the_DT very_RB greatest_JJS influence_NN who_WP dare_VBP enter_JJ houses_NNS belong-_JJ ing_NN to_TO other_JJ castes_NNS ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ necessary_JJ here_RB to_TO state_NN that_IN in_IN Mandvi_NNP people_NNS of_IN differ-_JJ ent_NN castes_NNS do_VBP not_RB live_VB together_RB in_IN the_DT same_JJ house_NN ._.
In_IN one_CD house_NN will_MD be_VB found_VBN only_RB Lohanas_NNP ,_, in_IN another_DT only_JJ Bhatias_NNP ;_: and_CC so_RB on_IN ._.

Sirdar_NNP Mahomed_NNP Yakub_NNP 's_POS interesting_JJ account_NN of_IN voluntary_JJ work_NN in_IN the_DT Central_NNP District_NNP is_VBZ given_VBN below_IN :_: -_: ``_`` The_DT Memons_NNP constitute_VBP one_CD of_IN the_DT most_RBS important_JJ Mussalman_NNP communities_VBZ ``_`` in_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
For_IN various_JJ reasons_NNS ,_, plague_JJ work_NN among_IN them_PRP had_VBD been_VBN going_VBG on_IN in_IN ``_`` an_DT unsatisfactory_JJ manner_NN ._.
The_DT Volunteers_NNPS were_VBD doing_VBG little_JJ ._.
House-to-house_NNP ``_`` search_NN by_IN Volunteers_NNP was_VBD nominal_JJ or_CC unknown_JJ ,_, and_CC although_IN in_IN September_NNP the_DT ``_`` mortality_NN was_VBD as_RB high_JJ as_IN double_JJ the_DT average_NN ,_, not_RB a_DT single_JJ plague_NN case_NN was_VBD reported_VBN ``_`` nor_CC was_VBD information_NN of_IN any_DT case_NN obtained_VBN from_IN any_DT other_JJ source_NN ._.
In_IN one_CD case_NN only_RB ``_`` information_NN had_VBD been_VBN got_VBN under_IN exceptional_JJ circumstances_NNS ,_, Within_IN two_CD weeks_NNS ``_`` of_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN September_NNP in_IN the_DT Kolsa_NNP Moholla_NNP five_CD deaths_NNS ,_, one_CD after_IN another_DT ,_, took_VBD ``_`` place_NN in_IN one_CD house_NN ,_, and_CC no_DT less_JJR a_DT person_NN than_IN the_DT then_RB Chairman_NNP of_IN the_DT Committee_NNP ``_`` supported_VBD ,_, before_IN the_DT District_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, stories_NNS ascribing_VBG each_DT death_NN to_TO a_DT non-plague_JJ ``_`` sickness_NN ._.
There_EX were_VBD other_JJ Memon_NNP houses_NNS in_IN which_WDT one_CD death_NN was_VBD followed_VBN by_IN ``_`` another_DT or_CC more_RBR in_IN the_DT same_JJ house_NN ,_, but_CC they_PRP were_VBD always_RB ascribed_VBN to_TO causes_VB other_JJ ``_`` than_IN plague_NN ._.
None_NN of_IN the_DT four_CD Moholla_NNP Hospitals_NNP of_IN the_DT Memons_NNP had_VBD been_VBN open_JJ ,_, ``_`` and_CC no_DT one_NN had_VBD been_VBN sent_VBN to_TO camp_VB or_CC hospital_NN ._.
The_DT one_CD patient_NN mentioned_VBD above_IN ``_`` was_VBD segregated_VBN in_IN his_PRP$ house_NN ._.
One_CD Jamayet_NNP had_VBD ,_, from_IN the_DT first_JJ ,_, declined_VBD to_TO form_VB a_DT ``_`` Committee_NNP of_IN Volunteers_NNP ;_: the_DT other_JJ Jamayets_NNS had_VBD separated_VBN from_IN them_PRP owing_VBG to_TO ``_`` differences_NNS ;_: and_CC the_DT leaders_NNS of_IN the_DT latter_NN were_VBD ,_, on_IN the_DT one_CD hand_NN ,_, anxious_JJ that_IN they_PRP ``_`` should_MD not_RB do_VB anything_NN to_TO incur_VB displeasure_NN of_IN their_PRP$ people_NNS and_CC ,_, on_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN ,_, ``_`` the_DT people_NNS would_MD not_RB listen_VB to_TO the_DT leaders_NNS ,_, because_IN they_PRP knew_VBD that_IN their_PRP$ neighbours_NNS ,_, ``_`` -the_JJ rival_NN Jamayet_NNP ,_, -_: did_VBD nothing_NN ._. ''_''
``_`` When_WRB my_PRP$ district_NN was_VBD formed_VBN on_IN 1st_CD November_NNP 1898_CD I_PRP had_VBD ascertained_VBN ``_`` the_DT principal_NN causes_VBZ which_WDT made_VBD the_DT Memon_NNP community_NN so_RB backward_RB in_IN plague_NN ``_`` matters_NNS ._.

This_DT meeting_NN was_VBD held_VBN at_IN the_DT house_NN of_IN the_DT Chairman_NNP Mr._NNP Abdool_NNP Rahiman_NNP ._.
I_PRP ``_`` addressed_VBD the_DT Memon_NNP leaders_NNS assembled_VBD there_RB ,_, impressing_VBG on_IN them_PRP first_RB the_DT ``_`` paramount_JJ necessity_NN of_IN sincere_JJ obedience_NN to_TO the_DT orders_NNS and_CC desires_NNS of_IN the_DT ruling_NN 111_CD ``_`` authorities_NNS ,_, explained_VBD to_TO them_PRP the_DT advantages_NNS of_IN the_DT measures_NNS advised_VBD to_TO be_VB adopted_VBN ,_, ``_`` dwelt_NN at_IN length_NN on_IN the_DT regrettable_JJ apathy_NN evinced_VBN by_IN their_PRP$ community_NN and_CC the_DT ``_`` bad_JJ name_NN they_PRP were_VBD acquiring_VBG in_IN consequence_NN ,_, not_RB only_RB for_IN themselves_PRP ,_, but_CC for_IN ``_`` the_DT Mussalmans_NNPS in_IN general_JJ ,_, desired_VBD them_PRP to_TO rise_VB to_TO a_DT sense_NN of_IN duty_NN ,_, and_CC pointed_VBD ``_`` out_RP that_IN as_IN the_DT senior_JJ Jamayet_NNP they_PRP should_MD lead_VB the_DT way_NN towards_IN the_DT right_JJ path_NN and_CC ``_`` should_MD not_RB be_VB influenced_VBN by_IN the_DT conduct_NN of_IN others_NNS ._.
Then_RB I_PRP suggested_VBD to_TO them_PRP ``_`` that_IN I_PRP intended_VBD to_TO work_VB through_IN the_DT leaders_NNS of_IN the_DT communities_NNS ,_, and_CC to_TO leave_VB to_TO ``_`` them_PRP as_RB much_RB as_IN possibly_RB could_MD be_VB done_VBN ,_, pointing_VBG out_RP that_IN that_DT had_VBD been_VBN my_PRP$ procedure_NN ``_`` in_IN two_CD previous_JJ epidemics_NNS in_IN Karachi_NNP ._.

The_DT result_NN of_IN this_DT meeting_NN was_VBD encouraging_VBG ._.
Warm_JJ assurances_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ ``_`` support_NN were_VBD given_VBN by_IN the_DT leaders_NNS ,_, and_CC I_PRP have_VBP reason_NN to_TO be_VB thankful_JJ to_TO them_PRP for_IN ``_`` all_DT that_IN they_PRP were_VBD able_JJ to_TO do_VB from_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN among_IN a_DT community_NN not_RB at_IN all_DT easy_JJ ``_`` to_TO deal_VB with_IN ._.
House-to-house_JJ visitations_NNS were_VBD recommenced_VBN by_IN the_DT Volunteers_NNS ._.
``_`` The_DT general_JJ tone_NN of_IN the_DT Jamayet_NNP showed_VBD signs_NNS of_IN improvement_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT leaders_NNS ``_`` became_VBD distinctly_RB regardful_JJ ._.
The_DT Chairman_NNP visited_VBD me_PRP daily_RB at_IN my_PRP$ office_NN ,_, and_CC ``_`` continued_VBN to_TO do_VB so_RB even_RB through_IN the_DT fasting_VBG month_NN of_IN Ramzan_NNP ._.
He_PRP invariably_RB ``_`` accompanied_VBD me_PRP or_CC Dr._NNP Lewis_NNP ,_, the_DT Sectional_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, or_CC the_DT lady_NN nurses_VBZ ``_`` for_IN any_DT inquiries_NNS or_CC inspections_NNS which_WDT had_VBD to_TO be_VB made_VBN in_IN his_PRP$ section_NN ;_: even_RB the_DT ``_`` disinfecting_JJ Inspector_NNP ,_, whenever_NN in_IN need_NN of_IN assistance_NN ,_, went_VBD direct_JJ to_TO him_PRP and_CC ``_`` obtained_VBD the_DT required_JJ help_NN ._.
``_`` Noticing_VBG a_DT certain_JJ degree_NN of_IN slackness_NN in_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN March_NNP in_IN reporting_VBG ``_`` plague_JJ sickness_NN ,_, I_PRP spoke_VBD to_TO the_DT Chairman_NNP and_CC sent_VBD word_NN to_TO two_CD other_JJ gentlemen_NNS ``_`` of_IN influence_NN ,_, upon_IN which_WDT they_PRP got_VBD together_RB the_DT leaders_NNS of_IN the_DT Jamayet_NNP ,_, who_WP worked_VBD ``_`` with_IN zeal_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN two_CD or_CC three_CD days_NNS discovered_VBD 8_CD plague_NN cases_NNS and_CC got_VBD them_PRP removed_VBD ._.
``_`` Very_RB useful_JJ assistance_NN w_NN rendered_VBN in_IN evacuation_NN of_IN infected_JJ rooms_NNS or_CC houses_NNS or_CC ``_`` whole_JJ floors_NNS ._.
This_DT was_VBD carried_VBN out_RP entirely_RB by_IN the_DT leaders_NNS themselves_PRP ,_, who_WP also_RB ``_`` assisted_VBD the_DT evicted_JJ people_NNS in_IN securing_VBG vacant_JJ houses_NNS fit_VBP for_IN their_PRP$ temporary_JJ ``_`` occupation_NN ._.
I_PRP consider_VBP this_DT to_TO be_VB a_DT very_RB satisfactory_JJ feature_NN inasmuch_JJ as_IN in_IN ``_`` the_DT two_CD previous_JJ epidemics_NNS evacuation_NN of_IN whole_JJ houses_NNS or_CC removal_NN from_IN whole_JJ floors_NNS ``_`` was_VBD not_RB known_VBN among_IN the_DT Memons._NNP ``_``
The_DT removal_NN of_IN the_DT sick_JJ or_CC contacts_NNS as_IN a_DT general_JJ rule_NN was_VBD left_VBN to_TO the_DT leaders_NNS ``_`` of_IN the_DT community_NN ,_, whether_IN the_DT case_NN was_VBD discovered_VBN through_IN information_NN from_IN ``_`` any_DT of_IN the_DT Volunteers_NNP or_CC otherwise_RB ._.
In_IN short_JJ ,_, every_DT thing_NN which_WDT was_VBD done_VBN in_IN the_DT ``_`` plague_JJ administration_NN was_VBD done_VBN through_IN the_DT leaders_NNS of_IN the_DT community_NN (_( most_JJS of_IN ``_`` whom_WP were_VBD Volunteers_NNP )_) ,_, and_CC on_IN the_DT whole_NN I_PRP found_VBD them_PRP desirous_JJ to_TO show_VB that_IN they_PRP ``_`` were_VBD willing_JJ to_TO exercise_VB their_PRP$ influence_NN so_RB far_RB as_IN they_PRP could_MD ._.
``_`` The_DT polite_NN and_CC cautious_JJ manner_NN with_IN which_WDT the_DT arrangements_NNS were_VBD ``_`` conducted_VBN by_IN him_PRP brought_VBD so_RB much_JJ popularity_NN on_IN the_DT Chairman_NNP ,_, Haji_NNP Abool_NNP Rahi-_NNP ``_`` man_NN ,_, the_DT principal_JJ worker_NN in_IN this_DT important_JJ section_NN ,_, that_IN his_PRP$ Community_NNP appointed_VBN ``_`` him_PRP ,_, in_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN March_NNP last_JJ ,_, Joint_NNP Trustee_NNP of_IN the_DT Jamayet_NNP Funds_NNP ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ a_DT ``_`` coveted_JJ position._NN ``_``
It_PRP may_MD be_VB remarked_VBN here_RB that_IN the_DT foremost_JJ thing_NN to_TO be_VB done_VBN with_IN people_NNS ``_`` whose_WP$ susceptibilities_NNS are_VBP keen_JJ is_VBZ to_TO please_VB their_PRP$ semi-religious_JJ or_CC social_JJ sentiments_NNS ``_`` to_TO which_WDT they_PRP attach_VBP much_JJ value_NN ,_, and_CC once_RB their_PRP$ confidence_NN is_VBZ gained_VBN by_IN little_JJ ``_`` favours_NNS in_IN this_DT direction_NN ,_, popularity_NN follows_VBZ and_CC co-operation_NN in_IN important_JJ matters_NNS is_VBZ ``_`` soon_RB secured_VBN ._.
?_. 112_CD ``_`` Kolsa_NNP Moholla_NNP Hallai_NNP Memons.-The_NNP Jamayet_NNP of_IN the_DT Kolsa_NNP Moholla_NNP Hallai_NNP ``_`` Memons_NNP was_VBD represented_VBN by_IN a_DT large_JJ number_NN of_IN Volunteers_NNP ._.

For_IN some_DT time_NN after_IN taking_VBG charge_NN I_PRP found_VBD little_RB or_CC no_DT improvement_NN ._.
As_IN in_IN ``_`` other_JJ cases_NNS ,_, I_PRP collected_VBD the_DT Jamayet_NNP leaders_NNS ,_, but_CC all_DT went_VBD to_TO no_DT purpose_NN ,_, and_CC for_IN a_DT ``_`` considerable_JJ time_NN I_PRP could_MD not_RB well_RB understand_VB the_DT difficulty_NN ._.

The_DT Jamayet_NNP as_IN a_DT body_NN communi-_JJ ``_`` cated_VBD its_PRP$ thanks_NNS to_TO the_DT authorities_NNS for_IN it_PRP ;_: and_CC the_DT leaders_NNS ,_, specially_RB the_DT Patel_NNP ,_, and_CC ``_`` his_PRP$ brother_NN ,_, commenced_VBD working_VBG on_IN the_DT same_JJ lines_NNS as_IN the_DT Catchi_NNP Jamayet_NNP ._.
A_DT desire_NN ``_`` to_TO co-operate_NN was_VBD generally_RB evinced_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT change_NN was_VBD marked_VBN and_CC gratifying_VBG ._.
``_`` The_DT Sectional_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP rightly_RB said_VBD of_IN it_PRP ``_`` I_PRP was_VBD working_VBG before_RB as_IN if_IN I_PRP was_VBD ``_`` working_VBG in_IN darkness_NN ,_, and_CC now_RB I_PRP find_VBP sudden_JJ light_NN thrown_VBN in_IN the_DT Kolsa_NNP Moholla_NNP ._. ''_''
``_`` The_DT Khandwani_NNP Hallai_NNP Jamayet_NNP could_MD not_RB be_VB induced_VBN to_TO form_VB a_DT Volunteer_NNP ``_`` Committee_NNP ,_, but_CC after_IN several_JJ discussions_NNS they_PRP agreed_VBD to_TO assist_VB ._.

In_IN a_DT few_JJ words_NNS it_PRP can_MD be_VB said_VBD that_IN the_DT leaders_NNS of_IN this_DT Jamayet_NNP helped_VBD when_WRB ``_`` help_NN was_VBD required_VBN of_IN them_PRP and_CC did_VBD not_RB show_VB a_DT spirit_NN of_IN opposition_NN to_TO the_DT measures._NN ``_``

``_`` Kokni_NNP Mussalmans.-The_NNP Koknis_NNP are_VBP the_DT oldest_JJS Mahomedan_JJ inhabitants_NNS of_IN ``_`` Bombay_NNP ,_, whose_WP$ influence_NN ,_, not_RB many_JJ years_NNS ago_RB ,_, was_VBD paramount_NN among_IN all_PDT the_DT ``_`` Mahomedans_NNP ._.
They_PRP are_VBP originally_RB Arabs_NNP who_WP belonged_VBD to_TO the_DT party_NN that_WDT waged_VBD war_NN ``_`` against_IN the_DT grandsons_NNS of_IN the_DT prophet_NN ,_, but_CC when_WRB their_PRP$ influence_NN was_VBD overpowered_VBN later_RB ``_`` on_IN they_PRP were_VBD obliged_VBN to_TO leave_VB Arabia_NNP ._.
They_PRP settled_VBD more_JJR than_IN a_DT thousand_CD years_NNS ago_RB ``_`` at_IN different_JJ places_NNS on_IN the_DT coast_NN in_IN the_DT Konkan_NNP and_CC afterwards_NNS in_IN the_DT Island_NNP of_IN Bom-_NNP ``_`` bay_NN ._.
The_DT principal_JJ mosque_NN in_IN the_DT city_NN is_VBZ still_RB held_VBN in_IN their_PRP$ trust_NN ;_: the_DT principal_NN Kazis_NNP ``_`` or_CC Moulvies_NNS who_WP lead_VBP religious_JJ or_CC social_JJ discussions_NNS are_VBP from_IN their_PRP$ community._NN ``_``
About_IN nine-tenths_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ population_NN live_VBP in_IN my_PRP$ district._NN ``_``
Among_IN the_DT Koknis_NNP there_EX is_VBZ not_RB a_DT formal_JJ sort_NN of_IN Panchayet_NNP institution_NN ,_, ``_`` but_CC they_PRP have_VBP got_VBN their_PRP$ local_JJ Jamayets_NNS in_IN the_DT different_JJ localities_NNS ,_, differing_VBG in_IN func-_JJ ``_`` tions_NNS from_IN the_DT Jamayets_NNS of_IN the_DT Memons_NNP ._.
The_DT majority_NN of_IN the_DT Koknis_NNP follow_VBP the_DT ``_`` purdah_NN system_NN ._.
The_DT work_NN among_IN them_PRP was_VBD also_RB as_RB backward_RB as_IN among_IN the_DT ``_`` Memons_NNP ,_, and_CC similar_JJ endeavours_NNS were_VBD made_VBN from_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN to_TO secure_VB the_DT ``_`` co-operation_NN of_IN the_DT leaders_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ Jamayets_NNS ._.
No_DT plague_NN case_NN had_VBD been_VBN reported_VBN ,_, ``_`` and_CC their_PRP$ plague_NN hospitals_NNS had_VBD not_RB been_VBN opened_VBN ._.
Matters_NNS improved_VBN in_IN January_NNP ,_, ``_`` and_CC evacuation_NN of_IN whole_JJ houses_NNS and_CC removal_NN of_IN evicts_NNS from_IN whole_JJ floors_NNS which_WDT ``_`` had_VBD not_RB been_VBN carried_VBN out_RP before_IN among_IN these_DT people_NNS was_VBD introduced_VBN through_IN the_DT ``_`` assistance_NN of_IN the_DT leading_VBG men_NNS ._.
``_`` Mr._NNP Budruddin_NNP Coor_NNP ,_, J.P._NNP ,_, whose_WP$ name_NN deserves_VBZ prominent_JJ mention_NN in_IN ``_`` this_DT community_NN ,_, was_VBD particularly_RB useful_JJ in_IN this_DT as_IN in_IN other_JJ matters_NNS ._.
He_PRP rendered_VBD ?_. 113_CD ``_`` assistance_NN not_RB only_RB among_IN the_DT Koknis_NNP ,_, but_CC also_RB in_IN the_DT Khatri_NNP Memon_NNP Jamayet_NNP ,_, ``_`` who_WP held_VBD him_PRP in_IN much_JJ respect_NN ,_, as_IN did_VBD the_DT Hindus_NNP (_( mostly_RB traders_NNS )_) ,_, who_WP formed_VBD a_DT ``_`` considerable_JJ portion_NN of_IN the_DT population_NN of_IN his_PRP$ section_NN ._.
His_PRP$ influence_NN extended_VBD ``_`` further_RB to_TO the_DT Kokni_NNP Mussalmans_NNPS in_IN Khara_NNP Talao_NNP ._.
``_`` In_IN second_JJ Nagpada_NNP there_EX are_VBP Deccani_NNP Mussalmans_NNPS in_IN large_JJ numbers_NNS ,_, ``_`` and_CC K._NNP B._NNP Hakim_NNP Mahomed_NNP Daim_NNP and_CC Mr._NNP Kazi_NNP Kabirudin_NNP ,_, Bar.-at-Law_NNP ,_, are_VBP ``_`` among_IN them_PRP leaders_NNS of_IN considerable_JJ influence_NN ._.

Julahas.-The_NNP Julahas_NNP (_( Weavers_NNP )_) belong_NN to_TO the_DT North-West_NNP and_CC the_DT Central_NNP ``_`` Provinces_NNP ,_, and_CC have_VBP settled_VBN in_IN Bombay_NNP on_IN account_NN of_IN the_DT demand_NN for_IN saris_NN ,_, etc._NN ,_, ``_`` woven_VBN by_IN hand_NN looms_NNS required_VBN by_IN the_DT Maratha_NNP and_CC the_DT Ghati_NNP population_NN ._.
As_IN a_DT ``_`` class_NN the_DT Julahas_NNP are_VBP very_RB poor_JJ ,_, and_CC they_PRP came_VBD with_IN a_DT reputation_NN for_IN gentleness_NN ``_`` which_WDT they_PRP have_VBP hardly_RB maintained_VBN ._.
During_IN the_DT year_NN under_IN report_NN Khan_NNP Bahadur_NNP ``_`` Abdul_NNP Razzak_NNP came_VBD forward_RB as_IN Chairman_NNP of_IN the_DT two_CD Julaha_NNP Committees_NNP in_IN ``_`` which_WDT capacity_NN he_PRP soon_RB acquired_VBD ,_, by_IN his_PRP$ tact_NN ,_, great_JJ influence_NN over_IN the_DT Jalahas_NNP ._.
I_PRP ``_`` consider_VB his_PRP$ work_NN of_IN the_DT highest_JJS value_NN ._.
One_CD section_NN of_IN the_DT Julahas_NNP are_VBP Wahabis_NNP ._.
``_`` They_PRP are_VBP fanatics_NNS and_CC more_RBR difficult_JJ to_TO deal_VB with_IN than_IN the_DT others_NNS ._.
Although_IN ``_`` there_EX was_VBD plague_NN among_IN them_PRP in_IN the_DT last_JJ two_CD years_NNS evicts_NNS had_VBD not_RB been_VBN removed_VBN ,_, ``_`` i.e._NN ,_, whole_JJ chawls_NN occupied_VBN by_IN them_PRP had_VBD not_RB been_VBN vacated_VBN ._.
Considerable_JJ ``_`` work_NN of_IN this_DT kind_NN has_VBZ been_VBN done_VBN in_IN this_DT season_NN among_IN these_DT people_NNS through_IN Khan_NNP ``_`` Bahadur_NNP Abdul_NNP Razzak_NNP ,_, with_IN the_DT assistance_NN of_IN their_PRP$ headmen_NNS ._.
As_IN the_DT Julahas_NNP ``_`` lived_VBD in_IN large_JJ over-crowded_JJ chawls_NN considerable_JJ evacuation_NN was_VBD carried_VBN out_RP ,_, and_CC ``_`` Mr._NNP Abdul_NNP Razzak_NNP ,_, with_IN some_DT Volunteers_NNS ,_, always_RB attended_VBD to_TO see_VB the_DT evacuation_NN ``_`` conducted_VBN and_CC remained_VBN there_RB from_IN the_DT first_JJ till_NN the_DT last_JJ person_NN came_VBD out_RP ._.
``_`` At_IN one_CD time_NN ,_, owing_VBG to_TO the_DT very_RB heavy_JJ mortality_NN ,_, these_DT people_NNS became_VBD very_RB ``_`` unwilling_JJ to_TO take_VB their_PRP$ patients_NNS to_TO their_PRP$ Hospital_NNP ._.
By_IN persuasion_NN and_CC comforting_VBG ``_`` assurances_NNS ,_, and_CC with_IN the_DT assistance_NN of_IN the_DT leading_VBG men_NNS ,_, the_DT difficulty_NN was_VBD got_VBN over_IN ,_, ``_`` but_CC in_IN several_JJ cases_NNS K._NNP B._NNP Abdul_NNP Razzak_NNP had_VBD to_TO go_VB personally_RB to_TO arrange_VB for_IN the_DT ``_`` removal_NN of_IN the_DT patients_NNS ,_, with_IN some_DT of_IN whom_WP he_PRP went_VBD as_RB far_RB as_IN the_DT Hospital_NNP ._. ''_''
Among_IN other_JJ Mussalman_NNP communities_NNS with_IN whom_WP the_DT Sirdar_NNP had_VBD to_TO deal_VB should_MD be_VB mentioned_VBN the_DT Bohras_NNP ,_, the_DT Khojas_NNP ,_, the_DT Mogals_NNS ,_, the_DT Arabs_NNPS ,_, the_DT Sidhis_NNP and_CC the_DT Pathans_NNPS ._.
None_NN of_IN these_DT are_VBP numerous_JJ as_IN compared_VBN with_IN the_DT classes_NNS already_RB referred_VBD to_TO ,_, and_CC no_DT difficulty_NN was_VBD experienced_VBN in_IN dealing_VBG with_IN them-thanks_NNS to_TO the_DT assistance_NN of_IN men_NNS of_IN influence_NN among_IN them_PRP ._.
The_DT small_JJ European_JJ and_CC Eurasian_JJ popula-_JJ tion_NN in_IN Byculla_NNP was_VBD adequately_RB supervised_VBN by_IN Col._NNP Freeman_NNP (_( retired_VBN )_) ._.
OF_IN THE_NNP HINDUS_NNP IN_NNP HIS_NNP CHARGE_NNP ,_, THE_NNP SIRDAR_NNP WRITES_NNP :_: -_: ''_'' About_IN ninety_NN per_IN ``_`` cent_NN ._.
are_VBP the_DT poorest_JJS classes_NNS ,_, mostly_RB Ghattis_NNP ,_, who_WP are_VBP labourers_NNS ,_, and_CC low_JJ class_NN Mochis_NNP ``_`` and_CC Mahars_NNP ._.
These_DT people_NNS live_VBP in_IN ill-ventilated_JJ ,_, dirty_JJ chawls_NN ,_, in_IN which_WDT nothing_NN can_MD ``_`` be_VB seen_VBN without_IN a_DT lamp_NN on_IN the_DT brightest_JJS day_NN ._.
Living_VBG on_IN scanty_NN and_CC poor_JJ food_NN ,_, ``_`` half_NN clad_NN and_CC packed_VBN in_IN the_DT most_RBS miserable_JJ manner_NN in_IN dark_NN and_CC dirty_NN rooms_NNS ,_, they_PRP ``_`` are_VBP naturally_RB much_RB more_RBR subject_JJ to_TO the_DT plague_NN than_IN any_DT others._JJ ``_``
On_IN the_DT Parel_NNP Road_NNP on_IN both_DT sides_NNS of_IN the_DT Bhendi_NNP Bazaar_NNP live_VBP better_JJR class_NN ``_`` Hindus_NNP ;_: accordingly_RB ,_, I_PRP constituted_VBD a_DT new_JJ Committee_NNP of_IN Hindu_NNP Volunteers_NNP there_RB ,_, ``_`` who_WP performed_VBD their_PRP$ duties_NNS in_IN a_DT very_RB satisfactory_JJ manner_NN ._.
The_DT existing_VBG Com-_NNP ``_`` mittee_NN in_IN Old_NNP Nagpada_NNP (_( Umerkhadi_NNP )_) did_VBD most_RBS excellent_JJ work_NN ,_, and_CC thanks_NNS to_TO ``_`` their_PRP$ unassuming_JJ hard_JJ work_NN the_DT plague_JJ administration_NN here_RB worked_VBD smoothly_JJ ``_`` and_CC efficiently_RB and_CC never_RB had_VBD any_DT trouble_NN at_IN all_DT ._.
?_. 114_CD General_NNP remarks_NNS with_IN regard_NN to_TO work_VB of_IN Volunteers.-_NNP ''_'' The_DT work_NN which_WDT lay_VBD be-_NN ``_`` fore_IN the_DT Volunteers_NNP was_VBD by_IN no_DT means_NNS easy_VBP or_CC free_JJ from_IN difficulty_NN ._.
They_PRP had_VBD to_TO deal_VB ``_`` with_IN a_DT fatalist_JJ population_NN ,_, a_DT great_JJ portion_NN of_IN which_WDT does_VBZ not_RB believe_VB in_IN the_DT advantages_NNS ``_`` of_IN the_DT Plague_NNP measures_NNS ._.
Many_JJ Volunteers_NNS and_CC influential_JJ men_NNS personally_RB inclined_VBD ``_`` to_TO be_VB useful_JJ could_MD not_RB actively_RB or_CC openly_RB do_VBP much_RB on_IN account_NN of_IN the_DT prevailing_JJ con-_JJ ``_`` ditions_NNS of_IN the_DT society_NN in_IN which_WDT their_PRP$ lot_NN was_VBD thrown_VBN ,_, where_WRB advancement_NN towards_IN ``_`` enlightened_JJ ideas_NNS is_VBZ slow_JJ ,_, and_CC it_PRP will_MD not_RB be_VB for_IN a_DT long_JJ time_NN that_IN a_DT true_JJ appreciation_NN ``_`` of_IN their_PRP$ efforts_NNS is_VBZ likely_JJ to_TO be_VB accorded_VBN ._.
There_EX are_VBP a_DT good_JJ many_JJ instances_NNS of_IN long_JJ ``_`` enjoyed_JJ influence_NN being_VBG lost_VBN on_IN account_NN of_IN active_JJ assistance_NN rendered_VBN in_IN Plague_NNP ``_`` measures.._NN
I_PRP shall_MD mention_VB a_DT few_JJ prominent_JJ cases_NNS ,_, and_CC could_MD add_VB several_JJ more_JJR ._.
``_`` A_DT learned_JJ gentleman_NN who_WP passed_VBD among_IN the_DT Mussalmans_NNPS as_IN a_DT religious_JJ ``_`` dignitary_JJ and_CC as_IN a_DT native_JJ physician_NN of_IN perhaps_RB the_DT largest_JJS practice_NN ,_, loyally_RB and_CC ``_`` most_JJS sincerely_RB assisted_VBN General_NNP Gatacre_NNP and_CC Sir_NNP James_NNP Campbell_NNP ,_, invariably_RB ``_`` accompanying_VBG them_PRP in_IN their_PRP$ rounds_NNS ._.
He_PRP brought_VBD to_TO notice_RB many_JJ plague_NN cases_NNS ,_, and_CC ``_`` in_IN consequence_NN lost_VBD nearly_RB all_PDT his_PRP$ influence_NN and_CC more_JJR than_IN half_NN of_IN his_PRP$ practice_NN ._.
``_`` Another_DT gentleman_NN whose_WP$ influence_NN had_VBD been_VBN unbounded_VBN among_IN the_DT Julahas_NNP has_VBZ ``_`` for_IN his_PRP$ ready_JJ and_CC true_JJ assistance_NN during_IN the_DT last_JJ two_CD years_NNS '_POS epidemics_NNS ,_, been_VBN hated_VBN ``_`` by_IN them_PRP more_JJR than_IN he_PRP was_VBD popular_JJ before_RB ,_, and_CC more_JJR than_IN one_CD other_JJ has_VBZ for_IN his_PRP$ ``_`` honest_JJS endeavours_NN in_IN recent_JJ years_NNS to_TO help_VB the_DT plague_NN authorities_NNS reaped_VBD a_DT harvest_NN ``_`` of_IN hatred_VBN and_CC abuse_NN ._.
``_`` So_RB difficult_JJ sometimes_RB is_VBZ the_DT position_NN of_IN the_DT Volunteers_NNS rendered_VBD that_IN the_DT ``_`` best_JJS of_IN them_PRP on_IN occasions_NNS do_VBP not_RB desire_VB that_IN the_DT assistance_NN given_VBN by_IN them_PRP in_IN some_DT ``_`` matters_NNS be_VB made_VBN known_VBN ,_, and_CC amusing_VBG instances_NNS not_RB infrequently_RB occurred_VBN of_IN influ-_JJ ``_`` ential_JJ Volunteers_NNS using_VBG the_DT most_RBS careful_JJ endeavours_NNS to_TO avoid_VB any_DT open_JJ recognition_NN ``_`` of_IN their_PRP$ assistance._NN ``_``
Even_RB among_IN the_DT medical_JJ profession_NN and_CC among_IN men_NNS of_IN learning_NN and_CC wide_JJ ``_`` worldly_RB experience_VB there_EX are_VBP people_NNS who_WP do_VBP not_RB believe_VB in_IN the_DT usefulness_JJ or_CC neces-_JJ ``_`` sity_NN of_IN the_DT Plague_NNP measures_NNS ._.
We_PRP should_MD ,_, therefore_RB ,_, expect_VBP among_IN the_DT masses_NNS a_DT large_JJ ``_`` majority_NN who_WP are_VBP not_RB satisfied_VBN with_IN them_PRP but_CC who_WP only_RB submit_VBP to_TO authority_NN ._.
``_`` Among_IN such_JJ people_NNS the_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT Volunteers_NNP is_VBZ undoubtedly_RB a_DT difficult_JJ one_CD ,_, and_CC ``_`` we_PRP have_VBP to_TO place_VB much_JJ value_NN on_IN the_DT assistance_NN they_PRP have_VBP given_VBN us_PRP under_IN these_DT circum-_JJ ``_`` stances_NNS ._.
If_IN they_PRP have_VBP shown_VBN any_DT shortcomings_NNS they_PRP should_MD be_VB closely_RB looked_VBN into_IN ,_, ``_`` and_CC a_DT good_JJ measure_NN of_IN them_PRP will_MD be_VB found_VBN to_TO be_VB due_JJ to_TO causes_NNS over_IN which_WDT they_PRP have_VBP ``_`` not_RB got_JJ full_JJ control_NN ._.

``_`` Through_IN them_PRP we_PRP have_VBP worked_VBN smoothly_RB and_CC with_IN reasonable_JJ efficiency_NN ._.

3733-P._CD ,_, General_NNP Department_NNP (_( Plague_NNP )_) ,_, dated_VBD 7th_CD June_NNP 1899_CD ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ printed_VBN below_IN :_: -_: RESOLUTION.-This_JJ report_NN very_RB fully_RB justifies_VBZ the_DT hopes_NNS entertained_VBN by_IN His_PRP$ Excellency_NN the_DT Governor-in-Council_NNP in_IN March_NNP 1898_CD ,_, and_CC shows_VBZ how_WRB ready_JJ has_VBZ been_VBN the_DT response_NN to_TO his_PRP$ appeal_NN for_IN co-operation_NN from_IN all_DT public-spirited_JJ citizens_NNS ._.
2_CD ._.

115_CD 3_CD ._.

4_CD ._.
