?_. 133_CD CHAPTER_NN IX_NNP ._.
Miscellaneous_NNP ._.
Attitude_VB the_DT people_NNS ._.
Speaking_VBG generally_RB ,_, the_DT attitude_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS in_IN Bombay_NNP has_VBZ been_VBN distinctly_RB friendly_JJ towards_IN the_DT plague_NN administration_NN ,_, during_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT certain_JJ proportion_NN have_VBP come_VBN to_TO believe_VB that_IN some_DT ,_, at_IN any_DT rate_NN ,_, of_IN the_DT plague_NN measures_NNS are_VBP useful_JJ ._.
That_DT which_WDT they_PRP could_MD most_VB clearly_RB understand_NN was_VBD the_DT measure_NN of_IN evacuation_NN of_IN infected_JJ places_NNS ._.
Cases_NNS occurred_VBD where_WRB people_NNS themselves_PRP took_VBD the_DT initiative_NN and_CC asked_VBD for_IN accommodation_NN in_IN the_DT public_JJ camps_NNS ;_: and_CC it_PRP happened_VBD over_RB and_CC over_RB again_RB that_IN they_PRP accepted_VBD the_DT suggestion_NN to_TO turn_VB out_RP without_IN any_DT demur_NN whatever_NN ._.
This_DT ready_JJ compliance_NN has_VBZ been_VBN due_JJ partly_RB to_TO the_DT bitterness_NN of_IN experience_NN ,_, partly_RB to_TO the_DT growth_NN of_IN confidence_NN in_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Officers_NNP ,_, but_CC very_RB largely_RB indeed_RB to_TO the_DT co-operation_NN of_IN plague_NN volunteers_NNS ._.
But_CC evacuation_NN was_VBD a_DT measure_NN which_WDT was_VBD only_RB pressed_VBN when_WRB several_JJ cases_NNS occurred_VBD in_IN succession_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT people_NNS could_MD realise_VB the_DT danger_NN they_PRP were_VBD in_IN ,_, and_CC even_RB in_IN such_JJ cases_NNS ,_, limitless_JJ patience_NN and_CC a_DT most_RBS persuasive_JJ tongue_NN were_VBD often_RB required_VBN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD ,_, however_RB ,_, often_RB found_VBD that_IN the_DT passive_JJ resistance_NN some-_JJ times_NNS made_VBN to_TO this_DT measure_NN was_VBD fomented_VBN by_IN the_DT landlord_NN of_IN the_DT house_NN ,_, or_CC by_IN the_DT contractor_NN to_TO whom_WP he_PRP had_VBD leased_VBN out_RP the_DT right_NN of_IN collecting_VBG rents_NNS ._.
There_EX is_VBZ no_DT doubt_NN that_IN the_DT landlord_NN class_NN has_VBZ been_VBN very_RB severely_RB hit_VBN by_IN the_DT visitation_NN of_IN plague_NN ._.
The_DT exodus_NN from_IN Bombay_NNP empties_NNS their_PRP$ chawls_NN of_IN tenants_NNS ;_: when_WRB plague_NN occurs_VBZ ,_, the_DT inevitable_JJ plague_NN mark_NN goes_VBZ up_IN to_TO frighten_VB away_RP future_JJ tenants_NNS ;_: when_WRB plague_NN recurs_VBP their_PRP$ tenants_NNS are_VBP turned_VBN out_RP en_FW masse_NN for_IN a_DT brief_JJ space_NN ,_, and_CC often_RB take_VBP the_DT opportunity_NN which_WDT evacuation_NN gives_VBZ them_PRP of_IN removing_VBG all_PDT their_PRP$ goods_NNS and_CC chattels_NNS from_IN the_DT reach_NN of_IN the_DT landlord_NN 's_POS custodian_JJ or_CC bhaya_NN ,_, to_TO find_VB accommodation_NN elsewhere_RB ,_, and_CC leave_VBP behind_IN them_PRP an_DT unpaid_JJ bill_NN for_IN arrears_NNS of_IN rent_NN ._.
On_IN the_DT top_NN of_IN this_DT repeated_JJ cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN in_IN a_DT house_NN brings_VBZ down_RP upon_IN them_PRP other_JJ calamities_NNS ._.
The_DT building_NN is_VBZ inspected_VBN and_CC surveyed_VBN for_IN sanitary_JJ defects_NNS ,_, and_CC sometimes_RB it_PRP is_VBZ condemned_VBN to_TO be_VB demolished_VBN altogether_RB for_IN a_DT compensation_NN that_WDT ignores_VBZ the_DT bloated_JJ rents_NNS secured_VBN through_IN overcrowding_NN ,_, and_CC sometimes_RB the_DT landlord_NN is_VBZ called_VBN upon_IN to_TO carry_VB out_RP improvements_NNS without_IN any_DT compensation_NN at_IN all_DT ._.
The_DT insanitary_JJ conditions_NNS under_IN which_WDT the_DT people_NNS live_VBP is_VBZ no_DT doubt_NN largely_RB responsible_JJ for_IN the_DT afflictions_NNS which_WDT have_VBP visited_VBN Bombay_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT rapacity_NN of_IN landlords_NNS is_VBZ doubtless_JJ worthy_NN of_IN condemnation_NN ,_, but_CC self-interest_JJS is_VBZ blind_JJ to_TO considerations_NNS opposed_VBN to_TO it_PRP ,_, and_CC though_IN it_PRP is_VBZ difficult_JJ to_TO sympathise_VB it_PRP is_VBZ easy_JJ to_TO understand_VB the_DT opposition_NN of_IN landlords_NNS to_TO ?_. 134_CD plague_NN measures_NNS ,_, and_CC very_RB special_JJ credit_NN is_VBZ due_JJ to_TO those_DT few_JJ who_WP have_VBP of_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ free_JJ will_MD assisted_VB the_DT authorities_NNS in_IN evacuating_VBG their_PRP$ own_JJ chawls_NN ,_, or_CC carried_VBD out_RP suggestions_NNS for_IN the_DT improvement_NN of_IN their_PRP$ buildings_NNS ._.
It_PRP had_VBD been_VBN stated_VBN that_IN people_NNS accepted_VBD evacuation_NN without_IN much_JJ trouble_NN ;_: as_IN a_DT rule_NN they_PRP accepted_VBD as_IN inevitable_JJ the_DT necessity_NN of_IN removing_VBG plague_NN patients_NNS to_TO hospital_VB ,_, when_WRB once_RB the_DT case_NN came_VBD to_TO the_DT notice_NN of_IN the_DT authorities_NNS ;_: but_CC deliberate_VBP concealment_NN of_IN plague_NN cases_NNS continued_VBD to_TO occur_VB ,_, and_CC though_IN ,_, in_IN the_DT absence_NN of_IN such_JJ an_DT organised_JJ house-to-_NN house_NN visitation_NN as_IN obtained_VBN in_IN the_DT past_NN ,_, mere_JJ silence_NN often_RB sufficed_VBD to_TO keep_VB the_DT authorities_NNS in_IN ignorance_NN ,_, yet_CC the_DT assistance_NN of_IN the_DT volunteers_NNS and_CC the_DT various_JJ methods_NNS adopted_VBN to_TO obtain_VB information_NN of_IN sickness_NN forced_VBN those_DT who_WP could_MD not_RB bear_VB the_DT idea_NN of_IN sending_VBG their_PRP$ relatives_NNS to_TO hospital_VB to_TO extraordinary_JJ devices_NNS ._.
It_PRP twice_RB happened_VBD that_IN the_DT District_NNP Staff_NNP ,_, on_IN going_VBG to_TO remove_VB a_DT patient_JJ upon_NN information_NN received_VBD ,_, found_VBD he_PRP had_VBD disappeared_VBN and_CC eventually_RB discovered_VBD him_PRP concealed_VBD in_IN a_DT tobacco_NN shop_NN among_IN the_DT tobacco_NN leaves_VBZ ._.
It_PRP frequently_RB happened_VBD that_IN information_NN was_VBD received_VBN of_IN a_DT plague_NN case_NN in_IN a_DT house_NN with_IN numerous_JJ rooms_NNS ,_, and_CC that_IN all_PDT the_DT rooms_NNS were_VBD carefully_RB searched_VBN without_IN result_NN ,_, until_IN nothing_NN remained_VBD except_IN a_DT few_JJ locked_VBN up_RP on_IN the_DT outside_NN ,_, the_DT tenants_NNS of_IN which_WDT were_VBD said_VBD to_TO have_VB gone_VBN out_RB to_TO their_PRP$ work_NN ._.
These_DT locked_VBN rooms_NNS had_VBD then_RB to_TO be_VB opened_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT patient_NN was_VBD often_RB found_VBN in_IN one_CD of_IN them_PRP :_: and_CC it_PRP sometimes_RB happened_VBD that_IN when_WRB a_DT house_NN was_VBD evacuated_VBN and_CC every_DT hole_NN and_CC corner_NN turned_VBD out_RP ,_, patients_NNS were_VBD found_VBN concealed_VBN in_IN unsuspected_JJ lofts_NNS ._.
Lt._NNP Warneford_NNP 's_POS remarks_NNS on_IN this_DT subject_NN are_VBP very_RB interesting_JJ ,_, and_CC are_VBP given_VBN in_IN full._NN ``_``
All_DT persons_NNS suffering_VBG from_IN plague_NN would_MD ,_, I_PRP think_VBP ,_, be_VB kept_VBN concealed_JJ and_CC hidden_VBN in_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ homes_NNS were_VBD it_PRP not_RB for_IN the_DT fear_NN of_IN the_DT many_JJ direct_JJ and_CC indirect_JJ agencies_NNS that_IN we_PRP have_VBP for_IN discovering_VBG them_PRP ._.
So_RB ,_, taking_VBG this_DT as_IN my_PRP$ opinion_NN ,_, to_TO the_DT question_NN ,_, ``_`` to_TO what_WP extent_NN are_VBP cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN now_RB concealed_VBN ''_'' ?_.
I_PRP would_MD answer_VB that_IN ``_`` every_DT case_NN is_VBZ concealed_VBN ,_, ''_'' and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ only_RB the_DT knowledge_NN that_WDT (_( through_IN house_NN owners_NNS ,_, or_CC neighbours_NNS ,_, or_CC friends_NNS ,_, or_CC medical_JJ attendants_NNS ,_, or_CC plague_NN volunteers_NNS ,_, or_CC others_NNS )_) ,_, the_DT plague_NN officers_NNS will_MD probably_RB get_VB to_TO know_VB about_IN the_DT sickness_NN ,_, and_CC will_MD come_VB round_NN to_TO the_DT house_NN and_CC see_VB the_DT sick_JJ person_NN and_CC probably_RB remove_VB him_PRP to_TO a_DT hospital_NN ;_: it_PRP is_VBZ ,_, I_PRP think_VBP ,_, only_RB the_DT knowledge_NN and_CC the_DT fear_NN of_IN this_DT that_WDT makes_VBZ some_DT of_IN the_DT people_NNS (_( a_DT small_JJ proportion_NN )_) remove_VB their_PRP$ plague-stricken_JJ friends_NNS or_CC relatives_NNS to_TO a_DT hospital_NN at_IN once_RB ._.
This_DT is_VBZ the_DT class_NN of_IN case_NN which_WDT we_PRP ordinarily_VBP call_VB a_DT ``_`` voluntary_JJ ''_'' removal_NN ,_, and_CC such_JJ cases_NNS ,_, in_IN my_PRP$ experience_NN ,_, now_RB number_NN about_IN 20_CD to_TO 30_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
of_IN the_DT total_NN of_IN plague_NN cases_NNS ._.
A_DT year_NN ago_RB ,_, I_PRP do_VBP not_RB think_VB there_EX were_VBD 5_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
of_IN such_JJ cases_NNS ,_, so_RB in_IN a_DT sense_NN things_NNS have_VBP improved_VBN in_IN this_DT respect_NN ,_, and_CC there_EX are_VBP now_RB more_JJR of_IN what_WP are_VBP called_VBN ``_`` voluntary_JJ removals_NNS to_TO hospitals_NNS ._. ''_''
All_DT other_JJ cases_NNS whether_IN they_PRP come_VBP to_TO the_DT knowledge_NN of_IN the_DT District_NNP Officer_NNP while_IN still_RB alive_JJ ,_, or_CC when_WRB dead_JJ ,_, are_VBP what_WP I_PRP would_MD call_VB strictly_RB speaking_VBG concealed_VBN cases_NNS ,_, that_WDT is_VBZ to_TO say-70_JJ to_TO 80_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
of_IN the_DT total_NN ._.
In_IN my_PRP$ opinion_NN this_DT desire_NN for_IN concealment_JJ results_NNS from_IN the_DT wish_NN of_IN the_DT patient_NN himself_PRP to_TO stay_VB at_IN home_NN ,_, and_CC of_IN his_PRP$ relatives_NNS (_( particularly_RB the_DT women_NNS of_IN the_DT family_NN )_) to_TO keep_VB the_DT patient_NN at_IN home_NN under_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ care_NN and_CC their_PRP$ own_JJ eyes_NNS ._.
They_PRP do_VBP not_RB understand_VB ,_, and_CC they_PRP do_VBP not_RB believe_VB in_IN the_DT advantage_NN to_TO their_PRP$ relation_NN of_IN removal_NN to_TO a_DT hospital-they_JJ consider_NN that_IN he_PRP has_VBZ much_RB more_JJR chance_NN of_IN recovery_NN if_IN they_PRP look_VBP after_IN him_PRP ,_, and_CC keep_VB him_PRP undisturbed_JJ in_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ home_NN ._.
Whether_NNP plague_NN infection_NN remains_VBZ with_IN them_PRP and_CC attacks_VB the_DT rest_NN of_IN the_DT family_NN or_CC other_JJ persons_NNS in_IN the_DT house_NN ?_. 135_CD they_PRP do_VBP n't_RB think_VB about_IN ,_, nor_CC if_IN they_PRP did_VBD ,_, would_MD they_PRP care_VB in_IN the_DT least_JJS ._.
To_TO sum_VB up_RP ,_, I_PRP consider_VBP that_IN if_IN it_PRP were_VBD not_RB for_IN the_DT various_JJ more_RBR or_CC less_RBR forcible_JJ methods_NNS of_IN persuasion_NN on_IN the_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT district_NN officers_NNS ,_, doctors_NNS ,_, and_CC volunteers_NNS ,_, ninety-nine_JJ plague_NN cases_NNS out_IN of_IN a_DT hundred_VBN would_MD be_VB kept_VBN at_IN home_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ the_DT wish_JJ and_CC the_DT effort_NN to_TO keep_VB them_PRP at_IN home_NN that_WDT is_VBZ the_DT cause_NN of_IN concealment_NN ._.
Two_CD other_JJ causes_NNS ,_, but_CC I_PRP should_MD say_VB comparatively_RB minor_JJ ones_NNS ,_, are-_JJ (_( 1_CD )_) The_DT fear_NN of_IN the_DT disturbance_NN of_IN the_DT whole_JJ house_NN and_CC family_NN by_IN their_PRP$ removal_NN as_IN contacts_NNS ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) The_DT fear_NN of_IN damaging_VBG their_PRP$ property_NN through_IN disinfection_NN ;_: but_CC I_PRP should_MD say_VB that_IN neither_DT of_IN these_DT operate_VBP so_RB strongly_RB as_IN the_DT wish_NN to_TO keep_VB the_DT son_NN or_CC daughter_NN ,_, husband_NN or_CC wife_NN ,_, under_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ care_NN and_CC their_PRP$ own_JJ eyes._NN ``_``
Out_IN of_IN a_DT total_NN of_IN 3,514_CD instances_NNS of_IN plague_NN reported_VBN in_IN C._NNP Ward_NNP ,_, from_IN June_NNP 1898_CD to_TO April_NNP 1,899_CD inclusive_NN ,_, 1,985_CD came_VBD to_TO our_PRP$ knowledge_NN before_IN death_NN and_CC were_VBD removed_VBN to_TO hospital_VB ,_, and_CC 1,529_CD were_VBD not_RB known_VBN about_IN until_IN after_IN death_NN ._.
That_DT is_VBZ to_TO say_VB that_IN 1,529_CD instances_NNS were_VBD successfully_RB concealed_VBN (_( i.e._FW ,_, not_RB removed_VBN to_TO hospital_NN or_CC reported_VBN to_TO any_DT plague_JJ authority_NN )_) until_IN after_IN death_NN ,_, and_CC I_PRP would_MD add_VB that_IN out_IN of_IN the_DT 1,985_CD persons_NNS removed_VBD to_TO hospital_VB alive_JJ the_DT great_JJ majority_NN were_VBD concealed_VBN until_IN they_PRP were_VBD found_VBN out._IN ``_``
As_IN regards_NNS concealment_NN of_IN plague_NN after_IN death_NN ,_, I_PRP do_VBP not_RB think_VB that_IN this_DT has_VBZ been_VBN successfully_RB practised_VBN in_IN C_NNP Ward_NNP ._.

''_''
Roadside_NNP cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN ,_, whether_IN sick_JJ or_CC dead_JJ ,_, are_VBP in_IN some_DT measure_NN due_JJ to_TO people_NNS refusing_VBG to_TO believe_VB they_PRP are_VBP ill_JJ and_CC going_VBG about_IN their_PRP$ busi-_JJ ness_NN with_IN plague_NN upon_IN them_PRP until_IN they_PRP collapse_VBP ;_: but_CC cases_NNS undoubtedly_RB occur_VBP ,_, more_RBR especially_RB among_IN the_DT labouring_NN classes_NNS ,_, many_JJ of_IN whom_WP come_VBP to_TO Bombay_NNP to_TO work_VB for_IN a_DT few_JJ months_NNS only_RB leaving_VBG their_PRP$ families_NNS at_IN home_NN ,_, where_WRB ,_, in_IN order_NN to_TO avoid_VB the_DT attention_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN authorities_NNS being_VBG called_VBN to_TO the_DT house_NN in_IN which_WDT they_PRP fell_VBD sick_RB ,_, the_DT dead_JJ bodies_NNS of_IN the_DT plague_NN stricken_NN are_VBP taken_VBN out_RP and_CC thrown_VB down_RP in_IN any_DT open_JJ space_NN ,_, or_CC more_RBR often_RB hidden_VBN in_IN the_DT empty_JJ rooms_NNS of_IN some_DT vacated_JJ chawl_NN that_WDT has_VBZ not_RB been_VBN securely_RB locked_VBN ._.
Instances_NNS were_VBD not_RB uncommon_JJ of_IN sick_JJ men_NNS being_VBG turned_VBD out_IN of_IN their_PRP$ houses_NNS by_IN the_DT landlord_NN for_IN similar_JJ reasons_NNS ._.
In_IN such_JJ cases_NNS these_DT unfortunates_NNS sometimes_RB found_VBD friends_NNS who_WP would_MD take_VB them_PRP in_IN ,_, care_NN for_IN them_PRP and_CC conceal_VB them_PRP ,_, but_CC more_RBR often_RB they_PRP wandered_VBD about_RB ,_, as_RB long_RB as_IN they_PRP could_MD stand_VB ,_, and_CC then_RB lay_VBD down_RB ,_, either_DT to_TO die_VB at_IN once_RB ,_, or_CC to_TO be_VB removed_VBN to_TO hospital_NN ._.
The_DT number_NN of_IN roadside_JJ cases_NNS was_VBD not_RB so_RB great_JJ as_IN formerly_RB :_: but_CC there_EX were_VBD as_RB many_JJ as_IN 180_CD in_IN C_NNP ward_NN and_CC 118_CD in_IN A_DT ward_NN ._.
In_IN F_NNP and_CC G_NNP wards_NNS only_RB 20_CD came_VBD to_TO notice_NNS ._.
Every_DT effort_NN was_VBD made_VBN to_TO make_VB the_DT public_JJ hospitals_NNS as_RB popular_JJ as_IN possible_JJ ._.
Special_JJ arrangements_NNS were_VBD made_VBN to_TO accommodate_VB the_DT families_NNS of_IN patients_NNS close_RB by_IN ,_, and_CC visitors_NNS were_VBD freely_RB allowed_VBN ._.
But_CC many_JJ disliked_VBD the_DT idea_NN of_IN being_VBG placed_VBN in_IN a_DT ward_NN with_IN a_DT number_NN of_IN others_NNS dangerously_RB ill_VB ,_, and_CC though_IN in_IN several_JJ hospitals_NNS this_DT was_VBD in_IN some_DT degree_NN mitigated_VBN ?_. 136_CD by_IN the_DT erection_NN of_IN screens_NNS and_CC curtains_NNS ,_, the_DT arrangement_NN was_VBD open_JJ to_TO objection_VB on_IN account_NN of_IN its_PRP$ interference_NN with_IN ventilation_NN ._.
Nor_CC was_VBD it_PRP possible_JJ to_TO allow_VB the_DT relations_NNS of_IN patients_NNS to_TO crowd_VB the_DT wards_NNS and_CC interfere_VB with_IN the_DT doctor_NN ,_, or_CC to_TO feed_VB them_PRP with_IN unsuitable_JJ concoctions_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ ,_, and_CC these_DT restrictions_NNS must_MD remain_VB and_CC will_MD always_RB make_VB hospitals_NNS to_TO some_DT extent_NN unpopular_JJ with_IN the_DT ignorant_NN ._.

Captain_NNP Lock_NNP writes_VBZ :_: ``_`` The_DT actual_JJ removal_NN to_TO hospital_NN was_VBD undoubtedly_RB a_DT great_JJ source_NN of_IN dread_NN ,_, especially_RB to_TO some_DT of_IN the_DT better_JJR classes-the_JJ poor_JJ took_VBD it_PRP for_IN the_DT most_JJS part_NN apathetically_RB ,_, but_CC to_TO very_RB many_JJ it_PRP was_VBD a_DT dive_NN in_IN the_DT dark_NN ;_: the_DT patient_NN feared_VBN death_NN and_CC the_DT friends_NNS of_IN the_DT patient_NN had_VBD no_DT guarantee_NN that_IN the_DT removal_NN would_MD be_VB for_IN the_DT better_JJR ,_, or_CC confidence_NN that_IN the_DT patient_NN would_MD be_VB better_RB treated_VBN than_IN he_PRP would_MD be_VB in_IN their_PRP$ care_NN ._. ''_''
As_IN in_IN former_JJ years_NNS the_DT sick_JJ vans_NNS of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Department_NNP be-_NN came_VBD a_DT terror_NN in_IN the_DT eyes_NNS of_IN the_DT people_NNS ,_, so_RB do_VBP they_PRP now_RB fear_VBP the_DT ambulances_NNS ._.
The_DT Committee_NNP of_IN the_DT Colaba_NNP Volunteers_NNP more_RBR than_IN once_RB represented_VBN this_DT ,_, but_CC were_VBD quite_RB satisfied_VBN when_WRB they_PRP were_VBD told_VBN that_IN a_DT Health_NNP Department_NNP van_NN would_MD also_RB be_VB available_JJ if_IN sent_VBN for_IN ._.
The_DT fact_NN is_VBZ that_IN any_DT type_NN of_IN conveyance_NN that_WDT is_VBZ used_VBN for_IN taking_VBG the_DT sick_NN to_TO hospital_NN is_VBZ bound_VBN to_TO become_VB unpopular_JJ ._.
People_NNS can_MD persuade_VB themselves_PRP that_IN sickness_NN is_VBZ not_RB serious_JJ ,_, until_IN the_DT authorities_NNS step_NN in_IN and_CC carry_VB them_PRP off_RP to_TO hospital_NN ,_, and_CC this_DT ,_, coupled_VBN as_IN it_PRP is_VBZ with_IN the_DT breaking_VBG up_IN of_IN the_DT home_NN and_CC the_DT transfer_NN of_IN the_DT family_NN to_TO the_DT hospital_NN camp_NN ,_, is_VBZ inevitably_RB associat-_JJ ed_NN with_IN the_DT realization_NN of_IN their_PRP$ fears_NNS that_IN the_DT sickness_NN is_VBZ in_IN danger_NN of_IN proving_VBG mortal_NN ._.
Captain_NNP Dunbar_NNP Stuart_NNP writes_VBZ :_: ``_`` They_PRP had_VBD some_DT idea_NN that_IN the_DT ambu-_JJ lance_NN gave_VBD a_DT shock_NN to_TO the_DT patients_NNS that_WDT would_MD kill_VB them_PRP ._.

Lieutenant_JJ Brackenbury_NNP ,_, D._NNP O._NNP ,_, B_NNP Ward_NNP South_NNP ,_, writes_VBZ :_: ``_`` During_IN the_DT year_NN there_EX were_VBD 326_CD voluntary_JJ admissions_NNS into_IN hospital_NN ,_, and_CC 119_CD were_VBD reported_VBN by_IN neighbours_NNS ._.
Beyond_IN these_DT it_PRP may_MD be_VB taken_VBN for_IN granted_VBN that_IN the_DT people_NNS would_MD have_VB concealed_VBN the_DT remainder_NN had_VBD they_PRP been_VBN able_JJ ._.
In_IN Mandvi_NNP the_DT high_JJ caste_NN Hindus_NNP conceal_NN because_IN they_PRP fear_VBP going_VBG to_TO hospital_VB ,_, they_PRP dislike_VBP the_DT discomfort_NN of_IN going_VBG to_TO camp_VB ,_, and_CC they_PRP hate_VBP the_DT idea_NN of_IN having_VBG their_PRP$ houses_NNS interfered_VBN with_IN for_IN disinfection_NN purposes_NNS ._. ''_''
The_DT people_NNS of_IN Mandvi_NNP are_VBP largely_RB Gujarathi-speaking_JJ Hindus_NNP ,_, -_: a_DT class_NN whose_WP$ religious_JJ and_CC social_JJ sensibilities_NNS are_VBP perhaps_RB keener_JJR than_IN 137_CD those_DT of_IN any_DT other_JJ ._.
They_PRP are_VBP well-to-do_JJ ,_, but_CC dislike_RB going_VBG to_TO hospitals_NNS ,_, even_RB their_PRP$ own_JJ ;_: they_PRP would_MD much_RB prefer_VB to_TO die_VB comfortably_RB in_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ houses_NNS surrounded_VBN by_IN their_PRP$ relatives_NNS ._.
They_PRP can_MD not_RB bear_VB the_DT idea_NN of_IN their_PRP$ houses_NNS and_CC kit_VB being_VBG disinfected_VBN ,_, partly_RB because_IN of_IN the_DT damage_NN they_PRP think_VBP will_MD be_VB done_VBN and_CC partly_RB because_IN of_IN the_DT halo_NN of_IN sanctity_NN with_IN which_WDT they_PRP endow_VBP all_DT their_PRP$ belongings_NNS ._.
The_DT Mahomedans_NNPS all_DT over_IN Bombay_NNP dislike_NN going_VBG to_TO hospital_VB or_CC camp_VB ,_, and_CC in_IN some_DT cases_NNS showed_VBD a_DT special_JJ aversion_NN to_TO disinfection_NN with_IN carbolic_JJ powder_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP required_VBD more_JJR patience_NN and_CC tact_NN to_TO overcome_VB their_PRP$ objections_NNS than_IN in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN any_DT other_JJ community_NN ._.
The_DT Julahas_NNP were_VBD an_DT exception_NN to_TO this_DT rule_NN ,_, and_CC very_RB little_JJ difficulty_NN was_VBD ever_RB experienced_VBN in_IN dealing_VBG with_IN them_PRP ;_: but_CC this_DT was_VBD largely_RB due_JJ to_TO the_DT happy_JJ influence_NN exercised_VBN over_IN them_PRP by_IN Khan_NNP Bahadur_NNP Abdur_NNP Razzak_NNP bin_NN Curtas_NNP ._.
Generally_RB speaking_VBG all_DT difficulties_NNS with_IN the_DT Musalmans_NNPS were_VBD smoothed_VBN over_IN with_IN the_DT assistance_NN of_IN their_PRP$ various_JJ leaders_NNS ,_, but_CC of_IN these_DT there_EX were_VBD none_NN in_IN some_DT parts_NNS of_IN E_NNP Ward_NNP ,_, and_CC here_RB occurred_VBD the_DT only_JJ case_NN in_IN which_WDT actual_JJ resistance_NN to_TO our_PRP$ measures_NNS occurred_VBD during_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
A_DT Mussalman_NNP assaulted_VBD a_DT coolie_NN engaged_VBN in_IN evacuation_NN work_NN ,_, and_CC was_VBD convicted_VBN and_CC fined_VBN Rs_NNP ._.
50_CD ._.
In_IN two_CD other_JJ in-_JJ stances_NNS in_IN the_DT same_JJ locality_NN ,_, the_DT Mussalmans_NNPS strenuously_RB objected_VBN to_TO the_DT removal_NN of_IN their_PRP$ sick_NN and_CC other_JJ plague_NN measures_NNS :_: but_CC in_IN the_DT one_CD case_NN a_DT small_JJ camp_NN was_VBD erected_VBN for_IN them_PRP with_IN accommodation_NN for_IN patients_NNS at_IN one_CD end_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT whole_JJ Community_NNP then_RB willingly_RB turned_VBN out_RP ,_, and_CC segregated_VBD their_PRP$ patients_NNS themselves_PRP ,_, with_IN the_DT result_NN that_WDT plague_VBZ very_RB soon_RB ceased_VBN from_IN among_IN them_PRP ._.
In_IN the_DT other_JJ case_NN they_PRP were_VBD for_IN a_DT time_NN allowed_VBN to_TO put_VB up_RP temporary_JJ sheds_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ ,_, with_IN a_DT separate_JJ shed_VBN for_IN patients_NNS ;_: but_CC as_IN the_DT arrangement_NN proved_VBD unsatisfactory_JJ and_CC plague_JJ continued_VBN ,_, a_DT little_JJ pressure_NN was_VBD brought_VBN to_TO bear_VB ,_, the_DT patients_NNS were_VBD sent_VBN to_TO hospital_NN and_CC the_DT healthy_JJ to_TO camp_VB ._.
In_IN a_DT considerable_JJ number_NN of_IN other_JJ cases_NNS in_IN other_JJ parts_NNS of_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, they_PRP began_VBD with_IN violent_JJ opposition_NN to_TO the_DT proposals_NNS of_IN the_DT District_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, but_CC were_VBD generally_RB persuaded_VBN in_IN the_DT end_NN to_TO accept_VB the_DT most_RBS essential_JJ precautions_NNS ._.
The_DT measures_NNS adopted_VBN by_IN Sirdar_NNP Mahomed_NNP Yakub_NNP in_IN the_DT Central_NNP District_NNP described_VBD elsewhere_RB ,_, show_VBP more_RBR fully_RB the_DT methods_NNS adopted_VBN and_CC the_DT success_NN achieved_VBN with_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC at_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN throw_VB much_JJ light_NN on_IN the_DT attitude_NN adopted_VBN by_IN them_PRP ._.
In_IN one_CD case_NN in_IN Seori_NNP Koliwada_NNP ,_, a_DT village_NN in_IN the_DT north_NN of_IN the_DT Island_NNP ,_, there_EX was_VBD at_IN one_CD time_NN passive_JJ resistance_NN ._.
The_DT people_NNS ,_, Kolis_NNP ,_, refused_VBD to_TO take_VB their_PRP$ patients_NNS to_TO hospital_VB ,_, to_TO evacuate_VB their_PRP$ houses_NNS ,_, or_CC take_VB any_DT measure_NN to_TO stop_VB the_DT spread_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.
The_DT District_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, Capt_NNP ._.
Lewis_NNP ,_, with_IN Lieut_NNP ._.

Under_IN the_DT circumstances_NNS the_DT D._NNP O0_NNP ._.
removed_VBN the_DT patients_NNS ._.
3_CD in_IN number_NN ,_, himself_PRP ._.
Thereafter_RB there_EX was_VBD no_DT difficulty_NN ._.
The_DT people_NNS brought_VBD their_PRP$ own_JJ patients_NNS ,_, evacuated_VBD the_DT village_NN ,_, and_CC were_VBD most_RBS amenable_JJ ._.
?_. 138_CD The_DT above_NN remarks_NNS dwell_VBP principally_RB upon_IN the_DT points_NNS wherein_VBP the_DT people_NNS were_VBD disinclined_VBN to_TO accept_VB plague_JJ measures_NNS ;_: but_CC as_IN regards_NNS the_DT general_JJ attitude_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS ,_, there_EX can_MD be_VB no_DT question_NN that_IN they_PRP have_VBP lost_VBN their_PRP$ old_JJ hostility_NN to_TO the_DT plague_JJ officer_NN and_CC all_PDT his_PRP$ works_NNS ._.
When_WRB plague_NN first_RB broke_VBD out_RP ,_, Municipal_JJ servants_NNS had_VBD to_TO face_VB a_DT storm_NN of_IN disapproval_NN ,_, and_CC not_RB seldom_VB were_VBD hustled_VBN :_: later_RB ,_, house-to-_JJ house_NN visitation_NN parties_NNS were_VBD attended_VBN by_IN police_NN ,_, or_CC even_RB by_IN troops_NNS and_CC evacuation_NN was_VBD carried_VBN out_RP with_IN the_DT assistance_NN of_IN sepoys_NNS and_CC sailors_NNS and_CC all_PDT the_DT time_NN the_DT office_NN files_NNS were_VBD crammed_VBN with_IN complaints_NNS of_IN every_DT description_NN ._.
During_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN complaints_NNS have_VBP been_VBN rare_JJ ;_: and_CC ,_, except_IN that_IN a_DT few_JJ police_NNS have_VBP occasionally_RB been_VBN asked_VBN to_TO be_VB present_JJ at_IN the_DT evacuation_NN of_IN large_JJ chawls_NN ,_, or_CC for_IN the_DT protection_NN of_IN property_NN when_WRB a_DT room_NN had_VBD to_TO be_VB opened_VBN ,_, the_DT plague_JJ staff_NN and_CC the_DT Volunteers_NNS have_VBP worked_VBN steadily_RB on_IN without_IN any_DT display_NN of_IN force_NN whatever_NN ._.
This_DT change_NN has_VBZ been_VBN due_JJ partly_RB to_TO the_DT gradual_JJ education_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS by_IN experience_NN ,_, but_CC in_IN very_RB large_JJ measure_NN to_TO the_DT voluntary_JJ co-operation_NN of_IN so_RB many_JJ enlightened_VBN and_CC public-spirited_JJ men_NNS from_IN among_IN them_PRP ._.
The_DT institution_NN by_IN leaders_NNS of_IN various_JJ commu-_JJ nities_NNS of_IN private_JJ camps_NNS and_CC hospitals_NNS is_VBZ mentioned_VBN elsewhere_RB ;_: the_DT Parsee_NNP Punchayet_NNP also_RB took_VBD special_JJ steps_NNS to_TO encourage_VB inoculation_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO help_VB those_DT in_IN distress_NN on_IN account_NN of_IN plague_NN ._.
Leaders_NNS of_IN the_DT Daivadnya_NNP Community_NNP issued_VBD a_DT circular_JJ pressing_VBG upon_IN their_PRP$ co-religionists_NNS the_DT necessity_NN of_IN removal_NN to_TO hospital_NN of_IN plague_NN patients_NNS and_CC other_JJ measures_NNS ,_, and_CC advising_VBG inoculation_NN ,_, and_CC their_PRP$ example_NN was_VBD followed_VBN by_IN the_DT Jains_NNP and_CC others_NNS ._.
It_PRP was_VBD this_DT public_JJ spirit_NN among_IN the_DT natural_JJ leaders_NNS of_IN the_DT people_NNS which_WDT went_VBD furthest_JJS to_TO reconcile_VB the_DT masses_NNS to_TO measures_NNS unavoidably_RB distasteful_JJ ,_, and_CC enabled_VBD the_DT plague_NN administration_NN to_TO proceed_VB with_IN so_RB little_JJ friction_NN ._.
The_DT movements_NNS of_IN the_DT people_NNS ._.
Bombay_NNP was_VBD perhaps_RB fuller_JJR than_IN it_PRP has_VBZ ever_RB been_VBN before_RB at_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN the_DT past_JJ cold_NN weather_NN ._.
The_DT population_NN was_VBD estimated_VBN at_IN 9,50,000_CD ;_: it_PRP had_VBD undoubtedly_RB been_VBN swelled_VBN to_TO some_DT extent_NN by_IN arrivals_NNS from_IN Dharwar_NNP and_CC the_DT Southern_NNP Maratha_NNP country_NN ,_, and_CC reports_NNS were_VBD more_JJR than_IN once_RB received_VBN of_IN the_DT great_JJ over-crowding_NN of_IN certain_JJ sections-notably_JJ Kumbharwada-by_NNP new_JJ arrivals_NNS ._.
The_DT approximate_JJ number_NN of_IN people_NNS in_IN Bombay_NNP at_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN each_DT month_NN is_VBZ given_VBN at_IN the_DT commencement_NN of_IN Chapter_NNP II_NNP of_IN this_DT report_NN ._.
There_EX was_VBD a_DT very_RB large_JJ exodus_NN during_IN January_NNP ,_, February_NNP and_CC March_NNP ,_, the_DT returns_NNS furnished_VBN by_IN the_DT Collector_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP showing_VBG that_IN in_IN round_NN numbers_NNS departures_NNS exceeded_VBD arrivals_NNS by_IN 40,000_CD ,_, 77,000_CD and_CC 82,000_CD in_IN those_DT months_NNS ,_, respectively_RB ._.
The_DT tide_NN turned_VBD in_IN April_NNP ,_, and_CC during_IN that_DT and_CC the_DT following_VBG month_NN some_DT 23,000_CD people_NNS came_VBD back_RB ._.

About_IN this_DT time_NN there_EX was_VBD a_DT severe_JJ outbreak_NN of_IN plague_NN at_IN Danda_NNP ,_, near_IN Bandora_NNP ,_, in_IN the_DT Salsette_NNP Taluka_NNP ;_: and_CC in_IN the_DT absence_NN of_IN any_DT Causeway_NNP inspection_NN ,_, the_DT people_NNS came_VBD into_IN Bombay_NNP in_IN numbers_NNS on_IN foot_NN ._.

General_NNP obser-_JJ vations_NNS ._.
There_EX is_VBZ a_DT general_JJ opinion_NN among_IN those_DT engaged_VBN in_IN plague_JJ operations_NNS ,_, that_DT infection_NN is_VBZ not_RB ,_, except_IN in_IN pneumonic_JJ cases_NNS ,_, readily_RB conveyed_VBN from_IN one_CD human_NN being_VBG direct_JJ to_TO another_DT ._.
The_DT rarity_NN of_IN cases_NNS in_IN hospital_NN supports_NNS this_DT belief_NN ,_, and_CC except_IN where_WRB people_NNS recklessly_RB handle_JJ and_CC embrace_VB the_DT sick_NN ,_, without_IN sanitary_JJ precautions_NNS of_IN any_DT kind_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ believed_VBN that_IN the_DT disease_NN is_VBZ more_RBR often_RB contracted_VBN from_IN infection_NN lurking_VBG in_IN the_DT floors_NNS ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, through_IN some_DT abrasion_NN in_IN the_DT skin_NN ,_, and_CC frequently_RB through_IN cracks_NNS in_IN the_DT skin_NN between_IN the_DT toes_NNS ._.

The_DT Surgeon_NNP in_IN charge_NN of_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Hospitals_NNP in_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, lived_VBD in_IN pre-eminently_RB healthy_JJ quarters_NNS ._.

His_PRP$ wife_NN ,_, a_DT pure_JJ European_JJ ,_, was_VBD attacked_VBN by_IN a_DT most_RBS virulent_JJ form_NN of_IN plague_NN and_CC died_VBD within_IN 3_CD hours_NNS of_IN the_DT disease_NN being_VBG definitely_RB diagnosed_VBN ._.
Another_DT case_NN was_VBD reported_VBN where_WRB 4_CD cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN were_VBD traced_VBN to_TO mattresses_NNS which_WDT had_VBD been_VBN made_VBN out_IN of_IN cotton_NN taken_VBN from_IN the_DT bedding_NN of_IN an_DT infected_VBN house_NN which_WDT had_VBD been_VBN pressed_VBN into_IN a_DT bale_NN and_CC sold_VBN ._.
The_DT following_JJ case_NN is_VBZ quoted_VBN by_IN Dr._NNP Godinho_NNP :_: -_: ``_`` A_DT large_JJ house_NN in_IN Narielwadi_NNP was_VBD almost_RB vacant_JJ ,_, on_IN the_DT ground-floor_JJ lived_VBD a_DT Mahommedan_NNP family_NN which_WDT consisted_VBD of_IN 6_CD people_NNS ,_, four_CD children_NNS and_CC the_DT parents_NNS ._.

?_. 141_CD The_DT following_JJ by_IN Dr._NNP Shroff_NNP :_: -_: ``_`` Dagdoo_NNP Laximan_NNP aged_VBD 8_CD years_NNS used_VBN to_TO stay_VB at_IN his_PRP$ relatives_NNS somewhere_RB in_IN Mandvi_NNP ,_, and_CC at_IN times_NNS used_VBN also_RB to_TO stay_VB in_IN this_DT house_NN No_DT ._.
134-136_JJ ._.
On_IN 30th_CD August_NNP this_DT boy_NN got_VBD an_DT attack_NN of_IN fever_NN and_CC died_VBD on_IN 1st_CD September_NNP ,_, the_DT Plague_NNP Bubo_NNP developing_VBG before_IN death_NN ._.
On_IN the_DT 1st_CD idem_NN other_JJ three_CD boys_NNS ,_, of_IN nearly_RB the_DT age_NN of_IN the_DT deceased_VBN ,_, were_VBD attacked_VBN at_IN the_DT same_JJ place_NN and_CC removed_VBN to_TO A._NNP R._NNP Hospital_NNP the_DT same_JJ day_NN ._.

``_`` Thus_RB the_DT first_JJ case_NN was_VBD an_DT infected_JJ one_CD and_CC the_DT infection_NN was_VBD subsequently_RB given_VBN to_TO the_DT other_JJ members_NNS of_IN the_DT family_NN ._. ''_''
These_DT are_VBP instances_NNS where_WRB infection_NN seems_VBZ to_TO have_VB been_VBN passed_VBN from_IN person_NN to_TO person_NN ;_: but_CC speaking_VBG generally_RB ,_, experience_NN indicates_VBZ that_IN the_DT danger_NN is_VBZ greater_JJR from_IN being_VBG in_IN an_DT infected_JJ spot_NN than_IN from_IN contact_NN with_IN an_DT infected_JJ person_NN ._.

Central_NNP District_NNP 415_CD 116_CD 155_CD Total_JJ 2,075_CD 681_CD 806_CD The_DT above_JJ statement_NN is_VBZ not_RB complete_JJ ,_, but_CC it_PRP shows_VBZ roughly_RB the_DT proportion_NN of_IN houses_NNS in_IN which_WDT plague_NN did_VBD and_CC did_VBD not_RB recur_VB ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ ,_, however_RB ,_, almost_RB impossible_JJ to_TO deduce_VB conclusions_NNS ._.
Each_DT house_NN has_VBZ a_DT separate_JJ population-one_NN may_MD be_VB little_RB more_JJR than_IN a_DT shed_VBN with_IN room_NN for_IN 10_CD people_NNS ,_, another_DT will_MD be_VB a_DT chawl_JJ accommodating_NN upwards_NNS of_IN 2,000-each_JJ house_NN has_VBZ a_DT separate_JJ individuality_NN in_IN its_PRP$ structure_NN and_CC arrangements_NNS ,_, in_IN the_DT matter_NN of_IN ventilation_NN ,_, water-supply_JJ and_CC drainage_NN ,_, every_DT house_NN has_VBZ a_DT different_JJ sanitary_JJ environment_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT customs_NNS and_CC manners_NNS of_IN the_DT residents_NNS vary_VBP according_VBG to_TO their_PRP$ caste_NN ,_, class_NN and_CC position_NN in_IN life_NN ._.
Again_RB the_DT record_NN only_RB refers_VBZ to_TO cases_NNS definitely_RB diagnosed_VBD as_IN plague_NN ,_, and_CC leaves_VBZ out_IN of_IN count_NN suspicious_JJ cases_NNS ,_, and_CC those_DT where_WRB the_DT cause_NN of_IN death_NN was_VBD successfully_RB misrepresented_VBN or_CC the_DT address_NN successfully_RB concealed_VBN ._.
?_. 142_CD The_DT policy_NN of_IN evacuation_NN of_IN infected_JJ localities_NNS and_CC houses_NNS is_VBZ based_VBN on_IN the_DT almost_RB universal_JJ experience_NN that_IN the_DT principal_JJ danger_NN in_IN a_DT plague_NN epidemic_NN is_VBZ to_TO be_VB found_VBN in_IN the_DT infected_JJ locality-that_WP the_DT greatest_JJS safety_NN lies_VBZ in_IN flight_NN ._.
Looking_VBG at_IN the_DT figures_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN they_PRP are_VBP ,_, from_IN this_DT point_NN of_IN view_NN ,_, they_PRP seem_VBP to_TO indicate_VB a_DT fair_JJ degree_NN of_IN success_NN from_IN the_DT measures_NNS adopted_VBN :_: and_CC when_WRB it_PRP is_VBZ borne_VBN in_IN mind_NN that_IN in_IN large_JJ numbers_NNS of_IN houses_NNS where_WRB two_CD or_CC more_JJR cases_NNS occurred_VBD ,_, they_PRP were_VBD separated_VBN by_IN such_JJ an_DT interval_NN of_IN time_NN as_IN precluded_VBN the_DT supposition_NN that_IN infection_NN was_VBD passed_VBN from_IN one_CD to_TO the_DT other_JJ ,_, and_CC led_VBD rather_RB to_TO the_DT inference_NN that_IN the_DT patient_NN had_VBD brought_VBN the_DT disease_NN in_IN from_IN outside_NN ,_, the_DT case_NN is_VBZ better_RBR than_IN the_DT figures_NNS at_IN first_JJ sight_NN indicate_NN ._.
Captain_NNP Lock_NNP writes_VBZ :_: -_: ``_`` It_PRP is_VBZ encouraging_VBG to_TO report_VB that_DT temporary_JJ evacuation_NN was_VBD found_VBN to_TO stop_VB the_DT plague_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN it_PRP was_VBD very_RB exceptional_JJ on_IN the_DT people_NNS being_VBG allowed_VBN to_TO re-occupy_VB that_IN during_IN the_DT then_RB present_JJ epidemic_IN the_DT house_NN would_MD be_VB again_RB infected_VBN ._.

House_NNP No_NNP ._.
87_CD ,_, Tandel_NNP Street.-This_NNP is_VBZ the_DT house_NN which_WDT started_VBD the_DT disease_NN in_IN the_DT street_NN ._.
After_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ broke_VBD out_RP at_IN Coorla_NNP ,_, a_DT village_NN in_IN the_DT Thana_NNP District_NNP ,_, a_DT Khojah_NNP merchant_NN named_VBD Ahmed_NNP Shariff_NNP ,_, who_WP carried_VBD on_IN his_PRP$ business_NN at_IN Goa_NNP ,_, fled_VBD with_IN his_PRP$ two_CD daughters_NNS to_TO Goa_NNP ._.

1_CD ._.

By_IN this_DT time_NN all_PDT the_DT people_NNS who_WP were_VBD removed_VBN to_TO camps_NNS had_VBD returned_VBN ._.
The_DT same_JJ procedure_NN of_IN evacuation_NN and_CC disinfection_NN was_VBD again_RB followed_VBN with_IN the_DT satisfactory_JJ result-though_JJ a_DT short-lived_JJ one-that_IN the_DT infection_NN stopped_VBD for_IN about_IN a_DT month_NN and-a-half_NN ._.
But_CC again_RB it_PRP made_VBD its_PRP$ appearance_NN with_IN increased_JJ virulence_NN ,_, at_IN this_DT time_NN in_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN March_NNP ,_, which_WDT witnessed_VBD six_CD cases_NNS ,_, dates_NNS of_IN the_DT cases_NNS being_VBG as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -_: Two_CD cases_NNS on_IN 13th_CD March_NNP 1899_CD ;_: three_CD on_IN 14th_CD March_NNP 1899_CD ;_: and_CC one_CD on_IN 15th_CD March_NNP 1899_CD ._.
As_IN each_DT case_NN took_VBD place_NN ,_, the_DT method_NN of_IN disinfection_NN and_CC evacuation_NN as_IN stated_VBN above_IN was_VBD strictly_RB followed_VBN ._.
This_DT had_VBD the_DT effect_NN of_IN stopping_VBG the_DT infection_NN again_RB for_IN the_DT second_JJ time_NN for_IN one_CD full_JJ month_NN ._.
For_IN the_DT third_JJ time_NN the_DT infection_NN was_VBD again_RB noticed_VBN in_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN April_NNP ,_, when_WRB three_CD cases_NNS were_VBD discovered_VBN on_IN the_DT following_JJ dates_NNS :_: -two_NN cases_NNS on_IN 14th_CD April_NNP 1899_CD and_CC one_CD on_IN 25th_CD April_NNP 1899_CD ._.
This_DT time_NN it_PRP was_VBD thought_VBN desirable_JJ to_TO vacate_VB and_CC thoroughly_RB disinfect_VB the_DT whole_JJ building_NN ._.
This_DT rigorous_JJ procedure_NN had_VBD a_DT very_RB satisfactory_JJ result_NN ,_, as_IN even_RB though_IN the_DT house_NN was_VBD allowed_VBN to_TO be_VB reoccupied_VBN on_IN 8th_CD May_NNP 1899-after_CD an_DT interval_NN of_IN thirteen_JJ days_NNS '_POS complete_JJ evacuation-no_JJ case_NN has_VBZ been_VBN discovered_VBN till_RB now_RB ._.
In_IN this_DT house_NN at_IN least_JJS it_PRP can_MD not_RB be_VB said_VBD that_IN the_DT infection_NN was_VBD kept_VBN up_RP by_IN the_DT dirty_JJ habits_NNS of_IN the_DT inhabitants_NNS ,_, for_IN it_PRP is_VBZ inhabited_VBN only_RB by_IN high_JJ class_NN Mahrattas_NNP mostly_RB belonging_VBG to_TO the_DT soldier_JJR class_NN of_IN former_JJ times_NNS ,_, They_PRP observe_VBP a_DT fair_JJ amount_NN of_IN cleanliness_NN in_IN their_PRP$ habits_NNS ._.
The_DT fault_NN ,_, in_IN my_PRP$ opinion_NN is_VBZ due_JJ to_TO the_DT bad_JJ method_NN of_IN construction_NN which_WDT allows_VBZ very_RB little_JJ of_IN free_JJ air_NN and_CC light_JJ inside_IN the_DT rooms_NNS ._.
?_. 146_CD (_( 2_CD )_) House_NNP No_UH ._.
529_CD ,_, Duncan_NNP Road.-This_NNP house_NN is_VBZ also_RB built_VBN of_IN wood_NN and_CC brick_NN ._.
The_DT ground_NN floor_NN consists_VBZ wholly_RB of_IN earth_NN and_CC is_VBZ consequently_RB very_RB damp_JJ ._.
This_DT building_NN consists_VBZ of_IN two_CD main_JJ parts_NNS or_CC chawls_NN situated_VBD one_CD behind_IN the_DT other_JJ ,_, with_IN an_DT intervening_VBG open_JJ space_NN of_IN only_RB about_IN 3_CD yards_NNS ._.
One_CD of_IN these_DT chawls_NN is_VBZ open_JJ on_IN three_CD sides_NNS and_CC faces_VBZ the_DT Duncan_NNP Road_NNP ._.
It_PRP has_VBZ a_DT fair_JJ amount_NN of_IN light_NN and_CC ventilation_NN ,_, and_CC was_VBD free_JJ of_IN infection_NN to_TO a_DT considerable_JJ extent_NN as_IN compared_VBN with_IN the_DT other_JJ chawl_NN of_IN the_DT same_JJ building_NN ,_, which_WDT had_VBD three_CD times_NNS more_RBR cases_NNS than_IN the_DT first_JJ one_NN ._.
The_DT other_JJ hind_NN chawl_NN is_VBZ very_RB badly_RB situated_VBN and_CC is_VBZ closed_VBN in_IN on_IN all_DT sides_NNS except_IN one_CD ,_, the_DT western_JJ ,_, with_IN high_JJ buildings_NNS cutting_VBG off_RP its_PRP$ supply_NN of_IN light_NN and_CC air_NN ._.

Out_IN of_IN the_DT total_JJ 25_CD cases_NNS which_WDT were_VBD found_VBN in_IN this_DT whole_JJ building_NN ,_, as_RB many_JJ as_IN 15_CD were_VBD found_VBN in_IN this_DT chawl_NN ._.
Dates_NNS of_IN the_DT cases_NNS are_VBP as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -1st_JJ case_NN on_IN 9th_CD December_NNP 1898_CD was_VBD found_VBN in_IN the_DT hind_NN chawi_NN ._.
The_DT infected_JJ room_NN ,_, together_RB with_IN the_DT two_CD adjoining_NN rooms_NNS ,_, was_VBD vacated_VBN and_CC disinfected_VBN on_IN 10th_CD December_NNP 1898_CD ._.

The_DT infection_NN stopped_VBD suddenly_RB and_CC seemed_VBD to_TO disappear_VB for_IN fully_RB two_CD months_NNS ._.
The_DT infection_NN made_VBD its_PRP$ next_JJ appearance_NN on_IN the_DT scene_NN on_IN the_DT 7th_CD February_NNP 1899_CD ,_, after_IN an_DT interval_NN of_IN fully_RB two_CD months_NNS ._.

In_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN March_NNP the_DT dates_NNS of_IN the_DT cases_NNS ,_, which_WDT are_VBP in_IN all_DT 9_CD ,_, are_VBP as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -1st_NN ,_, 7th_CD ,_, 9th_CD ,_, and_CC 12th_CD March_NNP 1899_CD ;_: 2_CD cases_NNS on_IN 15th_CD March_NNP 1899_CD ;_: 2_CD cases_NNS on_IN 20th_CD and_CC 21st_CD March_NNP 1899_CD ._.

But_CC it_PRP may_MD fairly_RB be_VB said_VBD here_RB that_IN the_DT infection_NN which_WDT began_VBD in_IN this_DT house_NN on_IN 9th_CD December_NNP 1898_CD went_VBD on_IN steadily_RB progressing_VBG notwithstanding_VBG our_PRP$ energetic_JJ measures_NNS to_TO stop_VB it_PRP ,_, till_VBZ it_PRP reached_VBD its_PRP$ height_NN in_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN March_NNP ._.
From_IN this_DT time_NN it_PRP began_VBD to_TO show_VB signs_NNS of_IN gradual_JJ decline_NN ,_, till_VB it_PRP almost_RB subsided_VBD in_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN May_NNP ,_, which_WDT witnessed_VBD only_RB 4_CD cases_NNS on_IN the_DT following_JJ dates_NNS :_: -4th_NN ,_, 10th_CD ,_, 29th_CD and_CC 30th_CD May_NNP 1899_CD ._.
This_DT house_NN goes_VBZ very_RB much_JJ to_TO prove_VB that_DT evacuation_NN and_CC disinfection_NN does_VBZ not_RB necessarily_RB exercise_VB a_DT check_NN on_IN the_DT spread_NN of_IN infection_NN ._.
This_DT 'house_NN ,_, and_CC especially_RB its_PRP$ back_NN chawl_NN ,_, affords_NNS every_DT facility_NN for_IN the_DT sheltering_NN of_IN plague_JJ infection_NN ._.

(_( 3_CD )_) House_NNP No_UH ._.
177_CD ,_, Grant_NNP Road.-This_NNP house_NN is_VBZ a_DT single_JJ storied_JJ house_NN ,_, consist-_JJ ing_NN of_IN two_CD rows_NNS of_IN rooms_NNS ._.

The_DT Public_NNP Hospitals_NNPS have_VBP ,_, as_IN usual_JJ ,_, had_VBD the_DT heaviest_JJS admissions_NNS ,_, though_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT Private_NNP Hospitals_NNP ,_, such_JJ as_IN the_DT Sarvajannic_NNP (_( which_WDT opened_VBD rather_RB late_JJ in_IN the_DT epidemic_NN )_) ,_, the_DT Parsee_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, the_DT two_CD Jain_NNP Hospitals_NNS ,_, the_DT Telugu_NNP ,_, Hindu_NNP ,_, and_CC Strong_NNP 's_POS ,_, all_DT did_VBD good_JJ work_NN ._.
I_PRP had_VBD to_TO issue_VB very_RB strict_JJ instructions_NNS to_TO some_DT of_IN the_DT hospitals_NNS who_WP were_VBD inclined_VBN to_TO admit_VB other_JJ diseases_NNS ,_, than_IN plague_NN or_CC relapsing_VBG fever_NN ,_, into_IN their_PRP$ wards_NNS ._.
The_DT tendency_NN in_IN some_DT of_IN these_DT was_VBD to_TO use_VB these_DT hospitals_NNS as_IN ones_NNS for_IN treat-_JJ ment_NN of_IN general_JJ diseases_NNS as_RB well_RB ,_, but_CC this_DT was_VBD put_VBN a_DT stop_NN to_TO as_RB well_RB as_IN I_PRP could_MD ,_, These_DT hospitals_NNS were_VBD generally_RB divided_VBN into_IN wards_NNS for_IN observa-_JJ tion_NN cases-other_NN diseases_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN relapsing_VBG fever_NN ,_, &_CC c.-convalescent_JJ wards_NNS and_CC plague_NN wards_NNS ,_, and_CC some_DT had_VBD separate_JJ accommodation_NN for_IN pneu-_JJ monic_JJ cases_NNS ._.
Of_IN course_NN ,_, the_DT men_NNS and_CC women_NNS were_VBD kept_JJ separate_JJ ._.
Every_DT effort_NN was_VBD made_VBN to_TO carry_VB out_RP the_DT above_JJ principles_NNS ._.
I_PRP regret_VBP to_TO have_VB to_TO note_VB the_DT small_JJ number_NN of_IN admissions_NNS in_IN the_DT Mahomedan_NNP Hospitals_NNP situated_VBD in_IN ._.
one_CD of_IN the_DT densest_JJS parts_NNS of_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, viz._NN ,_, the_DT district_NN between_IN the_DT Crawford_NNP Market_NNP ,_, Parel_NNP Road_NNP ,_, Frere_NNP Road_NNP ,_, and_CC Baboolla_NNP Tank_NNP Road_NNP ._.
These_DT hospitals_NNS ,_, viz._NN ,_, the_DT Cutchi_NNP Mehmons_NNP ,_, Hallai_NNP Mehmons_NNP and_CC Katri_NNP Mehmons_NNP ,_, ought_MD to_TO have_VB shown_VBN a_DT large_JJ number_NN of_IN admissions_NNS instead_RB of_IN the_DT comparative_JJ small_JJ numbers_NNS quoted_VBN ._.
I_PRP think_VBP the_DT work_NN done_VBN in_IN these_DT hospitals_NNS ,_, more_RBR especially_RB the_DT large_JJ public_JJ ones_NNS ,_, is_VBZ a_DT matter_NN of_IN congratulation_NN to_TO the_DT Staff_NNP and_CC Committee_NNP ._.
With_IN reference_NN to_TO the_DT Private_NNP Hospitals_NNP which_WDT were_VBD opened_VBN in_IN the_DT very_RB crowded_JJ part_NN of_IN the_DT City_NNP ,_, I_PRP may_MD here_RB state_NN that_IN I_PRP think_VBP it_PRP is_VBZ now_RB time_NN ,_, when_WRB our_PRP$ ideas_NNS of_IN this_DT disease_NN are_VBP more_RBR advanced_JJ and_CC the_DT panic_NN caused_VBN by_IN the_DT high_JJ mortality_NN has_VBZ to_TO a_DT very_RB great_JJ extent_NN subsided_VBD ,_, that_IN these_DT were_VBD gradually_RB abolished_VBN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ well_RB known_VBN amongst_RP the_DT medical_JJ profession_NN that_IN there_EX is_VBZ danger_NN in_IN placing_VBG infectious_JJ or_CC contagious_JJ diseases_NNS in_IN crowded_JJ parts_NNS of_IN any_DT city_NN ,_, and_CC for_IN this_DT reason_NN these_DT hospitals_NNS are_VBP removed_VBN outside_IN the_DT crowded_JJ area_NN and_CC placed_VBN in_IN open_JJ spaces_NNS away_RB from_IN the_DT city_NN ._.
The_DT Private_NNP Hospitals_NNP in_IN Bombay_NNP were_VBD mostly_RB in_IN the_DT densest_JJS part_NN of_IN the_DT City_NNP ._.
The_DT control_NN over_IN these_DT was_VBD not_RB sufficiently_RB careful_JJ ,_, and_CC I_PRP have_VBP no_DT doubt_NN the_DT intercourse_NN between_IN the_DT sick_NN and_CC their_PRP$ friends_NNS was_VBD much_RB too_RB free_JJ ._.
Another_DT point_NN is_VBZ that_IN in_IN a_DT number_NN of_IN these_DT Private_NNP Hospitals_VBZ the_DT buildings_NNS used_VBN as_IN such_JJ were_VBD generally_RB the_DT places_NNS where_WRB caste_NN meetings_NNS and_CC other_JJ public_JJ cere-_JJ monials_NNS were_VBD carried_VBN out_IN ,_, and_CC I_PRP think_VBP it_PRP will_MD be_VB admitted_VBN that_DT once_RB these_DT places_NNS were_VBD used_VBN as_IN Infectious_JJ Hospitals_NNS ,_, it_PRP would_MD not_RB be_VB wise_NN to_TO have_VB them_PRP used_VBN again_RB as_IN public_JJ meeting_NN places_NNS ,_, where_WRB large_JJ number_NN of_IN men_NNS ,_, women_NNS and_CC children_NNS might_MD meet_VB and_CC possibly_RB get_VB infected_VBN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP been_VBN in-_JJ formed_VBN that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ very_RB convenient_JJ to_TO have_VB these_DT hospitals_NNS near_IN where_WRB cases_NNS occur_VBP and_CC that_DT otherwise_RB they_PRP would_MD not_RB go_VB to_TO hospital_VB at_IN all_DT ._.
I_PRP can_MD instance_NN the_DT Maratha_NNP Hospital_NNP and_CC the_DT Arthur_NNP Road_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, also_RB the_DT Parsee_NNP and_CC Jain_NNP Hospitals_NNP in_IN the_DT Parel_NNP Road_NNP where_WRB Hindus_NNP ,_, Parsees_NNP and_CC Brahmins_NNP ,_, and_CC other_JJ castes_NNS also_RB ,_, were_VBD brought_VBN from_IN long_RB dis-_NN ?_. 154_CD tances_NNS to_TO have_VB their_PRP$ cases_NNS treated_VBN ;_: and_CC given_VBN a_DT comfortable_JJ method_NN of_IN conveyance_NN ,_, I_PRP can_MD not_RB see_VB why_WRB these_DT cases_NNS should_MD not_RB be_VB safely_RB brought_VBN to_TO hospitals_NNS outside_IN the_DT City_NNP ,_, and_CC so_RB possibly_RB save_VB the_DT City_NNP from_IN having_VBG these_DT probable_JJ centres_NNS of_IN infection_NN ._.
When_WRB I_PRP state_NN that_IN there_EX were_VBD 19_CD of_IN these_DT possible_JJ sources_NNS of_IN infection_NN ,_, it_PRP will_MD be_VB seen_VBN that_IN some_DT steps_NNS ought_MD to_TO be_VB taken_VBN to_TO suppress_VB this_DT evil_NN ._.
My_PRP$ own_JJ idea_NN on_IN the_DT subject_NN is_VBZ that_IN some_DT open_JJ space_NN ,_, such_JJ as_IN the_DT Maratha_NNP Hospital_NNP grounds_NNS ,_, or_CC any_DT other_JJ convenient_NN site_NN which_WDT might_MD be_VB selected_VBN ,_, should_MD be_VB laid_VBN out_RP as_IN Large_NNP Plague_NNP Hospital_NNP ._.
Small_JJ plots_NNS of_IN ground_NN enough_JJ to_TO meet_VB the_DT requirements_NNS of_IN each_DT sect_NN ,_, could_MD be_VB handed_VBN over_RP to_TO them_PRP to_TO build_VB their_PRP$ own_JJ hospitals_NNS and_CC contact_NN camps_NNS ._.
I_PRP need_VBP hardly_RB point_VB out_RP the_DT convenience_NN of_IN this_DT arrangement_NN ._.
A_DT staff_NN of_IN medical_JJ men_NNS and_CC nurses_NNS could_MD be_VB employed_VBN to_TO look_VB after_IN the_DT sick_JJ and_CC see_VBP that_IN things_NNS are_VBP carried_VBN on_IN properly_RB ._.
No_DT interference_NN with_IN the_DT prejudices_NNS of_IN caste_NN would_MD be_VB allowed_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT medical_JJ attendance_NN and_CC treatment_NN could_MD be_VB left_VBN to_TO the_DT wishes_NNS of_IN each_DT caste_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT uncontrolled_JJ intercourse_NN between_IN sick_JJ and_CC their_PRP$ friends_NNS avoided_VBN ._.
The_DT Maratha_NNP Hospital_NNP had_VBD its_PRP$ vaidya_NN or_CC native_JJ doctor_NN ._.
Those_DT who_WP wished_VBD it_PRP could_MD have_VB this_DT form_NN of_IN treatment_NN ,_, and_CC they_PRP were_VBD not_RB interfered_VBN with_IN in_IN any_DT way_NN ,_, except_IN that_IN the_DT general_JJ sanitary_JJ conditions_NNS of_IN these_DT wards_NNS were_VBD attended_VBN to_TO ._.
Under_IN these_DT circumstances_NNS ,_, the_DT infected_VBN would_MD be_VB safely_RB removed_VBN away_RB from_IN the_DT City_NNP ,_, and_CC possible_JJ sources_NNS of_IN infection_NN removed_VBN ._.
I_PRP think_VBP the_DT Arthur_NNP Road_NNP Hospital_NNP should_MD continue_VB ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ capable_JJ of_IN enlargement_NN so_RB as_IN to_TO meet_VB a_DT larger_JJR demand_NN on_IN its_PRP$ resources_NNS ._.
So_RB also_RB would_MD ,_, if_IN necessary_JJ ,_, the_DT Modikhana_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, where_WRB there_EX is_VBZ plenty_NN of_IN open_JJ space_NN for_IN expansion_NN ._.
The_DT Maratha_NNP to_TO me_PRP is_VBZ the_DT ideal_JJ place_NN ,_, and_CC if_IN the_DT ground_NN were_VBD properly_RB drained_VBN or_CC raised_VBN ,_, nearly_RB the_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT Hindu_NNP Hospitals_NNP could_MD be_VB placed_VBN comfortably_RB there_RB ._.
I_PRP think_VBP the_DT compact_NN and_CC well-conducted_JJ hospital_NN ,_, out-buildings_NNS and_CC contact_NN camps_NNS of_IN the_DT Pathare_NNP Parbhu_NNP as_RB well_RB as_IN the_DT Hindu_NNP Hospitals_NNP ,_, both_DT of_IN which_WDT were_VBD situated_VBN in_IN the_DT Charni_NNP Road_NNP Gardens_NNP ,_, a_DT model_NN on_IN which_WDT these_DT Hospitals_NNS should_MD be_VB instituted_VBN ._.

Those_DT who_WP have_VBP visited_VBN the_DT wards_NNS of_IN hospitals_NNS when_WRB these_DT ladies_NNS were_VBD employed_VBN would_MD be_VB at_IN once_RB struck_VBN by_IN the_DT air_NN of_IN tidiness_NN and_CC cleanliness_NN which_WDT pervaded_VBD the_DT place_NN ._.
Their_PRP$ great_JJ effort_NN night_NN and_CC day_NN was_VBD to_TO try_VB every_DT means_NNS in_IN their_PRP$ power_NN to_TO save_VB the_DT lives_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ charges_NNS ,_, and_CC if_IN the_DT reward_NN of_IN their_PRP$ efforts_NNS was_VBD in_IN proportion_NN to_TO the_DT energy_NN they_PRP displayed_VBD in_IN trying_VBG to_TO save_VB life_NN ,_, our_PRP$ mortality_NN ought_MD to_TO be_VB very_RB low_JJ indeed_RB ._.
It_PRP was_VBD then_RB under_IN these_DT depressing_VBG circum-_NN stances_NNS that_IN these_DT ladies_NNS worked_VBD ,_, and_CC I_PRP think_VBP the_DT warmest_JJS thanks_NNS of_IN all_DT ought_MD to_TO be_VB theirs_JJ ungrudgingly_RB ._.

?_. 165_CD All_DT Hospitals_NNS ._.
The_DT following_JJ remarks_NNS are_VBP made_VBN by_IN Capt_NNP ._.
Howell_NNP ,_, R._NNP A._NNP M._NNP C._NNP ,_, regarding_VBG the_DT mortality_NN and_CC virulence_NN of_IN succeeding_VBG epidemics_NNS ._.
Percentage_NN Mortality_NNP 1898-99_CD ._.
During_IN the_DT year_NN under_IN report_NN ,_, 10,210_CD cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN were_VBD admit-_RB ted_VBN to_TO hospitals_NNS ._.
Of_IN these_DT 7,519_CD died_VBD ._.
The_DT percentage_NN mortality_NN of_IN cases_NNS in_IN hospital_NN for_IN the_DT year_NN therefore_RB amounts_NNS to_TO 73.6_CD ._.
Percentage_NN Mortality_NNP March-June_NNP 1897_CD ._.
On_IN reference_NN to_TO General_NNP Gatacre_NNP 's_POS report_NN it_PRP will_MD be_VB found_VBN that_IN ,_, during_IN the_DT four_CD months_NNS in_IN 1897_CD covered_VBN by_IN his_PRP$ report_NN ,_, there_EX were_VBD 2,646_CD cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN admitted_VBN to_TO hospitals_NNS with_IN a_DT mortality_NN of_IN 1,561_CD ._.
This_DT gives_VBZ a_DT percentage_NN mortality_NN of_IN 58.9_CD ._.
Percentage_NN MortalityJuly_RB 1897_CD to_TO April_NNP 1898_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT following_JJ ten_JJ months_NNS (_( 1897-98_JJ )_) during_IN which_WDT the_DT Plague_NNP Committee_NNP had_VBD charge_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN operations_NNS ,_, we_PRP find_VBP 8,114_JJ cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN admitted_VBN to_TO hospital_VB ,_, and_CC of_IN these_DT 5,336_CD died_VBD ._.
This_DT gives_VBZ a_DT percentage_NN mortality_NN of_IN 65.7_CD ._.
Remarks_NNS on_IN above_IN ._.
It_PRP will_MD be_VB inferred_VBN from_IN a_DT comparison_NN of_IN the_DT above_JJ figures_NNS that_IN each_DT recurring_VBG epidemic_NN of_IN plague_NN is_VBZ more_RBR virulent_JJ than_IN the_DT last_JJ ._.
This_DT is_VBZ an_DT opinion_NN very_RB largely_RB held_VBN by_IN medical_JJ men_NNS in_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ doubtful_JJ ,_, however_RB ,_, if_IN the_DT true_JJ increase_NN in_IN percentage_NN mortality_NN is_VBZ so_RB great_JJ as_IN these_DT figures_NNS would_MD lead_VB us_PRP to_TO infer_VB ._.
For_IN instance_NN ,_, General_NNP Gatacre_NNP 's_POS report_NN does_VBZ not_RB cover_VB the_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_NN of_IN 1896-97_JJ ,_, but_CC only_JJ deals_NNS with_IN four_CD months_NNS during_IN which_WDT it_PRP was_VBD declining_VBG ;_: so_CC that_IN the_DT 58.9_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
mortality_NN shown_VBN by_IN his_PRP$ figures_NNS would_MD probably_RB have_VB been_VBN much_RB higher_JJR if_IN a_DT longer_JJR period_NN had_VBD been_VBN report-_JJ ed_NN on_IN ._.
The_DT figures_NNS ,_, however_RB ,_, do_VBP show_VB a_DT larger_JJR number_NN of_IN cases_NNS admitted_VBN to_TO hospital_VB during_IN 1898-99_JJ than_IN in_IN the_DT previous_JJ epidemics_NNS ._.
This_DT will_MD be_VB readily_RB seen_VBN if_IN we_PRP compare_VBP the_DT average_JJ monthly_JJ admissions_NNS to_TO hospital_NN ._.
During_IN General_NNP Gatacre_NNP 's_POS time_NN the_DT average_JJ monthly_JJ admission_NN rate_NN was_VBD 661.5_CD ;_: during_IN the_DT existence_NN of_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Committee_NNP ,_, 811.4_CD ,_, and_CC during_IN the_DT year_NN under_IN report_NN 850.8_CD ._.
It_PRP may_MD also_RB be_VB gathered_VBN from_IN a_DT comparison_NN of_IN the_DT percentage_NN rates_NNS of_IN mortality_NN that_WDT medical_JJ service_NN is_VBZ as_RB helpless_JJ as_IN ever_RB as_RB far_RB as_IN the_DT treat-_JJ ment_NN of_IN plague_NN is_VBZ concerned_VBN ._.
(_( It_PRP should_MD be_VB noted_VBN that_IN the_DT above_JJ figures_NNS are_VBP based_VBN upon_IN the_DT returns_NNS submitted_VBN by_IN hospitals_NNS ,_, and_CC a_DT few_JJ of_IN the_DT smaller_JJR hospitals_NNS made_VBD no_DT returns_NNS ._.
The_DT general_JJ accuracy_NN of_IN the_DT figures_NNS given_VBN may_MD however_RB be_VB accepted_VBN as_IN substantially_RB correct_VBP ._. )_)

Symptoms_NNS ,_, Character_NNP and_CC Treatment.-These_JJ have_VBP been_VBN fully_RB described_VBN in_IN previous_JJ report_NN ._.
No_DT essential_JJ changes_NNS have_VBP been_VBN made_VBN in_IN the_DT line_NN of_IN treatment_NN ,_, which_WDT has_VBZ hitherto_NN been_VBN mainly_RB stimulant_JJ to_TO the_DT entire_JJ exclusion_NN of_IN all_DT antipyretics_NNS ,_, depressants_NNS ,_, or_CC internal_JJ antiseptics_NNS ._.
Period_NN of_IN Incubation.-The_NNP period_NN of_IN incubation_NN extends_NNS from_IN three_CD to_TO ten_VB days_NNS ._.
In_IN some_DT cases_NNS that_WDT take_VBP a_DT very_RB mild_JJ course-pestis_JJ ambulans-the_JJ period_NN is_VBZ somewhat_RB prolonged_JJ ,_, and_CC may_MD extend_VB to_TO even_RB fifteen_JJ days_NNS ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ not_RB possible_JJ to_TO say_VB whether_IN this_DT is_VBZ due_JJ to_TO the_DT greater_JJR resistance_NN of_IN the_DT system_NN or_CC to_TO a_DT small_JJ or_CC less_RBR virulent_JJ dose_NN of_IN the_DT poison_NN ._.
Fever.-All_CD the_DT points_NNS under_IN this_DT heading_NN have_VBP been_VBN fully_RB described_VBN in_IN previous_JJ reports_NNS ._.
The_DT inquiries_NNS under_IN the_DT remaining_VBG clinical_JJ heads_NNS have_VBP been_VBN also_RB similarly_RB described_VBN ._.
Plague_NNP complicated_VBD with_IN other_JJ Diseases._NNP --_: Plague_NNP associated_VBD with_IN the_DT following_NN has_VBZ been_VBN observed_VBN :_: -_: (_( a_DT )_) Small-pox_NN ._.
(_( b_NN )_) Chicken-pox_NN ._.
(_( c_NN )_) Measles_NNP ._.
(_( d_NN )_) Malaria_NNP ._.
(_( e_NN )_) Relapsing_VBG Fever_NNP ._.
(_( f_NN )_) Phthisis_NN ._.
The_DT last_JJ complication_NN is_VBZ extremely_RB fatal_JJ ._.
Malaria_NNP and_CC relapsing_VBG fever_NN exert_VBP a_DT modifying_JJ influence_NN on_IN the_DT course_NN of_IN plague_NN ,_, making_VBG it_PRP milder_NN ._.
Mumps_NNS have_VBP never_RB been_VBN mistaken_VBN for_IN plague_NN ,_, for_IN the_DT gravity_NN in_IN the_DT two_CD diseases_NNS is_VBZ so_RB different_JJ ._.
Observation_NNP Cases.-These_JJ numbered_VBD 216_CD cases_NNS ,_, and_CC comprised_VBD malaria_NNS ,_, rheumatism_NN ,_, diarrha_NN ,_, dysentery_NN ,_, syphilis_NN ,_, guinea-worm_NN ,_, heart_NN disease_NN ,_, kidney_NN diseases_NNS ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, &_CC c._VBP Lustig_NNP 's_POS Serum.-Full_JJ reports_NNS on_IN the_DT treatment_NN with_IN Lustig_NNP 's_POS serum_NN have_VBP been_VBN supplied_VBN from_IN month_NN to_TO month_NN ._.
N._NNP H._NNP CHOKSEY_NNP ,_, BOMBAY_NNP ,_, Medical_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, in_IN Charge_NNP ,_, Arthur_NNP Road_NNP Hospital_NNP ._.
28th_CD July_NNP 1899_CD ._.
Note_NN by_IN the_DT Special_NNP Medical_NNP Officer.-Dr._NNP Choksey_NNP 's_POS work_NN since_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN epidemic_NN in_IN Bombay_NNP is_VBZ well_RB known_VBN ,_, and_CC requires_VBZ no_DT further_JJ praise_NN from_IN me_PRP ._.
The_DT Hospital_NNP was_VBD conducted_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT sick_JJ treated_VBN ,_, with_IN every_DT care_NN ,_, kindness_NN and_CC skill_NN ._.
The_DT report_NN on_IN the_DT inoculation_NN by_IN Lustig_NNP 's_POS serum_NN as_IN manufactured_VBN by_IN Professor_NNP Galliotti_NNP at_IN Parel_NNP is_VBZ published_VBN in_IN full_JJ ,_, with_IN remarks_NNS in_IN the_DT Appendix_NNP ._.
No_DT ._.
2_CD ._.
Report_NN on_IN the_DT Modikhana_NNP Plague_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, Bombay_NNP ,_, from_IN the_DT 1st_CD June_NNP 1898_CD to_TO 31st_CD May_NNP 1899_CD ._.
History_NN ._.
1_CD ._.
The_DT Hospital_NNP was_VBD first_RB opened_VBN ,_, on_IN the_DT 8th_CD January_NNP 1898_CD ,_, by_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Committee_NNP ,_, under_IN the_DT Chairmanship_NNP of_IN Sir_NNP James_NNP Campbell_NNP ,_, K.C.I.E._NNP ,_, and_CC has_VBZ been_VBN since_IN in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT following_JJ Medical_JJ Officers_NNS in_IN succession_NN :_: -_: Surgn_NN ._.
Julius_NNP ,_, R._NNP N._NNP Surgn_NNP ._.
Bernard_NNP ,_, R._NNP N._NNP Surgn_NNP ._.
Page_NN ,_, R._NNP N._NNP ?_. 173_CD The_DT present_JJ Medical_NNP Officer_NNP took_VBD charge_NN of_IN the_DT Hospital_NNP on_IN 28th_CD July_NNP 1898_CD ._.
The_DT Hospital_NNP was_VBD then_RB chiefly_NN used_VBN for_IN detaining_VBG and_CC keeping_VBG under_IN observa-_JJ tion_NN cases_NNS of_IN fever_NN sent_VBN from_IN the_DT various_JJ bunders_NNS by_IN the_DT Port_NNP Health_NNP authorities_NNS ._.
The_DT numbers_NNS of_IN plague_NN admissions_NNS were_VBD then_RB comparatively_RB few_JJ ,_, but_CC they_PRP gradually_RB swelled_VBD with_IN the_DT increase_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN the_DT City_NNP ._.
In_IN February_NNP 1899_CD ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN the_DT Port_NNP opened_VBD a_DT special_JJ camp_NN for_IN his_PRP$ ``_`` Bunder_NNP cases_NNS ``_`` on_IN the_DT site_NN of_IN the_DT old_JJ Modikhana_NNP Camp_NNP ,_, and_CC ceased_VBD sending_VBG them_PRP to_TO this_DT Hospital_NNP ._.
This_DT helped_VBD much_RB to_TO increase_VB our_PRP$ accommodation_NN for_IN plague_NN cases_NNS ._.
In_IN March_NNP 1899_CD ,_, accommodation_NN was_VBD further_RB augmented_VBN by_IN opening_VBG two_CD extra_JJ wards_NNS ._.
The_DT largest_JJS number_NN of_IN patients_NNS under_IN treatment_NN in_IN this_DT Hospital_NNP was_VBD 135_CD on_IN the_DT 12th_CD March_NNP 1899_CD ._.

17.4_CD Wards_NNS ._.
The_DT wards_NNS are_VBP constructed_VBN of_IN teak_NN and_CC bamboo_NN supports_NNS ,_, the_DT sides_NNS of_IN double_JJ bamboo_NN matting_NN and_CC roof_NN of_IN cudjan_NN or_CC jowli_NN ,_, and_CC rendered_VBD waterproof_NNS with_IN tarpau-_JJ lins_NNS ._.
Two_CD of_IN the_DT wards_NNS have_VBP canvas_VBN ceilings_NNS ._.
All_PDT the_DT wards_NNS are_VBP ventilated_VBN from_IN below_IN by_IN means_NNS of_IN one-foot_JJ frame_NN ,_, made_VBN to_TO be_VB opened_VBN up_RP or_CC let_VB down_RP as_RB required_JJ ._.
There_EX is_VBZ also_RB about_IN a_DT foot_NN of_IN open_JJ space_NN in_IN each_DT ward_NN between_IN the_DT roof_NN and_CC the_DT sides_NNS ._.
The_DT floor_NN is_VBZ raised_VBN so_RB as_IN to_TO form_VB a_DT plinth_NN of_IN about_IN 8_CD inches_NNS in_IN height_NN ,_, and_CC is_VBZ made_VBN of_IN a_DT mixture_NN of_IN earth_NN and_CC fine_JJ charcoal_NN dust_NN well_RB beaten_RB down_RP ._.
Every_DT shed_NN is_VBZ ,_, at_IN intervals_NNS ,_, limewashed_VBD both_DT inside_IN and_CC out_IN ._.
All_PDT the_DT cooking_NN places_NNS ,_, as_RB well_RB as_IN the_DT Dhobies_NNP '_POS lliuthee_NN shed_VBN ,_, are_VBP made_VBN com-_JJ pletely_RB of_IN corrugated_VBN iron_NN ,_, to_TO prevent_VB the_DT risk_NN of_IN fire_NN ._.
Four_CD of_IN the_DT wards_NNS are_VBP provided_VBN each_DT with_IN a_DT bath-room_NN with_IN concrete_JJ floor_NN and_CC a_DT stand-pipe_JJ ._.
This_DT arrangement_NN is_VBZ found_VBN to_TO be_VB more_RBR convenient_JJ and_CC satisfactory_JJ than_IN having_VBG stand-pipes_JJ outside_NN in_IN the_DT compound_NN ._.
These_DT four_CD wards_NNS have_VBP been_VBN reserved_VBN as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -_: 1_CD Acute_NNP Male_NNP Plague_NNP Ward_NNP ._.
1_CD Female_NNP Ward_NNP ._.
1_CD Male_JJ Observation_NNP Ward_NNP ._.
1_CD Male_JJ Convalescent_NNP Ward.-_NNP The_DT remaining_VBG three_CD wards_NNS were_VBD only_RB used_VBN during_IN the_DT height_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_NN for_IN the_DT accommodation_NN of_IN the_DT increased_JJ number_NN of_IN male_NN and_CC female_JJ convalescents_NNS ._.
Dispensary_NNP ,_, The_DT dispensary_NN is_VBZ provided_VBN with_IN a_DT stand-pipe_JJ ,_, and_CC furnished_VBD with_IN medicines_NNS likely_JJ to_TO be_VB useful_JJ in_IN a_DT plague_JJ hospital_NN ._.
Servants_NNS '_POS quarters_NNS ._.
Servants_NNS '_POS quarters_NNS consist_VBP of_IN two_CD long_JJ sheds_NNS ,_, and_CC provided_VBD with_IN chullas_JJ out-_JJ side_NN ;_: no_DT servants_NNS being_VBG allowed_VBN to_TO cook_VB inside_IN their_PRP$ rooms_NNS ._.
Contact_NNP shed_VBD ._.
There_EX is_VBZ a_DT large_JJ contact_NN shed_VBN with_IN rooms_NNS ,_, with_IN accommodation_NN for_IN about_IN 50_CD contacts_NNS ;_: it_PRP has_VBZ its_PRP$ own_JJ washing_JJ place_NN with_IN a_DT stand_NN pipe_NN and_CC a_DT kitchen_NN exclusively_RB for_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN the_DT contacts_NNS ._.
Dhobies_NNS '_POS washing_VBG place_NN ._.
There_EX is_VBZ a_DT tank_NN and_CC a_DT washing_JJ place_NN built_VBN ,_, and_CC reserved_VBD exclusively_RB for_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN dhobies_NNS ;_: and_CC also_RB an_DT arrangement_NN for_IN their_PRP$ bhuthee_NN or_CC oven_RB ._.
All_PDT the_DT hospital_NN clothing_NN is_VBZ washed_VBN on_IN the_DT premises_NNS ._.
Conservancy_NNP Surplus_NNP Water_NNP ._.
4_CD ._.
Conservancy-All_NNP the_DT surplus_JJ water_NN from_IN the_DT various_JJ stand-pipes_NNS of_IN the_DT wards_NNS ,_, kitchens_NNS and_CC cooking-places_NNS is_VBZ carried_VBN away_RB into_IN the_DT sea_NN by_IN means_NNS of_IN open_JJ drains_NNS constructed_VBN of_IN 4_CD ''_'' stone-ware_JJ half_NN pipes_NNS laid_VBN on_IN a_DT foundation_NN of_IN concrete_NN ._.
Ward_NNP Conservancy_NNP ._.
The_DT contents_NNS of_IN bed-pans_NNS are_VBP emptied_VBN into_IN pails_NNS containing_VBG a_DT solution_NN of_IN phenyle_NN and_CC provided_VBN with_IN lids_NNS ._.
These_DT pails_NNS are_VBP regularly_RB emptied_VBN into_IN a_DT night-soil_JJ cart_NN specially_RB provided_VBN for_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN ,_, and_CC which_WDT makes_VBZ daily_RB two_CD trips_NNS to_TO the_DT nearest_JJS dep6t_NN to_TO discharge_VB its_PRP$ contents_NNS ._.
Xiatrines_NNS and_CC disposal_NN of_IN sewage_NN ._.
The_DT Latrine_NNP is_VBZ six-seated_JJ ;_: two_CD seats_NNS being_VBG reserved_VBN for_IN females_NNS and_CC four_CD for_IN males_NNS ._.
The_DT night_NN soil_NN is_VBZ received_VBN into_IN iron_NN receptacles_NNS ,_, from_IN which_WDT the_DT solid_JJ portion_NN is_VBZ removed_VBN to_TO the_DT conservancy_NN cart_NN ,_, twice_RB daily_RB in_IN cold_JJ season_NN ,_, and_CC three_CD times_NNS in_IN the_DT hot_JJ weather_NN ._.
Until_IN March_NNP 1899_CD ,_, the_DT liquid_JJ portion_NN of_IN the_DT night-soil_NN was_VBD allowed_VBN to_TO run_VB into_IN a_DT cesspool_NN which_WDT was_VBD emptied_VBN every_DT morning_NN ._.
This_DT plan_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, was_VBD found_VBN to_TO be_VB much_JJ objectionable_JJ ._.
The_DT cesspool_NN was_VBD consequently_RB done_VBN away_RB with_IN ,_, and_CC the_DT liquid_JJ sewage_NN ia_NN now_RB made_VBN to_TO run_VB directly_RB into_IN the_DT main_JJ drain_NN ._.
Watorsupply_NNP ._.
5_CD Water-Supply_JJ is_VBZ derived_VBN from_IN Tansa_NNP and_CC Tulsi_NNP Lakes_NNP ._.
175_CD Disinfection_NN of_IN Wards_NNP ._.
6_CD ._.
Disinfection.-Regularly_JJ three_CD times_NNS in_IN 24_CD hours_NNS ,_, the_DT floor_NN of_IN each_DT ward_NN is_VBZ sprinkled_VBN over_IN with_IN phenyle_JJ and_CC swept_VBN by_IN the_DT ward_NN mehtars_NNS ,_, and_CC every_DT morning_NN powdered_VBN lime_NN is_VBZ spread_VBN over_IN the_DT floor_NN through_IN fine_JJ seives_NNS ._.
The_DT walls_NNS and_CC floors_NNS of_IN the_DT wards_NNS and_CC outhouses_NNS are_VBP lime-washed_JJ as_RB often_RB as_IN necessary_JJ ,_, quick_JJ lime_NN being_VBG used_VBN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN ._.
Of_IN dejecta_NN ._.
Discharges_NNS from_IN patients_NNS soiling_VBG the_DT floors_NNS are_VBP disinfected_VBN with_IN phenyle_NN ,_, swept_VBD up_RP ,_, removed_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT spot_NN lime-washed_JJ ._.
Of_IN dressings_NNS ._.
The_DT dressings_NNS are_VBP all_DT burnt_NNS in_IN the_DT incinerator_NN ._.
Of_IN soiled_VBN clothing_NN ._.
All_DT soiled_VBD clothing_NN is_VBZ carried_VBN from_IN the_DT ward_NN ,_, and_CC put_VB directly_RB into_IN a_DT large_JJ tub_NN containing_VBG a_DT solution_NN of_IN phenyle_NN ._.
Twice_RB daily_JJ it_PRP is_VBZ taken_VBN out_IN of_IN the_DT disinfecting_VBG solution_NN and_CC washed_VBN by_IN the_DT mehtars_NNS ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ then_RB sent_VBN to_TO the_DT disinfector_NN for_IN final_JJ sterilization_NN ._.
Modikhana_NNP Sterilizer_NNP ._.
This_DT hospital_NN has_VBZ the_DT advantage_NN of_IN the_DT close_JJ proximity_NN of_IN the_DT Modikhana_NNP sterilizer_NN ._.
Every_DT moruiug_NN all_PDT the_DT changed_VBN or_CC soiled_VBN clothes_NNS from_IN the_DT wards_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN jackets_NNS ,_, sheets_NNS ,_, blankets_NNS ,_, kumblies_NNS ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, are_VBP sent_VBN to_TO the_DT disinfector_NN for_IN sterilization_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ an_DT ``_`` Equifex_NNP ''_'' steam_NN disinfector_NN stove_NN of_IN Geniste_NNP Herscher_NNP patent_NN ,_, and_CC consists_VBZ of_IN a_DT vertical_JJ boiler_NN of_IN 8_CD h._NN p._NN and_CC a_DT sterilizing_JJ chamber_NN ._.
The_DT latter_NN is_VBZ made_VBN of_IN steel_NN ,_, cover-_JJ ed_NN over_IN on_IN the_DT outside_JJ with_IN wooden_JJ planking_NN ,_, and_CC having_VBG along_RP its_PRP$ internal_JJ surface_NN a_DT coil_NN of_IN tubes_NNS ._.
The_DT sterilising_JJ chamber_NN is_VBZ provided_VBN with_IN doors_NNS for_IN opening_VBG from_IN either_CC end_VB ,_, and_CC inside_IN it_PRP is_VBZ a_DT wire_NN cradle_NN for_IN holding_VBG the_DT articles_NNS to_TO be_VB sterilized_VBN ,_, and_CC arranged_VBD to_TO move_VB out_RB and_CC in_IN on_IN rails_NNS at_IN both_DT ends_NNS ._.
All_PDT the_DT clothing_NN to_TO be_VB disinfected_VBN ,_, is_VBZ put_VBN into_IN this_DT cradle_NN ,_, special_JJ care_NN being_VBG taken_VBN in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN mattresses_NNS ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, to_TO have_VB space_NN between_IN them_PRP by_IN means_NNS of_IN pillows_NNS or_CC other_JJ suitable_JJ articles_NNS so_RB as_IN to_TO allow_VB the_DT steam_NN to_TO penetrate_VB into_IN every_DT corner_NN ._.
The_DT doors_NNS are_VBP then_RB securely_RB fastened_VBN ._.
Mode_NNP of_IN working_VBG ._.
The_DT steam_NN generated_VBD in_IN the_DT boiler_NN is_VBZ then_RB introduced_VBN into_IN the_DT chamber_NN ,_, the_DT air_NN contained_VBN in_IN it_PRP being_VBG allowed_VBN to_TO escape_VB ._.
When_WRB the_DT thermometer_NN indicates_VBZ a_DT temperature_NN of_IN 180_CD ,_, the_DT air_NN valve_NN is_VBZ shut_VBN off_RP ,_, and_CC the_DT pressure_NN of_IN the_DT steam_NN in_IN the_DT chamber_NN is_VBZ allowed_VBN to_TO rise_VB until_IN the_DT gauge_NN indicates_VBZ a_DT pressure_NN of_IN 10_CD lbs_NNS ._.
After_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN five_CD minutes_NNS ,_, the_DT compressed_JJ steam_NN is_VBZ let_VBN off_RP ._.
This_DT causes_VBZ a_DT partial_JJ vacuum_NN .in_VBZ the_DT chamber_NN ,_, so_IN that_DT when_WRB the_DT fresh_JJ supply_NN of_IN steam_NN is_VBZ introduced_VBN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ able_JJ to_TO penetrate_VB into_IN the_DT articles_NNS more_RBR thoroughly_RB ._.
This_DT process_NN is_VBZ repeated_VBN three_CD times_NNS ._.
The_DT steam_NN is_VBZ then_RB finally_RB allowed_VBN to_TO escape_VB ._.
If_IN the_DT articles_NNS are_VBP removed_VBN at_IN this_DT stage_NN ,_, they_PRP will_MD be_VB found_VBN to_TO be_VB thoroughly_RB sterilized_VBN ,_, but_CC will_MD be_VB very_RB wet_JJ owing_VBG to_TO a_DT certain_JJ amount_NN of_IN condensation_NN of_IN steam_NN into_IN water_NN ._.
To_TO dry_VB the_DT articles_NNS ,_, steam_NN is_VBZ let_VBN into_IN the_DT coil_NN of_IN tubes_NNS along_IN the_DT inner_JJ aspect_NN of_IN the_DT sides_NNS of_IN the_DT chamber_NN ,_, the_DT water_NN in_IN which_WDT is_VBZ ,_, in_IN consequence_NN ,_, evaporated_VBN to_TO dryness_VB in_IN about_RB 10_CD minutes_NNS ._.
The_DT articles_NNS will_MD then_RB be_VB found_VBN to_TO be_VB thoroughly_RB dry_JJ ._.
The_DT whole_JJ operation_NN of_IN sterilization_NN takes_VBZ about_IN half_PDT an_DT hour_NN ._.
The_DT clothing_NN ,_, after_IN it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN thus_RB sterilized_VBN ,_, is_VBZ handed_VBN over_IN to_TO the_DT hospital_NN dhobies_NNS for_IN washing_VBG ._.
Mortuary_NNP ._.
7_CD ._.
The_DT Mortuary_NNP is_VBZ not_RB a_DT pucca_NN structure_NN ,_, but_CC only_RB a_DT shed_JJ 20_CD '_POS X_JJ 10_CD '_'' of_IN matting_NN and_CC jowlies_NNS with_IN perforated_JJ tin_NN sheeting_VBG running_VBG along_RB the_DT lower_JJR portion_NN of_IN the_DT sides_NNS ,_, and_CC serving_VBG the_DT double_JJ purpose_NN of_IN ventilation_NN as_RB well_RB as_IN protection_NN of_IN corpses_NNS from_IN the_DT attacks_NNS of_IN rats_NNS ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ also_RB ventilated_VBN from_IN above_IN by_IN an_DT open_JJ space_NN between_IN the_DT sides_NNS and_CC the_DT roof_NN ._.
The_DT floor_NN is_VBZ kutcha_VBN ._.
176_CD Removal_NNP of_IN the_DT dead_JJ ._.
After_IN the_DT death_NN of_IN a_DT patient_NN ,_, the_DT body_NN is_VBZ immediately_RB removed_VBN to_TO the_DT mortuary_NN by_IN the_DT wardboys_NNS ,_, the_DT patient_NN 's_POS name_NN written_VBN on_IN a_DT piece_NN of_IN paper_NN ,_, being_VBG tied_VBN to_TO the_DT wrist_NN for_IN subsequent_JJ identification_NN before_IN the_DT body_NN is_VBZ removed_VBN from_IN the_DT ward_NN ._.
No_DT corpse_NN is_VBZ allowed_VBN to_TO remain_VB for_IN more_JJR than_IN 12_CD hours_NNS ,_, at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN which_WDT period_NN it_PRP is_VBZ considered_VBN as_IN unclaimed_JJ and_CC disposed_JJ of_IN accordingly_RB ._.
Disposal_NNP of_IN un-_JJ claimed_JJ bodies_NNS of_IN Hindoos_NNP ._.

Clinical_JJ notes_NNS Onset_NNP ._.

The_DT temperature_NN soon_RB rose_VBD to_TO 102_CD and_CC upwards_NNS ,_, the_DT initial_JJ rise_NN being_VBG rapid_JJ ,_, and_CC it_PRP continued_VBD to_TO be_VB high_JJ until_IN about_IN the_DT 4th_JJ day_NN when_WRB there_EX was_VBD noticed_VBN a_DT tendency_NN for_IN the_DT fall_NN of_IN the_DT temperature_NN ._.

178_CD Netvous_JJ Phenomena_NNP ,_, 2_CD ._.
Nervous_JJ Symptoms.-Certain_NNP nervous_JJ symptoms_NNS were_VBD invariably_RB present_JJ ,_, generally_RB showing_VBG themselves_PRP early_JJ during_IN the_DT illness_NN ._.
These_DT symptoms_NNS were_VBD attri-_JJ butable_JJ to_TO perversion_NN of_IN consciousness_NN in_IN different_JJ ways_NNS :_: -In_VB some_DT cases_NNS there_EX was_VBD u_JJ partial_JJ loss_NN ,_, amounting_VBG to_TO a_DT state_NN of_IN lethargy_NN or_CC drowsiness_NN from_IN which_WDT the_DT patients-_NN could_MD be_VB roused_VBN by_IN being_VBG loudly_RB spoken_VBN to_TO ._.

3_CD ._.

4_CD ._.

VI_NNP ._.
Variety_NN ,_, A_NNP bubo_NN generally_RB made_VBD its_PRP$ appearance_NN within_IN 48_CD hours_NNS ,_, accompanied_VBN by_IN a_DT sensation_NN of_IN pain_NN in_IN the_DT region_NN ._.

The_DT course_NN of_IN the_DT buboes_NNS will_MD be_VB dwelt_VBN upon_IN under_IN the_DT progress_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.
In_IN addition_NN to_TO these_DT signs_NNS ,_, various_JJ other_JJ disturbances_NNS were_VBD produced_VBN by_IN the_DT implication_NN of_IN the_DT different_JJ systems_NNS in_IN the_DT body_NN :_: -_: Cutaneous_JJ Symptoms_NNS ._.
Cutaneous_JJ System.-The_JJ skin_NN was_VBD noticed_VBN to_TO be_VB mostly_RB hot_JJ and_CC dry_JJ ,_, but_CC in_IN a_DT few_JJ cases_NNS clammy_NNS and_CC moist_NN ,_, the_DT perspiration_NN having_VBG no_DT particular_JJ odour_NN ._.

179_CD Phlyctenules_NNS ._.
Pustules_NNS or_CC phlyctenules_NNS were_VBD noticed_VBN in_IN 10_CD cases_NNS ,_, and_CC had_VBD a_DT distinctive_JJ appearance_NN ;_: in_IN the_DT beginning_VBG a_DT small_JJ vesicle_NN was_VBD noticed_VBN which_WDT showed_VBD nmbilication_NN and_CC contained_VBD a_DT clear_JJ fluid_NN which_WDT afterwards_NNS became_VBD greyish_JJ and_CC purulent_NN ._.

Bloo.1_NNP ._.

Heart_NNP ._.
