Hmorrhages_NNS ._.
Various_JJ haemorrhages_NNS were_VBD noticed_VBN :_: epistaxis_NN ,_, haemorrhages_VBZ into_IN con-_JJ janciivce_NN ,_, bleeding_VBG from_IN the_DT throat_NN ,_, haemoptysis_NN ,_, hcematemesis_NN ,_, and_CC also_RB melna_NN ._.
There_EX were_VBD no_DT cases_NNS of_IN hcematuria_NNS nor_CC haemorrhages_NNS into_IN the_DT skin_NN ._.
Respiratory_NN Symptoms_NNP ._.
Pulmonary_JJ Lesions_NNS ._.
Respiratory_JJ System.-Hiccough_NNP was_VBD sometimes_RB noticed_VBN ._.
The_DT respirations_NNS were_VBD hurried_VBN ,_, generally_RB above_IN 30_CD per_IN minute_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN grave_JJ cases_NNS with_IN pulmonary_JJ complications_NNS ,_, short_RB ,_, irregular_JJ and_CC gasping_NN ._.
Congestion_NN of_IN the_DT pulmonary_JJ tissue_NN or_CC of_IN the_DT bronchioles_NNS or_CC a_DT catarrhal_JJ condition_NN of_IN them_PRP was_VBD noticed_VBN in_IN a_DT majority_NN of_IN case_NN ._.
This_DT secondary_JJ pneumonic_JJ condition_NN was_VBD noted_VBN in_IN 19_CD cases_NNS out_IN of_IN 28_CD cases_NNS treated_VBN by_IN the_DT Indian_NNP Plague_NNP Commission_NNP with_IN M._NNP Koux_NNP 's_POS serum_NN ,_, an_DT analysis_NN of_IN which_WDT will_MD be_VB given_VBN in_IN the_DT form_NN of_IN an_DT appendix_NN ._.
A_DT description_NN of_IN primary_JJ pneumonic_JJ plague_NN will_MD be_VB given_VBN subsequently_RB ._.
Nervous_JJ Symptoms_NNP ._.
Nervous_JJ System._NNP --_: Besides_IN the_DT symptoms_NNS of_IN drowsiness_NN and_CC delirium_NN and_CC the_DT characteristic_JJ manner_NN of_IN speech_NN ,_, mentioned_VBN above_IN ,_, various_JJ other_JJ nervous_JJ phenomena_NNS were_VBD noticed_VBN ._.
Delirium_NN was_VBD rapidly_RB followed_VBN by_IN great_JJ prostration_NN and_CC coma_NN ._.
180_CD Headache_NNP was_VBD more_RBR or_CC less_RBR a_DT constant_JJ symptom_NN and_CC so_RB also_RB sleeplessness_NN ._.
In_IN a_DT few_JJ cases_NNS a_DT peculiar_JJ fibrillar_JJ trembling_NN of_IN muscles_NNS was_VBD noticed_VBN ._.
Generally_RB there_EX was_VBD marked_VBN muscular_JJ atrophy_NN ,_, and_CC sometimes_RB spasmodic_JJ muscular_JJ contractions_NNS of_IN extremities_NNS ,_, sometimes_RB spasms_JJ resembling_VBG tetanus_NN ._.
Picking_VBG at_IN bed_NN clothes_NNS was_VBD noticed_VBN in_IN severe_JJ cases_NNS ,_, and_CC in_IN a_DT few_JJ cases_NNS con-_JJ vulsions_NNS preceded_VBD death_NN ._.
Urine_NN ._.
Urinary_JJ System.-Unfortunately_RB ,_, owing_VBG to_TO pressure_NN of_IN work_NN ,_, no_DT special_JJ observations_NNS were_VBD made_VBN with_IN regard_NN to_TO this_DT system_NN ._.
Retention_NN of_IN urine_NN was_VBD a_DT common_JJ symptom_NN ,_, but_CC suppression_NN was_VBD never_RB met_VBN with_IN ._.
There_EX appeared_VBD to_TO be_VB no_DT diminution_NN as_IN regards_NNS the_DT quantity_NN of_IN urine_JJ excreted_VBN ._.
Complications_NNS ._.
The_DT various_JJ complications_NNS met_VBD with_IN have_VBP been_VBN described_VBN above_IN under_IN the_DT various_JJ systems_NNS ,_, and_CC ,_, in_IN addition_NN to_TO these_DT ,_, acute_NN conjunctivitis_NN ,_, ulcerative_JJ keratitis_NN and_CC hypopyon_NN have_VBP been_VBN constantly_RB noticed_VBN ._.
Aphasia_NNP was_VBD met_VBN with_IN ,_, and_CC in_IN one_CD case_NN the_DT patient_NN remained_VBD aphasic_JJ for_IN nearly_RB one_CD month_NN after_IN the_DT subsidence_NN of_IN all_PDT the_DT acute_NN symptoms_NNS ._.
Pregnancy_NN complicated_VBD plague_NN in_IN six_CD cases_NNS ._.
Abortion_NN followed_VBD in_IN every_DT case_NN ._.
There_EX were_VBD no_DT recoveries_NNS ._.
Secondary_JJ abscesses_NNS were_VBD met_VBN with_IN in_IN a_DT large_JJ number_NN of_IN cases_NNS ,_, and_CC in_IN one_CD case_NN eight_CD such_JJ abscesses_NNS were_VBD opened_VBN ._.
In_IN some_DT cases_NNS the_DT pus_NN from_IN suppurated_VBN buboes_NNS showed_VBD a_DT tendency_NN to_TO travel_VB along_IN the_DT areolar_JJ tissue_NN in_IN long_JJ directions_NNS ._.
Sequelae_NNP ._.
The_DT sequel_NN of_IN plague_NN were_VBD noticed_VBN to_TO be_VB ,_, firstly_RB ,_, a_DT very_RB protracted_JJ period_NN of_IN convalescence_NN ,_, the_DT result_NN of_IN asthenia_NN following_VBG the_DT extreme_JJ prostration_NN from_IN the_DT action_NN of_IN the_DT toxines_NNS of_IN plague_NN on_IN the_DT tissues_NNS ._.
The_DT ulcerations_NNS resulting_VBG from_IN the_DT suppura-_JJ tion_NN of_IN buboes_NNS ,_, or_CC from_IN sloughing_VBG away_RB of_IN dead_JJ tissue_NN of_IN buboes_NNS or_CC plague_NN phlyctenules_NNS ,_, showed_VBD no_DT tendency_NN to_TO rapid_VB healing_NN ._.
Two_CD cases_NNS developed_VBD phthisis_NN during_IN convalescence_NN and_CC died_VBD of_IN exhaustion_NN ._.
Dementia_NNP was_VBD observed_VBN in_IN one_CD case_NN ._.
Clinical_JJ Varieties_NNS ._.
For_IN Clinical_JJ purposes_NNS three_CD varieties_NNS of_IN plague_NN were_VBD recognised_VBN :_: -_: (_( 1_CD )_) ._.
Bubonic_NNP ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) ._.
Septicoemia_NN or_CC non-bubonic_JJ (_( 3_CD )_) ._.
Pneumonic_NNP ._.
Bubonic_NNP Plague_NNP ._.
The_DT bubonic_JJ variety_NN was_VBD accompanied_VBN by_IN the_DT presence_NN of_IN bubo_NN which_WDT confirms_VBZ the_DT diagnosis_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.
Non-bubonic_JJ Plague_NNP ._.
In_IN the_DT second_JJ variety_NN all_PDT the_DT typical_JJ symptoms_NNS of_IN plague_NN were_VBD present_JJ ,_, but_CC no_DT bubo_NN could_MD be_VB detected_VBN externally_RB ._.
This_DT so_RB called_JJ septicoemic_NN or_CC non-bubonic_JJ type_NN was_VBD met_VBN with_IN in_IN 294_CD cases_NNS ._.
The_DT absence_NN of_IN buboes_NNS showed_VBD that_IN the_DT infection_NN was_VBD not_RB through_IN the_DT ordinary_JJ lymphatic_JJ channels_NNS ._.
The_DT terra_NN ``_`` Septicaemia_NNP ''_'' is_VBZ misleading_VBG ,_, for_IN every_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN is_VBZ a_DT septicoemia_NN ,_, and_CC there_EX is_VBZ no_DT reason_NN ,_, therefore_RB why_WRB this_DT term_NN should_MD be_VB applied_VBN to_TO non-bubonic_JJ cases_NNS in_IN particular_JJ ._.
Pneumonic_NNP Plague_NNP ._.
The_DT third_JJ clinical_JJ variety_NN is_VBZ pneumonic_JJ plague_NN ._.
In_IN a_DT certain_JJ number_NN of_IN cases_NNS all_PDT the_DT usual_JJ symptoms_NNS of_IN plague_NN are_VBP present_JJ ,_, but_CC no_DT bubo_NN ,_, showing_VBG that_IN the_DT infection_NN is_VBZ not_RB through_IN the_DT lymphatic_JJ system_NN ._.
There_EX are_VBP ,_, however_RB ,_, on_IN physical_JJ examination_NN certain_JJ inflammatory_JJ lesions_NNS invariably_RB found_VBN in_IN the_DT lungs_NNS ;_: and_CC the_DT sputum_NN is_VBZ found_VBN by_IN bacteriological_JJ examination_NN to_TO be_VB swarming_VBG with_IN plague_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ inferred_VBN from_IN this_DT that_WDT in_IN these_DT cases_NNS the_DT primary_JJ infection_NN is_VBZ through_IN the_DT respiratory_NN tract_NN ._.
181_CD In_IN these_DT cases_NNS of_IN primary_JJ pneumonic_JJ plague_NN ,_, the_DT appearance_NN of_IN the_DT patient_NN was_VBD found_VBN to_TO have_VB quite_RB characteristic_JJ symptoms_NNS ._.
The_DT expression_NN was_VBD very_RB anxious_JJ and_CC frightened_VBD ,_, face_NN cyanosed_VBD ,_, extreme_JJ restlessness_NN ,_, short_JJ ,_, hurried_JJ and_CC gasping_JJ respirations_NNS ,_, cough_NN short_JJ ,_, but_CC not_RB troublesome_JJ ,_, sputum_JJ scanty_NN ,_, frothy_JJ ,_, either_RB speck-_NN led_VBD with_IN blood_NN or_CC bloody_NN ._.
The_DT physical_JJ examination_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, was_VBD not_RB found_VBN to_TO reveal_VB signs_NNS of_IN any_DT magnitude_NN to_TO account_VB for_IN the_DT severity_NN of_IN the_DT symptoms_NNS ._.
A_DT careful_JJ examination_NN detected_VBD ,_, perhaps_RB ,_, a_DT small_JJ patch_NN of_IN impaired_JJ resonance_NN ,_, which_WDT on_IN ausoullation_NN showed_VBD a_DT few_JJ rhouchi_NN and_CC a_DT few_JJ small_JJ crepitations_NNS ._.
The_DT presence_NN of_IN the_DT numerous_JJ plague_NN bacteria_NNS in_IN the_DT sputum_NN made_VBD these_DT pneumonic_JJ cases_NNS very_RB infectious_JJ :_: they_PRP were_VBD ,_, therefore_RB ,_, kept_VBD ,_, according_VBG to_TO Ool_NNP ._.
Wilkins_NNS '_POS suggestion_NN ,_, together_RB in_IN a_DT corner_NN of_IN the_DT acute_JJ ward_NN ._.
In_IN some_DT of_IN these_DT cases_NNS bacteriological_JJ examinations_NNS were_VBD made_VBN by_IN Lieuts_NNP ._.
Douglas_NNP and_CC Walton_NNP ,_, of_IN the_DT I.M.S._NNP ,_, who_WP found_VBD the_DT sputa_NN in_IN pneumonic_JJ plague_NN to_TO be_VB pure_JJ cultures_NNS of_IN B._NNP Pestia_NNP ._.
(_( Edema_NNP of_IN the_DT anterior_JJ thorasic_JJ wall_NN was_VBD not_RB met_VBN with_IN in_IN a_DT single_JJ case_NN of_IN primary_JJ pneumonic_JJ plague_NN ._.
Termination_NN Favorable_NNP Symptoms_NNP ._.
Termination.-The_JJ suppuration_NN of_IN the_DT bubo_NN was_VBD always_RB found_VBN to_TO augur_VB favorable_JJ prognosis_NN ._.
Other_JJ favorable_JJ symptoms_NNS were_VBD the_DT fall_NN of_IN temperature_NN to_TO normal_JJ ,_, without_IN any_DT tendency_NN for_IN a_DT subsequent_JJ rise_NN ;_: the_DT disappearance_NN of_IN the_DT nervous_JJ phenomena_NNS ,_, clearing_VBG up_RB of_IN the_DT fur_NN on_IN the_DT tongue_NN and_CC the_DT lessening_NN of_IN the_DT suffusion_NN of_IN the_DT conjunctiva_NN ._.
Unfavorable_JJ Symptoms_NNP ,_, The_DT prognosis_NN should_MD be_VB ,_, however_RB ,_, always_RB guarded_VBD ,_, for_IN cases_NNS that_WDT looked_VBD favor-_JJ able_JJ might_MD suddenly_RB develop_VB prostration_NN ,_, and_CC as_IN the_DT result_NN of_IN the_DT slightest_JJS exertion_NN a_DT patient_NN might_MD suddenly_RB drop_VB down_RP dead_JJ ._.
The_DT ._.
presence_NN of_IN complications_NNS was_VBD always_RB looked_VBN upon_RP as_IN an_DT unfavorable_JJ symptom_NN ;_: also_RB convulsions_NNS ,_, muscular_JJ witchings_NNS and_CC delirium_NN ._.
The_DT tendency_NN for_IN the_DT bubo_NN or_CC the_DT phlyctenule_NN to_TO spread_NN was_VBD also_RB looked_VBN upon_IN as_IN a_DT bad_JJ omen_NNS ,_, so_RB also_RB if_IN the_DT patient_NN kept_VBD a_DT high_JJ temperature_NN and_CC showed_VBD accelerated_VBN pulse_RB and_CC respiration_NN rates_NNS ._.
Treatment_NNP General_NNP remarks_NNS ._.
On_IN coming_VBG to_TO the_DT hospital_NN every_DT patient_NN was_VBD immediately_RB examined_VBN and_CC sent_VBN to_TO the_DT appropriate_JJ ward_NN ._.
After_IN admission_NN into_IN the_DT ward_NN he_PRP was_VBD undressed_JJ and_CC thoroughly_RB sponged_VBN over_IN with_IN soap_NN and_CC hot_JJ water_NN ,_, all_DT his_PRP$ clothing_NN sent_VBD to_TO the_DT sterilizer_NN to_TO be_VB disinfected_VBN ,_, and_CC anything_NN that_WDT was_VBD filthy_VBN was_VBD burnt_VBN in_IN the_DT incinerator_NN ._.
Short_JJ clinical_JJ notes_NNS were_VBD then_RB taken_VBN down_RP by_IN the_DT Hospital_NNP Assistants_NNPS ._.
AIL_IN the_DT cases_NNS of_IN pneumonic_JJ plague_NN were_VBD kept_VBN together_RB ._.
``_`` With_IN the_DT increase_NN of_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN acute_JJ coses_NNS ,_, the_DT usual_JJ number_NN of_IN Ward_NNP boys_NNS and_CC Mehtars_NNP had_VBD to_TO be_VB doubled_VBN in_IN the_DT acute_NN plague_NN ward_NN and_CC even_RB this_DT number_NN was_VBD sometimes_RB found_VBN to_TO be_VB inadequate_JJ ._.
All_PDT the_DT dying_NN and_CC the_DT delirious_JJ were_VBD screened_VBN off_RP ._.
To_TO cause_VB this_DT to_TO be_VB carried_VBN out_RP in_IN a_DT more_RBR effectual_JJ manner_NN ,_, the_DT Special_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP had_VBD the_DT acute_JJ plague_NN ward_NN divided_VBD into_IN 19_CD compartments_NNS ,_, each_DT about_IN 7_CD '_POS X_JJ 6_CD '_'' ,_, by_IN means_NNS of_IN partitions_NNS of_IN bamboo_NN matting_VBG about_IN 6_CD feet_NNS high_JJ ;_: but_CC they_PRP were_VBD found_VBN much_RB to_TO interfere_VB with_IN the_DT work_NN of_IN the_DT nurses_NNS and_CC to_TO reduce_VB the_DT ventilation_NN of_IN the_DT ward_NN ._.
When_WRB the_DT weather-frames_NNS were_VBD put_VBN up_RP in_IN the_DT rainy_NN season_NN ,_, they_PRP further_RB interfered_VBD with_IN the_DT ventilation_NN ,_, and_CC were_VBD consequently_RB removed_VBN ._.
The_DT great_JJ drawback_NN about_IN this_DT arrangement_NN was_VBD that_IN the_DT compartments_NNS were_VBD too_RB small_JJ ,_, and_CC it_PRP necessitated_VBD the_DT employment_NN of_IN a_DT larger_JJR staff_NN of_IN ward_NN attendants_NNS ._.
There_EX can_MD be_VB certainly_RB no_DT doubt_NN that_IN the_DT sight_NN of_IN so_RB many_JJ patients_NNS raving_VBG and_CC gesticulating_VBG like_IN mad_JJ men_NNS ,_, and_CC then_RB suddenly_RB dropping_VBG down_RP dead_JJ ,_, is_VBZ quite_RB sufficient_JJ to_TO give_VB a_DT most_RBS profound_JJ shock_NN to_TO a_DT freshly_RB admitted_VBN patient_NN with_IN unimpaired_JJ mental_JJ faculties-a_NN shock_NN that_WDT may_MD certainly_RB reduce_VB his_PRP$ chances_NNS of_IN recovery_NN ._.
I_PRP am_VBP of_IN opinion_NN that_IN smaller_JJR and_CC moveable_JJ screens_NNS will_MD better_RB serve_VB this_DT purpose_NN ._.

Treatment_NN of_IN Bubo_NNP ._.

When_WRB actual_JJ suppuration_NN had_VBD taken_VBN place_NN in_IN the_DT buboes_NNS ,_, they_PRP were_VBD freely_RB laid_VBN open_JJ to_TO facilitate_VB the_DT escape_NN of_IN sloughed_JJ tissue_NN ._.

All_DT ;_: he_PRP remaining_VBG cases_NNS died_VBD ._.
Rouse_NNP 's_POS Serum_NNP ._.
28_CD cases_NNS were_VBD treated_VBN by_IN Roux_NNP 's_POS serum_NN ._.
The_DT cases_NNS have_VBP been_VBN fully_RB described_VBN in_IN the_DT appendix_NN ._.
Conclusion_NN ._.
The_DT Medical_JJ Officer_NNP can_MD not_RB but_CC conclude_VBP this_DT report_NN without_IN expressing_VBG his_PRP$ deep_JJ obligation_NN to_TO Col._NNP Wilkius_NNP ,_, I._NNP M._NNP S._NNP ,_, D._NNP S._NNP 0._CD ,_, the_DT Special_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP in_IN charge_NN of_IN Plague_NNP Operations_NNP ,_, for_IN his_PRP$ guidance_NN and_CC ever_RB valuable_JJ advice_NN ._.

?_. 191_CD No_NNPS ._.
3_CD ._.
Annual_JJ Report_NNP of_IN the_DT Maratha_NNP Plague_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, Bombay_NNP ,_, from_IN 1st_CD June_NNP 1898_CD to_TO 31st_CD May_NNP 1899_CD ._.
Situation_NN ._.
The_DT Maratha_NNP Plague_NNP Hospital_NNP is_VBZ situated_VBN to_TO the_DT north_NN of_IN the_DT Victoria_NNP Gardens_NNPS in_IN E._NNP Ward_NNP ,_, Bombay_NNP ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ bounded_VBN on_IN the_DT north_NN by_IN the_DT Connaught_NNP Road_NNP ,_, and_CC on_IN the_DT east_NN and_CC south_NN by_IN an_DT extensive_JJ piece_NN of_IN vacant_JJ ground_NN belonging_VBG to_TO Mr._NNP Bomanji_NNP Petit_NNP ,_, and_CC on_IN the_DT west_NN by_IN the_DT back_JJ ground_NN of_IN the_DT Western_JJ India_NNP Mills_NNP and_CC some_DT chawls_NN and_CC houses_NNS ._.
It_PRP occupies_VBZ about_IN 30,000_CD square_JJ yards_NNS of_IN vacant_JJ ground_NN belonging_VBG to_TO Sir_NNP Dinshaw_NNP Petit_NNP and_CC a_DT strip_NN of_IN land_NN measuring_VBG about_IN 10,000_CD square_JJ yards_NNS belonging_VBG to_TO the_DT Bombay_NNP Municipality_NNP and_CC now_RB transferred_VBN to_TO the_DT City_NNP Improvement_NNP Trust_NNP ._.
The_DT hospital_NN premises_NNS are_VBP open_JJ on_IN all_DT sides_NNS except_IN a_DT portion_NN on_IN the_DT west_NN and_CC north-west_JJ ,_, where_WRB there_EX are_VBP some_DT chawls_NNS and_CC small_JJ houses_NNS ._.
It_PRP has_VBZ a_DT neat_JJ garden_NN and_CC the_DT main_JJ entrance_NN to_TO the_DT hospital_NN is_VBZ from_IN the_DT south_NN ._.
The_DT hospital_NN consists_VBZ of_IN Plague_NNP Wards_NNP ,_, Observation_NNP Camp_NNP ,_, Contact_NNP Camp_NNP ,_, and_CC a_DT Segregation_NNP Camp_NNP ._.
There_EX are_VBP seven_CD Plague_NNP Wards_NNP each_DT holding_VBG 24-36_JJ beds_NNS ,_, and_CC four_CD Observation_NN Wards_NNP accommodating_VBG 80_CD patients_NNS ,_, besides_NNS ,_, there_EX are_VBP six_CD more_JJR wards_NNS running_VBG along_IN the_DT road_NN side_NN which_WDT hold_VBP 150_CD patients_NNS ,_, so_IN there_EX is_VBZ accommodation_NN for_IN 450_CD patients_NNS in_IN this_DT hospital_NN ._.
Each_DT ward_NN is_VBZ about_IN 60_CD feet_NNS long_JJ and_CC 24_CD feet_NNS wide_JJ ._.
The_DT Contact_NNP Camp_NNP is_VBZ a_DT long_JJ range_NN of_IN small_JJ well_RB ventilated_VBN dry_JJ sheds_NNS accommodating_VBG 300_CD people_NNS ,_, while_IN the_DT Segregation_NNP Camp_NNP consists_VBZ of_IN 15_CD sheds_NNS ,_, which_WDT run_VBP along_IN the_DT road_NN side_NN and_CC are_VBP separated_VBN by_IN a_DT distance_NN of_IN 300_CD yards_NNS from_IN the_DT Plague_NNP wards_NNS ._.
Each_DT of_IN these_DT sheds_NNS is_VBZ divided_VBN into_IN 2_CD compartments_NNS and_CC each_DT compartment_NN consists_VBZ of_IN 2_CD rooms_NNS ._.
They_PRP are_VBP all_DT open_JJ on_IN all_DT sides_NNS ._.
They_PRP are_VBP intended_VBN for_IN evicts_NNS and_CC such_JJ other_JJ people_NNS who_WP require_VBP temporary_JJ accommodation_NN in_IN a_DT well_NN ventilated_VBN and_CC healthy_JJ locality_NN until_IN their_PRP$ houses_NNS are_VBP perfectly_RB disinfected_VBN and_CC made_VBN habitable_NN ._.
These_DT sheds_NNS were_VBD mostly_RB used_VBN by_IN the_DT labouring_NN classes_NNS during_IN the_DT epidemics_NNS of_IN 1898-99_JJ ._.
Besides_IN these_DT there_EX are_VBP about_IN 30_CD more_JJR sheds_NNS consisting_VBG of_IN Dispensary_NNP ,_, Office_NNP ,_, House_NNP Surgeon_NNP 's_POS quarters_NNS ,_, Nurses_NNP '_POS quarters_NNS ,_, Hospital_NNP Assistants_NNP '_POS quarters_NNS ,_, servants_NNS '_POS quarters_NNS ,_, store_NN room_NN ,_, cook_NN houses_NNS and_CC other_JJ out-houses_NNS ._.
All_PDT these_DT sheds_NNS are_VBP constructed_VBN of_IN bamboos_NN and_CC zaolies_NNS ,_, while_IN the_DT walls_NNS of_IN each_DT shed_VBN are_VBP made_VBN of_IN split_NN bamboos_RB well_RB plastered_VBN ._.
Mortuary_NNP ._.
The_DT mortuary_NN is_VBZ situated_VBN in_IN the_DT south-east_JJ corner_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN compound_NN ._.
It_PRP has_VBZ masonry_VBN walls_NNS and_CC zaoly_NN roof_NN ._.
It_PRP has_VBZ a_DT pucca_NN chunam_NN flooring_NN ,_, so_IN that_IN it_PRP could_MD be_VB washed_VBN daily_RB with_IN disinfectants_NNS ._.
Latrines_NNS ._.
There_EX are_VBP five_CD latrines_NNS and_CC are_VBP situated_VBN at_IN the_DT four_CD corners_NNS of_IN the_DT hospital_NN to_TO meet_VB the_DT convenience_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS ._.
These_DT latrines_NNS are_VBP also_RB made_VBN of_IN bamboos_NN and_CC zaolies_NNS with_IN a_DT pucca_NN chunam_NN and_CC cement_NN flooring_NN ,_, so_IN that_IN no_DT sewage_NN matter_NN could_MD be_VB absorbed_VBN in_IN the_DT soil_NN ._.
Three_CD of_IN these_DT latrines_NNS are_VBP connected_VBN with_IN the_DT main_JJ drain_NN on_IN the_DT Connaught_NNP Road_NNP ,_, while_IN the_DT other_JJ two_CD latrines_NNS are_VBP situated_VBN on_IN a_DT low_JJ level_NN and_CC could_MD not_RB therefore_RB be_VB connected_VBN with_IN the_DT main_JJ drain_NN ._.
These_DT two_CD have_VBP well_RB built_VBN cesspools_NNS from_IN which_WDT sewage_NN water_NN ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, is_VBZ daily_JJ removed_VBN by_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP night-soil_JJ cart_NN ._.
The_DT water_NN supply_NN is_VBZ from_IN Vehar_NNP main_JJ ._.
There_EX are_VBP six_CD bathing_VBG places_NNS built_VBN in_IN different_JJ places_NNS in_IN the_DT compound_NN for_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN the_DT contacts_NNS ,_, evicts_NNS and_CC discharged_VBD patients_NNS ._.
?_. 192_CD The_DT dhobi_NN ghat_WP is_VBZ situated_VBN to_TO the_DT east_NN and_CC its_PRP$ water_NN is_VBZ carried_VBN to_TO the_DT main_JJ drain_NN on_IN the_DT Connaught_NNP Road_NNP by_IN means_NNS of_IN an_DT open_JJ masonry_NN gutter_NN ._.
The_DT disinfecting_NN platform_NN is_VBZ situated_VBN to_TO the_DT west_JJ end_NN of_IN the_DT compound_NN close_RB to_TO the_DT Bhangies_NNP '_POS quarters_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT waste_NN water_NN is_VBZ carried_VBN to_TO the_DT main_JJ on_IN the_DT Sussex_NNP Road_NNP ._.
The_DT compound_NN is_VBZ extensive_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT tastefully_RB arranged_VBN flower_JJR pots_NNS along_IN the_DT sides_NNS of_IN the_DT pucca_NN built_VBN road_NN make_VBP the_DT place_NN a_DT charming_NN spot_NN ._.
The_DT passages_NNS between_IN the_DT wards_NNS and_CC the_DT contact_NN camp_NN are_VBP also_RB pucca_JJ built_VBN and_CC are_VBP properly_RB drained_VBN ._.
History_NN ._.
The_DT epidemics_NNS of_IN 1896-97_JJ had_VBD made_VBN Bombay_NNP desolate_NN and_CC the_DT rich_JJ and_CC the_DT poor_JJ left_VBD their_PRP$ homes_NNS and_CC went_VBD to_TO live_VB far_RB off_RP in_IN distant_JJ lands_NNS ,_, not_RB minding_VBG all_PDT the_DT discomforts_NNS ,_, to_TO avoid_VB the_DT dire_JJ malady_NN ,_, thereby_RB paralysing_VBG the_DT trade_NN and_CC industry_NN of_IN the_DT city_NN and_CC threatening_VBG ruin_NN on_IN the_DT City_NNP ._.
But_CC Bombay_NNP was_VBD again_RB habited_JJ and_CC everything_NN went_VBD on_IN as_IN usual_JJ up_IN to_TO October_NNP of_IN 1897_CD ,_, when_WRB unfortunately_RB for_IN the_DT people_NNS a_DT recrudescence_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN broke_VBD out_RP early_RB in_IN December_NNP 1897_CD and_CC it_PRP was_VBD thought_VBN advisable_JJ to_TO do_VB something_NN to_TO keep_VB the_DT labouring_NN classes_NNS from_IN running_VBG away_RB and_CC thus_RB avoid_JJ paralysis_NN of_IN trade_NN and_CC industry_NN again_RB ._.
Some_DT of_IN the_DT leading_VBG men_NNS of_IN the_DT Maratha_NNP community_NN at_IN the_DT instance_NN of_IN Sirdar_NNP Mir_NNP Abdool_NNP Ali_NNP ,_, Khan_NNP Bahadoor_NNP ,_, with_IN the_DT consent_NN of_IN Sir_NNP James_NNP Campbell_NNP ,_, the_DT then_RB Plague_NNP Commissioner_NNP ,_, met_VBD to_TO consider_VB the_DT serious_JJ question_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP was_VBD resolved_VBN to_TO call_VB a_DT meeting_NN of_IN the_DT Marathas_NNP of_IN all_DT denominations_NNS and_CC to_TO open_VB a_DT hospital_NN for_IN all_DT Hindoos_NNP except_IN the_DT lower_JJR castes_NNS of_IN Mahar_NNP ,_, Mangs_NNP ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, where_WRB they_PRP could_MD get_VB several_JJ facilities_NNS and_CC comforts_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ homes_NNS and_CC where_WRB their_PRP$ superstitious_JJ prejudices_NNS would_MD be_VB respected_VBN and_CC the_DT relations_NNS of_IN the_DT patients_NNS allowed_VBN to_TO live_VB in_IN the_DT same_JJ compound_NN ,_, so_IN that_IN they_PRP might_MD not_RB feel_VB themselves_PRP forcibly_RB separated_VBD from_IN their_PRP$ dear_JJ ones_NNS ._.
A_DT meeting_NN of_IN the_DT Marathas_NNP of_IN all_DT classes_NNS was_VBD held_VBN under_IN the_DT presidency_NN of_IN Sirdar_NNP Mir_NNP Abdool_NNP Ali_NNP ,_, Khan_NNP Bahadoor_NNP ,_, about_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN December_NNP 1897_CD ,_, when_WRB it_PRP was_VBD resolved_VBN to_TO build_VB a_DT hospital_NN for_IN the_DT Marathas_NNP and_CC to_TO open_VB a_DT subscription_NN list_NN for_IN carrying_VBG out_RP the_DT laudable_JJ object_NN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD also_RB resolved_VBN to_TO approach_VB the_DT mill-owners_NNS who_WP had_VBD suffered_VBN a_DT good_JJ deal_NN during_IN the_DT first_JJ visitation_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ and_CC request_VB their_PRP$ association_NN and_CC co-operation_NN ._.
Sirdar_NNP Mir_NNP Abdool_NNP Ali_NNP kindly_RB promised_VBD to_TO give_VB his_PRP$ support_NN to_TO this_DT scheme_NN and_CC went_VBD on_IN collecting_VBG funds_NNS for_IN the_DT hospital_NN from_IN his_PRP$ friends_NNS and_CC other_JJ charitable_JJ people_NNS ._.
Sir_NNP James_NNP Campbell_NNP with_IN the_DT assistance_NN of_IN Sir_NNP George_NNP Cotton_NNP and_CC Sir_NNP Dinshaw_NNP Petit_NNP collected_VBD subscriptions_NNS from_IN mill-owners_NNS at_IN the_DT rate_NN of_IN Rs_NNP ._.
100_CD per_IN each_DT 2,000_CD spindles_NNS ._.
The_DT fund_NN collected_VBN by_IN the_DT Sirdar_NNP was_VBD utilized_VBN in_IN building_NN sheds_NNS ,_, making_VBG roads_NNS and_CC other_JJ superstructures_NNS ,_, while_IN that_DT collected_VBN by_IN Sir_NNP James_NNP Campbell_NNP was_VBD spent_VBN in_IN building_NN latrines_NNS ,_, drains_NNS ,_, stand-pipes_NNS and_CC other_JJ requirements_NNS of_IN the_DT hospital_NN ._.
The_DT work_NN of_IN erecting_VBG sheds_NNS was_VBD commenced_VBN on_IN the_DT 4th_CD January_NNP 1898_CD ,_, and_CC was_VBD carried_VBN under_IN the_DT direct_JJ supervision_NN of_IN Sirdar_NNP Mir_NNP Abdool_NNP Ali_NNP ,_, Rao_NNP Bahadoor_NNP Dhondiba_NNP Hanmantrao_NNP Barde_NNP ,_, and_CC Rao_NNP Bahadoor_NNP Vitoba_NNP Krishnaji_NNP Vandeker_NNP ,_, and_CC two_CD plague_NN wards_NNS ,_, one_CD observation_NN ward_NN ,_, a_DT contact_NN camp_NN ,_, segregation_NN camp_NN ,_, office_NN ,_, dispensary_JJ and_CC out-houses_NNS ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, stood_VBD up_RP like_IN mushrooms_NNS within_IN a_DT period_NN of_IN 15_CD days_NNS ._.
Cots_NNP ,_, woollen_JJ blankets_NNS ,_, bed_VBD sheets_NNS ,_, kamblies_NNS ,_, lamps_NNS ,_, lanterns_NNS ,_, dresses_NNS for_IN the_DT patients_NNS ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, were_VBD supplied_VBN out_IN of_IN the_DT fund_NN collected_VBN by_IN the_DT Sirdar_NNP ,_, while_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Committee_NNP undertook_NN to_TO maintain_VB the_DT hospital_NN patients_NNS and_CC the_DT contacts_NNS and_CC to_TO bear_VB the_DT cost_NN of_IN the_DT establishment_NN ,_, Mr._NNP L._NNP B._NNP Dhargalker_NNP ,_, L._NNP M._NNP &_CC S._NNP ,_, was_VBD nominated_VBN by_IN the_DT Committee_NNP as_IN au_JJ honorary_JJ Medical_JJ Officer_NNP in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN ,_, and_CC Mr._NNP Gangaram_NNP Dhurmaji_NNP was_VBD appointed_VBN as_IN Vaidya_NNP of_IN the_DT hospital_NN ._.
193_CD The_DT work_NN of_IN admitting_VBG patients_NNS was_VBD commenced_VBN on_IN the_DT 21st_CD January_NNP 1898_CD ._.
Day_NNP after_IN day_NN Maratha_NNP patients_NNS poured_VBD in_IN and_CC the_DT wards_NNS were_VBD swarmed_VBN within_IN a_DT pace_NN of_IN fifteen_JJ days_NNS and_CC new_JJ wards_NNS were_VBD run_VBN up_RP to_TO meet_VB the_DT increasing_VBG demand_NN ._.
In_IN all_DT ten_JJ wards_NNS were_VBD erected_VBN to_TO accommodate_VB 250_CD patients_NNS and_CC a_DT contact_NN camp_NN to_TO accommodate_VB 300_CD contacts_NNS ._.
Besides_IN these_DT House_NNP Surgeon_NNP 's_POS quarters_NNS ,_, Hospital_NNP Assistant_NNP 's_POS quarters_NNS ,_, Nurses_NNP '_POS quarters_NNS ,_, servants_NNS '_POS quarters_NNS ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, numbering_VBG 76_CD sheds_NNS in_IN all_DT ,_, have_VBP been_VBN erected_VBN one_CD after_IN another_DT to_TO accommodate_VB the_DT patients_NNS ,_, their_PRP$ relatives_NNS and_CC friends_NNS and_CC the_DT hospital_JJ staff_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT monsoon_NN the_DT wards_NNS in_IN the_DT interior_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN compound_NN were_VBD flooded_VBN with_IN rain_NN water_NN ,_, they_PRP being_VBG situated_VBN on_IN a_DT low_JJ ground_NN and_CC there_EX being_VBG no_DT proper_JJ outlet_NN for_IN it_PRP ,_, and_CC were_VBD found_VBN unhabitable_JJ ,_, so_IN the_DT segregation_NN sheds_NNS ,_, situated_VBN along_IN the_DT Connaught_NNP Road_NNP line_NN ,_, which_WDT are_VBP built_VBN on_IN a_DT high_JJ level_NN ground_NN and_CC which_WDT were_VBD found_VBN to_TO keep_VB dry_NN during_IN the_DT rain_NN ,_, were_VBD used_VBN as_IN hospital_NN wards_NNS ._.
During_IN the_DT epidemic_NN of_IN 1899_CD ,_, there_EX had_VBD been_VBN such_PDT a_DT rush_NN of_IN patients_NNS at_IN this_DT hospital_NN ,_, that_IN the_DT ten_NN wards_NNS situated_VBD within_IN the_DT interior_NN of_IN the_DT compound_NN were_VBD full_JJ ,_, and_CC more_JJR accommodation_NN was_VBD found_VBN necessary_JJ to_TO meet_VB the_DT increasing_VBG demand_NN ,_, so_IN the_DT wards_NNS along_IN the_DT road_NN side_NN used_VBN in_IN the_DT last_JJ rainy_NN season_NN for_IN the_DT hospital_NN were_VBD made_VBN ready_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT convalescents_NNS ,_, who_WP numbered_VBD 120_CD ,_, were_VBD removed_VBN to_TO these_DT wards_NNS and_CC room_NN was_VBD made_VBN for_IN new_JJ admissions_NNS ._.
Also_RB a_DT new_JJ ward_NN was_VBD built_VBN by_IN the_DT Sirdar_NNP to_TO accommodate_VB 40_CD patients_NNS ._.
The_DT whole_JJ management_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN was_VBD transferred_VBN to_TO the_DT Plague_NNP Committee_NNP about_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN February_NNP 1898_CD ._.
During_IN all_PDT this_DT time_NN the_DT hospital_NN was_VBD in_IN charge_NN of_IN Mr._NNP L._NNP B._NNP Dhargalker_NNP and_CC under_IN the_DT direct_JJ supervision_NN of_IN Major_NNP J._NNP P._NNP Barry_NNP ,_, I._NNP M._NNP S._NNP About_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN February_NNP the_DT number_NN of_IN patients_NNS went_VBD up_RB to_TO 150_CD and_CC more_JJR medical_JJ aid_NN became_VBD necessary_JJ ._.
The_DT Plague_NNP Committee_NNP therefore_RB appointed_VBD Dr._NNP C._NNP Parsons_NNP ,_, M.D_NNP ._.
(_( London_NNP )_) ,_, as_IN the_DT Chief_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN the_DT hospital_NN on_IN 20th_CD February_NNP ._.
The_DT number_NN of_IN patients_NNS steadily_RB increased_VBD and_CC went_VBD up_RB to_TO 190_CD in_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN March_NNP 1898_CD ._.
This_DT number_NN includes_VBZ the_DT convalescent_NN and_CC the_DT observation_NN patients_NNS ._.
With_IN the_DT decline_NN of_IN the_DT Plague_NNP the_DT number_NN of_IN admissions_NNS became_VBD less_RBR and_CC less_RBR and_CC the_DT number_NN of_IN discharged_JJ patients_NNS increased_VBD ,_, so_IN that_DT in_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN June_NNP there_EX were_VBD only_RB 20_CD patients_NNS left_VBN in_IN the_DT hospital_NN ._.
The_DT charge_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN was_VBD taken_VBN up_RP by_IN the_DT Municipality_NNP in_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN July_NNP 1898_CD ,_, and_CC since_IN then_RB it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN maintained_VBN by_IN that_DT body_NN ,_, while_IN the_DT building_NN of_IN new_JJ sheds_NNS ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, is_VBZ still_RB carried_VBN on_IN by_IN the_DT Sirdar_NNP ._.
The_DT Maratha_NNP hospital_NN is_VBZ considered_VBN to_TO be_VB a_DT model_NN hospital_NN ,_, as_IN it_PRP has_VBZ its_PRP$ plague_NN wards_NNS ,_, observation_NN wards_NNS ,_, contact_NN and_CC segregation_NN camps_NNS ,_, all_DT within_IN the_DT same_JJ compound_NN ,_, so_IN that_IN the_DT patient_NN 's_POS friends_NNS and_CC relatives_NNS can_MD live_VB in_IN the_DT same_JJ compound_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT patient_NN does_VBZ not_RB feel_VB the_DT pang_NN of_IN being_VBG forcibly_RB separated_VBN from_IN his_PRP$ people_NNS as_IN was_VBD the_DT case_NN in_IN other_JJ hospitals_NNS ._.
It_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN very_RB popular_JJ amongst_IN the_DT poor_JJ classes_NNS who_WP voluntarily_RB seek_VB admission_NN into_IN this_DT institution_NN ._.
The_DT hospital_NN authorities_NNS had_VBD to_TO make_VB allowance_NN for_IN the_DT ignorance_NN and_CC prejudice_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS who_WP are_VBP averse_JJ to_TO go_VB to_TO hospitals_NNS ,_, and_CC had_VBD to_TO create_VB in_IN them_PRP a_DT taste_NN for_IN hospital_JJ life_NN ._.
Masses_NNS as_IN a_DT rule_NN are_VBP quite_RB ignorant_JJ of_IN the_DT comforts_NNS and_CC tender_NN nursing_NN the_DT poor_JJ receive_NN in_IN every_DT hospital_NN ,_, but_CC with_IN persistent_JJ coaxing_NN and_CC allowing_VBG the_DT patients_NNS and_CC their_PRP$ relations_NNS certain_JJ indulgences_NNS ,_, the_DT poor_JJ people_NNS have_VBP taken_VBN a_DT liking_NN for_IN this_DT institution_NN more_JJR than_IN others_NNS ._.
The_DT relations_NNS and_CC friends_NNS of_IN patients_NNS are_VBP freely_RB welcomed_VBN on_IN all_DT occasions_NNS ,_, are_VBP allowed_VBN to_TO stay_VB near_IN their_PRP$ patient_NN ,_, and_CC if_IN possible_JJ to_TO help_VB the_DT staff_NN in_IN nursing_VBG them_PRP ._.
Some_DT of_IN these_DT people_NNS are_VBP no_DT doubt_NN very_RB useful_JJ in_IN nursing_VBG the_DT patients_NNS and_CC do_VBP everything_NN in_IN their_PRP$ power_NN to_TO ensure_VB comfort_NN and_CC happiness_NN to_TO them_PRP ._.
To_TO some_DT cases_NNS these_DT 194_CD poor_JJ people_NNS try_VBP to_TO attend_VB to_TO patients_NNS who_WP have_VBP no_DT relations_NNS to_TO look_VB to_TO them_PRP and_CC who_WP are_VBP lying_VBG on_IN a_DT cot_NN next_JJ to_TO that_DT of_IN their_PRP$ friend_NN ._.
The_DT patients_NNS at_IN this_DT hospital_NN are_VBP given_VBN the_DT option_NN of_IN being_VBG treated_VBN according_VBG to_TO the_DT European_NNP or_CC Native_NNP system_NN ._.
Those_DT who_WP choose_VBP the_DT latter_NN are_VBP admitted_VBN in_IN the_DT wards_NNS in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT Native_NNP Vaidya_NNP ,_, while_IN others_NNS are_VBP put_VBN under_IN the_DT care_NN of_IN qualified_JJ medical_JJ men_NNS ._.
The_DT patients_NNS are_VBP nursed_VBN by_IN the_DT nurses_NNS ,_, ward_NN boys_NNS ,_, and_CC ayahs_NN ._.
Patients_NNS who_WP do_VBP not_RB like_VB to_TO be_VB treated_VBN by_IN medical_JJ men_NNS in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN are_VBP allowed_VBN to_TO be_VB treated_VBN by_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ doctor_NN or_CC vaidya_NN and_CC are_VBP supplied_VBN with_IN all_PDT the_DT necessaries_NNS and_CC comforts_NNS that_WDT are_VBP available_JJ at_IN the_DT hospital_NN ._.
Hindoos_NNP of_IN all_DT castes_NNS ,_, except_IN the_DT lower_JJR classes_NNS of_IN Mahar_NNP and_CC Mangs_NNP ,_, are_VBP admitted_VBN into_IN the_DT hospital_NN ,_, and_CC special_JJ convenience_NN is_VBZ made_VBN for_IN every_DT high_JJ caste_NN patient_NN according_VBG to_TO his_PRP$ position_NN in_IN life_NN ,_, so_RB as_IN to_TO respect_VB his_PRP$ superstition_NN and_CC prejudices_NNS ._.
He_PRP is_VBZ usually_RB given_VBN a_DT corner_NN in_IN the_DT ward_NN and_CC is_VBZ screened_VBN on_IN all_DT sides_NNS ,_, so_IN that_IN his_PRP$ tender_NN feelings_NNS may_MD not_RB be_VB disturbed_VBN by_IN the_DT lamentable_JJ sight_NN of_IN the_DT dying_VBG patients_NNS ,_, and_CC special_JJ care_NN is_VBZ taken_VBN to_TO see_VB that_IN he_PRP receives_VBZ his_PRP$ food_NN from_IN the_DT Brahmin_NNP cook_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN ._.
Infection_NN ._.
The_DT patients_NNS '_POS friends_NNS and_CC relations_NNS having_VBG free_JJ access_NN to_TO the_DT wards_NNS ,_, the_DT flooring_NN of_IN the_DT wards_NNS being_VBG of_IN mud_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT people_NNS walking_VBG bare-footed_JJ ,_, it_PRP was_VBD surmised_VBN that_IN those_DT who_WP visited_VBD or_CC remained_VBN in_IN the_DT wards_NNS with_IN the_DT patients_NNS would_MD be_VB infected_VBN ,_, but_CC from_IN experience_NN it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN found_VBN that_IN that_DT fear_NN could_MD be_VB minimized_VBN by_IN the_DT free_JJ use_NN of_IN disinfectants_NNS and_CC by_IN lime-washing_VBG the_DT wards_NNS very_RB often_RB ._.
Thousands_NNS of_IN visitors_NNS must_MD have_VB trod_VBN on_IN the_DT flooring_NN ,_, but_CC instances_NNS of_IN these_DT people_NNS being_VBG infected_VBN have_VBP been_VBN rare_JJ ._.
As_IN to_TO infection_VB amongst_IN the_DT hospital_JJ staff_NN ,_, there_EX have_VBP been_VBN some_DT cases_NNS ,_, but_CC these_DT servants_NNS lived_VBD in_IN the_DT various_JJ infected_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT town_NN outside_IN the_DT hospital_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ difficult_JJ to_TO ascertain_VB whether_IN those_DT who_WP fell_VBD victims_NNS to_TO the_DT disease_NN became_VBD infected_VBN in_IN the_DT hospital_NN or_CC outside_NN ._.
But_CC here_RB we_PRP have_VBP to_TO turn_VB to_TO a_DT sad_JJ page_NN in_IN the_DT history_NN of_IN this_DT hospital_NN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD about_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN September_NNP 1898_CD that_IN a_DT Pneumonic_NNP plague_NN patient_NN was_VBD admitted_VBN into_IN the_DT hospital_NN who_WP died_VBD a_DT day_NN after_IN 'his_POS admission_NN ._.
Soon_RB after_IN a_DT ward_JJ boy_NN who_WP attended_VBD on_IN the_DT patient_NN was_VBD attacked_VBN with_IN pneumonia_NN ._.
A_DT few_JJ days_NNS after_IN an_DT Hospital_NNP Assistant_NNP died_VBD of_IN the_DT same_JJ ._.
The_DT late_JJ House_NNP Surgeon_NNP ,_, Mr._NNP Chonker_NNP was_VBD also_RB attacked_VBN with_IN Plague_NNP pneumonia_NN and_CC died_VBD within_IN three_CD days_NNS ._.
After_IN him_PRP two_CD native_JJ hospital_NN assistants_NNS ,_, one_CD compounder_NN and_CC one_CD ward-boy_NN ,_, died_VBD of_IN Plague_NNP pneumonia_NN ._.
The_DT cause_NN of_IN this_DT infection_NN was_VBD thoroughly_RB investigated_VBN ,_, but_CC nothing_NN was_VBD found_VBN wanting_VBG in_IN the_DT sanitary_JJ condition_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN ,_, and_CC while_IN the_DT staff_NN thus_RB suffered_VBD ,_, the_DT infection_NN did_VBD not_RB spread_VB amongst_IN the_DT patients_NNS both_DT in_IN the_DT Plague_NNP and_CC Observation_NNP wards_NNS ._.
Since_IN then_RB one_CD sweeper_NN ,_, one_CD contact_NN clerk_NN ,_, and_CC two_CD ward_NN boys_NNS died_VBD of_IN Bubonic_NNP Plague_NNP ._.
Disposal_NN of_IN the_DT dead_JJ ._.
No_DT sooner_NN is_VBZ there_RB a_DT death_NN in_IN the_DT wards_NNS ,_, the_DT body_NN is_VBZ removed_VBN to_TO the_DT mortuary_NN and_CC the_DT cot_NN and_CC the_DT clothing_NN is_VBZ thoroughly_RB disinfected_VBN ._.
In_IN every_DT case_NN ,_, where_WRB the_DT body_NN is_VBZ claimed_VBN by_IN the_DT relations_NNS or_CC friends_NNS of_IN the_DT patients_NNS ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ immediately_RB handed_VBN over_RP to_TO them_PRP for_IN disposal_NN ,_, but_CC in_IN many_JJ cases_NNS the_DT relatives_NNS disappear_VBP and_CC the_DT bodies_NNS have_VBP been_VBN obliged_VBN to_TO be_VB disposed_VBN of_IN at_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP expense_NN ._.
Every_DT possible_JJ effort_NN is_VBZ made_VBN to_TO inform_VB the_DT relatives_NNS or_CC friends_NNS of_IN the_DT deceased_VBN ,_, when_WRB known_VBN ,_, and_CC a_DT reasonable_JJ time_NN is_VBZ allowed_VBN for_IN them_PRP to_TO come_VB and_CC dispose_VB of_IN the_DT body_NN ._.
In_IN some_DT cases_NNS we_PRP have_VBP to_TO wait_VB for_IN them_PRP from_IN 12_CD to_TO 15_CD hours_NNS ,_, but_CC when_WRB they_PRP fail_VBP to_TO come_VB ,_, even_RB after_IN that_DT ?_. 195_CD time_NN ,_, the_DT corpse_NN is_VBZ removed_VBN to_TO the_DT cemetery_NN at_IN the_DT expense_NN of_IN the_DT Municipality_NNP ._.
Four_CD Hindoos_NNP of_IN the_DT Maratha_NNP community_NN have_VBP been_VBN engaged_VBN by_IN the_DT hospital_NN authorities_NNS for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN removing_VBG and_CC disposing_VBG of_IN the_DT unclaimed_JJ corpses_NNS ,_, so_IN that_IN the_DT feeling_NN of_IN the_DT Hindoos_NNP may_MD not_RB in_IN any_DT way_NN be_VB hurt_VBN and_CC their_PRP$ superstition_NN and_CC prejudices_NNS duly_RB respected_VBD ._.
Statement_NN of_IN Pneumonic_NNP and_CC other_JJ Plague_NNP cases_NNS amongst_VBP the_DT Hospital_NNP Staff_NNP ,_, vide_NN Appendix_NNP ._.
(_( 1_CD )_) ._.
Raghoo_NNP Sackaram_NNP ,_, a_DT corpse-bearer_NN ,_, became_VBD sick_JJ on_IN 3rd_CD September_NNP ,_, but_CC did_VBD not_RB report_NN of_IN his_PRP$ being_VBG ill_JJ until_IN two_CD days_NNS later_RB ,_, when_WRB he_PRP was_VBD found_VBN with_IN high_JJ temperature_NN and_CC dyspnoea_NN ._.
He_PRP was_VBD admitted_VBN into_IN the_DT hospital_NN and_CC on_IN examination_NN he_PRP was_VBD found_VBN to_TO suffer_VB from_IN pneumonia_NN ;_: there_EX was_VBD restlessness_NN ,_, hoemoptysis_NN and_CC high_JJ temperature_NN ._.
He_PRP died_VBD 83_CD hours_NNS after_IN admission_NN ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) ._.

(_( 3_CD )_) ._.
Gopal_NNP Powar_NNP ,_, an_DT Hospital_NNP Assistant_NNP ,_, was_VBD on_IN night_NN duty_NN on_IN 22nd_CD September_NNP ._.
He_PRP had_VBD to_TO watch_VB a_DT bad_JJ case_NN of_IN Plague_NNP pneumonia_NN and_CC had_VBD spent_VBN the_DT whole_JJ night_NN by_IN the_DT side_NN of_IN the_DT patient_NN giving_VBG nutrient_JJ enemas_NN ,_, hypodermic_JJ injections_NNS ,_, &_CC c._NN On_IN 24th_CD September_NNP he_PRP was_VBD on_IN day_NN duty_NN ,_, and_CC after_IN working_VBG in_IN the_DT wards_NNS till_VBP 12_CD noon_NN ,_, he_PRP went_VBD home_NN to_TO his_PRP$ meals_NNS ,_, but_CC finding_VBG himself_PRP feverish_JJ ,_, sent_VBD word_NN that_IN he_PRP was_VBD unable_JJ to_TO attend_VB to_TO duty_VB that_DT afternoon_NN ._.

?_. ._.
Chonker_NNP ,_, the_DT same_JJ evening_NN ,_, and_CC was_VBD advised_VBN to_TO go_VB to_TO the_DT hospital_NN for_IN treatment_NN ._.

(_( 5_CD )_) ._.

?_. ._.

He_PRP then_RB went_VBD to_TO his_PRP$ house_NN in_IN Moogbhat_NNP ,_, where_WRB I_PRP again_RB saw_VBD him_PRP at_IN 1_CD p.m._NN and_CC found_VBD the_DT temperature_NN rising_VBG and_CC sputa_NNS tinged_VBN with_IN blood_NN ,_, but_CC there_RB was_VBD neither_CC glandular_JJ development_NN nor_CC hoemoptysis_NN ._.

CLINICAL_JJ OBSERVATIONS_NNP ._.
The_DT cases_NNS admitted_VBD into_IN this_DT Hospital_NN were_VBD generally_RB in_IN a_DT very_RB low_JJ condition_NN of_IN health_NN and_CC about_IN two-thirds_NNS of_IN them_PRP were_VBD moribund_RB ,_, many_JJ of_IN whom_WP had_VBD practically_RB passed_VBN all_DT help_NN ._.
Out_IN of_IN 4,485_CD admissions_NNS during_IN the_DT twelve_JJ months_NNS under_IN review_NN ,_, 1,649_CD were_VBD voluntary_JJ admissions_NNS ,_, while_IN 2,836_CD were_VBD sent_VBN by_IN several_JJ District_NNP Officers_NNP ._.
The_DT plague_NN authorities_NNS sent_VBD the_DT patients_NNS in_IN ambulances_NNS ,_, while_IN the_DT voluntary_JJ cases_NNS came_VBD either_RB walking_VBG all_PDT the_DT way_NN or_CC were_VBD brought_VBN in_IN hack_NN gharies_NNS OP_NNP victorias_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP was_VBD always_RB strange_JJ to_TO see_VB how_WRB people_NNS ,_, with_IN painful_JJ buboes_NNS in_IN the_DT groin_NN ,_, with_IN high_JJ fever_NN OP_NNP with_IN pneumonic_JJ symptoms_NNS ,_, walk_VBP a_DT distance_NN of_IN a_DT mile_NN or_CC two_CD to_TO come_VB to_TO the_DT hospitals_NNS ,_, and_CC when_WRB admitted_VBN ,_, die_VB within_IN a_DT few_JJ hours_NNS ._.
Surprise_NN is_VBZ often_RB expressed_VBN by_IN the_DT outside_JJ public_NN that_IN the_DT man_NN apparently_RB well_RB should_MD die_VB within_IN so_RB short_VB a_DT time_NN in_IN the_DT hospital_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ still_RB believed_VBN that_IN doctors_NNS have_VBP orders_NNS from_IN Government_NNP to_TO kill_VB patients_NNS in_IN the_DT hospital_NN in_IN order_NN to_TO stop_VB further_JJ ravages_NNS of_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ ,_, At_IN times_NNS ?_. 198_CD the_DT patients_NNS were_VBD found_VBN dead_JJ in_IN the_DT ambulances_NNS ,_, and_CC it_PRP was_VBD said_VBD that_IN the_DT bedding_NN was_VBD saturated_VBN with_IN a_DT deadly_JJ poison_NN which_WDT killed_VBD a_DT person_NN no_DT sooner_NN he_PRP slept_VBD upon_IN it_PRP ._.
But_CC the_DT people_NNS have_VBP now_RB learnt_VBP that_IN there_EX was_VBD no_DT truth_NN in_IN these_DT rumours_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT patient_JJ gets_VBZ confidence_NN after_IN a_DT stay_NN of_IN a_DT day_NN or_CC two_CD in_IN the_DT hospital_NN ._.
GENERAL_NNP SIGNS_NNP AND_NNP SYMPTOMS_NNP OF_NNP PLAGUE_NNP PATIENTS_NNP ._.
The_DT onset_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN is_VBZ very_RB sudden_JJ ,_, a_DT person_NN apparently_RB well_RB ,_, perhaps_RB on_IN work_NN feels_NNS a_DT sudden_JJ chill_NN or_CC rigor_NN ,_, complains_NNS of_IN severe_JJ headache_NN ,_, accompanied_VBN with_IN or_CC without_IN vomiting_VBG ._.
The_DT skin_JJ becomes_NNS hot_JJ ,_, but_CC the_DT patient_NN does_VBZ not_RB think_VB of_IN going_VBG to_TO bed_VB ,_, he_PRP thinks_VBZ that_IN there_EX has_VBZ been_VBN nothing_NN serious_JJ with_IN him_PRP ,_, but_CC a_DT little_JJ indisposition_NN ,_, especially_RB a_DT bilious_JJ attack_NN ._.
He_PRP tries_VBZ to_TO work_VB as_RB usual_JJ ,_, the_DT temperature_NN rises_VBZ to_TO 104-105_JJ F._NNP ,_, the_DT patient_NN feels_VBZ some_DT pain_NN in_IN the_DT groin_NN or_CC armpit_NN or_CC the_DT neck_NN and_CC finds_VBZ that_IN he_PRP is_VBZ unable_JJ to_TO work_VB or_CC do_VB anything_NN else_RB but_CC take_VB to_TO bed_NN ._.
When_WRB removed_VBN to_TO the_DT hospital_NN the_DT temperature_NN varies_NNS ._.
The_DT maximum_JJ temperature_NN noted_VBD on_IN admission_NN is_VBZ 105_CD F._NNP and_CC the_DT minimum_JJ 98_CD F._NNP which_WDT has_VBZ tendency_NN to_TO rise_VB to_TO 102_CD F._NNP or_CC 103_CD F._NNP after_IN a_DT few_JJ hours_NNS ._.
Gait.-The_NNP gait_NN of_IN a_DT plague_NN patient_NN is_VBZ ,_, as_IN a_DT rule_NN ,_, tottering_VBG when_WRB the_DT patient_NN is_VBZ able_JJ to_TO walk_VB ._.
Aspect.-The_JJ aspect_NN of_IN the_DT patient_NN is_VBZ always_RB very_RB characteristic_JJ and_CC when_WRB once_RB seen_VBN is_VBZ never_RB forgotten_VBN ._.
The_DT features_NNS appear_VBP as_IN if_IN depicted_VBN with_IN fear_NN and_CC anxiety_NN as_IN if_IN from_IN fear_NN of_IN impending_VBG death_NN ._.
In_IN some_DT cases_NNS the_DT patient_NN has_VBZ a_DT maniacal_JJ look_NN with_IN blood_NN shot_JJ eyes_NNS ._.
In_IN the_DT comatose_JJ condition_NN he_PRP has_VBZ a_DT dull_NN or_CC drowsy_JJ look_NN with_IN eyelids_NNS half_NN closed_VBD and_CC the_DT face_NN more_RBR or_CC less_RBR cynotic_JJ ._.
Speech.-The_JJ speech_NN of_IN a_DT plague_NN patient_NN is_VBZ no_DT doubt_NN characteristic_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ of_IN two_CD kinds-_NN (_( 1_CD )_) the_DT words_NNS thick_NN and_CC broken_VB up_RP into_IN syllables_NNS and_CC articulated_VBN with_IN difficulty_NN in_IN a_DT more_RBR or_CC less_RBR husky_JJ tone_NN ,_, and_CC (_( 2_CD )_) the_DT words_NNS are_VBP uttered_JJ as_IN it_PRP were_VBD in_IN a_DT irritable_JJ or_CC an_DT angry_JJ tone_NN ._.
Temperature.-Rise_NN of_IN temperature_NN attracts_NNS early_JJ attention_NN of_IN the_DT patient_NN or_CC his_PRP$ friends_NNS ._.
It_PRP varies_VBZ from_IN 100_CD to_TO 107_CD F._NNP ,_, but_CC the_DT usual_JJ range_NN of_IN temperature_NN is_VBZ between_IN 102-105_JJ F._NNP No_NNP regularity_NN could_MD be_VB seen_VBN in_IN the_DT chart_NN of_IN any_DT two_CD cases_NNS ._.
Generally_RB there_EX is_VBZ a_DT continuous_JJ rise_NN for_IN three_CD or_CC four_CD days_NNS ,_, and_CC then_RB there_EX is_VBZ a_DT sudden_JJ fall_NN indicating_VBG collapse_NN or_CC sudden_JJ death_NN ,_, or_CC the_DT temperature_NN becomes_VBZ intermittent_JJ with_IN a_DT remission_NN of_IN 1-2_JJ F._NNP every_DT day_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT remission_NN does_VBZ not_RB occur_VB always_RB in_IN morning_NN as_IN in_IN other_JJ inflammatory_JJ fevers_NNS ,_, but_CC in_IN some_DT cases_NNS the_DT remission_NN is_VBZ in_IN the_DT evening_NN ._.
The_DT fall_NN of_IN temperature_NN by_IN lysis_NN may_MD go_VB on_IN up_RB to_TO 7_CD or_CC 8_CD days_NNS in_IN cases_NNS which_WDT are_VBP likely_JJ to_TO recover_VB ,_, while_IN in_IN other_JJ cases_NNS it_PRP again_RB rises_NNS and_CC after_IN two_CD or_CC three_CD days_NNS remission_NN to_TO 105_CD or_CC 106_CD F._NNP the_DT case_NN ends_VBZ fatally_RB ._.
In_IN some_DT cases_NNS ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ observed_VBN that_IN the_DT temperature_NN comes_VBZ down_RB to_TO normal_JJ on_IN the_DT second_JJ ,_, third_JJ or_CC fourth_JJ day_NN ,_, rises_VBZ suddenly_RB the_DT next_JJ day_NN and_CC again_RB falls_NNS below_IN normal_JJ ,_, the_DT case_NN ending_VBG fatally_RB ._.
In_IN a_DT case_NN of_IN septaenuia_NN the_DT temperature_NN chart_NN is_VBZ very_RB characteristic_JJ ,_, the_DT rise_NN in_IN the_DT evening_NN and_CC the_DT fall_NN in_IN the_DT morning_NN are_VBP well_RB marked_VBN ._.
In_IN cases_NNS where_WRB suppuration_NN of_IN the_DT bubo_NN or_CC sloughing_NN is_VBZ extensive_JJ or_CC deep-seated_JJ ,_, the_DT temperature_NN rises_VBZ and_CC falls_VBZ day_NN after_IN day_NN until_IN the_DT patient_JJ improves_NNS ._.
Buboes.-The_JJ appearance_NN of_IN a_DT bubo_NN with_IN rise_NN of_IN temperature_NN is_VBZ considered_VBN to_TO be_VB a_DT sure_JJ symptom_NN of_IN plague_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT patient_NN complains_VBZ more_RBR about_IN it_PRP when_WRB it_PRP was_VBD tender_NN and_CC painful_NN ._.
It_PRP appears_VBZ along_IN with_IN the_DT rise_NN of_IN temperature_NN or_CC after_IN two_CD or_CC three_CD days_NNS and_CC in_IN some_DT cases_NNS it_PRP appears_VBZ even_RB after_IN six_CD or_CC seven_CD days_NNS ._.
The_DT appearance_NN of_IN a_DT bubo_NN is_VBZ usually_RB characterized_VBN by_IN pain_NN and_CC tenderness_NN ,_, but_CC in_IN a_DT few_JJ cases_NNS neither_DT of_IN them_PRP are_VBP present_JJ and_CC the_DT patient_NN feels_VBZ no_DT discomfort_NN even_RB if_IN the_DT bubo_NN be_VB pressed_VBN hard_RB ._.
The_DT size_NN of_IN a_DT bubo_NN varies_NNS from_IN that_DT of_IN a_DT small_JJ pebble_NN to_TO that_DT of_IN a_DT big_JJ orange_NN ,_, but_CC smaller_JJR the_DT bubo_NN ,_, more_JJR excruciating_NN is_VBZ the_DT pain_NN and_CC more_JJR danger_NN to_TO the_DT patient_NN ._.
Swelling_VBG in_IN and_CC around_IN the_DT bubo_NN is_VBZ well_RB marked_VBN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ due_JJ to_TO infiltration_VB ?_. 199_CD of_IN the_DT glands_NNS or_CC to_TO effusion_NN of_IN serus_NN or_CC sero-sanguinous_JJ fluid_NN in_IN the_DT cellular_JJ tissue_NN around_IN the_DT glands_NNS ._.
It_PRP varies_VBZ in_IN extent_NN and_CC intensity_NN in_IN various_JJ cases_NNS ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ of_IN grave_JJ import_NN in_IN cases_NNS of_IN axillary_JJ and_CC cervical_JJ buboes_NNS as_IN it_PRP involves_VBZ the_DT vital_JJ parts_NNS ._.
Once_RB a_DT bubo_NN has_VBZ appeared_VBN ,_, it_PRP ends_VBZ either_CC in_IN resolution_NN ,_, or_CC suppuration_NN and_CC sloughing_NN ._.
Sometimes_RB a_DT bubo_NN remains_VBZ indolent_JJ for_IN a_DT long_JJ time_NN before_IN it_PRP effectually_RB suppurates_VBZ ._.
In_IN four-fifths_NNS of_IN the_DT cases_NNS which_WDT are_VBP likely_JJ to_TO recover_VB ,_, the_DT bubo_NN suppurates_VBZ ,_, but_CC in_IN some_DT it_PRP is_VBZ also_RB accompanied_VBN by_IN sloughing_VBG ._.
The_DT extent_NN of_IN sloughing_VBG varies_NNS a_DT great_JJ deal_NN ._.
It_PRP may_MD be_VB confined_VBN to_TO the_DT skin_NN and_CC the_DT connective_JJ tissue_NN over_IN the_DT area_NN of_IN infiltration_NN around_IN the_DT bubo_NN ,_, or_CC penetrate_VB deep_JJ beneath_IN the_DT sheaths_NNS of_IN muscles_NNS exposing_VBG them_PRP ._.
This_DT is_VBZ generally_RB the_DT case_NN when_WRB the_DT bubo_NN is_VBZ situated_VBN in_IN the_DT femoral_JJ or_CC axillary_JJ regions_NNS ._.
In_IN the_DT scarpas_NN triangle_VBZ the_DT sloughing_NN is_VBZ so_RB deep_JJ that_IN the_DT muscles_NNS ,_, superficial_JJ arteries_NNS and_CC veins_NNS are_VBP laid_VBN perfectly_RB bare_JJ as_IN if_IN the_DT part_NN was_VBD perfectly_RB dissected_VBN ._.
Two_CD such_JJ cases_NNS were_VBD seen_VBN in_IN this_DT hospital_NN and_CC wound_NN was_VBD so_RB deep_JJ that_IN one_CD could_MD easily_RB place_VB his_PRP$ fist_NN in_IN it_PRP ._.
The_DT same_JJ is_VBZ the_DT case_NN in_IN the_DT axilla_NN ,_, but_CC there_RB the_DT infiltration_NN is_VBZ so_RB much_JJ that_IN a_DT large_JJ surface_NN of_IN the_DT pectoral_JJ muscle_NN is_VBZ exposed_VBN ,_, the_DT vital_JJ parts_NNS are_VBP involved_VBN and_CC there_EX is_VBZ speedy_JJ termination_NN of_IN the_DT case_NN ._.
In_IN one_CD case_NN after_IN the_DT slough_NN was_VBD removed_VBN tetanus_NN set_VBN in_IN and_CC the_DT man_NN was_VBD carried_VBN off_IN within_IN two_CD days_NNS ,_, Sloughing_NNP is_VBZ also_RB caused_VBN by_IN the_DT application_NN of_IN marking_VBG nut_NN or_CC by_IN actual_JJ cautery_NN to_TO which_WDT the_DT poor_JJ natives_NNS resort_VBP with_IN a_DT hope_NN of_IN curing_VBG the_DT patient_NN ._.
Out_IN of_IN 595_CD cases_NNS which_WDT recovered_VBD the_DT buboes_NNS suppurated_VBD in_IN 482_CD only_RB ._.
Blebs_NNP or_CC Blisters_NNPS containing_VBG serous_JJ fluid_NNS were_VBD sometimes_RB seen_VBN on_IN various_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT body_NN of_IN a_DT plague_JJ patient_NN ._.
It_PRP starts_VBZ as_IN a_DT small_JJ bleb_NN or_CC blister_NN ,_, the_DT skin_NN of_IN the_DT part_NN becomes_VBZ dark_JJ green_JJ and_CC icy_NN cold_NN ._.
The_DT patient_NN puts_VBZ down_RP the_DT swelling_VBG to_TO the_DT formation_NN of_IN a_DT guineaworm_NN ,_, and_CC insists_VBZ upon_IN his_PRP$ suffering_NN from_IN that_DT disease_NN and_CC not_RB from_IN plague_NN ._.
In_IN one_CD case_NN a_DT gangrenous_JJ patch_NN appeared_VBD on_IN the_DT left_JJ lobe_NN of_IN the_DT ear_NN which_WDT I_PRP think_VBP a_DT very_RB uncommon_JJ position_NN ._.
Ulcers_NNS or_CC carbuncles_NNS are_VBP seen_VBN in_IN some_DT cases_NNS ._.
They_PRP generally_RB begin_VBP as_IN a_DT small_JJ hard_JJ nodule_NN under_IN the_DT skin_NN ,_, which_WDT sloughs_VBZ in_IN the_DT centre_NN while_IN the_DT surrounding_VBG surface_NN rises_NNS above_IN the_DT centre_NN and_CC is_VBZ of_IN stony_JJ hardness_NN ;_: then_RB it_PRP undergoes_VBZ peculiar_JJ changes_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT tissue_NN below_IN it_PRP die_VBZ and_CC leave_VB a_DT cup-shaped_JJ depression_NN ._.
One_CD case_NN worth_NN noting_VBG here_RB was_VBD that_IN of_IN a_DT Maharatha_NNP youth_NN aged_VBD 22_CD years_NNS ,_, who_WP was_VBD admitted_VBN in_IN the_DT plague_NN ward_NN for_IN fever_NN and_CC right_JJ femoral_JJ bubo_NN ._.

This_DT gradually_RB healed_VBN and_CC the_DT man_NN was_VBD discharged_VBN cured_VBN ._.
Abscesses.-Abscesses_NNS are_VBP formed_VBN in_IN various_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT body_NN ,_, especially_RB in_IN septicaemic_JJ form_NN of_IN plague_NN ._.
They_PRP burrow_VBP and_CC form_VBP long_JJ sinuses_NNS ,_, very_RB troublesome_JJ to_TO heal_VB and_CC exhaust_VB the_DT patient_NN 's_POS strength_NN ._.
A_DT case_NN of_IN septicaemic_JJ abscesses_NNS worth_JJ noting_VBG is_VBZ that_IN of_IN a_DT boy_JJ 13_CD years_NNS old_JJ ,_, admitted_VBN into_IN the_DT hospital_NN ,_, with_IN right_JJ femoral_JJ bubo_NN ._.

Petechice.-Small_JJ hemorrhagic_JJ spots_NNS have_VBP been_VBN observed_VBN in_IN two_CD cases_NNS only_RB in_IN this_DT hospital_NN ._.

Eyes.-Eyes_NNP as_IN a_DT rule_NN are_VBP injected_VBN and_CC suffused_VBN in_IN every_DT well_NN developed_VBD plague_NN case_NN ._.

A_DT case_NN admitted_VBN in_IN this_DT hospital_NN and_CC still_RB under_IN treatment_NN and_CC worth_JJ noting_NN is_VBZ that_IN of_IN a_DT Pardeshi_NNP gardener_NN ._.

Tongue.-Tongue_NN is_VBZ characteristic_JJ ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ dry_JJ ,_, covered_VBN with_IN a_DT thick_JJ white_JJ fur_NN ;_: as_IN the_DT case_NN gets_VBZ worse_JJR the_DT fur_NN becomes_VBZ yellowish_JJ brown_NN or_CC even_RB blackish_JJ ._.
Vomiting.-_JJ Vomiting_NNP is_VBZ very_RB common_JJ in_IN plague_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ often_RB yellowish_JJ in_IN colour_NN and_CC has_VBZ sour_VBN abid_NN smell_NN ._.

Hiccough_NNP ,_, is_VBZ a_DT very_RB distressing_JJ complication_NN ,_, but_CC is_VBZ not_RB very_RB common_JJ ._.
It_PRP yields_VBZ to_TO remedial_JJ measures_NNS ,_, but_CC soon_RB reappears_NNS ._.
In_IN one_CD case_NN it_PRP persisted_VBD for_IN twelve_NN days_NNS and_CC then_RB disappeared_VBD ,_, but_CC it_PRP is_VBZ more_RBR observed_JJ in_IN relapsing_VBG fever_NN cases_NNS ,_, where_WRB it_PRP commences_VBZ two_CD or_CC three_CD days_NNS previous_JJ to_TO the_DT expected_VBN relapse_NN ,_, and_CC persists_NNS during_IN the_DT time_NN the_DT temperature_NN is_VBZ high_JJ ._.
Constipation_NN ,_, is_VBZ complained_VBN of_IN in_IN many_JJ cases_NNS and_CC the_DT patient_NN feels_NNS relieved_VBN after_IN a_DT dose_NN of_IN a_DT purgative_JJ mixture_NN or_CC a_DT copious_JJ enema_NN of_IN soap_NN and_CC water_NN ._.

Pulse.-The_JJ pulse_NN of_IN a_DT plague_JJ patient_NN varies_NNS in_IN its_PRP$ frequency_NN ,_, force_NN ,_, volume_NN ,_, and_CC tone_NN ._.
The_DT full_JJ and_CC bounding_VBG pulse_RB associated_VBN with_IN high_JJ fever_NN is_VBZ generally_RB absent_JJ and_CC in_IN its_PRP$ place_NN we_PRP find_VBP a_DT feeble_JJ ,_, frequent_JJ running_VBG pulse_NN ,_, with_IN a_DT tendency_NN to_TO become_VB intermittent_JJ or_CC often_RB distinctly_RB dicrotic_JJ ,_, and_CC then_RB there_EX is_VBZ failure_NN of_IN heart_NN 's_POS action_NN ._.
It_PRP may_MD be_VB gradual_JJ or_CC sudden_JJ ._.
In_IN the_DT former_JJ ,_, the_DT pulse_NN becomes_VBZ imperceptible_JJ ,_, temperature_NN falls_VBZ below_IN normal_JJ ,_, the_DT skin_NN is_VBZ cold_JJ and_CC clammy_NN and_CC the_DT patient_NN dies_VBZ ;_: but_CC when_WRB the_DT failure_NN of_IN the_DT heart_NN is_VBZ sudden_JJ ,_, the_DT patient_NN apparently_RB looking_VBG better_RBR ,_, talks_VBZ sensibly_RB ,_, tries_NNS to_TO sit_VB up_RP or_CC attempts_NNS to_TO get_VB out_IN of_IN bed_NN ,_, after_IN some_DT such_JJ sudden_JJ exertion_NN ,_, falls_VBZ down_RB and_CC dies_NNS ._.
?_. 201_CD Respiratory_NNP System_NNP ._.
-_: Increased_VBD frequency_NN of_IN respiration_NN is_VBZ one_CD of_IN the_DT common_JJ symptoms_NNS that_WDT attracts_VBZ early_JJ notice_NN in_IN a_DT plague_NN case_NN ._.
There_EX is_VBZ congestion_NN of_IN the_DT air_NN passages_NNS and_CC one_CD or_CC both_DT lungs_NNS become_VBP involved_JJ ,_, due_JJ to_TO a_DT chill_NN or_CC some_DT such_JJ external_JJ cause_NN ,_, or_CC hypostatic_JJ congestion_NN sets_NNS in_IN with_IN the_DT length_NN of_IN time_NN the_DT patient_NN has_VBZ been_VBN in_IN one_CD particular_JJ position_NN ._.
Primary_NNP plague_NN pneumonia_NN is_VBZ not_RB very_RB common_JJ ,_, but_CC is_VBZ most_JJS fatal_JJ and_CC highly_RB infectious_JJ ,_, signs_NNS and_CC symptoms_NNS are_VBP very_RB distinct_JJ ._.
There_EX is_VBZ high_JJ continuous_JJ fever_NN ,_, there_EX is_VBZ dullness_NN at_IN the_DT bases_NNS ,_, crepitations_NNS are_VBP distinctly_RB audible_JJ ,_, there_EX is_VBZ dyspna_JJ and_CC blood-stained_JJ sputum_NN ,_, in_IN many_JJ cases_NNS there_EX is_VBZ hmoptysis_NN ,_, but_CC bacteriological_JJ examination_NN is_VBZ of_IN great_JJ importance_NN ._.

Nervous_JJ System.-The_NNP nervous_JJ system_NN is_VBZ affected_VBN from_IN the_DT very_RB beginning_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.
The_DT first_JJ complaint_NN of_IN the_DT patient_NN is_VBZ headache_NN ._.
In_IN some_DT cases_NNS it_PRP is_VBZ very_RB severe_JJ ._.
In_IN others_NNS it_PRP is_VBZ accompanied_VBN with_IN vertigo_NN ._.
Delirium_NN ,_, is_VBZ a_DT very_RB common_JJ complication_NN ._.
It_PRP generally_RB sets_VBZ in_IN on_IN the_DT second_JJ or_CC third_JJ day_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.
It_PRP may_MD be_VB acute_JJ or_CC low_JJ muttering_NN delirium_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT acute_JJ form_NN the_DT patient_NN is_VBZ violent_JJ ,_, gets_VBZ out_IN of_IN his_PRP$ bed_NN and_CC tries_NNS to_TO escape_VB from_IN his_PRP$ keepers_NNS ._.
In_IN one_CD case_NN the_DT patient_NN at_IN the_DT dead_NN of_IN night_NN jumped_VBD out_IN of_IN the_DT window_NN ,_, entered_VBD the_DT other_JJ ward_NN and_CC tried_VBD to_TO jump_VB through_IN another_DT window_NN ,_, but_CC was_VBD caught_VBN hold_NN of_IN and_CC taken_VBN back_RB to_TO his_PRP$ bed_NN ._.
One_CD patient_NN quietly_RB walked_VBD through_IN the_DT ward_NN and_CC went_VBD like_IN a_DT sane_NN person_NN to_TO Colaba_NNP ,_, where_WRB he_PRP fell_VBD exhausted_VBN ,_, and_CC was_VBD carried_VBN to_TO the_DT Modikhana_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, where_WRB he_PRP died_VBD ._.
In_IN another_DT case_NN the_DT man_NN became_VBD so_RB violent_JJ that_IN he_PRP struck_VBD six_CD persons_NNS and_CC would_MD have_VB strangled_VBN the_DT ward-boy_JJ if_IN there_EX would_MD have_VB been_VBN no_DT assistance_NN at_IN hand_NN ._.
In_IN one_CD case_NN ,_, the_DT patient_NN developed_VBD a_DT homicidal_JJ tendency_NN and_CC when_WRB he_PRP had_VBD got_VBN over_IN it_PRP he_PRP absconded_VBD from_IN the_DT ward_NN ._.
In_IN some_DT cases_NNS the_DT patients_NNS stealthily_RB get_VB under_IN another_DT patient_NN 's_POS cot_NN ,_, while_IN others_NNS go_VBP on_IN rolling_VBG in_IN their_PRP$ bed_NN and_CC lie_JJ half_NN way_NN down_RP their_PRP$ cot_NN with_IN the_DT head_NN about_IN its_PRP$ middle_NN and_CC the_DT feet_NNS resting_VBG on_IN the_DT floor_NN ._.
One_CD patient_NN in_IN his_PRP$ delirium_NN uttered_VBD the_DT words_NNS Shiwshanker_NNP in_IN a_DT convulsive_JJ manner_NN continuously_RB for_IN about_RB ten_JJ minutes_NNS and_CC then_RB stopped_VBD as_IN if_IN exhausted_VBN for_IN about_RB five_CD minutes_NNS to_TO repeat_VB the_DT name_NN ._.

Mortality.-The_NNP plague_NN mortality_NN at_IN this_DT hospital_NN this_DT year_NN has_VBZ been_VBN very_RB heavy_JJ ,_, i.e._JJ ,_, 808_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
1,001_CD patients_NNS out_IN of_IN 3,104_CD plague_NN patients_NNS admitted_VBN in_IN the_DT hospital_NN died_VBD within_IN 24_CD hours_NNS after_IN admission_NN ,_, a_DT greater_JJR number_NN dying_VBG within_IN a_DT few_JJ hours_NNS ,_, and_CC some_DT patients_NNS died_VBD within_IN a_DT few_JJ minutes_NNS ,_, and_CC a_DT few_JJ were_VBD found_VBN dead_JJ in_IN the_DT ambulances_NNS ._.
545_CD patients_NNS died_VBD within_IN 48_CD hours_NNS ._.
If_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN deaths_NNS between_IN 24_CD and_CC 48_CD hours_NNS be_VB excluded_VBN from_IN the_DT total_JJ plague_NN mortality_NN ,_, the_DT remainder_NN gives_VBZ an_DT average_JJ 6206_CD per_IN cent_NN ,_, of_IN mortality_NN ._.
It_PRP appears_VBZ that_IN the_DT heaviest_JJS mortality_NN was_VBD amongst_JJ those_DT patients_NNS who_WP had_VBD no_DT apparent_JJ bubo_NN and_CC most_JJS of_IN whom_WP showed_VBD signs_NNS and_CC symptoms_NNS of_IN pneumonia_NN ._.
