Multiple_JJ 70.9_CD The_DT most_RBS important_JJ cause_NN of_IN death_NN is_VBZ failure_NN of_IN heart_NN 's_POS action_NN ._.
In_IN cases_NNS of_IN axillary_JJ ,_, cervical_JJ ,_, and_CC parotid_NN buboes_NNS ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ due_JJ to_TO extension_NN of_IN inflammation_NN to_TO the_DT deep_JJ connective_NN tissues_NNS and_CC the_DT larynx_NN ._.
Hmorrhage_NN from_IN the_DT lungs_NNS has_VBZ been_VBN the_DT immediate_JJ cause_NN of_IN death_NN in_IN many_JJ cases_NNS ._.
Hmatemesis_NN was_VBD observed_VBN in_IN 4_CD cases_NNS ,_, while_IN hmaturia_NNS in_IN 3_CD cases_NNS only_RB ._.
Melna_NNP was_VBD also_RB a_DT very_RB common_JJ cause_NN of_IN death_NN when_WRB diarrha_NN supervened_VBD ._.
Convalescence.-Convalescence_NN of_IN a_DT plague_NN patient_NN is_VBZ extremely_RB tardy_JJ and_CC the_DT patients_NNS go_VBP on_IN lingering_VBG for_IN months_NNS together_RB ._.
The_DT shortest_JJS period_NN is_VBZ 20_CD days_NNS and_CC the_DT longest_JJS was_VBD 6_CD months_NNS ._.
The_DT wounds_NNS and_CC ulcers_NNS heal_VBP very_RB slowly_RB ;_: the_DT general_JJ strength_NN of_IN the_DT patient_NN is_VBZ not_RB recovered_VBN as_IN in_IN other_JJ diseases_NNS ,_, but_CC above_IN all_DT some_DT indiscretion_NN on_IN the_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT patient_NN or_CC his_PRP$ friends_NNS in_IN taking_VBG some_DT injudicious_JJ food_NN or_CC over-feeding_NN himself_PRP brings_VBZ on_IN complications_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN diarrha_NN ,_, cough_NN ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, and_CC retards_NNS recovery_NN ._.
Sequel.-The_JJ sequel_NN of_IN plague_NN is_VBZ general_JJ constitutional_JJ weakness_NN which_WDT remains_VBZ for_IN a_DT considerable_JJ time_NN even_RB after_IN the_DT patient_NN is_VBZ discharged_VBN cured_VBN from_IN the_DT hospital_NN ._.
Aphasia_NNP and_CC incordination_NN of_IN the_DT upper_JJ and_CC lower_JJR limbs_NNS are_VBP seen_VBN in_IN a_DT few_JJ cases_NNS but_CC it_PRP is_VBZ temporary_JJ ._.
The_DT patient_NN gets_VBZ his_PRP$ speech_NN and_CC power_NN of_IN locomotion_NN gradually_RB ._.
In_IN two_CD cases_NNS it_PRP took_VBD six_CD months_NNS for_IN them_PRP to_TO be_VB able_JJ to_TO speak_VB well_RB ,_, and_CC one_CD case_NN lately_RB discharged_VBD got_VBD tired_JJ of_IN remaining_VBG in_IN the_DT hospital_NN and_CC requested_VBD to_TO be_VB discharged_VBN ._.
Her_PRP$ husband_NN having_VBG promised_VBN to_TO look_VB after_IN her_PRP$ she_PRP was_VBD at_IN last_JJ discharged_VBD partially_RB cured_VBN of_IN her_PRP$ aphasia_NN ._.
In_IN one_CD case_NN there_EX was_VBD asoites_NNS due_JJ to_TO incompetency_NN of_IN the_DT heart_NN ._.
In_IN some_DT cases_NNS there_EX is_VBZ arthritis_NN which_WDT remains_VBZ for_IN a_DT long_JJ time_NN after_IN the_DT patient_NN has_VBZ been_VBN convalescent_JJ ._.
Incubation.-It_NNP is_VBZ very_RB difficult_JJ to_TO state_NN the_DT exact_JJ period_NN of_IN incubation_NN in_IN plague_NN ._.
The_DT class_NN of_IN people_NNS admitted_VBN in_IN this_DT hospital_NN are_VBP always_RB not_RB exact_VB in_IN their_PRP$ statements_NNS as_IN to_TO facts_NNS ._.
They_PRP always_RB state_NN that_IN it_PRP was_VBD only_RB the_DT first_JJ or_CC second_JJ day_NN of_IN the_DT attack_NN ,_, but_CC from_IN what_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN observed_VBN amongst_IN the_DT contacts_NNS it_PRP could_MD be_VB easily_RB said_VBD that_IN the_DT incubation_NN period_NN varied_VBD from_IN 3_CD to_TO 7_CD days_NNS ._.
In_IN one_CD case_NN only_RB I_PRP have_VBP ?_. 203_CD observed_VBD that_IN it_PRP extended_VBD for_IN 21_CD days_NNS ._.
A_DT woman_NN was_VBD admitted_VBN in_IN the_DT observation_NN ward_NN who_WP showed_VBD a_DT continuous_JJ fever_NN chart_NN ,_, but_CC to_TO my_PRP$ great_JJ surprise_NN she_PRP complained_VBD of_IN pain_NN in_IN the_DT sublingual_JJ region_NN on_IN the_DT 21st_CD day_NN and_CC developed_VBD a_DT bubo_NN ,_, which_WDT suppurated_VBD ,_, patient_JJ grew_VBD worse_JJR and_CC ultimately_RB died_VBD ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ doubtful_JJ whether_IN in_IN this_DT case_NN the_DT incubation_NN period_NN extended_VBD over_IN 21_CD days_NNS or_CC she_PRP caught_VBD the_DT poison_NN in_IN the_DT ward_NN from_IN some_DT other_JJ patient_JJ under_IN observation_NN ._.
Treatment.-The_JJ treatment_NN of_IN plague_NN cases_NNS followed_VBD in_IN this_DT hospital_NN is_VBZ of_IN two_CD kinds_NNS ._.
The_DT European_JJ system_NN and_CC the_DT Native_NNP system_NN of_IN treatment_NN ._.
European_JJ system.-Plague_NN is_VBZ such_JJ a_DT fell_VBD disease_NN that_IN no_DT drug_NN has_VBZ yet_RB established_VBN its_PRP$ claim_NN for_IN being_VBG a_DT specific_NN or_CC something_NN near_IN it_PRP in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN well-developed_JJ plague_NN cases_NNS ._.
Drugs_NNS are_VBP no_DT doubt_NN of_IN considerable_JJ value_NN ,_, but_CC their_PRP$ value_NN is_VBZ limited_VBN ._.
They_PRP have_VBP shown_VBN by_IN their_PRP$ actions_NNS how_WRB their_PRP$ uses_NNS vary_VBP and_CC how_WRB the_DT system_NN under_IN the_DT influence_NN of_IN plague_NN poison_NN could_MD tolerate_VB enormous_JJ ,_, even_RB actual_JJ ,_, poisonous_JJ doses_NNS of_IN certain_JJ drugs_NNS ._.
The_DT line_NN of_IN treatment_NN adopted_VBN in_IN this_DT hospital_NN is_VBZ as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -_: No_DT sooner_NN is_VBZ the_DT patient_NN brought_VBD to_TO the_DT ward_NN ,_, than_IN he_PRP is_VBZ put_VBN on_IN a_DT cot_NN ,_, having_VBG for_IN his_PRP$ bedding_VBG a_DT kumbly_NN ,_, a_DT white_JJ sheet_NN and_CC a_DT blanket_NN to_TO cover_VB ._.
A_DT piece_NN of_IN mackintosh_NN is_VBZ placed_VBN over_IN the_DT bed_NN and_CC the_DT patient_NN is_VBZ made_VBN to_TO lie_VB down_RP on_IN it_PRP ._.
He_PRP is_VBZ then_RB washed_VBN with_IN a_DT carbolic_JJ acid_NN lotion_NN diluted_VBD ._.
All_PDT his_PRP$ clothings_NNS are_VBP burnt_JJ ,_, and_CC he_PRP is_VBZ given_VBN hospital_JJ clothing_NN ._.
He_PRP is_VBZ then_RB given_VBN a_DT dose_NN of_IN stimulant_JJ mixture_NN and_CC four_CD ounces_NNS of_IN milk_NN ._.
The_DT further_JJ treatment_NN of_IN the_DT case_NN is_VBZ more_RBR or_CC less_RBR symptomatic_JJ ._.
(_( 1_CD )_) To_TO control_VB the_DT febrile_NN state_NN ,_, Diaphoretics_NNPS or_CC Antipyretics_NNPS are_VBP not_RB used_VBN to_TO bring_VB down_RP the_DT temperature_NN as_IN they_PRP have_VBP a_DT deleterious_JJ influence_NN on_IN the_DT heart_NN ,_, and_CC have_VBP been_VBN found_VBN to_TO do_VB more_JJR harm_NN than_IN good_JJ ._.
Reliance_NN is_VBZ therefore_RB placed_VBN on_IN the_DT application_NN of_IN hot_JJ or_CC cold_JJ pack_NN and_CC ice_NN to_TO the_DT head_NN to_TO bring_VB down_RP the_DT temperature_NN Continuous_NNP sponging_VBG brings_NNS down_RP the_DT temperature_NN ,_, but_CC only_RB for_IN a_DT short_JJ time_NN ._.
Patients_NNS in_IN this_DT hospital_NN prefer_VBP hot_JJ pack_NN ,_, and_CC I_PRP believe_VBP it_PRP is_VBZ an_DT efficient_JJ measure_NN of_IN controlling_VBG the_DT temperature_NN ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) To_TO control_VB delirium_JJ Bromide_NNP of_IN Potassium_NNP and_CC Hyoscyamus_NNP is_VBZ usually_RB persisted_VBN in_IN the_DT acute_NN cases_NNS ,_, but_CC when_WRB the_DT patient_NN is_VBZ very_RB violent_JJ resort_NN is_VBZ to_TO be_VB had_VBN in_IN subcutaneous_JJ injection_NN of_IN Hyoscine_NNP ._.
It_PRP works_VBZ efficiently_RB but_CC is_VBZ a_DT strong_JJ depressant_NN and_CC care_NN must_MD be_VB taken_VBN to_TO stimulate_VB the_DT patient_NN after_IN the_DT injection_NN ._.
Ice_NNP bag_NN to_TO the_DT head_NN is_VBZ of_IN very_RB little_JJ use_NN as_IN the_DT patient_NN does_VBZ not_RB keep_VB quiet_JJ and_CC tears_VBZ the_DT bag_NN into_IN pieces_NNS ._.
In_IN low_JJ muttering_NN delirium_NN ,_, stimulants_NNS are_VBP of_IN great_JJ value_NN ._.
To_TO support_VB the_DT heart_NN 's_POS action_NN ,_, a_DT mixture_NN of_IN Ammonia_NNP Carbonas_NNP ,_, Strychnia_NNP ,_, Digitalis_NNP ,_, Caffeine_NNP Citras_NNP and_CC Rum_NNP is_VBZ continued_VBN every_DT four_CD hours_NNS day_NN and_CC night_NN ._.
But_CC when_WRB the_DT patient_NN is_VBZ quite_RB unconscious_JJ or_CC not_RB able_JJ to_TO swallow_VB and_CC the_DT heart_NN is_VBZ failing_VBG ,_, he_PRP is_VBZ given_VBN two_CD hourly_JJ injections_NNS of_IN Strychnia_NNP ,_, Strophanthus_NNP and_CC Rum_NNP ._.
To_TO control_VB diarrha_NN ,_, an_DT astringent_JJ mixture_NN or_CC Dermatol_NNP is_VBZ generally_RB resorted_VBN to_TO but_CC these_DT have_VBP no_DT effect_NN ;_: an_DT astringent_NN enema_NN is_VBZ tried_VBN and_CC succeeds_VBZ in_IN many_JJ cases_NNS ._.
To_TO control_VB hmorrhage_NN from_IN the_DT lungs_NNS ,_, stomach_NN or_CC intestines_NNS ,_, more_JJR reliance_NN is_VBZ placed_VBN on_IN Calcium_NNP Chloride_NNP than_IN Hazeline_NNP and_CC other_JJ astringents_NNS ._.
To_TO control_VB plague_NN poison_NN itself_PRP several_JJ drugs_NNS in_IN various_JJ combinations_NNS have_VBP been_VBN tried_VBN without_IN any_DT satisfactory_JJ results_NNS ._.
Liquor_NNP Hydrargyri_NNP Perchloride_NNP in_IN one_CD drachm_NN doses_VBZ was_VBD once_RB said_VBD to_TO have_VB wonderful_JJ effect_NN in_IN controlling_VBG the_DT plague_NN poison_NN ,_, and_CC was_VBD given_VBN a_DT long_JJ trial_NN in_IN this_DT hospital_NN ,_, but_CC it_PRP proved_VBD to_TO be_VB of_IN little_JJ value_NN ._.
Similarly_RB ,_, Liquor_NNP Hydrarg_NNP ._.
Perchl_NNP ._.
and_CC Carbolic_NNP Acid_NNP in_IN one_CD minim_NN doses_NNS ,_, then_RB a_DT combination_NN of_IN Tinct_NNP ._.
Iodi_NNP ,_, Acid_NNP Carbolic_NNP ,_, Liquor_NNP Strychnia_NNP and_CC Glycerine_NNP were_VBD tried_VBN ,_, but_CC the_DT results_NNS were_VBD in_IN no_DT way_NN encouraging_VBG ._.
A_DT mixture_NN of_IN Liquor_NNP Hydrarg_NNP ._.
Perchl_NNP ._.
and_CC Pot_NNP ._.
lodid_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO form_VB an_DT efficient_JJ germicide_NN ,_, was_VBD tried_VBN ?_. 204_CD for_IN a_DT long_JJ time_NN and_CC gave_VBD better_JJR results_NNS than_IN the_DT above_NN mentioned_VBD drugs_NNS ,_, but_CC it_PRP was_VBD always_RB combined_VBN with_IN Strychnia_NNP ,_, Digitalis_NNP ,_, and_CC Rum_NNP ,_, so_IN it_PRP is_VBZ difficult_JJ to_TO credit_NN some_DT recoveries_NNS to_TO these_DT drugs_NNS only_RB ._.
Other_JJ germicides_NNS such_JJ as_IN Tetra_NNP Chlor_NNP ._.
Iodi_NNP and_CC Amber_NNP emulsion_NN as_IN recommended_VBN by_IN some_DT persons_NNS were_VBD tried_VBN in_IN half_PDT a_DT dozen_NN cases_NNS ,_, but_CC the_DT result_NN was_VBD in_IN no_DT way_NN encouraging_VBG ._.
Pneumonic_JJ cases_NNS were_VBD treated_VBN on_IN general_JJ principles_NNS ._.
They_PRP were_VBD as_IN a_DT rule_NN isolated_VBN from_IN other_JJ plague_NN patients_NNS ;_: that_DT is_VBZ ,_, they_PRP were_VBD kept_VBN in_IN a_DT separate_JJ ward_NN built_VBN for_IN pneumonic_NN cases_NNS only_RB ._.
The_DT chief_JJ factors_NNS in_IN the_DT treatment_NN of_IN plague_NN cases_NNS are_VBP judicious_JJ nursing_NN and_CC stimulants_NNS ._.
Acute_JJ cases_NNS are_VBP kept_VBN on_IN milk_NN diet_VBN only_RB ._.
When_WRB the_DT patient_NN is_VBZ delirious_JJ or_CC is_VBZ not_RB able_JJ to_TO take_VB his_PRP$ nourishment_NN owing_VBG to_TO the_DT swelling_NN of_IN the_DT tongue_NN or_CC epiglotis_NN ,_, he_PRP is_VBZ fed_VBN through_IN the_DT nose_JJ by_IN the_DT Esophageal_NNP tube_NN ._.
This_DT process_NN ,_, though_IN difficult_JJ ,_, is_VBZ very_RB effective_JJ ._.
When_WRB there_EX is_VBZ some_DT constriction_NN in_IN the_DT pharynx_NN and_CC the_DT patient_NN could_MD not_RB be_VB fed_VBN by_IN the_DT Esophageal_NNP tube_NN or_CC when_WRB there_EX is_VBZ constant_JJ vomiting_NN and_CC the_DT patient_NN is_VBZ not_RB able_JJ to_TO retain_VB anything_NN ,_, nutrient_JJ enemas_NN are_VBP given_VBN every_DT four_CD hours_NNS ._.
These_DT are_VBP generally_RB retained_VBN and_CC the_DT patient_NN 's_POS strength_NN is_VBZ sustained_VBN until_IN he_PRP is_VBZ able_JJ to_TO take_VB his_PRP$ food_NN by_IN mouth_NN ._.
Sero-theurapy.-Professor_NNP Lustig_NNP 's_POS serum_NN was_VBD tried_VBN by_IN Dr._NNP Galliotti_NNP in_IN 13_CD cases_NNS in_IN this_DT hospital_NN ,_, out_IN of_IN which_WDT three_CD recovered_VBD ._.
All_PDT these_DT cases_NNS were_VBD early_JJ cases_NNS and_CC were_VBD selected_VBN by_IN Dr._NNP Galliotti_NNP himself_PRP ._.
?_. 205_CD Disinfection.-Disinfection_NN of_IN the_DT patient_NN and_CC his_PRP$ clothing.-A_JJ patient_NN when_WRB brought_NN to_TO the_DT wards_NNS is_VBZ stripped_VBN off_IN of_IN his_PRP$ clothing_NN ,_, and_CC is_VBZ made_VBN to_TO lie_VB on_IN a_DT cot_NN with_IN a_DT piece_NN of_IN mackintosh_JJ underneath_NN ._.
He_PRP is_VBZ then_RB washed_VBN with_IN a_DT two_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
solution_NN of_IN carbolic_JJ acid_NN in_IN luke_JJ warm_JJ water_NN ._.
All_PDT his_PRP$ clothing_NN is_VBZ burnt_JJ and_CC he_PRP is_VBZ put_VBN in_IN a_DT clean_JJ hospital_NN suit_NN ._.
The_DT bedding_NN of_IN a_DT patient_NN ,_, which_WDT consists_VBZ of_IN a_DT kumbli_NN ,_, a_DT white_JJ sheet_NN and_CC a_DT blanket_NN is_VBZ changed_VBN as_RB often_RB as_IN it_PRP is_VBZ soiled_VBN or_CC every_DT other_JJ day_NN when_WRB not_RB soiled_VBN ._.
When_WRB a_DT patient_NN dies_VBZ ,_, his_PRP$ cot_NN is_VBZ removed_VBN outside_IN in_IN the_DT compound_NN ,_, washed_VBN with_IN a_DT solution_NN of_IN Perchloride_NNP of_IN Mercury_NNP and_CC is_VBZ exposed_VBN to_TO the_DT sun_NN for_IN a_DT day_NN or_CC two_CD before_IN it_PRP is_VBZ used_VBN again_RB ._.
All_PDT the_DT soiled_VBN and_CC other_JJ clothing_NN are_VBP removed_VBN every_DT time_NN to_TO the_DT disinfection_NN platform_NN ,_, where_WRB they_PRP are_VBP steeped_VBN over-night_JJ in_IN a_DT solution_NN of_IN Perchloride_NNP of_IN Mercury_NNP made_VBD according_VBG to_TO the_DT following_JJ formulae_NN :_: -_: Perchloride_NN of_IN Mercury_NNP 9_CD ozs_NN ._.
Acid_NNP Hydrochloric_NNP Fort_NNP 131/2_CD ozs_NN ._.
Water_NNP 72_CD gallons_NNS ._.
Next_JJ morning_NN all_PDT the_DT clothes_NNS are_VBP washed_VBN clean_JJ by_IN the_DT sweepers_NNS engaged_VBD for_IN that_DT purpose_NN and_CC handed_VBN over_IN to_TO the_DT Dhobi_NNP for_IN the_DT final_JJ wash_NN ._.
When_WRB the_DT hospital_NN clothing_NN is_VBZ much_RB soiled_VBN and_CC found_VBN unfit_NN for_IN further_JJ use_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ immediately_RB destroyed_VBN by_IN fire_NN ._.
Sputum_NN of_IN the_DT patient_NN is_VBZ collected_VBN in_IN earthen_JJ chatties_NNS or_CC enamelled_JJ spitoons_NNS ,_, containing_VBG quantity_NN of_IN sanitas_JJ powder_NN or_CC a_DT solution_NN of_IN phenyle_NN ._.
These_DT chatties_NNS and_CC spitoons_NNS are_VBP removed_VBN to_TO the_DT latrines_NNS twice_RB a_DT day_NN where_WRB the_DT contents_NNS are_VBP thrown_VBN away_RB and_CC washed_JJ clean_NN with_IN phenyle_JJ solution_NN ._.
Every_DT patient_NN is_VBZ made_VBN to_TO pass_VB his_PRP$ motion_NN in_IN a_DT bed_NN pan_NN and_CC urine_NN in_IN a_DT urine_JJ bottle_NN ._.
These_DT are_VBP immediately_RB removed_VBN to_TO the_DT latrines_NNS ,_, the_DT contents_NNS thrown_VBN out_RP and_CC are_VBP washed_VBN clean_JJ with_IN a_DT Perchloride_NNP Mercury_NNP solution_NN and_CC kept_VBD exposed_VBN outside_IN the_DT ward_NN ._.
The_DT sides_NNS and_CC flooring_NN of_IN every_DT ward_NN are_VBP lime-washed_JJ every_DT week_NN ,_, while_IN the_DT flooring_NN is_VBZ swept_VBN and_CC watered_VBN with_IN a_DT solution_NN of_IN Perchloride_NNP of_IN Mercury_NNP and_CC made_VBD sweet_NN with_IN sanitas_JJ powder_NN twice_RB a_DT day_NN ._.
The_DT poultices_NNS ,_, used_VBD bandages_NNS ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, are_VBP burnt_JJ and_CC not_RB used_VBN again_RB ._.
Disinfection_NN of_IN the_DT contacts.-The_JJ names_NNS of_IN all_DT persons_NNS sent_VBD as_IN contacts_NNS are_VBP registered_VBN ;_: they_PRP are_VBP then_RB made_VBN to_TO take_VB a_DT bath_NN with_IN a_DT two_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
solution_NN of_IN Carbolic_NNP Acid_NNP ._.
All_PDT the_DT clothing_NN on_IN their_PRP$ person_NN is_VBZ sent_VBN for_IN washing_VBG and_CC new_JJ clothing_NN and_CC blankets_NNS are_VBP given_VBN to_TO them_PRP for_IN the_DT time_NN their_PRP$ clothing_NN is_VBZ disinfected_VBN and_CC washed_VBN and_CC is_VBZ made_VBN ready_JJ for_IN wear_NN ;_: all_PDT the_DT kit_NN ,_, clothing_NN ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, belonging_VBG to_TO the_DT contacts_NNS and_CC the_DT patients_NNS are_VBP sent_VBN to_TO Naralwadi_NNP sterilizer_NN for_IN disinfection_NN ._.
These_DT things_NNS are_VBP generally_RB returned_VBN after_IN 3_CD or_CC 4_CD hours_NNS when_WRB the_DT sterilizer_NN is_VBZ working_VBG ,_, and_CC the_DT kit_NN thus_RB disinfected_VBN is_VBZ again_RB given_VBN in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT contacts_NNS to_TO whom_WP it_PRP belonged_VBD ._.
Two_CD or_CC three_CD persons_NNS of_IN one_CD family_NN sent_VBD as_IN contacts_NNS are_VBP given_VBN a_DT room_NN in_IN the_DT contact_NN camp_NN ,_, where_WRB they_PRP are_VBP to_TO keep_VB their_PRP$ things_NNS and_CC sleep_NN ,_, and_CC they_PRP cook_VBP in_IN separate_JJ cook_NN house_NN situated_VBD on_IN the_DT east_NN ._.
The_DT bedding_NN ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, used_VBN by_IN the_DT contact_NN is_VBZ exposed_VBN to_TO the_DT sun_NN every_DT day_NN ._.
The_DT rooms_NNS in_IN the_DT contact_NN sheds_NNS are_VBP limewashed_VBN everytime_IN they_PRP are_VBP vacated_VBN and_CC before_IN new_JJ contacts_NNS are_VBP put_VBN in_IN ._.
On_IN the_DT 11th_CD day_NN of_IN their_PRP$ admission_NN the_DT contacts_NNS are_VBP discharged_VBN and_CC are_VBP then_RB made_VBN to_TO take_VB a_DT bath_NN with_IN a_DT two_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
solution_NN of_IN Carbolic_NNP Acid_NNP and_CC put_VBN on_IN disinfected_JJ clothing_NN ,_, or_CC in_IN cases_NNS when_WRB there_EX are_VBP no_DT spare_JJ clothes_NNS ,_, they_PRP are_VBP supplied_VBN from_IN the_DT hospital_NN ._.
There_EX are_VBP four_CD blocks_NNS of_IN latrines_NNS in_IN the_DT hospital_NN compound_NN ._.
Two_CD blocks_NNS contain_VBP seven_CD seats_NNS in_IN each_DT ,_, one_CD block_NN has_VBZ six_CD seats_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT fourth_JJ block_NN has_VBZ three_CD seats_NNS only_RB ._.
All_PDT the_DT latrines_NNS are_VBP washed_JJ every_DT day_NN with_IN Perchloride_NNP of_IN Mercury_NNP solution_NN and_CC the_DT night-soil_NN and_CC the_DT sewage_NN water_NN is_VBZ removed_VBN every_DT morning_NN in_IN a_DT Municipal_JJ night-soil_JJ cart_NN ._.
?_. 206_CD The_DT whole_JJ compound_NN and_CC the_DT out-_JJ houses_NNS are_VBP cleaned_VBN and_CC swept_JJ every_DT day_NN and_CC all_PDT the_DT rubbish_NN is_VBZ destroyed_VBN by_IN fire_NN ._.
The_DT dispensary_NN ,_, offices_NNS ,_, and_CC other_JJ sheds_NNS are_VBP limewashed_VBN as_RB often_RB as_IN found_VBN necessary_JJ ._.
The_DT mortuary_NN is_VBZ washed_VBN every_DT day_NN with_IN Perchloride_NNP of_IN Mercury_NNP solution_NN ._.
Statistics.-The_JJ total_JJ number_NN of_IN admissions_NNS in_IN the_DT hospital_NN from_IN all_DT causes_NNS from_IN the_DT 1st_CD of_IN June_NNP 1898_CD to_TO 31st_CD May_NNP 1899_CD was_VBD 4,485_CD ._.
2,836_CD patients_NNS were_VBD sent_VBN by_IN the_DT District_NNP Officers_NNP from_IN various_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT town_NN ,_, while_IN 1,649_CD patients_NNS came_VBD in_IN voluntarily_RB ._.
Out_IN of_IN the_DT total_JJ admissions_NNS there_EX were_VBD 2,789_CD cases_NNS sent_VBD as_IN plague_NN cases_NNS ,_, while_IN the_DT remaining_VBG 1,696_CD were_VBD sent_VBN for_IN observation_NN ._.
Out_IN of_IN these_DT 1696_CD ,_, 315_CD cases_NNS developed_VBD into_IN plague_NN ,_, 394_CD into_IN relapsing_VBG fever_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT remaining_VBG 987_CD were_VBD cases_NNS of_IN other_JJ diseases_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN intermittent_NN fever_NN ,_, remittent_NN fever_NN ,_, bronchitis_NN ,_, diarrha_NN ,_, dysentery_NN ,_, jaundice_NN ,_, &_CC c._VBD The_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN deaths_NNS from_IN all_DT causes_NNS during_IN the_DT year_NN under_IN review_NN was_VBD 2,814_CD ,_, out_IN of_IN which_WDT 2,509_CD were_VBD from_IN plague_NN ,_, 37_CD from_IN relapsing_VBG fever_NN ,_, and_CC 268_CD from_IN other_JJ diseases_NNS ._.
There_EX were_VBD 3,033_CD people_NNS sent_VBD as_IN contacts_NNS to_TO the_DT contact_NN camp_NN ,_, out_IN of_IN which_WDT 57_CD persons_NNS developed_VBD plague_NN ,_, i.e._NN ,_, only_RB 1.85_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
suffered_VBN from_IN plague_NN ._.
The_DT largest_JJS number_NN of_IN admissions_NNS in_IN this_DT hospital_NN was_VBD 46_CD on_IN the_DT 2nd_CD March_NNP 1899_CD ._.
The_DT largest_JJS number_NN of_IN deaths_NNS was_VBD 35_CD on_IN the_DT 20th_CD of_IN March_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT largest_JJS number_NN of_IN patients_NNS in_IN the_DT hospital_NN was_VBD 320_CD on_IN the_DT 23rd_CD of_IN March_NNP 1899_CD ._.
As_IN to_TO Professor_NNP Haffkine_NNP 's_POS prophylactic_JJ inoculations_NNS ,_, only_RB one_CD case_NN was_VBD admitted_VBN into_IN this_DT hospital_NN ,_, quite_RB in_IN an_DT unconscious_JJ state_NN on_IN the_DT 26th_CD February_NNP 1899_CD and_CC died_VBD an_DT hour_NN after_IN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD of_IN a_DT female_JJ aged_VBN 50_CD years_NNS in_IN a_DT very_RB debilitated_JJ condition_NN of_IN body_NN ._.
She_PRP was_VBD inoculated_VBN a_DT month_NN prior_RB to_TO her_PRP$ attack_NN at_IN the_DT Mazagon_NNP inoculating_VBG station_NN with_IN 2_CD c.c_NNS ._.
Haffkine_NNP 's_POS prophylactic_JJ ._.
The_DT tables_NNS herewith_VBP annexed_JJ give_VBP the_DT details_NNS of_IN total_JJ admissions_NNS ,_, number_NN of_IN cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN ,_, relapsing_VBG fever_NN ,_, and_CC other_JJ diseases_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT number_NN of_IN deaths_NNS that_WDT occurred_VBD in_IN each_DT ;_: the_DT position_NN of_IN buboes_NNS and_CC the_DT number_NN of_IN attacks_NNS and_CC deaths_NNS in_IN each_DT ;_: the_DT number_NN of_IN males_NNS ,_, females_NNS ,_, and_CC children_NNS under_IN 12_CD years_NNS and_CC the_DT number_NN of_IN deaths_NNS in_IN each_DT sex_NN and_CC their_PRP$ percentage_NN ;_: so_CC also_RB the_DT number_NN of_IN primary_JJ and_CC secondary_JJ pneumonic_NN cases_NNS occurring_VBG in_IN males_NNS ,_, females_NNS ,_, and_CC children_NNS with_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN deaths_NNS and_CC recoveries_NNS in_IN each_DT ._.
The_DT patients_NNS admitted_VBD into_IN this_DT hospital_NN were_VBD all_DT Hindus_NNP and_CC table_JJ form_NN shows_VBZ the_DT number_NN of_IN deaths_NNS ,_, recoveries_NNS ,_, and_CC percentage_NN amongst_NN Hindu_NNP males_NNS ,_, females_NNS and_CC children_NNS under_IN 12_CD years_NNS ,_, while_IN a_DT separate_JJ list_NN is_VBZ annexed_JJ showing_VBG the_DT number_NN of_IN persons_NNS of_IN different_JJ Hindu_NNP communities_NNS admitted_VBD into_IN the_DT hospital_NN ._.

1-_JJ 7_CD June_NNP 2_CD 2_CD 100_CD 8-14_JJ 2_CD 1_CD 50_CD 14-21_JJ 1_CD 1_CD 100_CD 22-28_JJ 11_CD 10_CD 99.09_CD 29-5_JJ July_NNP 5_CD 2_CD 40_CD 6-12_JJ 14_CD 11_CD 78.5_CD 13-19_JJ 12_CD 9_CD 75_CD 20-26_JJ 19_CD 11_CD 57.8_CD 27-_JJ 2_CD August_NNP 8_CD 4_CD 50_CD 3-_JJ 9_CD 18_CD 12_CD 66.66_CD 10-16_JJ 20_CD 14_CD 70_CD 17-23_JJ 24_CD 17_CD 70.8_CD 24-30_JJ 34_CD 26_CD 76.4_CD 1-_JJ 7_CD September_NNP 39_CD 30_CD 76.9_CD 8-14_JJ 26_CD 17_CD 65.3_CD 15-21_JJ 34_CD 23_CD 67.6_CD 22-28_JJ 43_CD 36_CD 83.7_CD 29-5_JJ October_NNP 57_CD 38_CD 66.66_CD 6-12_JJ 40_CD 31_CD 77.5_CD 13-19_JJ 15_CD 14_CD 93.3_CD 20-26_JJ 7_CD 6_CD 85.7_CD 27-_JJ 2_CD November_NNP 7_CD 3_CD 42.8_CD 3-_JJ 9_CD 13_CD 13_CD 100_CD 10-16_JJ 3_CD 1_CD 33.33_CD 17-23_JJ 2_CD 1_CD 50_CD 24-30_JJ 7_CD 7_CD 100_CD 1-_JJ 7_CD December_NNP 11_CD 7_CD 63.63_CD 8-14_JJ 21_CD 20_CD 95.2_CD 15-21_JJ 15_CD 13_CD 86.6_CD 22-28_JJ 33_CD 26_CD 78.7_CD 28-31_JJ 13_CD 12_CD 92.3_CD 1899_CD 1-_JJ 7_CD January_NNP 36_CD 26_CD 72.2_CD 8-14_JJ 53_CD 41_CD 77.3_CD 15-21_JJ 107_CD 69_CD 55.1_CD 22-28_JJ 147_CD 102_CD 68.9_CD 29-4_JJ February_NNP 174_CD 149_CD 85.6_CD 5-11_JJ 165_CD 143_CD 86.6_CD 12-18_JJ 172_CD 141_CD 81.9_CD 19-25_JJ 201_CD 161_CD 80_CD 26-_JJ 4_CD March_NNP 209_CD 183_CD 87.5_CD 5-11_JJ 200_CD 170_CD 85_CD 12-18_JJ 212_CD 171_CD 80.6_CD 19-25_JJ 221_CD 191_CD 86.4_CD 26-_JJ 1_CD April_NNP 186_CD 154_CD 82.7_CD 2-_JJ 8_CD 131_CD 106_CD 80.9_CD 9-15_JJ 85_CD 90_CD 105_CD 16-22_JJ 63_CD 61_CD 96.8_CD 23-29_JJ 42_CD 35_CD 83.3_CD 30-_JJ 6_CD May_NNP 52_CD 40_CD 76.9_CD 7-13_JJ 48_CD 44_CD 91.7_CD 14-20_JJ 11_CD 14_CD 127.2_CD 21-27_JJ 10_CD 13_CD 130_CD 28-31_JJ 14_CD 3_CD 21.4_CD The_DT largest_JJS number_NN of_IN deaths_NNS on_IN a_DT single_JJ day_NN was_VBD 35_CD on_IN 20th_CD March_NNP 1899_CD ._.
L._NNP B._NNP DHARGALKER_NNP ,_, Chief_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, Mahratta_NNP Hospital_NNP ._.
?_. 211_CD Notes_NNS by_IN the_DT Special_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP ._.
The_DT very_RB interesting_JJ Report_NNP which_WDT Dr._NNP Dhargalker_NNP has_VBZ sent_VBN in_IN speaks_NN for_IN itself_PRP and_CC shows_VBZ the_DT very_RB large_JJ and_CC excellent_JJ work_NN which_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN accomplished_VBN by_IN this_DT Hospital_NNP ,_, by_IN far_RB the_DT largest_JJS and_CC the_DT most_RBS liked_JJ of_IN all_PDT the_DT Plague_NNP Hospitals_NNP in_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
The_DT arrangements_NNS for_IN the_DT housing_NN of_IN the_DT sick_NN ,_, their_PRP$ care_NN and_CC treatment_NN were_VBD always_RB the_DT desired_JJ object_NN of_IN the_DT Committee_NNP and_CC the_DT Medical_JJ Staff_NNP ._.
The_DT Hospital_NNP was_VBD in_IN all_DT respects_NNS what_WP a_DT Plague_NNP Hospital_NNP ought_MD to_TO be_VB ,_, viz._FW ,_, isolated_VBN and_CC containing_VBG all_DT requisites_NNS for_IN the_DT care_NN of_IN the_DT sick_NN and_CC the_DT isolation_NN of_IN contacts_NNS ._.
I_PRP take_VBP this_DT opportunity_NN of_IN stating_VBG the_DT gratitude_NN I_PRP feel_VBP to_TO Sirdar_NNP Khan_NNP Bahadur_NNP Mir_NNP Abdool_NNP Ali_NNP ,_, Rao_NNP Bahadur_NNP Vandekar_NNP and_CC the_DT rest_NN of_IN the_DT Committee_NNP for_IN the_DT great_JJ trouble_NN they_PRP took_VBD in_IN building_NN wards_NNS and_CC in_IN looking_VBG after_IN the_DT sick_JJ and_CC the_DT staff_NN ._.
The_DT Hospital_NNP was_VBD in_IN great_JJ part_NN built_VBN out_IN of_IN subscriptions_NNS collected_VBN by_IN these_DT gentlemen_NNS and_CC they_PRP are_VBP models_NNS of_IN infectious_JJ diseases_NNS wards_NNS ._.
Dr._NNP Dhargalker_NNP ,_, Resident_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, Suntooji_NNP Ramji_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT rest_NN of_IN the_DT staff_NN deserve_VBZ great_JJ credit_NN for_IN the_DT management_NN of_IN the_DT sick_JJ under_IN most_JJS exceptionally_RB trying_VBG circumstances_NNS ,_, viz._NN ,_, when_WRB every_DT effort_NN to_TO alleviate_VB and_CC cure_VB this_DT most_RBS dreadfully_RB fatal_JJ of_IN all_DT diseases_NNS baffled_VBD all_DT science_NN and_CC failed_VBD to_TO save_VB only_RB an_DT infini-tesimal_JJ proportion_NN of_IN cases_NNS ._.
The_DT Report_NNP most_RBS ably_RB worked_VBN out_RP by_IN Lt._NNP Twigg_NNP ,_, I.M.S._NNP ,_, on_IN the_DT Steam_NNP Bath_NNP Treatment_NNP I_PRP have_VBP published_VBN in_IN full_JJ as_IN it_PRP is_VBZ most_RBS interesting_JJ ,_, but_CC the_DT results_NNS are_VBP not_RB encouraging_JJ ,_, notwithstanding_VBG the_DT skilful_JJ way_NN that_IN the_DT method_NN was_VBD carried_VBN out_RP by_IN Lt._NNP Twigg_NNP ,_, to_TO whom_WP I_PRP owe_VBP many_JJ thanks_NNS for_IN his_PRP$ untiring_JJ work_NN ._.
Sunni_NNP Mohammedan_NNP Jullai_NNP Plague_NNP Hospital_NNP ._.
HISTORY_NN OF_IN THE_NNP FOUNDATION_NNP OF_NNP JULLAI_NNP HOSPITAL_NNP ._.
This_DT Hospital_NNP was_VBD founded_VBN on_IN the_DT 13th_CD April_NNP 1897_CD by_IN Sirdar_NNP Oomer_NNP Jamal_NNP under_IN the_DT patronage_NN of_IN General_NNP W._NNP F._NNP Gatacre_NNP ,_, late_JJ President_NNP of_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Plague_NNP Committee_NNP ._.
There_EX was_VBD not_RB a_DT single_JJ Medical_NNP Officer_NNP attached_VBD to_TO this_DT Jullai_NNP Plague_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, except_IN the_DT Hakim_NNP in_IN charge_NN ._.
A_DT Sectional_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN the_DT Byculla_NNP Section_NN has_VBZ kept_VBN general_JJ supervision_NN on_IN point_NN of_IN cleanliness_NN of_IN the_DT wards_NNS and_CC clothings_NNS of_IN the_DT patients_NNS and_CC regular_JJ diets_NNS given_VBN ._.
One_CD Nurse_NNP was_VBD appointed_VBN by_IN Lieut.-Colonel_NNP James_NNP Wilkins_NNP ,_, I.M.S._NNP ,_, in_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN April_NNP 1899_CD ,_, by_IN name_NN Mrs._NNP Barr_NNP ._.
There_EX were_VBD 7_CD ward_NN boys_NNS ,_, 3_CD ayahs_NN ,_, 1_CD cook_NN ,_, 1_CD assistant_NN cook_NN ,_, 1_CD dhobi_NN ,_, 3_CD sweepers_NNS (_( 2_CD male_NN and_CC 1_CD female_NN )_) ._.
DESCRIPTION_NN OF_IN THE_NNP JULLAI_NNP HOSPITAL_NNP BUILDING_NNP ._.
This_DT Hospital_NNP ,_, situated_VBD on_IN the_DT Ripon_NNP Road_NNP in_IN a_DT temporary_JJ shed_NN ,_, is_VBZ divided_VBN into_IN 5_CD wards-2_JJ wards_NNS for_IN male_JJ members_NNS (_( 1_CD for_IN plague_NN and_CC another_DT for_IN fever_NN )_) ,_, 1_CD for_IN female_NN and_CC 2_CD others_NNS for_IN the_DT other_JJ diseases_NNS ._.
The_DT new_JJ ward_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ known_VBN as_IN DuBoulay_NNP Ward_NNP ,_, was_VBD erected_VBN through_IN the_DT exertion_NN of_IN Lieut_NNP ._.
Firth_NNP ,_, late_JJ District_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, E_NNP Ward_NNP East_NNP ._.

4_CD ._.

5_CD ._.

6_CD ._.
The_DT method_NN which_WDT is_VBZ adopted_VBN regarding_VBG the_DT disposal_NN of_IN the_DT dead_JJ ,_, and_CC which_WDT is_VBZ quite_RB consistent_JJ with_IN the_DT principles_NNS of_IN customs_NNS and_CC usages_NNS of_IN the_DT religion_NN to_TO which_WDT the_DT deceased_VBN belonged_NN ,_, is_VBZ the_DT giving_VBG of_IN bath_NN by_IN a_DT professional_JJ man_NN as_IN soon_RB after_IN death_NN as_IN possible_JJ (_( in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN paupers_NNS who_WP have_VBP no_DT claimants_NNS )_) ,_, the_DT wrapping_NN of_IN the_DT corpses_NNS in_IN new_JJ cloth_NN cut_NN to_TO the_DT necessary_JJ size_NN and_CC shape_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT removing_NN of_IN same_JJ to_TO the_DT burial_JJ ground_NN ;_: expenses_NNS that_WDT are_VBP incurred_VBN for_IN all_PDT these_DT being_VBG defrayed_VBN from_IN the_DT fund_NN in_IN the_DT hands_NNS of_IN the_DT District_NNP Officer_NNP who_WP is_VBZ applied_VBN to_TO immediately_RB at_IN such_JJ an_DT occasion_NN ._.

7_CD ._.
A_DT Groanose_NNP ayah_NN ,_, residing_VBG within_IN the_DT hospital_NN premises_NNS ,_, was_VBD severely_RB attacked_VBN by_IN plague_NN during_IN her_PRP$ duties_NNS of_IN attending_VBG upon_IN the_DT patients_NNS some_DT time_NN within_IN the_DT period_NN when_WRB the_DT hospital_NN was_VBD originally_RB established_VBN ._.

Report_NN with_IN a_DT few_JJ Particulars_NNS ,_, including_VBG History_NNP ,_, and_CC Management_NNP ,_, from_IN 1st_CD June_NNP 1898_CD to_TO 31st_CD May_NNP 1899_CD ._.
History_NN ._.
This_DT Hospital_NNP was_VBD founded_VBN ,_, on_IN 18th_CD December_NNP 1896_CD ,_, by_IN the_DT late_JJ Dr._NNP K._NNP N._NNP Bahadurji_NNP ,_, in_IN conjunction_NN with_IN the_DT present_JJ Chief_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, Dr._NNP K._NNP M._NNP Hiramaneck_NNP ,_, and_CC others_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT Trustees_NNP of_IN the_DT Parsi_NNP Punchayet_NNP took_VBD upon_RP themselves_PRP the_DT responsibility_NN of_IN starting_VBG funds_NNS and_CC of_IN collecting_VBG subscriptions_NNS from_IN the_DT community_NN for_IN the_DT maintenance_NN of_IN the_DT Hospital_NNP ._.

Description_NN of_IN the_DT Hospital_NNP Buildings_NNP ._.
This_DT Hospital_NNP is_VBZ situated_VBN ,_, next_JJ to_TO the_DT Victoria_NNP Technical_NNP Institute_NNP ,_, in_IN the_DT capacious_JJ bungalow_NN of_IN Messrs._NNP Hormusji_NNP and_CC Merwanji_NNP Muncherji_NNP Cama_NNP ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ a_DT well_RB ventilat-_JJ ed_NN and_CC commodious_JJ bungalow_NN ,_, with_IN a_DT spacious_JJ hall_NN ,_, six_CD wards_NNS on_IN the_DT ground-floor_JJ 223_CD used_VBN for_IN acute_JJ cases_NNS ,_, two_CD wards_NNS on_IN the_DT first_JJ storey_NN for_IN convalescent_NN patients_NNS ,_, and_CC ,_, besides_IN these_DT ,_, two_CD sheds_NNS capable_JJ of_IN accommodating_VBG more_JJR than_IN thirty_NN patients_NNS ._.
There_EX is_VBZ a_DT well-_JJ fitted_JJ dispensary_NN ,_, a_DT store-room_NN ,_, a_DT House-Surgeon_NNP 's_POS Office_NNP ,_, and_CC a_DT Manager_NNP 's_POS Office_NNP fitted_VBD with_IN a_DT telephone_NN ;_: also_RB a_DT large_JJ godown_NN and_CC a_DT cooks_NN '_POS store-room_NN ._.
There_EX is_VBZ a_DT large_JJ well-ventilated_JJ kitchen_NN and_CC a_DT similar_JJ stable_NN ,_, where_WRB an_DT ambulance_NN fitted_VBN with_IN a_DT stretcher_NN for_IN bringing_VBG patients_NNS to_TO the_DT Hospital_NNP and_CC an_DT ambulance_NN for_IN removing_VBG the_DT dead_JJ to_TO the_DT Towers_NNP of_IN Silence_NNP are_VBP kept_VBN ._.
During_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ ,_, the_DT corpse-bearers_NNS are_VBP also_RB kept_VBN on_IN the_DT premises_NNS ._.
Above_IN the_DT stable_JJ there_EX are_VBP also_RB big_JJ quarters_NNS for_IN the_DT servants_NNS ._.
The_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN patients_NNS that_WDT can_MD be_VB accommodated_VBN at_IN a_DT time_NN is_VBZ about_IN 100_CD ._.
There_EX are_VBP also_RB quarters_NNS for_IN the_DT House-Surgeons_NNP and_CC the_DT Nurses_NNP in_IN the_DT same_JJ premises_NNS ._.
Conservancy_NN ._.
There_EX are_VBP ten_JJ latrines_NNS attached_VBN to_TO the_DT building_NN ._.
These_DT latrines_NNS are_VBP kept_VBN apart_RB from_IN the_DT wards_NNS ,_, and_CC Bhanghis_NNP are_VBP kept_VBN con-_JJ stantly_RB on_IN duty_NN day_NN and_CC night_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT night-soil_NN is_VBZ removed_VBN by_IN them_PRP to_TO an_DT iron_NN cart_NN ,_, kept_VBD about_IN 150_CD yards_NNS from_IN the_DT Hospital_NNP building_NN ,_, with_IN due_JJ precaution_NN for_IN disinfection_NN and_CC destroying_VBG the_DT virulence_NN of_IN the_DT excreta_NN of_IN patients_NNS especially_RB ._.
Under_IN no_DT circum-_JJ stances_NNS are_VBP patients_NNS permitted_VBD to_TO use_VB the_DT latrines_NNS used_VBN by_IN the_DT staff_NN ._.
They_PRP have_VBP to_TO pass_VB their_PRP$ motions_NNS in_IN bed-pans_NNS on_IN or_CC near_IN their_PRP$ beds_NNS ,_, and_CC proper_JJ disinfection_NN is_VBZ carried_VBN out_RP previous_JJ to_TO disposal_VB ._.
The_DT sewage_NN goes_VBZ to_TO the_DT Municipal_NNP drains_VBZ attached_VBN to_TO the_DT bungalow_NN ._.
Disinfection_NN of_IN Clothes_NNP ._.
The_DT clothes_NNS are_VBP all_DT disinfected_VBN in_IN a_DT strong_JJ solution_NN of_IN pheuyle_NN or_CC iodine_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB washed_VBD with_IN boiling_VBG solution_NN of_IN washing_VBG soda_NN ,_, and_CC thoroughly_RB exposed_VBN to_TO the_DT sun_NN before_IN being_VBG delivered_VBN to_TO the_DT Dhobhi_NNP ._.
The_DT things_NNS that_WDT can_MD not_RB be_VB washed_VBN ,_, e.g._VB ,_, much_RB soiled_VBD garments_NNS ,_, bandages_NNS ,_, surgical_JJ dressings_NNS ,_, napkins_NNS ,_, draw-sheets_NNS ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, are_VBP burnt_VBN at_IN once_RB ._.
The_DT water-supply_NN of_IN the_DT Hospital_NNP is_VBZ derived_VBN from_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP pipes_NNS ._.
Disinfection_NN of_IN Wards_NNP ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, &_CC c._NN When_WRB a_DT case_NN is_VBZ found_VBN in_IN a_DT very_RB critical_JJ condition_NN ,_, the_DT patient_NN is_VBZ at_IN once_RB removed_VBN to_TO one_CD of_IN the_DT special_JJ wards_NNS (_( called_VBD the_DT ``_`` Danger_NNP Ward_NNP ''_'' )_) where_WRB deaths_JJ usually_RB take_VBP place_NN ._.
Under_IN all_DT circumstances_NNS ,_, all_PDT the_DT clothing_NN belonging_NN to_TO these_DT cases_NNS is_VBZ burnt_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT floor_NN and_CC walls_NNS are_VBP covered_VBN with_IN unslaked_JJ lime_JJ powder_NN ,_, and_CC lime-washed_JJ ,_, respectively_RB ;_: and_CC a_DT ``_`` siggree_JJ ''_'' is_VBZ kept_VBN burning_VBG on_IN the_DT spot_NN for_IN several_JJ hours_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT windows_NNS of_IN the_DT room_NN are_VBP kept_JJ open_JJ day_NN and_CC night_NN ._.
The_DT Hospital_NNP is_VBZ cleansed_VBN thoroughly_RB twice_RB a_DT day_NN ,_, and_CC every_DT week_NN it_PRP is_VBZ washed_VBN ,_, and_CC lime-washed_JJ every_DT month_NN ,_, and_CC kept_VBD open_JJ to_TO the_DT sun_NN and_CC air_NN before_IN the_DT wards_NNS are_VBP utilized_JJ again_RB for_IN patients_NNS ._.
For_IN disinfection_NN of_IN the_DT premises_NNS ,_, thorough_IN cleansing_VBG with_IN washing-soda_JJ solution_NN and_CC plenty_NN of_IN lime-sprinkling_NN on_IN the_DT floor_NN is_VBZ relied_VBN upon_IN always_RB ._.
For_IN clothing_NN ,_, the_DT disinfectant_NN used_VBN is_VBZ a_DT strong_JJ solution_NN of_IN phenyle_NN and_CC iodine_JJ solution_NN ._.
For_IN cleaning_VBG hands_NNS and_CC for_IN surgical_JJ dressings_NNS iodine_JJ solution_NN is_VBZ also_RB freely_RB used_VBN ,_, and_CC in_IN some_DT cases_NNS carbolic_JJ acid_JJ solution_NN ,_, 1_CD in_IN 40_CD in_IN strength_NN ,_, There_EX is_VBZ no_DT steam_NN disinfector_NN attached_VBD to_TO this_DT Hospital_NNP ._.
Disposal_NN of_IN the_DT Dead_NNP ._.
The_DT dead_JJ patient_NN is_VBZ immediately_RB removed_VBN to_TO a_DT special_JJ room_NN kept_VBD for_IN the_DT purpose_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT special_JJ ambulance_NN is_VBZ quickly_RB ordered_VBN to_TO be_VB in_IN readiness_NN ,_, and_CC within_IN ten_JJ minutes_NNS after_IN death_NN the_DT body_NN is_VBZ removed_VBN in_IN the_DT carriage_NN to_TO the_DT Towers_NNP of_IN Silence_NNP ._.
?_. 224_CD The_DT mortuary_JJ room_NN is_VBZ kept_JJ quite_RB clean_JJ and_CC dry_JJ ._.
After_IN the_DT dead_JJ body_NN has_VBZ been_VBN for_IN a_DT few_JJ minutes_NNS in_IN the_DT mortuary_NN a_DT ``_`` siggree_JJ ''_'' is_VBZ kept_VBN burning_VBG there_RB constantly_RB ._.
In_IN very_RB rare_JJ instances_NNS ,_, in_IN cases_NNS of_IN detention_NN ,_, the_DT dead_JJ body_NN is_VBZ kept_VBN for_IN an_DT hour_NN or_CC two_CD in_IN the_DT mortuary_NN ._.
In_IN such_JJ cases_NNS the_DT usual_JJ methods_NNS of_IN sweeping_JJ ,_, lime-_JJ washing_NN ,_, and_CC lime-sprinkling_NN are_VBP practised_VBN ,_, together_RB with_IN a_DT thorough_JJ disinfection_NN of_IN the_DT place_NN ._.
This_DT mortuary_NN is_VBZ a_DT large_JJ room_NN in_IN the_DT premises_NNS ,_, kept_VBD clean_JJ ,_, with_IN absolutely_RB nothing_NN in_IN it_PRP ,_, except_IN the_DT ``_`` siggree_JJ ._. ''_''
Plague_NNP among_IN the_DT Hospital_NNP Staff_NNP ._.
Ten_CD members_NNS of_IN the_DT Hospital_NNP Staff_NNP were_VBD attacked_VBN with_IN plague_NN in_IN February_NNP 1899_CD ,_, of_IN whom_WP six_CD died_VBD ;_: they_PRP were_VBD all_DT from_IN the_DT servant_JJ class_NN ,_, residing_VBG in_IN their_PRP$ special_JJ quarters_NNS which_WDT are_VBP to_TO the_DT right_NN ,_, and_CC about_IN thirty_NN yards_NNS apart_RB from_IN the_DT main_JJ building_NN of_IN the_DT Hospital_NNP ._.
This_DT residence_NN has_VBZ on_IN its_PRP$ rear_NN a_DT large_JJ Municipal_NNP drain_NN ,_, a_DT big_JJ pond_NN on_IN the_DT right_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT well_NN to_TO the_DT left_NN ;_: below_IN these_DT quarters_NNS is_VBZ the_DT stable_JJ of_IN the_DT Hospital_NNP ._.
Previous_JJ to_TO these_DT attacks_NNS ,_, dead_JJ rats_NNS were_VBD found_VBN in_IN these_DT quarters_NNS ;_: and_CC ,_, consequently_RB ,_, the_DT place_NN had_VBD to_TO be_VB afterwards_NNS thoroughly_RB disinfected_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT residents_NNS segregated_VBD into_IN huts_NNS specially_RB erected_VBN in_IN the_DT open_JJ part_NN of_IN the_DT compound_NN to_TO the_DT north_NN of_IN the_DT main_JJ building_NN ._.

Notes_NNS on_IN the_DT Symptoms_NNP ,_, Character_NNP and_CC Treatment_NNP of_IN the_DT Disease_NNP ._.
From_IN personal_JJ experience_NN at_IN the_DT hospital_NN ,_, it_PRP ;_: has_VBZ been_VBN found_VBN that_IN the_DT period_NN of_IN Incubation_NNP varies_NNS from_IN a_DT day_NN to_TO a_DT week_NN ._.
(_( Certain_NN patients_NNS having_VBG been_VBN segregated_VBN ,_, went_VBD for_IN a_DT single_JJ night_NN to_TO sleep_VB in_IN infected_JJ houses_NNS and_CC caught_VBD the_DT disease_NN ._. )_)
Symptoms_NNS ._.
Among_IN the_DT external_JJ and_CC most_JJS prominent_JJ symptoms_NNS of_IN plague_NN are_VBP a_DT visible_JJ expression_NN of_IN complete_JJ prostration_NN ,_, an_DT anxious_JJ and_CC pinched_JJ expression_NN of_IN the_DT face_NN with_IN a_DT peculiar_JJ 'risus_POS sardonicus_NN '_'' over_IN it_PRP ,_, and_CC the_DT appearance_NN of_IN buboes_NNS on_IN the_DT surface_NN of_IN the_DT body_NN ._.
This_DT enlargement_NN of_IN the_DT glands_NNS may_MD be_VB either_CC a_DT mere_JJ tenderness_NN without_IN swelling_VBG ,_, or_CC a_DT huge_JJ tumour_NN ._.
Injected_VBN blood-shot_JJ eyes_NNS form_VBP another_DT external_JJ symptom_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ,_, but_CC this_DT symptom_NN is_VBZ generally_RB accompanied_VBN with_IN several_JJ others_NNS affect-_JJ ing_NN as_RB well_RB the_DT circulatory_NN system_NN of_IN the_DT human_JJ body_NN ._.
The_DT pulse_NN is_VBZ in_IN all_DT cases_NNS frequent_JJ and_CC soft_JJ ,_, but_CC in_IN acute_JJ cases_NNS even_RB irregular_JJ and_CC intermittent_NN from_IN the_DT very_RB onset_JJ ;_: and_CC the_DT circulatory_NN system_NN in_IN acute_JJ cases_NNS is_VBZ even_RB so_RB far_RB damaged_VBN as_IN to_TO bring-_VB on_IN a_DT marked_JJ lividity_NN of_IN the_DT countenance_NN ,_, or_CC a_DT general_JJ cyanosis_NN of_IN the_DT whole_JJ body_NN or_CC ,_, in_IN cases_NNS of_IN abnormal_JJ distension_NN of_IN the_DT portal_JJ venous_JJ system_NN ,_, grumous_JJ vomiting_NN ;_: there_EX are_VBP likewise_RB hmorrhagic_JJ petechial_NN or_CC blackish_JJ patches_NNS on_IN the_DT body_NN as_RB well_RB as_IN the_DT extremities_NNS due_JJ to_TO failing_VBG circulation_NN ._.
The_DT mischief_NN wrought_NN by_IN plague_NN on_IN the_DT res-_JJ piratory_NN system_NN is_VBZ ,_, however_RB ,_, not_RB less_RBR remarkable_JJ than_IN on_IN the_DT circulatory_NN one_CD ;_: the_DT breathing_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ from_IN the_DT very_RB onset_NN of_IN the_DT attack_NN ,_, frequent_NN and_CC shallow_NN ,_, soon_RB turns_VBZ dyspnal_JJ with_IN the_DT development_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ,_, and_CC this_DT difficulty_NN of_IN breathing_NN is_VBZ more_RBR commonly_RB inspiratory_NN than_IN expiratory_NN ._.
Dyspnal_NNP breathing_NN is_VBZ always_RB an_DT essential_JJ symptom_NN of_IN extreme_JJ cases_NNS except_IN when_WRB it_PRP originates_VBZ in_IN the_DT mere_JJ distension_NN of_IN the_DT abdomen_NNS so_RB common_JJ in_IN plague_NN ._.
But_CC by_IN far_RB the_DT most_RBS alarming_JJ symptom_NN of_IN the_DT damage_NN done_VBN by_IN plague_NN to_TO the_DT system_NN is_VBZ the_DT vomiting_NN of_IN blood_NN ._.
By_IN the_DT time_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, the_DT plague_NN presents_NNS such_JJ alarming_VBG symptoms_NNS ,_, the_DT nervous_JJ system_NN is_VBZ entirely_RB shattered_VBN ._.
Purely_RB nervous_JJ affections_NNS commence_NN either_RB with_IN a_DT marked_JJ stupor_NN or_CC a_DT restless_NN and_CC sleepless_JJ condition_NN accompanied_VBN with_IN severe_JJ headache_NN ;_: and_CC these_DT symptoms_NNS gradually_RB give_VBP place_NN to_TO coma_VB ,_, or_CC delirium_NN (_( either_CC low_JJ muttering_NN or_CC violent_NN )_) or_CC hyperpyrexia_JJ ac-_JJ cording_NN to_TO the_DT precise_JJ character_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN development_NN ._.
The_DT last_JJ symptom_JJ hyper-_JJ pyrexia_NN is_VBZ invariably_RB accompanied_VBN with_IN intense_JJ thirst_NN ._.
Turning_VBG next_JJ to_TO the_DT effects_NNS of_IN plague_NN on_IN the_DT alimentary_JJ system_NN ,_, we_PRP must_MD note_VB a_DT dry_JJ and_CC brown-furred_JJ tongue_NN ,_, occasional_JJ retching_NN and_CC vomiting_NN ,_, abdominal_JJ distension_NN with_IN a_DT stubborn_JJ constipation_NN consequent_NN upon_IN it_PRP ,_, or_CC even_RB ,_, as_IN in_IN certain_JJ cases_NNS ,_, diarrha_NN as_IN its_PRP$ commonest_NN symptom_NN ,_, whilst_VB the_DT only_JJ affection_NN common_JJ to_TO the_DT urinary_JJ organs_NNS in_IN plague_NN is_VBZ the_DT retention_NN of_IN urine_NN ,_, with_IN Hmaturia_NNP in_IN rare_JJ instances_NNS ._.
Malaria_NNP and_CC Bronchitis_NNP have_VBP been_VBN observed_VBN to_TO complicate_VB plague_NN cases_NNS ;_: but_CC no_DT such_JJ complications_NNS have_VBP been_VBN known_VBN to_TO accompany_VB the_DT disease_NN after_IN the_DT patients_NNS have_VBP been_VBN brought_VBN to_TO the_DT hospital_NN ,_, because_IN of_IN their_PRP$ summary_JJ prevention_NN ;_: likewise_CC there_EX have_VBP been_VBN no_DT sequl_NN marked_VBD after_IN recovery_NN in_IN this_DT hospital_NN ._.
The_DT period_NN of_IN convales-_JJ cence_NN is_VBZ from_IN three_CD to_TO nine_CD weeks_NNS ._.
Eighty-one_JJ cases_NNS were_VBD kept_VBN under_IN observation_NN ,_, and_CC nearly_RB all_DT of_IN them_PRP were_VBD found_VBN to_TO be_VB simple_JJ fever_NN cases_NNS ,_, and_CC only_RB three_CD were_VBD those_DT of_IN Phthisis_NNP ._.
Mumps_NNS have_VBP never_RB been_VBN mistaken_VBN for_IN plague_NN in_IN this_DT Hospital_NNP ._.
228_CD Treatment_NNP ._.
The_DT patient_NN is_VBZ brought_VBN to_TO the_DT hospital_NN in_IN the_DT special_JJ ambulance_NN (_( rubber_VB tyred_VBN )_) on_IN a_DT stretcher_NN ,_, and_CC removed_VBD carefully_RB in_IN the_DT horizontal_JJ position_NN ._.
The_DT greatest_JJS care_NN is_VBZ taken_VBN that_IN the_DT patient_NN does_VBZ not_RB sit_VB up_RP ._.
The_DT House_NNP Surgeon_NNP on_IN duty_NN attends_NNS to_TO the_DT case_NN previous_JJ to_TO admission_NN in_IN the_DT wards_NNS and_CC takes_VBZ notes_NNS of_IN the_DT condition_NN on_IN admission_NN ._.
The_DT patient_NN is_VBZ ._.
removed_VBN to_TO the_DT ward_NN on_IN a_DT stretcher_NN ,_, and_CC under_IN the_DT personal_JJ supervision_NN of_IN the_DT nurse_NN ,_, is_VBZ lifted_VBN on_IN to_TO his_PRP$ bed_NN which_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN kept_VBN ready-prepared_JJ ._.
On_IN the_DT cot_NN is_VBZ placed_VBN a_DT mattress_NN of_IN cotton_NN and_CC over_IN it_PRP a_DT mackin-_JJ tosh_NN of_IN the_DT full_JJ length_NN of_IN the_DT bed_NN ,_, and_CC over_IN it_PRP a_DT white_JJ blanket_NN and_CC draw-sheet_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT small_JJ piece_NN of_IN mackintosh_NN over_IN the_DT draw-sheet_NN ._.
A_DT pillow_JJ stuffed_NN with_IN cotton_NN is_VBZ placed_VBN under_IN the_DT head_NN ,_, protected_VBN by_IN a_DT mackintosh_NN and_CC a_DT towel_NN over_IN the_DT latter_JJ The_DT nurse_JJ removes_VBZ the_DT home-clothes_NNS ,_, which_WDT are_VBP handed_VBN over_IN to_TO the_DT Manager_NNP (_( who_WP burns_VBZ them_PRP )_) and_CC sponges_NNS and_CC thoroughly_RB cleans_VBZ the_DT patient_NN laid_NN over_IN a_DT mackintosh_NN of_IN the_DT full_JJ length_NN of_IN the_DT bed_NN with_IN soap_NN and_CC hot-water_NN with_IN some_DT disinfectant_NN ,_, and_CC clothes_NNS him_PRP with_IN a_DT ``_`` sudra_NN ,_, ''_'' a_DT ``_`` lenga_NN ''_'' and_CC flannel_VB shirt_NN ._.
Professional_NNP Treatment.._NNP A_NNP large_JJ enema_NN of_IN warm-water_NN (_( or_CC ice-cold_JJ water_NN if_IN Temperature_NNP be_VB high_JJ )_) is_VBZ immediately_RB administered_VBN (_( unless_IN the-_NN bowels_NNS have_VBP been_VBN thoroughly_RB moved_VBN at_IN home_NN )_) and_CC an_DT ice-bag_NN is_VBZ placed_VBN on_IN the_DT head_NN ,_, and_CC vinegar_JJ lotion_NN and_CC ice-bag_NN are_VBP placed_VBN on_IN the_DT bubo_NN ._.
If_IN there_EX be_VB Tympanitis_NNP ,_, another_DT large_JJ ice-bag_NN is_VBZ placed_VBN on_IN the_DT stomach_NN ,_, and_CC Tr._NNP ,_, Assaftetida_NNP and_CC Turpentine_NNP mixed_VBP in_IN equal_JJ quantities_NNS are_VBP rubbed_VBN on_IN the_DT abdomen_NNS ,_, as_RB well_RB as_IN the_DT Tympanitis_NNP Enema_NNP (_( containing_VBG Tr._NNP ,_, Lavand_NNP ._.
Co._NNP ,_, T._NNP ,_, Assaftida_NNP ,_, Ol_NNP ._.
Ricini_NNP ,_, &_CC c._NN )_) administered_VBD always_RB with_IN good_JJ results_NNS ._.
The_DT rectal_JJ tube_NN is_VBZ also_RB inserted_VBN and_CC kept_VBN for_IN 15_CD to_TO 30_CD minutes_NNS in_IN case_NN of_IN spasmodic_JJ contraction_NN of_IN the_DT lower_JJR end_NN of_IN the_DT gut_NN ._.
Cold_NNP douche_NN of_IN iced_JJ water_NN is_VBZ poured_VBN on_IN the_DT head_NN for_IN 10_CD to_TO 15_CD minutes_NNS ,_, and_CC if_IN the_DT temperature_NN keeps_VBZ up_RP ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ repeated_VBN every_DT two_CD hours_NNS ._.
This_DT is_VBZ also_RB done_VBN if_IN the_DT patient_NN be_VB restless_JJ or_CC delirious_JJ or_CC violent_NN ._.
If_IN violent_JJ ,_, the_DT patient_NN is_VBZ tied_VBN to_TO the_DT bed_NN with_IN a_DT tape_NN which_WDT runs_VBZ across_IN the_DT chest_NN and_CC other_JJ measures_NNS are_VBP taken_VBN to_TO prevent_VB the_DT patient_NN from_IN sitting_VBG up_RP ._.
Bromide_NNP of_IN Potash_NNP is_VBZ only_RB administered_VBN in_IN special_JJ cases_NNS and_CC in_IN small_JJ doses_NNS of_IN 3_CD or_CC 5_CD grains_NNS ,_, if_IN the_DT patient_NN is_VBZ very_RB noisy_JJ or_CC violent_JJ ,_, provided_VBD the_DT pulse_NN is_VBZ not_RB weak_JJ ._.
A_DT special_JJ chart_NN is_VBZ kept_VBN for_IN every_DT individual_JJ patient_NN ,_, where_WRB full_JJ particulars_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ temperature_NN ,_, pulse_NN ,_, respiration_NN ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, are_VBP daily_JJ marked_VBN morning_NN and_CC evening_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN very_RB bad_JJ cases_NNS even_RB every_DT two_CD hours_NNS ._.
No_DT food_NN is_VBZ given_VBN to_TO acute_VB cases_NNS except_IN a_DT cupful_NN of_IN arrowroot_JJ congee_NN with_IN 3_CD ii_NN of_IN Brandy_NNP every_DT three_CD hours_NNS ,_, and_CC no_DT milk_NN unless_IN they_PRP commence_VBP to_TO improve_VB ,_, when_WRB fresh_JJ milk_NN (_( a_DT cupful_NN )_) is_VBZ given_VBN morning_NN and_CC evening_NN ._.
In_IN all_DT cases_NNS with_IN a_DT Temperature_NNP above_IN 99_CD ,_, the_DT patient_NN is_VBZ kept_VBN in_IN a_DT half-pack_NN which_WDT is_VBZ removed_VBN and_CC wetted_VBN every_DT two_CD or_CC three_CD hours_NNS as_IN it_PRP gets_VBZ dry_JJ ._.
If_IN the_DT Temperature_NN be_VB above_IN 103_CD ,_, ice-cold_JJ pack_NN is_VBZ wrapped_VBN round_IN the_DT whole_JJ body_NN ,_, with_IN separate_JJ pieces_NNS for_IN the_DT arms_NNS and_CC legs_NNS ._.
The_DT half-pack_NN is_VBZ kept_VBN constantly_RB on_IN and_CC removed_VBD only_RB when_WRB the_DT Temperature_NN remains_VBZ normal_JJ for_IN several_JJ days_NNS and_CC the_DT patient_NN is_VBZ quite_RB convalescent_JJ ._.
Medicinal_NNP Treatment_NNP of_IN Plague_NNP ._.
Stimulant_JJ mixture_NN /ill_NN i_NN (_( consisting_VBG of_IN Spt._NNP ,_, Ammon_NNP ._.
Aromat_NNP ,_, Liq_NNP ._.
Strychnia_NNP and_CC Brandy_NNP )_) is_VBZ given_VBN every_DT three_CD hours_NNS and_CC Strychnia-Brandy_JJ mixture_NN is_VBZ given_VBN in_IN dram_NN doses_NNS every_DT hour_NN ,_, or_CC in_IN very_RB bad_JJ cases_NNS in_IN half_JJ dram_JJ doses_NNS every_DT half_DT hour_NN ._.
If_IN there_EX be_VB any_DT rigidity_NN of_IN the_DT limbs_NNS ,_, Strychnia_NNP is_VBZ omitted_VBN entirely_RB from_IN both_CC the_DT mixtures_NNS and_CC Tr_NNP ._.
Belladonna_NNP in_IN minim_NN doses_NNS is_VBZ given_VBN every_DT hour_NN ._.
In_IN cases_NNS with_IN a_DT small_JJ pulse_JJ special_JJ Strychnia_NNP and_CC Brandy_NNP mixture_NN (_( containing_VBG ether_RB )_) is_VBZ given_VBN every_DT half-hour_NN in_IN minim_NN doses_NNS ._.
In_IN cases_NNS of_IN high_JJ breathing_NN ,_, Belladonna_NNP Tincture_NNP is_VBZ pushed_VBN on_IN in_IN small_JJ hourly_JJ doses_NNS ,_, and_CC in_IN bad_JJ cases_NNS of_IN this_DT type_NN ,_, Liq_NNP ._.
Atropine_NNP m.i_NN ._.
is_VBZ injected_VBN occasionally_RB ,_, if_IN the_DT pulse-condition_NN allows_VBZ ._.
229_CD Whan_NNP swallowing_NN is_VBZ difficult_JJ and_CC the_DT patient_NN refuses_VBZ ,_, everything_NN by_IN the_DT mouth_NN the_DT mixtures_NNS and_CC feeding_VBG are_VBP given_VBN per_IN rectum_NN every_DT three_CD hours_NNS in_IN double_JJ doses_NNS ,_, or_CC nasal_JJ feeding_NN is_VBZ resorted_VBN to_TO ._.
Hypodermic_NNP medication_NN is_VBZ resorted_VBN to_TO in_IN all_DT true_JJ plague-cases_NNS and_CC m._NN ii_NN ._.
of_IN Liq_NNP ._.
Strychnia_NNP ,_, and_CC m._JJ x._NN of_IN ether_NN are_VBP injected_VBN regularly_RB every_DT four_CD hours_NNS ,_, day_NN and_CC night_NN ,_, with_IN due_JJ precaution_NN for_IN rigidity_NN of_IN the_DT muscles_NNS and_CC high_JJ temperatures_NNS ._.
In_IN serious_JJ cases_NNS the_DT above_NN is_VBZ repeated_VBN every_DT two_CD hours_NNS with_IN minim_JJ doses_NNS of_IN Liq_NNP ._.
Strychnia_NNP ._.
Treatment_NN of_IN Complications_NNP ._.
Delirium_NN is_VBZ combated_VBN with_IN ice-cold_JJ douching_VBG every_DT two_CD or_CC three_CD hours_NNS and_CC occa-_JJ sionally_RB Bromide_NNP is_VBZ given_VBN guardedly_RB by_IN the_DT mouth_NN or_CC per_IN rectum_NN ._.
In_IN sleeplessness_JJ half_PDT a_DT dose_NN of_IN the_DT sleeping-draught_JJ containing_VBG a_DT little_JJ Bromide_NNP and_CC Brandy_NNP is_VBZ administered_VBN and_CC repeated_VBN if_IN necessary_JJ ;_: but_CC in_IN the_DT majority_NN of_IN cases_NNS ,_, a_DT simple_JJ ice-_JJ cold_JJ douche_NN on_IN the_DT head_NN for_IN about_IN 10_CD minutes_NNS proves_VBZ equally_RB serviceable_JJ ._.
In_IN hyperpyrexia_PDT the_DT patient_NN is_VBZ wrapped_VBN in_IN a_DT full_JJ pack_NN of_IN iced-sheets_NNS and_CC the_DT same_JJ cold_JJ treatment_NN resorted_VBD to_TO in_IN delirium_NN is_VBZ given_VBN to_TO the_DT patient_NN ._.
In_IN very_RB extreme_JJ cases_NNS ,_, however_RB ,_, ice-rubbing_JJ on_IN the_DT spine_NN and_CC on_IN the_DT nape_NN of_IN the_DT neck_NN is_VBZ indispensable_JJ ._.
In_IN bad_JJ cases_NNS suffering_VBG from_IN Hiccough_NNP an_DT extra_JJ ice_NN bag_NN is_VBZ resorted_VBN to_TO on_IN the_DT pit_NN of_IN the_DT stomach_NN ,_, and_CC anything_NN tending_VBG to_TO increase_VB the_DT spasmodic_JJ contraction_NN is_VBZ omitted_VBN ;_: a_DT minim_NN dose_NN of_IN Belladonna_NNP along_IN with_IN a_DT little_JJ Ether_NNP or_CC Brandy_NNP is_VBZ pushed_VBN on_IN every_DT hour_NN ._.
When_WRB a_DT patient_NN is_VBZ found_VBN in_IN a_DT very_RB low_JJ condition_NN ,_, the_DT external_JJ application_NN of_IN dry_JJ heat_NN to_TO the_DT extremities_NNS and_CC sinapism_NN on_IN the_DT chest_NN and_CC diffusible_JJ stimulants_NNS are_VBP freely_RB administered_VBN ;_: the_DT two-hourly_JJ hypodermic_JJ injections_NNS of_IN Ether_NNP and_CC Strychina_NNP are_VBP persevered_VBN in_IN ._.
Vomiting_VBG in_IN milder_NN cases_NNS necessitates_VBZ the_DT placing_NN of_IN an_DT ice-bag_NN on_IN the_DT epigas-_JJ trium_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT total_JJ suspension_NN of_IN all_DT food_NN by_IN the_DT mouth_NN except_IN a_DT little_JJ ice-cold_JJ conjee_NN ,_, sometimes_RB a_DT little_JJ subnitrate_NN of_IN Bismuth_NNP is_VBZ mixed_JJ with_IN Bicarbonate_NNP of_IN Soda_NNP and_CC given_VBN ;_: whilst_JJ Salol_NNP too_RB is_VBZ at_IN times_NNS not_RB less_RBR useful_JJ ._.
In_IN persistent_JJ cases_NNS Ammonia_NNP and_CC Ether_NNP are_VBP entirely_RB omitted_VBN from_IN the_DT mixtures_NNS and_CC Mist_NNP ._.
Pepsine_NNP Co._NNP ,_, (_( Hewlett_NNP 's_POS )_) given_VBN instead_RB with_IN due_JJ caution_NN ._.
The_DT same_JJ preparation_NN is_VBZ also_RB very_RB useful_JJ in_IN severe_JJ cases_NNS of_IN Diarrha_NNP ,_, provided_VBD the_DT pulse-condition_NN of_IN the_DT patient_NN in_IN either_DT case_NN allows_VBZ the_DT free_JJ use_NN of_IN it_PRP ,_, and_CC in_IN such_JJ cases_NNS of_IN Diarrha_NNP also_RB ,_, Bismuth_NNP and_CC Salol_NNP is_VBZ given_VBN either_RB by_IN the_DT mouth_NN or_CC per_VB rectum_NN as_IN needed_VBN ._.
Much_JJ care_NN is_VBZ also_RB taken_VBN absolutely_RB to_TO suspend_VB the_DT administration_NN of_IN milk_NN ._.
In_IN extreme_JJ constipation_NN ,_, on_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN ,_, a_DT warm-water_JJ enema_NN ,_, with_IN sometimes_RB even_RB a_DT little_JJ Ammonium_NNP Chloride_NNP is_VBZ given_VBN once_RB a_DT day_NN ;_: but_CC when_WRB this_DT is_VBZ found_VBN to_TO be_VB ineffective_JJ ,_, Glycerine_NNP and_CC Castor-_NNP oil_NN in_IN dram_NN doses_NNS are_VBP injected_VBN per_IN rectum_NN with_IN a_DT little_JJ conjee_NN ._.
When_WRB this_DT condition_NN is_VBZ accompanied_VBN with_IN a_DT considerable_JJ distension_NN of_IN the_DT abdomen_NNS ,_, Tr_NNP ._.
Assaftida_NNP is_VBZ used_VBN for_IN external_JJ and_CC internal_JJ medication_NN with_IN great_JJ efficacy_NN ,_, and_CC ice-cold_JJ compresses_NNS at_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN are_VBP placed_VBN on_IN the_DT abdominal_JJ wall_NN ._.
Retention_NN of_IN urine_NN is_VBZ relieved_VBN as_RB far_RB as_IN possible_JJ either_CC by_IN placing_VBG cold_JJ compresses_NNS on_IN the_DT pubes_NNS or_CC by_IN emptying_VBG the_DT lower-bowel_NN by_IN enema_NN ,_, &_CC c._NN ;_: hence_VB the_DT catheter_NN is_VBZ resorted_VBN to_TO only_RB later_RB on_IN ._.
The_DT commonest_JJS cutaneous_JJ affection_NN is_VBZ the_DT bedsore_NN ;_: this_DT is_VBZ cleaned_VBN with_IN Iodine_NNP Lotion_NNP and_CC an_DT ointment_NN composed_VBN of_IN Iodoform_NNP ,_, Hazeline_NNP and_CC Lanoline_NNP applied_VBD to_TO it_PRP on_IN lint_NN ._.
The_DT abscesses_NNS that_WDT sometimes_RB follow_VBP the_DT hypodermic_JJ injection_NN of_IN Ether_NNP are_VBP dressed_VBN antiseptically_RB or_CC cauterized_VBN with_IN Nitrate_NNP of_IN Silver_NNP when_WRB necessary_JJ ._.
In_IN Pneumonic-plague_NNP ,_, the_DT abovementioned_JJ treatment_NN is_VBZ adopted_VBN ;_: no_DT hot_JJ poultices_NNS or_CC jacket-poultices_NNS are_VBP used_VBN ;_: but_CC ice-bags_NNS and_CC cold_NN are_VBP externally_RB applied_VBN to_TO the_DT chest_JJS wall_NN ._.
230_CD Treatment_NN followed_VBD in_IN a_DT mild_JJ case_NN of_IN Plague_NNP or_CC Pestis_NNP Minor_NNP ._.
In_IN a_DT mild_JJ attack_NN of_IN plague_NN ,_, the_DT same_JJ treatment_NN is_VBZ carried_VBN out_RP as_IN in_IN the_DT malig-_JJ nant_JJ type_NN ,_, excepting_VBG the_DT Hypodermic_NNP injections_NNS ._.
The_DT condition_NN of_IN the_DT bowels_NNS ,_, the_DT administration_NN of_IN stimulant_JJ mixtures_NNS and_CC the_DT cold_JJ applications_NNS on_IN the_DT head_NN and_CC the_DT buho_NN are_VBP carefully_RB looked_VBN to_TO as_IN in_IN the_DT acute_JJ stage_NN ;_: but_CC the_DT patient_NN is_VBZ wrapped_VBN in_IN a_DT pack_NN of_IN iced-sheets_NNS only_RB over_IN the_DT trunk_NN of_IN the_DT body_NN ,_, and_CC his_PRP$ conji-diet_JJ is_VBZ speedily_RB replaced_VBN by_IN a_DT milk_NN one_CD ,_, which_WDT in_IN turn_NN soon_RB advances_NNS to_TO a_DT soup-diet_JJ and_CC lastly_RB to_TO a_DT full_JJ one_NN ._.
Convalescence_NN ._.
During_IN convalescence_NN ,_, the_DT Mist_NNP ._.
Stimulans_NNS and_CC the_DT pack_NN are_VBP gradually_RB omitted_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT ice-bag_JJ removed_NN ;_: the_DT gland_NN is_VBZ opened_VBN and_CC dressed_VBN twice_RB a_DT day_NN with_IN Iodine_NNP Lotion_NNP and_CC freely_RB irrigated_JJ and_CC loose_JJ sloughs_NNS removed_VBN ._.
If_IN there_EX is_VBZ induration_NN around_IN the_DT site_NN of_IN incision_NN ,_, Ung_NNP ._.
Hg_NNP ._.
and_CC Ung_NNP ._.
