in_IN equal_JJ parts_NNS are_VBP rubbed_VBN ,_, or_CC if_IN needed_VBN ,_, a_DT poultice_NN is_VBZ placed_VBN on_IN it_PRP to_TO soften_VB the_DT hardness_NN ._.
Serum_NNP as_IN a_DT Curative_JJ Treatment_NN ._.
The_DT curative_JJ serum_NN of_IN Roux_NNP was_VBD never_RB tried_VBN in_IN this_DT Hospital_NNP ,_, but_CC two_CD female_JJ patients_NNS ,_, mother_NN and_CC daughter_NN ,_, by_IN name_NN Mrs._NNP and_CC Miss_NNP Bezonji_NNP Kapadia_NNP were_VBD sub-_RB jected_VBN to_TO Lustig_NNP 's_POS serum_NN ._.
Their_PRP$ charts_NNS are_VBP annexed_JJ herewith_NN ._.
Mrs._NNP Snnabai_NNP Kapadia_NNP ,_, a_DT Parsi_NNP female_NN ,_, aged_VBD 45_CD years_NNS ,_, was_VBD admitted_VBN at_IN 4_CD p.m._NN on_IN 8th_CD February_NNP 1899_CD ,_, with_IN a_DT temperature_NN of_IN 103_CD and_CC pulse_RB 140_CD beats_NNS ,_, weak_JJ ._.
The_DT fever_NN was_VBD of_IN three_CD days_NNS '_POS duration_NN ._.
There_EX was_VBD no_DT cough_NN nor_CC vomiting_NN and_CC she_PRP had_VBD not_RB slept_VBN at_IN home_NN the_DT night_NN previous_JJ ;_: she_PRP was_VBD restless_JJ ,_, but_CC neither_DT delirious_JJ nor_CC violent_JJ ._.
Her_PRP$ bubo_NN was_VBD right-femoral_JJ and_CC well-developed_JJ ._.
The_DT tongue_NN was_VBD brown_VBN ,_, but_CC moist_NN ._.
The_DT bowels_NNS had_VBD been_VBN moved_VBN freely_RB before_IN admission_NN ._.
At_IN home_NN ,_, she_PRP was_VBD ,_, the_DT same_JJ morning_NN ,_, injected_VBN with_IN 20_CD c._NNS c._NN of_IN Lustig_NNP 's_POS curative_JJ serum_NN ,_, and_CC at_IN 7_CD p.m._NN on_IN the_DT same_JJ day_NN ,_, she_PRP was_VBD injected_VBN a_DT similar_JJ dose_NN in_IN the_DT Hospital_NNP ._.
Her_PRP$ condition_NN at_IN 7_CD p.m._NN was_VBD very_RB grave_JJ ,_, the_DT tongue_NN dry_NN ,_, the_DT temperature_NN 1024_CD ,_, the_DT breathing_NN shallow_NN and_CC hurried_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT pulse_NN irregular_NN and_CC high_JJ in_IN ten-_JJ sion_NN ._.
She_PRP had_VBD moreover_RB mitral_JJ iucompetency_NN and_CC extreme_JJ debility_NN ._.
There_EX was_VBD also_RB distension_NN of_IN the_DT abdomen_NNS ._.
She_PRP was_VBD injected_VBN Ether_NNP m._NN x_NNP and_CC Strychnia_NNP m._NNP ii_NN on_IN admission_NN and_CC just_RB before_RB death_NN ._.
Nothing_NN was_VBD given_VBN to_TO her_PRP$ by_IN mouth_NN except_IN oz_NN ._.
iii_NN of_IN Brandy_NNP with_IN oz_NN ._.
ii_NN of_IN conji_NN every_DT three_CD hours_NNS ._.
Ice-bags_NNS were_VBD kept_VBN on_IN the_DT head_NN and_CC bubo_NN ._.
At_IN 2_CD a.m._NN on_IN the_DT 9th_CD ,_, the_DT temperature_NN rose_VBD to_TO 1054_CD ,_, and_CC she_PRP was_VBD pulseless_RB ;_: the_DT pupils_NNS were_VBD dilated_VBN ,_, the_DT extremities_NNS cold_VBP ,_, and_CC she_PRP was_VBD gasping_VBG for_IN breath_NN ._.
She_PRP died_VBD at_IN 2-30_JJ a.m._NN on_IN the_DT 9th_CD within_IN twelve_NN hours_NNS after_IN admission_NN ._.
Miss_NNP Maneckbai_NNP Kapadia_NNP ,_, a_DT Parsi_NNP girl_NN ,_, aged_VBD 18_CD years_NNS ,_, was_VBD admitted_VBN at_IN 2-30_CD p.m._NN ,_, on_IN 8th_CD February_NNP 1899_CD ,_, with_IN temperature_NN 1038_CD ,_, pulse_JJ 124-fair_CD ,_, and_CC a_DT foul_JJ tongue_NN ._.
There_EX was_VBD considerable_JJ mental_JJ excitement_NN and_CC an_DT inclination_NN to_TO weep_VB ._.
She_PRP was_VBD perfectly_RB conscious_JJ and_CC there_EX was_VBD no_DT delirium_NN ,_, she_PRP had_VBD a_DT right_JJ inguinal_JJ bubo_NN ._.
She_PRP was_VBD also_RB injected_JJ 20_CD c._JJ c._NN of_IN Lustig_NNP 's_POS Serum_NNP at_IN home_NN in_IN the_DT morning_NN and_CC a_DT similar_JJ dose_NN at_IN 7_CD p.m._NN in_IN the_DT Hospital_NNP ._.
The_DT same_JJ treatment_NN was_VBD tried_VBN in_IN her_PRP$ case_NN for_IN the_DT first_JJ 24-hours_JJ as_IN on_IN her_PRP$ mother_NN ;_: but_CC the_DT temperature_NN rose_VBD at_IN midnight_NN to_TO 1064_CD and_CC she_PRP became_VBD restless_JJ and_CC cyanosed_VBN with_IN a_DT feeble_JJ pulse_NN at_IN 2_CD a.m._NN on_IN the_DT 9th_CD ._.
At_IN 1_CD p.m._NN on_IN the_DT 9th_CD ,_, the_DT usual_JJ treatment_NN of_IN the_DT Hospital_NNP was_VBD given_VBN to_TO her_PRP$ at_IN the_DT request_NN of_IN her_PRP$ relations_NNS ,_, and_CC on_IN the_DT llth_NN her_PRP$ pulse_NN was_VBD 120-fair_JJ in_IN volume_NN and_CC the_DT temperature_NN had_VBD come_VBN down_RB to_TO 100_CD ,_, she_PRP was_VBD rational_JJ and_CC cheerful_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT bowels_NNS that_WDT were_VBD obstinately_RB constipated_VBN for_IN the_DT first_JJ two_CD days_NNS in_IN spite_NN of_IN enemata_NNS and_CC drugs_NNS were_VBD freely_RB moved_VBN and_CC there_EX was_VBD no_DT retention_NN of_IN urine_NN ._.
231_CD Her_PRP$ bubo_NN was_VBD opened_VBN on_IN the_DT 16th_CD February_NNP 1899_CD ,_, and_CC pus_NN removed_VBN therefrom_NN ._.
She_PRP remained_VBD convalescent_NN for_IN over_IN two_CD months_NNS and_CC was_VBD discharged_VBN cured_VBN of_IN plague_NN on_IN 22nd_CD April_NNP 1899_CD ._.
Special_JJ point_NN of_IN Interest.-Both_NNP these_DT ladies_NNS were_VBD inoculated_VBN in_IN February_NNP 1898_CD with_IN Haffkine_NNP 's_POS serum_NN and_CC on_IN 21st_CD January_NNP 1899_CD with_IN Yersin_NNP 's_POS serum_NN ._.
Notes_NNS by_IN the_DT Special_JJ MedicalOfficer_NNP ._.
The_DT report_NN on_IN this_DT Hospital_NNP speaks_NN for_IN itself_PRP ._.
The_DT Hospital_NNP is_VBZ well-managed_JJ and_CC has_VBZ done_VBN excellent_JJ work_NN amongst_IN the_DT Parsi_NNP Community_NNP ._.
No_DT ._.
7_CD ._.
K._NNP B._NNP Mahomedbhoy_NNP Ebrahim_NNP Hassum_NNP Bhalloo_NNP ,_, Plague_NNP Hospital_NNP for_IN Khojas_NNP ._.
DONTAD_NNP CROSS_NNP LANE_NNP ,_, BOMBAY_NNP ,_, 24th_CD July_NNP 1899_CD ._.
To_TO THE_DT SPECIAL_NNP MEDICAL_NNP OFFICER_NNP ,_, PLAGUE_NNP OPERATION_NNP ,_, BOMBAY_NNP ._.
SIR_NNP ,_, I_PRP have_VBP the_DT honor_NN to_TO submit_VB herewith_PDT the_DT report_NN of_IN the_DT K._NNP B._NNP Mahomedbhoy_NNP Ebrahim_NNP Khoja_NNP Plague_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, for_IN 12_CD months_NNS ,_, from_IN the_DT 1st_CD of_IN June_NNP 1898_CD to_TO the_DT 31st_CD of_IN May_NNP 1899_CD ._.
2_CD ._.
The_DT Hospital_NNP was_VBD founded_VBN by_IN the_DT late_JJ lamented_VBD K._NNP B._NNP Mahomedbhoy_NNP Ebrahim_NNP on_IN the_DT 26th_CD April_NNP 1897_CD ,_, there_EX were_VBD no_DT donations_NNS or_CC contributions_NNS towards_IN the_DT maintenance_NN of_IN the_DT Hospital_NNP ,_, all_PDT the_DT expenses_NNS were_VBD borne_VBN by_IN the_DT founder_NN ._.
Dur-_JJ ing_VBG his_PRP$ life-time_NN there_EX was_VBD no_DT Committee_NNP of_IN Management_NNP ,_, he_PRP used_VBD to_TO look_VB after_IN everything_NN in_IN connection_NN with_IN the_DT Hospital_NNP himself_PRP ._.
During_IN the_DT first_JJ 3_CD months_NNS of_IN the_DT year_NN under_IN report_NN ,_, Dr._NNP V._NNP Dias_NNP was_VBD in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN during_IN the_DT absence_NN of_IN the_DT permanent_JJ incumbent_NN ,_, Dr._NNP Khwaja_NNP Abdulla_NNP ._.
Mr._NNP Shirally_NNP Ebrahim_NNP was_VBD the_DT Manager_NNP of_IN the_DT hospital_NN throughout_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
The_DT hospital_JJ staff_NN consisted_VBN of_IN the_DT Medical_NNP Officer_NNP in_IN charge_NN ,_, Dr._NNP Khwaja_NNP Abdulla_NNP ,_, two_CD Nurses_NNP ,_, Mrs._NNP Fernandes_NNP and_CC Miss_NNP Manzulla_NNP ,_, two_CD Compounders_NNS ,_, 4_CD Wardboys_NNP ,_, 4_CD Ayahs_NNP ,_, 1_CD Hamal_NNP ,_, 2_CD Cooks_NNP ,_, 2_CD Ramoshis_NNP ,_, 1_CD Priest_NNP and_CC 2_CD Metharanis_NNP ._.
3_CD ._.
The_DT hospital_NN is_VBZ a_DT three-storied_JJ building_NN ,_, the_DT ground_NN floor_NN is_VBZ used_VBN for_IN patients_NNS under_IN observation_NN ._.
All_PDT the_DT 3_CD stories_NNS are_VBP used_VBN for_IN patients_NNS suffering_VBG from_IN Plague_NNP ,_, a_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT second_JJ story_NN is_VBZ occupied_VBN by_IN the_DT Office_NNP and_CC Dispensary_NNP ._.
A_DT separate_JJ four-storied_JJ building_NN just_RB near_IN the_DT hospital_NN was_VBD rented_VBN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN accommodating_VBG about_IN 60_CD contacts_NNS ,_, and_CC also_RB for_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN servants_NNS ._.
4_CD ._.
As_IN regards_NNS excreta_VBP ,_, they_PRP were_VBD mixed_JJ with_IN strong_JJ solution_NN of_IN phenyle_NN ,_, carbolic_JJ lotion_NN ,_, or_CC perchloride_NN of_IN mercury_NN solution_NN and_CC then_RB thrown_VB into_IN the_DT latrines_NNS ._.
The_DT patients_NNS were_VBD not_RB allowed_VBN to_TO use_VB water_NN closets_NNS ,_, but_CC each_DT patient_NN was_VBD pro-_JJ vided_JJ with_IN a_DT bed-pan_NN ._.
The_DT bedding_NN ,_, such_JJ as_IN mattresses_NNS ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, were_VBD disinfected_VBN with_IN the_DT perchloride_JJ lotion_NN or_CC strong_JJ solution_NN of_IN phenyle_NN ,_, allowed_VBN to_TO dry_VB and_CC then_RB handed_VBD over_RP to_TO the_DT Dhobi_NNP for_IN washing_VBG ,_, in_IN majority_NN of_IN cases_NNS the_DT mattresses_NNS were_VBD burnt_NNS ._.
232_CD 5_CD ._.
The_DT supply_NN of_IN water_NN was_VBD drawn_VBN mainly_RB from_IN the_DT service_NN pipes_NNS of_IN the_DT hospital_NN building_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT supply_NN not_RB being_VBG constant_JJ ,_, we_PRP were_VBD obliged_VBN to_TO get_VB water_NN from_IN outside_NN ._.
6_CD ._.
The_DT floors_NNS of_IN the_DT wards_NNS were_VBD sprinkled_VBN every_DT morning_NN with_IN strong_JJ solution_NN of_IN carbolic_JJ acid_NN or_CC mercury_NN ,_, and_CC lirnewashed_VBD twice_RB a_DT week_NN ,_, the_DT whole_JJ building_NN ,_, in-_JJ cluding_VBG the_DT walls_NNS ,_, windows_NNS ,_, ceilings_NNS ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, was_VBD disinfected_VBN twice_RB during_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
The_DT clothings_NNS of_IN the_DT patients_NNS were_VBD generally_RB burnt_VBN either_RB after_IN recovery_NN or_CC death_NN ,_, and_CC therefore_RB there_EX was_VBD no_DT necessity_NN for_IN sending_VBG the_DT same_JJ to_TO the_DT disinfecting_VBG Station_NNP ._.
7_CD ._.
As_RB soon_RB as_IN a_DT patient_NN died_VBD ,_, the_DT body_NN was_VBD covered_VBN or_CC wrapped_VBN with_IN a_DT sheet_NN saturated_VBN with_IN a_DT strong_JJ solution_NN of_IN mercury_NN or_CC carbolic_JJ acid_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB removed_VBD immediately_RB to_TO the_DT Khoja_NNP Cemetery_NNP which_WDT is_VBZ not_RB far_RB off_RB ._.
The_DT body_NN was_VBD not_RB allowed_VBN to_TO remain_VB in_IN the_DT hospital_NN for_IN more_JJR than_IN an_DT hour_NN or_CC two_CD ._.
Pauper_IN patients_NNS were_VBD also_RB treated_VBN in_IN the_DT same_JJ manner_NN and_CC the_DT expenses_NNS for_IN the_DT disposal_NN of_IN the_DT body_NN were_VBD paid_VBN by_IN the_DT founder_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN ._.
8_CD ._.
A_DT list_NN giving_VBG full_JJ particulars_NNS of_IN cases_NNS inoculated_VBN with_IN Professor_NNP Haffkine_NNP 's_POS serum_NN is_VBZ herewith_JJ attached_VBN ._.
9_CD ._.
There_EX was_VBD no_DT sickness_NN amongst_VBD the_DT staff_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN ._.
10_CD ._.
Attached_JJ please_NN find_VB eight_CD tables_NNS ,_, giving_VBG full_JJ particulars_NNS as_IN regards_NNS the_DT admissions_NNS ,_, deaths_NNS ,_, recoveries_NNS ,_, situation_NN of_IN buboes_NNS ,_, percentage_NN of_IN mortality_NN ,_, &_CC c._NN 11_CD ._.
During_IN the_DT week_NN ending_VBG 18th_CD March_NNP 1899_CD ,_, there_EX were_VBD 24_CD admissions_NNS which_WDT is_VBZ the_DT highest_JJS number_NN admitted_VBN ,_, 7_CD patients_NNS admitted_VBN in_IN one_CD day_NN only_RB ,_, which_WDT was_VBD the_DT 14th_CD March_NNP last_JJ ._.
12_CD ._.
The_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN deaths_NNS during_IN the_DT year_NN is_VBZ 100_CD ,_, of_IN whom_WP 97_CD died_VBD of_IN Plague_NNP ;_: the_DT average_JJ percentage_NN of_IN deaths_NNS is_VBZ 50_CD ._.
There_EX were_VBD 6_CD deaths_NNS in_IN one_CD day_NN only_RB ,_, which_WDT was_VBD the_DT 22nd_CD March_NNP last_JJ ._.
13_CD ._.
Incubation_NN :_: -The_NN statements_NNS made_VBN by_IN the_DT patients_NNS and_CC their_PRP$ relations_NNS are_VBP generally_RB unreliable_JJ ,_, and_CC therefore_IN it_PRP is_VBZ impossible_JJ to_TO state_NN with_IN accuracy_NN the_DT period_NN of_IN incubation_NN ,_, but_CC from_IN a_DT few_JJ reliable_JJ cases_NNS which_WDT I_PRP know_VBP of_IN ,_, the_DT period_NN of_IN incubation_NN appears_VBZ to_TO be_VB from_IN a_DT few_JJ hours_NNS to_TO 8_CD or_CC 10_CD days_NNS ._.
14_CD ._.
Symptoms.-Fever_NN :_: -It_NN lasts_VBZ for_IN about_IN six_CD days_NNS ,_, unless_IN there_EX are_VBP complica-_JJ tions_NNS ._.
It_PRP varies_VBZ from_IN 100_CD to_TO 108_CD ,_, but_CC nothing_NN depends_VBZ upon_JJ temperature_NN as_IN regards_NNS the_DT prognosis_NN ,_, unless_IN the_DT temperature_NN is_VBZ above_IN 106_CD ._.
I_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN almost_RB all_DT patients_NNS die_VBP when_WRB the_DT temperature_NN rises_VBZ above_IN 106_CD ;_: we_PRP had_VBD only_RB one_CD case_NN recovered_VBN in_IN January_NNP 1898_CD ,_, whose_WP$ temperature_NN had_VBD gone_VBN above_RB 306_CD ._.
Sudden_JJ subsidence_NN of_IN the_DT fever_NN during_IN the_DT first_JJ 5_CD days_NNS is_VBZ a_DT very_RB dangerous_JJ sign_NN ,_, almost_RB fatal_JJ ._.
Pulse.-Is_NNP always_RB frequent_NN and_CC full_JJ in_IN the_DT beginning_NN ,_, its_PRP$ beat_NN ranging_VBG from_IN 100_CD to_TO 106_CD or_CC sometimes_RB more_JJR ;_: as_IN the_DT disease_NN advances_VBZ it_PRP becomes_VBZ weak_JJ ,_, irregular_JJ ,_, intermittent_NN ,_, &_CC c._VBP The_DT pulse_NN is_VBZ the_DT only_JJ sign_NN which_WDT I_PRP think_VBP shows_VBZ whether_IN the_DT patient_NN is_VBZ progressing_VBG favourably_RB or_CC not_RB ._.
If_IN the_DT pulse_NN is_VBZ weak_JJ ,_, notwithstanding_VBG the_DT symptoms_NNS appearing_VBG favourable_JJ ,_, the_DT case_NN generally_RB proves_VBZ fatal_JJ ._.
Respirations.-Are_JJ always_RB increased_VBN ,_, sometimes_RB as_RB far_RB as_IN 60_CD or_CC even_RB 80_CD per_IN minute_NN ;_: if_IN the_DT respirations_NNS increase_VB without_IN any_DT lung_NN complications_NNS ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ a_DT bad_JJ sign_NN ;_: sometimes_VBZ the_DT respirations_NNS become_VBP irregular_JJ ._.
Tongue.-In_CD the_DT beginning_NN it_PRP becomes_VBZ white_JJ ,_, coated_VBN ,_, with_IN the_DT edges_NNS red_VBD ;_: as_IN the_DT case_NN advances_VBZ ,_, it_PRP becomes_VBZ dry_JJ ,_, brownish_JJ or_CC sometimes_JJ black_JJ in_IN bad_JJ cases_NNS ;_: moist_NN and_CC cleaner_NN in_IN favourable_JJ cases_NNS ._.
The_DT only_JJ characteristic_JJ sign_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN its_PRP$ characteristic_JJ tongue_NN ._.
233_CD Bowels.-Are_NNP generally_RB constipated_VBD ,_, moderate_JJ purging_NN is_VBZ always_RB good_JJ ,_, excessive_JJ purging_NN is_VBZ always_RB a_DT bad_JJ sign_NN and_CC specially_RB when_WRB the_DT stools_NNS are_VBP black_JJ in_IN color_NN ;_: all_DT my_PRP$ patients_NNS who_WP vomited_VBD black_JJ matter_NN or_CC who_WP passed_VBD black_JJ stools_NNS ,_, died_VBD ._.
Urine.-Is_JJ always_RB high-coloured_JJ and_CC scanty_NN ,_, it_PRP occasionally_RB contains_VBZ albumen_NNS ,_, suppression_NN of_IN urine_NN is_VBZ always_RB a_DT bad_JJ sign_NN ._.
Lungs.-The_JJ complications_NNS are_VBP either_DT primary_JJ or_CC secondary_JJ ,_, such_JJ as_IN bronchitis_NN ,_, broncho-pneumonia_NN ,_, pneumonia_NN ,_, hypostatic-pneumonia_NN ;_: when_WRB pneumonia_NN is_VBZ primary_JJ the_DT prognosis_NN is_VBZ always_RB grave_JJ ,_, we_PRP had_VBD only_RB one_CD case_NN recovering_VBG in_IN 1898_CD ,_, from_IN pneumonic_JJ plague_NN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN a_DT mild_JJ form_NN of_IN bronchitis_NN or_CC broncho-pneumonia_NN ,_, precede_VBP death_NN in_IN a_DT majority_NN of_IN fatal_JJ cases_NNS ._.
Liver.-In_JJ some_DT cases_NNS it_PRP is_VBZ enlarged_VBN and_CC all_PDT the_DT symptoms_NNS of_IN acute_JJ hepatitis_NN are_VBP present_JJ ,_, sometimes_RB jaundice_NN is_VBZ present_JJ ;_: as_IN regards_NNS the_DT prognosis_NN ,_, I_PRP do_VBP not_RB think_VB hepatitis_NN is_VBZ a_DT bad_JJ sign_NN ._.
Brain._NNP --_: In_IN almost_RB all_DT cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN ,_, there_EX are_VBP brain_NN symptoms_NNS more_RBR or_CC less_RBR present_JJ ,_, the_DT eyes_NNS become_VBP red_JJ ,_, conjunctive_JJ injected_VBN ,_, loss_NN of_IN sleep_NN ,_, and_CC often_RB violent_JJ delirium_NN ._.
Convulsions_NNS in_IN children_NNS are_VBP often_RB present_JJ and_CC signs_NNS of_IN acute_NN meningitis_NN are_VBP seen_VBN ;_: sometimes_RB the_DT patient_NN becomes_VBZ unconscious_JJ and_CC remains_VBZ in_IN that_DT state_NN from_IN a_DT few_JJ hours_NNS to_TO 5_CD or_CC 6_CD days_NNS ._.
I_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN patients_NNS with_IN all_PDT these_DT symptoms_NNS and_CC who_WP could_MD not_RB swallow_VB a_DT drop_NN of_IN medicine_NN ,_, recover_VB completely_RB ._.
Adults_NNS and_CC strong_JJ persons_NNS suffer_VBP more_JJR from_IN brain_NN symptoms_NNS (_( complications_NNS )_) than_IN the_DT weak_JJ and_CC the_DT old_JJ ._.
We_PRP occasionally_RB see_VBP loss_NN of_IN sight_NN and_CC paralysis_NN in_IN plague_NN cases_NNS ._.
Blisters.-They_NN are_VBP generally_RB black_JJ in_IN color_NN ,_, and_CC are_VBP seen_VBN only_RB at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN an_DT epidemic_JJ ._.
I_PRP had_VBD several_JJ such_JJ cases_NNS under_IN my_PRP$ treatment_NN ._.
Blisters_NNS generally_RB appear_VBP on_IN the_DT extremities_NNS ,_, they_PRP also_RB appear_VBP on_IN the_DT stomach_NN and_CC back_RB ._.
Pregnancy.-There_NNP is_VBZ an_DT impression_NN that_IN if_IN pregnant_JJ women_NNS get_VBP plague_JJ ,_, they_PRP generally_RB die_VBP ;_: my_PRP$ experience_NN is_VBZ quite_RB different_JJ ._.
I_PRP had_VBD 4_CD such_JJ cases_NNS in_IN Hospital_NNP ,_, two_CD of_IN whom_WP aborted_VBD and_CC died_VBD ,_, while_IN the_DT two_CD others_NNS recovered_VBD ;_: (_( one_CD was_VBD delivered_VBN of_IN a_DT male_JJ child_NN and_CC both_DT the_DT mother_NN and_CC the_DT child_NN were_VBD discharged_VBN cured_JJ 12_CD days_NNS after_IN delivery_NN )_) ._.
Buboes.-They_NNP may_MD appear_VB either_CC before_IN ,_, with_IN or_CC after_IN the_DT fever_NN ;_: if_IN the_DT bubo_NN appears_VBZ early_JJ and_CC the_DT patient_NN takes_VBZ rest_NN in_IN bed_NN for_IN about_IN a_DT week_NN and_CC keeps_VBZ himself_PRP on_IN liquid_NN diet_NN ,_, I_PRP think_VBP each_DT and_CC every_DT such_JJ case_NN will_MD recover_VB ._.
Buboes_NNS sometimes_RB ap-_JJ pear_JJ very_RB late_RB ,_, I_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN cases_NNS in_IN which_WDT they_PRP appeared_VBD on_IN the_DT 7th_JJ day_NN ,_, such_JJ cases_NNS generally_RB prove_VBP fatal_JJ ._.
There_EX may_MD be_VB more_JJR buboes_NNS than_IN one_CD ._.
When_WRB there_EX is_VBZ more_JJR than_IN one_CD bubo_NN the_DT prognosis_NN is_VBZ always_RB favourable_JJ ._.
In_IN the_DT beginning_NN there_EX is_VBZ only_RB tenderness_JJ ,_, it_PRP gradually_RB increases_VBZ in_IN size_NN ;_: the_DT pain_NN becomes_VBZ intense_JJ ,_, sometimes_RB the_DT pain_NN is_VBZ so_RB severe_JJ ,_, that_IN even_RB if_IN the_DT patient_NN is_VBZ unconscious_JJ and_CC you_PRP press_VBP the_DT spot_NN ,_, the_DT patient_NN will_MD cry_VB out_RP ._.
Sudden_JJ disappearance_NN of_IN the_DT bubo_NN within_IN the_DT first_JJ 5_CD days_NNS is_VBZ always_RB a_DT bad_JJ sign_NN ._.
The_DT bubo_NN may_MD be_VB as_RB small_JJ as_IN a_DT pea_NN or_CC it_PRP may_MD be_VB as_RB large_JJ as_IN a_DT mango_NN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN a_DT patient_NN ,_, the_DT circumference_NN of_IN whose_WP$ bubo_NN was_VBD 12_CD inches_NNS ,_, ifc_NN was_VBD very_RB painful_JJ and_CC the_DT patient_NN was_VBD so_RB restless_JJ that_IN I_PRP had_VBD to_TO cut_VB it_PRP open_JJ in_IN several_JJ places_NNS to_TO rolieve_VB pain_NN ,_, he_PRP ultimately_RB .recovered_VBD ,_, his_PRP$ name_NN is_VBZ Mahomed_NNP Jaffer_NNP Anand_NNP ,_, he_PRP was_VBD admitted_VBN on_IN the_DT 18th_CD January_NNP and_CC discharged_VBD as_RB cured_VBN on_IN the_DT 22nd_CD March_NNP last_JJ ;_: about_IN 5_CD days_NNS after_IN the_DT operation_NN ,_, the_DT gland_NN came_VBD out_RP ._.
Buboes_NNS on_IN both_DT sides_NNS of_IN the_DT neck_NN with_IN pneumonia_NN is_VBZ a_DT fatal_JJ sign_NN ._.
Buboes_NNS in_IN the_DT axillary_JJ regions_NNS are_VBP most_RBS fatal_JJ ._.
In_IN the_DT majority_NN of_IN cases_NNS the_DT buboes_NNS suppurated_VBD ._.
Treatment_NN ._.
Diet_JJ :_: -Milk_NN only_RB to_TO be_VB given_VBN ,_, occasionally_RB Brand_NNP 's_POS Essence_NNP of_IN Chicken_NNP and_CC Coffee_NNP ._.
234_CD Absolute_NNP rest_NN to_TO both_DT mind_NN and_CC body_NN ._.
If_IN the_DT bowels_NNS are_VBP constipated_VBN ,_, I_PRP give_VBP an_DT enema_NN of_IN soap_NN and_CC water_NN ._.
In_IN children_NNS I_PRP prescribe_VBP Santonine_JJ with_IN a_DT few_JJ grains_NNS of_IN Calomel_NNP ._.
If_IN the_DT patient_NN can_MD not_RB swallow_VB anything_NN ,_, I_PRP generally_RB give_VBP milk_NN and_CC medi-_JJ cine_NN by_IN enemata_NN ._.
To/illrelieve_NNP thirst_NN soda_NN water_NN is_VBZ given_VBN freely_RB ._.
I_PRP do_VBP not_RB recommend_VB the_DT use_NN of_IN ice_NN ._.
If_IN the_DT temperature_NN is_VBZ high_JJ ,_, I_PRP apply_VBP ice_RB to_TO the_DT head_NN ;_: if_IN the_DT temperature_NN is_VBZ not_RB very_RB high_JJ ,_, I_PRP cause_VBP Eau_NNP de_FW Cologne_NNP or_CC rose_VBD water_NN to_TO be_VB applied_VBN to_TO the_DT head_NN ._.
Mustard_NNP foot-bath_NN is_VBZ also_RB given_VBN ._.
Goat_NNP 's_POS milk_NN is_VBZ rubbed_VBN on_IN the_DT hands_NNS and_CC feet_NNS when_WRB the_DT temperature_NN is_VBZ high_JJ and_CC brain_NN symptoms_NNS present_JJ ._.
In_IN old_JJ and_CC weak_JJ persons_NNS ,_, if_IN the_DT temperature_NN is_VBZ not_RB very_RB high_JJ ,_, I_PRP do_VBP not_RB apply_VB anything_NN to_TO the_DT head_NN ._.
Application_NN to_TO the_DT bubo_NN :_: -If_VB the_DT bubo_NN is_VBZ small_JJ ,_, I_PRP apply_VBP poultice_RB ;_: if_IN it_PRP is_VBZ large_JJ ,_, I_PRP apply_VBP an_DT ointment_NN of_IN Pharbitis_NNP til_NN seeds_NNS with_IN vinegar_NN ,_, and_CC when_WRB the_DT acute_NN symptoms_NNS have_VBP subsided_VBN Belladona_NNP and_CC Mercurial_NNP ointment_NN ,_, and_CC finally_RB if_IN the_DT bubo_NN shows_VBZ sign_NN of_IN suppuration_NN ,_, I_PRP apply_VBP poultices_NNS aiad_RB open_VBP it_PRP like_IN an_DT ordinary_JJ abscess_NN under_IN strict_JJ antiseptic_JJ precautions_NNS ._.
If_IN the_DT bubo_NN is_VBZ very_RB large_JJ and_CC the_DT pain_NN is_VBZ so_RB intense_JJ as_IN to_TO give_VB me_PRP cause_VB to_TO apprehend_VB that_IN it_PRP alone_RB will_MD kill_VB the_DT patient_NN ,_, I_PRP open_VBP the_DT bubo_NN ._.
Whenever_WRB the_DT bubo_NN is_VBZ situated_VBN in_IN places_NNS where_WRB there_EX are_VBP loose_JJ tissues_NNS ,_, I_PRP apply_VBP leeches_NNS ._.
Medicinal_JJ treatment.-If_NN the_DT temperature_NN is_VBZ not_RB very_RB high_JJ and_CC if_IN there_EX are_VBP no_DT complications_NNS ,_, I_PRP give_VBP my_PRP$ decoction_NN which_WDT I_PRP continue_VBP up_RB to_TO the_DT time_NN of_IN convalescence_NN ,_, and_CC even_RB during_IN convalescence_NN ,_, I_PRP continue_VBP the_DT same_JJ till_IN the_DT patient_NN is_VBZ discharged_VBN ._.
If_IN there_EX are_VBP lung_JJ complications_NNS ,_, I_PRP give_VBP two_CD mixtures_NNS alternately_RB ,_, (_( my_PRP$ decoction_NN and_CC stimulants_NNS )_) with_IN poultice_NN to_TO the_DT chest_NN and_CC back_RB ,_, ice_NN to_TO the_DT head_NN ,_, &_CC c._NN When_WRB there_EX is_VBZ diarrhoea_JJ ,_, I_PRP do_VBP not_RB give_VB my_PRP$ decoction_NN but_CC depend_VBP for_IN a_DT time_NN on_IN Hewlett_NNP 's_POS Pepsin_NNP Mixture_NNP with_IN stimulants_NNS ,_, and_CC when_WRB the_DT diarrha_NN has_VBZ ceased_VBN ,_, I_PRP continue_VBP either_DT my_PRP$ decoction_NN or_CC stimulants_NNS according_VBG to_TO the_DT symptoms_NNS present_JJ ,_, if_IN the_DT pulse_NN is_VBZ failing_VBG I_PRP give_VBP a_DT subcutaneous_JJ injection_NN of_IN Ether_NNP ,_, Digitalis_NNP and_CC Strychni_NNP ._.
Lustig_NNP 's_POS Serum_NN :_: -Two_JJ cases_NNS were_VBD treated_VBN by_IN Dr._NNP Galliote_NNP by_IN Lustig_NNP 's_POS Serum7_NNP both_DT proved_VBD fatal_NN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP the_DT honour_NN to_TO be_VB ,_, Sir_NNP ,_, Your_NNP most_RBS obedient_JJ servant_NN ,_, KHAJHA_NNP ABDULLAH_NNP ,_, L.M.S._NNP ,_, Medical_NNP Officer_NNP in_IN charge_NN ._.
Notes_NNS by_IN the_DT Special_JJ Medi-_NNP cal_JJ Officer_NNP ._.
This_DT Hospital_NNP is_VBZ situated_VBN in_IN a_DT densely_RB crowded_VBN locality_NN and_CC the_DT surroundings_NNS are_VBP very_RB insanitary_JJ ._.
I_PRP must_MD say_VB that_IN I_PRP think_VBP that_IN the_DT place_NN is_VBZ badly_RB situated_VBN for_IN treat-_JJ ment_NN of_IN plague_NN cases_NNS ._.
Nevertheless_RB the_DT Hospital_NNP was_VBD thoroughly_RB well_RB looked_VBN after_IN and_CC the_DT Khojah_NNP Community_NNP have_VBP brought_VBN their_PRP$ sick_NN to_TO Hospital_NNP having_VBG great_JJ faith_NN in_IN the_DT kind_NN way_NN in_IN which_WDT they_PRP were_VBD attended_VBN to_TO by_IN Dr._NNP Khajha_NNP Abdullah_NNP ,_, the_DT Medical_NNP Officer_NNP ._.
The_DT Khojah_NNP Community_NNP has_VBZ suffered_VBN an_DT incalculable_JJ loss_NN in_IN the_DT death_NN of_IN the_DT founder_NN and_CC maintainer_NN of_IN this_DT Hospital_NNP ,_, Khan_NNP Bahadur_NNP Mahomed-_NNP bhoy_NN Ebrahim_NNP ._.
I_PRP frequently_RB visited_VBD this_DT Hospital_NNP and_CC was_VBD always_RB interested_JJ in_IN tha_NN cases_NNS which_WDT I_PRP found_VBD there_RB ._.

The_DT idea_NN to_TO erect_VB a_DT temporary_JJ Plague_NNP Hospital_NNP for_IN the_DT benefit_NN of_IN the_DT inhabitants_NNS of_IN Colaba_NNP ,_, who_WP for_IN the_DT greater_JJR part_NN are_VBP poor_JJ mill_NN operatives_NNS ,_, cartmen_NNS ,_, and_CC domestic_JJ servants_NNS ,_, emanated_VBN from_IN Khan_NNP Saheb_NNP Mahomed_NNP Faridudin_NNP ,_, whose_WP$ intimate_JJ knowledge_NN of_IN local_JJ conditions_NNS ,_, and_CC close_RB touch_JJ with_IN the_DT various_JJ communities_NNS at_IN Colaba_NNP ,_, had_VBD forced_VBN upon_IN him_PRP the_DT conclusion_NN ,_, that_IN the_DT only_JJ means_VBZ to_TO instil_VB entire_JJ confidence_NN into_IN the_DT then_RB terror-striken_JJ minds_NNS of_IN the_DT people_NNS would_MD be_VB the_DT erection_NN of_IN a_DT hospital_NN ,_, thrown_JJ open_JJ to_TO all_DT creeds_NNS ,_, castes_NNS ,_, and_CC conditions_NNS of_IN people_NNS ,_, a_DT hospital_NN ,_, in_IN which_WDT a_DT patient_NN could_MD be_VB attended_VBN by_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ kith_NN and_CC kin_NN ,_, and_CC where_WRB his_PRP$ caste_NN prejudice_NN would_MD not_RB be_VB interfered_VBN with_IN ._.
On_IN his_PRP$ initiative_NN the_DT Colaba_NNP volunteers_NNS formed_VBD themselves_PRP into_IN a_DT Committee_NNP on_IN the_DT 2nd_CD October_NNP 1898_CD ,_, and_CC were_VBD able_JJ to_TO admit_VB the_DT first_JJ patient_NN into_IN the_DT hospital_NN on_IN the_DT 5th_CD December_NNP 1898_CD ._.
The_DT opening_NN ceremony_NN was_VBD performed_VBN by_IN His_PRP$ Excellency_NN the_DT Governor_NNP on_IN the_DT 23rd_CD December_NNP 1898_CD ,_, who_WP at_IN the_DT desire_NN of_IN the_DT Committee_NNP named_VBD the_DT hospital_NN after_IN the_DT then_RB District_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, Lt._NNP H._NNP S._NNP Strong_NNP ,_, the_DT Stuart_NNP Strong_NNP Hospital_NNP ._.

,_, Sweeper_NNP 12_CD 4-_JJ 5-99_JJ 31-_JJ 5-99_CD The_DT hospital_NN consisted_VBD originally_RB of_IN three_CD wards_NNS ,_, dispensary_JJ ,_, nurse_NN 's_POS and_CC hospital_JJ assistant_NN 's_POS The_DT contact_NN huts_NNS have_VBP remained_VBN intact_JJ ,_, while_IN all_PDT the_DT other_JJ buildings_NNS were_VBD gradually_RB pulled_VBN down_RP ,_, in_IN order_NN to_TO make_VB place_NN for_IN more_JJR pucca-built_JJ structures_NNS ,_, as_IN the_DT Committee_NNP realised_VBD ,_, that_IN the_DT hopes_NNS at_IN first_JJ entertained_VBN of_IN a_DT gradual_JJ dying_VBG out_IN of_IN the_DT Plague_NNP during_IN the_DT year_NN would_MD not_RB be_VB fulfilled_VBN ,_, and_CC that_IN there_EX would_MD be_VB in_IN all_DT probability_NN need_NN of_IN a_DT hos-_JJ pital_NN again_RB after_IN the_DT monsoon_NN ._.
It_PRP must_MD be_VB remembered_VBN ,_, that_IN the_DT structures_NNS erected_VBN by_IN Mr._NNP Vithal_NNP Sayana_NNP were_VBD only_RB meant_VBN for_IN temporary_JJ occupation_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT mon-_JJ soon_RB would_MD of_IN course_NN destroy_VB them_PRP ._.
The_DT contact_NN huts_VBZ also_RB ,_, were_VBD not_RB built_VBN to_TO stand_VB the_DT monsoon_NN ,_, but_CC it_PRP was_VBD not_RB thought_VBN necessary_JJ to_TO renew_VB them_PRP ,_, as_IN the_DT present_JJ accommoda-_JJ tion_NN will_MD be_VB found_VBN sufficient_JJ for_IN patients_NNS and_CC contacts_NNS ,_, should_MD the_DT hospital_NN have_VBP to_TO be_VB re-opened_JJ during_IN the_DT monsoon_NN ,_, and_CC as_IN it_PRP will_MD not_RB be_VB a_DT very_RB difficult_JJ ,_, nor_CC expensive_JJ matter_NN ,_, to_TO put_VB the_DT contact_NN huts_VBZ in_IN order_NN again_RB after_IN the_DT monsoon_NN ._.

I_PRP attach_VBP a_DT list_NN of_IN donors_NNS and_CC amounts_NNS ,_, subscribed_VBD to_TO the_DT Building_NNP fund_NN ,_, as_RB well_RB as_IN a_DT balance_NN sheet_NN ,_, and_CC I_PRP again_RB beg_VBP to_TO place_VB on_IN record_NN the_DT Committee_NNP 's_POS sincere_JJ thanks_NNS for_IN these_DT handsome_JJ donations_NNS ._.
I_PRP also_RB beg_VBP to_TO thank_VB Khan_NNP Bahadur_NNP Sirdar_NNP Mir_NNP Abdul_NNP Ali_NNP ,_, Chief_NNP of_IN the_DT Criminal_NNP Investigation_NNP Department_NNP ,_, for_IN the_DT great_JJ interest_NN he_PRP has_VBZ taken_VBN in_IN the_DT work_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ the_DT Sirdar_NNP ,_, who_WP was_VBD almost_RB solely_RB instrumental_JJ in_IN collecting_VBG the_DT subscriptions_NNS and_CC to_TO whose_WP$ untiring_JJ energy_NN the_DT erection_NN of_IN the_DT buildings_NNS is_VBZ due_JJ ._.
The_DT latrines_NNS were_VBD built_VBN by_IN the_DT Committee_NNP with_IN materials_NNS ,_, lent_NN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN by_IN the_DT Municipality_NNP ._.
They_PRP have_VBP corrugated_VBN iron_NN sides_NNS and_CC roof_NN ,_, and_CC 5_CD seats_NNS built_VBN over_IN a_DT cement_NN flooring_NN ._.
The_DT pans_NNS into_IN which_WDT the_DT excreta_NN were_VBD deposited_VBN ,_, were_VBD regularly_RB cleaned_VBN out_RP by_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP Conservancy_NNP corps_VBD as_IN was_VBD also_RB the_DT cesspool_NN ._.
Both_DT latrines_NNS and_CC cesspool_NN were_VBD daily_RB disinfected_VBN under_IN the_DT supervision_NN of_IN the_DT Hospital_NNP Assistant_NNP ,_, or_CC Clerk_NNP ._.
The_DT dead_JJ house_NN is_VBZ now_RB pulled_VBN down_RP ,_, having_VBG only_RB been_VBN a_DT temporary_JJ concern_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT two_CD washing_NN platforms_NNS and_CC cesspool_NN which_WDT were_VBD constructed_VBN in_IN a_DT very_RB thorough_JJ manner_NN ,_, and_CC thickly_RB coated_VBN with_IN cement_NN ,_, are_VBP now_RB in_IN as_RB good_JJ a_DT state_NN as_IN at_IN the_DT begin-_JJ ning_NN and_CC the_DT Committee_NNP will_MD only_RB require_VB to_TO rebuild_VB the_DT mortuary_NN when_WRB necessary_JJ ._.
The_DT patients_NNS '_POS clothes_NNS as_RB soon_RB as_IN they_PRP were_VBD removed_VBN from_IN their_PRP$ person_NN were_VBD hand-_JJ ed_NN over_IN to_TO the_DT sweepers_NNS ,_, who_WP washed_VBD them_PRP in_IN a_DT strong_JJ solution_NN of_IN Hydrargyri_NNP Per-_NNP chloride_NN ,_, after_IN which_WDT they_PRP were_VBD rinsed_VBN in_IN cold_JJ water_NN and_CC hung_VBD up_RB to_TO dry_VB ._.
They_PRP were_VBD then_RB collected_VBN in_IN a_DT room_NN ,_, whence_NN the_DT Dhobie_NNP had_VBD to_TO remove_VB them_PRP in_IN order_NN to_TO wash_VB them_PRP thoroughly_RB ._.
I_PRP may_MD add_VB ,_, that_IN the_DT clothes_NNS before_IN being_VBG rinsed_VBN were_VBD allowed_VBN to_TO remain_VB in_IN the_DT Corrosive_NNP sublimate_NN solution_NN for_IN about_RB 12_CD hours_NNS ._.
Additional_JJ disinfec-_JJ tion_NN in_IN the_DT steam_NN disinfector_NN would_MD no_RB doubt_VB have_VB been_VBN an_DT extra_JJ safeguard_NN ,_, but_CC this_DT was_VBD not_RB possible_JJ as_IN our_PRP$ stock_NN of_IN clothing_NN would_MD not_RB allow_VB of_IN the_DT delay_NN ,_, which_WDT would_MD necessarily_RB have_VB followed_VBN such_PDT a_DT proceeding_NN ._.
The_DT water-supply_NN was_VBD derived_VBN from_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP main_JJ ,_, a_DT special_JJ connection_NN having_VBG been_VBN supplied_VBN for_IN this_DT purpose_NN by_IN the_DT Municipality_NNP ._.
As_RB far_RB as_IN I_PRP can_MD judge_VB ,_, the_DT water-supply_NN has_VBZ at_IN all_DT times_NNS been_VBN sufficient_JJ for_IN all_DT requirements_NNS ._.
The_DT wards_NNS were_VBD daily_RB disinfected_VBN by_IN means_NNS of_IN Perchloride_NNP and_CC Carbolic_NNP acid_VBP so-_JJ lution_NN ._.
Whenever_WRB a_DT patient_NN caused_VBD a_DT mess_NN on_IN the_DT floor_NN ,_, this_DT was_VBD at_IN once_RB covered_VBN with_IN Carbolic_NNP Acid_NNP or_CC Sanitas_NNP Powder_NNP ,_, and_CC removed_VBD when_WRB the_DT spot_NN was_VBD immediately_RB disin-_JJ fected_VBN with_IN solution_NN ._.
The_DT floor_NN and_CC walls_NNS were_VBD whitewashed_VBN as_RB often_RB as_IN was_VBD possible_JJ ,_, at_IN least_JJS however_RB once_RB a_DT week_NN ._.
On_IN a_DT death_NN occurring_NN ,_, the_DT patient_NN was_VBD immediately_RB wrapped_VBN up_RP in_IN a_DT sheet_NN ,_, previ-_JJ ously_RB soaked_VBN in_IN a_DT strong_JJ solution_NN of_IN Perchloride_NNP ._.
The_DT body_NN was_VBD then_RB removed_VBN on_IN its_PRP$ cot_NN to_TO the_DT mortuary_NN ,_, where_WRB it_PRP was_VBD drenched_VBN in_IN a_DT solution_NN of_IN Perchloride_NNP ._.
The_DT rela-_JJ tives_NNS of_IN the_DT deceased_VBN were_VBD then_RB at_IN once_RB notified_VBN ,_, provided_VBN they_PRP were_VBD known_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT body_NN was_VBD handed_VBN to_TO them_PRP for_IN immediate_JJ removal_NN either_CC at_IN once_RB ,_, or_CC ,_, if_IN the_DT death_NN occurred_VBD during_IN the_DT night_NN ,_, at_IN daybreak_JJ next_JJ morning_NN ._.
The_DT body_NN was_VBD generally_RB washed_VBN by_IN the_DT relatives_NNS on_IN the_DT washing_NN platform_NN ,_, for_IN which_WDT purpose_VBP a_DT plentiful_JJ supply_NN of_IN disinfectants_NNS was_VBD always_RB at_IN their_PRP$ disposal_NN ._.
The_DT usual_JJ funeral_JJ rites_NNS were_VBD then_RB allowed_VBN to_TO be_VB performed_VBN and_CC the_DT body_NN removed_VBD ._.
After_IN this_DT ,_, the_DT sheet_NN ,_, if_IN the_DT case_NN was_VBD not_RB of_IN a_DT very_RB virulent_JJ nature_NN ,_, was_VBD immersed_VBN in_IN a_DT strong_JJ corrosive_JJ sublimate_NN solution_NN ,_, and_CC ?_. 240_CD the_DT cot_NN was_VBD carefully_RB brushed_VBN down_RP with_IN the_DT same_JJ disinfectant_NN ,_, and_CC both_DT were_VBD allowed_VBN to_TO dry_VB in_IN the_DT sun_NN ._.
The_DT cot_NN was_VBD generally_RB allowed_VBN to_TO remain_VB at_IN least_JJS three_CD days_NNS in_IN the_DT sun_NN ,_, before_IN being_VBG used_VBN again_RB ._.
The_DT sheet_NN ,_, after_IN having_VBG been_VBN 12_CD hours_NNS in_IN the_DT disinfec-_JJ tant_JJ solution_NN ,_, and_CC having_VBG thoroughly_RB dried_VBN in_IN the_DT sun_NN ,_, was_VBD handed_VBN over_IN to_TO the_DT dhobie_NN ._.
If_IN the_DT case_NN was_VBD of_IN a_DT virulent_JJ nature_NN the_DT sheet_NN was_VBD burned_VBN ._.
If_IN a_DT patient_NN whose_WP$ relations_NNS could_MD not_RB be_VB found_VBN died_JJ ,_, his_PRP$ body_NN was_VBD handed_VBN over_IN to_TO the_DT Paltan_NNP Road_NNP Department_NNP ,_, whence_NN a_DT cart_NN was_VBD sent_VBN to_TO take_VB the_DT body_NN away_RB to_TO be_VB burned_VBN or_CC interred_VBN ,_, according_VBG to_TO the_DT religion_NN or_CC sect_NN of_IN the_DT deceased_VBN ._.
No_DT cases_NNS in_IN which_WDT Professor_NNP Haffkine_NNP 's_POS serum_NN had_VBD previously_RB been_VBN employed_VBN have_VBP come_VBN under_IN the_DT notice_NN of_IN the_DT Hospital_NNP Authorities_NNPS ._.
In_IN fact_NN ,_, inoculation_NN has_VBZ not_RB to_TO my_PRP$ knowledge_NN been_VBN practised_VBN at_IN Colaba_NNP ._.
I_PRP beg_VBP to_TO refer_VB to_TO some_DT suggestions_NNS I_PRP took_VBD the_DT liberty_NN to_TO make_VB on_IN this_DT point_NN during_IN last_JJ season_NN ._.
No_DT death_NN has_VBZ occurred_VBN amongst_IN the_DT members_NNS of_IN the_DT Staff_NNP ,_, though_IN several_JJ cases_NNS of_IN suspicious_JJ fever_NN have_VBP been_VBN registered_VBN ,_, all_DT of_IN which_WDT yielded_VBD to_TO immediate_VB radical_JJ treatment_NN ,_, The_DT Head-nurse_NNP had_VBD a_DT narrow_JJ escape_NN on_IN one_CD occasion_NN ,_, when_WRB in_IN the_DT execution_NN of_IN her_PRP$ duty_NN she_PRP inadvertently_RB had_VBD her_PRP hand_NN scratched_VBN by_IN the_DT breaking_NN of_IN an_DT enema_NN syringe_NN ,_, the_DT patient_NN at_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN scalding_VBG her_PRP$ with_IN urine_NN ._.
Though_IN disinfection_NN was_VBD immediately_RB resorted_VBN to_TO ,_, and_CC the_DT Head-nurse_NNP took_VBD medicine_JJ im-_JJ mediately_RB ,_, signs_NNS of_IN plague_NN showed_VBD themselves_PRP within_IN 24_CD hours_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT fact_NN that_IN no_DT serious_JJ consequences_NNS followed_VBD ,_, is_VBZ due_JJ to_TO the_DT speedy_JJ application_NN of_IN energetic_JJ measures_NNS ._.
Some_DT of_IN the_DT sweepers_NNS have_VBP from_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN suffered_VBN with_IN mumps_NNS ,_, aggravated_VBN by_IN fever_NN ,_, but_CC none_NN of_IN these_DT cases_NNS were_VBD serious_JJ enough_RB to_TO merit_VB special_JJ notice_NN ._.

Males_NNS 9_CD 4_CD 5_CD 444_CD Females_NNS 7_CD 6_CD 1_CD 857_CD Children_NNP Note.-Pneumonia_NNP supervened_VBD invariably_RB after_IN the_DT appearance_NN of_IN the_DT Buboes_NNP ._.
Symptoms_NNS and_CC Character_NNP ._.
The_DT usual_JJ glands_NNS affected_VBN are_VBP the_DT femoral_JJ ,_, inguinal_JJ axillary_NN and_CC cervical_JJ regions_NNS ._.
The_DT swellings_NNS consist_NN of_IN single_JJ glands_NNS ,_, chain_NN of_IN glands_NNS or_CC two_CD or_CC more_JJR separate_JJ glands_NNS ._.
The_DT glands_NNS subside_NN and_CC generally_RB disappear_VBP or_CC suppurate_VBP and_CC burst_NN ._.
Medical_JJ Treatment_NNP ._.
As_IN regards_NNS the_DT steam_NN bath_NN treatment_NN ,_, I_PRP may_MD say_VB that_IN ,_, out_IN of_IN 15_CD patients_NNS taken_VBN numerically_RB as_IN they_PRP were_VBD admitted_VBN ,_, 3_CD recovered_VBD and_CC 12_CD died_VBD ._.
The_DT wet_JJ packing_NN treatment_NN was_VBD adopted_VBN in_IN 35_CD patients_NNS ,_, out_IN of_IN which_WDT 12_CD recovered_VBD ._.
The_DT cases_NNS were_VBD not_RB selected_VBN but_CC were_VBD also_RB taken_VBN numerically_RB as_IN they_PRP were_VBD admitted_VBN ._.
The_DT period_NN of_IN incubation_NN varied_VBN in_IN different_JJ cases_NNS ._.
From_IN information_NN and_CC his-_JJ tory_NN of_IN the_DT patient_NN ,_, it_PRP was_VBD found_VBN that_IN the_DT incubation_NN varied_VBD from_IN 3_CD to_TO 10_CD days_NNS ._.
True_JJ copies_NNS of_IN typical_JJ chart_NN of_IN an_DT interesting_JJ acute_NN case_NN with_IN multiple_JJ buboes_NNS and_CC Secondary_NNP pneumonia_NN ending_VBG in_IN recovery_NN and_CC a_DT whole_JJ case_NN with_IN full_JJ notes_NNS and_CC charts_NNS of_IN a_DT Primary_NNP Plague_NNP Pneumonia_NNP seen_VBN and_CC bacteriologically_RB examined_VBN ,_, and_CC injected_VBD with_IN Roux_NNP 's_POS serum_NN by_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Commissioners_NNP ,_, have_VBP been_VBN herewith_JJ annexed_NN ._.
Character_NNP and_CC situation_NN of_IN Buboes_NNP ._.
Circumscribed_NNP or_CC spreading_NN ,_, or_CC conglomerated_VBN ,_, hard_JJ and_CC painful_JJ single_JJ or_CC multi-_JJ ple_NN buboes_NNS are_VBP found_VBN generally_RB in_IN the_DT cervical_JJ ,_, axillary_JJ ,_, femoral_JJ and_CC inguinal_JJ regions_NNS ._.
These_DT buboes_NNS may_MD appear_VB either_CC at_IN the_DT onset_NN or_CC within_IN six_CD or_CC eight_CD days_NNS ._.
The_DT most_RBS fatal_JJ form_NN of_IN buboes_NNS under_IN my_PRP$ observation_NN was_VBD the_DT axillary_JJ one_NN ._.
The_DT convalescence_NN of_IN plague_NN patients_NNS was_VBD often_RB very_RB protracted_JJ ._.
Thirty_NN cases_NNS were_VBD kept_VBN under_IN observation_NN ,_, out_IN of_IN which_WDT 4_CD developed_VBD plague_NN ,_, 7_CD relapsing_NN fever_NN ,_, and_CC others_NNS turned_VBD out_RP ordinary_JJ cases_NNS of_IN fever_NN ._.
Only_RB one_CD case_NN was_VBD subjected_VBN to_TO the_DT treatment_NN by_IN the_DT curative_JJ serum_NN of_IN Roux_NNP ,_, full_JJ particulars_NNS of_IN which_WDT with_IN its_PRP$ notes_NNS and_CC chart_NN have_VBP been_VBN herewith_JJ sent_NN ._.
SHIVDAS_NNP PARMANANDAS_NNP ,_, Medical_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, Bombay_NNP Port_NNP Trust_NNP ._.

Notes_NNS by_IN the_DT Special_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP ._.
A_DT well-planned_JJ and_CC conducted_JJ hospital_NN for_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN the_DT Dock_NNP labourers_NNS :_: Dr._NNP Parmanandas_NNP took_VBD a_DT great_JJ deal_NN of_IN interest_NN in_IN his_PRP$ work_NN ._.
This_DT Hospital_NNP is_VBZ situated_VBN on_IN open_JJ ground_NN near_IN the_DT Docks_NNP and_CC had_VBD its_PRP$ own_JJ Contact_NNP Camp_NNP near_IN ._.
The_DT interesting_JJ case_NN of_IN Pneumonic_NNP Plague_NNP quoted_VBD was_VBD seen_VBN by_IN Professor_NNP Wright_NNP ._.
I_PRP regret_VBP I_PRP am_VBP unable_JJ to_TO publish_VB the_DT plan_NN of_IN the_DT Hospital_NNP ,_, I_PRP would_MD have_VB done_VBN so_RB had_VBD it_PRP been_VBN on_IN a_DT small_JJ scale_NN ._.

10_CD ._.
Report_NN on_IN the_DT Parel_NNP Sarvajanik_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, Bombay_NNP ,_, from_IN the_DT 16th_CD January_NNP 1899_CD to_TO 2nd_CD June_NNP 1899_CD ._.
History_NN of_IN Hospital_NNP ._.
I_PRP ._.
The_DT Municipality_NNP having_VBG decided_VBD that_IN Government_NNP House_NNP ,_, Parel_NNP ,_, would_MD not_RB be_VB opened_VBN as_IN a_DT hospital_NN ,_, a_DT meeting_NN of_IN the_DT Volunteer_NNP Committees_NNP of_IN F_NNP and_CC G_NNP Wards_NNP was_VBD held_VBN at_IN Government_NNP House_NNP ,_, Parel_NNP ,_, early_RB in_IN November_NNP under_IN the_DT Chairmanship_NNP of_IN Rao_NNP Bahadur_NNP Vassanjee_NNP Khimjee_NNP ,_, J._NNP P._NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT following_JJ resolutions_NNS were_VBD passed_VBN :_: -_: 1_CD ._.
That_IN a_DT private_JJ hospital_NN should_MD be_VB erected_VBN in_IN Government_NNP House_NNP ,_, Parel_NNP Compound_NNP ,_, by_IN voluntary_JJ subscriptions_NNS ,_, provided_VBD that_IN the_DT necessary_JJ sanction_NN be_VB granted_VBN by_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP authorities_NNS ._.
2_CD ._.
That_IN the_DT hospital_NN should_MD be_VB for_IN all_DT castes_NNS and_CC creeds_NNS and_CC should_MD ,_, therefore_VB ,_, be_VB called_VBN ``_`` The_DT Parel_NNP Sarvajanik_NNP Hospital_NNP ._. ''_''
3_CD ._.
That_IN the_DT following_JJ gentlemen_NNS be_VB asked_VBN to_TO act_VB as_IN a_DT Managing_NNP Committee_NNP and_CC to_TO collect_VB subscriptions_NNS :_: -_: Rao_NNP Bahadur_NNP Vassanjee_NNP Khimjee_NNP ,_, J.P._NNP ,_, Chairman_NNP ._.
Mr._NNP A._NNP N._NNP Dalvi_NNP ,_, Member_NNP ._.

Khan_NNP Saheb_NNP Shaik_NNP Adam_NNP Essoof-_NNP bhoy_NN ,_, J.P._NNP ,_, Member_NNP ._.
Mr._NNP Raojee_NNP Raghoonath_NNP ,_, do_VBP ._.
Mr._NNP Adam_NNP Abba_NNP Patel_NNP ,_, do_VBP ._.
4_CD ._.
That_IN the_DT hospital_NN should_MD be_VB for_IN 30_CD beds_NNS for_IN patients_NNS with_IN Office_NNP ,_, Dispensary_NNP ,_, Hospital_NNP Assistant_NNP 's_POS Quarters_NNS and_CC other_JJ necessary_JJ buildings_NNS ._.
The_DT number_NN of_IN beds_NNS was_VBD afterwards_NNS increased_VBD to_TO 84_CD ._.
Hospital_NN opened_VBD ._.
II_NNP ._.
The_DT necessary_JJ sanction_NN for_IN the_DT building_NN of_IN the_DT Hospital_NNP having_VBG been_VBN obtained_VBN and_CC subscriptions_NNS coming_VBG in_IN freely_RB ,_, it_PRP was_VBD ready_JJ for_IN the_DT admittance_NN of_IN patients_NNS by_IN January_NNP 16th_CD ,_, 1899_CD ,_, when_WRB it_PRP was_VBD opened_VBN by_IN SIR_NNP ANDREW_NNP WINGATE_NNP ,_, I.C.S._NNP ,_, Plague_NNP Commissioner_NNP ,_, Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP ._.
Hopitals_NNS closed_VBD ._.
III_NNP ._.
The_DT hospital_NN was_VBD closed_VBN on_IN May_NNP 31st_CD ,_, 1899_CD ,_, and_CC was_VBD finally_RB closed_VBN on_IN June_NNP 2nd_CD ,_, 1899_CD ._.
Staff_NNP ._.
IV_NNP ._.
Dr._NNP G._NNP W._NNP Lewis_NNP ,_, District_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, Central_NNP District_NNP ,_, kindly_RB volun-_JJ teered_VBD his_PRP$ services_NNS as_IN Medical_JJ Officer_NNP to_TO the_DT hospital_NN and_CC was_VBD in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN until_IN it_PRP closed_VBD ._.
The_DT Government_NNP lent_VBD the_DT Committee_NNP the_DT services_NNS of_IN a_DT Lady_NNP Nurse_NNP ._.
Lady_JJ Nurse_NNP Miss_NNP Reynolds_NNP was_VBD on_IN duty_NN in_IN the_DT hospital_NN until_IN being_VBG appointed_VBN to_TO the_DT Indian_JJ Nursing_NNP Service_NNP on_IN 15th_CD April_NNP ,_, when_WRB Lady_NNP Nurse_NNP Miss_NNP Burrows_NNP took_VBD over_RP the_DT duties_NNS ._.
The_DT Committee_NNP wish_NN to_TO express_VB their_PRP$ thanks_NNS to_TO Dr._NNP G._NNP W._NNP Lewis_NNP ,_, Miss_NNP Reynolds_NNP and_CC Miss_NNP Burrows_NNP for_IN their_PRP$ excellent_JJ services_NNS and_CC for_IN the_DT kind_NN way_NN in_IN which_WDT their_PRP$ duties_NNS were_VBD carried_VBN out_RP ._.
The_DT remainder_NN of_IN the_DT staff_NN wore_VBD paid_VBN out_IN of_IN the_DT subscriptions_NNS and_CC was_VBD as_IN under_IN :_: -_: Hospital_NN Assistant_NNP Gangaram_NNP Vithal_NNP ,_, Night_NNP Nurse_NNP Miss_NNP Blanford_NNP ,_, Ward_NNP Boys_NNP 8_CD ,_, Ayahs_NNP 4_CD ,_, Cook_NNP 1_CD ,_, Dhobies_VBZ 2_CD ,_, Swepers_NNP 4_CD ._.
Ground_NN and_CC ridge_NN ventilation_NN was_VBD provided_VBN for_IN in_IN all_PDT the_DT huts_NNS ._.
The_DT partitions_NNS between_IN the_DT rooms_NNS were_VBD about_RB 8_CD ft._JJ high_NN ._.
Separate_JJ cook-rooms_NNS were_VBD provided_VBN for_IN all_DT castes_NNS ._.
The_DT other_JJ buildings_NNS erected_VBN were-Hospital_JJ Assistant_NNP 's_POS Quarters_NNS ,_, Dispensary_NNP ,_, Office_NNP ,_, Washing_NNP and_CC Disinfecting_NNP places_NNS for_IN men_NNS and_CC women_NNS ,_, Dhobi_NNP Ght_NNP ,_, Store_NNP Room_NNP and_CC Police_NNP Chauky_NNP ._.
?_. 252_CD The_DT quarters_NNS that_WDT were_VBD originally_RB meant_VBN for_IN servants_NNS '_POS quarters_NNS were_VBD turned_VBN into_IN a_DT ward_NN and_CC some_DT of_IN the_DT cook-rooms_NNS were_VBD utilized_VBN for_IN the_DT servants_NNS ._.
A_DT plan_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN is_VBZ attached_VBN and_CC shows_VBZ fully_RB the_DT number_NN of_IN wards_NNS and_CC all_DT buildings_NNS ._.
Hospital_NN ._.
V._NNP The_DT most_RBS important_JJ feature_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN was_VBD the_DT provision_NN of_IN a_DT separate_JJ room_NN for_IN each_DT patient_NN ._.
This_DT seems_VBZ specially_RB necessary_JJ in_IN a_DT hospital_NN to_TO which_WDT persons_NNS of_IN all_DT castes_NNS are_VBP admitted_VBN ._.
Some_DT freedom_NN was_VBD given_VBN in_IN allowing_VBG friends_NNS and_CC relatives_NNS to_TO be_VB present_JJ and_CC the_DT patients_NNS always_RB seemed_VBD far_RB happier_JJR ,_, each_DT in_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ room_NN ,_, than_IN in_IN a_DT big_JJ ward_NN where_WRB they_PRP are_VBP constantly_RB exposed_VBN to_TO the_DT sufferings_NNS of_IN others_NNS and_CC the_DT only_RB too_RB frequent_JJ removal_NN of_IN the_DT dead_JJ ._.
Of_IN course_NN ,_, this_DT system_NN considerably_RB increases_VBZ the_DT difficulties_NNS of_IN the_DT nursing_NN staff_NN ,_, but_CC its_PRP$ extremely_RB beneficial_JJ effect_NN to_TO the_DT mental_JJ condition_NN of_IN the_DT patients_NNS ,_, a_DT most_RBS important_JJ point_NN in_IN plague_NN ,_, is_VBZ undoubted_JJ ._.
Conservancy_NN ._.
VI_NNP ._.
There_EX was_VBD one_CD block_NN of_IN latrines_NNS consisting_VBG of_IN five_CD seats_NNS ._.
Two_CD seats_NNS were_VBD reserved_VBN for_IN women_NNS and_CC 3_CD for_IN men_NNS ._.
The_DT building_NN was_VBD of_IN corrugated_JJ iron_NN ._.
The_DT sewage_NN was_VBD removed_VBN by_IN the_DT sweepers_NNS in_IN the_DT ordinary_JJ way_NN and_CC emptied_VBD into_IN a_DT sewage_JJ cart_NN placed_VBN at_IN the_DT outskirts_NNS of_IN Parel_NNP Village_NNP ._.
All_DT clothes_NNS ,_, on_IN being_VBG removed_VBN from_IN the_DT hospital_NN ,_, were_VBD taken_VBN to_TO the_DT outer_NN com-_JJ pound_NN and_CC placed_VBN in_IN large_JJ tubs_NNS filled_VBN with_IN a_DT strong_JJ solution_NN of_IN Phenyle_NNP ;_: after_IN being_VBG soaked_VBN for_IN some_DT time_NN they_PRP were_VBD laid_VBN or_CC hung_VBN out_RP in_IN the_DT sun_NN and_CC then_RB handed_VBD over_RP to_TO the_DT Dhobies_NNPS ._.
Water_NNP supply_NN ._.
VII_NNP ._.
The_DT water_NN was_VBD laid_VBN on_IN from_IN the_DT Vehar_NNP main_JJ by_IN the_DT Water_NNP Department_NNP ._.
VIII_NNP ._.
The_DT principal_NN disinfectant_NN used_VBN was_VBD Carbolic_NNP Powder_NNP which_WDT was_VBD plenti-_JJ fully_RB sprinkled_VBN over_IN all_PDT the_DT floors_NNS in_IN the_DT hospital_NN two_CD or_CC three_CD times_NNS a_DT day_NN ._.
The_DT huts_NNS and_CC floors_NNS were_VBD not_RB lime-washed_JJ ._.
The_DT buildings_NNS being_VBG of_IN matting_VBG with_IN a_DT good_JJ draft_NN of_IN air_NN through_IN them_PRP ,_, it_PRP was_VBD not_RB considered_VBN necessary_JJ to_TO use_VB Perchloride_NNP often_RB ._.
The_DT Steam_NNP Disinfector_NNP was_VBD not_RB used_VBN as_IN it_PRP was_VBD too_RB far_RB off_RP ._.
Disposal_NN of_IN the_DT Dead_NNP ._.
IX_NNP ._.
As_IN a_DT rule_NN the_DT dead_JJ were_VBD removed_VBN by_IN their_PRP$ friends_NNS or_CC relatives_NNS ._.
Unclaimed_JJ bodies_NNS were_VBD removed_VBN in_IN the_DT following_JJ ways_NNS :_: -_: Hindus_NN by_IN Hindu_NNP sweepers_NNS at_IN a_DT cost_NN of_IN Rs_NNP ._.
2_CD per_IN body_NN which_WDT was_VBD paid_VBN out_IN of_IN the_DT Discretional_NNP Relief_NNP Fund_NNP by_IN order_NN of_IN the_DT Chief_NNP Accountant_NNP ._.
Efforts_NNS were_VBD made_VBN to_TO get_VB better_JJR class_NN Hindus_NNP to_TO do_VB this_DT work_NN but_CC it_PRP was_VBD found_VBN to_TO be_VB impossible_JJ ._.
Mahomedans.-These_JJ bodies_NNS were_VBD removed_VBN under_IN arrangements_NNS with_IN a_DT Mulvi_NNP who_WP resides_VBZ near_IN at_IN hand_NN ._.
The_DT cost_NN was_VBD Rs_NNP ._.
10_CD per_IN body_NN and_CC was_VBD paid_VBN in_IN the_DT same_JJ way_NN as_IN for_IN Hindu_NNP bodies_NNS ._.
Christians.-_NNP The_DT Health_NNP Department_NNP was_VBD notified_VBN and_CC they_PRP sent_VBD a_DT hearse_JJ free_JJ of_IN charge_NN and_CC made_VBD all_DT arrangements_NNS ._.
The_DT mortuary_NN was_VBD a_DT small_JJ building_NN containing_VBG 8_CD small_JJ rooms_NNS ,_, each_DT of_IN which_WDT would_MD hold_VB a_DT body_NN ._.
There_EX were_VBD no_DT doors_NNS to_TO this_DT building_NN and_CC plenty_NN of_IN ventilation_NN was_VBD secured_VBN ._.
The_DT ground_NN in_IN the_DT rooms_NNS and_CC all_DT round_NN outside_IN where_WRB the_DT people_NNS prepared_VBD the_DT bodies_NNS for_IN burial_NN was_VBD kept_VBN well_RB disinfected_VBN ._.
The_DT people_NNS were_VBD given_VBN disinfectants_NNS to_TO wash_VB in_IN after_IN handling_VBG the_DT corpse_NN ._.
Personal_JJ Explanation_NN ._.
X_NN ._.
From_IN this_DT point_NN in_IN the_DT report_NN most_JJS of_IN the_DT paras_NNS ,_, are_VBP entirely_RB of_IN a_DT medical_JJ nature_NN and_CC as_IN the_DT Doctor_NNP has_VBZ left_VBN Bombay_NNP I_PRP can_MD only_RB state_NN what_WP I_PRP have_VBP been_VBN able_JJ to_TO gather_VB from_IN the_DT records_NNS ._.
Inoculation_NN ._.
XI_NN ,_, Seven_NNP patients_NNS were_VBD known_VBN to_TO have_VB been_VBN previously_RB inoculated_VBN with_IN Haffkine_NNP 's_POS Serum_NNP ,_, out_IN of_IN these_DT 4_CD died_VBD and_CC 3_CD recovered_VBN ._.
XII_NN ._.
There_EX was_VBD no_DT case_NN of_IN sickness_NN of_IN any_DT sort_NN or_CC kind_NN amongst_IN the_DT staff_NN ._.

Males_NNS 2_CD 2_CD Females_NNS Children_NNP 1_CD 1_CD Buboes.-Percentage_NN of_IN mortality_NN was_VBD the_DT highest_JJS in_IN cases_NNS of_IN axillary_JJ buboes_NNS ,_, (_( the_DT right_NN and_CC left_VBD sides_NNS being_VBG nearly_RB equal_JJ in_IN this_DT respect_NN )_) and_CC it_PRP was_VBD the_DT lowest_JJS in_IN cases_NNS with_IN multiple_JJ buboes_NNS ._.
The_DT axillary_JJ buboes_NNS may_MD ,_, therefore_VB ,_, be_VB said_VBD to_TO be_VB the_DT most_RBS fatal_JJ form_NN ._.
Complication.-In_JJ two_CD cases_NNS pregnancy_NN was_VBD complicated_VBN with_IN an_DT attack_NN of_IN Plague_NNP ,_, one_CD of_IN these_DT ended_VBN fatally_RB ,_, while_IN the_DT other_JJ recovered_JJ ,_, but_CC in_IN neither_DT of_IN them_PRP did_VBD miscarriage_VB occur_NN ._.
?_. 255_CD Fifty-eight_JJ cases_NNS were_VBD kept_VBN under_IN observation_NN ,_, out_IN of_IN these_DT ,_, 5_CD turned_VBD out_RP to_TO be_VB Relapsing_VBG Fever_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT rest_NN of_IN other_JJ diseases_NNS mostly_RB of_IN Remittent_NNP Fever_NNP ,_, and_CC Febri-_NNP ula_NN ,_, a_DT few_JJ were_VBD of_IN Phthisis_NNP ._.
Rao_NNP Bahadur_NNP Vassanji_NNP Khimji_NNP collected_VBD the_DT greater_JJR part_NN of_IN the_DT subscriptions_NNS and_CC it_PRP was_VBD mainly_RB due_JJ to_TO his_PRP$ influence_NN and_CC energy_NN in_IN collecting_VBG subscriptions_NNS that_IN it_PRP was_VBD possible_JJ to_TO maintain_VB the_DT hospital_NN and_CC have_VBP a_DT balance_NN of_IN Rs_NNP ._.
2,000_CD odd_NN in_IN case_NN of_IN future_JJ need_NN ._.
The_DT thanks_NNS of_IN the_DT Committee_NNP are_VBP due_JJ to-_JJ Store_NNP ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, supplies_NNS ._.
The_DT Municipal_NNP authorities_NNS who_WP lent_VBP matting_VBG and_CC bamboos_NN for_IN the_DT erection_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN and_CC also_RB supplied_VBD stores_NNS and_CC medicines_NNS ._.
The_DT Improvement_NNP Trust_NNP who_WP gave_VBD the_DT use_NN of_IN the_DT ground_NN free_JJ of_IN charge_NN ._.
The_DT Government_NNP for_IN the_DT services_NNS of_IN the_DT Lady_NNP Nurses_NNP ._.

P._NNP LEWES_NNP ,_, CAPT._NNP ,_, D._NNP O._NNP G._NNP and_CC F._NNP Wards_NNP ._.
PAREL_NNP ,_, 23rd_CD July_NNP 1899_CD ._.
Notes_NNS by_IN the_DT Special_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP ._.
A_DT most_RBS useful_JJ hospital_NN and_CC one_CD badly_RB required_VBN for_IN the_DT North_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
Rao_NNP Bahadur_NNP Vassanji_NNP Khimji_NNP was_VBD indefatigable_JJ in_IN his_PRP$ endeavours_NN in_IN supervising_VBG and_CC seeing_VBG after_IN the_DT hospital_NN ;_: and_CC the_DT fact_NN that_IN over_IN 600_CD cases_NNS were_VBD treated_VBN and_CC kindly_RB looked_VBD after_IN during_IN 4_CD months_NNS ,_, speaks_NNS for_IN itself_PRP ._.
The_DT situation_NN and_CC general_JJ management_NN of_IN this_DT hospital_NN was_VBD excellent_JJ ._.
No_DT ._.
11_CD ._.
Adamji_NNP Peerbhoy_NNP Borah_NNP ._.
Plague_NNP Hospital_NNP ._.
1_CD ._.
Report_NN on_IN the_DT Adamji_NNP Peerbhoy_NNP Borah_NNP Fever_NNP (_( or_CC Plague_NNP )_) Hospital_NNP ,_, situated_VBD on_IN Queen_NNP 's_POS Road_NNP ,_, Bombay_NNP ,_, from_IN the_DT 1st_CD June_NNP 1898_CD ,_, to_TO the_DT 31st_CD May_NNP 1899_CD ._.
2_CD ._.
The_DT hospital_NN was_VBD founded_VBN for_IN the_DT Borah_NNP community_NN by_IN Mr._NNP Adamji_NNP Peer_NNP bhoy_NN ,_, J._NNP P._NNP It_PRP was_VBD opened_VBN in_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN March_NNP (_( 9th_CD )_) 1897_CD ,_, when_WRB the_DT plague_NN being_VBG properly_RB recognised_VBN ,_, measures_NNS were_VBD formulated_VBN for_IN the_DT removal_NN and_CC treatments_NNS of_IN plague_NN patients_NNS in_IN private_JJ hospitals_NNS ,_, since_IN that_DT time_NN it_PRP had_VBD been_VBN never_RB closed_VBN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ maintained_VBN exclusively_RB by_IN Mr._NNP Adamji_NNP Peerbhoy_NNP ,_, whose_WP$ philanthrophy_NN as_RB well_RB as_IN charity_NN for_IN the_DT members_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ community_NN (_( Borahs_NNP )_) ,_, is_VBZ far_RB and_CC extended_VBN ,_, and_CC whose_WP$ hand_NN is_VBZ ever_RB ready_JJ to_TO render_VB assistance_NN to_TO the_DT poor_JJ ,_, ignorant_JJ Borahs_NNP in_IN edu-_JJ cating_VBG them_PRP in_IN the_DT different_JJ ways_NNS and_CC walks_NNS of_IN life_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN improving_VBG the_DT condition_NN of_IN their_PRP$ families_NNS ._.
In_IN fact_NN ,_, the_DT buildings_NNS ,_, in_IN which_WDT the_DT plague_NN hospital_NN is_VBZ at_IN present_JJ located_VBN with_IN its_PRP$ adjoining_VBG portion_NN constituted_VBD originally_RB a_DT charitable_JJ institution_NN ,_, called_VBD the_DT Borah_NNP sanitarium_NN ,_, designed_VBN for_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN Borah_NNP travellers_NNS and_CC invalids_NNS or_CC convalescents_NNS requiring_VBG change_NN to_TO a_DT healthy_JJ place_NN for_IN the_DT benefit_NN of_IN health_NN ._.
The_DT names_NNS of_IN Committee_NNP looking_VBG after_IN the_DT hospital_NN management_NN are_VBP :_: -_: Adamji_NNP Peerbhoy_NNP ,_, Esq._NNP ,_, J.P._NNP Mahomedbhoy_NNP Adamji_NNP Peerbhoy_NNP ,_, Esq._NNP ,_, J.P._NNP Abdulbhai_NNP Adamji_NNP Peerbhoy_NNP ,_, Esq._NNP ,_, J.P._NNP Khan_NNP Saheb_NNP Hakeem_NNP Dayam_NNP ,_, J.P_NNP ._.
There_EX are_VBP two_CD medical_JJ officers_NNS ._.
One_CD in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN is_VBZ a_DT graduate_NN of_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP University_NNP (_( L._NNP M._NNP and_CC S._NNP )_) by_IN name_NN D._NNP R._NNP Khote_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT other_JJ Khan_NNP Saheb_NNP Abdulla_NNP Hiptoola_NNP Misri_NNP is_VBZ a_DT Hakeem_NNP ,_, knowing_VBG Unani_NNP medicines_NNS ._.
He_PRP resides_VBZ ?_. 256_CD in_IN a_DT room_NN of_IN the_DT convalescent_NN ward_NN ,_, day_NN and_CC night_NN ,_, and_CC works_VBZ as_RB ,_, a_DT resident_JJ officer_NN superintending_VBG the_DT diet_NN and_CC other_JJ necessaries_NNS of_IN plague_NN patients_NNS ._.
The_DT remaining_VBG persons_NNS of_IN the_DT hospital_JJ staff_NN are_VBP :_: Compounder_NN 1_CD (_( and_CC two_CD when_WRB more_JJR work_NN ._. )_)
Clerk_NN ..._: ..._: ..._: 1_CD Nurses_NNS (_( Native_NNP )_) ..._: 2_CD Ward-boy_JJ ..._: 6_CD Sweepers_NNS (_( Bhungee_NNP )_) ..._: 2_CD Male_NNP and_CC female_NN ._.
Cooks_NNP .._VBD 2_CD Gardener_NNP (_( Mallee_NNP )_) ..._: ..._: 1_CD Ramosee_NNP ,_, Bhaya_NNP ..._: ..._: 1_CD Dhobie_NNP ..._: 1_CD Servant_NNP (_( to_TO keep_VB the_DT hospital_JJ clean_NN )_) ..._: 1_CD There_EX are_VBP no_DT donations_NNS to_TO the_DT hospital_NN ._.
Mr._NNP Adamji_NNP is_VBZ willing_JJ to_TO carry_VB out_RP the_DT expenses_NNS of_IN the_DT hospital_NN himself_PRP ._.
3_CD ._.
The_DT hospital_NN buildings_NNS are_VBP situated_VBN on_IN Queen_NNP 's_POS Road_NNP ,_, just_RB opposite_JJ Churney_NNP Road_NNP Station_NNP facing_VBG the_DT sea_NN ._.
As_IN already_RB stated_VBN ,_, these_DT buildings_NNS form_VBP two-thirds_NNS of_IN the_DT sanitarium_NN ,_, converted_VBN into_IN hospital_NN for_IN plague_NN purposes_NNS ._.
The_DT sanitarium_NN ,_, opened_VBN at_IN a_DT great_JJ expense_NN by_IN Mr._NNP Adamji_NNP from_IN pure_JJ motives_NNS of_IN charity_NN to_TO his_PRP$ own_JJ sect_NN ,_, is_VBZ built_VBN upon_IN the_DT best_JJS sanitary_JJ principles_NNS as_IN regards_NNS free_JJ and_CC thorough_JJ ventilation_NN of_IN the_DT buildings_NNS on_IN all_DT sides_NNS and_CC of_IN each_DT of_IN the_DT rooms_NNS constituting_VBG it_PRP ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ divided_VBN into_IN three_CD parts_NNS or_CC buildings_NNS ,_, each_DT being_VBG separated_VBN from_IN the_DT other_JJ by_IN a_DT very_RB broad_JJ open_JJ passage_NN leading_VBG to_TO the_DT Queen_NNP 's_POS Road_NNP ._.
Each_DT building_NN consists_VBZ of_IN a_DT ground_NN floor_NN and_CC a_DT first_JJ floor_NN with_IN a_DT wide_JJ extensive_JJ verandah_NN serving_VBG as_IN a_DT roof_NN ._.
Its_PRP$ plinth_NN is_VBZ considerably_RB high_JJ and_CC it_PRP has_VBZ a_DT small_JJ verandah_NN on_IN the_DT ground_NN floor_NN on_IN the_DT side_NN of_IN the_DT sea_NN ._.
It_PRP consists_VBZ both_DT on_IN the_DT ground_NN and_CC first_JJ floors_NNS of_IN two_CD rows_NNS of_IN rooms_NNS with_IN a_DT wide_JJ ,_, free_JJ open_JJ passage_NN between_IN them_PRP ._.
The_DT rooms_NNS are_VBP large_JJ ,_, commodious_JJ ,_, thoroughly_RB exposed_VBN to_TO the_DT fresh_JJ sea-breeze_NN and_CC to_TO the_DT benign_JJ rays_NNS of_IN the_DT sun_NN ._.
Their_PRP$ walls_NNS and_CC floor_NN are_VBP pucca_JJ chunam-built_JJ ._.
Each_DT room_NN has_VBZ two_CD large_JJ ,_, wide_JJ windows_NNS with_IN shutters_NNS and_CC a_DT door_NN or_CC two_CD of_IN such_JJ good_JJ height_NN and_CC width_NN ,_, and_CC so_RB built_JJ that_IN the_DT air_NN passes_VBZ very_RB freely_RB and_CC unopposed_JJ in_IN and_CC out_IN and_CC is_VBZ conveyed_VBN to_TO all_PDT the_DT parts_NNS of_IN the_DT room_NN ._.
The_DT rooms_NNS on_IN the_DT side_NN of_IN the_DT sea_NN (_( 8_CD in_IN number_NN )_) are_VBP greater_JJR in_IN area_NN than_IN those_DT of_IN the_DT opposite_JJ side_NN ,_, (_( 7_CD in_IN number_NN )_) but_CC all_DT of_IN them_PRP are_VBP large_JJ in_IN all_DT their_PRP$ dimensions_NNS ._.
Each_DT room_NN on_IN the_DT side_NN of_IN the_DT sea_NN can_MD hold_VB two_CD or_CC three_CD patients_NNS (_( large_JJ three_CD ,_, and_CC small_JJ two_CD )_) ,_, with_IN perfect_JJ freedom_NN and_CC great_JJ convenience_NN ,_, while_IN one_CD ,_, on_IN the_DT other_JJ side_NN ,_, can_MD accommodate_VB one_CD patient_NN with_IN ease_NN and_CC comfort_NN ._.
Added_VBN to_TO these_DT buildings_NNS is_VBZ a_DT mosque_NN for_IN devotional_JJ purposes_NNS ._.
The_DT portion_NN next_IN to_TO the_DT mosque_NN is_VBZ kept_VBN for_IN hospital_NN use_NN as_IN a_DT ward_NN for_IN acute_JJ cases_NNS ._.
The_DT first_JJ floor_NN of_IN the_DT middle_JJ building_NN is_VBZ utilised_VBN as_IN a_DT convalescent_NN ward_NN ,_, while_IN the_DT rooms_NNS on_IN the_DT ground_NN floor_NN are_VBP used_VBN for_IN contacts_NNS ._.
On_IN the_DT back_NN of_IN these_DT buildings_NNS is_VBZ an_DT open_JJ ,_, wide_JJ compound_NN in_IN one_CD corner_NN of_IN which_WDT ,_, behind_IN the_DT mosque_NN ,_, are_VBP situated_VBN 6_CD rooms_NNS ._.
They_PRP serve_VBP as_IN kitchen_NN and_CC store_NN rooms_NNS ._.
Behind_IN the_DT compound_NN is_VBZ an_DT old_JJ Borah_NNP mortuary_MD not_RB now_RB in_IN use_NN ._.
There_EX is_VBZ a_DT well_RB and_CC a_DT garden_NN in_IN the_DT hospital_NN compound_NN ._.
There_EX is_VBZ accommodation_NN made_VBN for_IN Dhobies_NNS to_TO wash_VB hospital_NN clothes_NNS close_RB to_TO the_DT hospital_NN ._.
There_EX are_VBP small_JJ tanks_NNS built_VBN for_IN storing_VBG up_RP water_NN ,_, there_EX are_VBP also_RB water_NN pipes_NNS ._.
Dispensary.-The_JJ two_CD rooms_NNS on_IN the_DT first_JJ floor_NN of_IN the_DT ward_NN for_IN acute_JJ cases_NNS are_VBP made_VBN use_NN of_IN as_IN Dispensary_NNP and_CC Medical_NNP Officer_NNP 's_POS room_NN ._.
Dispensary_NNP contains_NNS European_JJ medicines_NNS and_CC ordinary_JJ surgical_JJ appliances_NNS and_CC instruments_NNS ._.
The_DT servants_NNS (_( ward-boys_JJ )_) ,_, after_IN work_NN ,_, retire_NN to_TO rest_VB on_IN the_DT open_JJ verandah_NN above_IN the_DT first_JJ floor_NN of_IN the_DT building_NN ._.
They_PRP have_VBP no_DT separate_JJ quarters_NNS for_IN them_PRP ._.
They_PRP are_VBP fed_VBN at_IN the_DT expense_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN in_IN the_DT hospital_NN compound_NN ._.
The_DT gardener_NN ,_, how-_JJ ever_RB ,_, has_VBZ wooden-built_JJ quarters_NNS allotted_VBN to_TO him_PRP ._.
257_CD Contact_NNP sheds_NNS are_VBP pucca-built_JJ rooms_NNS on_IN the_DT ground_NN floor_NN of_IN the_DT middle_JJ building_NN ._.
The_DT number_NN occupying_VBG them_PRP was_VBD 210_CD ._.
4_CD ._.
The_DT latrines_NNS are_VBP situated_VBN between_IN the_DT rooms_NNS (_( but_CC at_IN a_DT distance_NN behind_IN them_PRP ,_, )_) on_IN the_DT side_NN not_RB facing_VBG the_DT sea_NN ._.
They_PRP are_VBP two_CD on_IN the_DT ground_NN floor_NN and_CC two_CD on_IN the_DT first_JJ floor_NN both_DT in_IN acute_NN and_CC convalescent_NN wards_NNS ._.
They_PRP are_VBP large_JJ ,_, pucca-built_JJ ,_, well-_JJ ventilated_VBN ,_, kept_VBD always_RB clean_JJ by_IN resident_NN sweepers_NNS ,_, and_CC thoroughly_RB disinfected_VBN by_IN phenyle_JJ solution_NN ._.
The_DT excreta_NN (_( motions_NNS )_) of_IN plague_NN patients_NNS as_RB well_RB as_IN urine_NN ,_, vomit_NN ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, are_VBP carried_VBN immediately_RB by_IN sweepers_NNS in_IN tin_NN or_CC earthen_NN chatties_NNS ._.
They_PRP are_VBP previously_RB washed_VBN either_RB with_IN iodine_NN or_CC phenyle_JJ solution_NN ,_, and_CC sprinkled_VBD over_RP inside_IN with_IN carbolic_JJ powder_NN ._.
The_DT excreta_NN ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, are_VBP thrown_VBN into_IN the_DT latrines_NNS which_WDT are_VBP then_RB well-cleaned_JJ with_IN water_NN and_CC thoroughly_RB disinfected_VBN with_IN phenyle_NN or_CC carbolic_NN or_CC permanganate_NN of_IN potash_JJ solution_NN ._.
Sewage_NN and_CC sullage_NN are_VBP carried_VBN by_IN underground_JJ drains_NNS ._.
There_EX are_VBP four_CD seats_NNS in_IN the_DT acute_NN cases_NNS ward_RB and_CC four_CD in_IN convalescent_NN ward_NN and_CC contact_NN sheds_NNS ._.
As_IN regards_NNS disinfection_NN of_IN clothes_NNS by_IN sweepers_NNS previous_JJ to_TO washing_VBG by_IN Dhobies_NNP ,_, the_DT clothes_NNS are_VBP first_JJ dipped_JJ and_CC well-washed_JJ with_IN phenyle_JJ solution_NN or_CC perchloride_NN of_IN Hg_NNP ._.
solution_NN ;_: then_RB they_PRP are_VBP exposed_VBN to_TO the_DT sun_NN and_CC dried_VBN and_CC afterwards_NNS given_VBN tp_JJ Dhobies_NNS ._.
5_CD ._.
Water-supply_NNP is_VBZ from_IN the_DT pipe_NN ._.
6_CD ._.
The_DT wards_NNS and_CC other_JJ buildings_NNS are_VBP first_RB wetted_VBN with_IN perchloride_NN of_IN mercury_NN solution_NN (_( 1_CD in_IN 1,000_CD )_) ._.
Then_RB they_PRP are_VBP exposed_VBN to_TO the_DT sun_NN and_CC allowed_VBN to_TO dry_VB ._.
They_PRP are_VBP afterwards_NNS swept_VBD properly_RB ._.
The_DT walls_NNS and_CC floor_NN are_VBP then_RB lime-washed_JJ ,_, and_CC carbolic_JJ powder_NN is_VBZ thrown_VBN about_IN here_RB and_CC there_RB ._.
Clothes_NNS were_VBD never_RB sent_VBN to_TO the_DT Steam_NNP Disinfector_NNP ._.
Phenyle_NNP ,_, carbolic_NN ,_, iodine_NN or_CC permanganate_NN of_IN potash_JJ solutions_NNS were_VBD used_VBN for_IN washing_VBG away_RB any_DT portion_NN of_IN the_DT room_NN soiled_VBD with_IN foul_JJ excretions_NNS or_CC dirt_NN ._.
7_CD ._.
Dead_JJ bodies_NNS are_VBP carried_VBN in_IN a_DT coffin_NN to_TO the_DT Borah_NNP Cemetery_NNP ,_, situated_VBD rather_RB behind_IN ,_, but_CC more_JJR on_IN the_DT left_JJ side_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN ._.
Bodies_NNS are_VBP besmeared_VBN with_IN camphor_NN and_CC other_JJ solutions_NNS holding_VBG some_DT incense_NN ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, in_IN accordance_NN with_IN the_DT usual_JJ Borah_NNP practice_NN of_IN disposing_VBG of_IN the_DT dead_JJ bodies_NNS ._.
The_DT mortuary_NN is_VBZ a_DT large_JJ ,_, open_JJ and_CC wide_JJ space_NN behind_IN ,_, but_CC at_IN a_DT sufficient_JJ good_JJ distance_NN from_IN the_DT hospital_NN ._.
Pauper_NNP patients_NNS after_IN death_NN were_VBD buried_VBN ,_, like_IN other_JJ ordinary_JJ burials_NNS ,_, at_IN the_DT expense_NN of_IN Mr._NNP Adamji_NNP Peerbhoy_NNP ._.
8_CD ._.
No_DT inoculation_NN was_VBD reported_VBN to_TO have_VB been_VBN done_VBN previous_JJ to_TO admissions_NNS ,_, except_IN in_IN a_DT case_NN of_IN a_DT Mahomedan_NNP male_NN ,_, aged_VBD 20_CD ,_, who_WP had_VBD come_VBN to_TO hospital_VB from_IN Dharavi_NNP ._.
He_PRP was_VBD inoculated_VBN (_( but_CC not_RB in_IN full_JJ dose_NN )_) before_IN he_PRP was_VBD attacked_VBN ._.
The_DT date_NN of_IN the_DT ino-_JJ culation_NN could_MD not_RB be_VB obtained_VBN ._.
His_PRP$ attack_NN ended_VBD fatally_RB after_IN four_CD days_NNS ._.
His_PRP$ name_NN was_VBD Bahadur_NNP Khan_NNP Jeeva_NNP Khan_NNP ._.
He_PRP was_VBD admitted_VBN on_IN 6th_CD November_NNP 1898_CD at_IN 10_CD A._NN M._NNP ,_, and_CC he_PRP died_VBD on_IN 10th_CD November_NNP at_IN 3_CD P._NNP M._NNP His_PRP$ left_VBD parotid_NN gland_NN was_VBD enlarged_VBN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD informed_VBN that_IN he_PRP was_VBD attacked_VBN four_CD days_NNS before_IN his_PRP$ admission_NN ._.
He_PRP was_VBD once_RB in_IN the_DT hospital_NN on_IN 25th_CD August_NNP 1898_CD ,_, and_CC was_VBD discharged_VBN cured_VBN after_IN 36_CD days_NNS on_IN 1st_CD October_NNP 1898_CD ._.
The_DT enlarged_JJ gland_NN was_VBD in_IN the_DT left_NN loin_NN ._.
9_CD ._.
There_EX was_VBD no_DT sickness_NN or_CC mortality_NN in_IN the_DT regular_JJ staff_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN ._.
Amongst_NNP contacts_NNS ,_, there_EX was_VBD an_DT attack_NN three_CD days_NNS after_IN admission_NN of_IN a_DT female_JJ patient_NN ,_, aged_VBD 1_CD 4_CD ._.
The_DT attacked_JJ person_NN was_VBD a_DT male_NN ,_, aged_VBD 40_CD ,_, by_IN name_NN Rajbhai_NNP ._.
He_PRP was_VBD the_DT father_NN of_IN the_DT above_NN mentioned_VBD female_NN ._.
The_DT daughter_NN had_VBD developed_VBN multiple_NN buboes_NNS ,_, but_CC she_PRP recovered_VBD while_IN the_DT father_NN died_VBD on_IN the_DT fifth_JJ day_NN of_IN the_DT attack_NN ._.

12_CD Report_NNP on_IN the_DT Hindu_NNP Fever_NNP (_( Plague_NNP )_) Hospital_NNP ,_, Bombay_NNP ,_, from_IN 20th_CD February_NNP 1899_CD to_TO 31st_CD May_NNP 1899_CD ._.

History_NN of_IN the_DT foundation_NN of_IN the_DT Hospital_NNP ._.
The_DT Hospital_NNP was_VBD opened_VBN on_IN the_DT 28th_CD January_NNP 1897_CD ._.
It_PRP came_VBD into_IN existence_NN as_IN the_DT outcome_NN of_IN the_DT efforts_NNS of_IN a_DT meeting_NN of_IN leading_VBG Hindu_NNP gentlemen_NNS ,_, held_VBD on_IN the_DT 13th_CD January_NNP ,_, at_IN the_DT house_NN of_IN Mr._NNP Tribhuwandas_NNP Mangaldas_NNP Nathubhai_NNP ,_, and_CC presided_VBD over_RP by_IN him_PRP ._.
A_DT Committee_NNP of_IN management_NN was_VBD regularly_RB organized_VBN ,_, and_CC Dr._NNP (_( now_RB the_DT Hon'ble_NNP )_) Bhalchandra_NNP Khrishna_NNP and_CC Mr._NNP (_( now_RB Rao_NNP Bhahadur_NNP )_) Narayan_NNP Trimbak_NNP Vaidya_NNP ,_, were_VBD appointed_VBN Honorary_NNP Secretaries_NNPS ._.
The_DT Hospital_NNP was_VBD first_RB located_VBN at_IN the_DT Connaught_NNP Road_NNP on_IN Municipal_NNP ground_NN ,_, and_CC originally_RB consisted_VBN of_IN 6_CD sheds_NNS capable_JJ of_IN accommodating_VBG 24_CD patients_NNS only_RB ._.
The_DT Hospital_NNP soon_RB got_VBD popular_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT number_NN of_IN patients_NNS seeking_VBG admission_NN therein_FW went_VBD on_IN steadily_RB increasing_VBG ,_, so_IN that_IN the_DT Com-_NNP mittee_NN thought_VBD it_PRP necessary_JJ to_TO enlarge_VB it_PRP by_IN adding_VBG more_JJR sheds_NNS ._.
By_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN May_NNP 1897_CD ,_, the_DT epidemic_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN had_VBD practically_RB become_VBN extinct_JJ ,_, but_CC as_IN there_EX were_VBD a_DT number_NN of_IN convalescents_NNS in_IN the_DT Hospital_NNP unfit_NN to_TO be_VB discharged_VBN ,_, and_CC as_IN the_DT desire_NN for_IN its_PRP$ continuance_NN was_VBD expressed_VBN on_IN all_DT hands_NNS ,_, the_DT Committee_NNP resolved_VBD to_TO continue_VB it_PRP even_RB during_IN the_DT monsoons_NNS ._.
So_IN they_PRP removed_VBD it_PRP to_TO a_DT large_JJ and_CC spacious_JJ bungalow_NN near_IN the_DT Grant_NNP Road_NNP bridge_NN ,_, rented_VBN at_IN Rs_NNP ._.
175_CD per_IN mensem_NN ,_, which_WDT amount_NN was_VBD subsequently_RB increased_VBN to_TO Rs_NNP ._.
210_CD ._.
The_DT Hospital_NNP continued_VBD in_IN this_DT bungalow_NN till_VBZ the_DT end_NN of_IN May_NNP 1898_CD ,_, when_WRB it_PRP was_VBD temporarily_RB closed_VBN ,_, no_DT need_NN appearing_VBG for_IN keeping_VBG it_PRP open_JJ ._.
It_PRP was_VBD re-opened_VBN on_IN the_DT 20th_CD February_NNP 1899_CD ,_, and_CC was_VBD shifted_VBN to_TO the_DT Churni_NNP Road_NNP Gardens_NNP ,_, a_DT large_JJ and_CC central_JJ portion_NN of_IN which_WDT was_VBD kindly_RB placed_VBN at_IN the_DT disposal_NN of_IN the_DT Committee_NNP ,_, for_IN the_DT purpose_NN ,_, by_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Authorities_NNPS ,_, who_WP also_RB gave_VBD material_NN help_NN in_IN other_JJ directions_NNS ._.
The_DT Hospital_NNP is_VBZ kept_VBN still_RB working_VBG ,_, three_CD of_IN the_DT sheds_NNS having_VBG been_VBN made_VBN weather-proof_JJ and_CC fit_JJ to_TO receive_VB patients_NNS even_RB in_IN the_DT monsoons_NNS ._.
The_DT Hospital_NNP has_VBZ been_VBN maintained_VBN entirely_RB by_IN private_JJ subscriptions_NNS and_CC donations_NNS ._.
A_DT list_NN of_IN the_DT principal_NN subscribers_NNS is_VBZ given_VBN in_IN Appendix_NNP A_NNP ._.
The_DT help_NN to_TO the_DT hospital_NN has_VBZ mostly_RB come_VBN in_IN the_DT shape_NN of_IN monetary_JJ donations_NNS ._.
There_EX have_VBP ,_, however_RB ,_, been_VBN con-_JJ tributions_NNS in_IN other_JJ shapes_NNS ,_, out_IN of_IN which_WDT special_JJ mention_NN needs_NNS be_VB made_VBN of_IN two_CD semi-_JJ permanent_JJ sheds_NNS with_IN corrugated_JJ iron_NN roofing_NN and_CC dealwood_NN walls_NNS ,_, each_DT 24_CD by_IN 40_CD feet_NNS ,_, lent_NN by_IN Messrs._NNP Thackersey_NNP Moolji_NNP and_CC Sons_NNP ,_, and_CC of_IN the_DT services_NNS of_IN an_DT European_JJ nurse_NN (_( for_IN three_CD months_NNS )_) given_VBN by_IN Mr._NNP Damodar_NNP G._NNP Sukhadvala_NNP ._.
*_JJ Members_NNS of_IN the_DT Executive_NNP Committee_NNP ._.
Added_VBN in_IN 1899_CD ._.
261_CD The_DT services_NNS of_IN the_DT Hospital_NNP have_VBP been_VBN appreciated_VBN not_RB only_RB in_IN Bombay_NNP but_CC also_RB far_RB and_CC wide_JJ ,_, and_CC ,_, as_IN a_DT proof_NN of_IN this_DT ,_, it_PRP might_MD be_VB mentioned_VBN that_IN substantial_JJ monetary_JJ help_NN has_VBZ been_VBN given_VBN to_TO the_DT Hospital_NN by_IN His_PRP$ Highness_NNP the_DT Maharaja_NNP Gaikwad_NNP ,_, the_DT Raja_NNP Sahib_NNP of_IN Jawhar_NNP and_CC the_DT Chiefs_NNP of_IN Miraj_NNP (_( senior_JJ )_) ,_, Jechalkaranji_NNP and_CC Vishalgad_NNP ._.
The_DT Committee_NNP of_IN Management_NNP originally_RB consisted_VBD of_IN 15_CD members_NNS ,_, with_IN Dr._NNP Bhalchandra_NNP and_CC Mr._NNP N._NNP T._NNP Vaidya_NNP as_IN Honorary_NNP Secretaries_NNPS ._.
