3_CD ._.
The_DT Hindu_NNP Fever_NNP Hospital_NNP is_VBZ located_VBN in_IN the_DT Charni_NNP Road_NNP Gardens_NNP ,_, on_IN the_DT seashore_NN called_VBD the_DT Back_NNP Bay_NNP ._.
The_DT site_NN is_VBZ the_DT best_JJS one_NN in_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, being_VBG directly_RB open_VB to_TO the_DT sea-breezes_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT soil_NN being_VBG sandy_JJ and_CC thoroughly_JJ dry_NNS ._.
The_DT space_NN between_IN the_DT gardens_NNS and_CC the_DT sea_NN is_VBZ unoccupied_JJ ,_, and_CC is_VBZ only_RB resorted_VBN to_TO by_IN a_DT portion_NN of_IN the_DT ?_. 262_CD fashionable_JJ public_NN who_WP are_VBP accustomed_VBN to_TO go_VB out_RP for_IN an_DT airing_NN ._.
The_DT gardens_NNS are_VBP bounded_VBN on_IN the_DT other_JJ side_NN by_IN the_DT B_NNP ._.
B_NNP ._.
&_CC C._NNP I_PRP ._.
Railway_NNP Line_NNP and_CC the_DT Charni_NNP Road_NNP Station_NNP of_IN the_DT same_JJ Railway_NNP Company_NNP ._.
The_DT hospital_NN consists_VBZ of_IN five_CD sheds_NNS ,_, three_CD of_IN which_WDT are_VBP semi-permanent_JJ structures_NNS ;_: and_CC the_DT remaining_VBG two_CD are_VBP temporary_JJ ones_NNS ._.
The_DT two_CD temporary_JJ sheds_NNS ,_, each_DT measur-_JJ ing_VBG 32_CD '_'' by_IN 24_CD '_NNS ,_, are_VBP constructed_VBN of_IN bamboo-mats_NNS and_CC cadjan_NN with_IN a_DT plinth_NN of_IN one_CD foot_NN and_CC lime-washed_JJ ceiling_NN ,_, and_CC each_DT of_IN them_PRP can_MD accommodate_VB 8_CD beds_NNS ._.
One_CD of_IN the_DT sheds_NNS was_VBD also_RB lime-washed_JJ externally_RB ,_, in_IN order_NN to_TO protect_VB the_DT occupants_NNS effectively_RB from_IN the_DT outside_JJ heat_NN ._.
Two_CD of_IN the_DT semi-permanent_JJ sheds_NNS ,_, which_WDT are_VBP the_DT gift_NN of_IN Messrs._NNP Thakersi_NNP Moolji_NNP &_CC Sons_NNP ,_, have_VBP planked_VBN walls_NNS and_CC corrugated_JJ iron-roof_NN ,_, with_IN one_CD foot_NN plinth_NN ,_, and_CC each_DT measuring_VBG 40_CD '_'' by_IN 24_CD '_POS ._.
The_DT corrugated_JJ iron_NN roofs_NN are_VBP covered_VBN with_IN cadjan_NN as_IN a_DT protec-_JJ tion_NN from_IN heat_NN ._.
The_DT wards_NNS are_VBP fitted_VBN with_IN large_JJ windows_NNS and_CC wooden_JJ flaps_NNS next_IN the_DT floor_NN ._.
Each_DT of_IN the_DT sheds_NNS is_VBZ divided_VBN into_IN three_CD compartments_NNS ,_, and_CC each_DT compartment_NN can_MD accommodate_VB 6_CD beds_NNS ._.
The_DT floor_NN as_RB well_RB as_IN the_DT walls_NNS were_VBD lime_JJ ''_'' washed_VBN from_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN ._.
The_DT third_JJ semi-permanent_JJ shed_NN is_VBZ constructed_VBN on_IN the_DT Swiss_JJ cottage_NN princi-_JJ ple_NN ,_, which_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN very_RB much_JJ approved_VBN of_IN late_JJ by_IN the_DT Authorities_NNPS ,_, It_PRP measures_VBZ 35_CD by_IN 16_CD '_POS ,_, and_CC has_VBZ got_VBD a_DT high_JJ plinth_NN measuring_VBG two_CD feet_NNS and-a-half_JJ ._.
When_WRB the_DT windows_NNS are_VBP closed_VBN they_PRP stop_VBP the_DT breeze_NN completely_RB without_IN disturbing_VBG the_DT ventilation_NN ._.
The_DT hospital_NN can_MD accommodate_VB nearly_RB 60_CD patients_NNS in_IN all_DT ._.
One_CD shed_VBD measuring_VBG 24_CD '_'' by_IN 24_CD '_NNS ,_, with_IN a_DT verandah_NN of_IN four_CD feet_NNS ,_, accommodates_VBZ the_DT office_NN and_CC the_DT dispensary_NN ._.
Quarters_NNS are_VBP provided_VBN for_IN the_DT Nurse_NNP ,_, the_DT House_NNP Surgeon_NNP ,_, the_DT Hospital_NNP Assistants_NNPS and_CC Com-_NNP pounders_NNS ._.
Two_CD sheds_NNS each_DT measuring_VBG 40_CD '_'' by_IN 14_CD '_'' with_IN a_DT verandah_NN of_IN 4_CD feet_NNS are_VBP set_VBN aside_RB for_IN contacts_NNS ._.
Each_DT of_IN these_DT consists_NNS of_IN 4_CD rooms_NNS ._.
They_PRP give_VBP accommodation_NN to_TO nearly_RB 30_CD persons_NNS ._.
A_DT separate_JJ shed_NN is_VBZ provided_VBN for_IN the_DT kitchen_NN and_CC the_DT stores_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT bhangis_NN are_VBP provided_VBN with_IN quarters_NNS in_IN a_DT separate_JJ shed_VBN ,_, 4_CD ._.
There_EX are_VBP latrines_NNS with_IN five_CD seats_NNS provided_VBN by_IN the_DT Municipality_NNP ._.
They_PRP are_VBP used_VBN by_IN the_DT Hospital_NNP servants_NNS and_CC the_DT contacts_NNS ._.
They_PRP are_VBP kept_JJ clean_JJ and_CC disinfected_VBN with_IN phenyle_JJ solution_NN and_CC sanitas_JJ powder_NN ._.
The_DT night-soil_NN is_VBZ carried_VBN to_TO the_DT depot_NN by_IN a_DT bhangi_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT sullage_NN water_NN for_IN which_WDT a_DT cesspool_NN has_VBZ been_VBN built_VBN is_VBZ taken_VBN away_RB in_IN a_DT Municipal_JJ cart_NN ._.
The_DT patient_NN 's_POS excreta_NN were_VBD collected_VBN in_IN bedpans_NNS ;_: a_DT small_JJ quantity_NN of_IN some_DT dis-_JJ infectant_NN ,_, such_JJ as_IN Chloride_NNP of_IN Lime_NNP ,_, Iodine_NNP Perchloride_NNP solution_NN ,_, was_VBD put_VBN in_IN each_DT pan_NN before_IN use_NN ._.
After_IN use_VBP the_DT pan_NN was_VBD taken_VBN out_IN of_IN the_DT ward_NN and_CC emptied_VBN in_IN a_DT basket_NN kept_VBD specially_RB for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN collecting_VBG the_DT patients_NNS '_POS excreta_NN which_WDT was_VBD ultimately_RB taken_VBN to_TO the_DT depot_NN ._.
The_DT clothing_NN ,_, blankets_NNS ,_, and_CC other_JJ articles_NNS of_IN the_DT sick_JJ persons_NNS are_VBP disinfected_VBN by_IN steeping_VBG them_PRP in_IN boiling_VBG water_NN for_IN nearly_RB 12_CD hours_NNS ,_, and_CC then_RB they_PRP are_VBP kept_VBN in_IN a_DT large_JJ cask_NN containing_VBG Hydrargyri_NNP Perchloride_NNP solution_NN for_IN 6_CD hours_NNS ._.
They_PRP are_VBP then_RB dried_VBN in_IN the_DT sun_NN and_CC handed_VBD over_RP to_TO dhobie_VB for_IN washing_VBG ._.
5_CD ._.
The_DT water_NN is_VBZ supplied_VBN by_IN the_DT Municipality_NNP from_IN pipes_NNS laid_VBN by_IN them_PRP ._.
6_CD ._.
The_DT walls_NNS ,_, floor_NN ,_, and_CC ceiling_NN of_IN the_DT wards_NNS are_VBP first_JJ of_IN all_DT disinfected_VBN with_IN Hydrargyri_NNP Perchloride_NNP solution_NN and_CC then_RB washed_VBD with_IN chunam_NN ._.
The_DT floors_NNS of_IN the_DT wards_NNS are_VBP paid_VBN particular_JJ attention_NN ,_, and_CC they_PRP are_VBP frequently_RB lime-washed_JJ and_CC Chloride_NNP of_IN Lime_NNP and_CC Dry_NNP Chunam_NNP was_VBD sprinkled_VBN over_IN them_PRP ._.
The_DT disinfectants_NNS generally_RB used_VBN in_IN this_DT Hospital_NN are_VBP Phenyle_NNP ,_, Iodine_NNP Perchloride_NNP solution_NN ,_, Chloride_NNP of_IN Lime_NNP ,_, Sanitas_NNP powder_NN ,_, and_CC Carbolic_NNP and_CC Hydrargyri_NNP Perchloride_NNP solution_NN of_IN the_DT strength_NN 1_CD in_IN 1000_CD ._.
The_DT clothes_NNS of_IN the_DT patients_NNS are_VBP disinfected_VBN in_IN the_DT premises_NNS of_IN the_DT Hospital_NNP com-_JJ pound_NN and_CC they_PRP are_VBP not_RB sent_VBN to_TO the_DT disinfecting_VBG station_NN ._.
?_. 263_CD 7_CD ._.
On_IN the_DT death_NN of_IN a_DT patient_NN ,_, the_DT body_NN was_VBD removed_VBN at_IN once_RB to_TO the_DT mortuary_NN for_IN which_WDT a_DT temporary_JJ shed_NN was_VBD erected_VBN in_IN the_DT premises_NNS far_RB away_RB from_IN the_DT wards_NNS ._.
There_EX is_VBZ an_DT independent_JJ out-going_JJ passage_NN from_IN the_DT mortuary_JJ away_RB from_IN the_DT wards_NNS and_CC the_DT main_JJ road_NN ,_, so_IN that_IN no_DT patient_NN could_MD observe_VB the_DT taking_VBG away_RB of_IN the_DT corpses_NNS ._.
The_DT mortuary_NN could_MD admit_VB light_JJ ,_, but_CC not_RB crows_NNS or_CC other_JJ birds_NNS ._.
The_DT bodies_NNS were_VBD kept_VBN in_IN galvanized_JJ sheets_NNS separated_VBN from_IN each_DT other_JJ so_IN that_DT caste_NN prejudices_NNS could_MD be_VB pre-_JJ served_VBN ._.
The_DT floor_NN was_VBD kept_JJ clean_JJ ,_, and_CC was_VBD thoroughly_RB disinfected_VBN as_RB often_RB as_IN necessary_JJ with_IN Chloride_NNP of_IN Lime_NNP and_CC Phenyle_NNP ._.
The_DT dead_JJ body_NN was_VBD never_RB allowed_VBN to_TO remain_VB for_IN more_JJR than_IN a_DT few_JJ hours_NNS ._.
The_DT corpse_NN was_VBD wrapped_VBN in_IN a_DT sheet_NN soaked_VBN in_IN Perchloride_NNP of_IN Mercury_NNP solution_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB handed_VBD over_RP to_TO the_DT friends_NNS or_CC relations_NNS for_IN being_VBG taken_VBN to_TO the_DT cemetery_NN ._.
With_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT bodies_NNS of_IN the_DT pauper_NN patients_NNS when_WRB they_PRP happened_VBD to_TO be_VB Brahmins_NNP ,_, the_DT Brahman_NNP Community_NNP had_VBD made_VBN their_PRP$ own_JJ arrange-_JJ ments_NNS for_IN removal_NN and_CC disposal_NN ._.
When_WRB the_DT bodies_NNS happened_VBD to_TO belong_VB to_TO other_JJ castes_NNS ,_, without_IN any_DT friends_NNS or_CC relatives_VBZ to_TO take_VB care_NN of_IN ,_, they_PRP were_VBD disposed_VBN of_IN by_IN Mahratha_NNP servants_NNS of_IN the_DT Hospital_NNP in_IN a_DT hand_NN cart_NN with_IN springs_NNS specially_RB presented_VBN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN by_IN Sheth_NNP Damordur_NNP Goverdhandas_NNP Lukhadwalla_NNP ,_, the_DT expenses_NNS being_VBG borne_VBN by_IN the_DT Hospital_NNP ._.
8_CD ._.
Of_IN the_DT cases_NNS admitted_VBD into_IN the_DT hospital_NN ,_, information_NN in_IN regard_NN to_TO their_PRP$ being_VBG previously_RB inoculated_VBN with_IN Haffkine_NNP 's_POS serum_NN was_VBD obtained_VBN in_IN only_RB 2_CD cases_NNS ._.
The_DT exact_JJ date_NN of_IN their_PRP$ inoculation_NN is_VBZ not_RB known_VBN ,_, but_CC it_PRP was_VBD ascertained_VBN ,_, when_WRB they_PRP were_VBD living_VBG in_IN the_DT Hospital_NNP ,_, that_IN the_DT inoculation_NN had_VBD been_VBN done_VBN during_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN and_CC not_RB this_DT year_NN ._.
One_CD of_IN them_PRP died_VBD and_CC one_CD has_VBZ recovered_VBN ._.
9_CD ._.
Amongst_IN the_DT staff_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN only_RB one_CD person_NN suffered_VBD from_IN plague_NN ._.
He_PRP was_VBD a_DT ward_JJ boy_NN coming_VBG to_TO the_DT hospital_NN premises_VBZ only_RB for_IN his_PRP$ duty_NN ._.
He_PRP must_MD have_VB got_VBD the_DT infection_NN in_IN the_DT town_NN ,_, at_IN his_PRP$ residence_NN on_IN Tardeo_NNP Road_NNP ,_, where_WRB some_DT of_IN his_PRP$ neigh-_JJ bours_NNS had_VBD died_VBN of_IN plague_NN ._.
He_PRP died_VBD four_CD days_NNS after_IN the_DT infection_NN ._.
A_DT clerk_NN in_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP service_NN at_IN the_DT Sonapur_NNP cemetery_NN ,_, who_WP served_VBD at_IN the_DT hospital_NN during_IN 1897_CD and_CC 1898_CD as_IN a_DT clerk_NN ,_, was_VBD infected_VBN about_IN a_DT month_NN after_IN the_DT opening_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN ._.
Though_IN he_PRP was_VBD in_IN no_DT way_NN connected_VBN with_IN the_DT present_JJ hos-_JJ pital_JJ staff_NN ,_, he_PRP volunteered_VBD his_PRP$ assistance_NN to_TO the_DT staff_NN during_IN his_PRP$ leisure_NN and_CC on_IN that_DT account_NN he_PRP was_VBD often_RB allowed_VBN to_TO live_VB on_IN the_DT premises_NNS ._.
As_IN regards_NNS the_DT source_NN of_IN the_DT contagion_NN ,_, nothing_NN definite_NN can_MD be_VB said_VBD as_IN he_PRP worked_VBD at_IN the_DT Sonapur_NNP cemetery_NN for_IN nearly_RB ten_JJ hours_NNS every_DT day_NN ,_, and_CC was_VBD not_RB bound_VBN to_TO stay_VB on_IN the_DT premises_NNS of_IN the_DT hospi-_JJ tal_NN ._.
The_DT only_JJ thing_NN that_WDT could_MD be_VB ascertained_VBN about_IN his_PRP$ case_NN was_VBD that_IN he_PRP must_MD have_VB been_VBN infected_VBN through_IN the_DT cracks_NNS on_IN the_DT soles_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ feet_NNS because_IN it_PRP was_VBD observed_VBN that_IN he_PRP was_VBD always_RB in_IN the_DT habit_NN of_IN walking_VBG bare-footed_JJ ._.
Under_IN these_DT circumstances_NNS ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ much_RB more_RBR likely_JJ that_IN the_DT source_NN of_IN his_PRP$ contagion_NN must_MD be_VB outside_IN the_DT hospital_NN premises_NNS ,_, particularly_RB because_IN great_JJ care_NN was_VBD taken_VBN to_TO thoroughly_VB disinfect_VB the_DT wards_NNS ,_, the_DT latrines_NNS ,_, the_DT clothes_NNS ,_, the_DT beddings_NNS and_CC blankets_NNS of_IN the_DT patients_NNS ,_, as_RB often_RB as_IN necessary_JJ ._.
In_IN fact_NN no_DT possible_JJ source_NN of_IN contagion_NN was_VBD left_VBN uncared_JJ for_IN ,_, and_CC no_DT other_JJ member_NN of_IN the_DT staff_NN living_NN on_IN the_DT premises_NNS had_VBD any_DT sign_NN of_IN the_DT contagion_NN during_IN the_DT whole_JJ period_NN ._.

1_CD 26_CD March_NNP 131-_JJ 2=_CD (_( 129_CD )_) ,_, ,_, 2_CD 133-2_JJ (_( 131_CD )_) April_NNP 79_CD ,_, ,_, 1_CD 80_CD May_NNP 17_CD ,_, ,_, 9_CD 26_CD ?_. 264_CD Of_IN 252_CD admissions_NNS ,_, 250_CD were_VBD treated_VBN in_IN the_DT hospital_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN March_NNP one_CD patient_NN absconded_VBD and_CC died_VBD ultimately_RB in_IN the_DT Colaba_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, and_CC one_CD was_VBD trans-_NN ferred_VBN to_TO Vaishnya_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, 3rd_CD Bhoiwada_NNP ,_, Bhuleshwar_NNP ._.
11_CD ._.

Nil_NNP Nil_NNP The_DT cases_NNS were_VBD diagnosed_VBN by_IN the_DT appearance_NN of_IN the_DT signs_NNS and_CC symptoms_NNS of_IN Pneu-_NNP monia_NN ,_, developing_VBG on_IN the_DT 4th_CD or_CC 5th_CD day_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.
In_IN one_CD or_CC two_CD cases_NNS it_PRP developed_VBD on_IN the_DT 6th_CD day_NN ._.
No_DT Bacteriological_NNP examination_NN was_VBD made_VBN ._.
Notes_NNS on_IN the_DT symptoms_NNS and_CC character_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN :_: -_: The_DT disease_NN generally_RB commenced_VBN with_IN various_JJ symptoms_NNS which_WDT at_IN the_DT start_NN might_MD lead_VB to_TO its_PRP$ being_VBG confounded_VBN with_IN different_JJ affections_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN intermittent_NN or_CC remittent_NN fever_NN of_IN a_DT malignant_JJ type_NN ._.
The_DT symptoms_NNS varied_VBD much_JJ according_VBG to_TO the_DT severity_NN and_CC the_DT type_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.
In_IN most_JJS cases_NNS when_WRB the_DT epidemic_NN was_VBD at_IN its_PRP$ height_NN ,_, the_DT disease_NN began_VBD without_IN any_DT marked_JJ premonitary_NN symptoms_NNS except_IN a_DT slight_JJ igor_NN and_CC sensation_NN of_IN heat_NN ._.
If_IN premonitary_JJ symptoms_NNS occurred_VBD ,_, these_DT generally_RB lasted_VBN ?_. 266_CD only_RB a_DT few_JJ hours_NNS or_CC for_IN one_CD or_CC two_CD days_NNS ._.
They_PRP were_VBD generally_RB violent_JJ ,_, dull_JJ head-_NN ache_NN or_CC sometimes_RB heaviness_NN of_IN the_DT head_NN and_CC temples_NNS ,_, loss_NN of_IN appetite_NN ,_, sense_NN of_IN oppression_NN in_IN the_DT chest_NN ,_, lassitude_VBP ,_, nervous_JJ depression_NN ,_, dull_JJ pains_NNS all_DT over_IN the_DT body_NN and_CC specially_RB about_IN the_DT groin_NN and_CC in_IN the_DT lumbar_NN region_NN in_IN some_DT cases_NNS ._.
There_EX was_VBD nausea_NN often_RB vomiting_VBG and_CC constipation_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT stage_NN the_DT temperature_NN did_VBD not_RB seem_VB to_TO rise_VB ,_, or_CC if_IN it_PRP rose_VBD the_DT rise_NN was_VBD very_RB little_JJ ._.
Many_JJ persons_NNS ,_, generally_RB the_DT lower_JJR class_NN people_NNS with_IN their_PRP$ proverbial_JJ ignorance_NN ,_, used_VBD to_TO ascribe_VB all_PDT these_DT symptoms_NNS to_TO an_DT attack_NN of_IN bile_NN caused_VBN by_IN some_DT irregularity_NN in_IN diet_JJ or_CC to_TO change_VB of_IN season_NN ,_, and_CC on_IN this_DT belief_NN ,_, they_PRP remained_VBD without_IN any_DT systematic_JJ treatment_NN ._.
Two_CD or_CC three_CD days_NNS after_IN ,_, when_WRB the_DT illness_NN assumed_VBD a_DT grave_NN aspect_NN ,_, and_CC was_VBD marked_VBN by_IN high_JJ continued_VBN fever_NN and_CC glan-_JJ dular_NN swelling_NN ,_, the_DT proper_JJ medical_JJ and_CC hygienic_JJ treatment_NN was_VBD tried_VBN to_TO be_VB given_VBN to_TO the_DT patient_NN ._.
This_DT stage_NN of_IN attack_NN during_IN the_DT height_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ usually_RB lasted_VBN but_CC a_DT few_JJ hours_NNS ,_, and_CC was_VBD soon_RB followed_VBN by_IN high_JJ fever_NN and_CC great_JJ constitutional_JJ disturb-_JJ ance_NN ._.
There_EX was_VBD great_JJ muscular_JJ and_CC nervous_JJ exhaustion_NN and_CC an_DT over-powering_JJ sensation_NN of_IN fatigue_NN ._.
The_DT illness_NN being_VBG only_RB of_IN one_CD or_CC two_CD days_NNS '_POS duration_NN ,_, the_DT patient_NN not_RB expecting_VBG that_IN his_PRP$ strength_NN should_MD fail_VB him_PRP so_RB soon_RB ,_, naturally_RB tried_VBN to_TO exert_VB himself_PRP ,_, but_CC to_TO his_PRP$ utter_JJ despair_NN and_CC surprise_NN he_PRP used_VBD to_TO find_VB that_IN he_PRP was_VBD unable_JJ to_TO walk_VB or_CC even_RB to_TO stand_VB for_IN a_DT few_JJ minutes_NNS ._.
When_WRB he_PRP tried_VBD to_TO walk_VB in_IN a_DT particular_JJ direction_NN ,_, general_JJ trembling_NN set_VBN in_IN ,_, and_CC he_PRP was_VBD inclined_VBN to_TO fall_VB down_RP ._.
The_DT patient_NN showed_VBD a_DT gloomy_JJ expression_NN of_IN countenance_NN which_WDT appeared_VBD to_TO be_VB somewhat_RB characteristic_JJ of_IN the_DT plague_NN ._.
The_DT face_NN appeared_VBD a_DT little_JJ swollen_NN and_CC suffused_VBN and_CC the_DT skin_NN around_IN the_DT eyes_NNS ,_, the_DT forehead_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT cheeks_NN assumed_VBD a_DT bluish_JJ ,_, black_JJ or_CC muddy_JJ aspect_NN ._.
The_DT eyes_NNS were_VBD observed_VBN to_TO be_VB glowing_VBG and_CC injected_VBN ,_, sometimes_RB blood-shot_JJ and_CC a_DT little_JJ retracted_JJ ._.
The_DT look_NN was_VBD generally_RB vacant_JJ ,_, anxious_JJ ,_, stupid_JJ ,_, sometimes_RB fixed_VBN and_CC idiotic_JJ ._.
This_DT singular_JJ expression_NN though_IN somewhat_RB diagnostic_JJ of_IN the_DT plague_NN did_VBD not_RB always_RB indicate_VBP the_DT gravity_NN or_CC seriousness_NN of_IN the_DT case_NN ._.
Frequently_RB ,_, in_IN addition_NN ,_, the_DT speech_NN was_VBD thick_JJ ,_, faltering_JJ and_CC indistinct_JJ ._.
The_DT voice_NN when_WRB affected_VBN was_VBD generally_RB husky_JJ and_CC low_JJ ._.
These_DT two_CD signs_NNS when_WRB present_NN ,_, always_RB indicated_VBD a_DT bad_JJ prognosis_NN ._.
The_DT intellectual_JJ power_NN and_CC the_DT senses_NNS usually_RB became_VBD dull_JJ ,_, and_CC there_EX was_VBD generally_RB insomnia_VBN of_IN the_DT most_RBS distressing_JJ character_NN ._.
Sleeplessness_NN is_VBZ one_CD of_IN the_DT earliest_JJS symptoms_NNS and_CC is_VBZ present_JJ for_IN days_NNS and_CC nights_NNS in_IN succession_NN in_IN worse_JJR cases_NNS ._.
If_IN a_DT patient_NN sleeps_NN well_RB and_CC naturally_RB ,_, it_PRP must_MD be_VB considered_VBN a_DT favourable_JJ sign_NN ._.
During_IN the_DT disease_NN ,_, at_IN the_DT commencement_NN the_DT patients_NNS were_VBD generally_RB quiet_JJ ,_, apathetic_JJ ,_, but_CC as_IN the_DT fever_NN rose_VBD high_JJ and_CC the_DT sensation_NN of_IN internal_JJ heat_NN and_CC distress_NN became_VBD extremely_RB unbearable_JJ ,_, they_PRP threw_VBD themselves_PRP restlessly_RB from_IN side_NN to_TO side_VB and_CC became_VBD delirious_JJ ._.
The_DT delirium_NN was_VBD found_VBN to_TO be_VB a_DT common_JJ symptom_NN in_IN patients_NNS admitted_VBN into_IN this_DT hospital_NN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD usually_RB of_IN a_DT muttering_NN character_NN ,_, the_DT patient_NN was_VBD seen_VBN moving_VBG his_PRP$ hands_NNS to_TO and_CC fro_VB and_CC sometimes_RB picking_VBG the_DT bed_NN clothes_NNS ._.
In_IN a_DT few_JJ cases_NNS it_PRP was_VBD of_IN a_DT violent_JJ kind_NN ._.
The_DT patient_NN was_VBD sleepless_JJ ,_, rolled_VBD his_PRP$ head_NN about_IN ,_, cried_VBD out_RP loudly_RB ,_, tried_VBD to_TO spring_NN from_IN the_DT bed_NN and_CC run_VB away_RB ._.
Such_JJ patients_NNS refused_VBD all_DT nourishment_NN ,_, and_CC were_VBD restrained_VBN with_IN great_JJ difficulty_NN ._.
This_DT form_NN was_VBD seen_VBN usually_RB in_IN young_JJ and_CC strongly_RB built_VBN muscular_JJ patients_NNS ._.
The_DT symptoms_NNS of_IN disorder_NN of_IN the_DT digestive_JJ tract_NN were_VBD as_IN follow_NN :_: -_: At_IN the_DT onset_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN the_DT tongue_NN usually_RB became_VBD bright_JJ red_JJ at_IN the_DT tip_NN and_CC edges_NNS ,_, and_CC is_VBZ covered_VBN with_IN a_DT white_JJ fur_NN ._.
Later_RB on_IN it_PRP becomes_VBZ dry_JJ ,_, cracked_VBN and_CC covered_VBN ,_, together_RB with_IN teeth_NNS and_CC lips_NNS with_IN brownish_JJ incrustation_NN resembling_VBG the_DT tongue_NN seen_VBN in_IN third_JJ week_NN of_IN Typhoid_NNP fever_NN ._.
The_DT mucous_JJ membrane_NN of_IN the_DT mouth_NN and_CC pharynx_NN is_VBZ sometimes_RB red_JJ and_CC inflamed_JJ which_WDT is_VBZ generally_RB found_VBN to_TO be_VB an_DT unfavourable_JJ symptom_NN ._.
The_DT appetite_NN disappeared_VBD ._.
Vomiting_NN is_VBZ generally_RB found_VBN ?_. 267_CD to_TO be_VB present_JJ and_CC uncontrolable_JJ in_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN the_DT attack_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ generally_RB bilious_JJ or_CC watery_NN ,_, and_CC continuous_JJ and_CC obstinate_NN in_IN some_DT cases_NNS ._.
Great_NNP thirst_NN with_IN a_DT painful_JJ burning_NN sensation_NN in_IN the_DT stomach_NN is_VBZ usually_RB present_JJ ._.
Hmatemesis_NN was_VBD not_RB observed_VBN ._.
The_DT liver_NN and_CC spleen_NN were_VBD also_RB found_VBN to_TO be_VB enlarged_VBN and_CC painful_JJ in_IN few_JJ cases_NNS ._.
The_DT bowels_NNS are_VBP usually_RB constipated_VBN and_CC require_VB to_TO be_VB kept_VBN open_JJ by_IN internal_JJ medi-_JJ cine_NN or_CC enema_NN ._.
Diarrhoea_NNP was_VBD rarely_RB seen_VBN to_TO continue_VB throughout_IN the_DT whole_JJ period_NN of_IN the_DT fever_NN ._.
Disorder_NN of_IN the_DT respiratory_JJ system.-Patients_NNS with_IN the_DT various_JJ signs_NNS and_CC symp-_JJ toms_NNS of_IN plague_NN enumerated_VBN above_IN ,_, excepting_VBG the_DT bubo_NN ,_, and_CC with_IN prominent_JJ symp-_JJ toms_NNS of_IN affection_NN of_IN the_DT respiratory_NN organs_NNS ,_, were_VBD observed_VBN in_IN the_DT Hospital_NNP ,_, and_CC these_DT might_MD be_VB called_VBN the_DT cases_NNS of_IN the_DT Pneumonic_NNP type_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN ._.
These_DT cases_NNS were_VBD rather_RB difficult_JJ to_TO be_VB diagnosed_VBN in_IN the_DT early_JJ stage_NN from_IN cases_NNS of_IN true_JJ croupous_JJ pneu-_JJ monia_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT diagnosis_NN was_VBD helped_VBN greatly_RB by_IN the_DT absence_NN of_IN the_DT most_RBS characteristic_JJ signs_NNS such_JJ as_IN marked_JJ dullness_NN ,_, crepitations_NNS ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, of_IN the_DT latter_NN in_IN cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN and_CC in_IN such_JJ cases_NNS further_JJ confirmation_NN might_MD be_VB obtained_VBN by_IN a_DT microscopic_JJ examination_NN of_IN the_DT sputum_NN ._.
In_IN some_DT cases_NNS congestion_NN ,_, bronchial_JJ catarrh_NN ,_, and_CC pneumonia_RB appeared_VBD as_IN compli-_JJ cation_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.
The_DT breathing_NN was_VBD frequent_JJ generally_RB in_IN proportion_NN to_TO the_DT height_NN of_IN the_DT fever_NN ,_, but_CC in_IN some_DT cases_NNS it_PRP was_VBD unusually_RB hurried_VBN without_IN any_DT obvious_JJ lung_NN complication_NN to_TO account_VB for_IN it_PRP ,_, and_CC such_JJ cases_NNS as_IN a_DT rule_NN terminated_VBN fatally_RB ._.
The_DT Pulse.-At_NNP the_DT beginning_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN it_PRP was_VBD full_JJ ,_, soft_JJ ,_, bounding_VBG and_CC fre-_JJ quent_NN ,_, varying_VBG from_IN 100_CD to_TO 130_CD according_VBG to_TO the_DT intensity_NN of_IN the_DT fever_NN ._.
But_CC soon_RB after_IN ,_, within_IN the_DT 3rd_CD or_CC 4th_CD day_NN of_IN the_DT illness_NN ,_, it_PRP used_VBD to_TO lose_VB its_PRP$ tone_NN and_CC become_VB un-_JJ steady_JJ ,_, feeble_JJ ,_, small_JJ and_CC frequent_JJ ,_, which_WDT surely_RB indicated_VBD that_IN the_DT case_NN was_VBD getting_VBG worse_JJR and_CC would_MD soon_RB end_VB unfavourably_RB ._.
A_DT gradual_JJ fall_NN in_IN the_DT frequency_NN of_IN the_DT pulse_NN rate_NN is_VBZ a_DT favourable_JJ sign_NN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD also_RB observed_VBN that_IN the_DT cases_NNS in_IN which_WDT the_DT pulse_NN remained_VBD steady_JJ and_CC proportionately_RB slow_JJ ,_, even_RB when_WRB the_DT temperature_NN rose_VBD high_JJ ,_, generally_RB recovered_VBN ._.
The_DT heart_NN 's_POS sounds_NNS were_VBD generally_RB found_VBN to_TO be_VB normal_JJ al-_JJ though_IN the_DT impulse_NN was_VBD diffused_VBN ._.
Disorders_NNS of_IN the_DT nervous_JJ system.-There_JJ were_VBD muscular_JJ twitchings_NNS ,_, partial_JJ deafness_NN ,_, insomnia_NN of_IN the_DT most_RBS distressing_JJ character_NN ,_, nervous_JJ exhaustion_NN and_CC de-_JJ lirium_NN as_IN described_VBN above_IN ._.
One_CD prominent_JJ symptom_NN worth_IN observing_VBG was_VBD the_DT marked_JJ loss_NN of_IN muscular_JJ co-ordination_NN evidenced_VBN by_IN the_DT clumsiness_NN with_IN which_WDT the_DT patients_NNS handled_VBD the_DT articles_NNS ;_: their_PRP$ way_NN of_IN speaking_NN and_CC their_PRP$ inability_NN to_TO walk_VB ._.
Fever.-It_NNP was_VBD present_JJ in_IN almost_RB all_DT cases_NNS ,_, but_CC varied_VBD much_RB in_IN height_NN and_CC dura-_JJ tion_NN ._.
No_DT regular_JJ typical_JJ curve_NN like_IN that_DT of_IN some_DT specific_JJ fevers_NNS was_VBD observed_VBN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD usually_RB ushered_VBN in_IN by_IN one_CD or_CC more_JJR fits_NNS of_IN shivering_NN ._.
The_DT temperature_NN ranged_VBD generally_RB between_IN 103_CD and_CC 105F_CD ._.
But_CC in_IN a_DT few_JJ cases_NNS ,_, after_IN the_DT first_JJ rise_NN to_TO 105_CD or_CC to_TO 107_CD even_RB ,_, it_PRP ranged_VBD from_IN 100F_CD to_TO 103_CD ._.
The_DT temperature_NN began_VBD to_TO rise_VB on_IN the_DT first_JJ day_NN and_CC attained_VBD its_PRP$ height_NN on_IN the_DT second_JJ or_CC third_JJ day_NN ,_, when_WRB delirium_NN usual-_JJ ly_NN set_VBN in_IN ._.
The_DT temperature_NN continued_VBD to_TO be_VB high_JJ with_IN slight_JJ remissions_NNS till_VBP the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT first_JJ week_NN ._.
Then_RB in_IN successful_JJ cases_NNS it_PRP steadily_RB began_VBD to_TO go_VB down_RP from_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT first_JJ week_NN ,_, to_TO the_DT middle_NN of_IN the_DT second_JJ week_NN ,_, when_WRB it_PRP became_VBD normal_JJ and_CC continued_VBD so_RB in_IN uncomplicated_JJ cases_NNS ;_: whereas_NNS ,_, when_WRB serious_JJ complication_NN was_VBD present_JJ ,_, it_PRP progressed_VBD according_VBG to_TO the_DT nature_NN of_IN the_DT complication_NN ._.
A_DT fall_NN of_IN temperature_NN by_IN lysis_NN from_IN the_DT 5th_CD to_TO 7th_CD day_NN is_VBZ a_DT favorable_JJ symptom_NN ._.
?_. 268_CD The_DT height_NN of_IN the_DT temperature_NN afforded_VBD no_DT certain_JJ criterion_NN of_IN the_DT severity_NN of_IN the_DT cases_NNS ,_, and_CC though_IN the_DT temperature_NN seemed_VBD to_TO keep_VB down_RP low_JJ ,_, it_PRP was_VBD not_RB safe_JJ to_TO give_VB a_DT favorable_JJ opinion_NN ,_, because_IN of_IN its_PRP$ abatement_NN ,_, as_IN patients_NNS with_IN high_JJ and_CC low_JJ temperatures_NNS were_VBD seen_VBN equally_RB to_TO succumb_VB to_TO the_DT disease_NN ._.
Bubo.-The_NNP most_RBS characteristic_JJ phenomenon_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN was_VBD the_DT swelling_NN of_IN the_DT lymphatic_JJ glands_NNS ._.
It_PRP appeared_VBD either_CC at_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN the_DT fever_NN or_CC much_RB more_JJR commonly_RB in_IN the_DT course_NN of_IN the_DT first_JJ 4_CD or_CC 5_CD days_NNS of_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.
The_DT percentage_NN of_IN cases_NNS treated_VBN in_IN the_DT hospital_NN in_IN which_WDT it_PRP was_VBD present_JJ was_VBD 86_CD ._.
It_PRP appeared_VBD in_IN one_CD or_CC more_JJR parts_NNS of_IN the_DT body_NN ,_, and_CC varied_VBD in_IN size_NN from_IN a_DT bean_NN or_CC small_JJ almond_NN to_TO that_DT of_IN a_DT hen_NN 's_POS egg_NN ._.
The_DT size_NN and_CC situation_NN of_IN the_DT bubo_NN ,_, though_IN not_RB sure_JJ indicative_NN of_IN the_DT gravity_NN of_IN the_DT case_NN ,_, affected_VBD its_PRP$ course_NN to_TO a_DT considerable_JJ extent_NN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD observed_VBN that_IN the_DT smaller_JJR and_CC more_RBR tender_NN the_DT bubo_NN was_VBD ,_, and_CC attended_VBD with_IN high_JJ pyrexia_NN ,_, the_DT greater_JJR was_VBD the_DT danger_NN ,_, while_IN an_DT early_JJ appearance_NN of_IN the_DT bubo_NN and_CC its_PRP$ early_JJ inclination_NN to_TO suppurate_VB were_VBD looked_VBN upon_IN as_IN favourable_JJ symptoms_NNS ._.
The_DT bubo_NN developed_VBD itself_PRP frequently_RB about_IN the_DT groin_NN and_CC the_DT femoral_JJ region_NN ._.
It_PRP also_RB developed_VBD in_IN the_DT armpit_NN ,_, the_DT angle_NN of_IN the_DT lower_JJR jaw_NN and_CC the_DT neck_NN ._.
In_IN exceptional_JJ cases_NNS it_PRP was_VBD found_VBN in_IN the_DT side_NN of_IN the_DT chest_NN and_CC the_DT elbow_NN joint_NN ._.
As_IN a_DT rule_NN it_PRP appeared_VBD in_IN one_CD of_IN these_DT places_NNS only_RB ,_, but_CC in_IN few_JJ cases_NNS it_PRP appeared_VBD simultaneously_RB in_IN more_JJR than_IN one_CD place_NN ._.
It_PRP might_MD be_VB either_CC superficial_JJ and_CC palpable_JJ ,_, or_CC internal_JJ ,_, or_CC a_DT combination_NN of_IN both_DT ._.
Amongst_IN the_DT internal_JJ glands_NNS ,_, those_DT of_IN the_DT intestines_NNS were_VBD chiefly_RB affected_VBN as_IN could_MD be_VB made_VBN out_RP by_IN the_DT abdomen_NNS being_VBG very_RB tender_NN in_IN such_JJ cases_NNS ._.
In_IN 215_CD cases_NNS in_IN which_WDT the_DT bubo_NN made_VBD its_PRP$ appearance_NN ,_, it_PRP was_VBD localized_VBN as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -_: Femoral_JJ 77_CD Inguinal_JJ 53_CD Axillary_JJ 52_CD ._.
Cervical_JJ 11_CD Multiple_JJ 22_CD ._.
Character_NN of_IN the_DT Bubo.-The_NNP affected_VBD gland_NN was_VBD swollen_VBN and_CC increased_VBN in_IN size_NN and_CC was_VBD always_RB tender_NN and_CC painful_JJ ,_, so_RB much_RB so_IN that_RB even_RB when_WRB the_DT patient_NN was_VBD comatose_JJ ,_, moderate_JJ pressure_NN on_IN the_DT gland_NN caused_VBD moaning_NN ,_, indicative_NN of_IN the_DT suffering_NN produced_VBD thereby_RB ._.
As_IN the_DT disease_NN progressed_VBD ,_, the_DT bubo_NN got_VBD inflamed_JJ and_CC there_EX was_VBD a_DT marked_JJ in-_JJ filtration_NN ,_, hmorrhagic_NN or_CC serous_JJ ,_, in_IN the_DT glandular_NN and_CC cellular_JJ tissue_NN surrounding_VBG it_PRP ._.
The_DT inflammation_NN was_VBD not_RB confined_VBN to_TO the_DT single_JJ lymphatic_JJ gland_NN first_RB affected_VBD ,_, but_CC it_PRP spread_VBD usually_RB to_TO the_DT neighbouring_NN glands_NNS also_RB ._.
The_DT skin_NN over_IN the_DT bubo_NN then_RB became_VBD red_JJ and_CC dematous_JJ and_CC a_DT hard_JJ painful_NN swelling_VBG was_VBD thus_RB formed_VBN ._.
In_IN the_DT cases_NNS that_WDT recovered_VBD ,_, the_DT bubo_NN suppurated_VBD ,_, and_CC when_WRB opened_VBD it_PRP gave_VBD out_RP pus_NN and_CC other_JJ in-_JJ flammatory_NN discharges_NNS ._.
It_PRP usually_RB suppurated_VBD from_IN the_DT 10th_CD to_TO the_DT 14th_JJ day_NN of_IN the_DT illness_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP required_VBD generally_RB one_CD or_CC two_CD months_NNS to_TO heal_VB completely_RB ._.
Complications_NNS ._.
Brain_NNP symptoms-Congestion_NN was_VBD found_VBN to_TO be_VB very_RB common_JJ as_IN was_VBD evidenced_VBN by_IN the_DT presence_NN of_IN delirium_NN in_IN many_JJ cases_NNS ._.
True_JJ meningitis_NN was_VBD observed_VBN in_IN only_RB two_CD cases_NNS of_IN children_NNS ,_, both_DT of_IN which_WDT proved_VBD fatal_JJ ._.
On_IN account_NN of_IN the_DT toxmic_JJ condition_NN of_IN the_DT blood_NN ,_, the_DT intellectual_JJ powers_NNS appeared_VBD to_TO have_VB become_VBN dull_JJ ,_, but_CC in_IN most_JJS of_IN the_DT cases_NNS no_DT symptoms_NNS indicative_CD of_IN any_DT organic_JJ lesion_NN in_IN the_DT brain_NN were_VBD seen_VBN except_IN in_IN cases_NNS where_WRB speech_NN was_VBD affected_VBN ._.
However_RB ,_, when_WRB the_DT patients_NNS became_VBD convalescent_JJ ,_, the_DT power_NN of_IN speech_NN was_VBD restored_VBN ._.
?_. 269_CD Suppression_NN of_IN urine-It_NN was_VBD found_VBN in_IN three_CD cases_NNS only_RB ,_, but_CC the_DT urine_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, in_IN most_JJS cases_NNS was_VBD scanty_JJ and_CC high_JJ colored_VBN ._.

Hmorrhage-It_NN was_VBD generally_RB found_VBN from_IN the_DT lungs_NNS and_CC not_RB from_IN other_JJ organs_NNS ._.
It_PRP occurred_VBD in_IN about_IN 8_CD cases_NNS ,_, of_IN which_WDT 2_CD recovered_VBD and_CC 6_CD proved_VBD fatal_JJ ._.
Pregnancy._NNP --_: Three_NNP pregnant_JJ women_NNS were_VBD admitted_VBN ,_, one_CD was_VBD at_IN the_DT 3rd_CD month_NN and_CC she_PRP recovered_VBD without_IN abortion_NN having_VBG taken_VBN place_NN ,_, two_CD were_VBD advanced_VBN in_IN preg-_JJ nancy_NN and_CC both_DT of_IN them_PRP aborted_VBD and_CC died_VBD ._.

The_DT case_NN proved_VBD fatal_JJ ._.

Ear.-Deafness_NN was_VBD present_JJ in_IN some_DT cases_NNS ,_, but_CC the_DT patients_NNS used_VBN to_TO understand_VB questions_NNS when_WRB they_PRP were_VBD spoken_VBN to_TO loudly_RB and_CC distinctly_RB ._.
This_DT symptom_NN must_MD pro-_VB bably_RB be_VB due_JJ to_TO the_DT dullness_NN of_IN the_DT mental_JJ faculties_NNS ._.

The_DT speech_NN is_VBZ still_RB indistinct_JJ ._.

Period_NN of_IN convalescence.-The_JJ convalescence_NN usually_RB set_VBN in_IN by_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT first_JJ week_NN or_CC 10_CD days_NNS ;_: but_CC the_DT recovery_NN was_VBD not_RB complete_JJ until_IN one_CD or_CC two_CD months_NNS had_VBD elapsed_VBN ._.

Remedial.-Now_NN it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN proved_VBN that_IN the_DT plague_NN is_VBZ a_DT bacillary_JJ disease_NN propagated_VBD and_CC diffused_VBN by_IN a_DT specific_JJ micro-organism_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN its_PRP$ effects_NNS are_VBP due_JJ to_TO the_DT operations_NNS of_IN the_DT same_JJ specific_JJ micro-organism_NN that_WDT has_VBZ infected_VBN the_DT body_NN ._.
Having_VBG entered_VBD the_DT human_JJ body_NN either_CC through_IN the_DT respiratory_NN organs_NNS ,_, or_CC the_DT skin_NN or_CC the_DT intestinal_JJ tract_NN ,_, it_PRP multiplies_VBZ readily_RB in_IN the_DT blood_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT system_NN being_VBG thus_RB poisoned_VBN ,_, the_DT disease_NN manifests_VBZ itself_PRP in_IN one_CD form_NN or_CC another_DT according_VBG to_TO the_DT virulence_NN of_IN the_DT poison_NN and_CC the_DT state_NN of_IN health_NN of_IN the_DT person_NN affected_VBD ._.
?_. 270_CD Bearing_NN in_IN mind_NN this_DT nature_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN ,_, the_DT rational_JJ indication_NN for_IN treatment_NN to_TO eliminate_VB the_DT toxin_NN ,_, or_CC to_TO neutralize_VB in_IN whatever_WDT way_NN we_PRP can_MD ,_, the_DT morbid_NN activities_NNS of_IN the_DT special_JJ microbe_NN with_IN which_WDT the_DT organism_NN has_VBZ been_VBN infected_VBN ._.
This_DT was_VBD tried_VBN to_TO be_VB achieved_VBN by_IN means_NNS of_IN antiseptics_NNS or_CC germicides_NNS ._.
The_DT chief_JJ germicide_NN used_VBN was_VBD Liqr_NNP ._.
Hydrargyri_NNP Perchloride_NNP given_VBN in_IN 3s.-3i_CD ._.
dose_NN ,_, six_CD or_CC eight_CD times_NNS during_IN twenty-four_JJ hours_NNS ._.
It_PRP was_VBD generally_RB combined_VBN with_IN stimulant_JJ diaphoretics_NNS and_CC cardiac_JJ tonics_NNS ._.
Another_DT germicide_NN that_WDT was_VBD much_RB used_VBN this_DT time_NN was_VBD a_DT combination_NN of_IN Iodine_NNP and_CC Chlorine_NNP in_IN certain_JJ proportions_NNS ._.
Every_DT one_CD admits_VBZ that_IN Iodine_NNP and_CC Chlorine_NNP stand_VBP very_RB high_JJ in_IN the_DT list_NN of_IN drugs_NNS possessed_VBN with_IN germicidal_JJ power_NN ._.
The_DT chief_JJ diffi-_JJ culty_NN was_VBD ,_, how_WRB to_TO give_VB them_PRP in_IN a_DT suitable_JJ form_NN in_IN a_DT quantity_NN sufficient_NN to_TO neutralize_VB all_PDT the_DT toxines_NNS and_CC germs_NNS in_IN the_DT blood_NN ,_, without_IN the_DT least_JJS chance_NN of_IN doing_VBG any_DT injury_NN to_TO the_DT tissues_NNS and_CC organs_NNS ,_, through_IN which_WDT they_PRP were_VBD introduced_VBN into_IN the_DT system_NN ._.
Ultimately_RB a_DT combination_NN in_IN the_DT form_NN of_IN Terchloride_NNP of_IN Iodine_NNP was_VBD prepared_VBN with_IN varying_VBG proportions_NNS of_IN Chlorine_NNP ,_, added_VBD to_TO it_PRP to_TO make_VB it_PRP stable_JJ ,_, and_CC was_VBD tried_VBN in_IN good_JJ many_JJ cases_NNS in_IN the_DT hospital_NN ._.
That_IN this_DT preparation_NN has_VBZ a_DT marked_JJ effect_NN in_IN destroying_VBG the_DT germs_NNS of_IN Typhoid_NNP fever_NN ,_, Cholera_NNP and_CC other_JJ diseases_NNS ,_, and_CC that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB poisonous_JJ has_VBZ already_RB been_VBN shown_VBN by_IN Trangott_NNP and_CC Professor_NNP Behring_NNP by_IN experiments_NNS made_VBN on_IN hospital_NN patients_NNS ._.
First_LS it_PRP was_VBD administered_VBN in_IN 10_CD to_TO 20_CD minim_NNS dose_RB frequently_RB repeated_VBN ,_, but_CC later_RB on_IN it_PRP was_VBD given_VBN from_IN 3s_CD ._.
3i_CD ._.
per_IN dose_NN largely_RB diluted_VBN with_IN water_NN ._.
Some_DT patients_NNS could_MD bear_VB it_PRP very_RB well_RB ,_, while_IN others_NNS vomited_VBD as_RB soon_RB as_IN it_PRP was_VBD given_VBN ._.
No_DT evil_JJ effect_NN was_VBD seen_VBN in_IN a_DT single_JJ case_NN ._.
The_DT results_NNS obtained_VBN are_VBP no_DT doubt_NN hopeful_NN and_CC beneficial_JJ to_TO the_DT extent_NN of_IN 50_CD per_IN cent._NN ,_, but_CC they_PRP can_MD not_RB yet_RB be_VB declared_VBN as_RB conclusive_JJ as_IN other_JJ drugs_NNS were_VBD also_RB given_VBN to_TO the_DT patients_NNS to_TO whom_WP Iodine_NNP Terchlo-_NNP ride_NN was_VBD administered_VBN ._.
A_DT germicide_NN can_MD possibly_RB be_VB of_IN use_NN only_RB when_WRB it_PRP is_VBZ given_VBN from_IN the_DT very_RB com-_JJ mencement_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ of_IN no_DT use_NN expecting_VBG any_DT marvellous_JJ result_NN from_IN it_PRP when_WRB the_DT disease_NN is_VBZ sufficiently_RB advanced_JJ ._.
It_PRP can_MD not_RB be_VB expected_VBN to_TO repair_VB the_DT mis-_JJ chief_NN already_RB done_VBN to_TO the_DT system_NN by_IN the_DT bacteria_NNS and_CC their_PRP$ products_NNS ._.
I_PRP must_MD here_RB express_VB my_PRP$ sincere_JJ thanks_NNS to_TO Professor_NNP T._NNP K._NNP Gujjar_NNP ,_, for_IN suggesting_VBG to_TO me_PRP this_DT drug_NN as_IN powerful_JJ germicide_NN ,_, and_CC supplying_VBG it_PRP to_TO the_DT hospital_NN at_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ expense_NN ._.
On_IN admission_NN the.patient_NN was_VBD undressed_JJ ,_, the_DT personal_JJ clothing_NN was_VBD removed_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT body_NN was_VBD carefully_RB sponged_VBN over_IN with_IN warm_JJ water_NN containing_VBG Condy_NNP 's_POS fluid_NN ._.
He_PRP was_VBD then_RB given_VBN new_JJ clothes_NNS and_CC put_VB into_IN a_DT fresh_JJ bed_NN in_IN the_DT acute_JJ ward_NN ._.
When_WRB the_DT admitted_JJ patient_NN was_VBD first_RB examined_VBN in_IN the_DT hospital_NN ,_, the_DT foul_JJ state_NN of_IN the_DT tongue_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT foul_JJ breath_NN usually_RB present_JJ in_IN plague_NN cases_NNS ,_, suggested_VBD the_DT use_NN of_IN a_DT purgative_JJ ,_, and_CC this_DT was_VBD done_VBN by_IN means_NNS of_IN calomel_NN in_IN 5-_JJ grain_NN doses_NNS at_IN bed_NN time_NN ,_, and_CC followed_VBN by_IN a_DT saline_NN purge_NN ,_, if_IN the_DT bowels_NNS did_VBD not_RB move_VB freely_RB by_IN it_PRP ._.
I_PRP think_VBP calomel_NN is_VBZ best_RB suited_VBN for_IN this_DT purpose_NN on_IN account_NN of_IN its_PRP$ antiseptic_JJ and_CC purgative_JJ property_NN ,_, as_IN it_PRP sweeps_VBZ the_DT intestines_JJ clean_NN of_IN decomposing_VBG injesta_NN and_CC of_IN putrifactive_JJ bacteria_NNS that_WDT may_MD be_VB present_JJ there_RB ._.
Free_JJ action_NN of_IN the_DT bowels_NNS was_VBD necessary_JJ to_TO expel_VB poison_NN from_IN the_DT system_NN ,_, and_CC this_DT was_VBD seen_VBN to_TO do_VB some_DT good_JJ as_IN it_PRP frequently_RB stopped_VBD the_DT vomiting_NN and_CC enabled_VBD the_DT patient_NN to_TO take_VB his_PRP$ nourishment_NN with_IN better_JJR relish_NN than_IN previously_RB ._.
Another_DT chief_JJ indication_NN is_VBZ to_TO maintain_VB the_DT patient_NN 's_POS strength_NN and_CC to_TO support_VB the_DT constitutional_JJ vigour_NN so_RB as_IN to_TO help_VB the_DT system_NN to_TO resist_VB the_DT toxic_JJ influence_NN of_IN the_DT infective_JJ products_NNS of_IN the_DT plague_NN bacillus_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ of_IN the_DT greatest_JJS importance_NN that_IN the_DT ?_. 271_CD patient_NN should_MD be_VB kept_VBN absolutely_RB at_IN rest_NN in_IN bed_NN ,_, from_IN the_DT commencement_NN of_IN the_DT fever_NN ._.
He_PRP should_MD not_RB be_VB allowed_VBN to_TO get_VB oat_NN of_IN bed_NN for_IN any_DT purpose_NN ,_, and_CC hence_RB the_DT use_NN of_IN the_DT bed-pan_NN and_CC urine_JJ bottle_NN should_MD be_VB insisted_VBN on_IN ._.
Many_JJ persons_NNS not_RB knowing_VBG the_DT importance_NN of_IN absolute_JJ rest_NN in_IN such_JJ cases_NNS used_VBN to_TO shift_VB the_DT patient_NN from_IN one_CD place_NN to_TO another_DT for_IN fear_NN of_IN his_PRP$ being_VBG detected_VBN and_CC removed_VBN to_TO a_DT Hospital_NNP ._.
But_CC it_PRP should_MD be_VB borne_VBN in_IN mind_NN that_IN the_DT fatigue_NN of_IN physical_JJ exertion_NN caused_VBN by_IN such_JJ stealthy_JJ shifting_VBG from_IN place_NN to_TO place_NN is_VBZ very_RB great_JJ and_CC disastrous_JJ in_IN effect_NN ._.
The_DT next_JJ point_NN in_IN connection_NN with_IN the_DT maintenance_NN of_IN the_DT patient_NN 's_POS strength_NN is_VBZ the_DT regulation_NN of_IN food_NN and_CC drink_VB given_VBN to_TO him_PRP ._.
In_IN acute_JJ cases_NNS ,_, rice_NN and_CC sago_NN conjee_NN ,_, milk_NN ,_, tea_NN ,_, and_CC fruits_NNS were_VBD given_VBN ._.
The_DT food_NN should_MD be_VB of_IN the_DT bland_NN and_CC most_RBS diges-_JJ tible_JJ and_CC nourishing_JJ character_NN ._.
It_PRP should_MD be_VB given_VBN in_IN small_JJ quantity_NN and_CC at_IN stated_VBN intervals_NNS ,_, irrespective_NN of_IN the_DT desires_NNS or_CC the_DT inclination_NN of_IN the_DT patients_NNS in_IN the_DT matter_NN ._.
In_IN treating_VBG Hindu_NNP patients_NNS ,_, main_JJ reliance_NN had_VBD to_TO be_VB put_VBN on_IN milk_NN as_IN the_DT most_RBS nourish-_JJ ing_JJ article_NN of_IN diet_NN ._.
During_IN the_DT acute_JJ stage_NN all_DT meat_NN preparations_NNS were_VBD prohibited_VBN on_IN principle_NN ,_, though_IN they_PRP could_MD be_VB used_VBN in_IN persons_NNS of_IN certain_JJ caste_NN who_WP had_VBD no_DT religious_JJ objection_NN to_TO their_PRP$ use_NN ._.
They_PRP were_VBD used_VBN after_IN the_DT acute_JJ stage_NN had_VBD passed_VBN according_VBG to_TO the_DT necessity_NN of_IN each_DT case_NN ._.
It_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN assumed_VBN by_IN many_JJ practitioners_NNS that_IN milk_NN may_MD be_VB given_VBN ad-libitum_JJ as_RB much_JJ as_IN the_DT patient_NN can_MD take_VB without_IN bad_JJ effects_NNS ._.
But_CC it_PRP should_MD be_VB remembered_VBN that_IN injection_NN (_( taking_VBG in_IN )_) and_CC digestion_NN are_VBP very_RB different_JJ things_NNS ._.
The_DT physician_NN should_MD satisfy_VB himself_PRP that_IN the_DT milk_NN in_IN the_DT quantity_NN taken_VBN by_IN the_DT patient_NN is_VBZ being_VBG digested_VBN by_IN him_PRP and_CC is_VBZ not_RB producing_VBG any_DT bad_JJ effects_NNS by_IN way_NN of_IN restlessness_NN ,_, flatulence_NN ,_, &_CC c._NN To_TO convalescents_NNS ,_, ordinary_JJ diet_JJ consisting_NN of_IN rice_NN ,_, dal_NN ,_, ghee_NN ,_, vegetable_JJ and_CC milk_NN was_VBD given_VBN if_IN his_PRP$ caste_NN prejudices_NNS admitted_VBN of_IN this_DT ._.
As_IN regards_NNS drink.-The_JJ patients_NNS were_VBD allowed_VBN to_TO have_VB a_DT reasonable_JJ quantity_NN of_IN barley_NN water_NN ,_, soda_JJ water_NN or_CC if_IN they_PRP objected_VBD to_TO it_PRP ,_, pure_JJ water_NN ._.
If_IN the_DT thirst_NN was_VBD ex-_JJ cessive_JJ ice_NN was_VBD given_VBN to_TO suck_VB ._.
Stimulants_NNS and_CC cardiac_JJ tonics.-The_JJ heart_NN seems_VBZ to_TO be_VB very_RB early_RB affected_VBN in_IN this_DT disease_NN as_IN indicated_VBN by_IN the_DT weakness_NN of_IN the_DT first_JJ sound_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT pulse_NN being_VBG small_JJ ,_, frequent_JJ soft_JJ and_CC wanting_VBG in_IN tone_NN ._.
As_IN general_JJ muscular_JJ relaxation_NN and_CC nervous_JJ exhaustion_NN were_VBD prominent_JJ features_NNS of_IN the_DT plague_NN ,_, the_DT condition_NN of_IN the_DT heart_NN required_VBD a_DT careful_JJ watch_NN from_IN the_DT very_RB commencement_NN of_IN the_DT fever_NN ,_, for_IN the_DT cause_NN of_IN death_NN in_IN the_DT majority_NN of_IN cases_NNS was_VBD failure_NN of_IN the_DT heart_NN ._.
This_DT circumstance_NN calls_VBZ for_IN an_DT early_JJ administration_NN of_IN stimulants_NNS and_CC cardiac_JJ tonics_NNS in_IN addition_NN to_TO the_DT other_JJ measures_NNS taken_VBN to_TO support_VB the_DT strength_NN ._.
The_DT stimulants_NNS and_CC cardiac_JJ tonics_NNS used_VBN in_IN the_DT hospital_NN were_VBD chiefly_JJ Ammonii_NNP carbonas_NN ,_, ether_RB ,_, cinchona_NN ,_, digitalis_NN ,_, strophanthus_RB ,_, nux-vomica_JJ ,_, and_CC alcohol_NN in_IN the_DT form_NN of_IN rum_NN or_CC spirit_NN Vini_NNP Gallici_NNP ._.
Rum_NNP was_VBD used_VBN freely_RB with_IN medicine_NN as_RB well_RB as_IN with_IN milk_NN ._.
When_WRB the_DT patient_NN was_VBD found_VBN to_TO be_VB very_RB low_JJ and_CC the_DT stimulants_NNS given_VBN internally_RB by_IN the_DT mouth_NN were_VBD not_RB likely_JJ to_TO be_VB absorbed_VBN into_IN the_DT system_NN and_CC prove_VB effective_JJ ,_, strychnia_NN was_VBD used_VBN hypodermically_RB as_IN the_DT best_JJS stimulant_NN ,_, As_IN many_JJ patients_NNS admitted_VBN in_IN the_DT hospital_NN were_VBD in_IN the_DT advanced_JJ stage_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ,_, the_DT administration_NN of_IN stimulants_NNS by_IN the_DT mouth_NN was_VBD not_RB much_JJ depended_VBN upon_NN ,_, and_CC so_RB strychnia_NN was_VBD injected_VBN twice_RB or_CC even_RB thrice_VB a_DT day_NN in_IN some_DT cases_NNS ._.
It_PRP may_MD be_VB noted_VBN here_RB that_IN plague_NN patients_NNS can_MD tolerate_VB proportionately_RB large_JJ doses_NNS of_IN strychnia_NN and_CC liq_NN ._.
hydrargyri_NN perchloridi_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP might_MD be_VB true_JJ also_RB of_IN other_JJ drugs_NNS ._.
?_. 272_CD Strychnia_NNP has_VBZ been_VBN found_VBN to_TO keep_VB up_RP the_DT tone_NN of_IN the_DT pulse_NN and_CC the_DT system_NN generally_RB by_IN acting_VBG as_IN a_DT stimulant_NN in_IN many_JJ cases_NNS ._.
But_CC after_IN a_DT certain_JJ stage_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN was_VBD reached_VBN ,_, when_WRB circulation_NN and_CC respiration_NN show_NN signs_NNS of_IN gradual_JJ failing_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ observed_VBN in_IN some_DT cases_NNS that_IN the_DT strychnia_NN injections_NNS do_VBP not_RB prevent_VB further_JJ failure_NN of_IN the_DT heart_NN though_IN repeated_VBN almost_RB every_DT 4th_CD hour_NN ._.
Another_DT symptom_NN which_WDT required_VBD special_JJ attention_NN was_VBD fever_RB ._.
The_DT rise_NN of_IN tem-_JJ perature_NN in_IN plague_NN cases_NNS was_VBD looked_VBN upon_RB not_RB as_IN the_DT disease_NN itself_PRP ,_, but_CC as_IN a_DT sign_NN of_IN the_DT intensity_NN of_IN the_DT activities_NNS of_IN the_DT infective_JJ agent_NN ,_, and_CC so_RB ._.
the_DT reduction_NN of_IN temperature_NN by_IN means_NNS of_IN depressing_VBG antipyretics_NNS such_JJ as_IN antipyrine_NN ,_, phenacetine_NN ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, under_IN which_WDT the_DT temperature_NN is_VBZ lowered_VBN down_IN several_JJ degrees_NNS for_IN a_DT few_JJ hours_NNS only_RB to_TO rise_VB again_RB ,_, was_VBD not_RB attempted_VBN ._.
When_WRB the_DT temperature_NN was_VBD below_IN 103_CD ,_, nothing_NN special_NN was_VBD done_VBN to_TO lower_VB the_DT temperature_NN except_IN ice_NN to_TO the_DT head_NN ,_, sponging_VBG the_DT body_NN with_IN tepid_JJ water_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT use_NN of_IN antiseptics_NNS and_CC stimulant_JJ diaphoretics_NNS internally_RB ._.
But_CC when_WRB the_DT temperature_NN rose_VBD and_CC kept_VBD above_IN 104_CD F._NNP with_IN but_CC very_RB slight_JJ remissions_NNS and_CC the_DT ordinary_JJ treatment_NN by_IN antiseptics_NNS ,_, as_IN mentioned_VBN above_IN ,_, failed_VBD in_IN effecting_VBG a_DT reduction_NN ,_, other_JJ means_NNS were_VBD employed_VBN to_TO reduce_VB the_DT byperpyrexia_NN ._.
They_PRP usually_RB consisted_VBD of_IN the_DT application_NN of_IN cold_NN to_TO the_DT body_NN in_IN various_JJ ways_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN ice_NN bag_NN to_TO the_DT head_NN ,_, sponging_VBG and_CC wet_JJ pack_NN ._.
These_DT measures_NNS were_VBD useful_JJ not_RB only_RB for_IN reducing_VBG hyperpyrexia_NN ,_, but_CC also_RB the_DT nervous_JJ excitement_NN and_CC exhaustion_NN attendant_NN on_IN it_PRP ._.
The_DT fatigue_NN attending_VBG these_DT operations_NNS was_VBD not_RB to_TO be_VB overlooked_VBN ,_, and_CC so_RB brandy_JJ and_CC milk_NN were_VBD given_VBN before_IN and_CC after_IN the_DT operation_NN ._.
Another_DT symptom_NN which_WDT required_VBD prompt_JJ treatment_NN was_VBD vomiting_VBG ._.
When_WRB it_PRP was_VBD persistent_JJ and_CC severe_JJ it_PRP was_VBD generally_RB looked_VBN upon_RP as_IN an_DT unfavourable_JJ sign_NN ,_, as_IN loss_NN of_IN strength_NN ensued_VBN owing_VBG to_TO the_DT rejection_NN of_IN food_NN and_CC medicines_NNS ._.
Mustard_NNP plaster_NN to_TO the_DT epigastrium_NN ,_, ice_NN to_TO suck_VB ,_, and_CC an_DT effervescing_VBG draught_NN with_IN liquor_NN morphin_NNS hydrochloratis_NN were_VBD generally_RB found_VBN sufficient_NN to_TO check_VB it_PRP ._.
The_DT last_JJ symptom_NN which_WDT required_VBD to_TO be_VB attended_VBN to_TO was_VBD the_DT glands_NNS ._.
When_WRB the_DT gland_NN was_VBD inflamed_VBN and_CC painful_JJ ,_, belladonna_NN with_IN glycerine_NN or_CC unguentum_JJ hydrargyri_NN or_CC strong_JJ liniment_NN iodi_NN was_VBD applied_VBN ,_, and_CC to_TO relieve_VB pain_NN it_PRP was_VBD fomented_VBN with_IN warm_JJ linseed_NN poultice_NN ._.
When_WRB the_DT gland_NN was_VBD ripe_JJ and_CC formed_VBD into_IN an_DT abscess_NN ,_, it_PRP was_VBD opened_VBN and_CC dressed_VBN daily_RB with_IN iodoform_NN '_'' boric_JJ acid_NN '_POS and_CC carbolic_JJ oil_NN ._.
Sleeplessness.-It_NNP was_VBD combated_VBN by_IN potas_NNS :_: bromide_NN and_CC hyocyamus_NN ._.
But_CC in_IN many_JJ cases_NNS morphia_VBP with_IN atropine_NN was_VBD used_VBN hypodermically_RB at_IN bed_NN time_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP generally_RB succeeded_VBD in_IN bringing_VBG on_IN sleep_NN and_CC making_VBG the_DT patient_NN quiet_NN ._.
In_IN some_DT cases_NNS when_WRB the_DT patient_NN was_VBD very_RB violent_JJ and_CC had_VBD no_DT rest_NN for_IN hours_NNS together_RB the_DT injection_NN was_VBD repeated_VBN every_DT eighth_JJ hour_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP was_VBD attended_VBN with_IN good_JJ results_NNS ._.
For_IN delirium_NN attended_VBN with_IN red_JJ eyes_NNS ,_, blister_NN to_TO the_DT nape_NN of_IN the_DT neck_NN was_VBD found_VBN very_RB useful_JJ in_IN restoring_VBG consciousness_NN ._.
Hygienic_NNP Treatment_NNP ._.
Attention_NN to_TO the_DT laws_NNS of_IN hygiene_NN is_VBZ necessary_JJ and_CC important_JJ not_RB only_RB for_IN the_DT welfare_NN of_IN the_DT sick_NN and_CC the_DT convalescent_NN ,_, but_CC also_RB for_IN the_DT welfare_NN of_IN those_DT who_WP are_VBP as_IN yet_RB in_IN the_DT enjoyment_NN of_IN good_JJ health_NN ._.
When_WRB we_PRP know_VBP that_IN persons_NNS suffering_VBG from_IN diseases_NNS much_RB less_RBR virulent_JJ and_CC infectious_JJ than_IN the_DT plague_NN ,_, require_VB to_TO be_VB placed_VBN in_IN good_JJ hygienic_JJ conditions_NNS for_IN their_PRP$ recovery_NN ,_, it_PRP can_MD not_RB be_VB doubted_VBN for_IN a_DT moment_NN that_IN these_DT conditions_NNS are_VBP essentially_RB necessary_JJ in_IN cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN ,_, for_IN it_PRP is_VBZ almost_RB certain_JJ that_IN its_PRP$ ?_. 273_CD epidemic_JJ occurrence_NN is_VBZ materially_RB influenced_VBN by_IN conditions_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN filth_NN ,_, over-crowd-_JJ ing_NN ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP not_RB infreqeuntly_RB happens_VBZ that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ to_TO good_JJ hygienic_JJ measures_NNS and_CC proper_JJ nourishment_NN ,_, rather_RB than_IN to_TO the_DT administrate_NN of_IN several_JJ drugs_NNS ,_, that_IN we_PRP do_VBP look_VB for_IN the_DT cure_NN of_IN our_PRP$ patients_NNS ._.
Drugs_NNP no_DT doubt_NN have_VBP a_DT value_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT considerable_JJ value_NN in_IN plague_NN cases_NNS ,_, but_CC it_PRP is_VBZ limited_VBN ,_, and_CC beyond_IN that_DT limit_NN it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB possible_JJ to_TO go_VB ._.
Recovery_NN in_IN plague_NN depends_NNS much_RB on_IN the_DT original_JJ constitution_NN of_IN the_DT person_NN and_CC the_DT nerve_NN stamina_NN in_IN him_PRP ._.
No_DT case_NN in_IN the_DT Hospital_NNP was_VBD subjected_VBN to_TO the_DT treatment_NN by_IN the_DT curative_JJ serum_NN of_IN Roux_NNP and_CC Lustig_NNP ._.
G._NNP B._NNP KHER_NNP ,_, L.M_NNP ._.
&_CC S._NNP ,_, Bombay_NNP ,_, 3rd_CD August_NNP 1899_CD ._.
Chief_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, Hindu_NNP Fever_NNP Hospital_NNP ._.
Notes_NNS by_IN the_DT Special_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP ._.
The_DT Committee_NNP and_CC the_DT Medical_JJ Officer_NNP are_VBP to_TO be_VB congratulated_VBN on_IN the_DT success_NN of_IN their_PRP$ undertaking_NN ._.
The_DT hospital_NN and_CC its_PRP$ surroundings_NNS were_VBD always_RB conducted_VBN on_IN the_DT most_RBS satisfactory_JJ manner_NN ._.
The_DT whole_JJ buildings_NNS were_VBD compact_JJ ,_, and_CC no_DT expense_NN of_IN trouble_NN was_VBD spared_VBN to_TO make_VB the_DT patients_NNS comfortable_JJ and_CC happy_JJ ._.
It_PRP was_VBD always_RB great_JJ pleasure_NN to_TO me_PRP to_TO visit_VB this_DT and_CC the_DT adjoining_NN hospitals_NNS ,_, as_IN any_DT suggestions_NNS I_PRP made_VBD were_VBD invariably_RB carried_VBN out_RP and_CC welcomed_VBD ._.
Rao_NNP Bahadur_NNP Naraen_NNP Trimbuck_NNP Viadya_NNP was_VBD indefatigable_JJ in_IN the_DT way_NN he_PRP worked_VBD for_IN the_DT good_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN and_CC camp_NN ,_, and_CC I_PRP can_MD not_RB thank_VB him_PRP too_RB much_RB for_IN the_DT support_NN he_PRP always_RB gave_VBD me_PRP ._.
No_DT ._.
13_CD ._.
The_DT Pathare_NNP Prabhu_NNP Fever_NNP Hospital_NNP ._.

1_CD ._.
This_DT Hospital_NNP ,_, situated_VBN in_IN the_DT Churney_NNP Road_NNP Gardens_NNP ,_, was_VBD re-opened_VBN on_IN the_DT 21st_CD December_NNP 1898_CD ._.
History_NN of_IN the_DT Foundation_NNP of_IN the_DT Hospital_NNP ._.
2_CD ._.
It_PRP had_VBD been_VBN opened_VBN ,_, with_IN the.sanction_NN of_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Committee_NNP ,_, in_IN Churney_NNP Road_NNP Gardens_NNP ,_, on_IN the_DT 10th_CD February_NNP 1898_CD ,_, with_IN a_DT view_NN to_TO encourage_VB timely_JJ removal_NN of_IN plague_NN patients_NNS belonging_VBG to_TO the_DT community_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT interest_NN of_IN the_DT sick_NN as_RB well_RB as_IN that_DT of_IN the_DT healthy_JJ ,_, a_DT provision_NN having_VBG also_RB been_VBN made_VBN for_IN locating_VBG the_DT latter_NN ._.
Ever_RB since_IN its_PRP$ establishment_NN in_IN 1898_CD ,_, this_DT Hospital_NNP has_VBZ been_VBN maintained_VBN with_IN the_DT help_NN of_IN funds_NNS contributed_VBN by_IN the_DT members_NNS of_IN the_DT community_NN ._.
It_PRP has_VBZ also_RB been_VBN under_IN the_DT active_JJ management_NN of_IN the_DT abovenamed_JJ medical_JJ gentlemen_NNS who_WP all_DT belong_VBP to_TO the_DT Pathare_NNP Prabhu_NNP community_NN ,_, and_CC have_VBP volun-_NNS teered_VBN their_PRP$ services_NNS with_IN desire_NN to_TO help_VB the_DT afflicted_JJ and_CC alleviate_VB their_PRP$ sufferings_NNS ._.
Subordinate_NNP Hospital_NNP Staff_NNP ._.
The_DT subordinate_JJ hospital_NN staff_NN ,_, since_IN December_NNP 1898_CD ,_, consisted_VBD of_IN one_CD resident_NN compounder_NN and_CC three_CD ward_NN boys_NNS ._.
Native_JJ nurses_NNS were_VBD engaged_VBN from_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN as_IN required_VBN ._.
?_. 274_CD Besides_IN the_DT above_NN paid_VBD staff_NN ,_, voluntary_JJ services_NNS were_VBD rendered_VBN by_IN the_DT following_JJ members_NNS of_IN the_DT community_NN :_: -_: Mr._NNP V._NNP A._NNP J._NNP Kirtikar_NNP ,_, Junior_NNP Medical_NNP Student._NNP ``_``

A._NNP S._NNP Nayak._NNP ``_``

Description_NN of_IN Hospital_NNP Buildings_NNP ,_, &_CC c_NN ._.
The_DT hospital_NN is_VBZ situated_VBN in_IN the_DT Churney_NNP Road_NNP Gardens_NNP ._.
It_PRP consists_VBZ of_IN two_CD Acute_NNP Wards_NNS ,_, two_CD Observation_NN Wards_NNS ,_, one_CD Convalescent_NNP Ward_NNP and_CC one_CD Dispensary_NNP ._.
All_PDT the_DT above_JJ wards_NNS are_VBP pukka_JJ built_VBN ,_, consisting_VBG of_IN plank_JJ partitions_NNS and_CC so_RB con-_JJ structed_VBN as_IN to_TO afford_VB free_JJ light_NN and_CC ventilation_NN ._.
The_DT Acute_NNP and_CC Observation_NNP Wards_NNP are_VBP large_JJ enough_RB to_TO accommodate_VB 12_CD patients_NNS at_IN a_DT time_NN while_IN in_IN the_DT Convalescent_NNP Ward_NNP there_EX is_VBZ an_DT accommodation_NN for_IN 12_CD patients_NNS besides_IN ._.
Attached_VBN to_TO the_DT hospital_NN and_CC close_RB to_TO it_PRP are_VBP contact_JJ and_CC segregation_NN camps_NNS ._.
The_DT contact_NN camp_NN ,_, intended_VBN especially_RB for_IN those_DT who_WP attend_VBP on_IN the_DT plague_NN patients_NNS ,_, consists_NNS of_IN a_DT block_NN of_IN six_CD rooms_NNS (_( vide_JJ plan_NN )_) enough_RB to_TO accommodate_VB about_IN 30_CD persons_NNS ._.
The_DT segregation_NN camp_NN was_VBD intended_VBN for_IN families_NNS who_WP were_VBD removed_VBN from_IN houses_NNS where_WRB plague_NN cases_NNS actually_RB occurred_VBD ,_, even_RB though_IN the_DT persons_NNS attacked_VBD did_VBD not_RB actually_RB belong_JJ to_TO those_DT families_NNS ._.
This_DT camp_NN consists_VBZ of_IN 2_CD blocks_NNS each_DT of_IN 6_CD rooms_NNS (_( vide_JJ plan_NN )_) enough_RB to_TO accommodate_VB 60_CD persons_NNS ._.
Besides_IN contact_NN and_CC segregation_NN camps_NNS ,_, the_DT Hospital_NNP had_VBD this_DT year_NN attached_VBD to_TO it_PRP two_CD health_NN camps_NNS ,_, one_CD on_IN the_DT Marine_NNP Lines_NNPS and_CC the_DT other_JJ between_IN the_DT Churney_NNP Road_NNP and_CC Marine_NNP Lines_NNP Stations_NNP ,_, for_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN such_JJ members_NNS of_IN the_DT Pathare_NNP Prabhu_NNP Community_NNP as_IN required_VBN immediate_JJ removal_NN from_IN infected_JJ localities_NNS ._.
And_CC the_DT Committee_NNP is_VBZ glad_JJ to_TO say_VB that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ on_IN account_NN of_IN this_DT valuable_JJ and_CC timely_JJ addition_NN to_TO the_DT hospital_NN ,_, that_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN patients_NNS admitted_VBN this_DT year_NN was_VBD very_RB low_JJ as_IN com-_NN pared_VBN with_IN the_DT number_NN admitted_VBN last_JJ year_NN ,_, and_CC this_DT in_IN spite_NN of_IN increased_JJ virulence_NN of_IN plague_NN this_DT year_NN throughout_IN the_DT city_NN and_CC especially_RB in_IN localities_NNS occupied_VBN by_IN the_DT mem-_JJ bers_NNS of_IN the_DT community_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT opinion_NN of_IN the_DT Medical_NNP Staff_NNP ,_, even_RB this_DT number_NN would_MD have_VB been_VBN still_RB lower_JJR if_IN the_DT members_NNS of_IN the_DT community_NN had_VBD taken_VBN due_JJ notice_NN of_IN the_DT warning_NN and_CC listened_VBD to_TO the_DT advice_NN regarding_VBG the_DT timely_JJ removal_NN to_TO health_NN camps_NNS ,_, given_VBN to_TO them_PRP long_RB before_IN the_DT last_JJ recrudescence_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_NN ._.
Conservancy_NN ._.
Attached_VBN to_TO the_DT Hospital_NNP ,_, contact_NN and_CC segregation_NN camps_NNS ,_, there_EX were_VBD five_CD latrines_NNS besides_IN the_DT urinals_NNS ,_, and_CC these_DT were_VBD connected_VBN with_IN masonry_NN built_VBN cesspools_NNS which_WDT were_VBD cleaned_VBN every_DT morning_NN and_CC evening_NN by_IN bhangies_NNS attached_VBN to_TO the_DT hospital_NN ._.
Special_JJ care_NN was_VBD taken_VBN to_TO keep_VB them_PRP quite_RB clean_JJ and_CC disinfectants_NNS were_VBD freely_RB used_VBN ._.
Water-supply_NNP ._.
Disinfection_NN of_IN Wards_NNP ,_, &_CC c._NN Two_CD taps_NNS were_VBD supplied_VBN within_IN the_DT compound_NN by_IN the_DT plague_NN authorities_NNS ._.
Utmost_NNP cleanliness_NN was_VBD observed_VBN in_IN wards_NNS ._.
Floors_NNS and_CC walls_NNS were_VBD constantly_RB lime-washed_JJ ,_, strong_JJ solutions_NNS of_IN perchloride_NN of_IN mercury_NN or_CC phenyle_NN being_VBG added_VBN to_TO the_DT lime-wash._JJ Carbolic_NNP powder_NN was_VBD also_RB used_VBN for_IN sprinkling_VBG over_IN the_DT floors_NNS ._.
Besides_IN the_DT above_JJ disinfectants_NNS ,_, lysol_JJ solution_NN was_VBD also_RB used_VBN for_IN washing_VBG hands_NNS ,_, &_CC c._NN Sputa_NNP and_CC excreta_NN were_VBD thoroughly_RB disinfected_VBN ,_, and_CC all_PDT the_DT dressings_NNS and_CC highly_RB infected_JJ clothing_NN removed_VBN from_IN the_DT patient_NN immediately_RB after_IN admission_NN ,_, were_VBD burnt_VBN ._.
The_DT hospital_NN clothing_NN used_VBN for_IN a_DT plague_NN patient_NN was_VBD ,_, immediately_RB on_IN removal_NN ,_, first_RB kept_VBD ?_. 275_CD by_IN the_DT bhangies_NNS ,_, at_IN least_JJS for_IN 48_CD hours_NNS ,_, in_IN a_DT tub_NN containing_VBG saturated_JJ solution_NN of_IN per-_JJ chloride_NN of_IN mercury_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB washed_VBD with_IN sea-water_NN ._.
The_DT clothing_NN was_VBD subsequently_RB handed_VBN over_RP to_TO the_DT dhobie_NN attached_VBD to_TO the_DT hospital_NN for_IN final_JJ washing_NN ._.
Special_JJ care_NN was_VBD taken_VBN to_TO see_VB that_DT every_DT article_NN of_IN clothing_NN was_VBD put_VBN in_IN a_DT ``_`` Bhutty_NNP ``_`` constructed_VBD for_IN the_DT purpose_NN close_RB to_TO the_DT hospital_NN ,_, with_IN a_DT view_NN to_TO subject_VB it_PRP to_TO a_DT high_JJ temperature_NN ._.
Disposal_NN of_IN the_DT dead_JJ ._.
In_IN each_DT and_CC every_DT case_NN immediately_RB after_IN death_NN ,_, the_DT body_NN was_VBD wrapped_VBN in-_JJ a_DT sheet_NN saturated_VBN with_IN a_DT strong_JJ solution_NN of_IN perchloride_NN of_IN mercury_NN and_CC then_RB carried_VBD on_IN a_DT special_JJ stretcher_NN to_TO the_DT mortuary_JJ shed_NN ,_, erected_VBD about_IN 55_CD yards_NNS from_IN the_DT hospital_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT majority_NN of_IN cases_NNS ,_, all_DT such_JJ bodies_NNS were_VBD taken_VBN from_IN the_DT mortuary_NN to_TO the_DT burning_NN ground_NN ,_, quite_RB up_IN to_TO the_DT pyre_NN ,_, upon_IN a_DT light_JJ ambulance_NN car_NN specially_RB kept_VBD for_IN the_DT purpose_NN ._.
Sickness_NN or_CC mortality_NN amongst_VBP the_DT Staff_NNP ._.
Pneumonic_JJ patients_NNS were_VBD always_RB kept_VBN separated_VBN from_IN the_DT plague_NN patients_NNS and_CC special_JJ precautions_NNS were_VBD taken_VBN by_IN the_DT staff_NN attending_VBG such_JJ patients_NNS ._.
Care_NN was_VBD taken_VBN to_TO see_VB that_IN ward-boys_JJ and_CC native_JJ nurses_NNS never_RB entered_VBD the_DT hospital_NN premises_NNS with_IN out_RP shoes_NNS on_IN ._.
And_CC ,_, as_IN a_DT result_NN of_IN such_JJ precautions_NNS ,_, the_DT Committee_NNP is_VBZ glad_JJ to_TO say_VB that_IN none_NN of_IN the_DT staff_NN working_VBG in_IN the_DT Hospital_NNP caught_VBD the_DT contagion_NN or_CC suffered_VBN in_IN any_DT way_NN ._.
The_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN patients_NNS admitted_VBN for_IN Plague_NNP during_IN the_DT year_NN under_IN report_NN was_VBD 36_CD ._.
Of_IN these_DT 26_CD died_VBD and_CC 10_CD recovered_VBN ._.

The_DT type_NN was_VBD as_IN virulent_NN ,_, the_DT chief_NN symptoms_NNS being_VBG high_JJ fever_NN ,_, headache_NN ,_, vomiting_VBG ,_, and_CC glandular_JJ enlargements_NNS ._.
In_IN the_DT majority_NN of_IN cases_NNS of_IN recovery_NN the_DT buboes_NNS suppurate_VB ,_, the_DT treatment_NN was_VBD more_RBR or_CC less_RBR symp-_JJ tomatic_JJ ,_, but_CC ice_NN on_IN the_DT head_NN and_CC gland_NN ,_, wet_JJ pack_NN and_CC stimulants_NNS have_VBP been_VBN found_VBN useful_JJ ._.
V._NNP S._NNP DIVAN_NNP ,_, Medical_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, 30th_CD June_NNP 1899_CD 282_CD No_DT ._.
15_CD Report_NNP on_IN the_DT G._NNP Lund_NNP 's_POS Hospital_NNP ,_, Bombay_NNP ,_, from_IN the_DT 26th_CD September_NNP 1898_CD to_TO 30th_CD November_NNP 1898_CD ._.
The_DT hospital_NN was_VBD founded_VBN by_IN Mr._NNP G._NNP Lund_NNP ,_, in_IN the_DT compound_NN of_IN the_DT late_JJ Mr._NNP Justice_NNP Telang_NNP 's_POS properties_NNS ,_, for_IN the_DT benefit_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS living_VBG in_IN those_DT blocks_NNS ,_, as_IN those_DT labouring_JJ classes_NNS had_VBD the_DT great_JJ dread_NN of_IN being_VBG removed_VBN to_TO the_DT hospital_NN ,_, Maratha_NNP or_CC Arthur_NNP Road_NNP ._.
It_PRP was_VBD opened_VBN on_IN the_DT 26th_CD September_NNP 1898_CD ,_, by_IN Mr._NNP Wingate_NNP ,_, the_DT Plague_NNP Com-_NNP missioner_NN ,_, Mr._NNP Harvey_NNP ,_, the_DT Municipal_NNP Commissioner_NNP ,_, Mr._NNP DuBoulay_NNP ,_, the_DT Deputy_NNP Commissioner_NNP ,_, and_CC some_DT other_JJ gentlemen_NNS ._.
There_EX was_VBD no_DT regular_JJ Committee_NNP formed_VBD ,_, but_CC Mr._NNP G._NNP Lund_NNP used_VBD to_TO come_VB daily_RB to_TO see_VB the_DT management_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN ;_: S._NNP Rajaballi_NNP V._NNP Patel_NNP acted_VBD as_IN a_DT Medical_JJ Officer_NNP in_IN charge_NN ,_, and_CC K._NNP S._NNP Bhimjibhoy_NNP R._NNP Ashburner_NNP as_IN a_DT secretary_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT Native_NNP Hindoo_NNP Nurse_NNP ,_, one_CD Hindoo_NNP Hamal_NNP ,_, and_CC two_CD sweepers_NNS in_IN all_DT comprised_VBD the_DT Hospital_NNP staff_NN ._.
The_DT hospital_NN was_VBD composed_VBN of_IN three_CD big_JJ blocks_NNS ,_, two_CD permanent_NN and_CC one_CD tem-_NN porary_NN ,_, made_VBN of_IN zawli_NN ;_: they_PRP are_VBP quite_RB open_JJ on_IN all_DT sides_NNS and_CC are_VBP about_IN 20_CD feet_NNS high_JJ ;_: the_DT half_NN of_IN the_DT largest_JJS block_NN was_VBD divided_VBN into_IN 4_CD big_JJ wards_NNS ,_, each_DT accommodating_VBG about_IN 10_CD beds_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT other_JJ half_NN was_VBD used_VBN for_IN the_DT relatives_NNS of_IN the_DT patients_NNS who_WP were_VBD direct_JJ attendants_NNS ._.
The_DT other_JJ permanent_JJ block_NN consists_NNS of_IN three_CD big_JJ rooms_NNS ,_, of_IN which_WDT one_NN was_VBD used_VBN by_IN the_DT nurse_NN ,_, another_DT as_IN a_DT cook-room_NN for_IN the_DT patients_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT third_JJ as_IN a_DT store-room_NN ._.
All_PDT the_DT excreta_NN of_IN the_DT patients_NNS were_VBD received_VBN in_IN small_JJ tin_NN tarred_JJ chatties_NNS full_JJ of_IN strong_JJ solution_NN of_IN carbolic_JJ acid_VBP one_CD in_IN 20_CD ,_, after_IN having_VBG allowed_VBN excreta_NN to_TO remain_VB in_IN that_DT strong_JJ lotion_NN for_IN some_DT time_NN ,_, the_DT contents_NNS were_VBD thrown_VBN in_IN the_DT latrine_JJ baskets_NNS in_IN the_DT sweeper_NN gulli_NN which_WDT is_VBZ quite_RB close_JJ and_CC easily_RB accessible_JJ ._.
The_DT clothes_NNS of_IN the_DT patients_NNS were_VBD soaked_VBN in_IN a_DT tub_JJ full_JJ of_IN strong_JJ solution_NN of_IN mercury_NN (_( 1_CD in_IN 500_CD )_) for_IN a_DT few_JJ hours_NNS before_IN they_PRP were_VBD given_VBN to_TO Dhobies_NNS ._.
The_DT water_NN used_VBN for_IN drinking_NN purposes_NNS was_VBD obtained_VBN from_IN ordinary_JJ water-pipes_NNS ,_, while_IN the_DT well_NN water_NN was_VBD used_VBN for_IN ordinary_JJ working_NN purposes_NNS ._.
The_DT wards_NNS were_VBD thoroughly_RB disinfected_VBN with_IN H._NNP P._NNP Solution_NNP (_( 1_CD in_IN 500_CD )_) and_CC then_RB lime-washed_JJ ._.
The_DT clothes_NNS of_IN the_DT patients_NNS were_VBD taken_VBN in_IN our_PRP$ office_NN load_NN car_NN used_VBN by_IN coolies_NNS to_TO take_VB away_RP disinfectants_NNS ,_, to_TO the_DT Narielwadi_NNP sterilizer_NN ,_, and_CC were_VBD kept_VBN there_RB for_IN about_RB 24_CD hours_NNS ._.
The_DT dead_JJ were_VBD covered_VBN in_IN the_DT hospital_NN sheets_NNS soaked_VBD in_IN strong_JJ carbolic_JJ solution_NN ,_, and_CC were_VBD taken_VBN to_TO the_DT cemeteries_NNS to_TO be_VB burnt_VBN ._.
The_DT mortuary_NN was_VBD situated_VBN away_RB from_IN the_DT kitchen_NN and_CC store_NN ,_, and_CC was_VBD open_JJ ._.
The_DT ground_NN was_VBD made_VBN of_IN chunam_NN and_CC had_VBD no_DT roof_NN and_CC was_VBD quite_RB open_JJ to_TO the_DT sun_NN ._.
The_DT poor_JJ and_CC the_DT unclaimed_JJ dead_JJ bodies_NNS were_VBD taken_VBN away_RB and_CC cremated_VBN at_IN Mr._NNP G._NNP Lund_NNP 's_POS expense_NN ._.
One_CD patient_NN named_VBN Rangia_NNP Khandoo_NNP ,_, age_NN 24_CD ,_, male_NN Maratha_NNP ,_, ._.
was_VBD inoculated_VBN on_IN the_DT 4th_CD September_NNP 1898_CD ,_, was_VBD attacked_VBN with_IN plague_NN on_IN the_DT 4th_CD October_NNP 1898_CD discharged_VBD cured_VBN from_IN the_DT hospital_NN ._.
There_EX ,_, was_VBD neither_DT sickness_JJ nor_CC death_NN among_IN the_DT Hospital_NNP staff_NN ._.

2_CD ._.
History_NN of_IN the_DT forma-_JJ tion_NN of_IN the_DT Hospital_NNP ,_, &_CC c._NN When_WRB the_DT Plague_NNP was_VBD raging_VBG heavily_RB ,_, and_CC the_DT other_JJ hospitals_NNS were_VBD nearly_RB full_JJ of_IN patients_NNS ,_, and_CC in_IN some_DT cases_NNS when_WRB difficulty_NN was_VBD experienced_VBN in_IN removing_VBG the_DT patients_NNS to_TO long_JJ distances_NNS ,_, the_DT leaders_NNS of_IN the_DT community_NN thought_VBD it_PRP better_JJR to_TO open_VB an_DT hospital_NN in_IN the_DT midst_NN of_IN their_PRP$ locality_NN and_CC under_IN the_DT supervision_NN of_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ caste_NN men_NNS ._.
Hence_RB the_DT hospital_NN was_VBD opened_VBN on_IN the_DT 17th_CD February_NNP 1898_CD ._.

Description_NN of_IN the_DT Hospi-_NNP tal_NN Building_NNP Wards_NNP ,_, Ser-_NNP vants_NNS ,_, Quar-_JJ ters_NNS ,_, &_CC c._NN It_PRP is_VBZ a_DT three-storeyed_JJ building_NN ,_, well-vontilated_JJ and_CC with_IN sufficient_JJ light_NN ,_, situated_VBD near_IN the_DT Cawasjee_NNP Patel_NNP Tank_NNP ._.
It_PRP belongs_VBZ to_TO Seth_NNP Jekeesandas_NNP Gangadas_NNP ._.
It_PRP con-_JJ tained_JJ six_CD different_JJ wards-four_NNS for_IN Plague_NNP cases_NNS ,_, one_CD for_IN observation_NN and_CC one_CD for_IN convalescents_NNS ._.

4_CD ._.
Conservancy_NN ._.
The_DT building_NN has_VBZ permanent_JJ privies_NNS provided_VBN with_IN water_NN tanks_NNS ._.
Two_CD sweepers_NNS were_VBD employed_VBN to_TO keep_VB them_PRP clean_JJ ._.
In_IN all_DT there_EX were_VBD six_CD seats_NNS ._.
The_DT privies_NNS are_VBP connected_VBN according_VBG to_TO the_DT new_JJ system_NN with_IN the_DT main_JJ sewage_NN ,_, and_CC phenyle_JJ water_NN was_VBD used_VBN from_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN to_TO remove_VB the_DT filth_NN ._.
?_. 286_CD Phenyle_NNPS and_CC carbolic_JJ water_NN was_VBD used_VBN by_IN the_DT sweepers_NNS to_TO disinfect_VB clothes_NNS before_IN they_PRP were_VBD handed_VBN over_IN to_TO the_DT dhobie_NN ._.

5_CD ._.

6_CD ._.

Wards_NNS and_CC other_JJ rooms_NNS were_VBD lime-washed_JJ and_CC disinfected_VBN by_IN the_DT constant_JJ use_NN of_IN phenyle_JJ lotion_NN ,_, and_CC McDougall_NNP 's_POS powder_NN was_VBD used_VBN profusely_RB ._.

They_PRP were_VBD sent_VBN by_IN a_DT bullock_NN cart_NN and_CC were_VBD kept_VBN there_RB for_IN about_RB 2_CD hours_NNS ._.
7_CD ._.
Disposal_NN of_IN the_DT Dead_NNP ._.
Immediately_RB after_IN a_DT death_NN occurred_VBD the_DT body_NN was_VBD wrapped_VBN in_IN a_DT sheet_NN well_RB satur-_RB ated_VBN with_IN a_DT solution_NN of_IN Perchloride_NNP of_IN Mercury_NNP and_CC then_RB carried_VBD away_RB to_TO the_DT Mortuary_NNP ,_, and_CC thence_VB the_DT body_NN was_VBD removed_VBN to_TO the_DT Burning_NNP Ground_NNP ,_, Sonapoor_NNP ._.
Just_RB on_IN the_DT left_JJ side_NN of_IN the_DT entrance_NN to_TO the_DT hospital_NN ,_, a_DT room_NN was_VBD specially_RB used_VBN as_IN a_DT mortuary_NN ._.

9_CD ._.

R._NNP Damoder_NNP Ganesh_NNP ,_, a_DT compounder_NN was_VBD admitted_VBN in_IN the_DT hospital_NN on_IN the_DT evening_NN of_IN the_DT 14th_JJ February_NNP with_IN high_JJ fever_NN and_CC Bubo_NNP in_IN the_DT R._NNP Axilla_NNP ._.

Buboes_NNS ._.
They_PRP are_VBP usually_RB accompanied_VBN by_IN some_DT pain_NN ._.

Children_NNP As_NNP much_RB has_VBZ been_VBN said_VBD in_IN the_DT two_CD previous_JJ years_NNS '_POS reports_NNS on_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ ,_, it_PRP would_MD be_VB sufficient_JJ to_TO mention_VB here_RB that_IN this_DT year_NN 's_POS epidemic_NN in_IN no_DT way_NN materially_RB differed_VBN from_IN the_DT two_CD previous_JJ ones_NNS ._.
The_DT type_NN was_VBD as_IN virulent_NN ;_: the_DT chief_NN symptoms_NNS being_VBG high_JJ fever_NN ,_, headache_NN ,_, vomiting_VBG and_CC glandular_JJ enlargements_NNS ._.
In_IN the_DT majority_NN of_IN cases_NNS of_IN recovery_NN the_DT buboes_NNS suppurate_VB ,_, the_DT treatment_NN was_VBD more_RBR or_CC less_RBR symptomatic_JJ but_CC ice_NN on_IN he_PRP head_NN and_CC gland_NN ,_, wet_JJ pack_NN and_CC stimulants_NNS have_VBP been_VBN found_VBN useful_JJ ._.

Notes_NNS by_IN the_DT Special_NNP Plague_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP ._.
Situated_VBN in_IN a_DT densely_RB crowded_JJ part_NN of_IN the_DT City-viz._NNP ,_, in_IN Buleshwar_NNP ._.
No_DT ._.
19_CD ._.
Report_NN of_IN the_DT Telugu_NNP Hospital_NNP for_IN the_DT year_NN 1898-1899_RB ._.
I_PRP ._.
Report_NN on_IN the_DT Telugu_NNP Plague_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, Bombay_NNP ,_, from_IN the_DT 1st_CD of_IN June_NNP 1898_CD to_TO the_DT 31st_CD of_IN May_NNP 1899_CD ._.
II_NNP ._.
The_DT hospital_NN was_VBD founded_VBN in_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN April_NNP 1897_CD and_CC opened_VBD on_IN the_DT 14th_CD of_IN the_DT same_JJ month_NN ._.
A_DT public_JJ subscription_NN was_VBD circulated_VBN among_IN the_DT various_JJ Telugu_NNP Communities_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT fund_NN amounted_VBD to_TO nearly_RB 1,500_CD rupees_NNS ._.
In_IN that_DT year_NN a_DT Committee_NNP consisting_NN of_IN late_JJ Mr._NNP Karady_NNP Lingu_NNP ,_, Messrs._NNP Manajee_NNP Rajoojee_NNP ,_, Abbajee_NNP Abboo_NNP ,_, and_CC Mulloo_NNP Luxman_NNP as_IN Secretary_NNP ,_, was_VBD formed_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT hospital_NN management_NN was_VBD carried_VBN for_IN a_DT period_NN of_IN 4_CD months_NNS by_IN the_DT above_JJ Committee_NNP ._.
When_WRB the_DT hospital_NN fund_NN was_VBD exhausted_VBN ,_, a_DT gentleman_NN by_IN name_NN Mr._NNP Rajoo_NNP Babaji_NNP (_( who_WP is_VBZ at_IN present_JJ supporting_VBG the_DT hospital_NN )_) came_VBD forward_RB and_CC offered_VBD 200_CD rupees_NNS ;_: and_CC then_RB for_IN the_DT following_JJ 8_CD months_NNS ,_, i.e._FW ,_, from_IN September_NNP 1897_CD to_TO May_NNP 1898_CD ,_, the_DT expenses_NNS were_VBD borne_VBN by_IN Rao_NNP Bahadur_NNP Ellapa_NNP Ballaram_NNP ._.
The_DT hospital_NN was_VBD again_RB supported_VBN by_IN subscription_NN till_NN 31st_CD of_IN December_NNP 1898_CD ._.
From_IN January_NNP 1899_CD up_IN to_TO date_NN Mr._NNP Rajoo_NNP Babajee_NNP ,_, a_DT well-known_JJ Mill_NNP Contractor_NNP of_IN Shett_NNP Lukhmidass_NNP Khimji_NNP ,_, has_VBZ borne_VBN all_PDT the_DT expenses_NNS ._.
The_DT Hospital_NNP Committee_NNP lasted_VBD up_RB to_TO December_NNP 1898_CD ;_: after_IN this_DT Mr._NNP Rajoo_NNP Babajee_NNP ,_, the_DT present_JJ donor_NN ,_, took_VBD over_RP sole_JJ charge_NN and_CC management_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN from_IN the_DT Committee_NNP ,_, and_CC has_VBZ given_VBN full_JJ liberty_NN to_TO all_DT persons_NNS seeking_VBG aid_NN of_IN this_DT hospital_NN to_TO have_VB treatment_NN of_IN any_DT doctor_NN ,_, Vaid_NNP ,_, or_CC Hakeem_NNP ,_, thus_RB encouraging_VBG people_NNS to_TO resort_VB to_TO the_DT hospital_NN ._.
Hospital_JJ Staff_NNP ._.
Medical_JJ Officer_NNP P._NNP J._NNP Svami_NNP (_( Honorary_NNP ._. )_)
Ward-boys_JJ 3_CD Ayah_NNP 1_CD Dhobee_NNP 1_CD Sweepers_NNP 2_CD Supplied_NNP by_IN the_DT Municipality_NNP ._.
Eamosees_NNS 2_CD Do_NNP ._.
do_NN ._.
?_. 296_CD III_NNP ._.
The_DT hospital_NN is_VBZ situated_VBN in_IN a_DT thickly_NN populated_VBN locality_NN ;_: it_PRP consists_VBZ of_IN a_DT one_CD story_NN building_NN ,_, built_NN of_IN stone_NN ._.
Formerly_RB it_PRP was_VBD used_VBN to_TO celebrate_VB marriage_NN ceremonies_NNS ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ 46_CD feet_NNS by_IN 35_CD feet_NNS ._.
It_PRP has_VBZ 6_CD wards_NNS ,_, 3_CD on_IN the_DT ground_NN and_CC 3_CD on_IN the_DT upper_JJ floor_NN ._.
On_IN the_DT ground_NN floor_NN each_DT ward_NN measures_VBZ 23_CD feet_NNS in_IN length_NN ,_, 10_CD feet_NNS in_IN breadth_NN ,_, and_CC 13_CD feet_NNS in_IN height_NN ,_, and_CC has_VBZ a_DT verandah_NN measuring_VBG 46_CD feet_NNS by_IN 8_CD feet_NNS ._.
The_DT upper_JJ floor_NN has_VBZ also_RB a_DT gallery_NN and_CC each_DT ward_NN measures_VBZ 23_CD feet_NNS long_RB ,_, 10_CD feet_NNS broad_JJ ,_, and_CC 101/2_CD feet_NNS high_JJ ._.
Two_CD beds_NNS are_VBP generally_RB placed_VBN in_IN a_DT ward_NN ._.
Adjoining_VBG to_TO the_DT hospital_NN on_IN the_DT north_JJ side_NN of_IN it_PRP ,_, there_EX is_VBZ also_RB a_DT building_NN which_WDT contains_VBZ (_( 6_CD )_) six_CD rooms_NNS ,_, 3_CD on_IN the_DT ground_NN floor_NN ,_, and_CC 3_CD on_IN the_DT upper_JJ floor_NN ._.
This_DT building_NN is_VBZ 28_CD feet_NNS long_RB ,_, 12_CD feet_NNS broad_JJ and_CC 19_CD feet_NNS high_JJ ._.
Each_DT room_NN is_VBZ 10_CD feet_NNS 8_CD feet_NNS 9_CD feet_NNS ._.
As_IN for_IN the_DT dispensary_JJ some_DT arrangements_NNS were_VBD made_VBN on_IN the_DT gallery_NN of_IN the_DT upper_JJ story_NN ._.
There_EX is_VBZ a_DT contact_NN shed_VBN to_TO the_DT east_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN ,_, erected_VBN on_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP grounds_NNS ,_, but_CC very_RB little_JJ use_NN was_VBD made_VBN of_IN it_PRP ._.
There_EX is_VBZ a_DT Government_NNP Girls_NNP '_POS School_NNP close_NN by_IN in_IN which_WDT accommodation_NN is_VBZ found_VBN for_IN the_DT servants_NNS ._.
IV_NNP ._.
In_IN the_DT hospital_NN compound_NN there_EX are_VBP latrines_NNS ,_, (_( 2_CD )_) two_CD worked_VBN by_IN the_DT flushing_NN system_NN and_CC one_CD is_VBZ cleaned_VBN by_IN sweepers_NNS ._.
Each_DT has_VBZ one_CD seat_NN ._.
The_DT sewage_NN and_CC waste_NN water_NN are_VBP carried_VBN away_RB by_IN the_DT underground_JJ drain_NN ._.
The_DT clothes_NNS of_IN patients_NNS are_VBP saturated_VBN in_IN solution_NN of_IN Perchloride_NNP of_IN Mercury_NNP for_IN 24_CD hours_NNS previous_JJ to_TO their_PRP$ being_VBG given_VBN to_TO Dhobies_NNS ._.
V._VB The_DT water_NN supply_NN is_VBZ derived_VBN from_IN the_DT pipe_NN which_WDT supplies_VBZ the_DT City_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
VI_NNP ._.
The_DT hospital_NN wards_NNS are_VBP disinfected_VBN twice_RB a_DT day_NN with_IN a_DT solution_NN of_IN Perchlo-_NNP ride_NN of_IN Mercury-strength_NNP 1_CD in_IN 1,000_CD ;_: after_IN that_DT Carbolic_NNP powder_NN is_VBZ sprinkled_VBN over_IN ._.
The_DT privies_NNS and_CC drains_NNS and_CC the_DT hospital_NN surroundings_NNS ,_, drains_NNS ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, are_VBP disinfected_VBN with_IN a_DT solution_NN of_IN phenyle_NN ._.
No_DT Steam_NNP Disinfector_NNP was_VBD used_VBN in_IN the_DT hospital_NN ._.
VII_NNP ._.
As_RB soon_RB as_IN a_DT patient_NN died_VBD ,_, the_DT body_NN as_IN it_PRP laid_VBD on_IN the_DT cot_NN ,_, was_VBD removed_VBN to_TO the_DT Mortuary_NNP ._.
The_DT Mortuary_NNP is_VBZ situated_VBN on_IN the_DT north_JJ side_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN ,_, about_IN 50_CD feet_NNS from_IN it_PRP ;_: it_PRP is_VBZ built_VBN of_IN bamboo_NN tatties_NNS and_CC measures_VBZ 20_CD X_NN 20_CD feet_NNS ._.
The_DT funeral_NN of_IN Pauper_NNP patients_NNS was_VBD performed_VBN by_IN charitable_JJ persons_NNS who_WP paid_VBD the_DT necessary_JJ expenses_NNS for_IN their_PRP$ disposal_NN ._.
IX_NNP ._.
The_DT staff_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN did_VBD not_RB suffer_VB from_IN any_DT illness_NN ._.

?_. 299_CD TABLE_NNP VII_NNP ._.
