TABLE_NNP VIII_NNP ._.
Nil_NNP ._.
No_DT routine_JJ line_NN of_IN treatment_NN was_VBD adopted_VBN and_CC every_DT case_NN was_VBD treated_VBN according_VBG to_TO symptoms_NNS present_JJ ._.
Patients_NNS in_IN a_DT collapse_NN condition_NN were_VBD treated_VBN with_IN stimulants_NNS ,_, viz._NN ,_, AEthaer_NNP ,_, Digitalis_NNP ,_, -_: Strychnine_NN ,_, Brandy_NNP ,_, and_CC Ammonia_NNP ,_, some_DT hypodermically_RB ,_, and_CC sometimes_RB by_IN the_DT mouth_NN ._.
Nutritive_JJ enemas_NN were_VBD given_VBN ._.
Buboes_NNS were_VBD generally_RB Femoral_NNP and_CC Axillary_NNP ,_, and_CC appeared_VBD on_IN the_DT 2nd_CD ,_, 3rd_CD and_CC 4th_CD day_NN of_IN the_DT outset_NN ._.
Very_RB few_JJ glands_NNS subsided_VBN ,_, most_JJS suppurated_VBN between_IN 8_CD and_CC 12_CD days_NNS ._.
Left_NNP Groin_NNP and_CC Left_NNP Axilla_NNP most_JJS fatal_JJ ._.
Convalescence_NN lasts_NNS from_IN 4_CD to_TO 6_CD weeks_NNS ._.
In_IN conclusion_NN ,_, I_PRP can_MD not_RB help_VB but_CC thank_VB Lieut_NNP ._.
French_JJ ,_, District_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, for_IN his_PRP$ kindness_NN towards_IN the_DT staff_NN ,_, and_CC patients_NNS of_IN this_DT hospital_NN ;_: and_CC also_RB for_IN the_DT great_JJ interest_NN he_PRP took_VBD in_IN the_DT hospital_NN matters_NNS ._.
It_PRP must_MD not_RB be_VB omitted_VBN to_TO mention_VB here_RB that_IN Dr._NNP M._NNP N._NNP Kapadia_NNP ,_, by_IN his_PRP$ kind_NN treatment_NN to_TO the_DT afflicted_JJ persons_NNS in_IN the_DT section_NN ,_, contributed_VBD a_DT great_JJ deal_NN towards_IN the_DT progress_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN ._.
With_IN these_DT few_JJ observations_NNS I_PRP beg_VBP to_TO conclude_VB the_DT report_NN ._.
P._NNP J._NNP SVAMI_NNP ,_, Honorary_NNP Physician_NNP ,_, Telugu_NNP Plague_NNP Hospital_NNP ._.
Notes_NNS by_IN the_DT Special_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP ._.
This_DT hospital_NN is_VBZ situated_VBN in_IN a_DT densely_RB crowded_JJ part_NN of_IN Camateepura_NNP and_CC though_IN it_PRP did_VBD good_JJ ,_, I_PRP can_MD not_RB help_VB stating_VBG that_IN I_PRP think_VBP that_IN the_DT rooms_NNS used_VBN as_IN wards_NNS were_VBD very_RB small_JJ and_CC ill-ventilated_JJ ._.
No_DT ._.
20_CD ._.

?_. 302_CD Notes_NNS by_IN the_DT Special_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP ._.
The_DT hospital_NN was_VBD situated_VBN in_IN a_DT densely_RB crowded_JJ part_NN of_IN the_DT city_NN ._.
I_PRP am_VBP not_RB at_IN all_DT satisfied_JJ with_IN the_DT sanitary_JJ condition_NN of_IN the_DT situation_NN ._.
Ventilation_NN and_CC light_NN ,_, bad_JJ ._.
I_PRP think_VBP this_DT place_NN quite_RB unsuitable_JJ for_IN a_DT Private_NNP Hospital_NNP ._.

21_CD ._.
Jain_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, Parel_NNP ._.

I_PRP ._.
Report_NN on_IN the_DT Parel_NNP Plague_NNP Jain_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, Bombay_NNP ,_, from_IN the_DT 1st_CD of_IN June_NNP 1898._CD to_TO 31st_CD of_IN May_NNP 1899_CD ._.
II_NNP ._.
The_DT hospital_NN was_VBD opened_VBN in_IN April_NNP 1897_CD ._.
It_PRP was_VBD originally_RB a_DT small_JJ shed_NN and_CC when_WRB the_DT monsoons_NNS set_VBN in_IN ,_, the_DT authorities_NNS concerned_VBN converted_VBD the_DT shed_VBN into_IN a_DT pucca_JJ hospital_NN ._.
The_DT donors_NNS of_IN the_DT hospital_NN are_VBP members_NNS of_IN the_DT Vissa_NNP Jain_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT Committee_NNP consists_VBZ of_IN the_DT following_JJ gentlemen_NNS :_: -Mr._NN Dhamjee_NNP Lukmichand_NNP ,_, J._NNP P._NNP ,_, Mr._NNP Luckumsy_NNP Napoo_NNP Nansy_NNP ,_, J._NNP P._NNP ,_, and_CC Mr._NNP Barwal_NNP Rawjee_NNP ,_, who_WP is_VBZ the_DT most_RBS promi-_JJ nent_JJ man_NN and_CC takes_VBZ very_RB active_JJ part_NN in_IN the_DT hospital_NN affairs_NNS ._.
The_DT Medical_JJ Officer_NNP in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN is_VBZ Dr._NNP N._NNP F._NNP Pereira_NNP ._.
The_DT Medical_JJ Staff_NNP consists_VBZ of_IN a_DT Medical_JJ Officer_NNP abovementioned_VBD ,_, two_CD Hospital_NN Assistants_NNS and_CC six_CD Ward-boys_JJ ,_, one_CD Dhobie_NNP and_CC a_DT cook_NN ._.
The_DT donations_NNS which_WDT the_DT hospital_NN received_VBD are_VBP the_DT voluntary_JJ contribu-_JJ tions_NNS from_IN the_DT members_NNS of_IN the_DT Jain_NNP community_NN ._.
III_NNP ._.
The_DT hospital_NN buildings_NNS are_VBP divided_VBN into_IN 8_CD wards_NNS ,_, 4_CD of_IN which_WDT are_VBP for_IN the_DT male_NN patients_NNS ,_, 2_CD for_IN the_DT female_NN ,_, one_CD is_VBZ used_VBN for_IN segregation_NN or_CC contacts_NNS ,_, and_CC one_CD for_IN convalescents_NNS ,_, The_DT whole_JJ building_NN measures_NNS 150_CD feet_NNS in_IN length_NN and_CC 30_CD feet_NNS in_IN breadth_NN ._.
The_DT Dispensary_NNP is_VBZ attached_VBN to_TO the_DT convalescent_NN ward_NN ._.
English_JJ as_RB well_RB as_IN country_NN medicines_NNS are_VBP kept_VBN ._.
The_DT servants_NNS '_POS quarters_NNS are_VBP adjacent_JJ to_TO the_DT same_JJ ward_NN ._.
The_DT contact_NN sheds_NNS which_WDT are_VBP apart_RB from_IN the_DT other_JJ sheds_NNS can_MD accommodate_VB 12_CD patients_NNS j_NN at_IN present_JJ no_DT one_NN is_VBZ confined_VBN here_RB ._.
The_DT hospital_NN buildings_NNS are_VBP very_RB well_RB ventilated_VBN and_CC every_DT measure_NN that_WDT is_VBZ needed_VBN towards_IN the_DT cleanliness_NN of_IN the_DT place_NN is_VBZ strictly_RB carried_VBN out_RP ._.
IV_NNP ._.
There_EX are_VBP four_CD latrines_NNS ._.
The_DT excretions_NNS are_VBP first_RB disinfected_VBN in_IN the_DT wards_NNS ,_, whence_NN they_PRP are_VBP deposited_VBN in_IN the_DT latrines_NNS and_CC removed_VBD as_IN usual_JJ by_IN the_DT Halal-_NNP core_NN ._.
The_DT latrines_NNS have_VBP a_DT seat_NN each_DT and_CC are_VBP about_IN 80_CD or_CC 90_CD yards_NNS apart_RB from_IN the_DT hospital_NN buildings_NNS ._.
The_DT clothes_NNS are_VBP disinfected_VBN with_IN Perchloride_NNP of_IN Mercury_NNP Solution_NNP and_CC Chloride_NNP of_IN Lime_NNP ,_, and_CC then_RB the_DT same_JJ are_VBP handed_VBN over_IN to_TO the_DT dhobie_NN ._.
No_DT sugges-_JJ tions_NNS can_MD be_VB made_VBN as_IN the_DT present_JJ procedure_NN is_VBZ all_DT that_WDT can_MD be_VB desired_VBN ._.
V._NNP The_DT supply_NN of_IN water_NN is_VBZ derived_VBN from_IN the_DT Vehar_NNP Lake_NNP ._.
VI_NNP ._.
In_IN disinfecting_VBG the_DT hospital_NN buildings_NNS ,_, (_( 1_CD )_) Phenyle_NN and_CC Carbolic_NNP Lotion_NNP and_CC (_( 2_CD )_) Chloride_NNP of_IN Lime_NNP and_CC Perchloride_NNP of_IN Mercury_NNP are_VBP used_VBN ._.
The_DT place_NN is_VBZ systemati-_JJ cally_RB disinfected_VBN twice_RB a_DT day_NN ,_, morning_NN and_CC evening_NN ._.
VII_NNP ._.
The_DT dead_JJ ,_, whether_IN poor_JJ or_CC rich_JJ ,_, are_VBP all_DT conveyed_NNS to_TO Tank_NNP Bunder_NNP and_CC there_RB cremated_VBN ._.
The_DT 1st_CD ward_NN facing_VBG the_DT east_NN is_VBZ used_VBN as_IN a_DT Mortuary_NNP ._.
No_DT sooner_NN is_VBZ a_DT patient_JJ dead_NN ,_, than_IN he_PRP is_VBZ at_IN once_RB removed_VBN here_RB and_CC placed_VBN on_IN the_DT floor_NN in_IN accordance_NN with_IN the_DT customs_NNS of_IN the_DT Vissa_NNP community_NN ._.
After_IN the_DT remains_NNS are_VBP removed_VBN the_DT place_NN is_VBZ thoroughly_RB disinfected_VBN ._.

?_. 306_CD There_EX were_VBD 16_CD Ward-boys_JJ ,_, 4_CD Ayahs_NNP ,_, 2_CD servants-one_NN for_IN Dispensary_NNP and_CC Store-_NNP room_NN and_CC the_DT other_JJ for_IN the_DT Cook-room_NNP ,_, 1_CD Store-keeper_NNP ,_, 1_CD Gate-keeper_NNP ,_, 1_CD Brahmin_NNP cook_NN ,_, 1_CD barber_NN ,_, and_CC 2_CD halalkhors_NNS in_IN the_DT first_JJ quarter_NN of_IN the_DT current_JJ year_NN when_WRB the_DT number_NN of_IN patients_NNS was_VBD largest_JJS ._.

?_. 309_CD At_IN the_DT very_RB early_JJ commencement_NN of_IN the_DT appearance_NN of_IN a_DT bubo_NN pain_NN or_CC tenderness_NN ,_, the_DT application_NN of_IN Ice_NNP bag_NN or_CC of_IN Empl_NNP ._.

I_PRP have_VBP observed_VBN that_IN Lansonia_NNP Alba_NNP (_( Mythracac_NNP )_) has_VBZ got_VBD some_DT peculiar_JJ pro-_JJ perties_NNS to_TO moderate_VB suppuration_NN and_CC other_JJ inflammatory_NN processes_NNS in_IN the_DT parts_NNS ._.

Its_PRP$ leaves_NNS if_IN fresh_JJ and_CC green_JJ are_VBP pounded_VBN up_RP with_IN a_DT few_JJ drops_NNS of_IN water_NN ,_, and_CC applied_VBN in_IN the_DT form_NN of_IN a_DT poultice_NN between_IN the_DT two_CD layers_NNS of_IN a_DT muslin_NN cloth_NN ,_, and_CC if_IN dry_JJ are_VBP finely_RB powdered_VBN and_CC made_VBN into_IN a_DT poultice_NN with_IN water_NN and_CC similarly_RB applied_VBN ._.

This_DT plant_NN is_VBZ known_VBN in_IN Hindi_NNP ,_, Gujrati-as_NNP Mendi_NNP ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ a_DT common_JJ plant_NN and_CC used_VBN largely_RB by_IN Vaids_NNP ,_, Hakims_NNP in_IN boils_NNS as_IN an_DT external_JJ application_NN ._.

OBSERVATIONS_NNP ._.
There_EX was_VBD only_RB one_CD case_NN admitted_VBN into_IN the_DT hospital_NN which_WDT recovered_VBD ,_, and_CC that_DT was_VBD a_DT mild_JJ case_NN ._.
The_DT temperature_NN in_IN this_DT case_NN as_IN a_DT rule_NN never_RB went_VBD above_IN 103_CD and_CC no_DT bubo_NN was_VBD found_VBN ,_, but_CC a_DT characteristic_JJ black_JJ blister_NN was_VBD found_VBN on_IN the_DT inner_JJ side_NN of_IN the_DT ankle_NN ._.
The_DT situations_NNS and_CC localities_NNS of_IN the_DT buboes_NNS are_VBP given_VBN in_IN Table_NNP VI_NNP ._.
They_PRP appeared_VBD ,_, as_IN a_DT rule_NN ,_, within_IN the_DT first_JJ three_CD days_NNS of_IN the_DT attack_NN ,_, according_VBG to_TO statements_NNS of_IN the_DT patients_NNS or_CC their_PRP$ relations_NNS ;_: these_DT statements_NNS being_VBG sometimes_RB at_IN variance_NN with_IN one_CD another_DT ._.
But_CC no_DT opportunity_NN was_VBD found_VBN to_TO watch_VB a_DT case_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT patient_NN was_VBD admitted_VBN before_IN the_DT development_NN of_IN bubo_NN and_CC which_WDT afterwards_NNS developed_VBD it_PRP ,_, and_CC all_PDT the_DT patients_NNS came_VBD in_IN the_DT hospital_NN after_IN the_DT development_NN of_IN bubo_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT few_JJ cases_NNS that_WDT were_VBD treated_VBN in_IN the_DT hospital_NN ,_, only_RB one_CD patient_NN showed_VBD symptoms_NNS of_IN violent_JJ delirium_NN for_IN one_CD day_NN before_IN his_PRP$ death_NN ._.
Suppression_NN of_IN urine_JJ or_CC any_DT other_JJ organic_JJ diseases_NNS were_VBD not_RB observed_VBN ._.
The_DT treatment_NN given_VBN at_IN this_DT hospital_NN was_VBD on_IN general_JJ principles_NNS ._.
No_DT special_JJ serum_NN of_IN any_DT person_NN being_VBG used_VBN ._.
Ice_NNP bags_NNS ,_, stimulants_NNS (_( brandy_NN )_) ,_, nourishing_VBG digestible_JJ food_NN (_( milk_NN ,_, conjee_NN ,_, &_CC c._NN )_) ,_, diaphoretics_NNS ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, were_VBD used_VBN in_IN the_DT course_NN of_IN treatment_NN ._.
Chief_JJ drug_NN supposed_VBN to_TO act_VB as_IN specific_JJ on_IN plague_NN ,_, viz._NN ,_, mercury_NN perchloride_NN and_CC pot-_JJ tassium_NN iodide_NN were_VBD used_VBN ,_, but_CC were_VBD not_RB found_VBN to_TO be_VB of_IN any_DT special_JJ value_NN as_RB far_RB as_IN the_DT experience_NN of_IN this_DT hospital_NN is_VBZ concerned_VBN ._.
Digitalis_NNP ,_, ether_RB ,_, strychnia_NN were_VBD often_RB used_VBN for_IN injection_NN when_WRB necessary_JJ ._.
Digitalis_NNP was_VBD also_RB given_VBN internally_RB as_IN a_DT cardiac_JJ tonic_NN ,_, Enemata_NNP were_VBD often_RB ordered_VBN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN clearing_VBG the_DT bowels_NNS where_WRB purgatives_NNS were_VBD considered_VBN undesirable_JJ according_VBG to_TO the_DT condition_NN of_IN the_DT patient_NN ._.
V._NNP D._NNP VELANKAR_NNP ,_, B.sc._NNP ,_, L.M._NNP &_CC .S._NNP ,_, 30th_CD June_NNP 1899_CD ._.
Chief_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, in_IN charge_NN K._NNP P._NNP Hospital_NNP ._.
REMARKS_VBN BY_NNP THE_NNP SPECIAL_NNP MEDICAL_NNP OFFICER_NNP ._.
This_DT hospital_NN was_VBD situated_VBN in_IN the_DT Charni_NNP Road_NNP garden_NN facing_VBG the_DT sea_NN ,_, and_CC was_VBD well_RB conducted_VBN ._.
?_. 315_CD No_NNPS ._.
24_CD ._.
The_DT Kokni_NNP Plague_NNP Hospital_NNP Report_NNP of_IN the_DT Kokni_NNP Plague_NNP Hospital_NNP from_IN 1st_CD June_NNP 1898_CD to_TO 31st_CD May_NNP 1899_CD ._.
The_DT hospital_NN was_VBD opened_VBN on_IN the_DT 3rd_CD of_IN February_NNP 1899_CD ,_, at_IN the_DT request_NN of_IN Sirdar_NNP Khan_NNP Bahadur_NNP Mahomed_NNP Yacub_NNP ,_, late_JJ District_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN the_DT Central_NNP District_NNP ._.
I_PRP undertook_VBP to_TO visit_VB the_DT patients_NNS and_CC give_JJ medicine_NN gratis_NN ._.
The_DT building_NN is_VBZ one-storeyed_JJ ,_, the_DT ground_NN floor_NN is_VBZ used_VBN for_IN stores_NNS and_CC dispensary_NN ._.
The_DT first_JJ floor_NN is_VBZ used_VBN for_IN patients_NNS ._.
There_EX are_VBP three_CD halls_NNS and_CC three_CD rooms_NNS ._.
The_DT rooms_NNS are_VBP used_VBN for_IN female_JJ patients_NNS and_CC the_DT halls_NNS for_IN male_JJ patients_NNS ._.
All_PDT the_DT excretary_JJ matters_NNS were_VBD mixed_JJ with_IN phenyle_JJ or_CC carbolic_JJ lotion_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB allowed_VBD to_TO pass_VB in_IN the_DT drains_NNS ._.
As_IN the_DT patients_NNS admitted_VBN were_VBD generally_RB poor_JJ and_CC homeless_NN ,_, the_DT clothes_NNS were_VBD generally_RB destroyed_VBN by_IN fire_NN after_IN recovery_NN or_CC death_NN ._.
Water_NNP supply_NN is_VBZ derived_VBN from_IN the_DT water_NN pipe_NN supplied_VBN by_IN the_DT Municipality_NNP ._.
Every_DT week_NN the_DT floors_NNS were_VBD disinfected_VBN with_IN lime_NN and_CC percholride_NN of_IN mercury_NN lotion_NN ._.
The_DT walls_NNS and_CC the_DT roof_NN were_VBD disinfected_VBN once_RB during_IN four_CD months_NNS ._.
As_RB soon_RB as_IN a_DT person_NN is_VBZ dead_JJ ,_, the_DT body_NN is_VBZ removed_VBN to_TO the_DT cemetery_NN by_IN the_DT relatives_NNS ,_, and_CC in_IN case_NN of_IN poor_JJ persons_NNS ,_, they_PRP were_VBD removed_VBN by_IN the_DT servants_NNS of_IN the_DT Association_NNP called_VBD ``_`` Amwa-tay-la-Islamia_NNP ._. ''_''
None_NN of_IN the_DT patients_NNS treated_VBN in_IN this_DT hospital_NN were_VBD previously_RB inoculated_VBN by_IN Professor_NNP Haffkine_NNP 's_POS serum_NN ._.
One_CD of_IN the_DT Assistants_NNS suffered_VBD from_IN plague_NN ,_, but_CC he_PRP got_VBD the_DT contagion_NN from_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ house_NN where_WRB there_EX were_VBD several_JJ cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN ;_: he_PRP was_VBD removed_VBN to_TO the_DT Kutchee_NNP Memon_NNP Hospital_NNP where_WRB he_PRP recovered_VBD ._.
The_DT cases_NNS were_VBD generally_RB sent_VBN to_TO the_DT hospital_JJ several_JJ days_NNS after_IN the_DT onset_NN of_IN the_DT attack_NN ,_, and_CC as_IN there_EX were_VBD no_DT friends_NNS or_CC relations_NNS accompanying_VBG the_DT patients_NNS ,_, no_DT particulars_NNS as_IN to_TO the_DT period_NN of_IN incubation_NN ,_, symptoms_NNS ,_, or_CC progress_NN could_MD be_VB obtained_VBN ._.
The_DT mild_JJ cases_NNS were_VBD seldom_RB sent_VBN to_TO the_DT hospital_NN ._.
The_DT temperature_NN in_IN all_DT cases_NNS obser-_JJ ved_VBD during_IN the_DT first_JJ five_CD days_NNS of_IN the_DT disease_NN was_VBD between_IN 101_CD ,_, and_CC 106_CD whether_IN they_PRP recovered_VBD or_CC not_RB ._.
In_IN the_DT majority_NN of_IN cases_NNS of_IN recoveries_NNS ,_, the_DT buboes_NNS sup-_RB purated_VBN ._.
As_IN all_PDT the_DT patients_NNS had_VBD buboes_NNS on_IN when_WRB admitted_VBN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ impossible_JJ to_TO state_NN whether_IN they_PRP appeared_VBD before_IN ,_, with_IN or_CC after_IN the_DT fever_NN ._.
The_DT axillary_JJ buboes_NNS were_VBD fatal_JJ ,_, specially_RB left_VBD axillary_JJ one_CD ._.
Some_DT cases_NNS were_VBD complicated_VBN with_IN brain_NN symptoms_NNS ,_, other_JJ with_IN lung_NN symptoms_NNS ,_, others_NNS with_IN diarrhoea_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT majority_NN who_WP died_VBD ,_, died_VBD through_IN failure_NN of_IN the_DT heart_NN ._.

Report_NN of_IN the_DT ``_`` Vasanjee_NNP Tricumjee_NNP ''_'' Hospital_NNP ,_, Bombay_NNP ,_, from_IN the_DT 1st_CD June_NNP 1898_CD to_TO 31st_CD May_NNP 1899_CD ._.
History_NN of_IN the_DT foundation_NN of_IN the_DT Hospital_NNP ._.
The_DT Vasanjee_NNP Tricumjee_NNP Plague_NNP Hospital_NNP for_IN the_DT Dassa_NNP Oswal_NNP Banias_NNP was_VBD first_RB opened_VBN in_IN March_NNP 1897_CD ,_, its_PRP$ want_VBP being_VBG sadly_RB felt_VBD during_IN that_DT time_NN ._.
On_IN the_DT first_JJ out-_JJ break_NN ,_, there_EX was_VBD a_DT general_JJ panic_NN amongst_IN the_DT natives_NNS ,_, and_CC a_DT strong_JJ feeling_NN and_CC pre-_JJ judice_NN arose_NN against_IN the_DT patients_NNS being_VBG treated_VBN at_IN Municipal_NNP hospitals_NNS ._.
The_DT name_NN of_IN the_DT Arthur_NNP Road_NNP Municipal_NNP Hospital_NNP was_VBD a_DT droad_NN to_TO many_JJ people_NNS ,_, and_CC they_PRP declined_VBD to_TO go_VB to_TO it_PRP with_IN the_DT result_NN that_IN the_DT plague_NN spread_NN in_IN Mandvi_NNP and_CC other_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT city_NN with_IN great_JJ force_NN and_CC virulence_NN ._.
In_IN consequence_NN of_IN this_DT false_JJ dread_NN against_IN the_DT Ar-_NNP thur_NN Road_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, against_IN which_WDT they_PRP loudly_RB clamoured_VBD ,_, they_PRP secreted_VBD many_JJ cases_NNS which_WDT resulted_VBD in_IN untold_JJ mischief_NN ._.
An_DT appeal_NN was_VBD made_VBN by_IN H._NNP E._NNP Lord_NNP Sandhurst_NNP to_TO the_DT leaders_NNS of_IN native_JJ community_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP was_VBD in_IN response_NN to_TO this_DT appeal_NN that_WDT at_IN this_DT stage_NN Seth_NNP Vasanjee_NNP Tricumjee_NNP of_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ accord_NN and_CC intention_NN came_VBD to_TO the_DT rescue_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS ,_, and_CC offered_VBD to_TO start_VB and_CC maintain_VB an_DT hospital_NN for_IN the_DT Dassa_NNP Oswal_NNP community_NN ._.
The_DT spontaneous_JJ movement_NN was_VBD at_IN once_RB warmly_RB approved_VBN by_IN General_NNP Gatacre_NNP ,_, who_WP complimented_VBD Seth_NNP Vasanji_NNP Tricumjee_NNP on_IN his_PRP$ laudable_JJ and_CC generous_JJ spirit_NN in_IN coming_VBG to_TO the_DT succour_NN of_IN the_DT authorities_NNS as_RB well_RB as_IN the_DT people_NNS ._.
As_RB soon_RB as_IN the_DT hospital_NN was_VBD opened_VBN ,_, all_PDT the_DT troubles_NNS disappeared_VBD ,_, and_CC the_DT people_NNS having_VBG great_JJ confidence_NN in_IN Seth_NNP Vasanjee_NNP ,_, who_WP is_VBZ loved_VBN by_IN them_PRP on_IN account_NN of_IN his_PRP$ kindness_NN and_CC benevolence_NN ,_, went_VBD to_TO the_DT hospital_NN willingly_RB as_IN the_DT first_JJ symptoms_NNS of_IN fever_NN manifested_VBN themselves_PRP ._.
The_DT hos-_JJ pital_NN was_VBD maintained_VBN at_IN a_DT heavy_JJ cost_NN and_CC proved_VBD a_DT boon_NN not_RB only_RB to_TO the_DT Dassa_NNP Oswals_NNP ,_, but_CC the_DT members_NNS of_IN the_DT Brahmin_NNP caste_NN also_RB ,_, who_WP availed_VBD themselves_PRP of_IN it_PRP when_WRB attacked_VBN by_IN the_DT insidious_JJ and_CC invisible_JJ foe-the_JJ plague_NN ._.
Seth_NNP Vasanjee_NNP spared_VBD neither_DT pains_NNS nor_CC money_NN to_TO make_VB the_DT hospital_NN attractive_JJ ,_, useful_JJ ,_, and_CC as_RB popular_JJ as_IN possible_JJ ._.
Everything_NN that_DT money_NN and_CC science_NN can_MD do_VB to_TO save_VB the_DT lives_NNS of_IN the_DT people_NNS was_VBD done_VBN ._.
When_WRB poor_JJ patients_NNS were_VBD discharged_VBN cured_VBN ,_, Seth_NNP Vasunjee_NNP gave_VBD them_PRP new_JJ clothes_NNS and_CC money_NN to_TO start_VB life_NN again_RB ;_: this_DT and_CC other_JJ kind_NN considerations_NNS ,_, combined_VBN with_IN the_DT personal_JJ exhort-_JJ ations_NNS of_IN Seth_NNP Vasanjee_NNP ,_, induced_VBD the_DT people_NNS to_TO go_VB to_TO the_DT hospital_NN ,_, which_WDT was_VBD in_IN the_DT heart_NN of_IN the_DT native_JJ town_NN Mandvi_NNP where_WRB the_DT plague_NN played_VBD most_JJS havoc_NN ,_, and_CC committed_VBD ravages-_NN awful_NN to_TO contemplate_VB ._.
The_DT hospital_NN was_VBD visited_VBN by_IN H._NNP E._NNP Lord_NNP Sandhurst_NNP Sir_NNP A._NN Wingate_NNP ,_, Sir_NNP Charles_NNP Ollivant_NNP ,_, the_DT Hon'ble_NNP Mr._NNP Nugent_NNP ,_, Surgeon-_NNP General_NNP G._NNP Bainbridge_NNP ,_, Surgeon-Major_NNP H._NNP P._NNP Dimmock_NNP ,_, Lieut_NNP ._.
Brackenbury_NNP ,_, Dr._NNP J_NNP ._.
A._NN Britto_NNP ,_, S._NNP R._NNP Hutchinson_NNP ,_, Sir_NNP J._NNP W._NNP Campbell_NNP and_CC many_JJ others_NNS ,_, who_WP were_VBD all_DT pleased_VBN with_IN the_DT arrangement_NN made_VBN in_IN the_DT hospital_NN which_WDT showed_VBD what_WP success_NN a_DT popular_JJ leader_NN like_IN Seth_NNP Vasanjee_NNP can_MD achieve_VB over_IN the_DT members_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ community_NN by_IN settino-_NN a_DT noble_JJ example_NN and_CC persuading_VBG them_PRP to_TO go_VB to_TO the_DT hospital_NN ._.
This_DT institution_NN ,_, from_IN its_PRP$ earliest_JJS commencement_NN ,_, became_VBD so_RB popular_JJ that_IN its_PRP$ example_NN was_VBD followed_VBN by_IN high_JJ class_NN persons_NNS of_IN other_JJ Hindu_NNP castes_NNS also_RB ._.
Seth_NNP Vasanjee_NNP Tricumjee_NNP Muljee_NNP thus_RB succeeded_VBD in_IN gaining_VBG the_DT confidence_NN of_IN his_PRP$ people_NNS ,_, who_WP in_IN return_NN laid_VBN aside_RB all_DT prejudices_NNS and_CC imaginary_JJ fears_NNS and_CC rushed_VBN to_TO the_DT hospital_NN at_IN the-_JJ earliest_JJS symptoms_NNS of_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.
The_DT hospital_NN ,_, as_IN stated_VBN above_IN ,_, was_VBD founded_VBN in_IN March_NNP 1897_CD ,_, when_WRB ,_, after_IN doing_VBG excel-_JJ lent_NN work_NN for_IN four_CD months_NNS and-a-half_RB ,_, was_VBD closed_VBN during_IN the_DT monsoon_NN ._.
It_PRP re-opened_VBD with_IN the_DT second_JJ epidemic_NN on_IN the_DT 1st_CD of_IN December_NNP 1897_CD ,_, to_TO be_VB closed_VBN on_IN 31st_CD May_NNP 1898_CD ._.
On_IN the_DT recurrence_NN of_IN the_DT third_JJ epidemic_JJ ,_, it_PRP was_VBD once_RB more_JJR opened_VBN on_IN February_NNP 14th_CD ,_, 1899_CD ,_, to_TO carry_VB on_IN its_PRP$ noble_JJ work_NN ,_, which_WDT it_PRP still_RB continues_VBZ to_TO do_VB ._.
All_DT through_IN the_DT three_CD years_NNS the_DT whole_JJ expense_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN has_VBZ been_VBN defrayed_VBN solely_RB by_IN its_PRP$ generous_JJ founder_NN Seth_NNP Vasanjee_NNP Tricumjee_NNP ,_, by_IN which_WDT noble_JJ deed_NN he_PRP has-_JJ won_VBD the_DT lasting_JJ gratitude_NN of_IN the_DT public_NN ._.

This_DT Hospital_NNP is_VBZ situated_VBN in_IN Clive_NNP Road_NNP ,_, Mandvi_NNP ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ a_DT one-storeyed_JJ building_NN well_RB situated_VBN in_IN the_DT corner_NN of_IN a_DT street_NN ,_, so_IN that_IN it_PRP commands_VBZ a_DT respectable_JJ appearance_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ open_JJ on_IN the_DT North_NNP ,_, East_NNP and_CC West_NNP sides_NNS altogether_RB ;_: on_IN the_DT South_NNP there_EX is_VBZ an_DT adjoining_VBG building_NN ._.
The_DT ground_NN floor_NN is_VBZ occupied_VBN by_IN the_DT dis-_JJ pensary_NN in_IN one_CD room_NN ,_, and_CC another_DT large_JJ hall_NN left_VBD vacant_JJ ,_, but_CC a_DT part_NN of_IN it_PRP is_VBZ converted_VBN with_IN a_DT small_JJ kitchen_NN for_IN the_DT private_JJ use_NN of_IN the_DT Hospital_NNP patients_NNS ._.
The_DT top_JJ floor_NN consists_VBZ of_IN one_CD very_RB large_JJ and_CC another_DT small_JJ room_NN ._.
The_DT small_JJ room_NN is_VBZ set_VBN aside_RB as_IN a_DT female_JJ ward_NN ,_, and_CC holds_VBZ from_IN 6_CD to_TO 7_CD beds_NNS ._.
The_DT large_JJ room_NN is_VBZ given_VBN up_RP for_IN the_DT exclusive_JJ use_NN of_IN male_NN patients_NNS ,_, and_CC is_VBZ the_DT male_JJ ward_NN of_IN the_DT Hospital_NNP ._.
It_PRP holds_VBZ from_IN 24_CD to_TO 25_CD beds_NNS easily_RB ._.
Both_DT these_DT rooms_NNS are_VBP open_JJ and_CC very_RB freely_RB ventilated_VBN ,_, having_VBG four_CD large_JJ windows_NNS on_IN each_DT side_NN ._.
The_DT rooms_NNS are_VBP very_RB airy_JJ and_CC well_RB meant_VB for_IN hospital_NN purpose_NN ._.
The_DT dispensary_JJ ,_, as_IN stated_VBN above_IN ,_, is_VBZ in_IN the_DT smaller_JJR of_IN the_DT two_CD rooms_NNS in_IN the_DT ground_NN floor_NN ._.
Servants_NNS '_POS quarters_NNS are_VBP not_RB in_IN the_DT premises_NNS ,_, but_CC they_PRP live_VBP in_IN other_JJ houses_NNS not_RB very_RB far_RB from_IN the_DT hospital_NN ._.
4_CD ._.
Conservancy-Latrine_NNP ,_, having_VBG one_CD seat_NN and_CC worked_VBD according_VBG to_TO the_DT latest_JJS sanitary_JJ principles_NNS ;_: and_CC urinals_NNS ._.
Clothes_NNS that_WDT have_VBP been_VBN soiled_VBN by_IN fcal_JJ evacuations_NNS are_VBP burnt_JJ ,_, but_CC those_DT that_WDT have_VBP been_VBN very_RB slightly_RB soiled_VBN are_VBP first_RB disinfected_VBN thoroughly_RB by_IN carbolic_JJ lotion_NN then_RB dried_VBD ,_, and_CC then_RB sent_VBD to_TO the_DT dhobies_NNS ._.
Kerosine_NNP oil_NN we_PRP consider_VBP very_RB satisfactory_JJ for_IN disinfecting_VBG the_DT clothes_NNS that_WDT have_VBP been_VBN soiled_VBN ;_: as_IN it_PRP seems_VBZ to_TO have_VB a_DT powerful_JJ destructive_JJ influence_NN over_IN the_DT plague_NN bacilli_NN ._.
The_DT old_JJ dressings_NNS of_IN the_DT buboes_NNS are_VBP always_RB first_RB saturated_VBN with_IN kerosine_JJ oil_NN and_CC then_RB burnt_VB ,_, so_RB as_IN to_TO be_VB perfectly_RB certain_JJ of_IN avoiding_VBG contagion_NN by_IN that_DT means_VBZ ._.
?_. 320_CD 5_CD ._.
Water-supply_NNP is_VBZ from_IN the_DT general_JJ pipes_NNS taken_VBN into_IN the_DT buildings_NNS from_IN the_DT street_NN ._.
6_CD ._.
Disinfection_NN of_IN Wards_NNP and_CC other_JJ buildings-Every_JJ ward_NN is_VBZ daily_RB sprinkled_VBN with_IN a_DT week_NN solution_NN of_IN phenyle_NN before_IN the_DT ground_NN is_VBZ swept_VBN ._.
Whenever_WRB any_DT place_NN was_VBD made_VBN dirty_NN by_IN a_DT patient_NN or_CC otherwise_RB ,_, it_PRP was_VBD washed_VBN with_IN phenyle_NN ,_, allowed_VBN to_TO dry_VB for_IN some_DT time_NN ,_, then_RB white-washed_JJ with_IN chunam_NN ._.
Whenever_WDT pillows_NNS ,_, bed_VBD sheets_NNS ,_, clothes_NNS ,_, were_VBD much_RB soiled_VBN with_IN urine_JJ or_CC evacuations_NNS they_PRP were_VBD always_RB burnt_VBN ._.
Other_JJ clothes_NNS etc._VBP ,_, which_WDT needed_VBD disinfection_NN were_VBD sent_VBN to_TO the_DT District_NNP Officer_NNP (_( Ward_NNP )_) ,_, with_IN a_DT note_NN to_TO the_DT purpose_NN ,_, to_TO be_VB disinfected_VBN by_IN the_DT Steam_NNP Disinfector_NNP ._.
These_DT were_VBD carefully_RB returned_VBN in_IN about_RB 4_CD to_TO 5_CD hours_NNS ,_, after_IN which_WDT they_PRP were_VBD handed_VBN over_IN to_TO the_DT dhobies_NNS ._.
Disposal_NN of_IN the_DT Dead_NNP ._.
7_CD ._.
When_WRB a_DT patient_NN died_VBD ,_, he_PRP was_VBD removed_VBN to_TO one_CD corner_NN of_IN the_DT room_NN which_WDT is_VBZ set_VBN apart_RB for_IN the_DT purpose_NN ,_, and_CC screened_VBD from_IN the_DT view_NN of_IN other_JJ patients_NNS ._.
Here_RB it_PRP may_MD lie_VB for_IN about_RB half_PDT an_DT hour_NN to_TO an_DT hour_NN ,_, when_WRB the_DT relatives_NNS remove_VBP the_DT corpse_NN to_TO the_DT ground_NN floor_NN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN washing_VBG the_DT body_NN and_CC performing_VBG a_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT funeral_JJ rites_NNS ._.
The_DT body_NN after_IN death_NN is_VBZ as_IN a_DT rule_NN cleared_VBD within_IN 2_CD to_TO 3_CD hours_NNS from_IN the_DT hospital_NN premises_NNS ._.
No_DT pauper_NN patients_NNS ever_RB came_VBD to_TO the_DT hospital_NN ._.
All_DT had_VBD relations_NNS who_WP claimed_VBD the_DT body_NN soon_RB after_IN death_NN ._.
8_CD ._.
No_DT special_JJ record_NN kept_NN of_IN Haffkine_NNP 's_POS serum_NN inoculation_NN in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN the_DT first_JJ 18_CD patients_NNS ;_: but_CC during_IN the_DT treatment_NN of_IN the_DT present_JJ doctor_NN ,_, it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN discover-_JJ ed_NN that_IN not_RB a_DT single_JJ patient_NN ,_, who_WP came_VBD to_TO the_DT hospital_NN was_VBD ever_RB inoculated_VBN within_IN these_DT last_JJ 3_CD or_CC 4_CD years_NNS ._.

TABLE_NNP VIII_NNP ._.
There_EX was_VBD only_RB 1_CD male_JJ case_NN of_IN Secondary_NNP Plague_NNP pneumonia_NN complicated_VBD with_IN a_DT bubo_NN ._.
The_DT pneumonia_NN supervened_VBD on_IN the_DT third_JJ day_NN of_IN admission_NN ._.
The_DT patient_JJ re-_NN covered_VBD eventually_RB ._.
Notes_NNS on_IN the_DT symptoms_NNS ,_, character_NN and_CC treatment_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.
Fever.-The_JJ temperature_NN of_IN an_DT acute_JJ case_NN ending_VBG in_IN recovery_NN was_VBD as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -_: The_DT patient-a_JJ boy_NN 18_CD years_NNS old-was_RB admitted_VBN on_IN the_DT second_JJ day_NN of_IN his_PRP$ attack_NN when_WRB the_DT temperature_NN was_VBD 102.5_CD ._.
The_DT same_JJ evening_NN it_PRP rose_VBD to_TO 103.6_CD F._NNP On_IN the_DT second_JJ day_NN of_IN admission_NN it_PRP ran_VBD up_RB to_TO 105.8_CD F._NNP It_PRP came_VBD down_RP a_DT little_JJ in_IN the_DT even-_JJ ing_NN and_CC rose_VBD again_RB on_IN the_DT following_JJ morning_NN to_TO 105.6_CD ._.
It_PRP oscillated_VBD so_RB for_IN four_CD full_JJ days_NNS ,_, that_DT is_VBZ ,_, till_VB the_DT fifth_NN and_CC sixth_JJ day_NN of_IN the_DT attack_NN ._.
Then_RB on_IN the_DT eighth_JJ morning_NN it_PRP fell_VBD from_IN 102.2_CD to_TO 98_CD F._NNP It_PRP rose_VBD to_TO 102_CD again_RB on_IN the_DT tenth_JJ day_NN and_CC remained_VBD so_RB till_IN the_DT fifteenth_JJ day_NN ,_, from_IN which_WDT date_NN there_EX was_VBD the_DT morning_NN fall_NN (_( up_IN to_TO 99_CD )_) and_CC evening_VBG rise_NN (_( up_IN to_TO 102_CD F._NNP )_) of_IN temperature_NN till_IN the_DT thirtieth_JJ day_NN of_IN his_PRP$ admission_NN ._.
Then_RB from_IN the_DT thirty-third_JJ day_NN it_PRP became_VBD slightly_RB sub-normal_JJ 98_CD F._NNP and_CC remained_VBD so_RB for_IN another_DT fortnight_NN ,_, after_IN which_WDT it_PRP became_VBD quite_RB normal_JJ ._.
?_. 323_CD The_DT maximum_JJ temperature_NN noticed_VBN ,_, as_IN a_DT rule_NN ,_, is_VBZ 105_CD F._NNP ,_, the_DT minimum_JJ 95.5_CD to_TO 96_CD ._.
Buboes.-Buboes_NNS are_VBP generally_RB found_VBN in_IN the_DT inguinal_JJ regions_NNS ,_, and_CC that_IN also_RB more_JJR common_JJ on_IN the_DT left_NN than_IN on_IN the_DT right_JJ side_NN ._.
As_IN a_DT rule_NN ,_, at_IN first_JJ one_CD small_JJ is_VBZ felt_VBN ,_, when_WRB the_DT adjoining_NN glands_NNS also_RB soon_RB become_RB involved_JJ ,_, and_CC then_RB assume_VB a_DT big_JJ mass_NN ._.
Generally_RB they_PRP begin_VBP on_IN the_DT second_JJ or_CC third_JJ day_NN of_IN the_DT attack_NN ,_, in_IN some_DT cases_NNS they_PRP exist_VBP from_IN the_DT very_RB commencement_NN ._.
They_PRP suppurate_VBP or_CC subside_VBP after_IN the_DT first_JJ 6_CD or_CC 7_CD days_NNS ._.
The_DT most_RBS fatal_JJ form_NN of_IN buboes_NNS are_VBP those_DT which_WDT are_VBP situated_VBN in_IN the_DT cervical_JJ region_NN ,_, as_IN the_DT pressure_NN caused_VBN by_IN them_PRP on_IN the_DT trachea_NN and_CC oesophagus_NN soon_RB prevent_JJ nourish-_JJ ment_NN ,_, medication_NN and_CC free_JJ breathing_NN ._.
Next_RB in_IN order_NN are_VBP the_DT inguinal_JJ glands_NNS ,_, the_DT somewhat_RB hopeful_JJ ones_NNS are_VBP those_DT of_IN the_DT axill_NN ._.
Men_NNS are_VBP more_RBR liable_JJ to_TO the_DT attack_NN of_IN plague_NN than_IN women_NNS ,_, but_CC the_DT mortality_NN is_VBZ higher_RBR in_IN women_NNS than_IN in_IN men_NNS ._.
Further_RB ,_, mortality_NN amongst_NN pregnant_JJ women_NNS is_VBZ exceedingly_RB high_JJ ,_, even_RB 96_CD to_TO 97_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
It_PRP causes_VBZ abortion_NN at_IN first_JJ ,_, to_TO be_VB soon_RB followed_VBN by_IN the_DT death_NN of_IN the_DT patient_NN ._.
The_DT statistics_NNS of_IN this_DT hospital_NN proves_VBZ the_DT disease_NN commoner_NN in_IN men_NNS than_IN women_NNS ._.
Period_NN of_IN Convalescence.-Convalescence_NNP begins_NNS from_IN about_IN the_DT tenth_JJ day_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ very_RB slow_JJ ,_, sometimes_RB very_RB much_JJ protracted_VBN on_IN account_NN of_IN suppuration_NN of_IN the_DT .glands_NNS ._.
We_PRP have_VBP never_RB mistaken_VBN mumps_NNS for_IN plague_NN nor_CC vice_NN versa_NN ._.
Remarks_NNS by_IN the_DT Special_NNP Medical_NNP Officer.-This_NNP Hospital_NNP was_VBD one_CD of_IN the_DT best_JJS of_IN its_PRP$ kind_NN ,_, being_VBG isolated_VBN to_TO a_DT great_JJ extent_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP had_VBD large_JJ airy_NN wards_NNS and_CC contiguous_JJ to_TO no_DT overcrowded_JJ locality_NN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD always_RB well_RB conducted_VBN and_CC useful_JJ ._.

1_CD ._.
Report_NN on_IN the_DT Bhois_NNP '_POS Plague_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, Bom-_NNP bay_NN ,_, from_IN the_DT 11th_CD of_IN January_NNP 1899_CD to_TO the_DT 17th_CD of_IN April_NNP 1899_CD ._.
2_CD ._.
As_IN no_DT private_JJ Hindu_NNP Plague_NNP Hospital_NNP would_MD admit_VB Bhoi_NNP plague_NN patients_NNS ,_, Lt._NNP G._NNP Warneford_NNP ,_, District_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, C._NNP Ward_NNP ,_, and_CC myself_PRP thought_VBD that_IN a_DT small_JJ hospital_NN for_IN Bhois_NNP if_IN opened_VBN in_IN their_PRP$ caste_NN dining_VBG house_NN in_IN I_PRP Bhoivada_NNP ,_, Bhuleshwar_NNP ,_, would_MD be_VB the_DT means_NNS of_IN bringing_VBG together_RB and_CC isolating_VBG Plague_NNP cases_NNS ,_, and_CC in_IN this_DT way_NN putting_VBG a_DT stop_NN to_TO wholesale_JJ concealment_NN of_IN cases_NNS amongst_VBP them_PRP ,_, which_WDT prevailed_VBD during_IN the_DT previous_JJ epidemics_NNS ._.
The_DT Deputy_NNP Commissioner_NNP approved_VBD of_IN the_DT District_NNP Officer_NNP 's_POS suggestion_NN and_CC the_DT Bhois_NNP '_POS Hospital_NNP was_VBD opened_VBN on_IN 11th_CD January_NNP 1899_CD ._.
To_TO the_DT sum_NN of_IN rupees_NNS ninety_FW (_( Rs_NNP ._.
90_CD )_) ,_, subscribed_VBN by_IN the_DT Bhois_NNP ,_, were_VBD added_VBN rupees_NNS two_CD hundred_VBD (_( Rs_NNP ._.
200_CD )_) from_IN the_DT Discretional_NNP Relief_NNP Fund_NNP ,_, put_VBD at_IN the_DT dispo-_JJ sal_NN of_IN the_DT District_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, C._NNP Ward_NNP ,_, by_IN a_DT special_JJ order_NN from_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Commis-_NNP sioner_NN ._.
A_DT further_JJ donation_NN of_IN rupees_NNS twenty-five_JJ (_( Rs_NNP ._.
25_CD )_) was_VBD received_VBN from_IN the_DT Chevli_NNP Bhunsalis_NNP ,_, who_WP were_VBD pleased_JJ with_IN the_DT admission_NN and_CC successful_JJ treatment_NN of_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT women_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ caste_NN ,_, who_WP would_MD have_VB been_VBN removed_VBN to_TO a_DT Municipal_JJ hospi-_JJ tal_NN in_IN absence_NN of_IN the_DT above_JJ hospital_NN ._.
Rao_NNP Saheb_NNP Purshotum_NNP Odhuvji_NNP ,_, J._NNP P._NNP ,_, and_CC Messrs._NNP Runchhoddas_NNP B._NNP Shroff_NNP ,_, Chairman_NNP of_IN Volunteer_NNP Committee_NNP No_NNP ._.
IV_NNP section_NN ,_, Bhuleshwar_NNP C._NNP Ward_NNP ,_, as_RB well_RB as_IN Mr._NNP Mohanji_NNP Pranjiwandas_NNP ,_, Deputy_NNP Chairman_NNP ,_, No_NNP ._.
V_NNP Volunteer_NNP Committee_NNP ,_, Bhuleshwar_NNP ,_, C_NNP Ward_NNP ,_, also_RB presented_VBN beddings_NNS ,_, blankets_NNS ,_, bed-sheets_NNS ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, to_TO the_DT hospital_NN ._.
I_PRP was_VBD in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT Bhoi_NNP servant_NN acted_VBD as_IN Ward-boy_NNP ,_, who_WP was_VBD assisted_VBN for_IN about_IN a_DT month_NN and-a-half_NN by_IN a_DT watchman_NN ._.
?_. 326_CD 3_CD ._.
The_DT hospital_NN was_VBD in_IN a_DT 3-storeyed_JJ building_NN ,_, the_DT ground_NN floor_NN of_IN which_WDT was_VBD used_VBN for_IN contacts_NNS ,_, the_DT first_JJ storey_NN was_VBD used_VBN for_IN acute_JJ cases_NNS ,_, the_DT second_JJ for_IN convales-_JJ cent_NN patients_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT 3rd_CD storey_NN ,_, a_DT loft_NN ,_, was_VBD the_DT store-room_NN ._.

4_CD ._.
A_DT Bhungi_NNP was_VBD told_VBN off_RP for_IN duty_NN (_( morning_NN and_CC evening_NN )_) at_IN the_DT hospital_NN by_IN Inspector_NNP C._NNP Ward_NNP ,_, H._NNP D._NNP ,_, who_WP removed_VBD the_DT excreta_NN ,_, which_WDT were_VBD collected_VBN in_IN ear-_JJ thenware_NN chatties_NNS ._.
The_DT clothes_NNS were_VBD burnt_VBN in_IN almost_RB all_DT cases_NNS and_CC the_DT bed-sheets_NNS ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, were_VBD washed_VBN at_IN the_DT Modh_NNP and_CC Porwad_NNP Hospital_NNP by_IN their_PRP$ hospital_NN Dhobie_NNP ._.

?_. 328_CD TABLE_NNP VIII.-Secondary_JJ Pneumonia_NNP and_CC Bubo_NNP ._.
Admitted_VBN ._.

Recovered_VBN ._.
Percentage_NN of_IN Mortality_NNP ._.
Males_NNS 1_CD 1_CD 100_CD Females_NNS Children_NNP N.B.-No_NNP Bacteriological_NNP examination_NN was_VBD made_VBN in_IN any_DT case_NN ._.
The_DT secondary_JJ Pneumonia_NNP supervened_VBD 3_CD days_NNS after_IN the_DT appearance_NN of_IN fever_NN and_CC bubo_NN ,_, and_CC was_VBD diag-_NNS nosed_VBN from_IN the_DT physical_JJ signs_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT characteristic_JJ sputum_NN ._.
The_DT disease_NN was_VBD most_RBS virulent_JJ in_IN the_DT latter_JJ part_NN of_IN February_NNP and_CC the_DT commence-_JJ ment_NN of_IN March_NNP 1899_CD ._.
The_DT treatment_NN was_VBD only_RB symptomatic_JJ ,_, stimulants_NNS being_VBG mostly_RB indicated_VBN and_CC used_VBN ._.
The_DT dates_NNS of_IN actual_JJ attack_NN and_CC infection_NN could_MD not_RB be_VB obtained_VBN ,_, the_DT patients_NNS being_VBG from_IN an_DT illiterate_JJ class_NN ;_: in_IN one_CD case_NN the_DT wife_NN was_VBD attacked_VBN exactly_RB 9_CD days_NNS after_IN the_DT death_NN of_IN her_PRP$ husband_NN in_IN the_DT Churni_NNP Road_NNP Camp_NNP ,_, the_DT husband_NN having_VBG died_VBN within_IN 18_CD hours_NNS after_IN the_DT first_JJ manifestation_NN of_IN high_JJ fever_NN and_CC bubo_NN ._.
The_DT maximum_JJ tem-_JJ perature_NN noted_VBD was_VBD 1058F_CD ._.
Cervical_JJ and_CC axillary_JJ buboes_NNS proved_VBD the_DT most_RBS fatal_JJ ._.
Brain_NN symptoms_NNS were_VBD by_IN far_RB the_DT most_RBS common_JJ complications_NNS ._.
In_IN only_RB one_CD case_NN was_VBD the_DT urine_NN suppressed_VBN ._.
The_DT period_NN of_IN convalescence_NN is_VBZ between_IN a_DT fortnight_NN and_CC a_DT month_NN and_CC a-half_NN after_IN the_DT first_JJ fall_NN in_IN temperature_NN ;_: in_IN one_CD case_NN the_DT convalescence_NN was_VBD retarded_VBN by_IN the_DT appearance_NN of_IN another_DT bubo_NN in_IN the_DT groin_NN ,_, which_WDT subsided_VBD in_IN four_CD days_NNS with_IN strong_JJ Lin_NNP ._.
Iodi_NNP and_CC fomentations_NNS ,_, without_IN any_DT other_JJ trouble_NN ._.
One_CD case_NN was_VBD kept_VBN under_IN observation_NN and_CC found_VBD to_TO be_VB one_CD of_IN Hysteria_NNP ._.
No_DT cases_NNS were_VBD treated_VBN by_IN any_DT kind_NN of_IN curative_JJ serum_NN ._.
The_DT treatment_NN consisted_VBD of_IN ice_NN bags_NNS to_TO the_DT head_NN and_CC over_IN the_DT buboes_NNS and_CC stimulants_NNS ._.
Where_WRB the_DT patient_NN was_VBD delirious_JJ and_CC sleeplessness_JJ prominent_NN ,_, Bromides_NNP were_VBD used_VBN ._.
Milk_NNP diet_JJ and_CC brandy_JJ were_VBD freely_RB used_VBN ._.
In_IN two_CD cases_NNS vapour_VBP baths_NNS were_VBD used_VBN ,_, which_WDT quieted_VBD the_DT patients_NNS for_IN a_DT few_JJ hours_NNS ._.
History-_NNP The_DT Hospital_NNP (_( Plague_NNP )_) for_IN Bhois_NNP was_VBD started_VBN under_IN orders_NNS from_IN the_DT Deputy_NNP Commissioner_NNP 's_POS Office_NNP ,_, No_NNP ._.
4604_CD of_IN 1898-99_JJ ._.
Dr._NNP D._NNP R._NNP Bardi_NNP was_VBD appointed_VBN Medical_JJ Officer_NNP ._.
The_DT first_JJ patient_NN was_VBD received_VBN on_IN 11th_CD January_NNP 1899_CD ,_, and_CC the_DT last_JJ patient_NN was_VBD discharged_VBN cured_VBN on_IN 17th_CD April_NNP 1899_CD ._.
Funds-_CD The_DT Bhois_NNP subscribed_VBD Rs_NNP ._.
90_CD amongst_JJ themselves_PRP ,_, to_TO which_WDT sum_NN were_VBD added_VBN Rs_NNP ._.
200_CD ,_, placed_VBN at_IN the_DT disposal_NN of_IN the_DT District_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, C._NNP Ward_NNP ,_, from_IN the_DT Discretional_NNP Relief_NNP Fund_NNP (_( Government_NNP )_) under_IN orders_NNS from_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Commissioner_NNP in_IN his_PRP$ No_NN ._.
125_CD of_IN 1898-99_NNS ._.
The_DT Chevli_NNP Bhunsalis_NNP also_RB gave_VBD a_DT donation_NN of_IN Rs_NNP ._.
25_CD to_TO the_DT hospital_NN fund_NN ,_, pleased_JJ with_IN the_DT success-_JJ ful_JJ treatment_NN of_IN a_DT woman_NN of_IN their_PRP$ caste_NN ,_, who_WP was_VBD removed_VBN to_TO the_DT said_VBD hospital_NN in_IN absence_NN of_IN any_DT hospital_NN of_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ ._.
?_. 329_CD The_DT hospital_NN was_VBD opened_VBN in_IN the_DT Bhois_NNP '_POS Jamat_NNP house_NN ,_, situated_VBN in_IN 1st_CD Bhoiwada_NNP and_CC it_PRP was_VBD arranged_VBN to_TO treat_VB plague_JJ patients_NNS of_IN castes_NNS other_JJ than_IN Bhois_NNP ,_, when_WRB necessary_JJ ,_, provided_VBD there_EX was_VBD sufficient_JJ accommodation_NN available_JJ ,_, with_IN the_DT mutual_JJ consent_NN of_IN the_DT Medical_NNP Officer_NNP (_( as_IN a_DT representative_NN to_TO the_DT District_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, C._NNP Ward_NNP )_) and_CC the_DT chief_JJ men_NNS of_IN the_DT Bhois_NNP ._.
Patients-_NNP Thus_NNP out_IN of_IN the_DT twenty_NN patients_NNS treated_VBD 14_CD were_VBD Bhois_NNP ._.
Caste-_JJ 1_CD was_VBD a_DT Bhunsali_NNP ,_, 1_CD Marwari_NNP ,_, 3_CD were_VBD Kunsaras_NNP ,_, and_CC 1_CD was_VBD a_DT Durji_NNP (_( tailor_NN )_) ._.
Sex-_JJ Amongst_NNP the_DT 20_CD patients_NNS 16_CD were_VBD females_NNS ,_, and_CC 4_CD males_NNS ._.
Age-_NNP As_IN regards_NNS age_NN ,_, out_IN of_IN 20_CD patients_NNS 1_CD was_VBD under_IN 1_CD year_NN of_IN age_NN ,_, 2_CD were_VBD between_IN 1_CD and_CC 5_CD years_NNS of_IN age_NN ,_, 3_CD were_VBD between_IN 5_CD &_CC 10_CD years_NNS of_IN age_NN ,_, 5_CD were_VBD between_IN 10_CD &_CC 20_CD years_NNS of_IN age_NN ,_, 6_CD were_VBD between_IN 20_CD &_CC 40_CD years_NNS of_IN age_NN ,_, and_CC 3_CD were_VBD over_IN 40_CD years_NNS of_IN age_NN ._.
Diseases_NNS -_: Out_IN of_IN 20_CD there_EX were_VBD 18_CD Plague_NNP cases_NNS ._.
1_CD Cholera_NNP and_CC 1_CD suffered_VBN from_IN other_JJ Disease_NNP ._.
Result_NN of_IN Treatment-_NNP Out_NNP of_IN a_DT total_NN of_IN 18_CD Plague_NNP cases_NNS 6_CD recovered_VBD and_CC 12_CD died_VBD ,_, 1_CD Cholera_NNP nil_NN ._.
1_CD 1_CD Other_JJ case_NN 1_CD so_IN the_DT percentage_NN of_IN recovery_NN in_IN Plague_NNP cases_NNS comes_VBZ to_TO 33.3_CD ._.
N._NNP B.-The_NNP Cholera_NNP case_NN as_RB well_RB as_IN 4_CD Plague_NNP cases_NNS (_( all_DT of_IN the_DT Pneumonic_NNP type_NN )_) died_VBD within_IN 24_CD hours_NNS after_IN admission_NN into_IN the_DT hospital_NN ._.
Rao_NNP Saheb_NNP Purshotum_NNP Odhuvji_NNP ,_, J._NNP P._NNP ,_, and_CC Messrs._NNP R._NNP L._NNP Shroff_NNP and_CC Mohunji_NNP Pranjivundas_NNP presented_VBD many_JJ useful_JJ things_NNS to_TO the_DT hospital_NN ,_, and_CC visited_VBD the_DT hospital_NN occasionally_RB ._.
The_DT undersigned_JJ begs_NN to_TO acknowledge_VB with_IN thanks_NNS the_DT assistance_NN ,_, co-operation_NN ,_, and_CC suggestions_NNS from_IN the_DT gentlemen_NNS who_WP took_VBD very_RB great_JJ interest_NN in_IN the_DT hospital_NN ._.

The_DT Bene-Israel_NNP Plague_NNP Hospital_NNP is_VBZ a_DT communal_JJ hospital_NN for_IN Jews_NNP of_IN all_DT denominations-Bene-Israelites_NNS ,_, Bagdadi_NNP and_CC other_JJ Jews_NNP ._.
It_PRP was_VBD opened_VBN on_IN the_DT 23rd_CD February_NNP 1898_CD ,_, and_CC has_VBZ been_VBN kept_VBN open_JJ up_IN to_TO date_NN ._.

3_CD ._.
The_DT hospital_NN is_VBZ situate_JJ at_IN Connaught_NNP Road_NNP ,_, Byculla_NNP ._.
There_EX are_VBP fourteen_JJ blocks_NNS occupying_VBG 11/2_CD acres_NNS of_IN Municipal_NNP ground_NN given_VBN to_TO this_DT hospital_NN by_IN the_DT kind_NN Municipal_NNP Commissioner_NNP ,_, to_TO whom_WP the_DT thanks_NNS of_IN the_DT whole_JJ Jewish_NNP Community_NNP are_VBP due_JJ ._.
?_. 331_CD The_DT blocks_NNS are_VBP as_IN follow_NN :_: -_: 1_CD ._.

2_CD ._.

Health_NNP Camps_NNP 4_CD blocks_NNS of_IN 20_CD rooms_NNS ._.
14_CD ._.
Bhangis_NNP '_POS Quarters_NNS 1_CD block_NN ._.
Health_NNP camps_NNS were_VBD built_VBN by_IN the_DT Municipality_NNP at_IN the_DT recommendations_NNS of_IN Col._NNP James_NNP S._NNP Wilkins_NNP ,_, D.S.O._NNP ,_, I.M.S._NNP ,_, Special_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, and_CC J._NNP H._NNP DuBoulay_NNP ,_, Esq._NNP ,_, I.C.S._NNP ,_, Deputy_NNP Commissioner_NNP for_IN Plague_NNP Operations_NNP ._.
One_CD room_NN in_IN the_DT contact_NN ward_NN is_VBZ given_VBN to_TO each_DT contact_NN family_NN as_RB well_RB as_IN those_DT re-_JJ moved_VBD to_TO segregation_VB camp_NN and_CC the_DT health_NN camps_NNS ._.
These_DT camps_NNS can_MD accommodate_VB nearly_RB 150_CD persons_NNS at_IN a_DT time_NN ._.
The_DT contacts_NNS removed_VBD to_TO the_DT hospital_NN were_VBD detained_VBN in_IN the_DT camp_NN till_IN the_DT patient_NN with_IN whom_WP they_PRP came_VBD was_VBD discharged_VBN ;_: in_IN cases_NNS of_IN death_NN ,_, they_PRP were_VBD discharged_VBN after_IN 10_CD days_NNS from_IN the_DT day_NN of_IN such_JJ deaths_NNS ._.
Persons_NNS sent_VBD to_TO the_DT segregation_NN and_CC health_NN camps_NNS were_VBD detained_VBN for_IN fifteen_JJ days_NNS to_TO one_CD month_NN ,_, when_WRB they_PRP were_VBD allowed_VBN to_TO return_VB home_NN ._.
In_IN all_DT 453_CD persons_NNS passed_VBN through_IN these_DT camps_NNS ,_, the_DT peculiarity_NN being_VBG that_IN those_DT who_WP refused_VBD to_TO come_VB at_IN first_JJ were_VBD most_RBS backward_JJ to_TO leave_VB ._.
4_CD ._.
Latrines.-Latrines_JJ consist_NN of_IN two_CD blocks-one_NN for_IN contacts_NNS and_CC the_DT other_JJ for_IN those_DT in_IN health_NN camps_NNS ._.
Each_DT block_NN has_VBZ three_CD seats_NNS ._.
Excreta_NNS are_VBP removed_VBN to_TO the_DT night-soil_JJ depot_NN twice_RB a_DT day_NN by_IN the_DT halalcore_NN ._.
Before_IN being_VBG taken_VBN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ treated_VBN with_IN a_DT strong_JJ lotion_NN of_IN phenyle_NN and_CC carbolic_JJ acid_NN ,_, the_DT seats_NNS ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, are_VBP washed_VBN twice_RB a_DT day_NN with_IN carbolic_JJ acid_NN and_CC carbolic_JJ powder_NN is_VBZ put_VBN just_RB near_IN the_DT latrines_NNS ._.
The_DT halalcore_NN is_VBZ strictly_RB supervised_VBN by_IN a_DT Municipal_NNP Health_NNP Inspector_NNP ._.
5_CD ._.
Water_JJ supply.-Two_JJ stand-pipes_NNS are_VBP provided_VBN ,_, the_DT waste_NN water_NN being_VBG con-_JJ veyed_NN to_TO the_DT main_JJ drain_NN on_IN the_DT northern_JJ side_NN ._.
6_CD ._.
Disinfectants-A_JJ solution_NN of_IN Perchloride_NNP of_IN mercury_NN is_VBZ sprinkled_VBN twice_RB daily_RB on_IN the_DT ground_NN floors_NNS of_IN the_DT wards_NNS and_CC all_PDT the_DT floors_NNS are_VBP limewashed_VBN every_DT week_NN ._.
In_IN case_NN of_IN death_NN ,_, the_DT place_NN just_RB under_IN and_CC near_IN the_DT cot_NN is_VBZ disinfected_VBN with_IN phenyle_NN and_CC limewashed_VBN after_IN two_CD hours_NNS ._.
5_CD per_IN cent_NN ,_, solution_NN of_IN Carbolic_NNP Aoid_NNP is_VBZ used_VBN for_IN general_JJ purposes_NNS such_JJ as_IN washing_VBG hands_NNS ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, phenyle_JJ being_VBG freely_RB used_VBN ,_, all_PDT the_DT floor_NN of_IN the_DT wards_NNS are_VBP scraped_VBN every_DT month_NN and_CC the_DT dirt_NN burnt_NN ;_: new_JJ earth_NN being_VBG placed_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT floors_NNS are_VBP limewashed_VBN ._.
Cloths_NNS ,_, blankets_NNS ,_, sheets_NNS ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, are_VBP saturated_VBN with_IN 1_CD per_IN cent_NN solution_NN of_IN perchloride_JJ mercury_NN and_CC exposed_VBN to_TO sun_VB till_NN dry_NN ,_, and_CC subsequently_RB washed_VBN by_IN the_DT dhobee_NN ._.
Rags_NNP ,_, hospital_NN dressings_NNS ,_, patient_NN 's_POS cloths_NNS are_VBP destroyed_VBN by_IN fire_NN ._.
?_. 332_CD 7_CD ._.
Mortuary.-As_JJ soon_RB as_IN a_DT death_NN takes_VBZ place_NN ,_, the_DT body_NN is_VBZ removed_VBN to_TO the_DT mortuary_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ situated_VBN on_IN the_DT east_JJ side_NN ,_, after_IN performing_VBG religious_JJ rites_NNS and_CC ceremonies_NNS ,_, the_DT body_NN in_IN new_JJ clothes_NNS is_VBZ removed_VBN to_TO the_DT burial_JJ ground_NN ._.
The_DT expenses_NNS (_( funeral_JJ )_) of_IN the_DT paupers_NNS dying_VBG are_VBP borne_VBN out_IN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN funds_NNS ._.
8_CD ._.
Inoculation_NNP -None_NN of_IN the_DT patients_NNS ,_, contact_JJ persons_NNS or_CC persons_NNS in_IN segregation_NN and_CC health_NN camps_NNS were_VBD inoculted_VBN ._.
9_CD ._.
Sickness_NN among_IN the_DT Staff.-No_NNP case_NN of_IN infection_NN or_CC any_DT serious_JJ nature_NN amongst_VBZ the_DT hospital_JJ staff_NN or_CC the_DT attendants_NNS ._.

Treatment_NN ._.
Treatment_NNP wholly_RB unsatisfactory_JJ ._.
No_DT drug_NN can_MD combat_VB the_DT disease_NN ._.
If_IN the_DT disease_NN is_VBZ complicated_VBN with_IN Diarrhoea_NNP ,_, heart_NN failure_NN generally_RB sets_VBZ in_IN ,_, in_IN spite_NN of_IN all_DT efforts_NNS ._.

Remarks_NNS by_IN the_DT Special_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP ._.
The_DT hospital_NN was_VBD one_CD of_IN the_DT most_RBS satisfactorily_RB conducted_VBN amongst_IN all_DT I_PRP had_VBD under_IN me_PRP ._.

1_CD ._.
Annual_JJ report_NN on_IN the_DT Cutchi_NNP Memon_NNP Plague_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, commencing_VBG from_IN December_NNP 1898_CD up_IN to_TO May_NNP 31st_CD ,_, 1899_CD ._.
2_CD ._.
By_IN the_DT combined_JJ labour_NN of_IN Haji_NNP Yusuf_NNP ,_, Haji_NNP Sulaiman_NNP ,_, and_CC Abdul_NNP Wahid_NNP ,_, well-known_JJ Merchants_NNS in_IN the_DT C._NNP M._NNP Community_NNP ,_, and_CC also_RB gentlemen_NNS of_IN very_RB high_JJ positions_NNS ,_, this_DT hospital_NN came_VBD into_IN existence_NN for_IN the_DT welfare_NN of_IN the_DT plague-stricken_JJ patients_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ community_NN ,_, and_CC consequently_RB on_IN the_DT 1st_CD of_IN April_NNP 1897_CD ,_, while_IN the_DT plague_NN was_VBD raging_VBG very_RB fiercely_RB in_IN the_DT city_NN ,_, this_DT hospital_NN was_VBD declared_VBN opened_VBN by_IN the_DT name_NN of_IN Cutchi_NNP Memon_NNP Plague_NNP Hospital_NNP ._.
The_DT original_JJ founders_NNS and_CC benefactors_NNS of_IN this_DT great_JJ sympathetic_JJ work_NN were_VBD subsequently_RB made_VBN joint-secretaries_NNS in_IN behalf_NN of_IN their_PRP$ community_NN ,_, and_CC were_VBD given_VBN powers_NNS to_TO receive_VB all_DT donations_NNS from_IN the_DT community_NN to_TO meet_VB expenses_NNS of_IN the_DT establishment_NN ._.

15,000_CD ._.
But_CC the_DT whole_JJ credit_NN is_VBZ due_JJ to_TO the_DT enlightenment_NN and_CC forethought_NN of_IN our_PRP$ learned_JJ Secretaries_NNPS ._.

3_CD ._.
The_DT hospital_NN building_NN was_VBD the_DT Jamat_NNP Khana_NNP which_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN very_RB kindly_RB lent_JJ by_IN the_DT whole_JJ community_NN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN ._.
Therefore_RB ,_, no_DT separate_JJ shed_VBD or_CC a_DT new_JJ building_NN was_VBD contemplated_VBN ._.
The_DT building_NN itself_PRP is_VBZ very_RB large_JJ ,_, airy_NN ,_, and_CC gives_VBZ a_DT full_JJ play_NN of_IN light_JJ inside_IN all_PDT the_DT wards_NNS and_CC surroundings_NNS ._.
Indeed_RB ,_, there_EX could_MD not_RB have_VB been_VBN a_DT better_JJR place_NN than_IN this_DT for_IN the_DT reception_NN of_IN plague-stricken_JJ cases_NNS ._.
It_PRP contains_VBZ four_CD large_JJ wards_NNS for_IN the_DT accommodation_NN of_IN male_NN ,_, female_JJ ,_, convalescent_NN ,_, and_CC observation_NN cases_NNS separately_RB ._.

4_CD ._.
Conservancy.-Latrines_NNS for_IN servants_NNS and_CC for_IN the_DT patients_NNS have_VBP been_VBN separated_VBN ,_, and_CC great_JJ care_NN was_VBD taken_VBN in_IN the_DT disposal_NN of_IN sewage_NN ,_, which_WDT was_VBD thoroughly_RB disinfected_VBN by_IN disinfecting_VBG powder_NN before_IN being_VBG thrown_VBN away_RB ,_, and_CC all_DT clothes_NNS belonging_VBG to_TO patients_NNS were_VBD carefully_RB disinfected_VBN by_IN liq_NN ._.

perchlor_NN ._.
before_IN being_VBG given_VBN to_TO the_DT dhobie_NN for_IN washing_VBG ._.

5_CD ._.

6_CD ._.

7_CD ._.

8_CD ._.

9_CD ._.
There_EX was_VBD no_DT sickness_NN of_IN any_DT nature_NN among_IN the_DT staff_NN of_IN hospital_NN ,_, although_IN we_PRP used_VBD to_TO mix_VB freely_RB with_IN the_DT plague_NN patients_NNS ,_, and_CC without_IN any_DT great_JJ precaution_NN or_CC reserve_NN ._.
10_CD ._.
I_PRP send_VBP herewith_RB all_PDT the_DT tables_NNS required_VBN ,_, carefully_RB compiled_VBN ._.
?_. 338_CD 11_CD ._.
About_IN the_DT symptoms_NNS of_IN the_DT disease_NN on_IN the_DT whole_NN ,_, I_PRP can_MD only_RB say_VB that_IN they_PRP were_VBD more_JJR acute_JJ in_IN subjects_NNS of_IN plethosric_JJ temperament_NN and_CC mild_NN in_IN weak_JJ cases_NNS ,_, where_WRB as_IN the_DT former_JJ patients_NNS succumbed_VBD in_IN many_JJ cases_NNS owing_VBG to_TO the_DT severity_NN of_IN the_DT symptoms_NNS ;_: the_DT latter_JJ cases_NNS lingered_VBN on_IN till_NN recovered_VBN ._.
Therefore_RB ,_, it_PRP will_MD be_VB not_RB misleading_VBG to_TO say_VB that_IN in_IN robust_JJ health_NN death_NN was_VBD almost_RB certain_JJ ,_, while_IN the_DT debilitated_JJ state_NN of_IN health_NN always_RB proved_VBD a_DT favourable_JJ ground_NN and_CC good_JJ chance_NN of_IN recovery_NN ._.
12_CD ._.
Ice.-I_NNP can_MD not_RB speak_VB too_RB highly_RB about_IN it_PRP ._.
This_DT being_VBG so_RB indispensable_JJ in_IN reducing_VBG the_DT temperature_NN of_IN the_DT patient_NN in_IN a_DT very_RB short_JJ time_NN ,_, and_CC bringing_VBG unconscious_JJ patients_NNS to_TO their_PRP$ senses_NNS ._.
If_IN there_EX is_VBZ any_DT specific_JJ treatment_NN for_IN bubonic_JJ fever_NN I_PRP can_MD say_VB very_RB boldly_RB it_PRP is_VBZ the_DT Ice_NNP ,_, and_CC a_DT system_NN of_IN mild_JJ treatment_NN and_CC low_JJ diet_NN ._.
13_CD ._.
About_IN the_DT Buboes.-Most_NNP of_IN them_PRP have_VBP occurred_VBN in_IN the_DT groins_NNS ,_, very_RB few_JJ coming_VBG in_IN the_DT axilla_NN ._.
14_CD ._.
Period_NN of_IN Convalescence.-With_NNP the_DT exception_NN of_IN two_CD or_CC three_CD cases_NNS who_WP were_VBD convalescents_NNS for_IN fifty_NN or_CC sixty-days_NNS ,_, all_DT others_NNS were_VBD discharged_VBN as_IN cured_VBN within_IN a_DT month_NN from_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN admission_NN into_IN the_DT hospital_NN ._.
15_CD ._.
We_PRP had_VBD only_RB two_CD plague_NN cases_NNS complicated_VBN with_IN pneumonia_NN ,_, *_NNP both_DT of_IN whom_WP recovered_VBD ._.
I_PRP have_VBP had_VBN never_RB a_DT case_NN of_IN mumps_NNS mistaken_VBN for_IN plague_NN ._.
16_CD ._.

17_CD ._.

Khatri_NNP Mahomedan_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, Bapoo_NNP Khote_NNP Street_NNP ._.
Report_NN on_IN the_DT working_NN of_IN the_DT Khatri_NNP Mahomedan_NNP Plague_NNP Hospital_NNP for_IN the_DT period-1st_JJ February_NNP to_TO 15th_CD June_NNP 1899_CD ._.
2_CD ._.
History.-The_NNP Hospital_NNP was_VBD founded_VBN on_IN the_DT 1st_CD April_NNP 1897_CD ,_, by_IN the_DT Jamat_NNP of_IN the_DT Khatri_NNP Mahomedans_NNPS ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ since_IN then_RB in_IN working_VBG order_NN ,_, and_CC is_VBZ opened_VBN during_IN recrudescence_NN each_DT year_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ ,_, and_CC closed_VBD temporarily_RB when_WRB the_DT disease_NN abates_VBZ ._.
The_DT following_JJ comprises_VBZ the_DT Hospital_NNP Board_NNP :_: -_: (_( a_DT )_) Hajee_NNP Ebrahim_NNP Hoosein_NNP ,_, J.P._NNP ,_, Chairman_NNP ._.
(_( b_NN )_) Khan_NNP Shab_NNP Hajee_NNP Isak_NNP Hajee_NNP Isa_NNP ._.
(_( c_NN )_) Hajee_NNP Ebrahim_NNP Rehimtoola_NNP ._.
(_( d_NN )_) Hajee_NNP Oosman_NNP Sooleman_NNP ._.
(_( e_NN )_) Mr._NNP Oomar_NNP Jaffer_NNP ,_, Secretary_NNP ._.
Hospital_NNP Establishment_NNP ._.
(_( a_DT )_) Dr._NNP M._NNP N._NNP Disana_NNP ,_, L._NNP M._NNP &_CC S._NNP ,_, Honry_NNP ._.
Medical_JJ Officer_NNP ._.
(_( b_NN )_) One_CD Hospital_NNP Assistant_NNP (_( unqualified_JJ )_) ._.
(_( c_NN )_) Two_CD Native_JJ Nurses_NNS or_CC ``_`` Dhayis_NNP ._. ''_''
(_( d_NN )_) Six_CD Ward-boys_JJ ._.
(_( e_NN )_) One_CD Cook_NNP ,_, one_CD Sweeper_NNP ,_, one_CD Dhobie_NNP ._.
The_DT Hospital_NNP Board_NNP in_IN all_DT their_PRP$ deliberations_NNS were_VBD guided_VBN and_CC assisted_VBN by_IN Mr._NNP Budrudin_NNP Abdulla_NNP Kur_NNP ,_, J.P._NNP ,_, Chairman_NNP of_IN the_DT Committee_NNP in_IN the_DT District_NNP ._.
Expenses.-The_JJ expenses_NNS in_IN connection_NN with_IN the_DT hospital_NN are_VBP defrayed_VBN out_IN of_IN Jamat_NNP funds_NNS to_TO which_WDT the_DT members_NNS of_IN the_DT Hospital_NNP Board_NNP are_VBP large_JJ contributors_NNS ._.
3_CD ._.
Building.-The_NNP hospital_NN building_NN is_VBZ originally_RB a_DT Jamat_NNP Khana_NNP ,_, i.e._NN ,_, a_DT place_NN or_CC hall_NN whereon_VBP religious_JJ and_CC other_JJ great_JJ occasions_NNS ,_, the_DT Mahomedans_NNPS of_IN the_DT Khatri_NNP community_NN meet_NN and_CC dine_NN ._.
It_PRP comprises_VBZ a_DT ground_NN floor_NN and_CC three_CD upper_JJ floors_NNS ._.
The_DT ground_NN floor_NN is_VBZ utilized_JJ for_IN miscellaneous_JJ purposes_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN kitchen_NN ,_, disinfecting_VBG room_NN ,_, store_NN room_NN ,_, and_CC for_IN accommodation_NN of_IN servants_NNS ._.
The_DT first_JJ floor_NN is_VBZ utilized_VBN as_IN the_DT observation_NN ward_NN ,_, the_DT second_JJ the_DT male_JJ ward_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT third_JJ the_DT female_JJ ward_NN ._.
Each_DT of_IN these_DT wards_NNS is_VBZ capable_JJ of_IN accommodating_VBG 12_CD beds_NNS ,_, and_CC is_VBZ well_RB ventilated_VBN ._.
No_DT dispensary_NN is_VBZ attached_VBN to_TO the_DT hospital_NN ,_, but_CC all_DT medicaments_NNS are_VBP supplied_VBN by_IN the_DT Hony_NNP ._.
Medical_JJ Officer_NNP from_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ Dispensary_NNP ._.
Attached_VBN to_TO the_DT hospital_NN is_VBZ a_DT segregation_NN house_NN where_WRB contacts_NNS are_VBP removed_VBN ,_, except_IN those_DT who_WP are_VBP allowed_VBN to_TO stay_VB as_IN nurses_NNS by_IN the_DT patient_NN ._.
This_DT segregation_NN house_NN is_VBZ situated_VBN at_IN Nagdevi_NNP Street_NNP and_CC is_VBZ in_IN charge_NN of_IN Mr._NNP B_NNP ._.
A._NN Kur_NNP ,_, Chairman_NNP of_IN the_DT District_NNP Committee_NNP ._.
4_CD ._.
Conservancy.-Each_NNP bed_NN is_VBZ supplied_VBN with_IN a_DT bed-pan_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT sweeper_NN who_WP is_VBZ constantly_RB present_JJ on_IN the_DT premises_NNS ,_, removes_VBZ the_DT excreta_NN at_IN once_RB and_CC disposes_NNS of_IN them_PRP under_IN directions_NNS of_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP Health_NNP Inspector_NNP ._.
Servants_NNS and_CC contacts_NNS are_VBP supplied_VBN with_IN chamber_NN pots_NNS placed_VBD on_IN the_DT ground_NN floor_NN ._.
In_IN 1897_CD ,_, when_WRB 1_CD applied_VBN to_TO General_NNP Gatacre_NNP 's_POS Committee_NNP for_IN the_DT construction_NN of_IN suitable_JJ closets_NNS ,_, the_DT above_NN was_VBD the_DT arrangement_NN recommended_VBD for_IN adoption_NN after_IN inspection_NN of_IN the_DT building_NN by_IN the_DT Committee_NNP ._.
?_. 341_CD 5_CD ._.
Water_NNP Supply-On_NNP the_DT ground_NN floor_NN is_VBZ a_DT large_JJ pipe_NN in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT cook_NN ._.
Underneath_NN is_VBZ a_DT tank_NN from_IN which_WDT the_DT hospital_NN is_VBZ supplied_VBN with_IN water_NN ._.
There_EX are_VBP taps_NNS on_IN each_DT floor_NN ,_, but_CC they_PRP were_VBD not_RB utilized_VBN ._.
6_CD ._.
Disinfection-The_JJ wards_NNS are_VBP treated_VBN every_DT evening_NN with_IN strong_JJ phenyle_JJ solution_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT walls_NNS and_CC flooring_VBG are_VBP lime-washed_JJ once_RB every_DT month_NN ._.
When_WRB the_DT hospital_NN closes_VBZ temporarily_RB ,_, the_DT -District_NNP Plague_NNP Officer_NNP gets_VBZ the_DT whole_JJ building_NN disinfected_VBD ._.
The_DT linen_NN and_CC clothing_NN are_VBP never_RB sent_VBN to_TO the_DT Disinfecting_NNP Station_NNP but_CC disinfected_VBN in_IN the_DT hospital_NN premises_NNS ._.
All_DT linen_NN ,_, bedding_NN and_CC clothing_NN ,_, soiled_VBN by_IN excreta_NN ,_, are_VBP destroyed_VBN by_IN burning_VBG ._.
The_DT rest_NN is_VBZ dipped_VBN in_IN a_DT solution_NN of_IN perchloride_NN of_IN mercurry_NN 1_CD in_IN 2,000_CD for_IN twenty-four_JJ hours_NNS and_CC then_RB washed_VBD thoroughly_RB by_IN the_DT dhobie_NN on_IN the_DT premises_NNS ._.
7_CD ._.
Disposal_NN of_IN the_DT Dead-The_NNP front_JJ verandah_NN of_IN the_DT ground_NN floor_NN is_VBZ utilized_VBN as_IN a_DT mortuary_NN ._.
A_DT patient_NN dying_VBG in_IN the_DT ward_NN is_VBZ brought_VBN down_RB here_RB ,_, dressed_VBN and_CC placed_VBN in_IN the_DT coffin_NN ,_, and_CC taken_VBN immediately_RB to_TO the_DT cemetery_NN by_IN contacts_NNS ,_, and_CC part_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN establishment_NN ._.
Very_RB little_JJ or_CC no_DT time_NN is_VBZ lost_VBN as_IN the_DT Mahomedan_NNP religious_JJ rites_NNS enjoin_VBP early_JJ interment_NN ._.
The_DT verandah_NN is_VBZ ._.
then_RB treated_VBN with_IN perchloride_JJ solution_NN and_CC lime-washed_JJ ._.
There_EX is_VBZ no_DT difficulty_NN as_IN regards_NNS pauper_IN patients_NNS who_WP receive_VBP the_DT same_JJ attention_NN when_WRB dead_JJ as_IN the_DT rich_JJ ones_NNS ._.
8_CD ._.

The_DT Mahomedans_NNPS in_IN this_DT district_NN have_VBP never_RB taken_VBN a_DT favourable_JJ view_NN of_IN it_PRP ._.

2_CD 100_CD Females_NNS 1_CD 100_CD Children_NNP Notes_NNS on_IN the_DT Symptoms_NNP ,_, Character_NNP and_CC Treatment_NNP of_IN the_DT Disease_NNP ._.
(_( From_IN experience_NN obtained_VBN in_IN this_DT and_CC other_JJ Hospitals_NNS in_IN my_PRP$ charge_NN ,_, as_RB well_RB as_IN private_JJ practice_NN )_) ._.
Incubation.-The_JJ period_NN of_IN incubation_NN varies_NNS from_IN a_DT few_JJ hours_NNS to_TO a_DT few_JJ weeks_NNS ._.
No_DT approximate_JJ time_NN could_MD be_VB fixed_VBN ;_: all_DT depends_VBZ on_IN the_DT vitality_NN of_IN the_DT tissues_NNS of_IN a_DT person_NN to_TO resist_VB the_DT poison_NN ._.
Amongst_IN the_DT ricketty_NN and_CC those_DT whose_WP$ staple_JJ food_NN is_VBZ ``_`` dhall_JJ ''_'' and_CC rice_VB alone_RB ,_, such_JJ as_IN among_IN the_DT Jains_NNS and_CC among_IN the_DT lower_JJR order_NN of_IN almost_RB all_DT communities_NNS ,_, the_DT resisting_VBG power_NN of_IN the_DT tissue_NN is_VBZ so_RB low_JJ ,_, that_IN the_DT period_NN of_IN incubation_NN is_VBZ very_RB short_JJ ._.
On_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN ,_, among_IN the_DT robust_JJ and_CC among_IN the_DT higher_JJR orders_NNS of_IN all_DT classes_NNS who_WP indulge_VBP in_IN a_DT mixed_JJ food_NN ,_, including_VBG vegetables_NNS ,_, fruits_NNS ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, the_DT resisting_VBG power_NN of_IN tissues_NNS to_TO the_DT plague_NN germs_NNS is_VBZ long_RB ._.
Cases.-Ismail_NNP Hajee_NNP Moti_NNP ,_, a_DT wood_NN merchant_NN ,_, was_VBD living_VBG for_IN 2_CD months_NNS in_IN the_DT forest_NN of_IN Atgaon_NNP ,_, about_RB 40_CD miles_NNS away_RB from_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
His_PRP$ younger_NN brother_NN in_IN Bombay_NNP having_VBG been_VBN attacked_VBN by_IN Plague_NNP ,_, Ismail_NNP was_VBD telegraphed_VBN for_IN ._.
He_PRP arrived_VBD in_IN Bombay_NNP at_IN 8_CD p.m._NN on_IN the_DT 9th_CD February_NNP 1898_CD ._.
At_IN 9-30_CD p.m._NN he_PRP had_VBD severe_JJ rigor_NN ,_, and_CC I_PRP was_VBD sent_VBN for_IN to_TO see_VB him_PRP ._.
His_PRP$ temperature_NN was_VBD found_VBN 104_CD at_IN 7_CD a._NN m._NN ,_, the_DT next_JJ morning_NN I_PRP again_RB saw_VBD him_PRP ,_, and_CC found_VBD that_IN he_PRP had_VBD a_DT large_JJ bubo_NN in_IN the_DT left_JJ Axilla_NNP ._.
He_PRP was_VBD at_IN once_RB removed_VBN to_TO the_DT Kolsa_NNP Mohola_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, and_CC died_VBD four_CD days_NNS after_IN ._.
Here_RB the_DT incubation_NN period_NN was_VBD not_RB even_RB two_CD hours_NNS ._.
Cassum_NNP Mahomed_NNP ,_, aged_VBD 30_CD ,_, was_VBD nursing_VBG his_PRP$ mother_NN who_WP was_VBD laid_VBN up_RP with_IN Plague_NNP on_IN the_DT 15th_CD February_NNP 1899_CD ._.
Cassum_NNP himself_PRP was_VBD attacked_VBN on_IN the_DT 13th_CD March_NNP 1899_CD ,_, and_CC sent_VBD to_TO the_DT hospital_NN lying_NN by_IN the_DT side_NN of_IN his_PRP$ mother_NN ._.
During_IN the_DT intervening_JJ period_NN ._.
Cassum_NNP ,_, who_WP was_VBD usually_RB of_IN a_DT cheerful_JJ temper_NN ,_, looked_VBD very_RB ill_RB ._.
He_PRP complained_VBD of_IN feverish_JJ condition_NN at_IN night_NN and_CC occasional_JJ vomiting_NN ._.
This_DT is_VBZ a_DT case_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT incubation_NN period_NN has_VBZ been_VBN nearly_RB a_DT month_NN ._.
?_. 344_CD Symptoms.-The_JJ symptoms_NNS at_IN the_DT onset_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN vary_NN so_RB very_RB much_JJ that_IN for_IN clinical_JJ purposes_NNS ,_, I_PRP divide_VBP the_DT disease_NN into_IN the_DT following_JJ groups_NNS ._.
I._NNP Plague_NNP Simple_NNP with_IN or_CC without_IN Buboes_NNP ._.
(_( a_DT )_) Mild_NNP cases_NNS ._.
(_( b_NN )_) Ordinary_JJ cases_NNS ._.
(_( c_NN )_) Severe_NNP cases_NNS ._.
(_( d_NN )_) Virulent_NN cases_NNS ._.
II_NNP ._.
Pneumonic_NNP Plague_NNP with_IN or_CC without_IN Buboes_NNP ._.
(_( a_DT )_) Primary_NNP pneumonia_NN ._.
(_( b_NN )_) Secondary_NNP pneumonia_NN ._.
III_NNP ._.
Septicoemic_NNP Plague_NNP ._.
(_( a_DT )_) Simple_JJ Septicmic_NNP ._.
(_( b_NN )_) Septicoemia_NN with_IN one_CD or_CC many_JJ blisters_NNS ,_, or_CC blebs_NN ._.
Class_NNP I.-Plague_NNP Simple_NNP (_( a_DT )_) mild_NN cases_NNS ._.
In_IN this_DT form_NN the_DT patient_NN goes_VBZ generally_RB to_TO private_JJ medical_JJ dispensaries_NNS complain-_JJ ing_NN of_IN slight_JJ glandular_NN pain_NN ,_, and_CC gives_VBZ one_CD to_TO understand_VB that_IN he_PRP consults_VBZ only_RB as_IN a_DT precautionary_JJ measure_NN ._.
On_IN examination_NN a_DT lymphatic_JJ is_VBZ found_VBN ,_, enlarged_VBN and_CC painful_JJ on_IN pressure_NN ._.
His_PRP$ pulse_NN is_VBZ quick_JJ ,_, about_RB 130_CD ,_, and_CC temperature_NN ranging_VBG from_IN 99_CD to_TO 100_CD ._.
His_PRP$ looks_NNS are_VBP frightened_VBN ,_, excepting_VBG this_DT no_DT other_JJ symptom_NN is_VBZ visible_JJ ._.
These_DT cases_NNS are_VBP met_VBN with_IN just_RB about_IN the_DT time_NN when_WRB recrudescence_NN commences_NNS ,_, and_CC easily_RB yield_VB to_TO judicious_JJ treatment_NN locally_RB and_CC internally_RB in_IN about_RB 24_CD to_TO 48_CD hours_NNS ._.
If_IN treatment_NN is_VBZ then_RB discontinued_VBN on_IN or_CC about_IN the_DT third_JJ day_NN there_EX is_VBZ a_DT relapse_NN with_IN severe_JJ symptoms_NNS ._.
These_DT cases_NNS are_VBP rarely_RB seen_VBN in_IN hospitals_NNS ._.
Class_NN 1_CD (_( b_NN )_) -Ordinary_JJ Cases-In_NNP this_DT ,_, the_DT patient_NN complains_NNS of_IN feverish_JJ condition_NN and_CC slight_JJ glandular_NN pain_NN ._.
He_PRP too_RB generally_RB attends_VBZ the_DT dispensary_NN of_IN medical_JJ men_NNS ._.
On_IN examination_NN he_PRP is_VBZ found_VBN to_TO have_VB fever_VBN about_IN 100_CD ._.
He_PRP has_VBZ furred_VBN tongue_NN ,_, anxious_JJ looks_NNS ,_, slight_JJ headache_NN ,_, loss_NN of_IN appetite_NN ,_, and_CC pains_NNS in_IN the_DT limbs_NNS ._.
His_PRP$ friends_NNS are_VBP warned_VBN of_IN the_DT danger_NN ,_, but_CC neither_CC he_PRP nor_CC they_PRP attach_VBP any_DT weight_NN to_TO the_DT warning_NN ._.
He_PRP moves_VBZ about_RB in_IN the_DT house_NN and_CC often_RB in_IN the_DT streets_NNS ,_, even_RB doing_VBG some_DT business_NN ,_, when_WRB suddenly_RB ,_, on_IN or_CC about_IN the_DT fourth_JJ day_NN ,_, he_PRP feels_VBZ nausea_NN and_CC choking_VBG sensations_NNS in_IN the_DT chest_NN ._.
He_PRP vomits_VBZ copiously_RB yellow_JJ or_CC greenish-yellow_JJ matter_NN ,_, and_CC simultaneously_RB shivers_NNS and_CC is_VBZ feverish_JJ ._.
On_IN examination_NN the_DT gland_NN seems_VBZ to_TO have_VB increased_VBN in_IN size_NN and_CC is_VBZ most_RBS painful_JJ ._.
The_DT temperature_NN immediately_RB after_IN vomiting_VBG is_VBZ about_IN 102_CD ,_, and_CC within_IN a_DT few_JJ hours_NNS reaches_VBZ up_IN to_TO 104_CD ._.
The_DT pulse_NN which_WDT is_VBZ soft_JJ and_CC compressible_JJ after_IN vomiting_VBG becomes_RB full_JJ ,_, bounding_NN ,_, and_CC running_VBG with_IN the_DT rise_NN in_IN temperature_NN ._.
The_DT skin_NN which_WDT is_VBZ cold_JJ and_CC moist_NN during_IN the_DT shivering_NN stage_NN ,_, becomes_VBZ hot_JJ and_CC dry_JJ within_IN a_DT few_JJ hours_NNS ._.
The_DT feeling_NN of_IN nausea_NN persists_NNS ,_, and_CC there_EX is_VBZ heaviness_NN about_IN the_DT head_NN ._.
The_DT patient_NN is_VBZ excited_VBN ,_, the_DT features_NNS get_VBP flushed_VBN ,_, and_CC he_PRP tries_VBZ to_TO sleep_VB ._.
This_DT is_VBZ the_DT onset_NN in_IN ordinary_JJ cases_NNS ._.
Case.-Amuabai_NNP Mahomed_NNP Oomer_NNP ,_, age_NN 21_CD ,_, was_VBD on_IN the_DT 18th_CD March_NNP 1899_CD ,_, brought_VBD to_TO the_DT Khatri_NNP Mahomedan_NNP Hospital_NNP suffering_VBG from_IN Plague_NNP ._.

Severe_JJ Cases_NNP ._.
In_IN this_DT form_NN there_EX are_VBP no_DT preliminary_JJ symptoms_NNS before_IN the_DT regular_JJ onset_NN ._.

His_PRP$ skin_NN is_VBZ dry_JJ and_CC pale_JJ ._.

Class_NN I.-_NNP (_( d_NN )_) Virulent_VBD cases.-In_NN this_DT the_DT onset_NN is_VBZ very_RB sudden_JJ ,_, the_DT patient_NN is_VBZ suddenly_RB struck_VBN down_RP unconscious_JJ ,_, followed_VBD within_IN a_DT few_JJ minutes_NNS by_IN fits_NNS of_IN convulsions_NNS and_CC often_RB death_NN ._.

Case.-Mohomedally_NNP Adamjee_NNP Charter_NNP ,_, age_NN 35_CD ._.
After_IN his_PRP$ evening_NN meal_NN ,_, he_PRP was_VBD sitting_VBG in_IN the_DT verandah_NN of_IN his_PRP$ house_NN at_IN about_IN 7_CD p._NN m._NN He_PRP suddenly_RB fell_VBD down_RB and_CC was_VBD seized_VBN with_IN a_DT fit_NN of_IN convulsions_NNS ._.

Primary_JJ Pneumonia.-In_NNP most_JJS cases_NNS the_DT onset_NN is.sudden_NN and_CC fever_NN ,_, bubo_NN and_CC pneumonia_NN all_DT three_CD occur_NNS simultaneously_RB ._.
In_IN my_PRP$ observation_NN I_PRP have_VBP found_VBN that_IN in_IN most_JJS pneumonic_JJ cases_NNS the_DT respiratory_NN system_NN was_VBD not_RB healthy_JJ before_RB ._.
There_EX had_VBD been_VBN Catarrh_NNP or_CC Bronchitis_NNP or_CC Emphysema_NNP or_CC Tuberculosis_NNP ,_, or_CC the_DT patient_NN was_VBD a_DT drunkard_NN ,_, a_DT hard_JJ smoker_NN ,_, a_DT pan_NN and_CC tobacco_NN chewer_NN or_CC an_DT opium-eater_NN ._.
At_IN the_DT onset_NN pneumonia_NN is_VBZ found_VBN in_IN its_PRP$ first_JJ stage_NN ,_, viz._NN ,_, that_IN of_IN congestion_NN ._.
The_DT next_JJ stage_NN ,_, viz._NN ,_, that_IN of_IN engorgement_JJ sets_NNS in_IN within_IN a_DT few_JJ hours_NNS ,_, and_CC should_MD the_DT patient_NN live_JJ ,_, exudation_NN commences_NNS within_IN 12_CD hours_NNS ._.
The_DT stages_NNS follow_VBP one_CD after_IN the_DT other_JJ in_IN very_RB rapid_JJ succession_NN ._.
The_DT symptoms_NNS at_IN the_DT onset_NN are_VBP the_DT same_JJ as_IN described_VBN above_IN under_IN heading_NN (_( c_NN )_) severe_JJ cases_NNS ,_, and_CC (_( d_NN )_) virulent_NN cases_NNS ,_, with_IN the_DT addition_NN of_IN symptoms_NNS of_IN ordinary_JJ croupous_JJ pneumonia_NN ._.
If_IN the_DT latter_JJ be_VB lobular_JJ ,_, i.e._FW ,_, a_DT few_JJ dull_NN patches_NNS are_VBP discovered_VBN ,_, the_DT prognosis_NN is_VBZ often_RB favourable_JJ ,_, but_CC 'should_MD the_DT whole_JJ lung_NN be_VB infected_VBN ,_, the_DT chances_NNS of_IN recovery_NN are_VBP few_JJ ._.
The_DT fatal_JJ sign_NN is_VBZ when_WRB streaks_NNS of_IN blood_NN appear_NN in_IN the_DT sputum_NN ._.
When_WRB this_DT appears_VBZ the_DT chances_NNS to_TO recovery_NN are_VBP few_JJ ._.
Besides_IN pain_NN ,_, dispnoea_NN ,_, high_JJ temperature_NN ,_, the_DT one_CD noticeable_JJ symptom_NN is_VBZ difficulty_NN at_IN deglutution_NN ._.
The_DT patient_NN ,_, after_IN vain_NN attempts_NNS to_TO swallow_VB food_NN or_CC medicine_NN ,_, spits_NNS about_IN him_PRP ,_, sometimes_RB right_RB in_IN to_TO the_DT face_NN of_IN the_DT persons_NNS standing_VBG by_IN as_IN if_IN he_PRP did_VBD it_PRP purposely_RB ,_, such_JJ is_VBZ the_DT onset_NN of_IN Primary_NNP Plague_NNP Pneumonia_NNP ._.
Case.-Oomer_JJ Usman_NNP aged_VBD 15_CD ,_, was_VBD admitted_VBN to_TO the_DT Khatri_NNP Mahomedan_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, on_IN the_DT 6th_CD March_NNP ._.

Class_NN II.-Pneumonic_NNP Plague_NNP (_( b_NN )_) Secondary.-This_NN I_PRP consider_VBP to_TO be_VB merely_RB a_DT symptom_NN of_IN the_DT failing_VBG heart_NN ,_, rather_RB than_IN a_DT complication_NN ._.
In_IN most_JJS cases_NNS a_DT bruit_NN manifests_VBZ itself_PRP with_IN the_DT first_JJ sound_NN of_IN the_DT heart_NN ._.
I_PRP consider_VBP it_PRP to_TO be_VB a_DT mere_JJ acute_JJ mechanical_JJ congestion_NN of_IN lungs_NNS through_IN weakness_NN of_IN the_DT heart_NN ._.
Class_NN III.-Septicamic_NNP Plague_NNP (_( a_DT )_) Simple_NNP Septicoemea_NNP without_IN Blebs_NNP ._.

?_. 347_CD Multiple_NNP Buboes_NNP ._.

Class_NN III.-Seplicoemic_NNP Buboes_NNP with_IN Blebs.-In_NNP this_DT the_DT symptoms_NNS at_IN onset_NN are_VBP the_DT same_JJ as_IN in_IN the_DT above_JJ variety_NN ,_, but_CC with_IN the_DT addition_NN of_IN blisters_NNS or_CC blebs_NN either_CC above_IN the_DT gland_NN or_CC in_IN close_JJ proximity_NN of_IN it_PRP ._.
They_PRP vary_VBP in_IN size_NN and_CC shape_NN and_CC colour_NN ._.
There_EX may_MD be_VB a_DT dark_JJ congested_JJ spot_NN with_IN or_CC without_IN a_DT bleb_NN in_IN the_DT centre_NN ._.
If_IN the_DT congested_JJ spot_NN ,_, having_VBG the_DT appearance_NN of_IN ecchymosis_NN ,_, is_VBZ left_VBN to_TO itself_PRP ,_, a_DT bleb_NN forms_VBZ over_IN it_PRP a_DT few_JJ hours_NNS afterwards_NNS ._.
The_DT fluid_NN in_IN the_DT bleb_NN is_VBZ viscid_JJ ,_, yellowish_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT patient_NN not_RB only_RB complains_VBZ severe_JJ burning_VBG pain_NN in_IN this_DT part_NN but_CC in_IN the_DT whole_JJ body_NN ._.
The_DT local_JJ burning_NN ceases_NNS after_IN the_DT bleb_NN is_VBZ opened_VBN and_CC a_DT few_JJ poulticies_NNS applied_VBN ._.
Fever_NN ._.
I_PRP regret_VBP ,_, without_IN the_DT assistance_NN of_IN qualified_JJ Hospital_NNP Assistants_NNPS or_CC Nurses_NNP ,_, temperature_NN charts_NNS could_MD not_RB be_VB kept_VBN in_IN most_JJS cases_NNS ;_: but_CC the_DT temperatures_NNS were_VBD mostly_RB noted_VBN by_IN me_PRP in_IN the_DT papers_NNS of_IN cases_NNS relating_VBG to_TO patients_NNS ._.
Remarks.-In_JJ most_RBS cases_NNS the_DT regular_JJ onset_NN begins_VBZ with_IN the_DT temperature_NN of_IN 102_CD ._.
After_IN vomiting_VBG it_PRP shoots_VBZ up_IN to_TO 103_CD ,_, 104_CD ,_, up_RB to_TO 107_CD ,_, and_CC rarely_RB to_TO 108_CD ._.
Next_JJ morning_NN the_DT temperature_NN either_CC falls_VBZ to_TO 99_CD or_CC below_IN with_IN an_DT evening_VBG rise_NN to_TO about_IN 104_CD ,_, or_CC it_PRP falls_VBZ to_TO about_IN 102_CD or_CC 103_CD in_IN the_DT morning_NN ,_, and_CC rises_NNS again_RB by_IN 1_CD or_CC 2_CD degrees_NNS in_IN the_DT evening_NN ._.

Buboes_NNS ._.
These_DT are_VBP of_IN two_CD varieties-_NN (_( 1_CD )_) simple_NN ;_: (_( 2_CD )_) with_IN blisters_NNS or_CC blebs_NN ._.
In_IN 1897_CD the_DT second_JJ variety_NN almost_RB did_VBD not_RB exist_VB ._.
In_IN 1898_CD they_PRP appeared_VBD just_RB about_IN the_DT time_NN when_WRB the_DT virulence_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_NN was_VBD most_RBS severe_JJ ,_, and_CC this_DT year_NN they_PRP were_VBD seen_VBN from_IN the_DT very_RB beginning_NN of_IN the_DT recrudescence_NN ,_, leading_VBG me_PRP to_TO suppose_VB that_IN the_DT virulence_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_NN would_MD be_VB more_JJR severe_JJ this_DT year_NN than_IN during_IN the_DT former_JJ ones_NNS ._.
Buboes_NNS vary_VBP in_IN size_NN from_IN a_DT gram-seed_NN to_TO a_DT large_JJ pear_NN ,_, their_PRP$ shape_NN being_VBG rounded_VBN .or_NNP elliptical_JJ ;_: and_CC when_WRB two_CD or_CC more_JJR unite_JJ together_RB ,_, as_IN the_DT cervical_JJ and_CC the_DT sub-maxillary_JJ ,_, they_PRP form_VBP an_DT irregularly_JJ shaped_JJ mass_NN ._.
Situation.-From_JJ observations_NNS I_PRP have_VBP come_VBN to_TO the_DT conclusion_NN that_IN in_IN most_JJS cases_NNS buboes_VBP appear_VB about_IN the_DT situation_NN of_IN those_DT glands_NNS which_WDT at_IN one_CD time_NN or_CC the_DT other_JJ have_VBP become_VBN diseased_VBN ._.
Native_JJ children_NNS generally_RB suffer_VBP from_IN otorrhoea_NN ,_, stomatitis_NN ,_, apthoe_NN or_CC skin_NN diseases_NNS of_IN the_DT scalp_NN ,_, &_CC c._NN ;_: and_CC among_IN them_PRP bucoes_NNS appear_VBP in_IN the_DT cervical_JJ ,_, parotid_JJ and_CC sub-maxillary_JJ region_NN mostly_RB ._.

Development.-At_NNP the_DT onset_NN they_PRP are_VBP very_RB small_JJ ,_, bat_JJ continue_VBP to_TO grow_VB in_IN size_NN ,_, the_DT inflammation_NN extending_NN ,_, until_IN about_IN the_DT fifth_JJ day_NN ._.

Complications_NNS ._.

?_. 349_CD Sequelae_NNP ._.

Period_NN of_IN Convalescence_NNP ._.

Treatment_NN ._.

Fever.-For_NN this_DT symptom_NN it_PRP is_VBZ easy_JJ to_TO say_VB what_WP drugs_NNS are_VBP harmful_JJ rather_RB than_IN what_WP are_VBP useful_JJ ._.

Of_IN late_JJ I_PRP have_VBP given_VBN extensively_RB a_DT much_RB neglected_VBN Compound_NNP ,_, viz._NN ,_, Tincture_NNP of_IN Warburg_NNP ._.
It_PRP proves_VBZ a_DT good_JJ stimulating_NN diaphoretic_JJ ,_, and_CC having_VBG seen_VBN lately_RB a_DT copy_NN of_IN the_DT original_JJ receipt_NN ,_, the_DT idea_NN that_IN it_PRP contained_VBD any_DT harmful_JJ drug_NN ,_, such_JJ as_IN aconite_NN or_CC Iodine_NNP ,_, is_VBZ dispelled_VBN ._.

Insomnia.-All_NNP drugs_NNS having_VBG a_DT depressing_JJ influence_NN on_IN the_DT heart_NN are_VBP contra-indicated_JJ ._.

cannabis_NN ind_NN ._.
answers_NNS best_JJS ._.
Delirium.-Excepting_JJ ice_NN bag_NN ,_, everything_NN else_RB is_VBZ harmful_JJ ._.

Gastric_NNP sedatives_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN hydrocanic_JJ acid_NN and_CC bismuth_NN ,_, are_VBP contra-indicated_JJ ._.

I_PRP have_VBP given_VBN full_JJ trial_NN .to_VBD the_DT Khoja_NNP Hospital_NNP decoction_NN ,_, containing_VBG several_JJ native_JJ herbs_NN ,_, and_CC find_VBP that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ as_RB useful_JJ as_IN any_DT ordinary_JJ diaphoretic_JJ mixture_NN in_IN curing_VBG the_DT disease_NN ._.

The_DT reason_NN why_WRB it_PRP succeeds_VBZ so_RB well_RB in_IN the_DT Khoja_NNP Hospital_NNP is_VBZ to_TO be_VB ?_. 351_CD looked_VBD to_TO ,_, not_RB in_IN the_DT decoction_NN ,_, but_CC elsewhere_RB ;_: perhaps_RB previous_JJ inoculation_NN has_VBZ something_NN to_TO do_VB with_IN it_PRP or_CC the_DT early_JJ resorting_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS to_TO the_DT hospital_NN for_IN treatment_NN ._.
