Report_NN on_IN the_DT working_NN of_IN the_DT Kolsa_NNP Moholla_NNP Mahommedan_NNP Plague_NNP Hospital_NNP for_IN the_DT period_NN 1st_CD January_NNP to_TO 15th_CD June_NNP 1899_CD ._.
History.-This_NNP was_VBD the_DT first_JJ hospital_NN started_VBD in_IN Bombay_NNP in_IN the_DT very_RB locality_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS for_IN whom_WP it_PRP was_VBD intended_VBN ,_, in_IN April_NNP 1897_CD ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ located_VBN ,_, like_IN other_JJ Mahommedan_NNP hospitals_NNS ,_, in_IN the_DT Jamat_NNP Khana_NNP or_CC dining_VBG hall_NN ._.
The_DT following_JJ comprises_VBZ the_DT Hospital_NNP Board_NNP :_: -_: (_( a_DT )_) Khan_NNP Shab_NNP Hajee_NNP Ebrahim_NNP Hajee_NNP Soomar_NNP Patel_NNP ,_, Chairman_NNP ._.
(_( b_NN )_) Sirdar_NNP Khan_NNP Bahadur_NNP Cassum_NNP Hajee_NNP Mitha_NNP ,_, J._NNP P._NNP (_( c_NN )_) Hajee_NNP Ebrahim_NNP Hajee_NNP Ahmed_NNP Patel_NNP ._.
(_( d_NN )_) Mr._NNP Alli_NNP Mahomed_NNP Abba_NNP Jooma_NNP ,_, J._NNP P._NNP (_( e_NN )_) Hajee_NNP Oosman_NNP Hajee_NNP Abba_NNP ,_, Secretary_NNP ._.
Hospital_NNP Establishment_NNP ._.
(_( a_DT )_) Dr._NNP M._NNP N._NNP Disana_NNP ,_, L.M._NNP &_CC S._NNP ,_, Honorary_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP ._.
(_( b_NN )_) One_CD Hospital_NNP Assistant_NNP ._.
(_( c_NN )_) Four_CD Ward-boys_JJ ._.
(_( d_NN )_) One_CD Cook_NNP ,_, one_CD Sweeper_NNP ,_, one_CD Dhobie_NNP ._.
Expenses.-The_JJ expenses_NNS incidental_JJ to_TO the_DT working_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN are_VBP incurred_VBN out_IN of_IN the_DT Jamat_NNP Fund_NNP ,_, collected_VBN by_IN a_DT sort_NN of_IN income_NN tax_NN ._.
No_DT donations_NNS have_VBP been_VBN received_VBN from_IN any_DT one_CD ,_, and_CC the_DT Honorary_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, besides_IN giving_VBG his_PRP$ services_NNS free_JJ of_IN charge_NN ,_, supplies_NNS medicaments_NNS free_JJ ._.
Conservancy_NN ._.
Building.-It_NNP is_VBZ a_DT three-storied_JJ building_NN ,_, open_JJ only_RB to_TO the_DT West_NNP ,_, and_CC has_VBZ three_CD stories_NNS with_IN a_DT ground-floor_NN ._.
The_DT last_JJ is_VBZ utilized_JJ as_IN a_DT store_NN and_CC cook_NN room_NN ,_, and_CC has_VBZ accommodation_NN for_IN servants_NNS and_CC contacts_NNS ._.
The_DT first_JJ storey_NN is_VBZ utilized_VBN as_IN an_DT Observation_NNP Ward_NNP ;_: the_DT second_JJ ,_, the_DT male_NN ;_: and_CC the_DT third_JJ ,_, the_DT female_NN ._.
No_DT segregation_NN house_NN is_VBZ provided_VBN ._.
The_DT building_NN had_VBD had_VBN no_DT conservancy_NN arrangement_NN before_IN ._.
General_NNP Gatacre_NNP 's_POS Committee_NNP undertook_VBD the_DT construction_NN of_IN water-closets_NNS and_CC erected_VBD water-pipes_NNS ._.
The_DT expenses_NNS amounted_VBD to_TO about_IN Rs_NNP ._.
1,800_CD ,_, half_NN of_IN which_WDT were_VBD paid_VBN out_IN of_IN the_DT Jamat_NNP Funds_NNPS and_CC the_DT other_JJ half_NN by_IN the_DT Municipality_NNP ._.
There_EX are_VBP flushing_VBG tanks_NNS connected_VBN with_IN the_DT latrines_NNS ._.
?_. 352_CD Water-supply.-It_JJ is_VBZ drawn_VBN out_IN of_IN pipes_NNS erected_VBN on_IN each_DT floor_NN by_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Committee_NNP in_IN April_NNP 1897_CD ._.
Disinfection.-Whenever_NN there_EX are_VBP patients_NNS ,_, the_DT wards_NNS are_VBP treated_VBN with_IN phenyle_JJ solution_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT flooring_NN washed_VBD with_IN lime_NN once_RB a_DT fortnight_NN ._.
This_DT year_NN the_DT linen_NN and_CC clothing_NN ,_, as_RB well_RB as_IN bedding_NN ,_, soiled_VBN by_IN patients_NNS have_VBP been_VBN all_DT destroyed_VBN ._.
The_DT rest_NN were_VBD treated_VBN with_IN strong_JJ phenyle_JJ solution_NN and_CC washed_VBN by_IN the_DT Dhobie_NNP ._.
Disposal_NN of_IN the_DT Dead.-On_NNP a_DT patient_NN dying_NN ,_, he_PRP or_CC she_PRP was_VBD taken_VBN to_TO the_DT back_NN of_IN the_DT ward_NN ,_, and_CC there_RB dressed_VBN and_CC put_VBN into_IN the_DT coffin_NN and_CC taken_VBN to_TO the_DT Burial_NNP Ground_NNP ._.
Inoculation.-Of_NNP the_DT patients_NNS admitted_VBD none_NN were_VBD inoculated_VBN ._.
No_DT sickness_NN occurred_VBD among_IN the_DT hospital_JJ staff_NN ._.
General_NNP Remarks.-This_NNP year_NN only_RB seven_CD patients_NNS were_VBD admitted_VBN into_IN the_DT hospital_NN ,_, out_IN of_IN which_WDT three_CD died_VBD ,_, and_CC four_CD were_VBD discharged_VBN cured_VBN ._.
One_CD of_IN the_DT reasons_NNS for_IN the_DT small_JJ number_NN of_IN admissions_NNS is_VBZ the_DT retirement_NN of_IN Sirdar_NNP Khan_NNP Bahadur_NNP Cassum_NNP Hajee_NNP Mitha_NNP from_IN active_JJ search-work_NN through_IN ill-health_NN ;_: but_CC the_DT more_RBR notorious_JJ one_CD is_VBZ apparently_RB the_DT dislike_NN of_IN hospitals_NNS ,_, by_IN the_DT Mahommedans_NNPS in_IN general_JJ in_IN this_DT part_NN ,_, no_DT matter_NN whether_IN it_PRP be_VB their_PRP$ own_JJ Jamat_NNP hospital_NN where_WRB friends_NNS could_MD attend_VB ,_, and_CC privacy_NN was_VBD respected_VBN ,_, or_CC Municipal_JJ hospitals_NNS ;_: and_CC ,_, consequently_RB ,_, comparing_VBG their_PRP$ general_JJ death-rate_NN ,_, I_PRP am_VBP inclined_JJ to_TO believe_VB plague_NN cases_NNS were_VBD successfully_RB concealed_VBN ._.
I_PRP append_VBP herewith_PDT the_DT necessary_JJ tables_NNS called_VBN forth_NN in_IN the_DT circular_NN ._.
As_IN to_TO remarks_NNS on_IN clinical_JJ experiences_NNS ,_, I_PRP have_VBP included_VBN them_PRP in_IN my_PRP$ report_NN on_IN the_DT working_NN of_IN the_DT Khatri_NNP Mahommedan_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, Bapu_NNP Khote_NNP Street_NNP ._.
M._NNP N._NNP DISANA_NNP ,_, Hony_NNP ._.
Medical_JJ Officer_NNP ,_, Kolsa_NNP Moholla_NNP Mahommedan_NNP Plague_NNP Hospital_NNP and_CC Khatri_NNP Mahommedan_NNP Hospital_NNP ._.
Notes_NNS by_IN the_DT Special_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP ._.
The_DT work_NN done_VBN by_IN this_DT hospital_NN was_VBD very_RB small_JJ and_CC unsatisfactory_JJ ,_, especially_RB as_IN the_DT hospital_NN is_VBZ situated_VBN in_IN a_DT very_RB crowded_JJ locality_NN ,_, and_CC ought_MD to_TO have_VB been_VBN used_VBN extensively_RB ._.

33_CD ._.
Petit_NNP Mills_NNP Hospital_NNP ._.
Report_NN on_IN the_DT Maneckji_NNP Petit_NNP Mills_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, Bombay_NNP ,_, from_IN March_NNP 1898_CD to_TO May_NNP 1899_CD ._.
1_CD ._.
Owing_VBG to_TO the_DT plague_NN and_CC house-to-house_JJ visitation_NN of_IN the_DT authorities_NNS ,_, the_DT mill_NN hands_VBZ became_VBD nervous_JJ ,_, and_CC resolved_VBD to_TO bolt_VB away_RP in_IN numbers_NNS to_TO their_PRP$ native_JJ place_NN ._.
In_IN time_NN a_DT good_JJ many_JJ left_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT mill_NN business_NN was_VBD hampered_VBN ._.
So_IN the_DT agents_NNS of_IN the_DT mills_NNS ,_, through_IN the_DT manager_NN ,_, consoled_VBD the_DT mill-hands_NNS ,_, and_CC promised_VBD to_TO erect_VB a_DT temporary_JJ plague_NN hospital_NN ,_, where_WRB they_PRP would_MD be_VB looked_VBN after_IN ,_, instead_RB of_IN being_VBG sent_VBN away_RB to_TO the_DT Municipal_NNP hospitals_NNS if_IN they_PRP be_VB attacked_VBN with_IN plague_NN ._.
They_PRP heartily_RB approved_VBD of_IN this_DT ,_, and_CC abandoned_VBD the_DT idea_NN of_IN ``_`` going_VBG away_RB ._. ''_''
The_DT hospital_NN was_VBD opened_VBN on_IN 1st_CD March_NNP 1898_CD ._.
I_PRP was_VBD appointed_VBN to_TO look_VB after_IN it_PRP with_IN one_CD Hospital_NNP Assistant_NNP ,_, Mr._NNP J_NNP ._.
A._NN DeSouza_NNP ,_, one_CD compounder_NN (_( Balvant_NNP Sakaram_NNP Barve_NNP )_) ,_, one_CD ward-boy_NN (_( Sakaram_NNP Bapoo_NNP )_) ,_, with_IN other_JJ servants_NNS ._.
All_PDT the_DT expenses_NNS of_IN the_DT Petit_NNP Mills_NNP Hospital_NNP were_VBD defrayed_VBN by_IN the_DT mills_NNS solely_RB ._.
I_PRP should_MD like_VB to_TO note_VB that_IN the_DT mill_NN has_VBZ got_VBD a_DT dispensary_NN of_IN its_PRP$ own_JJ for_IN the_DT workmen_NNS (_( which_WDT are_VBP nearly_RB five_CD thousand_NNS )_) for_IN the_DT last_JJ fifteen_JJ years_NNS ._.
2_CD ._.
The_DT hospital_NN was_VBD erected_VBN on_IN a_DT large_JJ plot_NN of_IN ground_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT compound_NN of_IN the_DT mills_NNS ._.
The_DT hospital_NN was_VBD a_DT temporary_JJ one_CD ,_, so_IN it_PRP was_VBD made_VBN of_IN matting_NN and_CC cadjan_NN leaves_NNS ._.
We_PRP have_VBP submitted_VBN a_DT plan_NN for_IN permanent_JJ hospital_NN to_TO the_DT Municipality_NNP on_IN good_JJ sanitary_JJ principles_NNS ,_, with_IN arrangements_NNS for_IN ventilation_NN at_IN bottom_JJ and_CC top_JJ (_( just_RB as_IN the_DT Maratha_NNP Hospital_NNP )_) ._.
The_DT temporary_JJ hospital_NN was_VBD made_VBN in_IN two_CD blocks_NNS of_IN three_CD rooms_NNS each_DT ,_, with_IN accommodation_NN for_IN six_CD patients_NNS ._.
The_DT mill_NN dispensary_NN was_VBD also_RB in_IN the_DT same_JJ compound_NN ,_, close_RB by_IN ._.
One_CD contact_NN camp_NN ,_, with_IN accommodation_NN for_IN about_IN forty_JJ people_NNS ,_, was_VBD erected_VBN along_IN with_IN the_DT hospital_NN ._.
Servants_NNS '_POS quarters_NNS were_VBD a_DT little_JJ away_RB from_IN it_PRP ._.
3_CD ._.
A_DT Bhungy_NNP was_VBD kept_VBN night_NN and_CC day_NN to_TO take_VB away_RP the_DT ejecta_NN ,_, and_CC keep_VB the_DT place_NN clean_NN ._.
Earthen_NNP chatties_NNS were_VBD freely_RB supplied_VBN for_IN the_DT same_JJ ._.
Two_CD water-closets_NNS were_VBD erected_VBN ._.
?_. 355_CD All_PDT the_DT clothing_NN ,_, bedding_NN ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, of_IN the_DT plague_NN cases_NNS were_VBD burnt_VBN up_RP ,_, if_IN the_DT case_NN terminated_VBN in_IN death_NN ._.
Clothing_NNP ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, of_IN the_DT recovering_NN cases_NNS were_VBD disinfected_VBN by_IN dipping_VBG them_PRP in_IN perchloride_NN of_IN mercury_NN lotion_NN ._.
4_CD ._.
Water-supply_NNP was_VBD from_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP taps_NNS ,_, separate_JJ for_IN the_DT purpose_NN ._.
5_CD ._.
Disinfection_NN of_IN wards_NNS and_CC surroundings_NNS was_VBD done_VBN by_IN digging_VBG up_RP the_DT ground_NN and_CC freely_RB sprinkling_VBG chloride_NN of_IN lime_NN and_CC perchloride_NN of_IN mercury_NN lotion_NN ._.
6_CD ._.
According_VBG to_TO the_DT mill_NN agent_NN 's_POS instructions_NNS through_IN the_DT manager_NN ,_, the_DT feelings_NNS and_CC the_DT caste_NN prejudices_NNS of_IN the_DT mill-hands_NNS were_VBD much_JJ to_TO be_VB respected_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT dead_JJ were_VBD immediately_RB carried_VBN away_RB by_IN their_PRP$ relatives_NNS according_VBG to_TO their_PRP$ religious_JJ customs_NNS ._.
7_CD ._.
No_DT plague_NN case_NN admitted_VBN in_IN our_PRP$ mill_NN hospital_NN was_VBD inoculated_VBN by_IN Mr._NNP Haffkine_NNP 's_POS serum_NN ,_, except_IN our_PRP$ ward-boy_NN who_WP was_VBD inoculated_VBN by_IN me_PRP in_IN March_NNP 1898_CD ,_, but_CC he_PRP developed_VBD plague_NN this_DT year_NN in_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN March_NNP ._.
His_PRP$ name_NN was_VBD Sakaram_NNP alias_JJ Sitaram_NNP Bapoo_NNP ,_, a_DT Maratha_NNP by_IN caste_NN ,_, aged_VBN about_IN 20_CD ._.
8_CD ._.
Amongst_IN the_DT staff_NN ,_, only_RB this_DT ward-boy_JJ developed_JJ plague_NN ,_, with_IN bubo_NN in_IN the_DT left_NN groin_NN ._.
A_DT month_NN before_IN his_PRP$ sickness_NN ,_, he_PRP left_VBD the_DT mill_NN premises_NNS and_CC was_VBD staying_VBG close_RB by_IN the_DT mill_NN in_IN Mr._NNP Noor_NNP Mahomed_NNP 's_POS Chawl_NNP ,_, Forjett_NNP Street_NNP ,_, which_WDT was_VBD highly_RB infected_VBN at_IN that_DT time_NN ._.
He_PRP was_VBD attending_VBG to_TO our_PRP$ hospital_NN cases_NNS up_RB to_TO the_DT last_JJ day_NN of_IN his_PRP$ sickness_NN ._.
So_IN I_PRP can_MD not_RB say_VB ,_, exactly_RB ,_, where_WRB he_PRP got_VBD the_DT infection_NN from_IN ._.
He_PRP was_VBD admitted_VBN ,_, and_CC died_VBD two_CD days_NNS after_IN admission_NN ,_, on_IN 11th_CD March_NNP 1899_CD ._.

TABLE_NNP VIII.-Secondary_JJ Pneumonia_NNP (_( with_IN Buboes_NNP )_) ._.
Died_NNP ._.

Males_NNS 4_CD 100_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
Females_NNS Children_NNP (_( a_DT )_) The_DT physical_JJ signs_NNS of_IN pneumonia_NN were_VBD marked_VBN ._.
No_DT bacteriological_JJ examin-_JJ ation_NN was_VBD made_VBN ._.
(_( b_NN )_) Pneumonia_NNP supervened_VBN in_IN two_CD to_TO four_CD days_NNS ._.
Buboes_NNS ._.
They_PRP are_VBP chiefly_VBN in_IN the_DT groins_NNS ,_, in_IN the_DT axillas_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT cervical_JJ region_NN ._.
They_PRP appear_VBP very_RB irregularly_RB ._.
Sometimes_RB they_PRP appear_VBP with_IN the_DT rise_NN of_IN temperature_NN and_CC at_IN times_NNS a_DT day_NN or_CC two_CD after_IN it_PRP ._.
They_PRP are_VBP always_RB small_JJ in_IN size_NN ,_, but_CC very_RB tender_NN and_CC painful_NN ._.
Buboes_NNP which_WDT suppurate_VBP prolong_IN the_DT life_NN of_IN patients_NNS ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ a_DT very_RB hopeful_JJ sign_NN ._.
Complications_NNS ._.
Cerebral_NNP symptoms_NNS are_VBP very_RB prominent_JJ in_IN the_DT acute_JJ stage_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.
ARDESHIR_NNP HORMUSJI_NNP GHASWALA_NNP ,_, L.M._NNP &_CC S._NNP ,_, In_IN Charge_NNP ,_, The_DT Petit_NNP Mills_NNP Hospital_NNP ._.
Remarks_NNS by_IN the_DT Special_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP ._.
A_DT very_RB useful_JJ little_JJ hospital_NN ,_, situated_VBN in_IN open_JJ ground_NN and_CC near_IN the_DT mills_NNS ,_, and_CC when_WRB completed_VBN on_IN the_DT principle_NN adopted_VBN by_IN the_DT Marathi_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, will_MD do_VB good_JJ work_NN and_CC serve_VB a_DT useful_JJ purpose_NN ._.
Contact_NNP sheds_NNS should_MD also_RB be_VB erected_VBN ._.
?_. 357_CD APPENDIX_NNP A_NNP ._.
The_DT official_JJ year_NN for_IN the_DT compiling_NN for_IN the_DT Annual_NNP Plague_NNP Returns_NNP for_IN the_DT previ-_JJ ous_JJ 12_CD months_NNS ends_VBZ on_IN the_DT 31st_CD May_NNP 1899_CD ._.
All_DT returns_NNS for_IN the_DT 12_CD months_NNS will_MD therefore_RB be_VB made_VBN up_RP to_TO the_DT above_JJ date_NN ._.
To_TO facilitate_VB the_DT compiling_NN of_IN the_DT returns_NNS I_PRP have_VBP thought_VBN it_PRP advisable_JJ to_TO have_VB a_DT uniform_JJ method_NN of_IN Tables_NNP and_CC Headings_NNP ,_, and_CC I_PRP hope_VBP that_IN all_DT Medical_NNP Officers_NNP will_MD adhere_VB as_RB much_JJ as_IN possible_JJ to_TO these_DT so_RB as_IN to_TO avoid_VB confusion_NN ._.
In_IN making_VBG observation_NN regarding_VBG the_DT symptoms_NNS and_CC other_JJ developments_NNS of_IN the_DT disease_NN I_PRP want_VBP Medical_JJ Officers_NNS to_TO state_NN facts_NNS and_CC to_TO give_VB reasons_NNS for_IN statements_NNS made_VBN ._.
This_DT is_VBZ more_JJR particalarly_RB required_VBN in_IN Pneumonic_NNP Plague_NNP where_WRB the_DT physical_JJ signs_NNS of_IN the_DT disease_NN should_MD be_VB given_VBN as_RB well_RB as_IN Bacteriological_NNP examination_NN where_WRB made_VBN ,_, and_CC combined_VBN with_IN charts_NNS ,_, &_CC c._NN With_IN regard_NN to_TO Pneumonic_NNP Plague_NNP ,_, I_PRP am_VBP aware_JJ that_IN only_RB a_DT very_RB few_JJ examina-_JJ tions_NNS have_VBP been_VBN made_VBN bacteriogically_RB and_CC I_PRP think_VBP that_IN it_PRP would_MD be_VB better_JJR to_TO include_VB as_IN Pneumonic_NNP Plague_NNP all_DT cases_NNS of_IN Lung_NNP Disease_NNP uncomplicated_VBD with_IN Buboes_NNP ,_, which_WDT have_VBP died_VBN within_IN say_VBP 3_CD days_NNS of_IN the_DT development_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.

?_. 361_CD Statement_NN of_IN plague_NN cases_NNS in_IN the_DT Maratha_NNP Hospital_NNP Staff_NNP ._.
(_( 1_CD ._. )_)
Raghu_NNP Sakharam_NNP (_( Corpse_NNP bearer_NN )_) became_VBD sick_JJ on_IN the_DT 3rd_CD of_IN September_NNP but_CC did_VBD not_RB report_VB until_IN two_CD days_NNS later_RB ,_, when_WRB he_PRP was_VBD found_VBN with_IN high_JJ temperature_NN and_CC dyspnaea_NN ._.
He_PRP was_VBD admitted_VBN into_IN the_DT hospital_NN and_CC on_IN examination_NN he_PRP was_VBD found_VBN to_TO suffer_VB with_IN pneumonia_NN ;_: there_EX was_VBD restlessness_NN ,_, haemoptysis_NN and_CC high_JJ temperature_NN ._.
He_PRP died_VBD 83_CD hours_NNS after_IN admission_NN ._.
(_( 2_CD ._. )_)
Govind_NNP Laxuman_NNP (_( ward_IN boy_NN )_) became_VBD sick_JJ on_IN 23rd_CD of_IN September_NNP ,_, had_VBD plague_VBN pneumonia_NN and_CC died_VBD on_IN 24th-23_JJ hours_NNS after_IN admission_NN ._.
This_DT case_NN had_VBD no_DT connection_NN with_IN the_DT above_JJ case_NN ._.
He_PRP was_VBD attending_VBG on_IN a_DT pneumonia_NN case_NN in_IN the_DT ward_NN ._.
(_( 3_CD ._. )_)
Gopal_NNP Powar_NNP (_( Hospital_NNP Assistant_NNP )_) was_VBD on_IN night_NN duty_NN on_IN the_DT 2_CD 2nd_CD of_IN Sep-_JJ tember_NN ._.
He_PRP had_VBD to_TO watch_VB a_DT bad_JJ case_NN of_IN plague_NN pneumonia_NN and_CC had_VBD spent_VBN the_DT whole_JJ night_NN by_IN the_DT side_NN of_IN the_DT patient_NN giving_VBG nutrient_JJ enemas_NN ,_, hypodermic_JJ injections_NNS ,_, &_CC c._NN On_IN 24th_CD September_NNP he_PRP was_VBD on_IN day_NN duty_NN and_CC after_IN working_VBG in_IN the_DT wards_NNS till_VBP 12_CD A.M._NNP ,_, he_PRP went_VBD home_NN to_TO his_PRP$ meals_NNS ,_, but_CC finding_VBG himself_PRP feverish_JJ ,_, sent_VBD word_NN that_IN he_PRP was_VBD un-_JJ able_JJ to_TO attend_VB duty_NN that_IN afternoon_NN ._.
He_PRP was_VBD seen_VBN at_IN his_PRP$ house_NN by_IN Mr._NNP K._NNP M._NNP Chonker_NNP the_DT same_JJ evening_NN ,_, and_CC was_VBD advised_VBN to_TO go_VB to_TO the_DT hospital_NN for_IN treatment_NN ._.
He_PRP was_VBD admit-_RB ted_JJ next_JJ morning_NN ,_, when_WRB pneumonia_NN set_VBN in_IN ._.
He_PRP vomited_VBD blood_NN three_CD or_CC four_CD times_NNS ,_, was_VBD conscious_JJ up_RB to_TO last_JJ ._.
Died_VBN on_IN 26th_CD of_IN September-14_NNP hours_NNS after_IN admission_NN ._.
He_PRP was_VBD attended_VBN by_IN his_PRP$ wife_NN who_WP fell_VBD ill_RB on_IN 29th_CD of_IN September_NNP ,_, and_CC died_VBD of_IN plague_NN on_IN 1st_CD October_NNP ._.
(_( 4_CD ._. )_)
K._NNP M._NNP Chonker_NNP ,_, Resident_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, got_VBD a_DT cut_NN on_IN the_DT left_JJ index_NN finger_NN while_IN opening_VBG a_DT bubo_NN of_IN a_DT plague_JJ patient_NN ._.
He_PRP cauterized_VBD the_DT cut_NN and_CC did_VBD not_RB feel_VB in_IN any_DT way_NN uncomfortable_JJ up_RB to_TO the_DT night_NN of_IN the_DT 29th_CD of_IN September_NNP ,_, when_WRB he_PRP had_VBD a_DT strong_JJ chill_NN and_CC rise_NN of_IN temperature_NN ._.
I_PRP saw_VBD him_PRP next_JJ morning_NN and_CC found_VBD him_PRP suffer-_JJ ing_NN from_IN pneumonia_NN ._.
He_PRP then_RB went_VBD to_TO his_PRP$ house_NN in_IN Moogbhat_NNP ,_, where_WRB I_PRP again_RB saw_VBD him_PRP at_IN 1_CD P.M._NNP and_CC found_VBD the_DT temperature_NN rising_VBG and_CC sputa_NNS tinged_VBN with_IN blood_NN ,_, but_CC there_RB was_VBD neither_CC glandular_JJ development_NN anywhere_RB or_CC haemoptysis_NN ._.
During_IN the_DT next_JJ two_CD days_NNS that_IN he_PRP lived_VBD ,_, there_EX was_VBD no_DT change_NN in_IN the_DT symptoms_NNS ,_, but_CC pericardites_VBZ set_VBN in_IN and_CC dyspnaea_VB became_VBD intense_JJ ._.
He_PRP was_VBD seen_VBN by_IN Dr._NNP Gallioti_NNP on_IN 30th_CD September_NNP ._.
He_PRP died_VBD on_IN 2nd_CD October_NNP ._.
He_PRP was_VBD a_DT well_RB nourished_VBN ,_, rather_RB corpulent_JJ man_NN with_IN regular_JJ habits_NNS ._.
He_PRP was_VBD attended_VBN by_IN three_CD persons_NNS from_IN the_DT hospital_JJ staff_NN ._.
(_( 5_CD )_) ._.
Ramcrishna_NNP Govind_NNP (_( Hospital_NNP Assistant_NNP )_) ,_, who_WP now_RB and_CC then_RB attended_VBD on_IN Mr._NNP Chonker_NNP felt_VBD feverish_JJ on_IN the_DT 4th_CD instant_NN ._.
Dr._NNP Galleoti_NNP was_VBD kind_NN enough_JJ to_TO see_VB him_PRP on_IN the_DT 5th_CD and_CC advised_VBD him_PRP to_TO undergo_VB curative_JJ inoculation_NN treatment_NN ,_, but_CC he_PRP prefer-_RB red_VBD the_DT treatment_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN Vaidya_NNP ._.
His_PRP$ case_NN was_VBD similar_JJ to_TO that_DT of_IN Mr._NNP Chonker_NNP ._.
He_PRP died_VBD on_IN 8th_CD October_NNP ._.
He_PRP was_VBD a_DT young_JJ man_NN of_IN good_JJ constitution_NN and_CC regular_JJ habits_NNS ._.
(_( 6_CD ._. )_)

REMARKS.-From_JJ the_DT above_JJ history_NN it_PRP would_MD be_VB seen_VBN that_IN there_EX was_VBD nothing_NN un-_JJ usual_JJ with_IN the_DT sanitary_JJ condition_NN of_IN the_DT wards_NNS of_IN the_DT hospital_NN ._.

No_DT one_NN of_IN the_DT staff_NN was_VBD inoculated_VBN with_IN prophylactic_JJ serums_NNS ,_, and_CC they_PRP were_VBD more_RBR or_CC less_JJR careless_NN of_IN the_DT results_NNS of_IN contact_NN with_IN plague_NN patients_NNS ._.
Two_CD rats_NNS were_VBD found_VBN dead_JJ in_IN the_DT dispensary_JJ room_NN below_IN a_DT cupboard_NN ._.
One_CD can-_NN not_RB say_VB how_WRB long_JJ the_DT rats_NNS lay_VBD decomposing_VBG there_RB ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ believed_VBN that_IN the_DT late_JJ House-_NNP Surgeon_NNP finding_VBG the_DT place_NN infected_VBN with_IN rats_NNS had_VBD placed_VBN some_DT rough-on-rats_NNS here_RB and_CC there_RB and_CC that_IN the_DT rat_NN might_MD have_VB died_VBN of_IN the_DT poison_NN ._.
But_CC one_CD thing_NN is_VBZ certain_JJ that_IN the_DT Compounder_NNP ,_, the_DT Dispensary-boy_NNP and_CC Hospital_NNP Assistant_NNP ,_, used_VBD to_TO sit_VB for_IN hours_NNS together_RB in_IN the_DT dispensary_JJ room_NN ,_, inhaling_VBG the_DT foul_NN air_NN and_CC not_RB minding_VBG the_DT stink_NN from_IN the_DT dead_JJ rat_NN ._.
I_PRP noticed_VBD the_DT stink_NN on_IN the_DT 5th_JJ instant_NN and_CC removed_VBD the_DT dispensary_NN and_CC the_DT office_NN to_TO other_JJ sheds_NNS close_RB by_IN and_CC disinfected_VBN and_CC vacated_VBN the_DT quarters_NNS ._.
L._NNP B._NNP DHARGALKER_NNP ._.
PLAGUE_NNP RESEARCH_NNP LABORATORY_NNP ,_, MAZAGON_NNP ._.
BOMBAY_NNP ,_, 12th_CD October_NNP 1898_CD ._.
To_TO J._NNP H._NNP DuBOULAY_NNP ,_, EsQ._NNP ,_, I.C.S_NNP ._.
SIR_NNP ,_, -With_NNP reference_NN to_TO attached_JJ papers_NNS ,_, 1_CD have_VBP the_DT honour_NN to_TO state_NN that_IN I_PRP am_VBP of_IN opinion_NN that_IN the_DT recently_RB occurring_VBG cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN among_IN the_DT staff_NN of_IN the_DT Mara-_NNP tha_NN Hospital_NNP were_VBD due_JJ to_TO infection_VB one_CD from_IN the_DT other_JJ ._.
I_PRP am_VBP inclined_JJ to_TO lay_VB special_JJ stress_NN on_IN the_DT history_NN in_IN each_DT case_NN ,_, except_IN the_DT first_JJ of_IN exposure_NN to_TO infection_NN in_IN a_DT dwelling_VBG other_JJ than_IN the_DT hospital_NN ._.
The_DT first_JJ case_NN (_( Gopal_NNP Powar_NNP )_) may_MD very_RB possibly_RB have_VB contracted_VBN the_DT disease_NN in_IN the_DT performance_NN of_IN his_PRP$ duties_NNS ._.

4_CD had_VBD died_VBN in_IN the_DT meantime_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN case_NN No_NNP ._.
5_CD was_VBD moribund_NN ._.
Another_DT of_IN the_DT staff_NN has_VBZ been_VBN attacked_VBN (_( on_IN the_DT 10th_CD )_) ._.
In_IN this_DT case_NN also_RB there_EX is_VBZ a_DT history_NN of_IN infection_NN at_IN home_NN ,_, the_DT man_NN 's_POS brother_NN having_VBG died_VBN recently_RB of_IN plague_NN pneumonia_NN ._.
This_DT man_NN also_RB visited_VBD No_DT ._.
2_CD before_IN the_DT latter_NN 's_POS death_NN on_IN the_DT 2nd_CD instant_NN ._.
With_IN reference_NN to_TO the_DT hospital_NN arrangements_NNS ,_, I_PRP consider_VBP that_IN the_DT wards_NNS are_VBP rather_RB crowded_VBN ,_, especially_RB in_IN view_NN of_IN the_DT fact_NN that_IN there_EX are_VBP a_DT larger_JJR proportion_NN of_IN plague_NN pneumonia_NN cases_NNS occurring_VBG among_IN this_DT community_NN than_IN usual_JJ ._.
If_IN it_PRP were_VBD possible_JJ ,_, I_PRP think_VBP it_PRP would_MD be_VB desirable_JJ to_TO have_VB this_DT class_NN of_IN cases_NNS treated_VBN in_IN a_DT separate_JJ ward_NN ,_, with_IN extra_JJ space_NN per_IN bed_NN ,_, and_CC by_IN special_JJ assistants_NNS who_WP should_MD be_VB warned_VBN as_IN to_TO the_DT ?_. 363_CD extreme_JJ infectiousness_NN of_IN this_DT form_NN of_IN plague_NN ._.
The_DT face_NN should_MD be_VB kept_VBN averted_VBN as_RB much_JJ as_IN possible_JJ when_WRB examining_VBG and_CC attending_VBG to_TO the_DT patients_NNS ._.
The_DT sputum_NN of_IN such_JJ patients_NNS is_VBZ virulently_RB infective_JJ ,_, and_CC should_MD be_VB at_IN once_RB disinfected_VBN (_( burnt_JJ if_IN pos-_JJ sible_NN )_) ._.

I_PRP examined_VBD the_DT hospital_NN records_NNS of_IN these_DT patients_NNS under_IN English_NNP treatment_NN for_IN the_DT last_JJ fortnight_NN ,_, and_CC they_PRP showed-_VBP Plague_NNP Deaths_NNP ,_, Bubonic_NNP ..._: ..._: ..._: 69_CD Do_NNP ._.
Pneumonia_NN ..._: ..._: ..._: 17_CD The_DT recoveries_NNS in_IN each_DT clasa_NN are_VBP 12_CD and_CC 6_CD ,_, respectively_RB ._.
This_DT last_JJ figure_NN is_VBZ too_RB high_JJ ,_, and_CC probably_RB includes_VBZ some_DT recoveries_NNS from_IN simple_JJ pneumonia_NN ._.
One_CD small_JJ dead_JJ rat_NN was_VBD found_VBN in_IN the_DT dispensary_NN ,_, subsequently_RB to_TO my_PRP$ first_JJ visit_NN ._.

I_PRP have_VBP ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, F._NNP MAITLAND_NNP GIBSON_NNP ._.
APPENDIX_NNP C._NNP Report_NNP on_IN the_DT Steam_NNP Bath_NNP Treatment_NNP of_IN Plague_NNP cases_NNS at_IN the_DT Mahratta_NNP Hospital_NNP by_IN Lieut_NNP ._.
H._NNP J._NNP R._NNP Twigg_NNP ,_, I.M.S_NNP ._.
In_IN this_DT report_NN ,_, brevity_NN has_VBZ been_VBN aimed_VBN at_IN throughout_IN ,_, and_CC to_TO attain_VB that_IN end_JJ para-_JJ graphs_NN existing_VBG in_IN rough_JJ copies_NNS have_VBP been_VBN freely_RB omitted_VBN ._.
The_DT text_NN must_MD not_RB be_VB regarded_VBN as_IN the_DT most_RBS important_JJ part_NN :_: the_DT charts_NNS on_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN have_VBP been_VBN somewhat_RB elaborated_JJ ,_, and_CC a_DT careful_JJ study_NN thereof_NN with_IN occa-_JJ sional_JJ references_NNS to_TO the_DT text_NN should_MD suffice_VB for_IN a_DT .clear_JJ idea_NN of_IN the_DT results_NNS obtained_VBD ._.
In_IN addition_NN ,_, the_DT charts_NNS give_VB further_JJ information_NN not_RB directly_RB bearing_VBG upon_IN the_DT Steam_NNP Treat-_NNP ment_NN but_CC interesting_JJ as_IN regards_NNS the_DT incidence_NN of_IN plague_NN during_IN the_DT last_JJ outbreak_NN in_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
It_PRP was_VBD not_RB possible_JJ upon_IN administrative_JJ grounds_NNS to_TO take_VB alternative_JJ cases_NNS for_IN the_DT Bath_NNP treatment_NN :_: had_VBD such_PDT a_DT plan_NN been_VBN carried_VBN out_RP ,_, the_DT process_NN of_IN comparing_VBG results_NNS would_MD have_VB consisted_VBN of_IN mere_JJ simple_JJ arithmetic_NN ._.
Certain_NN cases_NNS were_VBD allotted_VBN for_IN Steam_NNP Treatment_NNP in_IN addition_NN to_TO the_DT treatment_NN in_IN use_NN in_IN the_DT ward_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT particular_JJ case_NN was_VBD ,_, but_CC although_IN the_DT permission_NN to_TO give_VB cases_NNS Steam_NNP Baths_NNP was_VBD freely_RB and_CC generously_RB granted_VBN by_IN the_DT Medical_JJ staff_NN at_IN the_DT Mahratta_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, nevertheless_RB much_JJ care_NN had_VBD to_TO be_VB exercised_VBN to_TO maintain_VB a_DT fair_JJ selection_NN of_IN cases_NNS ._.
I_PRP think_VBP it_PRP can_MD be_VB truthfully_RB said_VBD that_IN the_DT cases_NNS were_VBD allotted_VBN in_IN as_IN fair_NN a_DT manner_NN as_IN could_MD possibly_RB be_VB followed_VBN ._.
Allowances_NNS have_VBP been_VBN made_VBN in_IN this_DT Report_NNP for_IN all_DT departures_NNS from_IN an_DT exactly_RB equal_JJ distribution_NN ._.
The_DT only_JJ condition_NN which_WDT at_IN times_NNS deterred_VBD me_PRP from_IN giving_VBG a_DT case_NN a_DT bath_NN was_VBD feebleness_NN of_IN pulse_NN ,_, but_CC pulmonary_JJ com-_JJ plications_NNS I_PRP considered_VBD no_DT contra-indication_NN at_IN all_DT ._.
Late_RB in_IN March_NNP ,_, I_PRP rejected_VBD many_JJ cases_NNS with_IN feeble_JJ pulses_NNS ,_, nevertheless_RB the_DT mortality_NN continued_VBD very_RB high_JJ ,_, The_DT charts_NNS have_VBP been_VBN divided_VBN up_RP into_IN three_CD groups_NNS A_NNP ,_, B_NNP ,_, and_CC C_NNP ,_, of_IN very_RB unequal_JJ size_NN and_CC importance_NN ._.
Group_NNP A_NNP ,_, expresses_VBZ actual_JJ results_NNS ._.
Group_NNP B_NNP likewise_RB ex-_JJ presses_NNS results_NNS ,_, but_CC the_DT interpretation_NN of_IN these_DT results_NNS is_VBZ a_DT fit_JJ matter_NN for_IN discussion_NN ._.
Group_NNP C_NNP is_VBZ a_DT small_JJ and_CC miscellaneous_JJ group_NN introducing_VBG factors_NNS which_WDT modify_VBP the_DT results_NNS of_IN group_NN A_NNP ._.
The_DT remaining_VBG part_NN of_IN the_DT report_NN contains_VBZ a_DT brief_JJ summary_NN of_IN parts_NNS A_NNP ,_, B_NNP and_CC C._NNP [_NNP N_NNP ._.
B._NNP --_: Owing_VBG to_TO the_DT large_JJ number_NN of_IN charts_NNS in_IN the_DT General_NNP Report_NNP ,_, the_DT Chart_NNP of_IN Parts_NNP II_NNP and_CC I_PRP ]_VBP 1_CD in_IN this_DT Report_NNP on_IN steam_NN treatment_NN have_VBP not_RB been_VBN published_VBN ._. ]_NN
?_. 364_CD :_: Group_NNP A_NNP is_VBZ divisible_JJ into_IN four_CD parts_NNS (_( 1_CD )_) a_DT Chart_NNP A-1_NNP of_IN daily_JJ admissions_NNS in_IN four_CD colours_NNS ,_, each_DT of_IN which_WDT denotes_VBZ a_DT method_NN of_IN treatment_NN save_VBP that_DT black_JJ is_VBZ a_DT summary_NN of_IN the_DT three_CD colours_NNS red_JJ ,_, green_JJ and_CC blue_NN ,_, which_WDT represent_VBP respectively_RB ,_, Bath_NNP ,_, .Native_NNP and_CC ``_`` Other_JJ Treatments_NNPS ._. ''_''
Two_CD facts_NNS must_MD be_VB kept_VBN here_RB well_RB in_IN mind_NN ._.
The_DT Bath_NNP Treatment_NNP was_VBD never_RB given_VBN alone_RB ,_, but_CC always_RB in_IN conjunction_NN with_IN another_DT treatment_NN ._.
The_DT other_JJ fact_NN to_TO be_VB remembered_VBN is_VBZ that_IN ``_`` Other_JJ treatment_NN ''_'' means_VBZ practically_RB European_JJ treatment_NN ._.
It_PRP includes_VBZ ,_, therefore_RB ,_, such_JJ methods_NNS as_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN hypodermic_JJ injections_NNS ,_, stimulants_NNS ,_, mercurials_NNS ,_, antiseptics_NNS ,_, alteratives_NNS ,_, diaphoretics_NNS ,_, and_CC expectorants_NNS ._.
A_DT few_JJ cases_NNS were_VBD treated_VBN by_IN Lustig_NNP 's_POS serum_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT numbers_NNS were_VBD small_JJ ,_, the_DT numerical_JJ results_NNS were_VBD un-_JJ affected_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT cases_NNS occurred_VBD early_RB in_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN Lustig_NNP 's_POS serum_NN method_NN ,_, when_WRB it_PRP was_VBD hardly_RB out_IN of_IN the_DT experimental_JJ stage_NN ._.
All_PDT these_DT methods_NNS have_VBP been_VBN grouped_VBN into_IN one_CD and_CC called_VBD ``_`` other_JJ methods_NNS ._. ''_''
To_TO sub-divide_VB up_RP the_DT group_NN gives_VBZ rise_VBP to_TO many_JJ groups_NNS each_DT so_RB small_JJ that_IN the_DT results_NNS of_IN such_JJ are_VBP untrustworthy_JJ ._.
Returning_VBG to_TO Chart_NNP A-1_NNP the_DT following_JJ points_NNS may_MD be_VB noted_VBN :_: -_: (_( a_DT )_) The_DT gradual_JJ increase_NN in_IN numbers_NNS from_IN January_NNP to_TO March_NNP ._.
(_( b_NN )_) The_DT paucity_NN of_IN cases_NNS in_IN January_NNP ._.

II_NNP ._.
The_DT next_JJ part_NN of_IN Group_NNP A._NNP is_VBZ No_DT ._.
2_CD ._.
The_DT Charts_NNP A-2_NNP ,_, A-3_NNP ,_, A-4_NNP ,_, differ_NN from_IN A-1_NNP in_IN being_VBG of_IN a_DT twofold_JJ character_NN ._.
Firstly_RB ,_, each_DT is_VBZ merely_RB an_DT extract_NN from_IN a_DT part_NN of_IN Chart_NNP A-l_NNP ,_, thus_RB ,_, in_IN A-2_NNP the_DT Bath_NNP daily_JJ admission_NN for_IN clearness_NN are_VBP presented_VBN alone_RB ,_, in_IN A-_NNP 3_CD the_DT Native_JJ daily_JJ admission_NN are_VBP likewise_RB shewn_JJ ,_, and_CC in_IN A-4_NNP the_DT ``_`` Other_JJ method_NN ``_`` admissions_NNS are_VBP similarly_RB given_VBN ._.
Secondly_RB ,_, each_DT chart_NN has_VBZ a_DT lower_JJR line_NN in_IN an_DT appropriate_JJ colour_NN ._.
This_DT lower_JJR line_NN represents_VBZ actual_JJ recoveries_NNS ._.
Thus_RB ,_, to_TO take_VB any_DT one_CD date_NN :_: let_VB us_PRP say_VB ,_, 10_CD cases_NNS come_VBP in_IN on_IN that_DT day_NN :_: then_RB if_IN the_DT recoveries_NNS for_IN that_DT day_NN appear_VB as_IN 4_CD ,_, what_WP is_VBZ meant_VBN is_VBZ that_IN of_IN the_DT 10_CD cases_NNS 4_CD recovered_JJ ,_, but_CC that_IN out_IN of_IN the_DT 10_CD ,_, 6_CD cases_NNS at_IN some_DT time_NN or_CC other_JJ ,_, but_CC not_RB necessarily_RB on_IN that_DT particular_JJ day_NN ,_, died_VBD ._.
Hence_RB the_DT daily_JJ percentage_NN of_IN recoveries_NNS can_MD be_VB easily_RB deduced_VBN ._.

(_( b_NN )_) In_IN A-3_NNP the_DT increase_NN in_IN numbers_NNS with_IN greater_JJR uniformity_NN ._.
(_( c_NN )_) In_IN A-4_NNP the_DT marked_JJ increase_NN in_IN numbers_NNS ._.

II_NNP ._.

It_PRP is_VBZ apparently_RB a_DT very_RB complicated_JJ chart_NN ,_, but_CC really_RB it_PRP is_VBZ very_RB simple_JJ ._.
The_DT colours_NNS used_VBN are_VBP for_IN the_DT same_JJ purposes_NNS as_IN previously_RB stated_VBN ._.
The_DT chief_JJ points_NNS to_TO be_VB noted_VBN are_VBP :_: -_: (_( a_DT )_) That_WDT early_RB in_IN January_NNP ,_, when_WRB the_DT numbers_NNS were_VBD small_JJ ,_, the_DT results_NNS tended_VBD to_TO extremes_NNS ._.
(_( b_NN )_) That_IN the_DT daily_JJ variations_NNS are_VBP excessive_JJ ;_: for_IN example_NN ,_, a_DT mortality_NN on_IN one_CD day_NN of_IN 100_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
:_: on_IN the_DT next_JJ of_IN 0_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
and_CC on_IN the_DT third_JJ of_IN 100_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
again_RB ._.
The_DT small_JJ value_NN of_IN such_JJ results_NNS is_VBZ obvious_JJ ._.
?_. 365_CD (_( c_NN )_) A_DT similar_JJ state_NN of_IN affairs_NNS on_IN a_DT smaller_JJR scale_NN obtains_NNS as_IN regards_NNS the_DT bath_NN during_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN February_NNP ._.
(_( d_NN )_) The_DT greater_JJR uniformity_NN and_CC avoidance_NN of_IN extremes_NNS obtaining_VBG during_IN March_NNP when_WRB the_DT numbers_NNS were_VBD high_JJ ._.
Hence_NNP these_DT daily_JJ charts_NNS have_VBP been_VBN supplemented_VBN by_IN others_NNS which_WDT summarize_VBP the_DT former_JJ into_IN weekly_JJ groups_NNS corresponding_VBG in_IN time_NN with_IN the_DT weekly_JJ returns_NNS fur-_RB nished_VBN to_TO the_DT Municipality_NNP by_IN the_DT various_JJ Bombay_NNP Plague_NNP Hospitals_NNP ._.
By_IN this_DT method_NN a_DT sufficiently_RB large_JJ number_NN of_IN cases_NNS is_VBZ guaranteed_VBN ._.

(_( Cases_VBZ No_DT ._.
385_CD and_CC 673_CD do_VBP not_RB appear_VB to_TO agree_VB with_IN these_DT statements_NNS ._. )_)
These_DT statements_NNS after_IN all_DT merely_RB amount_NN to_TO saying_VBG that_IN of_IN all_DT complications_NNS cardiac_VBP complications_NNS are_VBP the_DT most_RBS serious_JJ ;_: that_IN if_IN the_DT circulation_NN and_CC respiration_NN go_VBP on_IN in_IN harmony_NN ,_, the_DT case_NN is_VBZ favourable_JJ ,_, two_CD very_RB important_JJ functions_NNS not_RB being_VBG much_JJ disturbed_NN ._.
I_PRP think_VBP slight_JJ pulmonary_JJ troubles_NNS do_VBP not_RB contra-indicate_VB the_DT Bath_NNP ._.
When_WRB a_DT patient_NN has_VBZ a_DT bath_NN ,_, the_DT pulse_NN and_CC respiration_NN shew_VBP the_DT following-_JJ changes_NNS ._.
The_DT combined_VBN changes_NNS are_VBP of_IN more_JJR importance_NN than_IN the_DT changes_NNS occurring_VBG in_IN either_DT of_IN them_PRP alone_RB ;_: for_IN that_DT reason_NN the_DT following_JJ description_NN refers_NNS to_TO the_DT two_CD functions_NNS together_RB ._.
Unless_IN very_RB rapid_JJ at_IN the_DT beginning_NN ,_, the_DT pulse_NN rate_NN is_VBZ increased_VBN and_CC the_DT tension_NN slightly_RB 'raised_VBN ;_: about_IN two_CD minutes_NNS later_RB the_DT rate_NN is_VBZ still_RB further_RB increased_VBN as_IN also_RB is_VBZ the_DT tension_NN ;_: then_RB rather_RB suddenly_RB the_DT latter_JJ markedly_RB drops_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT volume_NN and_CC rate_NN increase_NN ._.
These-_JJ changes_NNS are_VBP preceded_VBN by_IN alterations_NNS in_IN the_DT respiration_NN ,_, consisting_VBG of_IN a_DT gradual_JJ increase_NN in_IN rate_NN but_CC not_RB in_IN depth_NN ,_, to_TO be_VB broken_VBN by_IN a_DT sudden_JJ and_CC marked_JJ increase_NN in_IN depth_NN in_IN the_DT breathing_NN ._.
This_DT increase_NN in_IN depth_NN of_IN respiration_NN usually_RB occurs_VBZ first_RB after_IN the_DT sudden_JJ diminution_NN in_IN pulse_JJ volume_NN referred_VBD to_TO ._.
Another_DT thing_NN to_TO be_VB noted_VBN is_VBZ that_DT early_JJ in_IN the_DT respiratory_NN changes_NNS ,_, coughing_VBG frequently_RB occurs_VBZ as_IN if_IN an_DT effort_NN is_VBZ made_VBN to_TO expel_VB any_DT mucus_NN which_WDT may_MD by_IN chance_NN exist_NN in_IN the_DT air_NN passages_NNS ._.
Quickly_RB following_VBG on_IN the_DT respiratory_NN and_CC circulatory_NN changes_NNS ,_, we_PRP have_VBP sweating_VBG ,_, which_WDT usually_RB is_VBZ synchronous_JJ with_IN the_DT increased_VBN depth_NN of_IN breathing_VBG referred_VBN ?_. 369_CD to_TO ;_: after_IN that_DT there_EX is_VBZ a_DT gradual_JJ return_NN to_TO the_DT ._.
original_JJ condition_NN of_IN the_DT pulse_NN and_CC res-_JJ piration_NN except_IN that_IN the_DT deep_JJ breathing_NN persists_VBZ somewhat_RB longer_JJR than_IN the_DT other_JJ phenomena_NN ._.
Usually_RB within_IN two_CD hours_NNS ,_, I_PRP have_VBP found_VBN the_DT patient_NN has_VBZ returned_VBN to_TO his_PRP$ former_JJ state_NN ._.
A_DT marked_JJ feature_NN in_IN many_JJ cases_NNS ,_, and_CC experienced_VBD on_IN every_DT occasion_NN upon_IN which_WDT the_DT author_NN took_VBD a_DT bath_NN ,_, was_VBD slight_JJ dizziness_NN and_CC throbbing_NN of_IN the_DT cerebral_JJ vessels_NNS coming_VBG on_IN after_IN the_DT advent_NN of_IN sweating_NN ._.
Personally_RB for_IN four_CD or_CC five_CD hours_NNS after_IN the_DT bath_NN ,_, a_DT sense_NN of_IN well-being_NN was_VBD most_RBS marked_JJ and_CC on_IN one_CD occasion_NN a_DT slight_JJ bronchial_NN catarrh_NN was_VBD much_RB improved_VBN ._.
Sweating_VBG comes_VBZ on_IN usually_RB when_WRB the_DT patient_NN has_VBZ been_VBN in_IN the_DT bath_NN twelve_NN minutes_NNS ;_: but_CC the_DT time_NN varies_VBZ between_IN 4_CD and_CC 25_CD minutes_NNS ._.
In_IN many_JJ cases_NNS presenting_VBG a_DT few_JJ scattered_JJ rales_NNS in_IN the_DT chest_JJS much_JJ improvement_NN was_VBD noticed_VBN ,_, and_CC reviewing_VBG the_DT whole_JJ series_NN ,_, I_PRP think_VBP these_DT were_VBD ,_, the_DT cases_NNS most_RBS benefited_VBN by_IN the_DT bath_NN ._.
There_EX can_MD be_VB no_DT doubt_NN that_IN much_JJ relief_NN is_VBZ afforded_VBN the_DT majority_NN of_IN the_DT patients_NNS ,_, delirium_NN especially_RB being_VBG relieved_VBN ._.
The_DT sweating_NN which_WDT generally_RB occurs_VBZ also_RB is_VBZ a_DT source_NN of_IN great_JJ relief_NN ,_, though_RB at_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN its_PRP$ immediate_JJ onset_NN ,_, the_DT circulatory_NN and_CC respiratory_NN changes_NNS referred_VBD to_TO cause_VB a_DT little_JJ discomfort_NN ._.
Urination_NN is_VBZ very_RB common_JJ ;_: the_DT cases_NNS of_IN retention_NN of_IN urine_JJ were_VBD very_RB few_JJ ;_: defoecation_NN also_RB occurs_VBZ ,_, but_CC less_JJR commonly_RB ,_, and_CC I_PRP understand_VBP that_IN many_JJ of_IN the_DT cases_NNS took_VBD their_PRP$ food_NN better_RBR after_IN the_DT bath_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ to_TO be_VB expected_VBN from_IN these_DT remarks_NNS that_IN some_DT degree_NN of_IN improvement_NN occurred_VBD in_IN many_JJ cases_NNS ,_, but_CC unfortunately_RB the_DT results_NNS shew_VBP that_IN the_DT relief_NN is_VBZ relief_JJ only_RB ,_, and_CC not_RB cure_VB and_CC that_DT symptoms_VBZ only_RB ,_, and_CC not_RB the_DT real_JJ disease_NN have_VBP been_VBN controlled_VBN ._.
This_DT is_VBZ borne_VBN out_RP by_IN the_DT effect_NN of_IN repeated_JJ baths_NNS ;_: each_DT bath_NN gives_VBZ relief_NN ,_, but_CC in_IN my_PRP$ opinion_NN the_DT relief_NN afforded_VBN by_IN the_DT second_JJ is_VBZ less_JJR than_IN that_DT afforded_VBN by_IN the_DT first_JJ and_CC so_RB on_IN for_IN the_DT third_JJ ._.
That_IN a_DT patient_NN after_IN eight_CD or_CC nine_CD baths_NNS should_MD recover_VB ,_, does_VBZ not_RB ,_, I_PRP think_VBP prove_IN that_IN the_DT baths_NNS saved_VBD him_PRP ._.
Before_IN pursuing_VBG this_DT matter_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, I_PRP will_MD now_RB introduce_VB Part_NNP III_NNP in_IN which_WDT the_DT question_NN will_MD be_VB again_RB brought_JJ forward_NN ._.
PART_NN III_NNP ._.
Three_CD Charts_NNS are_VBP presented_VBN in_IN this_DT part_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT earlier_JJR part_NN of_IN this_DT investigation_NN ,_, I_PRP thought_VBD that_IN the_DT Bath_NNP cases_NNS lived_VBD longer_RBR than_IN the_DT Non-bath_JJ cases_NNS ._.
To_TO test_VB this_DT belief_NN ,_, the_DT first_JJ hundred_VBD odd_JJ fatal_JJ cases_NNS in_IN each_DT group_NN were_VBD carefully_RB classified_VBN .and_NNP sixty_JJ pairs_NNS were_VBD selected_VBN ._.
During_IN the_DT process_NN of_IN selection_NN the_DT number_NN of_IN days_NNS the_DT patient_NN lived_VBD was_VBD quite_RB unknown_JJ ,_, having_VBG been_VBN noted_VBN in_IN a_DT different_JJ note_NN book_NN which_WDT was_VBD not_RB consulted_VBN until_IN a_DT couple_NN of_IN weeks_NNS later_RB ._.
Age_NNP ,_, sex_NN ,_, time_NN of_IN admission_NN ,_, number_NN of_IN days_NNS sick_JJ ,_, type_NN of_IN disease_NN ,_, locality_NN ,_, caste_NN and_CC occupation_NN were_VBD all_DT considered_VBN ,_, and_CC pairs_NNS as_RB similar_JJ as_IN possible_JJ were_VBD selected_VBN ._.
The_DT result_NN was_VBD unexpected_VBN in_IN one_CD respect_NN ,_, namely_RB ,_, that_IN the_DT tendency_NN to_TO prolongation_NN of_IN life_NN was_VBD wholly_RB in_IN favour_NN of_IN the_DT balh_NN ._.
The_DT results_NNS are_VBP expressed_VBN on_IN Chart_NNP C-1_NNP ._.
There_EX the_DT red_JJ line_NN is_VBZ throughout_IN ,_, above_IN the_DT blue_JJ line_NN denoting_VBG that_IN bath_NN cases_NNS live_VBP longer_JJR ,_, though_IN on_IN the_DT average_NN only_RB a_DT day_NN or_CC two_CD ._.
I_PRP do_VBP not_RB know_VB whether_IN this_DT feature_NN was_VBD maintained_VBN during_IN the_DT later_JJ period_NN of_IN the_DT in-_JJ vestigation_NN in_IN March_NNP so_RB rapidly_RB did_VBD the_DT Bath_NNP cases_NNS die_VBP that_IN the_DT difference_NN between_IN the_DT two_CD methods_NNS could_MD only_RB be_VB very_RB slight_JJ ._.
But_CC it_PRP does_VBZ shew_VB that_IN no_DT harm_NN was_VBD done_VBN to_TO the_DT patients_NNS ._.
On_IN page_NN 367_CD I_PRP have_VBP stated_VBN in_IN what_WP ways_NNS I_PRP think_VBP the_DT bath_NN gives_VBZ relief_NN ._.
But_CC if_IN one_CD bath_NN can_MD give_VB relief_NN ,_, then_RB why_WRB should_MD not_RB several_JJ continue_VBP that_DT relief_NN and_CC materially_RB aid_VBD the_DT recovery_NN of_IN the_DT patient_NN ._.
My_PRP$ experience_NN is_VBZ that_IN such_JJ continued_JJ relief_NN is_VBZ not_RB what_WP actually_RB occurs_VBZ ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT relief_NN afforded_VBN by_IN the_DT first_JJ bath_NN generally_RB exceeds_VBZ that_IN of_IN the_DT second_JJ bath_NN and_CC so_RB on_IN ._.
What_WP the_DT bath_NN does_VBZ is_VBZ chiefly_VBN in_IN the_DT direction_NN of_IN stimulating_VBG afresh_IN the_DT many_JJ and_CC varied_JJ functions_NNS of_IN the_DT body-circulation_NN ,_, respiration_NN ,_, digestion_NN ,_, excretion_NN ,_, secretion_NN ,_, and_CC so_RB on_IN in_IN a_DT probably_RB complex_JJ manner_NN ._.
A_DT little_JJ thought_NN will_MD lead_VB one_CD to_TO realize_VB what_WP a_DT powerful_JJ therapeutic_JJ agent_NN a_DT vapour_JJ bath_NN is_VBZ and_CC how_WRB much_JJ the_DT whole_NN ._.
body_NN is_VBZ brought_VBN under_IN its_PRP$ influence_NN ._.
That_IN it_PRP should_MD be_VB a_DT ?_. 370_CD powerful_JJ stimulant_NN ,_, meaning_VBG thereby_RB a_DT potent_JJ agent_NN in_IN bringing_VBG about_IN changes_NNS in_IN the_DT body_NN is_VBZ ,_, I_PRP think_VBP ,_, not_RB to_TO be_VB wondered_VBN at_IN ._.
Such_JJ improvement_NN as_IN occurs_NN is_VBZ to_TO be_VB attri-_JJ buted_VBN ,_, I_PRP think_VBP ,_, to_TO the_DT resumption_NN of_IN functions_NNS previously_RB more_RBR or_CC less_JJR deranged_VBN as_IN the_DT result_NN of_IN the_DT diseased_JJ state_NN of_IN the_DT patient_NN ,_, but_CC it_PRP must_MD be_VB remembered_VBN that_IN for_IN the_DT great_JJ part_NN this_DT resumption_NN is_VBZ only_RB temporary_JJ ._.
The_DT old_JJ abnormal_JJ state_NN is_VBZ quickly_RB re-_JJ established_VBN and_CC with_IN each_DT bath_NN the_DT stimulus_NN become_VB less_RBR and_CC less_RBR ._.
With_IN the_DT cold_JJ bath_NN we_PRP have_VBP other_JJ things_NNS to_TO consider_VB ._.
In_IN nearly_RB all_DT feverish_JJ conditions_NNS when_WRB we_PRP apply_VBP a_DT cold_JJ bath_NN after_IN a_DT hot_JJ bath_NN ,_, the_DT risk_NN of_IN inducing_VBG shock_NN is_VBZ great_JJ ,_, but_CC never_RB in_IN it_PRP greater_JJR than_IN when_WRB we_PRP have_VBP to_TO deal_VB with_IN a_DT disease_NN such_JJ as_IN plague_NN ,_, in_IN which_WDT cardiac_JJ enfeeblement_NN is_VBZ only_RB too_RB common_JJ ._.
In_IN addition_NN the_DT visceral_JJ conges-_JJ tion_NN induced_VBN in_IN the_DT pelvic_JJ organs_NNS and_CC lower_JJR abdominal_JJ regions_NNS must_MD ,_, in_IN my_PRP$ opinion_NN ,_, together_RB with_IN the_DT risk_NN of_IN shock_NN ,_, quite_RB condemn_VBZ the_DT use_NN of_IN the_DT cold_JJ bath_NN ._.
Chart_NNP C-2_NNP calls_VBZ for_IN a_DT little_JJ attention_NN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD my_PRP$ original_JJ intention_NN to_TO gather_VB from_IN the_DT large_JJ collection_NN of_IN statistics_NNS I_PRP have_VBP accumulated_VBN ,_, numbers_NNS enabling_VBG me_PRP to_TO shew_VB graphically_RB the_DT varying_NN successes_NNS of_IN the_DT bath_NN and_CC the_DT non-bath_JJ treatments_NNS at_IN different_JJ ages_NNS of_IN life_NN ;_: also_RB among_IN different_JJ castes_NNS and_CC among_IN different_JJ occupations_NNS ._.
Had_NNP these_DT results_NNS for_IN the_DT bath_NN and_CC the_DT non-bath_JJ treatments_NNS been_VBN widely_RB divergent_JJ ,_, the_DT in-_JJ ference_NN would_MD have_VB been_VBN that_IN the_DT bath_NN at_IN certain_JJ ages_NNS or_CC among_IN certain_JJ castes_NNS or_CC among_IN certain_JJ occupations_NNS had_VBD been_VBN markedly_RB potent_JJ either_CC for_IN evil_NN or_CC for_IN good_JJ ._.
The_DT result_NN as_IN regards_NNS age_NN is_VBZ shown_VBN in_IN Chart_NNP C-2_NNP where_WRB for_IN the_DT most_JJS part_NN there_EX is_VBZ not_RB much_JJ difference_NN ._.
The_DT most_RBS favourable_JJ age_NN for_IN the_DT bath_NN is_VBZ 25-30_JJ while_IN over_IN 40_CD bath_NN cases_NNS do_VBP badly_RB ._.
I_PRP do_VBP not_RB know_VB that_IN any_DT other_JJ inference_NN can_MD be_VB fairly_RB drawn_VBN and_CC with_IN results_NNS so_IN scanty_JJ I_PRP was_VBD deterred_VBN from_IN pursuing_VBG my_PRP$ inquiries_NNS into_IN caste_NN and_CC occupation_NN ._.
Moreover_RB ,_, there_EX must_MD be_VB many_JJ other_JJ circumstances_NNS which_WDT must_MD quite_VB overshadow_IN all_PDT these_DT ,_, for_IN example_NN ,_, as_IN Dr._NNP Dhalgakar_NNP has_VBZ pointed_VBN out_RP to_TO me_PRP ,_, the_DT question_NN whether_IN the_DT patient_NN is_VBZ well_RB fed_VBN or_CC nearly_RB starved_VBN on_IN admission_NN ._.
For_IN the_DT last_JJ Chart_NNP C-3_NNP ,_, I_PRP am_VBP indebted_VBN to_TO the_DT kindness_NN of_IN Mr._NNP Moos_NNP ,_, Director_NNP of_IN the_DT Observatory_NNP ,_, Colaba_NNP ._.
I_PRP asked_VBD for_IN curves_NNS for_IN temperature_NN ,_, barometric_JJ pressure_NN and_CC humidity_NN ,_, and_CC was_VBD kindly_RB supplied_VBN with_IN the_DT same_JJ together_NN with_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT results_NNS gained_VBD at_IN Colaba_NNP in_IN connection_NN with_IN Plague_NNP ._.
Apparently_RB Mr._NNP Moos_NNP considers_VBZ ground_NN temperature_NN a_DT most_RBS important_JJ factor_NN in_IN this_DT propagation_NN of_IN plague_NN and_CC probably_RB the_DT connection_NN is_VBZ very_RB close_RB ._.
I_PRP was_VBD induced_VBN to_TO ask_VB for_IN the_DT curves_NNS represented_VBD inasmuch_JJ as_IN with_IN the_DT climatic_JJ changes_NNS noted_VBD during_IN the_DT course_NN of_IN February_NNP and_CC March_NNP ,_, there_EX were_VBD marked_VBN changes_NNS (_( for_IN the_DT worse_JJR )_) in_IN the_DT results_NNS for_IN all_DT treatments_NNS ._.
At_IN one_CD time_NN I_PRP fancied_VBD the_DT meteorological_JJ changes_NNS might_MD have_VB in_IN some_DT way_NN modified_VBD the_DT conditions_NNS favouring_VBG sweating_NN ,_, and_CC so_RB have_VB accounted_VBN partially_RB for_IN the_DT increased_VBN bath_NN mortality_NN :_: but_CC as_IN all_DT methods_NNS of_IN treatment_NN showed_VBD increased_JJ mortality_NN ,_, some_DT other_JJ cause_NN must_MD be_VB sought_VBN for_IN ._.
[_NN Addendum_NNP ,_, 17-7-99_JJ ]_NN ._.
CHART_NNP C.-4_NNP ._.
Added_VBN to_TO shew_VB the_DT results_NNS obtained_VBD at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN every_DT week_NN from_IN January_NNP the_DT first_JJ ,_, 1899_CD ._.
The_DT most_RBS marked_JJ feature_NN is_VBZ the_DT decline_NN in_IN the_DT success_NN of_IN the_DT bath_NN ,_, but_CC it_PRP must_MD be_VB noted_VBN that_IN the_DT comparative_JJ success_NN only_RB occurred_VBD when_WRB a_DT small_JJ number_NN of_IN cases_NNS was_VBD taken_VBN ._.
CONCLUSION_NNP ._.
Part_NN I_PRP deals_VBP with_IN actual_JJ results_NNS ,_, Part_NNP II_NNP deals_NNS with_IN certain_JJ phenomena_JJ occur-_JJ ring_NN during_IN the_DT administration_NN of_IN the_DT hot_JJ bath_NN ,_, and_CC Part_NNP III_NNP ,_, along_IN with_IN miscellaneous_JJ questions_NNS deals_NNS with_IN the_DT alleviative_JJ as_IN opposed_VBN to_TO the_DT curative_JJ nature_NN of_IN the_DT steam_NN treatment_NN ._.
Bath_NNP and_CC Non-bath_NNP methods_NNS alike_RB have_VBP ,_, at_IN the_DT Maratha_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, been_VBN ?_. 371_CD failures_NNS ,_, and_CC while_IN the_DT Non-bath_NNP methods_NNS have_VBP not_RB been_VBN curative_JJ ,_, the_DT bath_NN method_NN can_MD certainly_RB ,_, in_IN my_PRP$ opinion_NN ,_, claim_NN to_TO have_VB been_VBN more_RBR alleviative_JJ than_IN its_PRP$ competitors_NNS ._.
As_IN to_TO what_WP would_MD have_VB been_VBN its_PRP$ results_NNS had_VBD the_DT cold_JJ bath_NN been_VBN rigidly_RB enforced_JJ ,_, I_PRP will_MD not_RB say_VB ._.
In_IN the_DT words_NNS of_IN the_DT Medical_JJ Officer_NNP at_IN the_DT Maratha_NNP Hospital_NNP ``_`` whatever_WDT cases_NNS may_MD have_VB recovered_VBN here_RB ,_, have_VBP recovered_VBN by_IN means_NNS of_IN processes_NNS not_RB brought_VBN about_RB by_IN us_PRP but_CC have_VBP got_VBN well_RB of_IN themselves_PRP ._. ''_''
In_IN conclusion_NN I_PRP must_MD thank_VB the_DT Medical_NNP Officers_NNPS and_CC staff_NN at_IN the_DT Maratha_NNP Hospital_NNP for_IN their_PRP$ assistance_NN ;_: also_RB Mr._NNP Moos_NNP for_IN his_PRP$ Chart_NNP relating_NN to_TO meteorological_JJ factors_NNS ,_, and_CC Mr._NNP Leslie_NNP I_PRP must_MD thank_VB for_IN two_CD reasons_NNS ;_: firstly_RB ,_, for_IN providing_VBG me_PRP with_IN an_DT excellent_JJ opportunity_NN for_IN studying_VBG plague_NN ,_, and_CC secondly_RB for_IN providing_VBG me_PRP with_IN a_DT really_RB excellent_JJ assistant_NN ,_, quite_RB indefatigable_JJ in_IN work_NN and_CC always_RB willing-Mr_NN ._.
Hate_NNP upon_IN whose_WP$ shoulders_NNS fell_VBD more_JJR than_IN a_DT fair_JJ share_NN of_IN the_DT work_NN in_IN this_DT investigation_NN ._.
But_CC the_DT Report_NNP is_VBZ wholly_RB my_PRP$ own_JJ and_CC for_IN it_PRP I_PRP alone_RB am_VBP responsible_JJ ._.
Its_PRP$ delayed_VBN comple-_NN tion_NN has_VBZ been_VBN due_JJ to_TO occupation_VB elsewhere_RB and_CC temporary_JJ indisposition_NN ._.
APPENDIX_NNP D._NNP Appendix_NNP to_TO the_DT Report_NNP of_IN the_DT Modikhana_NNP Plague_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, Bombay_NNP ,_, for_IN 1898-1899_JJ ._.
Report_NN of_IN Cases_NNP treated_VBD with_IN Roux_NNP 's_POS Serum_NNP ._.
General_NNP Remarks_NNP ._.
The_DT Indian_NNP Plague_NNP Commission_NNP brought_VBD along_RP with_IN them_PRP a_DT large_JJ quantity_NN of_IN anti-plague_JJ serum_NN prepared_VBN in_IN the_DT Institute_NNP Pasteur_NNP in_IN Paris_NNP under_IN the_DT direction_NN of_IN M._NNP Roux_NNP ,_, with_IN the_DT intention_NN of_IN trying_VBG its_PRP$ efficacy_NN on_IN a_DT large_JJ scale_NN ._.
The_DT first_JJ trial_NN of_IN the_DT serum_NN was_VBD conducted_VBN at_IN Bangalore_NNP ._.
During_IN the_DT months_NNS of_IN January_NNP and_CC February_NNP 1899_CD ,_, the_DT Modikhana_NNP Hospital_NNP was_VBD selected_VBN for_IN a_DT further_JJ trial_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT close_JJ proximity_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN to_TO the_DT Municipal_NNP Laboratory_NNP ,_, where_WRB the_DT Members_NNS of_IN the_DT Commission_NNP were_VBD engaged_VBN in_IN carrying_VBG on_IN research_NN work_NN in_IN plague_NN ,_, was_VBD found_VBN to_TO be_VB a_DT great_JJ advantage_NN to_TO them_PRP ._.
The_DT treatment_NN was_VBD carried_VBN out_RP by_IN Lieutenants_NNS Walton_NNP and_CC Douglas_NNP of_IN the_DT Indian_NNP Medical_NNP Service_NNP ,_, who_WP were_VBD assisting_VBG the_DT Plague_NNP Commission_NNP in_IN their_PRP$ Laboratory_NN work_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT cases_NNS were_VBD watched_VBN from_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN by_IN Professor_NNP Wright_NNP and_CC Dr._NNP Riiffer_NNP ._.
A_DT detailed_JJ account_NN of_IN the_DT action_NN and_CC results_NNS of_IN the_DT serum_NN on_IN the_DT cases_NNS tried_VBN in_IN the_DT Modikhana_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, and_CC of_IN its_PRP$ action_NN on_IN lower_JJR animals_NNS will_MD appear_VB in_IN the_DT Report_NNP of_IN the_DT Indian_NNP Plague_NNP Commission_NNP ._.
The_DT following_JJ brief_NN sketch_NN is_VBZ only_RB intended_VBN to_TO give_VB a_DT little_JJ idea_NN of_IN the_DT manner_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT treatment_NN was_VBD carried_VBN out_RP ._.
Number_NNP and_CC Selection_NNP of_IN Cases_NNP ._.
There_EX were_VBD altogether_RB twenty-eight_JJ cases_NNS of_IN acute_JJ plague_NN treated_VBN with_IN Roux_NNP 's_POS Serum_NNP ._.
These_DT cases_NNS were_VBD not_RB specially_RB selected_VBN for_IN treatment_NN ,_, but_CC every_DT alternate_NN case_NN as_IN it_PRP was_VBD admitted_VBN into_IN the_DT acute_JJ plague_NN ward_NN ,_, was_VBD taken_VBN for_IN serum_JJ treatment_NN ,_, the_DT remaining_VBG cases_NNS forming_VBG the_DT ``_`` Controls_NNP ._. ''_''
This_DT arrangement_NN was_VBD thought_VBN to_TO be_VB better_RB adapted_VBN for_IN comparing_VBG the_DT result_NN of_IN the_DT serum_NN treatment_NN with_IN that_DT of_IN the_DT routine_JJ treatment_NN as_IN carried_VBN on_IN in_IN the_DT hospital_NN ._.
Of_IN the_DT 28_CD cases_NNS treated_VBN with_IN serum-_JJ 10_CD were_VBD brought_VBN into_IN the_DT hospital_NN on_IN the_DT 2nd_CD day_NN ._.
6_CD .._JJ .._NNP .._NNP .._VBD 3rd_CD ``_`` 5_CD .._NNP .._VBD 4th_CD ``_`` 2_CD ..._: .._RB 6th_CD ``_`` 1_CD .._$ 8th_CD ``_`` In_IN 4_CD remaining_VBG cases_NNS the_DT duration_NN was_VBD unknown_JJ ._.
372_CD Mode_NNP of_IN treatment_NN ._.
The_DT injections_NNS were_VBD generally_RB given_VBN deep_RB into_IN the_DT cellular_JJ tissue_NN of_IN the_DT anterior_JJ abdominal_JJ wall_NN ,_, sometimes_RB in_IN the_DT interscapular_JJ region_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN a_DT few_JJ cases_NNS intravenously_RB ._.
In_IN all_DT cases_NNS the_DT strictest_JJS antiseptic_JJ precautions_NNS were_VBD taken_VBN ;_: the_DT syringe_NN and_CC the_DT skin_NN being_VBG carefully_RB sterilized_VBN ._.
In_IN not_RB a_DT single_JJ case_NN were_VBD local_JJ abscesses_NNS formed_VBN at_IN the_DT seats_NNS of_IN injections_NNS ._.
The_DT injections_NNS were_VBD given_VBN twice_RB daily_RB ._.
The_DT first_JJ dose_JJ was-_NN ,_, with_IN only_RB a_DT few_JJ exceptions_NNS ,_, 40_CD cubic_JJ centimetres_NNS ,_, all_PDT the_DT subsequent_JJ doses_NNS being_VBG 20_CD cubic_JJ centimetres_NNS each_DT ._.
The_DT total_JJ amount_NN of_IN serum_NN injected_VBN varied_VBD from_IN 40_CD cubic_JJ centimetres_NNS upwards_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT largest_JJS amount_NN injected_VBD into_IN a_DT single_JJ individual_NN was_VBD 235_CD cubic_JJ centimetres_NNS ,_, (_( Serial_JJ No_NNP ._.
9_CD )_) who_WP however_RB died_VBD ._.
In_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN Rama_NNP Narayen_NNP (_( Serial_JJ No_NNP ._.
17_CD )_) who_WP was_VBD ultimately_RB discharged_VBN cured_VBN ,_, 220_CD cubic_JJ centimetres_NNS of_IN serum-_NN were_VBD injected_VBN ._.
In_IN all_DT of_IN these_DT cases_NNS the_DT ordinary_JJ routine_NN treatment_NN for_IN plague_NN ,_, viz._NN ,_, stimulants_NNS and_CC strychnine_JJ injections_NNS ,_, was_VBD allowed_VBN to_TO be_VB carried_VBN on_IN simultaneously_RB with_IN the_DT serum_NN ._.
Effects_NNS on_IN Symptoms_NNP ._.
The_DT injections_NNS ,_, as_IN I_PRP have_VBP said_VBD before_IN ,_, were_VBD given_VBN both_DT intracellularly_RB ,_, as_RB well_RB as_IN intravenously_RB ,_, and_CC without_IN any_DT accidents_NNS ._.
In_IN general_JJ ,_, it_PRP may_MD be_VB said_VBD ,_, that_IN there_EX was_VBD no_DT effect_NN observed_VBD as_IN the_DT result_NN of_IN the_DT injections_NNS ._.
The_DT temperature_NN ,_, pulse_NN ,_, and_CC respirations_NNS were_VBD in_IN no_DT way_NN affected_VBD ,_, and_CC the_DT serum_NN ,_, even_RB when_WRB injected_VBN in_IN the_DT proximity_NN of_IN a_DT bubo_NN ,_, did_VBD not_RB appear_VB to_TO influence_VB it_PRP in_IN any_DT manner_NN ._.
It_PRP produced_VBD no_DT beneficial_JJ effect_NN upon_IN the_DT delirium_NN ._.
The_DT intravenous_JJ injections_NNS apparently_RB created_VBD no_DT influence_NN on_IN the_DT pneumonic_JJ condition_NN ._.
It_PRP may_MD be_VB mentioned_VBN at_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, that_IN there_EX were_VBD certainly_RB no_RB ill-effects_NNS observed_VBD to_TO be_VB arising_VBG from_IN the_DT injection_NN and_CC use_NN of_IN the_DT serum_NN ._.
No_DT irritation_NN or_CC urticaria_NN was_VBD produced_VBN at_IN or_CC around_IN the_DT seats_NNS of_IN injection_NN ._.
Result_NN ._.
Of_IN the_DT 28_CD cases_NNS treated_VBD ,_, 5_CD recovered_VBD and_CC the_DT remaining_VBG 23_CD died_JJ ,_, thus_RB giving_VBG a_DT mortality_NN of_IN 821_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
Out_IN of_IN an_DT equal_JJ number_NN of_IN ``_`` Controls_NNP ''_'' there_EX were_VBD 3_CD re-_JJ coveries_NNS and_CC 25_CD deaths_NNS ,_, mortality_NN percentage_NN being_VBG 899_CD ._.
Thus_RB the_DT perecentage_NN of_IN recoveries_NNS from_IN the_DT serum_NN treatment_NN does_VBZ not_RB show_VB any_DT striking_JJ results_NNS as_IN compared_VBN with_IN those_DT obtained_VBN from_IN the_DT ordinary_JJ treatment_NN ._.
The_DT result_NN ,_, therefore_RB ,_, was_VBD unsatisfactory_JJ and_CC disappointing_JJ ,_, especially_RB as_IN in_IN Laboratory_NNP experiments_NNS Roux_NNP 's_POS Serum_NNP had_VBD shown_VBN a_DT decided_JJ antagonising_VBG action_NN to_TO the_DT toxines_NNS of_IN plague_NN ._.
Of_IN the_DT five_CD recoveries_NNS ,_, in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN Dhondoo_NNP Trimbuck_NNP ,_, the_DT bubo_NN gradually_RB subsided_VBD ,_, in_IN the_DT remaining_VBG four_CD the_DT buboes_NNS suppurated_VBD and_CC had_VBD to_TO be_VB incised_VBN ._.
A_DT tabular_JJ list_NN is_VBZ herewith_JJ appended_JJ giving_VBG details_NNS of_IN the_DT cases_NNS treated_VBD ;_: also_RB Charts_VBZ showing_VBG four_CD hourly_JJ temperature_NN ,_, pulse_NN ,_, respirations_NNS ,_, the_DT amount_NN of_IN serum_NN injected_VBN and_CC the_DT time_NN of_IN injection_NN ._.
D._NNP A._NN TURKHUD_NNP ,_, Chief_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, Modikhana_NNP Hospital_NNP ._.
