1_CD D._NNP A._NN TUBKHUD_NNP ,_, Chief_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, Modikhana_NNP Hospital_NNP ._.
374_CD APPENDIX_NNP E._NNP A_NNP short_JJ History_NNP of_IN Lustig_NNP 's_POS serum_NN as_IN used_VBN in_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
In_IN November_NNP 1897_CD ,_, Professor_NNP Lustig_NNP wrote_VBD from_IN Florence_NNP ,_, to_TO the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, stating_VBG that_IN as_IN the_DT experiments_NNS with_IN serum_NN prepared_VBN according_VBG to_TO his_PRP$ method_NN had_VBD proved_VBN very_RB satisfactory_JJ on_IN monkeys_NNS and_CC men_NNS ,_, his_PRP$ Assistant_NNP ,_, Dr._NNP Galeotti_NNP ,_, would_MD go_VB to_TO Bombay_NNP to_TO prepare_VB the_DT serum_NN there_RB provided_VBD his_PRP$ journey_NN and_CC actual_JJ expenses_NNS were_VBD paid_VBN ._.
The_DT letter_NN met_VBD with_IN the_DT approbation_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, Col._NNP Weir_NNP ,_, who_WP states_VBZ that_IN the_DT results_NNS of_IN the_DT treatment_NN adopted_VBN by_IN Professor_NNP Lustig_NNP were_VBD most_RBS encouraging_JJ ._.
Professor_NNP Lustig_NNP had_VBD been_VBN originally_RB sent_VBN out_RP to_TO Bombay_NNP by_IN the_DT British_JJ Government_NNP ,_, and_CC conducted_VBD a_DT number_NN of_IN experiments_NNS with_IN his_PRP$ serum_NN which_WDT Dr._NNP Choksy_NNP ,_, the_DT Medical_NNP Officer_NNP in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT Arthur_NNP Road_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, reports_VBZ as_IN the_DT only_JJ serum_NN which_WDT gave_VBD anything_NN like_IN satisfactory_JJ results_NNS ,_, as_IN out_IN of_IN 7_CD cases_NNS treated_VBN with_IN this_DT serum_NN 6_CD recovered_VBN ,_, and_CC at_IN Lanowli_NNP 16_CD cases_NNS were_VBD treated_VBN and_CC 12_CD recovered_VBN ._.
2_CD ._.
On_IN the_DT strength_NN of_IN these_DT favourable_JJ reports_NNS ,_, the_DT Municipality_NNP decided_VBD to_TO accept_VB the_DT services_NNS of_IN Dr._NNP Galeotti_NNP ,_, and_CC a_DT wire_NN was_VBD sent_VBN to_TO Professor_NNP Lustig_NNP to_TO that_DT effect_NN ,_, also_RB to_TO ascertain_VB if_IN he_PRP had_VBD any_DT serum_JJ ready_NN and_CC how_WRB long_JJ it_PRP would_MD take_VB to_TO prepare_VB fresh_JJ serum_NN in_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
3_CD ._.
In_IN answer_NN to_TO this_DT ,_, Professor_NNP Lustig_NNP wired_VBD to_TO say_VB that_IN no_DT serum_NN was_VBD ready_JJ and_CC that_IN four_CD weeks_NNS would_MD be_VB required_VBN to_TO prepare_VB the_DT serum_NN which_WDT he_PRP proposed_VBD to_TO send_VB out_RP by_IN Dr._NNP Galeotti_NNP ._.
The_DT Municipal_NNP Commissioner_NNP ,_, Mr_NNP ._.
Snow_NNP ,_, in_IN return_NN wired_VBN to_TO say_VB that_IN as_RB much_JJ serum_NN as_IN could_MD be_VB prepared_VBN should_MD be_VB sent_VBN out_RP by_IN Dr._NNP Galeotti_NNP ,_, and_CC that_IN a_DT weekly_JJ supply_NN be_VB sent_VBN (_( February_NNP 1898_CD )_) ._.
Professor_NNP Lustig_NNP then_RB proposed_VBD that_IN if_IN the_DT trials_NNS resulted_VBD in_IN a_DT successful_JJ termination_NN ,_, he_PRP would_MD come_VB himself_PRP (_( with_IN the_DT sanction_NN of_IN the_DT Italian_NNP Ministry_NNP )_) to_TO Bombay_NNP and_CC set_VBD up_RP an_DT Institu-_JJ tion_NN for_IN its_PRP$ preparation_NN ._.
This_DT was_VBD in_IN February_NNP 1898_CD ._.
4_CD ._.
On_IN March_NNP 11th_CD ,_, Dr._NNP Galeotti_NNP arrived_VBD in_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT experiments_NNS with_IN Lustig_NNP 's_POS serum_NN were_VBD taken_VBN in_IN hand_NN ._.
In_IN April_NNP Dr._NNP Choksy_NNP was_VBD called_VBN on_IN for_IN a_DT report_NN of_IN the_DT cases_NNS inoculated_VBN and_CC stated_VBN ,_, on_IN the_DT 22nd_CD April_NNP ,_, that_IN it_PRP was_VBD feared_VBN that_IN if_IN any_DT deductions_NNS were_VBD to_TO be_VB drawn_VBN from_IN those_DT already_RB treated_VBN at_IN such_PDT an_DT early_JJ stage_NN ,_, no_DT definite_JJ conclusions_NNS would_MD be_VB arrived_VBN at_IN ,_, but_CC that_IN the_DT percentage_NN of_IN recover-_JJ ies_NNS amongst_VBP those_DT treated_VBN is_VBZ about_IN 50_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
In_IN a_DT further_JJ communication_NN ,_, dated_VBD 25th_CD April_NNP ,_, he_PRP states_VBZ that_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN patients_NNS treated_VBN amounted_VBD to_TO 103_CD ;_: 84_CD :_: of_IN whom_WP were_VBD treated_VBN at_IN the_DT Arthur_NNP Road_NNP ,_, 10_CD at_IN the_DT Maratha_NNP ,_, and_CC 9_CD at_IN Parel_NNP Hospitals_NNP ._.
That_IN the_DT serum_NN obtained_VBN from_IN Horse_NNP No_NNP ._.
1_CD was_VBD comparatively_RB weak_JJ and_CC gave_VBD less_JJR satisfactory_JJ results_NNS than_IN the_DT other_JJ animals_NNS ._.
Of_IN the_DT 103_CD cases_NNS treated_VBD ,_, 18_CD were_VBD very_RB advanced_JJ and_CC grave_NN ,_, including_VBG some_DT that_WDT were_VBD pneumonic_JJ and_CC unconscious_JJ ._.
These_DT cases_NNS were_VBD treated_VBN to_TO see_VB the_DT effect_NN of_IN the_DT serum_NN on_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC the_DT result_NN found_VBD was_VBD that_IN there_EX was_VBD some_DT amelioration_NN and_CC considerable_JJ improve-_JJ ment_NN in_IN their_PRP$ symptoms_NNS ,_, albeit_NN of_IN a_DT temporary_JJ nature_NN ,_, although_IN they_PRP eventually_RB succumbed_VBD ._.
The_DT rate_NN of_IN recovery_NN in_IN these_DT cases_NNS was_VBD 4271_CD per_IN cent._NN ,_, and_CC eleminat-_JJ ing_VBG the_DT 18_CD grave_NN cases_NNS ,_, the_DT recoveries_NNS were_VBD 5177_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
The_DT average_JJ mortality_NN at_IN the_DT Arthur_NNP Road_NNP Hospital_NNP at_IN this_DT time_NN was_VBD 7355_CD ._.
Thus_RB the_DT serum_NN gives_VBZ encouraging_JJ results_NNS ._.
5_CD ._.
The_DT Standing_NNP Committee_NNP ,_, on_IN the_DT 27th_CD April_NNP ,_, resolved_VBD that_IN '_'' the_DT serum_NN be_VB distributed_VBN as_RB far_RB as_IN possible_JJ to_TO the_DT various_JJ Plague_NNP Hospitals_NNP and_CC also_RB ,_, if_IN possible_JJ ,_, to_TO the_DT Plague_NNP Authorities_NNP at_IN Karachi_NNP ._.
6_CD ._.
The_DT question_NN of_IN the_DT expenditure_NN concerning_VBG the_DT proposed_VBN Laboratory_NN for_IN the_DT manufacture_NN of_IN serum_NN locally_RB was_VBD then_RB gone_VBN into_IN ,_, and_CC sanction_NN given_VBN to_TO the_DT neces-_JJ ?_. 375_CD sary_JJ appliances_NNS required_VBN ,_, as_IN Dr._NNP Galeotti_NNP wished_VBD the_DT manufacture_NN to_TO be_VB begun_VBN without_IN delay_NN ,_, as_IN in_IN a_DT few_JJ weeks_NNS the_DT supply_NN of_IN serum_NN from_IN Florence_NNP would_MD cease_VB ._.
7_CD ._.
In_IN May_NNP a_DT further_JJ list_NN of_IN cases_NNS treated_VBN with_IN this_DT serum_NN was_VBD sent_VBN in_IN from_IN the_DT Arthur_NNP Road_NNP Hospital_NNP ._.
155_CD cases_NNS were_VBD treated_VBN and_CC 95_CD died_VBD ,_, giving_VBG a_DT mortality_NN 6129_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
against_IN an_DT average_JJ mortality_NN of_IN about_IN 82_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
amongst_NN cases_NNS treated_VBD without_IN serum_NN ._.
Amongst_NNP these_DT 95_CD cases_NNS 25_CD were_VBD moribund_VBN ,_, and_CC if_IN these_DT are_VBP deducted_VBN a_DT reduction_NN to_TO 5384_CD per_IN cent_NN ,_, would_MD be_VB obtained_VBN ._.
The_DT serum_NN from_IN No_NNP ._.
1_CD Horse_NNP was_VBD again_RB found_VBN weak_JJ and_CC gave_VBD less_RBR favourable_JJ results_NNS ._.
(_( Vide_NNP letter_NN No_NNP ._.
518_CD of_IN 1898_CD from_IN the_DT Arthur_NNP Road_NNP Hospital_NNP ._. )_)
8_CD ._.
The_DT services_NNS of_IN Dr._NNP Galeotti_NNP and_CC Dr._NNP Polverini_NNP (_( his_PRP$ Assistant_NN )_) were_VBD taken_VBN on_IN by_IN the_DT Corporation_NN from_IN the_DT 1st_CD June_NNP 1898_CD for_IN the_DT manufacture_NN of_IN the_DT serum_NN ._.
9_CD ._.
In_IN September_NNP a_DT further_JJ list_NN of_IN cases_NNS treated_VBN by_IN Lustig_NNP 's_POS serum_NN was_VBD sent_VBN in_IN by_IN Dr._NNP Choksey_NNP ._.
The_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN cases_NNS treated_VBN were_VBD 207_CD ,_, out_IN of_IN which_WDT 117_CD died_VBD and_CC 90_CD recovered_VBN ,_, giving_VBG a_DT mortality_NN of_IN 5650_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
Out_IN of_IN these_DT cases_NNS 30_CD were_VBD moribund_VBN cases_NNS which_WDT ,_, if_IN excluded_VBN ,_, would_MD give_VB a_DT mortality_NN of_IN 4915_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
The_DT results_NNS ,_, even_RB including_VBG the_DT 30_CD moribund_NN cases_NNS ,_, are_VBP nearly_RB 20_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
better_JJR than_IN the_DT average_NN of_IN other_JJ hospitals_NNS ._.
It_PRP was_VBD again_RB found_VBN that_IN there_EX was_VBD amelioration_NN of_IN symptoms_NNS and_CC prolonging_NN of_IN life_NN in_IN very_RB advanced_JJ cases_NNS ._.
(_( Vide_NNP letter_NN No_NNP ._.
21067_CD of_IN 1898-99_JJ ,_, from_IN the_DT Executive_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP ._. )_)
The_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN cases_NNS treated_VBN with_IN the_DT serum_NN sent_VBD out_RP from_IN Florence_NN ,_, up_RB to_TO the_DT end_NN of_IN October_NNP was_VBD 257_CD ;_: of_IN these_DT 145_CD died_VBD and_CC 112_CD recovered_VBN ,_, giving_VBG a_DT mortality_NN rate_NN of_IN 5642_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
During_IN the_DT same_JJ period_NN 752_CD cases_NNS were_VBD treated_VBN without_IN serum_NN ,_, and_CC of_IN these_DT 595_CD died_VBD ,_, and_CC 157_CD recovered_VBN ,_, giving_VBG a_DT mortality_NN rate_NN of_IN 7912_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
10_CD ._.
In_IN October_NNP 1898_CD ,_, the_DT necessary_JJ number_NN of_IN horses_NNS ,_, viz_NN ._.
5_CD ,_, and_CC the_DT apparatus-required_JJ for_IN the_DT manufacture_NN of_IN this_DT serum_NN was_VBD obtained_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT Laboratory_NNP at_IN Parez_NNP started_VBD work_NN ._.
The_DT horses_NNS were_VBD inoculated_VBN from_IN the_DT 1st_CD November_NNP ._.
A_DT 6th_CD horse_NN and_CC a_DT donkey_NN were_VBD purchased_VBN in_IN January_NNP 1899_CD ._.
11_CD ._.
On_IN the_DT 6th_CD December_NNP ,_, from_IN an_DT infiltration_NN on_IN the_DT shoulder_NN of_IN oneofthe-horses_NNS ,_, serum_NN was_VBD obtained_VBN and_CC a_DT very_RB severe_JJ case_NN of_IN plague_NN treated_VBN with_IN it_PRP at_IN the_DT Arthur_NNP Road_NNP Hospital_NNP with_IN satisfactory_JJ result_NN ._.
On_IN the_DT 11th_CD January_NNP ,_, 2_CD horses_NNS had_VBD completed_VBN their_PRP$ course_NN of_IN treatment_NN ,_, and_CC from_IN the_DT serum_NN obtained_VBN from_IN them_PRP ,_, on_IN the_DT 15th_CD and_CC 16th_CD January_NNP ,_, cases_NNS were_VBD treated_VBN a_DT couple_NN of_IN days_NNS after_IN ._.
12_CD ._.
Professor_NNP Lustig_NNP came_VBD out_RP to_TO Bombay_NNP to_TO see_VB the_DT working_NN of_IN the_DT Laboratory_NNP as_IN conducted_VBN by_IN Dr._NNP Galeotti_NNP and_CC Polverini_NNP at_IN Parel_NNP at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN January_NNP 1899_CD ,_, and_CC as_IN the_DT result_NN of_IN his_PRP$ investigations_NNS ,_, letter_NN No_NNP ._.
32724_CD of_IN the_DT 1st_CD February_NNP is_VBZ published_VBN ,_, and_CC will_MD be_VB found_VBN very_RB interesting_JJ ._.
No_DT ._.
32724_CD OF_IN 1ST_CD FEBRUARY_NNP 1899_CD ._.
To_TO THE_DT MUNICIPAL_NNP COMMISSIONER_NNP ._.
Sir_NNP ,_, -I_WDT have_VBP the_DT honour_NN to_TO forward_VB herewith_PDT a_DT very_RB interesting_JJ and_CC valuable_JJ memorandum_NN by_IN Prof._NNP Lustig_NNP on_IN the_DT measures_NNS that_WDT have_VBP been_VBN taken_VBN for_IN the_DT preparation_NN of_IN the_DT curative_JJ serum_NN of_IN Prof._NNP Lustig_NNP ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ very_RB gratifying_VBG to_TO find_VB that_DT Prof._NNP Lustig_NNP is_VBZ thoroughly_RB satisfied_VBN with_IN all_DT that_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN done_VBN ._.
His_PRP$ opinions_NNS on_IN the_DT destruction_NN of_IN rats_NNS are_VBP most_RBS interesting_JJ in_IN view_NN of_IN the_DT experiments_NNS that_WDT have_VBP been_VBN made_VBN since_IN 1896.-I_CD have_VBP ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, T._NNP S._NNP WEIR_NNP ,_, Health_NNP Officer_NNP ._.
MEMO_NNP ._.
1_CD ._.
Haying_VBG obtained_VBN from_IN the_DT Italian_JJ Government_NNP leave_NN only_RB up_RB to_TO the_DT 10th_CD of_IN February_NNP ,_, I_PRP must_MD start_VB from_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, and_CC I_PRP regret_VBP it_PRP is_VBZ impossible_JJ for_IN me_PRP to_TO give_VB my_PRP$ evidence_NN before_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Commission_NNP ._.
?_. 376_CD 2_CD ._.
I_PRP beg_VBP to_TO forward_VB to_TO the_DT Commissioner_NNP memorandum_NN giving_VBG briefly_NN my_PRP$ opinion_NN on_IN the_DT different_JJ subjects_NNS on_IN which_WDT I_PRP have_VBP been_VBN requested_VBN to_TO express_VB my_PRP$ views_NNS ._.
3_CD ._.
Further_JJ explanations_NNS can_MD be_VB given_VBN by_IN my_PRP$ Assistant_NNP ,_, Dr._NNP Galeotti_NNP ,_, Lecturer_NNP at_IN the_DT University_NNP of_IN Florence_NNP ,_, and_CC by_IN myself_PRP by_IN letter_NN ,_, if_IN the_DT Commission_NNP find_VBP it_PRP necessary_JJ ._.
4_CD ._.
The_DT aim_NN of_IN my_PRP$ coming_VBG to_TO Bombay_NNP has_VBZ been_VBN to_TO pay_VB a_DT visit_NN to_TO the_DT laboratory_NN arranged_VBN by_IN my_PRP$ Assistants_NNS ,_, Drs_NNP ._.
Galeotti_NNP and_CC Polverini_NNP ,_, and_CC to_TO have_VB personal_JJ information_NN of_IN the_DT arrangements_NNS for_IN the_DT preparation_NN of_IN the_DT curative_JJ serum_NN ._.
5_CD ._.
I_PRP am_VBP very_RB pleased_JJ to_TO be_VB able_JJ to_TO express_VB to_TO the_DT Commissioner_NNP that_IN I_PRP have_VBP found_VBN the_DT work_NN of_IN Drs_NNP ._.
Galeotti_NNP and_CC Polverini_NNP completely_RB satisfactory_JJ in_IN every_DT regard_NN ,_, and_CC I_PRP should_MD be_VB very_RB glad_JJ if_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Commission_NNP would_MD pay_VB a_DT visit_NN to_TO this_DT Laboratory_NNP and_CC examine_VB the_DT operations_NNS for_IN the_DT preparation_NN of_IN the_DT serum_NN and_CC the_DT experiments_NNS for_IN the_DT immunisation_NN of_IN horses_NNS and_CC other_JJ animals_NNS ._.
6_CD ._.
Now_RB ,_, it_PRP will_MD be_VB seen_VBN from_IN the_DT several_JJ works_NNS published_VBN by_IN myself_PRP and_CC Dr._NNP Galeotti_NNP in_IN different_JJ scientific_JJ papers_NNS that_IN we_PRP had_VBD in_IN our_PRP$ researches_NNS ,_, the_DT object_NN of_IN extracting_VBG from_IN the_DT plague_NN bacilli_VBZ a_DT very_RB active_JJ substance_NN of_IN known_VBN constitution_NN able_JJ to_TO induce_VB in_IN the_DT animals_NNS in_IN which_WDT this_DT substance_NN has_VBZ been_VBN injected_VBN ,_, a_DT strong_JJ local_JJ and_CC general_JJ reaction_NN ,_, by_IN means_NNS of_IN which_WDT the_DT serum_NN of_IN the_DT blood_NN of_IN these_DT animals_NNS attain_VBP specific_JJ bactericidal_NN and_CC antitoxic_NN properties_NNS ._.
7_CD ._.
Our_PRP$ experiments_NNS were_VBD in_IN the_DT beginning_NN performed_VBN on_IN animals_NNS (_( rabbits_NNS ,_, rats_NNS ,_, guinea-pigs_NNS ,_, monkeys_NNS )_) and_CC later_RBR on_IN [_NNS ?_.
on_IN human_JJ beings_NNS ]_NN (_( July_NNP and_CC August_NNP 1897_CD )_) in_IN Bombay_NNP and_CC Poona_NNP with_IN a_DT serum_NN prepared_VBN in_IN Florence_NNP ._.
With_IN this_DT serum_NN we_PRP treated_VBD 30_CD patients_NNS in_IN different_JJ stages_NNS of_IN disease_NN ,_, and_CC of_IN these_DT 24_CD recovered_VBD ._.
8_CD ._.
In_IN February_NNP 1898_CD ,_, I_PRP was_VBD charged_VBN by_IN the_DT Municipality_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP to_TO prepare_VB serum_NN in_IN my_PRP$ Laboratory_NN at_IN Florence_NNP ,_, and_CC to_TO send_VB it_PRP here_RB for_IN the_DT treatment_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN patients_NNS in_IN the_DT hospitals_NNS of_IN this_DT town_NN ._.
9_CD ._.
Every_DT time_NN ,_, before_IN the_DT sending_VBG out_IN of_IN the_DT serum_NN ,_, I_PRP tested_VBD its_PRP$ preventive_JJ and_CC curative_JJ power_NN on_IN rats_NNS ,_, injecting_VBG them_PRP in_IN the_DT peritoneal_JJ cavity_NN with_IN a_DT small_JJ quantity_NN of_IN a_DT very_RB virulent_JJ plague_NN culture_NN ._.
10_CD ._.
I_PRP did_VBD not_RB determine_VB the_DT minimum_JJ curative_JJ doses_NNS ,_, because_IN I_PRP think_VBP that_IN such_JJ determinations_NNS have_VBP no_DT conclusive_JJ value_NN ,_, it_PRP being_VBG impossible_JJ to_TO have_VB a_DT standard_NN of_IN the_DT strength_NN of_IN the_DT injected_JJ virus_NN ._.
11_CD ._.
I_PRP can_MD only_RB say_VB with_IN certitude_NN ,_, that_IN 1/3_CD or_CC 1/2_CD C.C_NNPS ._.
of_IN serum_NN was_VBD able_JJ to_TO save_VB a_DT white_JJ rat_NN of_IN 100_CD grains_NNS weight_VBN ,_, if_IN the_DT serum_NN was_VBD injected_VBN under_IN the_DT skin_NN 2_CD or_CC 3_CD hours_NNS after_IN the_DT intraperitoneal_JJ infection_NN with_IN cultures_NNS able_JJ to_TO kill_VB rats_NNS in_IN 12_CD to_TO 18_CD hours_NNS ._.
12_CD ._.
These_DT experiments_NNS show_VBP that_IN the_DT serum_NN of_IN the_DT No_NNP ._.
4_CD ,_, horse_NN was_VBD the_DT most_RBS active_JJ ,_, and_CC that_IN of_IN the_DT No_NNP ._.
1_CD horse_NN was_VBD the_DT weakest_JJS ._.
13_CD ._.
The_DT results_NNS are_VBP in_IN accordance_NN with_IN the_DT experiments_NNS made_VBN with_IN the_DT same_JJ serums_NNS on_IN plague_NN patients_NNS ._.
14_CD ._.
With_IN these_DT experiments_NNS the_DT Plague_NNP Commission_NNP have_VBP been_VBN acquainted_VBN by_IN Dr._NNP Galeotti_NNP and_CC by_IN other_JJ witnesses_NNS who_WP had_VBD occasion_NN to_TO examine_VB the_DT treated_JJ cases_NNS and_CC it_PRP would_MD be_VB useless_JJ to_TO report_VB these_DT results_NNS ._.
15_CD ._.
Now_RB I_PRP have_VBP found_VBN the_DT horses_NNS treated_VBN by_IN Dr._NNP Galeotti_NNP in_IN good_JJ condition_NN and_CC I_PRP hope_VBP they_PRP will_MD give_VB an_DT active_JJ serum_NN ._.
?_. 377_CD 16_CD ._.
The_DT first_JJ essays_NNS made_VBN by_IN Dr._NNP Galeotti_NNP on_IN rats_NNS gave_VBD very_RB satisfactory_JJ results_NNS ,_, and_CC these_DT result_NN will_MD be_VB communicated_VBN to_TO the_DT Plague_NNP Commission_NNP together_RB with_IN those_DT of_IN the_DT following_JJ experiments_NNS by_IN Dr._NNP Galeotti_NNP himself_PRP ._.
17_CD ._.
In_IN accordance_NN with_IN my_PRP$ personal_JJ experience_NN on_IN the_DT preparation_NN of_IN curative_JJ serum_NN in_IN general_JJ and_CC specially_RB in_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT preparation_NN of_IN the_DT antiplague_NN serum_NN ,_, I_PRP must_MD say_VB that_IN not_RB all_PDT the_DT horses_NNS are_VBP able_JJ to_TO give_VB a_DT serum_NN imbued_VBN with_IN sufficient_JJ curative_NN properties_NNS ,_, and_CC that_IN some_DT horses_NNS are_VBP able_JJ to_TO give_VB a_DT good_JJ serum_NN only_RB after_IN a_DT long_JJ process_NN of_IN repeated_VBN inoculations_NNS ._.
18_CD ._.
I_PRP believe_VBP that_IN the_DT strength_NN of_IN the_DT serum_NN prepared_VBN ,_, following_VBG my_PRP$ method_NN ,_, is_VBZ due_JJ to_TO the_DT presence_NN in_IN the_DT blood_NN of_IN substances_NNS elaborated_VBN by_IN the_DT cells_NNS of_IN the_DT organism_NN of_IN the_DT horses_NNS ,_, during_IN the_DT general_JJ reactions_NNS ,_, which_WDT follows_VBZ every_DT inoculation_NN ._.
19_CD ._.
When_WRB the_DT activity_NN of_IN the_DT serum_NN is_VBZ in_IN proportion_NN to_TO the_DT number_NN and_CC strength_NN of_IN these_DT reactions_NNS ,_, the_DT horses_NNS ,_, able_JJ to_TO give_VB strong_JJ reactions_NNS ,_, will_MD furnish_VB surely_RB an_DT active_JJ serum_NN ._.
20_CD ._.
On_IN the_DT contrary_JJ ,_, the_DT horses_NNS in_IN bad_JJ condition_NN of_IN nutrition_NN and_CC in_IN which_WDT the_DT material_NN exchange_NN is_VBZ abnormal_JJ ,_, show_NN ,_, after_IN the_DT inoculations_NNS ,_, phenomena_NNS of_IN im-proverishment_JJ and_CC topor_NN ,_, and_CC are_VBP not_RB able_JJ to_TO give_VB a_DT sufficiently_RB strong_JJ serum_NN ._.
21_CD ._.
For_IN this_DT reason_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ necessary_JJ to_TO keep_VB the_DT horses_NNS quiet_VBP for_IN some_DT time_NN after_IN the_DT first_JJ blood_NN letting_NN and_CC before_IN making_VBG new_JJ inoculations_NNS ._.
22_CD ._.
I_PRP have_VBP requested_VBN Dr._NNP Galeotti_NNP to_TO give_VB to_TO the_DT Plague_NNP Commission_NNP the_DT most_RBS detailed_JJ information_NN about_IN the_DT experiments_NNS which_WDT will_MD be_VB done_VBN on_IN plague_NN patients_NNS with_IN the_DT serum_NN of_IN the_DT horses_NNS which_WDT are_VBP now_RB under_IN treatment_NN ,_, and_CC also_RB ,_, in_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT researches_NNS designed_VBN to_TO determine_VB on_IN rats_NNS ,_, with_IN the_DT greatest_JJS exactness_NN possible_JJ ,_, the_DT strength_NN of_IN the_DT serum_NN of_IN every_DT treated_JJ horse_NN ._.
23_CD ._.
Being_VBG requested_VBN by_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP Commissioner_NNP to_TO express_VB my_PRP$ opinion_NN on_IN the_DT importance_NN of_IN rats_NNS in_IN the_DT diffusion_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN ,_, I_PRP offer_VBP the_DT following_NN :_: -_: 1st_CD ._.
I_PRP have_VBP performed_VBN experiments_NNS on_IN hundreds_NNS of_IN rats_NNS of_IN different_JJ races_NNS ,_, and_CC living_NN in_IN the_DT most_RBS different_JJ conditions_NNS ,_, and_CC I_PRP have_VBP found_VBN that_IN almost_RB all_DT are_VBP able_JJ to_TO get_VB plague_NN ._.
2nd_CD ._.
Keeping_VBG in_IN a_DT cage_NN several_JJ infected_JJ and_CC non-infected_JJ rats3_NN all_DT die_VBP in_IN a_DT short_JJ time_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN their_PRP$ bodies_NNS plague_VBP microbes_NNS are_VBP always_RB to_TO be_VB found_VBN ._.
3rd_CD ._.
Mixing_VBG a_DT virulent_NN plague_NN culture_NN with_IN the_DT food_NN given_VBN to_TO some_DT rats_NNS ,_, all_PDT these_DT generally_RB die_VBP from_IN plague_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ quite_RB common_JJ to_TO find_VB the_DT bacilli_NN in_IN their_PRP$ fces_NNS ._.
4th_CD ._.
Generally_RB in_IN the_DT infected_JJ rats_VBZ the_DT microbes_NNS enter_VBP the_DT blood_NN ,_, and_CC with_IN great_JJ facility_NN they_PRP pass_VBP into_IN the_DT urine_NN ;_: thus_RB this_DT urine_JJ becomes_VBZ a_DT very_RB infectant_JJ liquid_NN ._.
5th_CD ._.
In_IN 1897_CD ,_, I_PRP had_VBD occasion_NN to_TO examine_VB at_IN Poona_NNP some_DT dead_JJ rats_NNS found_VBN in_IN a_DT granary_JJ ,_, and_CC in_IN these_DT I_PRP found_VBD plenty_NN of_IN microbes_NNS ._.
I_PRP investigated_VBD also_RB the_DT corn_NN of_IN this_DT granary_JJ ,_, but_CC I_PRP did_VBD not_RB discover_VB any_DT plague_NN microbes_NN in_IN it_PRP ._.
Nevertheless_RB ,_, I_PRP know_VBP that_IN 2_CD cooks_NNS who_WP ate_VBP of_IN this_DT corn_NN died_VBD from_IN plague_NN a_DT few_JJ days_NNS after_IN ._.
6th_CD ._.
I_PRP believe_VBP that_IN the_DT rats_NNS represent_VBP one_CD of_IN the_DT most_RBS important_JJ means_NNS of_IN diffusion_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ,_, because_IN they_PRP are_VBP able_JJ to_TO carry_VB everywhere_RB virulent_JJ microbes_NNS ._.
7th_CD ._.
The_DT destruction_NN of_IN the_DT rats_NNS is_VBZ one_CD of_IN the_DT most_RBS important_JJ measures_NNS to_TO be_VB taken_VBN against_IN the_DT plague_NN ._.
For_IN this_DT purpose_JJ poisons_NNS can_MD be_VB very_RB useful_JJ ,_, and_CC specially_RB would_MD it_PRP be_VB useful_JJ to_TO provoke_VB amongst_IN the_DT rats_NNS another_DT epidemic_JJ ,_, with_IN a_DT microbe_NN not_RB virulent_JJ to_TO man_NN ._.
For_IN this_DT purpose_NN ,_, I_PRP believe_VBP that_IN the_DT Laser_NNP 's_POS microbe_NN would_MD be_VB ?_. 378_CD the_DT best_JJS ,_, because_IN it_PRP was_VBD used_VBN with_IN satisfactory_JJ results_NNS in_IN Thessalia_NNP some_DT years_NNS ago_RB ._.
I_PRP got_VBD a_DT culture_NN of_IN this_DT microbe_NN and_CC tried_VBD it_PRP on_IN white_JJ mice_NN ,_, and_CC obtained_VBD a_DT culture_NN which_WDT was_VBD very_RB virulent_JJ ,_, but_CC I_PRP had_VBD not_RB success_NN with_IN the_DT black_JJ rats_NNS ._.
I_PRP know_VBP that_IN the_DT same_JJ was_VBD experienced_VBN by_IN Dr._NNP Galeotti_NNP ,_, to_TO whom_WP I_PRP sent_VBD one_CD of_IN my_PRP$ cultures_NNS of_IN Lasar_NNP 's_POS microbe_NN ._.
Dr._NNP Galeotti_NNP will_MD receive_VB in_IN a_DT short_JJ time_NN from_IN Plague_NNP another_DT more_RBR virulent_JJ culture_NN of_IN the_DT same_JJ microbe_NN ,_, and_CC will_MD repeat_VB the_DT experiments_NNS ._.
DR._NNP A._NN LUSTIG_NNP ,_, Prof._NNP ,_, R._NNP University_NNP ,_, Florence_NNP ._.

W._NNP L._NNP HARVEY_NNP ,_, Commissioner_NNP ._.
13_CD ._.
Dr._NNP Choksy_NNP being_VBG called_VBN on_IN for_IN a_DT report_NN on_IN the_DT cases_NNS inoculated_VBN at_IN the_DT Arthur_NNP Road_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, during_IN January_NNP and_CC February_NNP ,_, with_IN the_DT new_JJ serum_NN manufactured_VBN at_IN Parel_NNP ,_, his_PRP$ letter_NN No_NNP ._.

14_CD ._.

35963_CD of_IN 25th_CD of_IN March_NNP ,_, I_PRP have_VBP the_DT honour_NN to_TO state-_NN (_( 1_CD )_) That_IN I_PRP am_VBP not_RB fully_RB acquainted_VBN with_IN the_DT results_NNS of_IN experiments_NNS made_VBN on_IN animals_NNS by_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Commission_NNP with_IN the_DT serum_NN prepared_VBD locally_RB ._.

(_( 2_CD )_) The_DT observations_NNS made_VBN in_IN hospitals_NNS up_RB to_TO date_NN ,_, -136_JJ patients_NNS ,_, of_IN whom_WP 91_CD have_VBP died_VBN and_CC 45_CD recovered_VBN ,_, giving_VBG a_DT mortality_NN rate_NN of_IN 6691_CD per_IN cent_NN ,_, against_IN about_IN 80_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.

(_( 3_CD )_) In_IN my_PRP$ experiences_NNS last_JJ year_NN with_IN the_DT first_JJ supply_NN of_IN serum_NN obtained_VBN from_IN Florence_NNP ,_, it_PRP was_VBD found_VBN that_IN this_DT first_JJ serum_NN was_VBD weak_JJ and_CC its_PRP$ strength_NN improved_VBN with_IN subsequent_JJ bleedings_NNS ._.

''_''
This_DT advice_NN deserves_VBZ the_DT more_RBR serious_JJ consideration_NN inasmuch_RB as_IN the_DT serum_NN treatment_NN is_VBZ the_DT only_JJ form_NN of_IN remedy_NN that_IN offers_VBZ any_DT hope_NN of_IN reducing_VBG the_DT mortality_NN amongst_VBZ the_DT sufferers_NNS from_IN plague_NN ._.
I_PRP believe_VBP a_DT second_JJ supply_NN of_IN serum_NN can_MD be_VB obtained_VBN after_IN a_DT month_NN ._.

The_DT last_JJ suggestion_NN of_IN Dr._NNP Galeotti_NNP that_IN the_DT second_JJ supply_NN of_IN serum_NN should_MD be_VB offered_VBN to_TO the_DT Medical_NNP practitioners_NNS in_IN private_JJ practice_NN is_VBZ a_DT good_JJ one_CD ._.
I_PRP believe_VBP there_EX is_VBZ a_DT feeling_NN in_IN the_DT Medical_NNP profession_NN that_IN the_DT serum_NN should_MD be_VB given_VBN a_DT further_JJ trial_NN ._.

36094_CD of_IN the_DT 20th_JJ ultimo_NN ,_, I_PRP have_VBP the_DT honour_NN to_TO submit_VB the_DT following_JJ report_NN and_CC returns_NNS showing_VBG the_DT results_NNS obtained_VBN by_IN Professor_NNP Lustig_NNP 's_POS serum_NN ._.
2_CD ._.
During_IN February_NNP 1899_CD ,_, 68_CD cases_NNS were_VBD treated_VBN with_IN Professor_NNP Lustig_NNP 's_POS serum_NN of_IN whom_WP 48_CD died_VBD and_CC 20_CD recovered_VBN ,_, giving_VBG a_DT mortality_NN rate_NN of_IN 70.58_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.

The_DT results_NNS therefore_VBD show_JJ 8.58_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
in_IN favour_NN of_IN the_DT serum_NN cases_NNS ._.
3_CD ._.
During_IN March_NNP 1899_CD ,_, 74_CD cases_NNS were_VBD treated_VBN of_IN whom_WP 49_CD died_VBD and_CC 25_CD recovered_VBN ,_, giving_VBG a_DT mortality_NN rate_NN of_IN 66.21_CD per_IN cent_NN ,_, as_IN against_IN 7948_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
in_IN cases_NNS not_RB treated_VBN with_IN the_DT serum_NN ._.

4_CD ._.
The_DT following_VBG table_JJ contrasts_NNS the_DT mortality_NN rate_NN amongst_IN the_DT two_CD classes_NNS of_IN cases_NNS :_: -_: Mortality_NN rate_NN of_IN cases_NNS treated_VBN with_IN serum_NN ._.
Mortality_NNP rate_NN of_IN cases_NNS not_RB treated_VBN with_IN serum_NN ._.
Difference_NN ._.
February_NNP 70.58_CD 79.16_CD 8.58_CD March_NNP 66.21_CD 79.48_CD 13.27_CD 5_CD ._.
As_IN regards_NNS the_DT cases_NNS treated_VBN with_IN the_DT serum_NN ,_, it_PRP may_MD be_VB noted_VBN that_IN all_DT cases_NNS that_WDT were_VBD moribund_VBN and_CC all_DT those_DT that_WDT had_VBD gone_VBN over_IN six_CD or_CC seven_CD days_NNS and_CC were_VBD either_RB semi-convalescent_JJ or_CC convalescent_NN were_VBD excluded_VBN ,_, so_IN that_IN the_DT cases_NNS injected_VBN with_IN the_DT serum_NN represented_VBD a_DT fairly_RB average_JJ type_NN of_IN the_DT most_RBS acute_JJ cases_NNS ._.
The_DT mortality_NN rate_NN amongst_IN the_DT cases_NNS not_RB treated_VBN with_IN the_DT serum_NN would_MD have_VB been_VBN higher_JJR were_VBD it_PRP not_RB for_IN the_DT fact_NN that_IN a_DT large_JJ number_NN of_IN semi-convalescent_JJ and_CC convalescent_JJ cases_NNS are_VBP included_VBN amongst_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC they_PRP have_VBP thus_RB contributed_VBN in_IN favour_NN of_IN the_DT non-serum_JJ cases_NNS ._.
If_IN anything_NN the_DT better_JJR results_NNS with_IN the_DT so-called_JJ ``_`` selected_VBN ``_`` cases_NNS treated_VBN with_IN the_DT serum_NN have_VBP been_VBN more_JJR than_IN counterbalanced_VBN by_IN the_DT latter_NN ._.
6_CD ._.
The_DT serum_NN treatment_NN was_VBD put_VBN to_TO as_IN severe_JJ a_DT test_NN as_IN possible_JJ during_IN the_DT height_NN of_IN an_DT epidemic_JJ which_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN known_VBN for_IN its_PRP$ extreme_JJ virulence_NN ._.
And_CC so_RB much_RB so_IN that_IN during_IN some_DT periods_NNS in_IN February_NNP and_CC March_NNP the_DT mortality_NN amongst_VBZ the_DT admissions_NNS ranged_VBD between_IN 85_CD to_TO 90_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
That_IN the_DT serum_NN can_MD and_CC does_VBZ reduce_VB the_DT mortality_NN rate_NN even_RB in_IN an_DT epidemic_NN of_IN the_DT present_JJ type_NN is_VBZ therefore_RB beyond_IN doubt_NN ._.

From_IN a_DT comparison_NN of_IN the_DT returns_NNS for_IN February_NNP ,_, March_NNP and_CC April_NNP it_PRP appears_VBZ that_IN each_DT succeeding_VBG month_NN the_DT serum_NN shows_VBZ better_JJR results_NNS as_IN it_PRP becomes_VBZ stronger_JJR and_CC more_RBR active_JJ ._.

)_) -That_WP the_DT serum_NN has_VBZ and_CC can_MD not_RB but_CC have_VBP a_DT limited_JJ value_NN in_IN the_DT treatment_NN of_IN the_DT class_NN of_IN patients_NNS admitted_VBN into_IN the_DT Arthur_NNP Road_NNP Hospital_NNP -_: patients_NNS drawn_VBP from_IN the_DT lowest_JJS strata_NN of_IN society_NN ,_, badly_RB housed_VBD ,_, badly_RB nourished_VBD or_CC half-starved_JJ ,_, the_DT houseless_NN ,_, the_DT friendless_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT vagrant_NN ,_, picked_VBD up_RP from_IN the_DT streets_NNS and_CC byelanes_NNS of_IN the_DT City_NNP and_CC brought_VBD to_TO the_DT hospital_NN in_IN a_DT moribund_NN or_CC semi-moribund_JJ condition_NN ,_, and_CC after_IN the_DT vital_JJ organs_NNS had_VBD become_VBN thoroughly_RB disintegrated_VBN from_IN saturation_NN with_IN the_DT plague_NN poison_NN ._.

To_TO THE_DT MUNICIPAL_NNP COMMISSIONER_NNP ,_, SIR_NNP ,_, -I_WDT have_VBP the_DT honour_NN to_TO submit_VB the_DT following_JJ report_NN on_IN the_DT observations_NNS conducted_VBN by_IN treating_VBG every_DT alternate_NN case_NN of_IN plague_NN with_IN Professor_NNP Lustig_NNP 's_POS serum_NN :_: -_: 1_CD ._.

And_CC the_DT results_NNS are_VBP just_RB as_IN I_PRP had_VBD anticipated_VBN ,_, fully_RB bearing_VBG out_RP and_CC confirming_VBG the_DT conclusions_NNS I_PRP had_VBD arrived_VBN at_IN in_IN the_DT report_NN above_RB mentioned_VBD as_IN to_TO the_DT best_JJS way_NN of_IN conducting_VBG similar_JJ investigations_NNS ._.
However_RB attractive_JJ and_CC plausibly_RB fair_VBD the_DT method_NN of_IN the_DT treatment_NN of_IN every_DT alternate_NN case_NN may_MD appear_VB on_IN the_DT surface_NN ,_, when_WRB tested_VBN with_IN rigid_JJ scientific_JJ accuracy_NN it_PRP falls_VBZ to_TO the_DT ground_NN and_CC exposes_VBZ the_DT fallacies_NNS incidental_VBP to_TO it_PRP ,_, even_RB in_IN a_DT small_JJ series_NN of_IN 46_CD cases_NNS as_IN the_DT present_JJ ._.
2_CD ._.
In_IN this_DT series_NN observations_NNS were_VBD conducted_VBN on_IN 46_CD plague_NN patients_NNS ,_, and_CC every_DT alternate_NN case_NN was_VBD treated_VBN with_IN the_DT serum_NN ,_, irrespective_NN of_IN the_DT type_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ,_, the_DT -state_NN of_IN the_DT patient_NN ,_, the_DT duration_NN of_IN illness_NN ,_, the_DT position_NN of_IN buboes_NNS ,_, and_CC irrespective_JJ also_RB of_IN age_NN ,_, sex_NN and_CC caste_NN ,_, etc._FW ,_, etc._FW ,_, conditions_NNS which_WDT are_VBP absolutely_RB necessary_JJ for_IN proper_JJ control_NN cases_NNS ,_, and_CC which_WDT even_RB Professor_NNP Wright_NNP of_IN the_DT Indian_NNP Plague_NNP Commission_NNP had_VBD to_TO admit_VB to_TO be_VB the_DT most_RBS reliable_JJ and_CC the_DT least_JJS open_JJ to_TO error_VB ._.
Under_IN these_DT circumstances_NNS the_DT serum_NN had_VBD to_TO be_VB wasted_VBN in_IN 7_CD moribund_NN cases_NNS and_CC -also_NN in_IN one_CD convalescent_NN case_NN that_WDT did_VBD not_RB actually_RB require_VB it_PRP ,_, and_CC had_VBD to_TO be_VB injected_VBN with_IN a_DT small_JJ quantity_NN in_IN order_NN to_TO fulfil_VB the_DT conditions_NNS of_IN the_DT experiment_NN ._.
3_CD ._.
The_DT results_NNS of_IN these_DT observations_NNS are_VBP no_DT less_RBR interesting_JJ than_IN instructive_JJ ,_, and_CC illustrate_NN in_IN a_DT way_NN the_DT errors_NNS that_WDT tend_VBP to_TO vitiate_VB the_DT results_NNS of_IN all_DT such_JJ observation_NN ._.
Of_IN the_DT 23_CD cases_NNS treated_VBN with_IN the_DT serum_NN ,_, 15_CD died_VBD and_CC 8_CD recovered_VBD ;_: in_IN the_DT 23_CD alternate_NN cases_NNS not_RB so_RB treated_JJ ,_, the_DT results_NNS were_VBD the_DT same_JJ ._.
But_CC the_DT conditions_NNS in_IN these_DT two_CD series_NN were_VBD not_RB identical_JJ ;_: for_IN whereas_IN the_DT series_NN of_IN cases_NNS ,_, not_RB treated_VBN with_IN the_DT serum_NN ,_, had_VBD the_DT advantage_NN in_IN their_PRP$ favour_NN of_IN 4_CD convalescent_NN cases_NNS ,_, there_EX was_VBD only_RB one_CD such_JJ convalescent_NN case_NN included_VBD amongst_PDT the_DT serum_NN cases_NNS ;_: moreover_RB ,_, the_DT latter_NN had_VBD 7_CD moribund_NN cases_NNS to_TO 6_CD in_IN the_DT former_JJ ._.
And_CC as_IN all_PDT the_DT moribund_NN cases_NNS died_VBD ,_, and_CC all_PDT the_DT convalescent_NN oases_VBZ recovered_VBN in_IN both_DT the_DT series_NN ,_, the_DT serum_NN series_NN had_VBD one_CD convalescent_NN case_NN only_RB in_IN its_PRP$ favour_NN ,_, and_CC one_CD more_JJR moribund_NN against_IN it_PRP ,_, as_IN contrasted_VBN with_IN the_DT non-serum_JJ series_NN that_WDT had_VBD 4_CD convalescents_NNS and_CC one_CD less_JJR moribund_NN ,_, and_CC proportionately_RB ,_, therefore_RB ,_, the_DT results_NNS in_IN the_DT latter_JJ series_NN preponderated_VBN in_IN its_PRP$ favour_NN to_TO the_DT above_JJ extent_NN :_: -_: No_DT ._.

Non-serum_JJ cases_NNS ._.
23_CD 23_CD Convalescent_NNP 1_CD 4_CD Moribund_NNP 6_CD Total_NNP ..._: 15_CD 13_CD 403_CD The_DT above_NN statement_NN shows_VBZ that_IN for_IN actual_JJ basis_NN of_IN comparison_NN ,_, only_RB the_DT 15_CD serum_NN cases_NNS could_MD be_VB compared_VBN with_IN the_DT 13_CD non-serum_JJ cases_NNS ._.

4_CD ._.
It_PRP thus_RB appears_VBZ that_IN in_IN one_CD and_CC the_DT same_JJ series_NN of_IN cases_NNS results_NNS differ_VBP consi-_JJ derably_NN and_CC are_VBP influenced_VBN for_IN better_JJR or_CC worse_JJR in_IN proportion_NN to_TO the_DT number_NN of_IN con-_JJ valescent_NN and_CC muribund_NN cases_NNS that_WDT happen_VBP to_TO be_VB admitted_VBN under_IN the_DT one_CD or_CC the_DT other_JJ bead_NN ,_, and_CC are_VBP therefore_RB inconclusive_JJ for_IN or_CC against_IN the_DT serum_NN ,_, inasmuch_JJ as_IN it_PRP is_VBZ impossible_JJ to_TO so_RB control_VB the_DT admissions_NNS that_WDT convalescent_NN and_CC moribund_NN cases_NNS should_MD fall_VB in_IN in_IN equal_JJ proportions_NNS in_IN each_DT series_NN ._.

To_TO THE_DT DEPUTY_NNP COMMISSIONER_NNP ,_, PLAGUE_NNP OPERATIONS_NNP ._.
SIR_NNP ,_, -With_NNP reference_NN to_TO Dr._NNP Choksy_NNP 's_POS report_NN on_IN the_DT cases_NNS treated_VBD with_IN Professor_NNP Lustig_NNP 's_POS serum_NN in_IN May_NNP 1899_CD ,_, I_PRP have_VBP the_DT honour_NN to_TO point_VB out_RP that_IN the_DT arguments_NNS brought_VBN forward_RB are_VBP perfectly_RB valid_JJ ,_, when_WRB it_PRP is_VBZ possible_JJ only_RB to_TO experiment_VB with_IN a_DT small_JJ number_NN of_IN cases_NNS ;_: when_WRB there_EX are_VBP only_RB a_DT few_JJ cases_NNS to_TO be_VB divided_VBN into_IN the_DT two_CD groups-_JJ 1_CD ._.
Control_NNP cases_NNS ._.
2_CD ._.
Cases_NNS treated_VBN with_IN the_DT serum_NN ._.
One_CD or_CC other_JJ of_IN these_DT groups_NNS will_MD probably_RB contain_VB a_DT large_JJ proportion_NN of_IN the_DT convalescent_NN or_CC moribund_NN cases_NNS ,_, and_CC in_IN this_DT way_NN the_DT statistics_NNS may_MD give_VB a_DT wrong_JJ impression_NN of_IN the_DT effect_NN of_IN the_DT serum_NN treatment_NN ._.
On_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN if_IN only_RB picked_VBN cases_NNS are_VBP treated_VBN with_IN the_DT serum_NN ,_, the_DT results_NNS will_MD be_VB always_RB open_JJ to_TO criticism_NN ._.
The_DT only_JJ method_VBZ the_DT results_NNS of_IN which_WDT will_MD be_VB above_IN criticism_NN is_VBZ to_TO treat_VB every_DT alternate_NN case_NN of_IN plague_NN admitted_VBN into_IN the_DT hospital_NN ,_, while_IN keeping_VBG the_DT remaining_VBG cases_NNS as_IN control_NN ._.
Where_WRB this_DT method_NN has_VBZ been_VBN adopted_VBN with_IN a_DT large_JJ number_NN of_IN cases_NNS (_( for_IN instance_NN 150_CD or_CC more_JJR of_IN both_DT groups_NNS )_) ,_, the_DT convalescent_NN and_CC moribund_NN cases_NNS will_MD be_VB found_VBN to_TO have_VB been_VBN very_RB equally_RB divided_VBN ,_, and_CC a_DT true_JJ and_CC scientific_JJ opinion_NN can_MD be_VB formed_VBN as_IN to_TO the_DT value_NN of_IN the_DT remedy_NN ._.
This_DT has_VBZ been_VBN well_RB instanced_VBN in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN diphtheria_NN antitoxin_NN ._.
In_IN some_DT hospitals_NNS ,_, where_WRB only_RB picked_JJ cases_NNS were_VBD treated_VBN ,_, the_DT percentage_NN of_IN recoveries_NNS was_VBD very_RB large_JJ ,_, giving_VBG a_DT very_RB false_JJ impression_NN of_IN the_DT real_JJ value_NN of_IN the_DT treatment_NN ._.
In_IN one_CD large_JJ fever_NN hospital_NN most_RBS careful_JJ statistics_NNS were_VBD kept_VBN of_IN the_DT results_NNS of_IN inoculating_VBG every_DT alternate_NN case_NN ._.
Nearly_RB 1,000_CD cases_NNS were_VBD compared_VBN in_IN this_DT way_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP was_VBD found_VBN in_IN the_DT end_NN that_IN the_DT moribund_NN and_CC very_RB mild_VB ?_. 405_CD cases_NNS in_IN the_DT two_CD groups_NNS were_VBD almost_RB exactly_RB equal_JJ in_IN number_NN ,_, and_CC as_IN a_DT result_NN an_DT ._.
accurate_JJ estimate_NN of_IN the_DT value_NN of_IN the_DT treatment_NN was_VBD formed_VBN ._.
The_DT results_NNS obtained_VBD at_IN this_DT hospital_NN have_VBP formed_VBN the_DT standard_JJ figures_NNS giving_VBG the_DT true_JJ effect_NN of_IN the_DT antitoxin_NN treatment_NN of_IN diphtheria_NN and_CC have_VBP never_RB been_VBN criticized_VBN or_CC controverted_VBN ._.
The_DT same_JJ absolutely_RB fair_JJ test_NN ought_MD to_TO be_VB applied_VBN to_TO the_DT treatment_NN of_IN plague_NN with_IN Professor_NNP Lustig_NNP 's_POS serum_NN ._.
When_WRB a_DT considerable_JJ number_NN of_IN cases_NNS have_VBP been_VBN treated_VBN on_IN these_DT lines_NNS ,_, the_DT sources_NNS of_IN error_NN ,_, quoted_VBN by_IN Dr._NNP Choksy_NNP ,_, will_MD be_VB found_VBN to_TO have_VB been_VBN eliminated_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT comparison_NN of_IN the_DT results_NNS in_IN the_DT two_CD groups_NNS of_IN cases_NNS will_MD establish_VB or_CC otherwise_VB once_RB for_IN all_PDT the_DT value_NN of_IN serum_JJ treatment_NN of_IN plague_NN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, O._NNP H._NNP CAYLEY_NNP ,_, Ag_NNP ._.

W._NNP L._NNP HARVEY_NNP ._.
25th_CD June_NNP 1899_CD ._.
This_DT ,_, then_RB ,_, is_VBZ ,_, as_RB far_RB as_IN we_PRP have_VBP gone_VBN ,_, a_DT history_NN of_IN the_DT manufacture_NN and_CC use_NN of_IN Lustig_NNP 's_POS serum_NN as_IN prepared_JJ in_IN Bombay_NNP and_CC will_MD be_VB found_VBN very_RB interesting_JJ ._.
I_PRP am_VBP ._.
personally_RB of_IN opinion_NN that_IN the_DT manufacture_NN of_IN this_DT serum_NN should_MD be_VB continued_VBN as_RB long_RB as_IN the_DT results_NNS given_VBN are_VBP hopeful_JJ ,_, which_WDT they_PRP decidedly_RB are_VBP ;_: or_CC until_IN some_DT other_JJ and_CC more_RBR potent_JJ remedy_NN is_VBZ found_VBN to_TO act_VB on_IN this_DT most_RBS fatal_JJ disease_NN ._.
Dr._NNP Cayley_NNP 's_POS remarks_NNS are_VBP very_RB much_RB to_TO the_DT point_NN ,_, and_CC should_MD the_DT epidemic_NN again_RB come_VBN on_IN us_PRP we_PRP will_MD ,_, I_PRP trust_VBP ,_, be_VB able_JJ to_TO give_VB the_DT serum_NN a_DT fair_JJ trial_NN ._.
